waħdahu wakafarnaaː bimaaː kunnaaː bihi muʃrikijna maː huwa siruu aːlraqm sabʕaa ʔiinnaaː mursiluwaː aːlnnaaːqaai fitnaaan llahum faaːrtaqibhum waʶaʶːsˤtˤaʶbiʶrˤ taʕrifu fij wud͡ʒuwhihim naʶdˤrˤaʶaʶaʶ aːlʁanijju aːlħamijdu ʔiilaːaːa ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbaʶ aːljamijni fmaː lhm ʕn aːltðkra mʕrˤdˤjn wʔamaː mn d͡ʒaːʔk jsʕaː jʕlm maː bjn ʔajdjhm wmaː χlfhm wʔilaː aːllh trd͡ʒʕ aːlʔamwr mn aːχtrʕh jaː traː bzjaːrtj rʔajtu tˤaʶːʔiʶrˤaʶːaʶn juħllqu fwqa ʃd͡ʒrain sˤfʕth kfaːan ʕlaː wd͡ʒhh jaʕlamu maaː bajna ʔaajdijhim wamaaː χalfahum walaaː juʶħiʶjtˤuʶwnaʶ bihi ʕilmanaː bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm laː ʔaqsm snħl aːlmʃkla bikatbi rizqihi waʔaad͡ʒalihi waʕamalihi waʃaqijjun ʔaw saʕijdun waqaaːla ʔaːχaru fmaː lhm laː jʔumnwn ʔilaː mn twlaː wkfr qd ʔaflħ mn tzkaː wakataba ʕumaru bnu aʶːlˤχaʶtˤtˤaʶaʶːbiʶ mmuʶtˤaʶhaʶrˤaʶaʶiʶn ʔin aːlðjn jχʃwn rbhm baːlʁjb lhm mʁfra wʔad͡ʒr kbjr waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi kullu ʕaqlin laaː judaaːraaː bihi aːlkullu falajsa biʕaqlin taaːmmin ʔajmknnj sʔuaːlk ʕn bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm waːlʕaːdjaːt dˤbħaʶː wʔanaː mnaː aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħwn wmnaː dwn ðlk knaː tˤrˤaʶːʔiʶq qddaː ʔiðaaː kaaːna aʶːlˤʁaʶrˤaʶdˤuʶ qad jaʶħsˤuʶlˤuʶ lahu biaːlnnakijri waʔiin walaaː jaħjaaː qaːlwaː rbnaː ʁlbt ʕljnaː ʃqwtnaː wknaː qwmaː dˤaʶːlˤjn ʔiinnaaː ʔaanzalnaaːhu qurʔaːnanaː ʕarabijjanaː laʕallakum taʕqiluwna lmaːðaː jħdθ lj daːʔimaː nfs aːlʔamr wahal ʔaataaːka faħaqijqun biaːlʕaqli ʔaan jakuwna bihi mutamassikanaː waʕalajhi muʶħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤaʶnaʶː lmn aːʃtrjt aʶːlˤʕðˤm fhl ʕsjtm ʔin twljtm ʔan tfsdwaː fj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wtqtˤʕwaʶː ʔarħaːmkm χjr ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ aːlftaːa aːlʔalmaːs nðˤrˤtuʶhuʶ laː tsurr hw mthwr kaːnt ldjhm mʕaːrf mħdwda fj aːld͡ʒʁraːfjaː ln jsˤbk ʔaħd baːlʔaðaː ʔanaː ħqaːan ʔaθq bqdrth waʔaannahum ðˤaʶnnuʶwaʶː kamaaː ðˤaʶnaʶntuʶm ʔaan lan jabʕaθa aːlllahu ʔaaħadanaː ħaʶːfðˤwaʶː ʕlaː aʶːlˤsˤlˤwaʶːt waʶːlˤsˤlˤaʶːaʶ aʶːlˤwstˤaʶː wqwmwaː llh qaːntjn ʔiilahukum ʔiilahun waaːħidun faaːllaðijna laaː juʔuminuwna biaːlʔaːχiraai quluwbuhum munkiraaun wahum mustakbiruwna limaːrj ʔakθr mn mʔia zwd͡ʒin mn aːlʔaħðja ʔinmaː ʔilhkm aːllh aːlðj laː ʔilh ʔilaː hw wsʕ kl ʃjʔ ʕlmaː faʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ liħukmi rabbika walaː takun kaʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶ aːlħuwti ʔiið naaːdaaː wahuwa maʶkðˤuʶwmuʶn wwd͡ʒwh jwmʔið baːsra fqlnaː aːðhbaː ʔilaː aːlqwm aːlðjn kðbwaː bʔaːjaːtnaː fdmrnaːhm tdmjraː jbdw raːʔiʕaː nħn dˤd aːlʔaslħa aːlnwwja faʔaaʁwajnaaːkum ʔiinnaaː kunnaaː ʁaaːwijna ʔanta fqtˤ thrb mn mʃaːkl aːlħjaːa waʔiin jakun lahumu aːlħaqqu jaʔatuwaː ʔiilajhi muðʕinijna wataraknaaː baʶʕdˤaʶhuʶm jawmaʔiiðin jamuwd͡ʒu fij baʶʕdˤiʶn wanufiχa fij aʶːlˤsˤsˤuʶwrˤiʶ fad͡ʒamaʕnaaːhum d͡ʒamʕanaː ʔiðaaː ʕalimt falaaː tufakkir fij kaθraai man duwnak min aːld͡ʒuhhaaːli wmaː jʔatjhm mn nbj ʔilaː kaːnwaː bh jsthzʔiwn wlhm mqaːmʕ mn ħdjd nwr aːlhdaː sʔaʶħdˤdˤrˤ bʕdˤaʶːaʶn mn aːlqhwa ʔaldjk mftaːħ hðaː aːlbaːb waːlslaːm ʕlj jwm wldt wjwm ʔamwt wjwm ʔabʕθ ħjaː walaʔaan jakuwna bihaaː muʶqaʶsˤsˤiʶrˤaʶnaʶː fajuðʕinu biaːliaːnqijaaːdi ʁrjb hðaː lkn aːlbaːb ftħ lwħdh aːnt tħfr qbrk faʔiiðaaː aːlnnud͡ʒuwmu tˤuʶmiʶsaʶt fʔamaː mn ʔawtj ktaːbh bjmjnh fjqwl haːʔum aːqrʔwaː ktaːbjh maaː tasbiqu min ʔaummaain ʔaad͡ʒalahaaː wamaaː jastaʔaχiruwna hl ttħdθ aːlʔisbaːnja ʔamlk bjtaːan fj aːld͡ʒbaːl nħn laː ntwaːʕd wfj rwaːjai ʁjri aːlttirmðji ʔinh kaːn fj ʔahlh msrwraː wlaː tkwnwaː kaːlðjn tfrqwaː waːχtlfwaː mn bʕd maː d͡ʒaːʔhm aːlbjnaːt wʔawlʔik lhm ʕðaːb ʕðˤjm hw trknaː nðhb maː ʔin tbdʔa aːltdχjn fʔinh jsˤʕb ʕljk trk tlk aːlʕaːda aːlsjʔia ʔinh jħb aʶːlˤsˤjd jawma laaː tamliku nafsun linafsin ʃajʔianaː waaːlʔaamru jawmaʔiiðin lillahi ʔanaː mn ʔaustraːljaː maː qlth sˤħjħ walaʔiin ʔaaðaqnaaːhu naʕmaaːʔa baʕda dˤaʶrˤrˤaʶaʶːʔaʶ massathu lajaquwlanna ðahaba aːlssajiʔiaaːtu ʕannij ʔiinnahu lafariħun faχuwrun ql jaː ʔajhaː aːlnaːs ʔinmaː ʔanaː lkm nðjr mbjn qaːl laː tχtsˤmwaʶː ldj wqd qdmt ʔiljkm baːlwʕjd waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ madadnaaːhaaː waʔaalqajnaaː fijhaaː rawaaːsija waʔaanbatnaaː fijhaaː min kulli zawd͡ʒin bahijd͡ʒin laː faːʔida mn ʕðr khðaː aʶːlˤsˤjn bld ʕðˤjm hl jwd͡ʒd mtd͡ʒr hnaː ʔawlm jtfkrwaː maː bsˤaʶːħbhm mn d͡ʒna ʔin hw ʔilaː nðjr mbjn kn mtsaːmħaː kraːm brra waːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħaʶːt lndχlnhm fj aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħjn laː ʔauqsimu bijawmi aːlqijaaːmaai bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi tanzijlu aːlkitaaːbi mina aːlllahi aːlʕazijzi aːlħakijmi kllnaː ʔasraː sˤbaʶːbaʶːt aːlhwaː waaːlʔaanafaau fij aːlʔaabnaaːʔi fij muqaaːbalaai aːlʔiiʃfaaːqi fij aːlʔaːbaaːʔi wahadajnaaːhumaaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤiʶrˤaʶaʶːtˤaʶ aːlmustaqijma lm tbn rwmaː fj jwm waːħd ʔiinnaaː naχaaːfu min rabbinaaː jawmanaː ʕabuwsanaː sˤrˤaʶːtˤ mstqjm qaaːla rabbi ʔiinnij ðˤaʶlˤaʶmtuʶ nafsij faaːʁfir lij faʁafara lahu ʔiinnahu huwa aːlʁafuwru aːlrraħijmu waʔiið qaaːla muwsaaː lifataaːhu laaː ʔaabraħu ħattaaː ʔaabluʁa mad͡ʒmaʕa aːlbaħrajni ʔaaw ʔaʶaʶmdˤiʶjaʶ ħuqubanaː mdjna aːlqaːhra ʔalʔaːn ʔad͡ʒml mmmaː kaːnt fj aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤaʶː bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ħm wðlkm ðˤnkm aːlðj ðˤnntm brbkm ʔardaːkm fʔaʶsˤbħtm mn aːlχaːsrjn ʃkraːan ʕlaː aːltafahhum waqad qaaːla aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː linabijjihi sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama lmaːðaː jħdθ hðaː daːʔimaːan lj ʔin dʕwtah rbmaː sjʔatj flaː ʔaqsm bmwaːqʕ aːlnd͡ʒwm ʔiinnaaː ʔaanʃaʔanaaːhunna ʔiinʃaaːʔan kjfa sʔasdd djwnaː aːlʔaːn wʔiðaː qrʔi aːlqrʔaːn faːstmʕwaː lh wʔaʶnsˤtwaʶː lʕlkm trħmwn jwm laː tmlk nfs lnfs ʃjʔiaː waːlʔamr jwmʔið llh wlaː tħzn ʕljhm wlaː tkn fj dˤjq mmaː jmkrwn lawlaaː d͡ʒaaːʔuwaː ʕalajhi biʔaarbaʕaai ʃuhadaaːʔa faʔiið lam jaʔatuwaː biaːlʃʃuhadaaːʔi faʔauwlaʔiika ʕinda aːlllahi humu aːlkaaːðibuwna ʔiðaaː kaaːna aːllaðij janbaʁij ʔaan jaʕmalahu fij ħajaaːtihi maʕmuwlanaː jaː mwsaː ʔinh ʔanaː aːllh aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm waʔiin kaaːnuwaː min qabli ʔaan junazzala ʕalajhim min qablihi lamublisijna mn kaːn jrd͡ʒw lqaːʔ aːllh fʔin ʔad͡ʒl aːllh faʔaaχbirnj ʕani aːlʔiħsaːni ljs mʕj ʔakθr mn χmsa dwlaːraːt fj ktaːb mknwn raaːma ʔaamranaː muʕwizanaː ʔaalam jaku nuʶtˤfaʶaʶaʶn min manijjin jumnaaː bal jakuwna minhum ʕalaaː ħaðarin wtħbwn aːlmaːl ħbaː d͡ʒmaː laː aːtklm ʕrbj km ʕmr waːldk ʔinhm kaːnwaː laː jrd͡ʒwn ħsaːbaː ʔaraːdt mnnj aːlkðb waqaaːla ʔibrwjs ʔaʶaʶtˤiʶʕ man fawqak juʶtˤiʶʕk man duwnak wʔiðaː ʔanʕmnaː ʕlaː aːlʔinsaːn ʔaʶʕrˤdˤ tkrmwn aːljtjm rabbanaaː ʔiinnaka man tudχili aːlnnaaːra faqad ʔaaχzajtahu wamaaː lˤiʶlˤðˤðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ min ʔaʶaʶnsˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶn falaaː dunjaaːhum ʔaʶaʶsˤaʶbtuʶm wajaʔanisu bihi aʶːlˤdˤdˤaʶʕiʶjfuʶ maː tdʕwn ʔiljh ʔin ʃaːʔ wtnswn maː tʃrkwn kl ʃjʔ ʕlaː maː jraːm ʕan ʕaaːʔiiʃaaa rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhaaː ʕan aːlnnabiji sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama ʔaannahu qaaːla lamawaddaaun mimman juħibbuk muʶχlˤiʶsˤaʶnaʶː χajrun min aːlrraħimi aːlqarijbi aːlkaaːʃiħi waqaaːla ʔaːχaru rbmaː twm jsttˤjʕ ʔan jfʕl ʃjʔiaːan llmsaːʕda qaːlwaː d͡ʒzaːʔuh mn wd͡ʒd fj rħlh fhw d͡ʒzaːʔuh kðlk ðarraain χajranaː jarahu ʔarjd ʔan trwjaː lj kll maː ħdθ hw ktb rsaːlaan wad͡ʒazaaːhum bimaaː sˤaʶbaʶrˤuʶwaʶː d͡ʒannaaan waħarijranaː fʔamaː aːlðjn kfrwaː fʔaʕðbhm ʕðaːbaː ʃdjdaː fj aːldnjaː waːlʔaːχra wmaː lhm mn naʶːsˤrˤjn tʕlm fj mdrsa ʕmwmja qarijbun min aːlnnaaːsi jwm jdʕwn ʔilaː naːr d͡ʒhnm dʕaː aːlllahi aːllaðij lahu maaː fij aːlssamaaːwaaːti wamaaː fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wawajlun lilkaaːfirijna min ʕaðaaːbin ʃadijdin waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi zaaːʔiidu aːlʔiimhaaːli raaːʔiidu aːlʔiihmaaːli ʔanti ʕljki fqtˤ ʔan tʕidjnj bʃjʔ waːħd fahaðaaː ʔaaslamu aːlmalalajni waʔaaqrabu aːlrrad͡ʒulajni jusaaːmiħu fij waqti aːstaraaːħathu waħijna fatratihi whw aːlðj jħjj wjmjt wlh aːχtlaːf aːlljl waːlnhaːr ʔaflaː tʕqlwn swf nuqlʕ fj ʁdˤwn dqaːʔiq taʶðˤuʶnnuʶ ʔaan jufʕala bihaaː faaːqiraaun faʁulibuwaː hunaaːlika waaːnqalabuwaː sˤaʶaʶːʁiʶrˤiʶjnaʶ fsnjsrh lljsraː waʔaanna aːlʔaaħmaqa maʶħðˤuʶwðˤuʶn aːnaː mtʕb d͡ʒdaː lkj aːmʃj aːkθr mn ðlk bqj aːlqljl mn aːlħljb fj aːlzd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa knt ttħdθ fj nwmk aːlbaːrħa jħtaːd͡ʒ twm lˤbʕdˤ aːlmaːʔ kaːn ʁbj kfaːjh lrʔujthaː mra aːχraː ʕndm ʔabtsm lldnjaː hj tnhaːl ʕljj baʶːlˤʁdˤb walaaː jataðakkaru ħiʶfaʶaʶːðˤaʶnaʶː walaaː ʕahdanaː qaːl saːmj ðlk lljlaː liʔaannahu ʔaaχaffu ʔiθqaaːlanaː wakulafanaː lhðh aːlmsrħja θlaːθa fsˤwlˤ laː tnsa ʔan trsl hðh aːlrsaːla qaaːla ʔaafaraʔaajtum maaː kuntum taʕbuduwna twqft aːlmbaːraːa bsbb ʕaʶːsˤfaʶ rʕdja wlkn ʔanaː ʔafhm maː jqwl tˤlˤbtk laː jħbwnnj lqd smʕt aːlkθjr ʕnk kj nsbħk kθjraː waaːlʁinaaː ʕan aːlnnaaːsi lqd qlt lk ʔanh ljs hnaː ħaːwl ʔan jdfʕnj lˤʔaʶsqtˤ fj aːlmaːʔ ʔiillaaː aːllaðijna taaːbuwaː min qabli ʔaan taqdiruwaː ʕalajhim faaːʕlamuwaː ʔaanna aːlllaha ʁafuwrun raħijmun aːlmthm brjʔ ħtaː tθbt ʔidaːnth faqaaːla bal ʔaahlakatkum aʶːlˤjaʶqiʶðˤaʶaʶuʶ aːstlm aːld͡ʒaːʔiza ʔaħd ʕʃr tˤaʶːlˤbaʶːaʶn lqd qtˤʕt aʶːsˤbʕj waaːstadʕaaːhu aːlttaqrijbu ql ʔin sˤlˤaʶːtj wnskj wmħjaːj wmmaːtj llh rb aːlʕaːlmjn fabaʃʃarnaaːhu biʁulaaːmin ħalijmin waʶbiʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶbrˤiʶ ʔaaħraaː ʔaan janaaːla waʶjaʶðˤfaʶrˤaʶ lm ʔakn ʔatwqʕ bʔan twmsjqʕ fj ħb maːrj ʔanaː lw knt ʁnja knt ʔawd ʔan ʔaʶʕtˤjk aːlmaːl fj aːlħrb aːlʕaːlmja aːlθaːnja qtl aːlkθjr mn aːlnaːs maː aːlðj tχfjh wraːʔ ðˤhrˤk laː ʃjʔ hl hðaː lka flmaː d͡ʒaːʔ aːlsħra qaːlwaː lfrʕwn ʔaʔin lnaː lʔad͡ʒraː ʔin knaː nħn aːlʁaːlbjn lqd fʕl ðlk mraːraːan wtkraːraːan kjf td͡ʒrʔ ʕlaː qwl ʃjʔin khðaː θumma baʕaθnaaːhum linaʕlama ʔaajju aːlħizbajni ʔaʶaʶħsˤaʶaʶː limaaː labiθuwaː ʔaamadanaː maaːðaaː ʕalajka ʔiðaaː ʔakramta ʔamsijatijbi kajfa ʔanti masaaːʔu aːlχajri muʃtaaːqu waaːʕlam ʔaanna sˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːħaʶ aːlddunjaaː muʕtabarun min wad͡ʒhajni hl ʔant mn kwkb laː tʕjʃ fjh ʔilaː aːlnsaːʔ ltrtaːħ fj tswqk aːlʔasbwʕj jd͡ʒb ʔan tmlk sjaːraan kaːn saːmj raːʁbaː fj ʔiχraːd͡ʒ ljlaː mn aʶːlˤsˤsˤwrˤaʶ nħn aːlqmrjwn mn ʔijmaːnin waːħd kaːn ðlk aʶːstʕrˤaʶːdˤaʶː bʔatm mʕnaː aːlklma ʔiinna aːlʔiinsaaːna lafij χusrin wataðaruwna maaː χalaqa lakum rabbukum min ʔaazwaaːd͡ʒikum bal ʔaantum qawmun ʕaaːduwna waʔiin kaaːduwaː lajastafizzuwnaka mina aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ lijuχrid͡ʒuwka minhaaː waʔiiðanaː laaː jalbaθuwna χilaaːfaka ʔiillaaː qalijlanaː waqaaːla ʔaabuw aːlʔaaswadi aːldduʔualiju nðˤrˤt ħwlj wuʶdˤiʶʕaʶ saːmj tħt rʕaːja ʔasra ħaʶːdˤnaʶ judχilu man jaʃaaːʔu fij raħmatihi waʶaʶːlˤðˤðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ ʔaaʕadda lahum ʕaðaaːbanaː ʔaalijmanaː ʔinhu ʔiqtbaːs mn ktaːb lnraː wasahula ʕalajhi kullu ʕasijrin fj hðh aːlljla qmt bhðaː bdwn ʔan tfkr qaaːla haðaaː firaaːqu bajnij wabajnika saʔaunabbiʔiuka bitaʔawijli maaː lam taʶstaʶtˤiʶʕ ʕalajhi sˤaʶbrˤaʶnaʶː waːtqwaː aːlðj χlqkm waːld͡ʒbla aːlʔawljn waʔaammaaː ʔiin kaaːna min ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbiʶ aːljamijni wqaːl aːlmlk aːʔitwnj bh ʔaʶstχlˤsˤh lnfsj flmaː klmh qaːl ʔink aːljwm ldjnaː mkjn ʔamjn laː bd lj ʔan ʔaʶtˤlˤb mnk ʔan ttˤjʕ ʔawaːmrj ʔiinna aʶːlˤʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːnaʶ lakum ʕaduwwun faaːttaχiðuwhu ʕaduwwanaː ʔiinnamaaː jadʕuw ħizbahu lijakuwnuwaː min ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbiʶ aːlssaʕijri ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ lqlm ʔajn jnthj hl kaːn kjn fj aːlbjt baːlʔams sjkwn ħfl mjlaːdh ʁdaː ʕnd aːlθaːlθa ʔaʶðˤhrˤt aːlntaːʔid͡ʒu χtˤʔaʶ aːltnbʔuaːt jrsl ʕljkmaː ʃwaʶːðˤ mn naːr wnħaːs flaː tntsˤrˤaʶːn waʔiin kullun lammaaː d͡ʒamijʕun ladajnaaː muʶħdˤaʶrˤuʶwnaʶ ldjh ndbh ʕlj ðqnh wd͡ʒʕlnaː aːbn mrjm wʔamh ʔaːja wʔaːwjnaːhmaː ʔilaː rbwa ðaːt qraːr wmʕjn lqd aːnhaːr mn ʃda ħbh lhaː qaaːla famaaː χaʶtˤbuʶkaʶ jaaː saaːmirijju θumma qaraʔaa ʔinnamaaː jaχʃaaː aːlllaha min ʕibaaːdihi aːlʕulamaaːʔu waʔaammaaː aːlqaaːʕidaau aːlrraaːbiʕaau jkmn fj aʶːlˤqsˤaʶ ʃjʔ mn ʕnsˤrˤ aːltraːd͡ʒjdjaː jħb twm aːlħjaːka hw trka twm jðhb aːʃtrjt bʕdˤ aʶːlˤbjdˤ aʶːlˤtˤaʶːzd͡ʒ aːlðj ʔataː mn aːlmzrʕa lltw lqd aːtuuhima baːχtlaːs aːlʔamwaːl aːlʕaːmma wafadajnaaːhu biðibħin ʕaʶðˤiʶjmiʶn ðlk ʕjsaː aːbn mrjm qwl aːlħq aːlðj fjh jmtrwn wajastaqillu ʕinda aːstiqlaaːlihi wajudχiluhumu aːld͡ʒannaaa ʕarrafahaaː lahum aːlðj jraːk ħjn tqwm ljs ʕndj aːlwqt lʔasaːʕdk fj ħl waːd͡ʒbk fjqwlwaː hl nħn mnðˤrˤwn wql rb ʔaʕwð bk mn hmzaːt aʶːlˤʃjaʶːtˤjn wanufiχa fij aʶːlˤsˤsˤuʶwrˤiʶ ðalika jawmu aːlwaʕijdi aːllaðijna d͡ʒaʕaluwaː aːlqurʔaːna ʕiʶdˤiʶjnaʶ ʔaskn fj mdjna kbjra waqijla man raaːqin bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi wajlun lˤiʶlˤmuʶtˤaʶffiʶfiʶjnaʶ wahum ʕalaaː maaː jafʕaluwna biaːlmuʔuminijna ʃuhuwdun kaʔaannahu d͡ʒimaaːlatun sˤuʶfrˤuʶn twm jrqd fj aːlfraːʃ mħmwmaːan hl tnwj aːlqdwm ʁdanaː ʔanaː bħaːd͡ʒa ʔilaː qaʶsˤiʶaʶ ʃaʕr hl hj sˤʕbaʶ llʁaːja lkj tuktb aːlmqaːrna bjn aːlʔiθnajni lm tkn lˤsˤaʶːlˤħiʶhiʶ faʔiiðaaː d͡ʒaaːʔati aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːχaʶaʶuʶ aʶːsttˤaʶːʕ ʔan jbnj bjtaːan sˤʁjrˤaʶːaʶn ʔinaː d͡ʒʕlnaːhaː ftna lˤlˤðˤaʶːlˤmjn faʔaammaaː aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶaʶːtiʶ fajudχiluhum rabbuhum fij raħmatihi ðalika huwa aːlfawzu aːlmubijnu kaːn saːmj jqdˤj wqtaː ʔakθr mʕ ljlaː hl ttħdθ aːlfrnsja ʔam lhm ʃrkaːʔ fljʔatwaː bʃrkaːʔihm ʔin kaːnwaː sˤaʶːdqjn nzlaː mn ʁfwr rħjm wkðbwaː bʔaːjaːtnaː kðaːbaː flˤnqsˤn ʕljhm bʕlm wmaː knaː ʁaːʔibjn frd͡ʒʕwaː ʔilaː ʔanfshm fqaːlwaː ʔinkm ʔantm aʶːlˤðˤaʶːlˤmwn ʔanaː ʔaʕd ln ʔafʕlhaː md͡ʒddaːan maːðaː fʕlta knt ʔafkr hl trjd aːlzwaːd͡ʒ ln nnsaː ʔabdaː lˤtˤfk kaːrjn nmsaːwja laː jʃtrj ʔilaː maː hw dˤrˤwrˤj haːa kaːnt jaːʔisa mn ʔan ttzwd͡ʒ bitarki aʶːlˤiʶaʶːstiʶtˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶaʶiʶ ʔatnaːwl aːlʁdaːʔ ʕnd aʶːlˤðˤhjrˤaʶ mʕ ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔiʶj ʔaʶsˤiʶrˤrˤaʶ ʕlaː aʶːlˤʔaʶfdˤlˤ hl hðh hj ħqaː aːlħqjqa waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi biaːlʕadli waʶaʶːlˤʔiʶiʶnsˤaʶaʶːfiʶ takuwnu muddaau aːliaːʔitilaaːfi ʔiinna aːlʔaabraaːra lafij naʕijmin wanasuwqu aːlmud͡ʒrimijna ʔiilaaː d͡ʒahannama wirdanaː θumma ʔaʶaʶfiʶjdˤuʶwaʶː min ħajθu ʔaʶaʶfaʶaʶːdˤaʶ aːlnnaaːsu waaːstaʁfiruwaː aːlllaha ʔiinna aːlllaha ʁafuwrun raħijmun sʔaltuh ʕn aːlħaːdθ ʔanaː lstu χaːʔifaan waaːlʔiidlaaːla ʕalajhi waʔiin taqaddamat sˤuʶħbaʶtuʶhuʶ walakin aʶːuʶnðˤuʶrˤ ʔilaaː man fawqak min aːlʕulamaaːʔi ðaːk aʶːlˤʃχsˤ sˤdjqj χaːlj jʕjʃ fj lndn ql lmn aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wmn fjhaː ʔin kntm tʕlmwn hl ʔant mstʕd ʔan ttˤjrˤ maːðaː tqtrħ fad͡ʒumlaau aːlʔaansaaːbi ʔaannahaaː tanqasimu θalaaːθaaa ʔaaqsaaːmin wʔawrθkm ʔaʶrˤdˤhm wdjaːrhm wʔamwaːlhm wʔaʶrˤdˤaʶː lm ttˤʔiʶwhaʶː wkaːn aːllh ʕlaː kl ʃjʔ qdjraː hðaː ʔabj hw jrtbik ʕndmaː jraːhaː ðlk aːlmħl jʁlq fj aːlsaːʕa aːltaːsʕa kl ljla sʔaʶnðˤf aʶːlˤmtˤbχ bʕd qljl ʔaam χalaquwaː aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ bal llaː juwqinuwna walaaː tukaaːfiʔiuwaː ðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmaʶnaʶː faʶjaʶbtˤuʶlˤaʶ faʶdˤlˤuʶkuʶm waliðalika qijla tafaqqahuwaː qabla ʔaan tasuwduwaː sʔard͡ʒʕ ħaːlaː hjaː bnaː nðhb lnraː ʔiðaː kaːn twm jsttˤjʕ ʔan jsaːʕdnaː hnaːk ðbaːba fj aːlqhwa taʶbsˤiʶrˤaʶaʶaʶn waðikraaː likulli ʕabdin munijbin hðaː srjr kjf bʔimkaːnnaː ʔan nħkm ʁjrnaː ʕndmaː laː nsttˤjʕ ʔan nħkm ʔanfsnaː jasʔaaluhu man fij aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ kulla jawmin huwa fij ʃaʔanin jaʔatuwnanaaː fij ħaaːli aːlquwwaai binaaː ʕalajhim wʔiðaː naːdjtm ʔilaː aʶːlˤsˤlˤaʶːaʶ aːtχðwhaː hzwaː wlʕbaː ðlk bʔanhm qwm laː jʕqlwn wajatawaqqaaːhu aːlħaaːzimu min suwʔi ʕawaaːqibi aːlfitnaai waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami min aːlddunjaaː ʕalaaː aːlddunjaaː dalijlun aːlsjd ʔisbraːntw bχjr aːljsa kðlk aːlktaːb ʕlaː aːlmktb ʁdaː sjkwn fj bjth ʔant ʁnjj jaaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːlnnaaːsu qad d͡ʒaaːʔakum burhaaːnun min rabbikum waʔaanzalnaaː ʔiilajkum nuwranaː mubijnanaː wad͡ʒazaaːʔu sajjiʔiaain sajjiʔiaaun miθluhaaː faman ʕafaaː waʶʔaʶaʶsˤlˤaʶħaʶ faʔaad͡ʒruhu ʕalaaː aːlllahi ʔiinnahu laaː juħibbu aʶːlˤðˤðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ fij maqʕadi sˤiʶdqiʶn ʕinda malijkin muqtadirin aːlrraħmanu ʔaʕndk qlm nʕm ʕndj waːħd jaaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː aːttaquwaː aːlllaha wakuwnuwaː maʕa aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ ðhbt ʔilaː aːlmstʃfaː rbhm lhm ʕðaːb mn rd͡ʒz ʔaljm maː aːlðj d͡ʒraː aːlljla aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤjaʶ laː ʃjʔ aːlbta ʁsl saːmj aʶːlˤsˤħwn wafijhaaː kafaaː lilʕulaaː waaːlhimam wafijhaaː dˤaʶmaʶaʶːnuʶn linajli aːlmunaaː ʔiʃtraːth ʕʃr twm ljs aːʃtraːkj wʔanaː mnaː aːlmslmwn wmnaː aʶːlˤqaʶːstˤwn fmn ʔaslm fʔawlʔik tħrwaː rʃdaː ʔaaw liħamijjaain daaːχalatk ʕinda taʕaððuri fahmihi ʔaan talida aːlʔaamaau rabbatahaaː waʔaan taraaː aːlħufaaːaa aːlʕuraaːaa aːlʕaaːlaaa riʕaaːʔa aːlʃʃaaːʔi jaʶtaʶtˤaʶːwaʶlˤuʶwnaʶ fij aːlbunjaaːni wqaːlwaː mhmaː tʔatnaː bh mn ʔaːja ltsħrnaː bhaː fmaː nħn lk bmʔumnjn ʔinhaː tnaːdnj knd͡ʒj aʶːnðˤrˤ ʔilaː aʶːlˤsˤwrˤaʶ ʕlaː aʶːlˤħaʶːʔiʶtˤ lm jkn twm jstmʕ fkaːnt hbaːʔ mnbθaː twqfj ʕn dˤrˤb ʔaχjki laː tqlq ʔalm ʔaql ʔan kl ʃʔi sjsjrʕlaː nħw d͡ʒjd kamaaː ʔaaχrad͡ʒaka rabbuka min bajtika biaːlħaqqi waʔiinna farijqanaː mina aːlmuʔuminijna lakaaːrihuwna laaː jud͡ʒaaːdilu ʔillaaː munaaːfiqun ʔaaw murtaaːbun aːlsmka tχtfj tħt aʶːlˤsˤχwrˤ θumma jud͡ʒzaaːhu aːld͡ʒazaaːʔ aːlʔaawfaaː ʔabj fj aʶːlˤmtˤbχ ʔadnaːh walaw d͡ʒaaːʔathum kullu ʔaːjaain ħattaaː jarawuaː aːlʕaðaaːba aːlʔaalijma law ʔaaradnaaː ʔaan nattaχiða lahwanaː laaːttaχaðnaaːhu min ladunnaaː ʔiin kunnaaː faaːʕilijna maː ðhbt ʔilaː aːlmdrsa ʔaħaːwl aːlmsaːʕda fħsb waaːlbaχijlu baʕijdun min aːlllahi ʕazza wad͡ʒalla hw tˤbjbuʶn d͡ʒjjd ʔin hðh tðkra fmn ʃaːʔ aːtχð ʔilaː rbh sbjlaː hðaː ʕðˤjm walaħmi tˤaʶjrˤiʶn mimmaaː jaʃtahuwna mnnaːd mlaːbsh juʶtˤaʶaʶːfuʶ ʕalajhim bikaʔasin min maʕijnin aːktʃfnaː klma aːlmrwr bshwla waaːlʕaduwwu ʕaduwwanaː liʕadwihi ʕalajk trk ʕaːʔilth w ðhb llʕjʃ fj taːhjtj aːtuhm sqrˤaʶːtˤ baːlʔilħaːd lʔanh lm jʔumn bzjws ʔatmnaː lk jwmaːan lˤtˤjfaʶːaʶn laqad wuʕidnaaː haðaaː naħnu waʔaːbaaːʔuunaaː min qablu ʔiin haðaaː ʔiillaaː ʔaʶaʶsaʶaʶːtˤiʶjrˤuʶ aːlʔaawwalijna lam jad͡ʒib baʕθaau aːlʔaanbijaaːʔi ʔilajhim hl hðh ʔawl zjaːra lk llmdjna laː jwd͡ʒd dχaːn mn ʁjr naːr aːlnsaːʔ jtqdmwn fj aːlsn ʔakθr mn aːlrd͡ʒaːl ʔinhaː qdjma qidm aːltilaːl aːlðjn jtχðwn aːlkaːfrjn ʔawljaːʔ mn dwn aːlmʔumnjn ʔajbtʁwn ʕndhm aːlʕza fʔin aːlʕza llh d͡ʒmjʕaː wʔaχj haːrwn hw ʔaʶfsˤħ mnj lsaːnaː fʔarslh mʕj rdʔaː jsˤdqnj ʔinj ʔaχaːf ʔan jkðbwn mn tkwn kalaːaːa ʔiinnahu taðkiraaun aːðaː wd͡ʒdt ʕbaːra aːntht aʶːlˤmqaʶːtˤʕ aːltj tħtaːd͡ʒ tsd͡ʒjl lhðh aːllʁa fʕd aːlaː aːlmwqʕ laːħqaː laː tql lj hðh hj aːlsaːʕa aːltj aːʃtrjthaː aːms flnðjqn aːlðjn kfrwaː ʕðaːbaː ʃdjdaː wlnd͡ʒzjnhm ʔaswʔa aːlðj kaːnwaː aːlʕajʃu fij θalaaːθin ldjj ʔaχwaun wajazhadu fijhaaː aːlqurabaaːʔu dʕwnaː nkwn sˤaʶːdqjn mʕa bʕdˤ maːðaː rʔaaː ʔin rbk hw aːlχlaːq aːlʕljm wmn χft mwaːzjnh fʔawlʔik aːlðjn χsrwaː ʔanfshm bmaː kaːnwaː bʔaːjaːtnaː jðˤlˤmwn waʔiiðaaː aːld͡ʒibaaːlu nusifat ʔiinnij ðˤaʶnaʶntuʶ ʔaannij mulaːqin ħisaaːbijah wwd͡ʒwh jwmʔið ʕljhaː ʁbra bħθt ʕnh fj kl mkaːn lknj lm ʔad͡ʒdh lqd trdd qbl aːlʔid͡ʒaːba raʔasu aːlʕaqli baʕda aːlʔiijmaaːni biaːalllahi taʕaaːlaaː aːlttawadudu ʔilaaː aːlnnaaːsi lm jtwqʕ ʔaħd ðlk falaaː tahinuwaː watadʕuwaː ʔiilaaː aːlssalmi waʔaantumu aːlʔaaʕlawna waaːlllahu maʕakum walan jatirakum ʔaaʕmaaːlakum ldj χwf mn aʶːlˤðˤlˤaʶːm qaaːla fabiʕizzatika laʔauʁwijannahum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna lm ʔaraː ʃjʔiaː wud͡ʒuwhun jawmaʔiiðin naʶaʶːdˤiʶrˤaʶaʶuʶn wamin ʃarri ħaaːsidin ʔiiðaaː ħasada aːlðjn jqjmwn aʶːlˤsˤlˤaʶːaʶ wjʔutwn aːlzkaːa whm baːlʔaːχra hm jwqnwn laː ʔamlk aːlmaːl aːskt jaː ʁbj ln ʔaraːh bʕd aːljwm bʕdˤ aʶːlˤʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤ jsbħwn fj aːlbħr ʔaʔarjthaː waːldjk wʔið qaːlt wajuχrid͡ʒ ʔaʶaʶdˤʁaʶaʶːnaʶkuʶm mataaːʕun fij aːlddunjaaː θumma ʔiilajnaaː mard͡ʒiʕuhum θumma nuðijquhumu aːlʕaðaaːba aːlʃʃadijda bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jakfuruwna ʔam ħsb aːlðjn fj qlwbhm mrˤdˤ ʔan ln χaːʃʕa ʔaʶbsˤaʶːrˤhm trhqhm ðla wqd kaːnwaː jdʕwn ʔilaː aːlsd͡ʒwd whm saːlmwn walan juʔuaχχira aːlllahu nafsanaː ʔiiðaaː d͡ʒaaːʔa ʔaad͡ʒaluhaaː waaːlllahu χabijrun bimaaː taʕmaluwna ʔaʶdˤft bʕdˤ θalaaːθaaan waqaaːla muwsaaː ʔiin takfuruwaː ʔaantum waman fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ d͡ʒamijʕanaː faʔiinna aːlllaha laʁanijjun ħamijdun ljʔaklwaː mn θmrh wmaː ʕmlth ʔajdjhm ʔaflaː jʃkrwn ʔanaː laː ʔaʕrf ʔaaw lˤiʶjaʶsˤmuʶt aːlʕaqlu ħajθu kaaːna ʔaaluwfun wamaʔaluwfun ʔiin ʔaanaaː ʔiillaaː naðijrun mubijnun wahaðaaː ʔinnamaaː jaʶsˤiʶħħuʶ aːstiħlaaːʔuuhu fijmaaː qalla wahuwa biʶaʶːlˤlˤlˤaʶfðˤiʶ ʔaaχaaːhu dirhamanaː hl bʔimkaːnk ʔiʕaːda maː qlt tlqqaː saːmj ʕlaːd͡ʒaː wamin raħmatihi d͡ʒaʕala lakumu aːlllajla waaːlnnahaːra litaskunwaː fjhi walitabtaʁwaː min faʶdˤlˤiʶhiʶ walaʕallakum taʃkurwna btˤrˤjqaʶ χaʶːtˤʔiʶaʶ waʔiin ʕarija ʕan ʔaaħadi haðihi aːlʔaasbaaːbi kaaːna ðullanaː walam jakun ħilmanaː jaaː ʔaabaaː ʕabdi aːlllahi ʔinh aːχtlaːf klb d͡ʒawaaaːlun χjr mn ʔasd rˤaʶːbdˤ tħtl aːld͡ʒzaːʔiraːlmrtba aːlθaːmna ʕaːlmjaː fj ʔintaːd͡ʒ aːlzjtwn bnwʕjh aːlmwd͡ʒh llzjt ʔaw aːlmaːʔida hðh aːlsaːʕa ʔaʶfdˤlˤ mn tlk tmkkn saːmj ʔan jbqaː jqðˤaʶː ʔiinnahu ðˤaʶnnaʶ ʔaan lan jaħwra faʔauwlaaːʔiika ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːlnnaaːri hum fijhaaː χaaːliduwna wasanaðkuru min ʔaaħwaaːli ʔaadabi aʶːlˤrˤrˤiʶjaʶaʶːdˤaʶaʶiʶ waʶaʶːlˤiʶaʶːstiʶsˤlˤaʶaʶːħiʶ fuʶsˤuʶwlˤaʶnaʶː taħtawij ʕalaaː maaː baːkr ʔiin kuntum fij rajbin mimmaaː nazzalnaaː ʕalaaːaː ʕabdinaaː faʔatuwaː bisuwraain min miθlihi waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi aːlnnaaːsu ʔaaʃtaaːtun walikulli d͡ʒamʕin ʃataaːtun saːmj ʃdjd aːlχd͡ʒl ʔaθmma maː trjd ʔiχbaːrj ʕnh snstmr fj hðaː ħtaː jmnʕnaː ʔaħdhm waðakara ʔaannahu liʕalijji bni ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶn karrama aːlllahu wad͡ʒhihi qðf aːlʃrq mn blaːd aʶːlˤħjaʶːdˤ ʔin knt tʁdw fj aːlðnwb d͡ʒljdaːan wudda flm tubqi ʕlaː wuddih kʔan qrqra aːlʔibrjq bjnhm ħaːl bjnj wbjn ʃkrj aːltraːb ʔin llbjn sˤwlˤaʶ whd͡ʒwmaː lst ʔadrj mn wlaː kjf ʔanaː hj dnjaː bqaːʔuhaː mstħjl ʔaʃkw ʔilaː ʔaljs kðlk lqd wsˤlˤ aːlbaːrħa aːlaː tˤwkjw ʔaʕrf msbqaːan maːðaː sjkwn mwdˤwʕ aːlbrnaːmd͡ʒ aːlraːdjwj ʔiðaː fj md͡ʒls nðkr ʕljaːan lqd tħssn kθjraː ljtnj lm ʔakn lˤʕtˤfk nlt aʶːlˤtˤqs ljlaːan jkwn baːrdaːan hl tʕlm ʔan aːlklaːb aʶːlˤsˤʁjrˤaʶ tʕjʃ ʕaːda ʔakθr mn aːlslaːlaːt aːlkbjra nðˤf jdjk d͡ʒjdaːan baʶːntðˤaʶːm baːstχdaːm mtˤhrˤ aːljdjn aːlkħwlj ʔaw aːʁslhmaː baːlmaːʔ waʶːlˤsˤaʶːbwn hm ʔabj kl jwm hw ʕtˤlˤaʶ fj mkaːn maː mn aːlʕaːlm sjtm aːlaːmr kaːnt ljlaː mnfzʕa lʕlj bn sˤaʶːlˤħ bn ʕlj ʔad͡ʒbnj ʔin tfdˤlˤt tslqtu d͡ʒbl fwd͡ʒj θlaːθ mraːt ʕnd dˤrˤb ʔaj rqm fj sˤfrˤ jkwn aːlnaːtd͡ʒ sˤfrˤ lm ʔad͡ʒd bʕd maː tˤlˤbh mnj twm qd tʕdwaː ʕlaː aʶːlˤsˤjaʶːm wqaːlwaː ftħ aːlbwwaːb aːlbaːba nʃrt aʶːlˤmnðˤmaʶ ʔasʔila wʔad͡ʒwba ʕn aːlthwja wtkjjf aːlhwaːʔ hðaː ħqaː ħdjθ d͡ʒjd aːbtsmt wqblt hdjtj aʶːlˤsˤʁjrˤaʶ maː rʔatnj ʕjnaːk jwm aːlfraːq kjf qd ħaːwlwaː aːʁtjaːlk ʁdraː ðhb aːlðjn thzhm mdaːħhm kamaaː tanaaːmuwna kaðalika tamuwtuwna wʔakθr mn aːlʔiχwaːn maː aʶːstˤʕt ʔinhm ʔaʃʕr ʔannj mrˤjdˤ qljlaː blda χaːb bmn fjhaː aːlrd͡ʒaːʔ waʶːsˤlˤt ljlaː aːlssjaːqa mn maːt jʕlm ʔank aːlħq aːlmbjn ʔajaː ʕjn d͡ʒwdj wlaː tsʔamj kaːn bʔimkaːnk ʔan traː aːlddm fj kll mkaːn lqd rʔajtk bmkaːn maː waʶːlˤsˤdaʶːʕ ʔin d͡ʒmaːl jswq sjaːrth ʕbr aːld͡ʒsr waruwija ʕan aːlnnabiji sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama ʔaannahu qaaːla fij baʶʕdˤiʶ χuʶtˤaʶbiʶhiʶ kjf tʕlm bmlkja twm lhðaː kaːn faʶːdˤlˤ mstʕddaː ʔan jstqrr mʕ ljlaː kll ʃjʔ jtʁjjr ʔablʁ aːlħaːrθ ʕnj ʔannj maː zaːl jtwd͡ʒb ʕljnaː fʕl ðlk ʔatraː aːlnsjm ʔiðaː sraː mn nd͡ʒdh ʃʕraːʔ msˤrˤ wlaː ʔaqwl d͡ʒmjʕkm ʔahlaː bwd͡ʒhk mn sˤbaʶːħ mqbl ʔaandaaːdanaː lˤiʶjuʶdˤiʶlˤlˤuʶwaʶː ʕan sabijlihi qul tamattaʕuwaː faʔiinna maʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶkuʶm ʔiilaaː aːlnnaaːri lahum ʕaðaaːbun fij aːlħajaaːai aːlddunjaaː walaʕaðaaːbu aːlʔaːχiraai ʔaaʃaqqu wamaaː wʔin aːllh ʕlaː nsˤrˤhm lqdjr jaʶχtaʶsˤsˤuʶ biraħmatihi man jaʃaaːʔu waaːlllahu ðuw aʶːlˤfaʶdˤlˤiʶ aʶːlˤʕaʶðˤiʶjmiʶ wataskijnanaː lˤiʶsˤaʶwlˤaʶtiʶhiʶm fʔin aːld͡ʒna hj aːlmʔawaː sumjjtu ʕlaː χaːlj qd tkwn aʶːlˤdˤħjaʶ msˤaʶːbaʶ fj aːlrʔas aːlklaːb waʶːlˤqtˤtˤ waːlχjwl ħjwaːnaːt faʔaanbatnaaː fijhaaː ħabbanaː laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔaθq bh qbblnj aːjhaː aːlʔaħmq lqd hjʔat nfshaː llʕba aːltns baːltdrjb baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlmutaqaddimijna aːstiʁnaaːʔuuk ʕan aːlʃʃajʔi χajrun min aːstiʁnaaːʔiik bihi aːldjaːnaːt aːlsmaːwja aːlθlaːθ hj aːlʔislaːm waːljhwdja waːlmsjħja ħaːla lθtk sjʔia jwd͡ʒd χdʃa ʔaatadʕuwna baʕlanaː wataðaruwna ʔaaħsana aːlχaaːliqijna aʶːtsˤlˤ bj lw smħt bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ʕbs wtwlaː aːlʕadlu ʔaaw aːlʃʃud͡ʒaaːʕaau qaaːluwaː aʶːħtfðˤ bhðh aːlmʕlwma lnfsk ql ʔinmaː ʔanðrkm baːlwħj wlaː jsmʕ aʶːlˤsˤm aːldʕaːʔ ʔiðaː maː jnðrwn qaːlwaː bl lm tkwnwaː mʔumnjn wanamaaːriqu maʶsˤfuʶwfaʶaʶuʶn lilssaaːʔiili waaːlmaħruwmi tˤbʕaʶːaʶn qdm lj bʕdˤ aʶːlˤnsˤaʶːʔiʶħ warubbamaaː taqaddama biʶaʶːlˤχaʶtˤtˤiʶ man kaaːna aʶːlˤχaʶtˤtˤuʶ min d͡ʒulli faʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤiʶhiʶ aʶːlˤsˤħaʶ knz laː jʕrf qjmth ʔilaː aʶːlˤmrˤdˤaʶː faaːntaqamnaaː minhum faʶaʶːnðˤuʶrˤ kajfa kaaːna ʕaaːqibaau wstˤ aːlmdjna lm jtmkn mn aːħtwaːʔ ʁdˤbh w lw lθaːnja ʔajn stkwn jwm aːlʔiθnjn wamaaː ʔaarsalnaaː fij qarjaain min nabijjin ʔiillaaː ʔaaχaðnaaː ʔaahlahaaː biaːlbaʔasaaːʔi waʶaʶːlˤdˤdˤaʶrˤaʶaʶːʔiʶ laʕallahum jaʶdˤdˤaʶrˤaʶʕuʶwnaʶ ʔatsmħ lj baːlʕzf ʕlaː aːlbjaːnw liʔaannahaaː ʔiðaaː manaħat kaddat waʔaatʕabat ʔanaː tħdθt mʕ twm laaː jufattaru ʕanhum wahum fijhi mublisuwna maː hw aːld͡ʒjnz hðaː wad͡ʒaʕa aʶːlˤdˤdˤiʶrˤsiʶ ʔaʁlq aːlbwaːba waman ʁaaːlaba aːlħaqqa laaːna ħdθth ʕn mʃaːklhaː wadaaːru nad͡ʒaaːain liman fahima ʕanhaaː hlaː ʃʁlt aːltlfaːz mn fdˤlˤk kaːn aːljwnaːnjwn ʔawl mn aːʕtbr aːlʔaħdaːθ aːlsmaːwja ðˤwaʶːhrˤ tstħq aːlaːktʃaːf lajsa ħaqaaːanaːlʔamr lajsa lahu ʕilaːqaun bik ʔaʶsˤbħ ʕmrhaː waːħdaːan w θmaːnjn sna lkn hðh aːlʕmlja tmt bʃkl tdrjd͡ʒj lmlaːjjn aːlsnjn lm jsbq lsaːmj w ʔan ʔataː ʔilaː mnzlj dˤaʶːʕ jrbwʕj tʔaqlmwaː mʕ aːltʁjjr bsrʕa ʔanaː baːlfʕl mtʔaχr wlaː ʔaʃk ʔan mʕk fdˤlˤaʶː hl mn ʔaħd lmsaːʕdtj ʔaalaaː jaʕlamu man χalaqa wahuwa aʶːlˤlˤlˤaʶtˤiʶjfuʶ aːlχabijru sʔaʃtrj haːtfaː χlwjaː ʁdaː hjhaːt ʃʕbj jstkjn wamaaː wad͡ʒadnaaː liʔaakθarihim min ʕahdin waʔiin wad͡ʒadnaaː ʔaakθarahum lafaaːsiqijna jmknka ʔan tqwlhaː ʕlaː hðaː aːlnħw wlknhaː mubtðla ʔaulqija fijhaaː fawd͡ʒun saʔaalahum χazanatuhaaː ʔaalam jaʔatikum naðijrun aːnqʃʕt ʁjwm aːlʃtaːʔ aʶːlˤmaʶːtˤrˤaʶ wðˤhrˤt ʃms aːlrbjʕ aːldaːfʔia ltnjr dˤwaʶːħj bldtj aʶːlˤsˤʁjrˤaʶ wmaː ʔadraːk maː jwm aʶːlˤfsˤlˤ hw aːlðj χlqkm mn tˤjn θm qdˤaʶː ʔad͡ʒlaː wʔad͡ʒl msmaː ʕndh θm ʔantm tmtrwn hl bʔimkaːnj aːstʕaːra hðaː aʶːlˤqrˤsˤ ʔawd aːlaːstmaːʕ ʔilaː rʔajk qad jaʕlamu aːlllahu aːlmuʕawwiqijna minkum waaːlqaaːʔiilijna liʔiiχwaaːnihim halumma ʔiilajnaaː walaaː jaʔatuwna aːlbaʔasa ʔiillaaː qalijlanaː lqd ʔistχdmt rʔashaː jnbʁj ʔan tkwn lwsj fj aʶːlˤmtˤbχ aːlʔaːn laː tdˤʁtˤ aːlaːrz jbdwn ʔamrjkjjn waʔiimmaaː ʔilaaː aːld͡ʒafaaːʔi waaːlʕuquwqi fʔimaː nðhbn bk fʔinaː mnhm mntqmwn hj thtm baːlmwsjqaː jaː ʔajhaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː laː tχwnwaː aːllh waːlrswl wtχwnwaː ʔamaːnaːtkm wʔantm tʕlmwn wd͡ʒaːʔ ʔiχwa jwsf fdχlwaː ʕljh fʕrfhm whm lh mnkrwn zrʕt wrdaːan lam jakun lˤiʶlˤssuʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːniʶ lubθun walaaː liʔaajjaaːmihi sˤaʶfwuʶn waaːlssaaːdisu aːlfaraaːʁu aːllaðij jakuwnu maʕahu aːlttawafuru waʶjaʶħsˤuʶlˤuʶ bihi aːliaːstikθaaːru laː ʔaħb aːlmʁrwrjn wazuχrufanaː waʔiin kullu ðalika lammaaː mataaːʕu aːlħajaaːai aːlddunjaaː waaːlʔaːχiraau ʕinda rabbika lilmuttaqijna maːðaː jʕnj ðlk wχlq aːllh aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ baːlħq wltd͡ʒzaː kl nfs bmaː ksbt whm laː jðˤlˤmwn warawaaː aːbnu ʕumara rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhumaaː ʔaanna aːlnnabija sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama aːld͡ʒadbu jaħduθu min ʔaasbaaːbi aːlfasaaːdi maaː dˤaʶaʶːddaʶhaʶaʶː hl tʃaːrk fj hðaː aːlħdθ ʔanaː kbjr bmaː jkfj ʔaaħaduhumaaː laaːzimun biʶaʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶbʕiʶ faʔiinnahum jawmaʔiiðin fij aːlʕaðaaːbi muʃtarikuwna twm jntðˤrˤ sˤlˤaʶːħ ʔamrk baːlʔaχlaːq mrd͡ʒʕh faqawwim aːlnfs baːlʔaχlaːq tstqm falammaaː ʔaaħassuwaː baʔasanaaː ʔiiðaaː hum minhaaː jaʶrˤkuʶdˤuʶwnaʶ waʶʔaʶaʶbsˤiʶrˤ fasawfa juʶbsˤiʶrˤuʶwnaʶ badijʕu aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ waʔiiðaaː qaʶdˤaʶaʶː ʔaamranaː faʔiinnamaaː jaquwlu lahu kun fajakuwnu fjhaː faːkha waːlnχl ðaːt aːlʔakmaːm wʔilaː aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ kjf stˤħt waʔiin kaaːna taʶqsˤiʶjrˤuʶ aʶːlˤlˤlˤaʶfðˤiʶ ʕan aːlmaʕnaaː lisuwʔi fahmi aːlmutakallimi fahuwa ʔaʶaʶsˤʕaʶbuʶ aːlʔaumuwri ħaaːlanaː hðaː sˤdjqj twm walahum ʕalajja ðanbun faʔaaχaaːfu ʔaan jaqtuluwni rbmaː jwd aːlðjn kfrwaː lw kaːnwaː mslmjn ʔin aːllh laː jðˤlˤm aːlnaːs ʃjʔiaː wlkn aːlnaːs ʔanfshm jðˤlˤmwn bʕzmj wnaːrj wbrkaːn θʔarj wʔaʃwaːq dmj lˤʔaʶrˤdˤj wdaːrj hl wsˤlˤtnj ʔaj rsaːʔil liʔaanna min ʕilali aʶːlˤmaʶsˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħiʶ maaː huwa ðˤaʶaʶːhiʶrˤuʶn faʔiinnahuna ʔaaquwmu bihaðaaː aːlħaaːli ʁaːjaun tuʃariifu wraːjaun trafrifu jaː hanaaːk fj ʕulaːk kl ʔinsaːn ldjhi aːlħq fj mmtlkaːthi aʶːlˤχaʶːsˤaʶ faqaaːla aʶːrˤdˤaʶ biaːlqawti waχaf min aːlfawti waaːd͡ʒʕal sˤaʶwmaʶk aːlddunjaaː waʶfiʶtˤrˤaʶk aːlmawta faaːljawma nunad͡ʒd͡ʒijka bibadanika litakuwna liman χalfaka ʔaːjaaan waʔiinna kaθijranaː mina aːlnnaaːsi ʕan ʔaːjaaːtinaaː laʁaaːfiluwna hj mtˤrˤbaʶ twm laː jmknhu ʔiχfaːʔ sr ʕn maːrjaː wllh aːlmʃrq waːlmʁrb fʔajnmaː twlwaː fθm wd͡ʒh aːllh ʔin aːllh waːsʕ ʕljm wjwm jħʃr ʔaʕdaːʔ aːllh ʔilaː aːlnaːr fhm jwzʕwn jawma tubaddalu aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤuʶ ʁajra aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ waaːlssamaaːwaaːtu wabarazuwaː lillahi aːlwaaːħidi aːlqahhaaːri ʔaʶsˤbħ ʔaχj raːhbaː d͡ʒazaaːʔan wifaaːqanaː wʃaːhd wmʃhwd ʔaʕtrf bʔannj knt mhmlaːan haːa ʔatt ʔilaː hunaː mraan ʔaχraː d͡ʒnaːt ʕdn td͡ʒrj mn tħthaː aːlʔanhaːr χaːldjn fjhaː wðlk d͡ʒzaːʔ mn tzkaː waaːlχaaːmisu aːliaːktifaaːʔu bimaaːddaain tuʁnijhi ʕan kalafi aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶlˤaʶbiʶ maː ʔant ʔilaː bʃr mθlnaː fʔat bʔaːja ʔin knt mn aʶːlˤsˤaʶːdqjn waddat tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶfaʶaʶuʶn min ʔaahli aːlkitaaːbi law juʶdˤiʶlˤlˤuʶwnaʶkuʶm wamaaː juʶdˤiʶlˤlˤuʶwnaʶ ʔiillaaː ʔaanfusahum wamaaː jaʃʕuruwna wahaðaaː qawlu aːbni ʕabbaaːsin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhumaaː maːðaː kunti stqwljna lw knti fj mkaːnj faʔaawd͡ʒasa fij nafsihi χijfaaan muwsaaː aːbn ʕmj mn msˤrˤ hw msˤrˤj waʔaammaaː man ʔauwtija kitaaːbahu biʃimaaːlihi fajaquwlu jaaː lajtanij lam ʔauwta kitaaːbijah ʔiðaː rʔathm mn mkaːn bʕjd smʕwaː lhaː tʁjðˤaʶː wzfjraː ʔiinnij d͡ʒazajtuhumu aːljawma bimaaː sˤaʶbaʶrˤuʶwaʶː ʔaannahum humu aːlfaaːʔiizuwna ʔirm ðaːt aːlʕmaːd mnnaːd laː jzaːl fj mnzl sˤdjqth wamin kulli ʃajʔin χalaqnaaː zawd͡ʒajni laʕallakum taðakkaruwna lqd twqf aʶːlˤmtˤrˤ lðaː jmknnaː aːlbdʔ walam jabqa maʕahumaaː wad͡ʒdun ʔaʕtðr laː ʔaʕtqd ʔannj sʔakwn qaːdraːan ʕlaː ðlk waʔiin zaaːla aːlssababu bizawaaːli aːlrraʁbaai waaːlrrahbaai muχtalifijna fij aːlrrizqi fahaðaaː ʁanijjun wahaðaaː faqijrun hm jħbwnnaː ʕinda sidraai aːlmuntahaaː ʔin dˤjʕt mftaːħj fln ʔaqdr ʕlaː ftħ aːlbaːb qalijlu aːlʕilmi χajrun min kaθijri aːlʕibaaːdaai flmaː rʔawh zlfa taʕaaːlaaː aʶːntˤaʶlˤiʶquʶwaʶː ʔiilaaː ðˤiʶlˤlˤiʶn ðij θalaaːθi ʃuʕabin waʕad͡ʒibt liman raʔaaaː aːlddunjaaː wataqallubahaaː biʔaahlihaaː θumma jaʶtˤmaʶʔiʶiʶnnuʶ ʔilajhaaː ʔaʕlm ʔan χbzhaː sjkwn haːm fj aːlfjlm bl hw ʔaːjaːt bjnaːt fj sˤdwrˤ aːlðjn ʔawtwaː aːlʕlm wmaː jd͡ʒħd bʔaːjaːtnaː ʔilaː aʶːlˤðˤaʶːlˤmwn kjf tʕrfjn hðaː ʔaan jakuwna min kulli waaːħidin minhumaaː majlun ʔilaaː ʔaabij aːlʕataaːhijaai fakataba ʕalaaː ħaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶtˤiʶ aːlħabsi ʔaħb aʶːlˤtˤrˤjqaʶ aːltj jtklm bhaː wql rb ʔadχlnj mdχl sˤdq wʔaχrd͡ʒnj mχrd͡ʒ sˤdq waːd͡ʒʕl lj mn ldnk slˤtˤaʶːnaʶː nsˤjrˤaʶː waʔaakðibu aːlnnafsa ʔiðaaː ħaddaθtuhaaː ʔinna sˤiʶdqaʶ aːlnnafsi wajaʕtamiduwaː sˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːħaʶ qawaaːʕidihaaː waʔaasbaaːbihaaː ʕlmnj kjf ʔastʕml tlk aːlkmraː qaaːla aːbnu ʕabbaaːsin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu mswma ʕnd rbk llmsrfjn maːðaː tfʕln ʕaːʃ bwb tˤfwlˤth fj bwstˤn θumma lˤaʶqaʶtˤaʶʕnaʶaʶː minhu aːlwatijna wlqd d͡ʒʕlnaː fj aːlsmaːʔ brwd͡ʒaː wzjnaːhaː lˤlˤnaʶːðˤrˤjn wasuʔiila baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʕulamaaːʔi ʔinaː ʔarslnaː ʕljhm sˤjħaʶ waːħda fkaːnwaː khʃjm aʶːlˤmħtðˤrˤ maːðaː tfʕln aːlʕbrja waːlfjnjqja lʁaːt knʕaːnja kam ʕumruka ðaːk mbll wawud͡ʒuwhun jawmaʔiiðin ʕalajhaaː ʁabaraaun ʔiinna aːllaðijna juʔuðuwna aːlllaha warasuwlahu laʕanahumu aːlllahu fij aːlddunjaaː waaːlʔaːχiraai waʔaaʕadda lahum ʕaðaaːbanaː muhijnanaː laaː jamassuhu ʔiillaaː aʶːlˤmuʶtˤaʶhhaʶrˤuʶwnaʶ aːllaðij χalaqa qlth lltw ʃarruhu maʶqtˤuʶwʕaʶnaʶː walaaː jaqʕudu ʕan naʶhdˤaʶaʶiʶn fij maʕuwnaain min ʃarri aːlwaswaaːsi aːlχannaaːsi ʔastʁfr aːllh ʔauwlaʔiika jusaaːriʕuwna fij aːlχajraaːti wahum lahaaː saaːbiquwna fahal raʔaajt kaðalika ʕaaːlimanaː ʔaawʁala fij aːld͡ʒahli waʔaadalla ʕalaaː qillaai aːlʕaqli aʶːlˤsˤħaʶ aːld͡ʒjda laː jmkn fsˤlˤ aːlʕlaːqa bjnhaː wbjn aʶːlˤrˤjaʶːdˤaʶ waːlaːʕtdaːl fj kl ʃjʔ ʔilj ʔajn ʔant ðaːhb bʕd ʁd ʔið qaːl lʔabjh wqwmh maː hðh aːltmaːθjl aːltj ʔantm lhaː ʕaːkfwn hðaː hw sbb tʔaχrj fhmt aːlʔintrnt mfjd d͡ʒdaː lmʕrfa ðˤrˤwf kl d͡ʒzʔ mn aːlʕaːlm wlaː jʔamrkm ʔan ttχðwaː wʔiðaː aːld͡ʒna ʔazlft wʔin ʕljk lʕntj ʔilaː jwm aːldjn maaː ʔaaʃd͡ʒaʕahu qaaːtalahu aːlllahu ðˤnntk qlt ʔank laː tħb twm waːlsaːbqwn aːlsaːbqwn ʔiinna ʕibaaːdij lajsa laka ʕalajhim suʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːnuʶn ʔiillaaː mani aːttabaʕaka mina aːlʁaaːwijna salhum ʔaajjuhum biðalika zaʕijmun ʔaallaaː taʶtˤʁaʶwaʶː fij aːlmijzaaːni maaː raʔaajt miθla aːld͡ʒannaai naaːma tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbuʶhaʶaʶː ʔaam jaquwluwna faaːʕlamuwaː ʔaannamaaː ʕalaaː rasuwlinaaː aːlbalaaːʁu aːlmubijnu ʔawlʔik hm aːlkaːfrwn ħqaː wʔaʕtdnaː llkaːfrjn ʕðaːbaː mhjnaː twqf w ʔilaː ʔaʶtˤlˤqt aːlnaːr waʔiiðaaː ʔaanʕamnaaː ʕalaaː murtabikanaː sʔalt aːlmrʔaa msˤʕwqaʶaʶn kjf ʔadχlt ħqjbaan fj d͡ʒjbk θumma ðahaba ʔiilaaː ʔaahlihi jaʶtaʶmaʶtˤtˤaʶaʶː waʔaaʕadda ðalika min niʕamihi aʶːlˤʕiʶðˤaʶaʶːmiʶ θumma radadnaaː lakumu aːlkarraaa ʕalajhim waʔaamdadnaaːkum biʔaamwaaːlin wabanijna wad͡ʒaʕalnaaːkum ʔaakθara nafijranaː fahija χiʶsˤbuʶ daaːrin tattasiʕu aːlnnufuwsu bihi fij aːlʔaaħwaaːli wataʃtariku fijhi ðuw aːlʔiikθaaːri waaːlʔiiqlaaːli falajsa kullu aːlzzamaaːni zamaaːna aːktisaaːbin ðˤrˤf w tˤaʶːbʕ brjd mn fdˤlˤk waʔiiðaaː kaaːna ðaaː ʃarri ʔaʶaʶbʁaʶdˤaʶhuʶm waʶʔaʶaʶbʁaʶdˤuʶwhuʶ ʔanaː mstʕd ʔajmknnaː aːlʃʃirijri tuksibu aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔa watufsidu aːlʔaaχlaaːqa ʃχsˤ maː jʔakl stdfʕ θmn hðaː laaː ʔiilaha ʔiillaaː huwa juħjij wajumijtu rabbukum warabbu ʔaːbaaːʔiikumu aːlʔaawwalijna ʔalaː tkrh hðaː fij aːlfulki aːlmaʃħuwni fafarartu minkum lammaaː χiftukum fawahaba lij rabbij ħukmanaː wad͡ʒaʕalanij mina aːlmursalijna ʔaːml ʔan hðh aːlrsaːla ʔaθaːrt aːhtmaːmk w ʔanaː fj aʶːntðˤaʶːrˤ ʔid͡ʒaːbtk ʔanaː mtʔakda ʔanki mχtˤʔiʶaʶ aːʕlam ʔaanna maaː bihi taʶsˤlˤuʶħuʶ aːlddunjaaː ħattaaː taʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶ ʔaaħwaaːluhaaː muʶntaʶðˤiʶmaʶaʶaʶn ʔaʶwsˤlˤnj ħtaː aʶːlˤqsˤrˤ ʔanaː ʔaʶnðˤf ʁrftj faʶtaʶqaʶtˤtˤaʶʕuʶwaʶː ʔaamrahum bajnahum zuburanaː kullu ħizbin bimaaː ladajhim fariħuwna watattaχiðuwna maʶsˤaʶaʶːniʶʕaʶ laʕallakum taχluduwna waʔiin wallajtum ʕalijjanaː tad͡ʒiduwhu haaːdijanaː mahdijjanaː jastabʃiruwna biniʕmaain mina aːlllahi waʶfaʶdˤlˤiʶn waʔaanna aːlllaha laaː juʶdˤiʶjʕuʶ ʔaad͡ʒra aːlmuʔuminijna ʔaafasiħrun haðaaː ʔaam ʔaantum laː tuʶbsˤiʶrˤuʶwnaʶ ʔabj aːʕtaːd ʔan jkwn rd͡ʒlaːan qwjaːan mn kaːn jrjd θwaːb aːldnjaː fʕnd aːllh θwaːb aːldnjaː waːlʔaːχra wkaːn aːllh smjʕaː bsˤjrˤaʶː whðaː maː jʕrf aːlʔaːn bqaːnwn haːbl liʔaanna aːlqabijħa ʔaanammu min aːld͡ʒamijli waaːlrraðijlaau ʔaaʃharu min aʶːlˤfaʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶiʶ waaːlttaaːriki lidijnihi aːlmufaaːriqi lild͡ʒamaaːʕaai aːlʕuluwmu maʶtˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶʕuʶhaʶaʶː min θalaaːθaai ʔaawd͡ʒuhin aːllaðij d͡ʒaʕala lakum mina aːlʃʃad͡ʒari aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶχdˤaʶrˤiʶ naaːranaː faʔiiðaaː ʔaantum minhu tuwqiduwna hðaː aːlklb jʔakl tqrjbaːan kl ʃʔi ʔanaː tlmjð wlkn hw ljs bwaːħd qaaːlaaː rabbanaaː ðˤaʶlˤaʶmnaʶaʶː ʔaanfusanaaː waʔiin lam taʁfir lanaaː watarħamnaaː lanakuwnanna mina aːlχaaːsirijna mnaːd kaːn ʕlaː bʕd ħwaːlj nsˤf saːʕa mn bjth wdaːwwd wsljmaːn ʔið jħkmaːn fj aːlħrθ ʔið nfʃt fjh ʁnm aːlqwm wknaː lħkmhm ʃaːhdjn walammaaː kaaːna aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔaakθara ħaaːd͡ʒaaan min d͡ʒamijʕi aːlħajawaaːni kaaːna ʔaʶaʶðˤhaʶrˤaʶ ʕad͡ʒzanaː aːʃthrt kaːljfwrnjaː bfwaːkhhaː jusmaː aʶːlˤʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤ aːlðjn fqdwaː ʔawljaːʔhmjtaːmaː wajarudduhum ʔilaaː aːlħilmi waʔiinnaaː lillahi fijmaaː baqija maaː ʔaaqalla minhu aːlħaðaru kaːn aʶːlˤnsˤf aːlʔaχjr mn aːlmsrħja mmlaːan qljlaːan wtħml ʔaθqaːlkm ʔilaː bld lm tkwnwaː baːlʁjh ʔilaː bʃq aːlʔanfs ʔin rbkm lrʔwf rħjm maaː aːlʕamalu jaaː turaaː fj aːlwaːqʕ maː ʔaklt ʃjʔiaːan mnð aʶːlˤsˤbaʶːħ dˤaʶaʶːħiʶkaʶaʶuʶn mustabʃiraaun waʔiiðaaː kaaːna aːlttad͡ʒaaːnusu waaːlttaʃaaːkulu min qawaaːʕidi aːlʔauχuwwaai waʔaasbaaːbi aːlmawaddaai kaːn aʶːlˤtˤqs d͡ʒjdaː ħtaː aːljwm laaː jusminu walaaː juʁnij min d͡ʒuwʕin hl jðhb ʔilaː aːlmdrsa baːlħaːfla nħnu swfa nusaːʕdki mwaːfqa ʃfjt mn aʶːlˤsˤdaʶːʕ ħaːwl djmaː ʔan jshl ʕlaː aːlmrʔaa laː tqlqj ʔinh ljs lj aːklth hðh tˤaʶːwlˤaʶ qaaːla bal rabbukum rabbu aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ aːllaðij faʶtˤaʶrˤaʶhuʶnnaʶ waʔaanaaː ʕalaaː ðalikum mina aːlʃʃaaːhidijna aːstʁrq aːlʔamr mnj ʔakθr mn saːʕtjn lʔatrd͡ʒm bdˤʕ sˤfħaʶːt fj aːllʁa aːlʔind͡ʒljzja wad͡ʒaʕalnaaː nawmakum subaaːtanaː jwmʔið tʕrˤdˤwn laː tχfaː mnkm χaːfja tlk ktbnaː limaaː fij aːlttaʃaaːʁuli biaːstiχraaːd͡ʒi rumuwzihaaː min aʶːlˤʔiʶiʶbtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶ ʕan ʔidraaːkihaaː wadaχala d͡ʒannatahu wahuwa ðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmuʶn linafsihi qaaːla maaː ʔaʶaʶðˤuʶnnuʶ ʔaan tabijda haðihi ʔaabadanaː laː tnðˤrˤ ʔilaː aːlʔasfl ʔiinnaaː mursiluw aːlnnaaːqaai fitnaaan lahum faaːrtaqibhum waʶaʶːsˤtˤaʶbiʶrˤ faʔiiðaaː sawwajtuhu wanafaχtu fijhi min ruwħij faqaʕuwaː lahu saaːd͡ʒidijna waʶaʶːstaʶðˤhaʶrˤaʶ linafsihi lmaːðaː laː jsttˤjʕ ʔabdaː fʕl ʃjʔ faʔiiðaaː aːnʃaqqati aːlssamaaːʔu fakaaːnat wardaaan kaaːlddihaaːni jaaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːlmuzzamilu law daʕawta aːlllaha taʕaaːlaaː ʔaan jarzuqak ħimaaːranaː faqaaːla θumma kaaːna mina aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʶtaʶwaʶaʶːsˤaʶwaʶː biʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶbrˤiʶ waʶtaʶwaʶaʶːsˤaʶwaʶː biaːlmarħamaai walaaː jakuwnu ðalika min ʕadaaːwaain lahaaː walaaː malalin minhaaː tarmijhim biħid͡ʒaaːraain mmin sid͡ʒd͡ʒijlin aːllaðij ʔaʶaʶtˤʕaʶmaʶhuʶm min d͡ʒuwʕin waʔaːmanahum min χawfin lqd ʔabljt blaːʔan ħsnaːan bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm aːlr tlk ʔaːjaːt haðaaː jawmun ʕasirun waʶtaʶwaʶaʶːsˤaʶwaʶː biaːlħaqqi waʶtaʶwaʶaʶːsˤaʶwaʶː biʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶbrˤiʶ ʔafħsbtm ʔanmaː χlqnaːkm ʕbθaː wʔankm ʔiljnaː laː trd͡ʒʕwn waʶːsˤbrˤ ʕlaː maː jqwlwn waːhd͡ʒrhm hd͡ʒraː fdaːʔij fdaːʔij jaː ʔaʶrˤdˤj jaː ʔaʶrˤdˤ aːld͡ʒdwd ʔaʕjʃ fj aːljaːbaːn liʔaannahu jaʶndˤaʶmmuʶ ʔilaaː ʕadaaːwaai aːliaːχtilaaːfi taħaaːsudu aːlʔaakfaaːʔi kaːn brjʔiaːan mn aːld͡ʒrjma wʔaʶbsˤrˤ fswf flaː ttrddwaː fj ʕml aːlχjr waaːstiχfaaːfanaː biħaqqihi waʔaaχfawaː maʕaaːnijahu ljs ldj aːlħq fj ʔan ʔaklmk ʕn aːlħaːdθ sjʁlj ðlk aːlmaːʔ bʕd χms dqaːʔiq ʔaw maː qaːrb ðlk mn qaːl hðaː aːlθlwd͡ʒ thtˤlˤ bkθra waʶaʶːlˤχaʶsˤlˤaʶaʶuʶ aːlθθaaːliθaau aːlwlaːjaːt aːlmtħda bld ʁnj baːlmwaːrd aʶːlˤtˤbjʕjaʶ aːlrraquwbu aːllatij turaaːqibuhu ʔaan jamuwta fataʔaχuða maaːlahu jaaː ʔisraaːʔiijlu χaf aːlllaha χawfanaː jaʃʁaluk ʕan aːlrrad͡ʒaaːʔi faʔiinna aːlrrad͡ʒaaːʔa jaʃʁaluk ʕan aːlχawfi kamaaː ʔaanna aːlmakaaːna aʶːlˤmuʶnχaʶfiʶdˤaʶ ʔaakθaru aːlbiqaaːʕi maaːʔan aːlħqwq laː tuʶtˤlˤb bl tʔuχð haðihi d͡ʒahannamu aːllatij jukaððibu bihaaː aːlmud͡ʒrimuwna sʔatzwd͡ʒ sʔaʶðˤlˤ hnaː hðaː aːlʃhr bʔakmlh sʔasʔal ʕn mwʕd wsˤwlˤ aʶːlˤqtˤaʶːrˤ taʁjijru aːlħuruwfi ʕan ʔaaʃkaaːlihaaː waʔiibdaaːlihaaː biʔaaʁjaaːrihaaː ħattaaː jaktuba aːlħaaːʔa ʕalaaː ʃakli aːlbaaːʔi sjχttm aːlmʔutmr ʔaʕmaːlh ʁdaːan hl hj mwd͡ʒwda ħqjqa waʔiinnaaː lanaħnu nuħjij wanumijtu wanaħnu aːlwaaːriθuwna lm ʔakn ʔarjd ʔan ʔafzʕk tˤaʶlˤʕuʶhaʶaʶː kaʔaannahu ruʔuwsu aʶːlˤʃʃaʶjaʶaʶːtˤiʶjniʶ aʶːnðˤrˤ kjf jftrwn ʕlaː aːllh aːlkðb wkfaː bh ʔiθmaː mbjnaː aːrd͡ʒiʕ ʔiilajhim falanaʔatijannahum bid͡ʒunuwdin laaː qibala lahum bihaaː walanuχrid͡ʒannahum minhaaː ʔaaðillaaan wahum sˤaʶaʶːʁiʶrˤuʶwnaʶ fad͡ʒumiʕa aːlssaħaraau limijqaaːti jawmin maʕluwmin lm tħb zwd͡ʒhaː hj fhmtnj ʔinaː nħn nrθ aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wmn ʕljhaː wʔiljnaː mʔaːb lmaːðaː tmlk hðaː aːlʕdd klh mn aʶːlˤqtˤtˤ ʔin knt md͡ʒbraː fʔant md͡ʒbr aːlʔislaːm lm jntʃr baːlsjf ʔaaw takuwna laka d͡ʒannaaun min naχijlin waʕinabin fatufad͡ʒd͡ʒira aːlʔaanhaaːra χilaaːlahaaː tafd͡ʒijranaː faʶʔaʶaʶsˤaʶaʶːbaʶhuʶm sajjiʔiaaːtu maaː ʕamiluwaː waħaaːqa bihim maaː kaaːnuwaː bihi jastahziʔiuwna falaaː χajruhu jurd͡ʒaaː lqd ʔaʶmdˤjnaʶː wqtaː raːʔiʕaː hl tðkr aːsmh waħʃatik wazajnun ʕinda ʕaaːfijatk ʔajmknk ʔan tχbrnj mtaː jʁaːdr aʶːlˤqtˤaʶːrˤ ʔarʔajt mn aːtχð ʔilhh hwaːh ʔafʔant tkwn ʕljh wkjlaː ʔaan ʔaadduwaː ʔiilajja ʕibaaːda aːlllahi ʔiinnij lakum rasuwlun ʔaqrʔa rsaːla ʔanaː ʔaħbb ʕsˤjrˤaʶ aːltffaːħi maːt aːlkθjr mn aːlnaːs fj hðaː aːlħaːdθ ʔaħdhm jraːqbk ʔam jqwlwn nħn d͡ʒmjʕ mntsˤrˤ wakulla ʃajʔin ʔaʶaʶħsˤaʶjnaʶaʶːhuʶ kitaaːbanaː wahuwa aːllaðij halaka man taraka laaː ʔaadrij aːn fj θwrtnaː fsˤlˤ aʶːlˤχtˤaʶːb ʔinh ʔasbwʕ mnð ʔan tqaːbl twm wmaːrj ʔin hðaː maː kntm bh tmtrwn aːlʔaħd ljs jwm ʕml baːlnsba lj hl ʔanta ħzjn fajanbaʁij liman aʶːlˤwaʶsˤlˤaʶaʶuʶ ʔin ʔilhkm lwaːħd lqd χdʕhu maaː kaaːna lija min ʕilmin biaːlmalaʔii aːlʔaaʕlaaː ʔiið jaʶχtaʶsˤiʶmuʶwnaʶ maː fʕlth ʔanaː kaːn χaʶːtˤʔiʶaʶːaʶn ħjθ kaːn junfq mn rajʕhaː ʕlaː waʔaanʃadt liaːbni aːlʕamijdi ʕndk mftaːħ nʕm waliðalika qijla aːlmarʔaaau rajħaaːnaaun walajsat biqahramaaːnaain ʔaaʔaantum ʔaanʃaʔatum ʃad͡ʒaratahaaː ʔaam naħnu aːlmunʃiʔuuwna ql lj kjf ʕlmta rkbt qtˤaʶːrˤ aːlʕaːʃra w aʶːlˤnsˤf aːlðj tʔaχr ʕʃra dqaːʔiq mtaːʕaː lkm wlʔanʕaːmkm qul man bijadihi malakuwtu kulli ʃajʔin wahuwa jud͡ʒijru walaaː jud͡ʒaaːru ʕalajhi ʔiin kuntum taʕlamuwna qaːlwaː lm nk mn aʶːlˤmsˤlˤjn waʔaakθaru aːχtilaaːfanaː watamaaːdijanaː ʔaalakumu aːlððakaru walahu aːlʔaunθaaː wqaːlwaː lwlaː ʔanzl ʕljh mlk wlw ʔanzlnaː mlkaː lˤqdˤj aːlʔamr θm laː jnðˤrˤwn waʶːsˤlˤ mnnaːd aːlmħaːwla wakaðalika d͡ʒaʕalnaaː likulli nabijjin ʕaduwwanaː mina aːlmud͡ʒrimijna wakafaaː birabbika haaːdijanaː waʶnaʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶnaʶː d͡ʒannaaːtu ʕadnin tad͡ʒrij min taħtihaaː aːlʔaanhaaːru χaaːlidijna fijhaaː waðalika d͡ʒazaaːʔu man tazakkaaː rb aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wmaː bjnhmaː aːlrħmn laː jmlkwn mnh χtˤaʶːbaʶː lðaː kl maː tħtaːd͡ʒh hw aːld͡ʒbn aːld͡ʒjd wʔinaːʔ mn mrbaː aːlkrz aːlʔaswd ʕdnaː qaaːluwaː ʔaaʔiiðaaː mitnaaː wakunnaaː turaaːbanaː waʶʕiʶðˤaʶaʶːmaʶnaʶː ʔaaʔiinnaaː lamabʕuwθuwna aːbnj mraːhq mtmrd swf ʔaːkl aːltfaːħa waaːlllajli ʔiiðaaː ʕasʕasa faʔaaχaða ʔaabuw aːlʕataaːhijaai haðaaː aːlmaʕnaaː faʶnaʶðˤaʶmaʶhuʶ ʃaʕranaː waʔiið qaaːla rabbuka lilmalaaːʔiikaai ʔiinnij χaaːliqun baʃaranaː min sˤaʶlˤsˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶn min ħamaʔiin masnuwnin waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlddunjaaː ʔimmaaː niqmaaun naaːzilaaun waʔiimmaaː niʕmaaun zaaːʔiilaaun maː ʔad͡ʒml hðaː aːlχaːtm fj jdk wχsf aːlqmr mina aːlllahi ðij aːlmaʕaaːrid͡ʒi laː thm mwaːfqth tbdw sʕjdaː jnʃrwn lmaːðaː hj ʁaʶːdˤbaʶ aːlʔihmaːl hw nwʕ mn aʶːlˤdˤrˤrˤ ʔaw aːld͡ʒrm ðaːk aʶːlˤʃχsˤ jðˤn ʔan qtˤj jʕjʃ ʕlaː aːlʃd͡ʒra laː tqlq jmknk ʔan tθq bj ql kl jʕml ʕlaː ʃaːklth frbkm ʔaʕlm bmn hw ʔahdaː sbjlaː lm ʔaħaːwl qtˤ sjaːqa sjaːra tqrjbaː aːlkl d͡ʒaːʔ twm jrjd minj ʔan ʔaqwl ðlk ʔaħb ʔakθr aːlʔamrjkjjn rwzflt qul ʔaaʔiinnakum latakfuruwna biaːllaðij χalaqa aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ fij jawmajni watad͡ʒʕaluwna lahu ʔaandaaːdanaː ðalika rabbu aːlʕaaːlamijna qtlt bjtj ʔamk ʔinh ʕlaː rd͡ʒʕh lqaːdr ʔinhu ðˤrˤjf wlkn ʁbj χalaqa aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ biaːlħaqqi waʶsˤaʶwwaʶrˤaʶkuʶm faʔaaħsana sˤuʶwaʶrˤaʶkuʶm waʔiilajhi aʶːlˤmaʶsˤiʶjrˤuʶ fj d͡ʒnaːt wʕjwn aːlʃaːb aːlðj kaːn hnaː ʔaʶʕtˤaʶːnj hðh lk hl ʔaʕd͡ʒbtk aːld͡ʒaːmʕa haːa wdˤʕt aːlmd͡ʒla ʕlaːa aʶːlˤtˤaʶːwlˤaʶ ʔinhu jrjd ʔan jnðˤrˤ ħtaː jtzwd͡ʒ ʔilaː mn aʶːrˤtdˤaʶː mn rswl fʔinh jslk mn bjn jdjh wmn χlfh rˤsˤdaʶː ʔanaː lst mn hnaː ʔatmnaː ʔan ʔaqjm fj fndq χms nd͡ʒwm waaːllaðijna aːstad͡ʒaaːbuwaː lirabbihim waʔaaqaaːmuwaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːaʶaʶ waʔaamruhum ʃuwraaː bajnahum wamimmaaː razaqnaaːhum junfiquwna sˤbaʶːħ aːlχjr ʔajhaː aʶːlˤtˤbjb faʶtˤaʶwwaʶʕaʶt lahu nafsuhu qatla ʔaaχijhi faqatalahu faʶʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħaʶ mina aːlχaaːsirijna χaːlj jdχn kθjranaː d͡ʒdaː wlaː ʁnaː lh ʕn aːltbʁ d͡ʒnaːt ʕdn mftħa lhm aːlʔabwaːb ʔin aːlðjn tdʕwn mn dwn aːllh ʕbaːd ʔamθaːlkm faːdʕwhm fljstd͡ʒjbwaː lkm ʔin kntm sˤaʶːdqjn rafaʕa samkahaaː fasawwaaːhaaː hðh aːlmra hdfj hw baːrjs waaːlθθaaːnij aːnqijaaːdun faʶːsˤbrˤ ʔin wʕd aːllh ħq wlaː jstχfnk aːlðjn laː jwqnwn traː maːðaː sjfʕl aːlrʔijs aːld͡ʒdjd ljs ldjk aːlħq fj aːltwqf fj hðaː aːlʃaːrʕ laː jχtlˤtˤ aːlħljb baːlmaːʔ ʔanaː ʕlaː θqa mn ʔan hðaː aːlktaːb sjkwn ðaː faːʔida ʕðˤjmaʶ lk kðbt qwm lˤwtˤ aːlmrsljn wʔarsl ʕljhm tˤjrˤaʶː ʔabaːbjl law naʃaaːʔu d͡ʒaʕalnaaːhu ʔaud͡ʒaaːd͡ʒanaː falawlaaː taʃkuruwna ʔiinna haðaaː lahuwa ħaqqu aːljaqijni waʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ faʔiinna aːlllaha laaː juʶdˤiʶjʕuʶ ʔaad͡ʒra aːlmuħsinijna aːlħq mn rbk flaː tkwnn mn aːlmmtrjn ʔinh jʕtbr aʶːntiʶðˤaʶaʶːmiʶhaʶaʶː wasalaaːmatihaaː lm ʔaraː mθl hðaː aʶːlˤbtˤjχ aːlkbjr mn qbl ʔinh mn sljmaːn wʔinh bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm wajakuffuhum ʕan ʔaasbaaːbi aːlmawaaːddi aːllatij bihaaː qiwaaːmu ʔaawadihim waʶaʶːntiʶðˤaʶaʶːmuʶ d͡ʒumlatihim ʔalqt aʶːlˤʃrˤtˤaʶ aʶːlˤqbdˤ ʕlaː aːlrd͡ʒl aːlðj qtl aːlftaːa qaːl nwħ rb ʔinhm ʕsˤwnj waːtbʕwaː mn lm jzdh maːlh wwldh ʔilaː χsaːraː aːlbħr fj ʃwnaːn mzdħm kθjraːan jwm aːlʔaħd slaːm ʕlaː ʔil jaːsjn fij ʔaadnaaː aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wahum min baʕdi ʁalabihim sajaʁlibuwna waʔiiðaaː ʔaanʕamnaaː ʕalaaː aːlʔiinsaaːni ʔaʶaʶʕrˤaʶdˤaʶ wanaʔaaaː bid͡ʒaaːnibihi waʔiiðaaː massahu aːlʃʃaru kaaːna jaʔiuwsanaː llχnaːzjr bʕdˤ aːlmjzaːt aːlmʃtrka mʕ aːlbʃr ʔinh ʔamr mχtlf d͡ʒwdj trˤqsˤ d͡ʒjdaː faaːd͡ʒtamaʕuwaː ʕalajhi faqaaːla wakaððaba bihi qawmuka wahuwa aːlħaqqu qul lastu ʕalajkum biwakijlin waaːðkur ʔiismaaːʕijla waaːljasaʕa waðaaː aːlkifli wakullun mina aːlʔaaχjaaːri wabiaːlrraħmaai aːlħunuwwa waaːlʃʃafaqaaa lkl mqaːm mqaːl aʶːlˤlˤtˤf lʁaan jsmʕhaː aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤm wjraːhaː aːlʔaʕmaː ʔiilaaː rabbika jawmaʔiiðin aːlmustaqarru waʔiin ʔaadrij laʕallahu fitnaaun lakum wamataaːʕun ʔiilaaː ħijnin hl ttħdθ aːlktaːlwnja hunaaːlika aːlwalaaːjaau lillahi aːlħaqqi huwa χajrun θawaaːbanaː waχajrun ʕuqbanaː wakaʔaajjin min daaːbbaain laaː taħmilu rizqahaaː aːlllahu jarzuquhaaː waʔiijjaaːkum wahuwa aːlssamijʕu aːlʕalijmu wʕd aːllh laː jχlf aːllh wʕdh wlkn ʔakθr aːlnaːs laː jʕlmwn lituʔuminuwaː biaːlllahi warasuwlihi watuʕazziruwhu watuwaqqiruwhu watusabbiħuwhu bukraaan waʶʔaʶaʶsˤiʶjlˤaʶnaʶː dfʕ twm maːrj mn ʕlaː aːldrd͡ʒ kamaaː ʔaanna ħirmaaːna aːlʕaaːqili lmaːðaː tʕtqd ðlk hl rddt ʕlaː tlk aːlrsaːla bʕd walaaː taqbalu ʕaaːʔiidanaː fqdt traːsj nðˤaʶːrˤthaʶː walaqad ʕahidnaaː ʔiilaaː ʔaːdama min qablu fanasija walam nad͡ʒid lahu ʕazmanaː wʔin jkðbwk fqd kðbt qblhm qwm nwħ wʕaːd wθmwd faaːlʔiiχwaaːnu hum aʶːlˤsˤsˤiʶnfaʶaʶːniʶ aːlʔaːχaraaːni aːlllaðaaːni man kaaːna minhum kaaːlʁiðaaːʔi wakaaːlddawaaːʔi wmaː hw bqwl ʃaːʕr qljlaː maː tʔumnwn nsˤf hðh aːltfaːħaːt faːsd wabawaaːdiri aːlħumqi aʶːlˤmuʶdˤiʶlˤlˤaʶaʶiʶ tðhb zwd͡ʒth mʕh ʔajnmaː ðhb ʕndmaː kaːn ʃaːbaːan kaːn ʕaːmlaːan mθaːbraːan ʔiinna ʃaaːniʔiaka huwa aːlʔaabtaru wamaaː tasʔaaluhum ʕalajhi min ʔaad͡ʒrin ʔiin huwa ʔiillaaː ðikrun lilʕaaːlamijna aːnhaː qbjħa ʔiinnij ðˤaʶnaʶntuʶ ʔaannij mulaaːqin ħisaaːbijah ʔauwlaaːʔiika aːllaðijna aːʃtarawuaː aʶːlˤdˤdˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶaʶaʶ biaːlhudaaːaː famaaː rabiħat ttid͡ʒaaːratuhum wamaaː kaaːnuwaː muhtadijna wajurijdu aːllaðijna jattabiʕuwna aːlʃʃahawaaːti ʔaan tamijluwaː majlanaː ʕaʶðˤiʶjmaʶnaʶː maːðaː sjħsˤlˤ lljaːbaːn ʔaahum χajrun ʔaam qawmu tubbaʕin waaːllaðijna min qablihim ʔaahlaknaaːhum ʔiinnahum kaaːnuwaː mud͡ʒrimijna likulli aːmriʔiin mminhum jawmaʔiiðin ʃaʔanun juʁnijhi jbdw kjn sʕjdaːan tktb aːlʕrbja mn aːljmjn ʔilaː aːljsaːr ʔanaː laː ʔarjd aːlʕwda kl aːlħaːflaːt mmtlʔia knt sʕjdanaː baːlʔams hðaː ktaːb llqraːʔa jaː ʔahl aːlktaːb lm tkfrwn bʔaːjaːt aːllh wʔantm tʃhdwn lijakuwna ʔankr aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤwaʶːt lˤsˤwt aːlħmjr djfjd nʃjtˤ d͡ʒdaːan ʔaʶdˤaʶːʔ ħjaːtah ʕwdau aːbnth faðalika aːllaðij jaduʕʕu aːljatijma ʔawlʔik jsaːrʕwn fj aːlχjraːt whm lhaː saːbqwn mhtˤʕjn mqnʕj rʔwshm laː jrtd ʔiljhm tˤrˤfhm wʔafʔidthm hwaːʔ waːlðjn hm ʕlaː sˤlˤwaʶːthm jħaʶːfðˤwn wqaːl mwsaː jaː frʕwn ʔinj rswl mn rb aːlʕaːlmjn ʔaskn fj mdjna mnð ʔan lz mθnaː aːlχjl mhrh ʔiinna haʔuulaaːʔi laʃirðimaaun qalijluwna jaaː bunajja ʔin kunt fij qawmin falaaː tatakallam bikalaaːmi man huwa fawqak fajamqutuwk nazala mina aːlssamaaːʔi maʶtˤaʶrˤuʶn ʁzjrun qaːlwaː bal lam takwnwaː muʔuminjna laː jmknh aʶːlˤrˤkdˤ bsrʕa tard͡ʒiʕwnahaː ʔiin kuntum sˤaʶːdiʶqjnaʶ ħsˤaʶːnj maː bh ʔinnj msjħj w lkn waːldj mn ʔasra kjnja tʃml ʔad͡ʒjaːlaː mn aːlmslmjn kaːn saːmj jħml qdraː kbjraː mn aʶːlˤʁdˤb fj nfsh aːlllahu aːllaðj d͡ʒaʕala lakumu aːlʔaanʕaːma litarkabwaː minhaː waminhaː taʔakulwna laː tqtˤʕ hðh aːlʔaʃd͡ʒaːr liʔaanna aːlnnafsa ʔilaaː maħbuwbihaaː ʔaaʃwaqu waʔiilaaː maaː jalijhi ʔaasbaqu waʔiinnahu laqasamun law taʕlamwna ʕaʶðˤjmuʶn θumma qaʶbaʶdˤnaʶaʶːhuʶ ʔiilajnaaː qaʶbdˤaʶnaʶː jasijranaː jaʔatuwka bikulli saħħaaːrin ʕalijmin laː td͡ʒʕlhaː rˤχjsˤaʶ hðh msʔala wqt jaaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː ʔiiðaaː laqijtumu aːllaðijna kafaruwaː zaħfanaː falaaː tuwalluwhumu aːlʔaadbaaːra wd͡ʒaːʔt skra aːlmwt baːlħq ðlk maː knt mnh tħjd hðaː fljðwqwh ħmjm wʁsaːq ðhb ʔibnj ʔilaː lndn ʔajn wldt waaːlmaʁruwru fijhaaː maðʕuwrun aːlðj jʔutj maːlh jtzkaː kaːn mnzl mnnaːd mktdˤdˤaʶː baːlnnaːs faʔiiðaaː taʔaammalthaaː lam tad͡ʒid χaaːmisanaː jaqtarinu bihaaː warahbaau aʶːlˤssuʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːniʶ ʔaablaʁuhaaː wʔin jwns lmn aːlmrsljn maː aːlðj tsˤħk ʕljh ʔaʶʕtˤnj brtqaːla ʔin ʕdnaː aʶːlˤaʶːsˤdqaʶːʔ baːlklaːm nd͡ʒdhm wfrwn w ʔin knaː bħaːd͡ʒa ʔiljhm laː nd͡ʒd aːħdaː waaːllaðijna hum birabbihim laaː juʃrikuwna waaːlmulka fij ʕulamaaːʔiihim waman jaqul minhum ʔiinnij ʔiilahun min duwnihi faðalika nad͡ʒzijhi d͡ʒahannama kaðalika nad͡ʒzij aʶːlˤðˤðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ lm jrd twm aːlðhaːb ʔilaː aːlsjnmaː hl jd͡ʒb ʔan tðhb ʔilaː mktb aːlbrjd jʕrf mhrd͡ʒaːn aːlrbjʕ baːlʕaːm aʶːlˤsˤjnj aːld͡ʒdjd ʔaʶjdˤaʶːaʶn walidafʕi ʕad͡ʒzihi ħijalanaː dallahu ʕalajhaaː biaːlʕaqli wahuwa aːlfardu aːlʔaawħadu fij sˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːħiʶ aːlʔaːχiraai wamanʕin wahaaːti wakullu sˤaʶʁiʶjrˤiʶn wakabijrin muʶstaʶtˤaʶrˤuʶn ʔiiniij lˤaʶʔaʶuʶʕtˤiʶj aːlraad͡ʒula waʁajruhu ʔaaħabuu ʔiilajaa minhu χaʃjaaa ʔaan jakubaahu aːllaahu fij aːlnaaaːri limaaː huwa mustaqirrun fij nufuwsihim min ʕiʶðˤaʶmiʶ χaʶtˤaʶrˤiʶhiʶ wad͡ʒalaaːlaai qadrihi waʶðˤuʶhuʶwrˤiʶ nafʕihi waʔaaθarihi kallaaː sanaktubu maaː jaquwlu wanamuddu lahu mina aːlʕaðaaːbi maddanaː aːlddijnu aːlwaaːqifu biʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶhiʶ ʕalaaː aːlχajraaːti ʔam nd͡ʒʕl aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħaʶːt kaːlmfsdjn fj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ ʔam nd͡ʒʕl aːlmtqjn kaːlfd͡ʒaːr wʔanaː aːχtrtk faːstmʕ lmaː jwħaː man ʔaʶaʶʕrˤaʶdˤaʶ ʕanhu faʔiinnahu jaħmilu jawma aːlqijaaːmaai wizranaː lm jsttˤʕ aːltfkjr fj maː jd͡ʒb ʔan jqdmh lhaː fj ʕjd mjlaːdhaː ʔalaː jʕlm mn χlq whw aʶːlˤlˤtˤjf aːlχbjr waaːalllahi laʔaan tamuwta tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbaʶnaʶː lilʕilmi χajrun min ʔaan taʕijʃa qaaːniʕanaː biaːld͡ʒahli ʔaan jakuwna aʶːlˤmaʶqsˤuʶwduʶ bihi aːlqijaaːma bimaaː jatawallaaːhu aːlnnisaaːʔu min tadbijri aːlmanaaːzili waʔaanʃadt liʔaabij bakri bni durajdin aːlnnaaːsu miθlu zamaaːnihim qaddu aːlħiðaaːʔi ʕalaaː miθaaːlih nðˤrˤ aːlʁraːbaːn ʔilaː bʕdˤhmaʶː wwaːfqaː ʕlaː aːqtraːħ aːlθʕlb wʔaʶʕtˤjaʶːh qtˤʕaʶ aːld͡ʒbn wmaː ʔaʶsˤaʶːbkm mn msˤjbaʶ fbmaː ksbt ʔajdjkm wjʕfw ʕn kθjr kaaːnat aːlʕadaaːwaau bajnahum ʔaaqwaaː waaːlʔiiħanu fijhim ʔaʶaʶʕðˤaʶmaʶ wðrnj waːlmkðbjn ʔawlj aːlnʕma wmhlhm qljlaː wajadʕu aːlʔiinsaaːnu biaːlʃʃari duʕaaːʔahu biaːlχajri wakaaːna aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʕad͡ʒuwlanaː ldj ʃʕwr ʔanh mħq fakaððabuwhu faʔaaχaðathumu aːlrrad͡ʒfaau faʶʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħuʶwaʶː fij daaːrihim d͡ʒaaːθimijna aːtrjd mnj aːn aːftħ lk qlbj jawmaʔiiðin tuʶʕrˤaʶdˤuʶwnaʶ laaː taχfaaː minkum χaaːfijaaun sʔauħaliq ʔilaː aːlmaːnjaː waʔiið qaaːla ʔiibraaːhijmu liʔaabijhi waqawmihi ʔiinnanij baraaːʔun mimmaaː taʕbuduwna faðakkir ʔiinnamaaː ʔaanta muðakkirun sjʕd͡ʒbk hðaː aːlnwʕ mn aːlmwsjqaː waʶʔaʶaʶdˤbaʶtˤaʶ limaaː jalijhi faðarhum jaʶχuʶwdˤuʶwaʶː wajalʕabuwaː ħattaaː julaːquwaː jawmahumu aːllaðij juwʕaduwna qul kafaaː biaːlllahi ʃahijdanaː bajnij wabajnakum ʔiinnahu kaaːna biʕibaaːdihi χabijranaː baʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶnaʶː kʔanhm jwm jrwnhaː lm jlbθwaː ʔilaː ʕʃja ʔaw dˤħaʶːhaʶː wajaʕbuduwna min duwni aːlllahi maaː laaː janfaʕuhum walaaː jaʶdˤuʶrˤrˤuʶhuʶm wakaaːna aːlkaaːfiru ʕalaaː rabbihi ðˤaʶhiʶjrˤaʶnaʶː ʔaalaːa waʔiinna likulli malikin ħimanaː ʔaalaːa wʔiinna ħimaaː aːllhi maħaaːrimuhu wrfʕnaː lk ðkrk lm jsttˤʕ ʔan jd͡ʒʕl nfsh ttˤlˤq ʕlaː aːlʔajjil θumma sawwaaːhu wanafaχa fijhi min ruwħihi wad͡ʒaʕala lakumu aːlssamʕa waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ waaːlʔaafʔiidaaa qalijlanaː maaː taʃkuruwna ʔinmaː wljkm aːllh wrswlh waːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː aːlðjn jqjmwn aʶːlˤsˤlˤaʶːaʶ wjʔutwn aːlzkaːa whm raːkʕwn sjstwd͡ʒb ʕljhaː ʔan tntðˤrˤh wħsˤlˤ maː fj aʶːlˤsˤdwrˤ ʔiinnaka laaː tusmiʕu aːlmawtaaː walaaː tusmiʕu aʶːlˤsˤsˤuʶmaʶ aːldduʕaaːʔa ʔiiðaaː wallawaː mudbirijna kl mn ʕljhaː faːn aːlħq mn rbk flaː tkn mn aːlmmtrjn aːlmkfwfwn aːlbʃr laː jsttˤjʕwn aːlʕjʃ ʕlj aːlmrjχ waaːlqamari ʔiiðaaː talaaːhaaː jatanaaːzaʕuwna fijhaaː kaʔasanaː laaː laʁwun fijhaaː walaaː taʔaθijmun χaaːʃiʕaaan ʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːrˤuʶhuʶm tarhaquhum ðillaaun ðalika aːljawmu aːllaðij kaaːnuwaː juwʕaduwna hl jmknk ʔan tqwl lj lmaːðaː tħbhaː hdjtnaː lkl aːlnaːd͡ʒħjn ʔaw tkwn lk d͡ʒna mn nχjl wʕnb ftfd͡ʒr aːlʔanhaːr χlaːlhaː tfd͡ʒjraː waʔiinna lillaðijna ʔant tkðb ʔaljs kðlk tqf tlk aːlmrʔaa ʔamaːm aːlmktba linursila ʕalajhim ħid͡ʒaaːraaan min tˤiʶjniʶn ql lj mn aːktʃf aːlhwaːʔ jaquwlu aːlʔiinsaaːnu jawmaʔiiðin ʔaajna aːlmafarru ʔanaː ʔaʶtˤhw wlkn laː ʁjr ðj ʕwd͡ʒ lʕlhm jtqwn hl bʔimkaːnj mqaːbltk jwm aːlʔiθnjn waʶmaʶdˤaʶrˤrˤaʶaʶuʶ aːld͡ʒaaːhili lajsat biðaaːti ħaddin lstu raːʁbanaː d͡ʒdaː baːlθrwa last ʔaaχaaːfu ʕalajk ʔaan taχaaːfa aːlllaha waʔiinnamaaː ʔaaχaaːfu ʕalajk ʔaan laaː taχaaːfa aːlllaha ʔin ʔardt ʔan jħbk aːlnaːs fʔaħbbh waqaaːla aːlmaʔamuwnu aːlʔiiχwaaːnu θalaaːθu tˤaʶbaʶqaʶaʶːtiʶn tˤaʶbaʶqaʶaʶuʶn kaaːlʁiðaaːʔi laaː justaʁnaaː ʕanhu wahaðihi ħaaːlaaun laaː jumkinu ħaʶsˤrˤuʶ ʁaaːjatihaaː walaaː aːlwuquwfu ʕinda nihaaːjatihaaː aːlskr ħlw liχusn aʶːlˤħðˤ ʔanhu lm jmut jaaː rasuwla aːlllahi ʔaʶaʶwsˤiʶniʶj aːnh dˤχm aːlrraħmanu aːlrraħijmu wkʔajn mn ʔaːja fj aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ jmrwn ʕljhaː whm ʕnhaː mʕrˤdˤwn θm bʕθnaː mn bʕdhm mwsaː whaːrwn ʔilaː frʕwn wmlʔih bʔaːjaːtnaː faːstkbrwaː wkaːnwaː qwmaː md͡ʒrmjn waaːlrruwħu ʔiilajhi fij jawmin kaaːna miqdaaːruhu χamsijna ʔaalfa sanaain kaːn mn aʶːlˤχtˤʔaʶ rˤfdˤ msaːʕdth aːlħaðara aːlħaðara nħn d͡ʒjl aːlbðl fd͡ʒr aːlkaːdħjn ldj kutb qrʔathaː mraːraː wtkraːraː waʔiið faraqnaaː bikumu aːlbaħra faʔaand͡ʒajnaaːkum waʔaaʁraqnaaː ʔaːla firʕawna waʔaantum taʶnðˤuʶrˤuʶwnaʶ hl tʕrfn sfjna nwħ ʔardt ʔan ʔakwn fj baːrjs lm jkn bʔimkaːnj ʔan ʔatʕrf ʕljh lʔanj lm mustaqillanaː lˤiʶlˤfaʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶiʶ minhu lijazdaaːda minhaaː ðlk d͡ʒzaːʔuhm d͡ʒhnm bmaː kfrwaː waːtχðwaː ʔaːjaːtj wrslj hzwaː ʔaljs aːllh bʔaħkm aːlħaːkmjn dʕwnaː nʔaχð tsˤwjt jd͡ʒb ʕlja ʔiʶsˤlˤaʶːħhaʶː qaːl hm ʔawlaːʔ ʕlaː ʔaθrj wʕd͡ʒlt ʔiljk rb lˤtrˤdˤaʶː hl jmknk aːqtraːħ mtˤʕm mʕjn kʔan lm jʁnwaː fjhaː ʔalaː bʕdaː lmdjn kmaː bʕdt θmwd waʶtaʶsˤlˤiʶjaʶaʶuʶ d͡ʒaħijmin lawlaː ʔaan tadaaːrakahu niʕmaaun mmin rrabihi lanubiða biaːlʕaraaːʔ wahuwa maðmuwmun ħddaθnaː rswlu aːllhi sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːllhu ʕalajhi wasallama whw aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːdiʶquʶ aʶːlˤmsˤduʶwquʶ twm jtʃaːd͡ʒr mʕ maːrj θm lm tkn ftnthm ʔilaː ʔan qaːlwaː waːllh rbnaː maː knaː mʃrkjn jawma tuqallabu wud͡ʒuwhuhum fij aːlnnaaːri jaquwluwna jaaː lajtanaaː ʔaʶaʶtˤaʶʕnaʶaʶː aːlllaha waʶʔaʶaʶtˤaʶʕnaʶaʶː aːlrrasuwlaaː sˤaʶbaʶbnaʶaʶː aːlmaaːʔ sˤaʶbbaʶnaʶː ln tblʁ aːlmd͡ʒd ħtaː tlʕq aʶːlˤsˤbrˤ waʶaʶːlˤmuʶðˤaʶaʶːfaʶrˤaʶaʶuʶ biʶtaʶnaʶaʶːsˤuʶrˤiʶ aːlfiʔiatajni ʔiillaaː man huwa sˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶ aːld͡ʒaħijmi mn hw mdrsk fj fijhaaː aːlmawta ʔiillaaː aːlmawtaaa aːlʔauwlaaː wawaqaaːhum ʕaðaaːba aːld͡ʒaħijmi laqad waʶsˤaʶlˤwaʶː ʔilaː hadafahum wqaːl ʔinj ðaːhb ʔilaː rbj sjhdjn kaːn aːlmkaːn haːdʔiaːan ʔaqrʔa ktaːbk ʔanaː fχwra d͡ʒdaːan bki qaːlwaː wd͡ʒdnaː ʔaːbaːʔnaː lhaː ʕaːbdjn ʔin aːllh laː jχfaː ʕljh ʃjʔ fj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wlaː fj aːlsmaːʔ waħukija ʔaanna ʔaabaaː ħaaːzimin aːlʔaaʕrad͡ʒa ʔaaχbara sulajmaaːna bna ʕabdi aːlmaliki biwaʕijdi aːlllahi lilmuðnibajni aːntħrt aːlmʁnja aːlʃhjra ʔanta stkwn hnaː ʁdaːan ʔiinna aːlllaha rabbij warabbukum faaːʕbuduwhu haðaaː sˤiʶrˤaʶaʶːtˤuʶn mustaqijmun waʔaaʃbaaːhihimaaː min aːlrrumuwzi maʕnanaː sˤaʶħiʶjħaʶnaʶː waʕilmanaː mustafaaːdanaː laχarad͡ʒa min aːlrramzi aːlχafijji ʔilaaː aːlʕilmi aːld͡ʒalijji laː td͡ʒaːdl waːnt ʁdˤbaʶːn wlaː tʔakl waːnt ʃbʕaːn nħn mslmwn aːlkθjr mn aːlʔazwaːd͡ʒ jnthj bhm ʔilaː aʶːlˤtˤlˤaʶːq aːiʁsl rd͡ʒljk ʕljk aːn laː tqwl hðaː aːlnwʕ mn aːlklaːm ʕndmaː jkwn aʶːlˤaʶːtˤfaʶːlˤ fj aːld͡ʒwaːr aːlðjn kfrwaː wsˤdwaʶː ʕn sbjl aːllh zdnaːhm ʕðaːbaː fwq aːlʕðaːb bmaː kaːnwaː jfsdwn wd͡ʒaːʔ aːlsħra frʕwn qaːlwaː ʔin lnaː lʔad͡ʒraː ʔin knaː nħn aːlʁaːlbjn ʔanaː lst mtmjzaː bl hm fj ʃk jlʕbwn ʔanaː lst fj aːlmwqʕ aːlðj jχwwlnj tqdjm aʶːlˤnsˤaʶːʔiʶħ baʶsˤiʶrˤaʶthuʶ jaʕrifuwna niʕmata aːlllahi θumma junkiruwnahaaː waʔaakθaruhumu aːlkaaːfiruwna ʔaħb aːlkʕk lilkaaːfirijna lajsa lahu daaːfiʕun faʔaaraaːduwaː bihi kajdanaː fad͡ʒaʕalnaaːhumu mudhaaːmmataaːni ʔiinna aːllaðijna jarmuwna aʶːlˤmuʶħsˤaʶnaʶaʶːtiʶ aːlʁaaːfilaaːti aːlmuʔuminaaːti luʕinuwaː fij aːlddunjaaː waaːlʔaːχiraai walahum ʕaðaaːbun ʕaʶðˤiʶjmuʶn aːskt maːrj ʕasraːʔ aʶːlˤfaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤuʶ hajʔiaaːtun muʶtaʶwaʶssiʶtˤaʶaʶuʶn bajna χallatajni naʶaʶːqiʶsˤaʶtaʶjniʶ walammaaː ħaʶdˤaʶrˤaʶ biʃra bna maʶnsˤuʶwrˤiʶn aːlmawtu fariħa rbkm aːlðj jzd͡ʒj lkm aːlflk fj aːlbħr mra man qalla ðalla waqaaːla qajsu bnu ʕaʶaʶːsˤiʶmiʶn waʔiimmaaː manijjaaun mufd͡ʒiʕaaun mʃt bsrʕa kj tlħq baːlʔaːχrjn ʔinaː mknaː lh fj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wʔaːtjnaːh mn kl ʃjʔ sbbaː twm ljs sˤaʶːrˤmaʶːaʶn fj bjʔiaːt mχtlfa falaʔiin kunnaaː muqirrijna ʔinnaaː liħamqaaː walaʔiin maː zaːʁ aʶːlˤbsˤrˤ wmaː tˤʁaʶː laː ʃk fj ʔan aːlʔisbraːntw mdˤjʕaʶ wqt kbjra χalaqa aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ biaːlħaqqi taʕaaːlaaː ʕammaaː juʃrikuwna nħn daːʔimaːan knnaː ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ waruwija ʕan mud͡ʒaaːhidin fij qawlh taʕaaːlaaː hl trjdjnj ħqaːan ʔan ʔafʕl hðaː qaːl djmaː bnbra χd͡ʒila ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ bʕdˤ aːlmaːl ʔaːsf lkn laː jmknnj ħdˤwrˤ aːlʔid͡ʒtmaːʕ ʃχsˤjaʶː waʶjaʶtaʶʕaʶaʶːtˤaʶaʶː ʕilma maaː aːuχtulifa fijhi duwna maaː aːuttufiqa ʕalajhi rʔajt dˤwʔaʶː fj nhaːja aːlnfq aːlðjn kfrwaː lhm ʕðaːb ʃdjd walajaʕlamanna aːlkaaːðibijna hðaː ʃjʔ aːrjd aːn aːʕmlh lwħdj qaːla θumma aʶːntˤaʶlˤaʶqaʶ falabiθtu malijjanaːθuma qaːla lj ʔiinna rabbaka huwa ʔaaʕlamu biman dˤaʶlˤlˤaʶ ʕan sabijlihi wahuwa ʔaaʕlamu biaːlmuhtadijna kun lilwuddi ħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤaʶnaʶː waʔiin lam tad͡ʒid muʶħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤaʶnaʶː smmaːh ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔuʶh tid aːlmrʔaa lhaː χdwd d͡ʒmjla θumma nuʶsˤħuʶhuʶ fij aːlssiri waaːlʕalaaːnijaai wamaaː ʔaanta ʔiillaaː baʃarun miθlunaaː waʔiin naʶðˤuʶnnuʶkaʶ lamina aːlkaaːðibijna fahaðaaː ʔaaʕdalu aːlʔiiχwaaːni qaːl twm ʔanh laː jħlm ʔabdaː walajsa tattafiqu ʔaaħwaaːlu d͡ʒamijʕihim ʕalaaː ħaddin waaːħidin fajasbiqa ʕalajhi aːlkitaaːbu fajaʕmala biʕamali ʔaahli aːlnnaaːri fjadχulahaaː watamahhadat ladajhi ʔaaħwaaːlu man χabarahu ʔiinnij wad͡ʒd͡ʒahtu wad͡ʒhija lillaðij faʶtˤaʶrˤaʶ aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ ħanijfanaː wamaaː ʔaanaaː mina aːlmuʃrikijna waqaaːluwaː jaaː ʔaajjuha aːlssaaːħiru aːdʕu lanaaː rabbaka bimaaː ʕahida ʕindaka ʔiinnanaaː lamuhtaduwna ʔajn sˤndwq aːlbrjd wʔarslnaːh ʔilaː maːʔia ʔalf ʔaw jzjdwn kaːn aʶːlˤmnðˤrˤ mn qma hðaː aːlmbnaː raːʔiʕaː lmaːðaː ʔant ʁjr mħbwb hnaː jaː ʔilhj ʔinhaː fwdˤaʶː ʕaːrma χtˤth χtˤrˤaʶ ʔaraː ʔan hðaː aːlmʕd͡ʒm mfjd waːrħmnaː wʔant χjr aːlraːħmjn maaː lij walilwaladi walaqad ʔaʶaʶdˤaʶlˤlˤaʶ minkum d͡ʒibillanaː kaθijranaː ʔaafalam takuwnuwaː taʕqiluwna laː ʔaʕlm ʔin kaːn d͡ʒwrd͡ʒ qaːdmaː ʔam laː aːlktb hj ʔaʕz ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔiʶj aːlθld͡ʒ jtsaʶːqtˤ fj aːld͡ʒbaːl nzl qtˤhaʶː mn srjrj ʔinh ljs χljlj maː bjnnaː hw ħb ʔaʶflˤaʶːtˤwnj mʕ bʕdˤ aːlmnaːfʕ ʔanaː swf ʔaðhb ʔilaː bwstn aːlʔisbwʕ aːlqaːdm wlkn ʔanaː ħqaːan mtaː trjd zjaːrtnaː ʔaʶʕtˤnj kl aʶːlˤtfaʶːsˤjlˤ lqd ʔistχdm rʔash waqaaːla ħammaaːdu ʕad͡ʒradu ʔaʶħdˤiʶrˤ aːlmusaːʕda ʔiinnahaaː saaːʔat mustaqarranaː wamuqaaːmanaː aːlzzd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa mljʔia baːlmaːʔ ʔahdtnj ʕmtj ktaːbanaː fj ʕjd mjlaːd aːlmsjħ haː lm trhu ʔabdaːan hnaːk dljl laː jqbl aːld͡ʒdl ʔan twm hw aʶːlˤlˤsˤ lʕlk baːχʕ nfsk ʔalaː jkwnwaː mʔumnjn qaːlwaː nfqd sˤwaʶːʕ aːlmlk wlmn d͡ʒaːʔ bh ħml min ðalika mutaʕad͡ʒd͡ʒibijna wabihi muʕtabirijna ħattaaː qijla libazard͡ʒamhara ʔawd ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilaː aːlħfl jaʕlamu maaː bajna ʔaajdijhim wamaaː χalfahum waʔiilaaː aːlllahi turd͡ʒaʕu aːlʔaumuwru fij sʔaʶsˤlˤ ʔilaː aʶːlˤmħtˤaʶ ʔin ʔaχðt hðaː aʶːlˤtˤrˤjq liʔaanna aːlttabaaːjuna fij aːlnnaaːsi ʁaaːlibun aːttabiʕuwaː man laaː jasʔaalukum ʔaad͡ʒranaː wahum muhtaduwna laː ʔaʕtqd ʔanhaː stfhm hl tðkr judillu biʶaʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶiʶ aʶːlˤʕaʶaʶːsˤiʶj wajansaaː ʕaʶðˤiʶjmaʶ aʶːlˤmaʶʕaʶaʶːsˤiʶj wʔin mn ʔahl aːlktaːb ʔilaː ljʔumnn bh qbl mwth wjwm aːlqjaːma jkwn ʕljhm ʃhjdaː waqaaːla rad͡ʒulun min waʶːlˤʔaʶbsˤaʶːrˤ waːlʔafʔida qljlaː maː tʃkrwn mtaː ʕljnaː ʔan nðhb ʁjr msmwħ lk ʔan tħdˤrˤ qtˤk ʔilaː aːlmdrsa walaaː lahu buddun min saddi aːlχallaai fijhaaː ʕinda ħaaːd͡ʒatihi waʶʕaʶrˤaʶdˤnaʶaʶː judaaːχiluhum aːlʔiiʕd͡ʒaaːbu litawaħħudihim biʶfaʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶiʶ aːlʕilmi ʔaafalaaː jarawna ʔaallaaː jard͡ʒiʕu ʔiilajhim qawlanaː walaaː jamliku lahum dˤaʶrˤrˤaʶnaʶː walaaː nafʕanaː qaaːla ʔaalqihaaː faʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶaʶ aːlttaqadumi wajamnaʕuwhu mubaaːjinaaa aʶːlˤttaʶχsˤiʶjsˤiʶ ʕinaaːdanaː limaaː d͡ʒahiluwhu wamaqtanaː limaaː baaːjanuwhu watakuwnu aːld͡ʒibaaːlu kaaːlʕihni qul kuwnuwaː ħid͡ʒaaːraaan ʔaaw ħadijdanaː wʔiinna aːllha ʔaamara aːlmuʔuminijna bimaaː ʔaamara bihi aːlmursalijna faqaaːla taʕaaːlaaː walammaaː balaʁa ʔaaʃuddahu waaːstawaaː ʔaːtajnaaːhu ħukmanaː waʕilmanaː wakaðalika nad͡ʒzij aːlmuħsinijna linuħjija bihi baldaaan majtanaː wanusqijahu mimmaaː χalaqnaaː ʔaanʕaaːmanaː waʔaanaaːsijja kaθijranaː waaːlʃʃarafu fij aːlttaʁaaːfuli χaf aːlllaha biaːlnnahaaːri wanam biaːlllajli ʔawh ʕmrhaː θmaːnja snwaːt qul ʔiinnij lan jud͡ʒijranij mina aːlllahi ʔaaħadun walan ʔaad͡ʒida min duwnihi multaħadanaː bwrkt ʔaʶrˤdˤ aːlfraːtjn wtˤn waʔaadχalnaaːhum fij raħmatinaaː ʔiinnahum mina aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħiʶjnaʶ wnʕma kaːnwaː fjhaː faːkhjn waaːlwaladu aːlssuwʔu jaʃijnu aːlssalafa wajahdimu aːlʃʃarafa tbdw htumj sʕjda d͡ʒdaːan mn tkwnjii wmaː jʔatjhm mn ðkr mn aːlrħmn mħdθ ʔilaː ljs hw ʔibnj wlkn ʔanaː waːldh ðalika biʔaanna aːlllaha nazzala aːlkitaaːba biaːlħaqqi waʔiinna aːllaðijna aːχtalafuwaː fij aːlkitaaːbi lafij ʃiqaaːqin baʕijdin θm jd͡ʒzaːh aːld͡ʒzaːʔ aːlʔawfaː sunwjmka aːik d͡ʒħaːn ldkjaː walaw kaaːnat fijhi faʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶuʶn lˤaʶχaʶsˤsˤaʶ aːlllahu bihi man aʶːsˤtˤaʶfaʶaʶːhuʶ lirisaaːlatihi maːðaː tbħθ hnaːk mlʔat aʶːlˤħwdˤ maːʔaː ʔanaː ʔatnaːwl ʁdaːʔij lm ʔaχbrh baːlħqjqa χʃja ʔan jʁdˤb qaaːla ʔaabaʃʃartumuwnij ʕalaaː ʔaan massanija aːlkibaru fabima tubaʃʃiruwna ʕzf ʕaːzf aːlbjaːnw mqaʶːtˤʕ ʔiʶdˤaʶːfjaʶ aːlðj ʔaʶtˤʕmhm mn d͡ʒwʕ wʔaːmnhm mn χwf jd͡ʒb faʔaaħjaaːkum θumma jumijtukum θumma juħjijkum θumma ʔiilajhi turd͡ʒaʕuwna waħurraaːsuhu fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ aːllaðijna jaʶqbiʶdˤuʶwnaʶ ʔaarzaaːqahum jaðubbuwna ʕan aːlnnaaːsi walammaaː dˤuʶrˤiʶbaʶ aːlrrid͡ʒaaːlu ʔaarbaʕaaun wmaː χlqnaː aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wmaː bjnhmaː ʔilaː baːlħq wʔin aːlsaːʕa lʔaːtja faʶːsˤfħ aʶːlˤsˤfħ aːld͡ʒmjl lʕbt aːltns tˤwaʶːlˤ aːljwm aːlkwb mljʔ baːlħljb lqd ʔaad͡ʒaʕalnaaː min duwni aːlrraħmani ʔaːlihaaan juʕbaduwna waʔiinnahu lahudanaː waraħmaaun lilmuʔuminijna ʕabbrt ʕn ħznhaː baːldmwʕ aʶːlˤsˤaʶːmtaʶ waʔaanta ħillun bihaðaaː aːlbaladi waʕalajhaaː naaːʃiʔianaː ʃʕrt bʔan qlbj jχfq bsrʕa faʔaahlaknaaː ʔaaʃadda minhum baʶtˤʃaʶnaʶː waʶmaʶdˤaʶaʶː maθalu aːlʔaawwalijna wamina aːlllajli fasabbiħhu waʔaadbaaːra aːlssud͡ʒuwdi faʔaaχaða d͡ʒaʶħðˤaʶaʶuʶ rbh warafaʕnaaː laka ðikraka ʔaw qaːl maːt fqd kðb lqd ħdaqat bʕjnjn nsˤf muʶʁmdˤtjn waʔiinnaka latulaqqaaː aːlqurʔaːna min ladun ħakijmin ʕalijmin mn ntˤfaʶ ʔiðaː tmnaː θumma rudduwaː ʔiilaaː aʶːlˤfdˤaʶːʔiʶj d͡ʒjms waːb jsftħ aːlʔabwaːb waːsʕa waʔaanʃada aːlrrijaaːʃiju lˤiʶmuʶsˤʕaʶbiʶ bni ʕabdi aːlllahi qaaːluwaː ʔaʶaʶdˤʁaʶaʶːθuʶ ʔaaħlaaːmin wamaaː naħnu bitaʔawijli aːlʔaaħlaaːmi biʕaaːlimijna kl aːlʔawraːq aːlnqdja aːlʔamrjkja ldjhaː nfs aːllwn qaaːluwaː sanuraaːwidu ʕanhu ʔaabaaːhu waʔiinnaaː lafaaːʕiluwna lmaːðaː laː trjd ʔan tqwl lnaː aːlħqjqa law kaaːna min ʔaːbaaːʔiihi min malikin qultu rad͡ʒulun jaʶtˤlˤuʶbuʶ mulka ʔaabijhi wmn aːlnaːs mn jqwl ʔaːmnaː baːllh wbaːljwm aːlʔaːχr wmaː hm bmʔumnjn ʔinhaː tstħq aːlʕnaːʔ ʔiinna aːlllaha maʕa aːllaðijna aːttaqawaː waaːllaðijna hum muħsinuwna fqtˤ ʔaχbrnj maːðaː trjd ʔanaː md͡ʒthd fj aːlʕlwm jʕd͡ʒbh aːlðhaːb baʶːlˤʃaʶːtˤʔiʶ bjn aːlfjna waːlʔaχraː ʔaan d͡ʒaaːʔahu aːlʔaaʕmaaː maː aːlsr jnbʁj ʔan tʕml bnsˤjħth wanujassiruka liljusraaːaː rbmaː mn aʶːlˤʔaʶfdˤlˤ ʔan tʔatj mʕnaː sʔakwn mʕk ħaːlanaː χlq aːllh aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ baːlħq ʔin fj ðlk lʔaːja llmʔumnjn maː kl hðh aʶːlˤdˤwdˤaʶːʔ ʔanaː mn aːlʁaːlbjn laː jmkn td͡ʒnb nʃwb aːlħrwb maːdaːm aːlʃʕb ʁjr mtʕlm kfaːja lqd ʔazʕd͡ʒtmwh ʔardtu ʔan ʔatʔakd ʔank stʔatj ʔilaː hnaː ʔaafabihaðaaː aːlħadijθi ʔaantum mudhinuwna waːlðj χlq aːlʔazwaːd͡ʒ klhaː wd͡ʒʕl lkm mn aːlflk waːlʔanʕaːm maː trkbwn qaːl rb aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wmaː bjnhmaː ʔin kntm mwqnjn wʔink ltdʕwhm ʔilaː sˤrˤaʶːtˤ mstqjm qaaːla faʔiini aːttabaʕtanij falaaː tasʔaalnij ʕan ʃajʔin ħattaaː ʔauħdiθa laka minhu ðikranaː walaaː nukallifu nafsanaː ʔiillaaː wusʕahaaː waladajnaaː kitaaːbun jaʶntˤiʶquʶ biaːlħaqqi wahum laaː juʶðˤlˤaʶmuʶwnaʶ rd͡ʒaːʔan aːʁsl jdjk d͡ʒjdanaː qbl aːlʔakl naħnu laaː nurijdu ʔaan namuwta ħattaaː natuwba hl traː aːlʔab w aːlʔaum ʔanaː aːħtrmk ʔalaː tʕrf ʔaχtk aːlsbaːħa wanaħnu ʔausuwdu aːlwaʁaaː faaːʃhadij wuθuwba ʔausuwdiki jawma aʶːlˤsˤiʶiʶdaʶaʶːm wakaðalika nuʶfaʶsˤsˤiʶlˤuʶ aːlʔaːjaaːti walitastabijna sabijlu aːlmud͡ʒrimijna ʔinhaː tdʕwnj bknd͡ʒj laː tnm waːlnwaːfð mftwħa ʕinda sidraai aːlmuntahaaː waaːlʔaaqlaaːma lahaaː ruʕaaːaan kl ʃjʔ fuqid lm jʔaðnj ʔaħd wmaː ʔarslwaː ʕljhm ħaʶːfðˤjn bl nħn mħrwmwn ʕljk ʔan ttʔasf ʔalm tr kjf fʕl rbk bʕaːd ʔaafaraʔaajta ʔiin mattaʕnaaːhum sinijna nsˤħhaʶː aʶːlˤtˤbjb bʔan tdχl ʔilaː aːlmstʃfaː laː jmknnj ʔan ʔafrrq bjnh wbjn ʔaχjh waʔaanzala fij ðalika aːlqurʔaːna jħb aːlbrtqaːl ʔawlm jrwaː ʔanaː χlqnaː lhm mmaː ʕmlt ʔajdjnaː ʔanʕaːmaː fhm lhaː maːlkwn laː ʔaʕrf maː aːlðj sʔafʕlh ʔinhaː trjd fqtˤ aʶːlˤħsˤwlˤ ʕlaː aːlmtʕa ʔatʔamrwn aːlnaːs baːlbr wtnswn ʔanfskm wʔantm ttlwn aːlktaːb ʔaflaː tʕqlwn kuluwaː waaːʃrabuwaː hanijʔianaː bimaaː kuntum taʕmaluwna ʔafrʔajtm aːlnaːr aːltj twrwn waʔiin ʔaasrafa fijhi ʔaabʃamahu waminhum man jamtaniʕu min fiʕli aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶːtiʶ faʔaaraaːhu aːlʔaːjaaa aːlkubraaː aːlʔiimaaːmu aːld͡ʒaaːʔiiru χajrun min aːlfitnaai bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi qad ʔaaflaħa aːlmuʔuminuwna tklmwaː whm jʃrbwn aːlqhwa ldja aːlkθjr mn klmaːt aːlsr lʔatðkrhaː walaaː aʶːlˤðˤðˤuʶlˤuʶmaʶaʶːtuʶ walaaː aːlnnuwru wakam min qarjaain ʔaahlaknaaːhaaː fad͡ʒaaːʔahaaː baʔasunaaː bajaaːtanaː ʔaaw hum qaaːʔiiluwna lqd ʃrħ tˤwm aʶːlˤwdˤʕjaʶ lmaːrj laːnhaː kaːnt ʕtˤlˤaʶ sˤjfjaʶ fqd qmt bd͡ʒwla jawma jaquwmu aːlnnaaːsu lirabbi wahudanaː lilʕaaːlamijna ʁdaːan ʕjd aːlʔam θjaːbh laː ttmaːʃaː mʕ aʶːlˤmwdˤaʶ fʔinmaː hj zd͡ʒra waːħda kallaaː ʔiiðaaː dukkati aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤuʶ dakkanaː dakkanaː faʔaalhamahaaː fud͡ʒuwrahaaː wataqwaaːhaaː km hðaː mzʕd͡ʒ hl ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔaʶuʶħdˤrˤ ʔaħdaːan mʕj qad naʕlamu ʔiinnahu lajaħzunuka aːllaðij jaquwluwna faʔiinnahum laaː jukaððibuwnaka walakinna aʶːlˤðˤðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ biʔaːjaaːti aːlllahi jad͡ʒħaduwna aːllaðij jaʶsˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlnnaaːra aːlkubraaːaː χaʶtˤtˤaʶʔaʶtiʶ aːlntaːʔid͡ʒu aːltnbʔuaːti ʔiillaaː ʕad͡ʒuwzanaː fij aːlʁaaːbirijna maːðaː traː fj aʶːlˤsˤwrˤaʶ manaʕa aʶːlˤquʶtˤnaʶ bal juʶʕtˤaʶaʶː maaː jastaħiqquhu biʶsuʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːniʶhiʶ waʕuluwwi jadihi ʔaraːd saːmj ʔan jʕtnq aːlʔislaːm faʔiinna aːlqaraaːʔiiħa ʔiðaaː aːnfaradat aːstakaddahaaː aːlfikru waaːstafraʁahaaː aːliaːd͡ʒtihaaːdu ldjj bʕdˤ aːlmlaːbs lk wamaː ʔaʶaʶsˤaʶːbaʶkuʶm min muʶsˤjbaʶaʶiʶn fabimaː kasabat ʔaajdjkum wajaʕfw ʕan kaθjrin waʁuruwranaː laaː jankaʃifu ʔillaaː biaːlttuhmaai waaːrtafaʕat aːlttuhmaau biʶtˤuʶwlˤiʶ aːlχibraai naaːma aʶːlˤtˤtˤiʶflˤuʶ ʕalaaː aːlssarijri kjf ʔaːkl hðaː ʔaqwl ðlk mn qlbj ʔiinna aːlharama qadijmun wakaaːna muħaddiθanaː ʕaːd saːmj llʕjʃ hnaː waqad ʔaataaː aːbnu aːlrruwmiji biʔaablaʁa min haðaaː aːlmaʕnaaː fij ʃaʕrihi faqaaːla ʕlaː aːlbaːʁj tdwr aːldwaːʔir laaː naʶqsˤuʶn ʔin lm ttrknaː w ʃʔannaː saʶːttsˤlˤ baʶːlˤʃʃrˤtˤaʶ walaaː ʔaan taχtalifa aːlʕuqalaaːʔu fij sˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːħiʶhaʶaʶː wafasaaːdihaaː walaː ʔaanaː ʕaːbidun maː ʕabadtum qaːl saːmj hðaː lˤmmrˤrˤdˤaʶ ndmt ʕlaː ʕdm ħdˤwrˤj aʶːlˤχtˤbaʶ waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi man ʁarasa ʃad͡ʒaraaa aːlħilmi aːd͡ʒtanaaː θamaraaa aːlssilmi faʔaajna taðhabwna ħb aʶːlˤwtˤn mn aːlʔijmaːn jabijʕu aːlttaaːd͡ʒiru aːlbunna wafj θamwda ʔiið qjla lahum tamattaʕwaː ħattaː ħjnin kl aːld͡ʒbl jtʁjr bʔalwaːnh fj aːlχrjf faʔiinna aːlssunaaa laaː jad͡ʒuwzu ʔaan tarida biʔiibaaːħaai aːlkaðibi jnbʁj ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jntðˤrˤ waʔiinna nafaaːða ʔaamrik maʕa kalaaːmik tʕbt qljlanaː rʔaaː saːmj ðlk aːlmnzl taʕd͡ʒijluhu waʶtaʶsˤʁiʶjrˤuʶhuʶ wasatruhu wamuraaːʔiij aːlmaħaaːsini waaːlʕujuwbi waaːlmud͡ʒaaːharaai bimaaː kaaːna juʶdˤmiʶrˤuʶhuʶ ʔaχð saːmj kll aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶːbwn mʕh lqd tħqqt mn aːlaːmr waʔaakjdu kajdanaː waqad qijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami aːlħilmu ħid͡ʒaaːbu aːlʔaːfaaːti wrħaː aːlmnjja ttˤħn fabaddala aːllaðijna ðˤaʶlˤaʶmuʶwaʶː qawlanaː ʁajra aːllaðij qijla lahum ʔiinnahaː laʔiiħdaaː aːlkubari ʔajn ʔaqrb mʕrˤdˤ fnj tˤaʶʕaʶːmuʶ aːlʔaaθjmi aːird͡ʒʕ ʔilaː aːlbjt qbl aːlsaːdsa janbaħu aːlkalbu rkkzt ʕlaː ʃjʔ waːħd waaːlquluwba bihaaː waaːθiqaaun waqaːlwaː jaː wajlanaː hðaː jawmu aːlddjni twm jħaːdθ maːrj ʕlaː aːlhaːtf saːmj mn ʔasra jhwdjja θrjja wakallafahaaː luzuwma aʶːlˤfaʶsˤaʶaʶːħaʶaʶiʶ waaːlnnad͡ʒmu waaːlʃʃad͡ʒaru jasd͡ʒudaːni man ʃakaraka ʕalaaː maʕruwfin lam tusdihi ʔilajhi faʕaaːd͡ʒilhu biaːlbirri waʔiillaaː aːnʕakasa faʶsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ ðammanaː dʕaː saːmj ljlaː llddχwl ʔaχbr saːmj aʶːlˤʃʃrˤtˤaʶ ʔannh qd aːrtukbt d͡ʒrjma wamadχalun makrihi χafijjun liʔaanna aʶːlˤsˤsˤiʶdqaʶ jadʕuw ʔilajhi ʕaqlun muwd͡ʒibun waʃarʕun muʔuakkadun qijla fakam bajna aːlmaʃriqi waaːlmaʁribi qaaːla masijraau jawmin lilʃʃamsi faʃaːribwna ʕalajhi mina aːlħamjmi waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man saaːsa nafsahu saaːda naaːsahu wajuʔuθiru aːlwuquwfa ʕalajhi aːntqlj llʕjʃ hnaː aːlʕfw ʕnd aːlmqdra laː nstqbl aːlzwwaːr aːljwm wataʕfuw ħilmanaː wajabqaː wad͡ʒhu rabbika ðuw aːld͡ʒalaːli waaːlʔiikraːmi θumma kaːna ʕalaqaaan faχalaqa fasawwaː rʔajt aːlnaːs qd maːlwaː ʔilaː mn ʕndh maːl wafuruʃin marfwʕaain wajazilla bihaaː saaːhijanaː liʔaanna aːlʔiinsaaːna qad juðijʕa sirra nafsihi bibaaːdiraai lisaaːnihi waʔaammaː man ʔawtija kitaːbahu biʃimaːlihi fajaqwlu jaː lajtanj lam ʔawta kitaːbijah ʔiið hum ʕalajhaː quʕwdun kaːn jkðb bʃkl sˤaʶːrˤχ mn ʔajn ħsˤlˤ ʕlaː hðaː aːlħdaːʔ aːlʁrjb aːlzam aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶmtaʶ faʔiinnahu juksibuk sˤaʶfwaʶ aːlmaħabbaai ʔaħbb tʔamml aːlnnd͡ʒwm laː jsttˤjʕ saːmj aʶːlˤaʶːntðˤaʶːrˤ lm jsbq lsaːmj w ʔan rʔaaː ʃjʔiaː mmaːθlaː fj ħjaːth kaːn aʶːlˤmsˤaʶːlˤħaʶ mtaː wulidt waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlzam aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶmtaʶ tuʕaddu ħakijmanaː d͡ʒaaːhilanaː kunta ʔaaw ʕaaːlimanaː dmmr zlzaːl ʕjaːda saːmj kaːn saːmj jχtls aʶːlˤnnðˤrˤ ʕbr aːlnnwaːfð wamud͡ʒaaːnabaaa maaː sˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ muttafaqanaː ʕalajhi biʶaʶːlˤmuʶwaʶaʶːdˤaʶʕaʶaʶiʶ faʔaammaː man ʔaʶaʶʕtˤaʶː waaːttaqaː waaːlqattaaːtu aːlnnamaaːmu waqijla aːlnnamaaːmu aːllaðij jakuwnu maʕa aːlqawmi jataħaddaθuwna fajanummu ħadijθahum jrjdwn mħaːdθa twm fqtˤ faaːfʕaluwaː maaː tuʔumaruwna lm jzrhm ʔaħd tˤjlˤaʶ ʔiqaːmthm hnaː ʔajmknk ʔan turijanj ðlk ʔalħq zlzaːl ʔaʶdˤrˤaʶːrˤaʶː baːlʁa baːlʕjaːda ʔanaː mwqn bʔan twm mħq walajsa liman muniħa d͡ʒawdaau aːlqarijħaai wasurʕaau aʶːlˤχaʶaʶːtˤiʶrˤiʶ ʕad͡ʒzun ʕan d͡ʒawaaːbin waʔiin ʔaʶuʶʕdˤiʶlˤaʶ qd jnbt aːlʃwk wstˤ aːlzhwr walikulli wahnin miqdaaːrun min aːld͡ʒahli waaːlʔaarzaaːqu aːlmaktuwbaau laaː tunaaːlu biaːlʃʃidaai waʶaʶːlˤmuʶtˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶbaʶaʶiʶ ʔaam ħasiba aːllaðjna jaʕmalwna aːlssajiʔiaaːti ʔaan jasbiqwnaː saːʔa maː jaħkumwna fajuθijru ħasadanaː qad χaaːmara buʶʁdˤaʶnaʶː qaːm aːlmdrrs bmnaːdaːa aʶːlˤħaʶːdˤrˤjn waʔiin taraktahum lam jatrukuwka qijla watarku aʶːlˤχaʶtˤiʶjʔiʶaʶaʶiʶ χajrun min muʕaaːlad͡ʒaai aːlttawbaai warubba naʶðˤrˤaʶaʶiʶn zaraʕat ʃahwaaan faʔiiðaaː aːrtaħalnaaː lam jazal jaðkuru aːlllaha ʕazza wad͡ʒalla ħattaaː nanzila faʔiinna ðawij aːlmuknaai kaθijrun waaːlmuʕijnu minhum qalijlun ljdnaː djwn kθjra jd͡ʒb ʔan nsdddhaː waʔiin qaaːbala ʕalajhi d͡ʒaaːnaba ʔaadabahu faʶaʶːlˤʃʃaʶrˤtˤuʶ aːlʔaawwalu laː tns aʶːlˤaʶːttsˤaʶːlˤ bnaː lm jkn hnaːk ʔaħd aʶːlˤsˤjn bld kbjr waqad qaaːla ʔaabuw aːlʕataaːhijaai waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi qalijlun jakfij χajrun min kaθijrin juʶtˤʁiʶj waʔiin naaːlahu ðullun walaħiqahu wahnun fajataʔaawwalu sˤaʶaʶːħiʶbuʶhaʶaʶː qawla aːlbuħturijji walaaː juflatu min ʁawaaːʔiili makrihi aːlʔidaːra bbsaʶːtˤaʶ hj tħmlk aːllwm ʕn ʔaʶχtˤaʶːʔ aːld͡ʒmjʕ waʔiin kaaːna rmmm twm mnzlh faːz frjq maːntʃstr jwnaːjtd bʔarbʕa ʔahdaːf mqaːbl ʔiθnjn aːdχuluwaː aːld͡ʒannaaa ʔaantum waʔaazwaːd͡ʒukum tuħbarwna aʶːrˤkuʶdˤ birid͡ʒlika hðaː muʁtasalun baːridun waʃaraːbun waaːlħabbu ðuw aʶːlˤʕaʶsˤfiʶ waaːlrrajħaːnu waʔaanʃada baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi liʕalijji bni ʕabbaaːsin aːlrruwmiji raħimahu aːlllahu ʔalʁaː saːmj ħflh saːmj jʕml fj aːlʕjaːda waaːlddunjaaː daaːru aːlmiħnaai aːlnnaaːru laaː jaʶnquʶsˤuʶhaʶaʶː maaː ʔauχiða minhaaː ðhb saːmj lˤʔiʶħdˤaʶːrˤ aːlddwaːʔ bsrʕa fj samwmin waħamjmin aːddahinuwaː jaðhab aːlbuʔusu ʕankum sjsˤlˤ aːlaːχrwn fj ʁdˤwn dqaːʔiq mʕdwda waʔaammaaː ħajaaːʔuuhu min aːlnnaaːsi fajakuwnu bikaffi aːlʔaaðaaː watarki aːlmud͡ʒaaːharaai biaːlqabijħi hj tʕaːnj mn mrˤdˤ wahadajnaːhumaaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤiʶrˤaʶːtˤaʶ aːlmustaqjma ʔaafatumaːrwnahu ʕalaː maː jaraː kaːn aːlmdrrs jtd͡ʒaːhlnj lam jaʕibk bitarki ðalika ʔaaħadun hw bihaaː ʕiʶrˤdˤuʶn ʔiinnaː ʔaanzalnaː ʔiilajka aːlkitaːba biaːlħaqqi faaːʕbudi aːlllaha muʶχlˤiʶsˤaʶnaʶː lahu aːlddjna wakullu ðalika jamnaʕu minhu aːlʃʃarʕu wajadfaʕu ʕanhu aːlʕaqlu ʔanaː θrj walaw aːlnnabaaːhaai kaːn saːmj fj mkaːn ʁjr msmwħ llssbaːħa kaːn saːmj jʃrb aːlkħwl walaː jwθiqu waθaːqahu ʔaaħadun aːlmʃkla hj ʔannj lm jkn ldjj maː ʔaqwlh lh kaːnt d͡ʒrwħ saːmj thddd ħjaːth kaːn mrtdjaːan aːllwn aːlʔazrq faqaaːla walaaː sarafa fij aːlχajri aːllaðj ʔaaħallanaː daːra aːlmuqaːmaai min faʶdˤlˤiʶhiʶ laː jamassunaː fjhaː naʶsˤaʶbuʶn walaː jamassunaː fjhaː luʁwbun hl hnaːk maː jħdθ faʔaumuwrun hija lahu ħasmun ʔin sˤaʶaʶːdaʶfaʶhaʶaʶː ʕazmun waʔaaχrasa jurijdu aʶːlˤχuʶtˤbaʶaʶaʶ qad tabassama ħattaaː badat nawaaːd͡ʒiðuhu warawaaː aːbnu masʕuwdin ʕan aːlnnabiji sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama ʔaannahu qaaːla lm ʔant mstʕd͡ʒl aːllaðj ʔaʶaʶnqaʶdˤaʶ ðˤaʶhrˤaʶkaʶ hl tʕrf kjf tsˤlˤħ aːltlfaːz kaːn mdrrsj lˤlˤrˤrˤjaʶːdˤaʶ jkrhnj mn sjsaːʕdnj lm jχbrnj faʶːdˤlˤ bʃjʔ hðaː jawmu aʶːlˤfaʶsˤlˤiʶ aːllaðj kuntum bihi tukaððibwna qaaːla ʕalijju bnu ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶn rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu man kaaːna lij ʔilajhi ħaaːd͡ʒaaun waʔiiðaaː d͡ʒaaːlast aːlʕulamaaːʔa faʶʔaʶaʶnsˤiʶt lahum ʔarjd ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilaː kjwtw kaːnt ljlaː mtħmmsa bʃʔan ðlk aːlħml ʔaknt fj aːlmdrsa fj ðlk aːlwqt bdʔat ljlaː tsthlk aːlmχddraːt w aːlkħwl bʔiʶfrˤaʶːtˤ qul maː ʔaasʔaalukum ʕalajhi min ʔaad͡ʒrin ʔiillaː man ʃaːʔa ʔaan jattaχiða ʔiilaː rabbihi sabjlanaː aːlfʔiraːn ħjwaːnaːt χd͡ʒwla tsbbb mrˤdˤ saːmj aːlnnfsj fj ʔijqaːf mʃwaːrh fj ʕrˤdˤ aːlʔazjaːʔ trk saːmj nðˤðˤaʶːrˤaʶːth fj ʁrfa aːlfndq laː tns mʕaːjna aːlddwaːljb faʶaʶːqsˤuʶrˤhuʶ ʕalaaː aːld͡ʒamijli waʶaʶːqtaʶsˤiʶrˤ minhu ʕalaaː aːlqalijli aːlʕaaːmilu naʶʃiʶjtˤuʶn waʔiin ʕaaːlad͡ʒahu sarat aːldraːhm mraːhm faman ʔaaʕqalu aːlnnaaːsi qaaːla man lam jatad͡ʒaaːwaz aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶmtaʶ fij ʕuquwbaai aːld͡ʒuhhaaːli aːlmʕrfa qwa ʕrˤdˤ saːmj aːlmnzl fj aːlsswq saːmj mʕd͡ʒb bkm χjr aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ mn trk aːlmzaːħ faʔiinnahum ʕaduwwun lj ʔiillaː rabba aːlʕaːlamjna rbmaː stmtˤrˤuʶ bʕda qljl lm laː nfʕl ðlk rd͡ʒaːl w nsaːʔ qaːtlwaː lldfaːʕ ʕn wtˤnhm faqad kaððabwaː fasajaʔatjhim ʔaanbaːʔu maː kaːnwaː bihi jastahziʔiwna ʔataː saːmj w ʔaqllnj lqd kaːn rd͡ʒlaː mhððbaː waʔaanna saʕjahu sawfa juraː kaːnt zwd͡ʒa saːmj ljlaː mmrˤrˤdˤaʶ walahaaː bihaaː ʕan aːlmaħaaːsini aːlmamnuwħaai tuʶdˤħiʶj aːlmadijnaau muzdaħimaaan aːrjnj aːjaːh ʔanti mn tsbbb fj mwt twm ʔaraːd saːmj ʔan tʕtˤjh ljlaː aːlmzjd mn aːlmaːl aːllaðjna hum fj ʁamraain saːhwna lqd ʔaklnaː hnaːk θlaːθ mraːt waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami laaː tunkiħ χaʶaʶːtˤiʶbaʶ sirrik hðh aːltfaːħa tˤʕmhaʶː ħaʶːmdˤ hw swf ln jχlf wʕdh ʔabdaː lm laː tqwl lh ðlk ʔaawaʔaːbaːʔuunaaː aːlʔaawwalwna waqad kaaːna aːlnnabiju sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama jaquwlu fij duʕaaːʔiihi ʔalfjt kll tmjma laː tnfʕ twm laː jtħdθ aːlfrnsja btˤlˤaʶːqaʶ ktˤlˤaʶːqaʶ maːrj ʔinnhmaː mχaːdʕaːn aːudlulnij ʕalaaː maaː ʔauʕaaːlid͡ʒuhu waʶsˤaʶdaʶqaʶ ʔaabuw ʕuθmaaːna wakataba kisraaː ʔilaaː aːbnihi hurmuza faaːllliʔiaaːmu ʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶrˤuʶ ʔaad͡ʒsaaːmanaː waqulnaaː jaaː ʔaːdamu aːskun ʔaanta wazawd͡ʒuka aːld͡ʒannaaa wakulaaː minhaaː raʁadanaː ħajθu ʃiʔitumaaː θumma ħuduwθuhu min rahbaain jaχaaːfuhaaː qaːla jaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːlmalaʔau ʔaajjukum jaʔatjnj biʕarʃihaː qabla ʔaan jaʔatwnj muslimjna wajabʕaθuhu aːllluʔumu ʕalaaː aːlbaðaaːʔi bisafahihi faʔiin ʁafala ʕan baʃaranaː min tˤjniʶn ðalika maaːlij ʔaad͡ʒwadu bihi wahaðaaː ʕaqlij baχilt bihi faʔiinna aːlħaqqa ʔaaθqalu maħmalanaː aːqtrb faʶːdˤlˤ mn daːnja w ħjjaːhaː ʔaʶʕtˤ aːlqws baːrjhaː lm tsˤddqnj lm tχlʕ smʕ saːmj ʃχsˤaʶː jsjr χlfh liʔiibraaːhijma bni hilaaːlin aːlkaaːtibi bʕd mrwr bdˤʕaʶ ʔaʃhr ʔaʶsˤbħ saːmj jtħkkm fj kll mðˤhrˤ mn mðˤaʶːhrˤ ħjaːa ljlaː nʕm kaːn ðlk mðhlaːan laː juʶsˤdq qul laː tusʔaalwna ʕammaː ʔaad͡ʒramnaː walaː nusʔaalu ʕammaː taʕmalwna waːd͡ʒb aːld͡ʒmjʕ ljs waːd͡ʒb ʔaħd laaː biʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶsˤlˤiʶ waaːlħasabi ħsˤlˤ ʕlaː aːlkra kl sr d͡ʒaːwz aːlaːθnjn ʃaːʕ jaħriθu ʕn ðlk ʔiðaː frʁ aːlfʔuaːd ðhb aːlrqaːd tlqaː aːlkθjr mn aːlmdjħ ʔaaħjaːʔan waʔaamwaːtanaː ʔaan jakuwna laʔiijma aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶbʕiʶ χabijθa aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶsˤlˤiʶ qad ʔaaʁraaːhu luʔumu aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶbʕiʶ ʕalaaː aːlbarijjaai waʔaanfaʕu maaː kasabahu waaːqtanaaːhu aːlkaaːsibu bʕd ʔan sˤfʕt ljlaː ʃʕrt baːlððnb raħmaaan min rabbika ʔiinnahu huwa aːlssamjʕu aːlʕaljmu naħnu naraaː qabuwla aːlssiʕaaːjaai ʃarranaː minhaaː kamaaː qijla lilʔiiskandari faʶʔaʶaʶʕrˤiʶdˤ ʕanhum waʶaʶːntaʶðˤiʶrˤ ʔiinnahum muʶntaʶðˤiʶrˤwnaʶ waaːlʔaaħmaqa bimaaː fijhi min aːlrraðaaːʔiili nafʕun ʕalaaː faaːʕilihaaː fij aːktisaaːbi baʃjranaː wanaðjranaː waʔiin min ʔaummaain ʔiillaː χalaː fjhaː naðjrun juʶbaʶsˤsˤaʶrˤwnaʶhuʶm jawaddu aːlmud͡ʒrimu law jaftadj min ʕaðaːbi jawmiʔiiðin bibanjhi waʶʔaʶaʶsˤlˤuʶ kulli ðammin lisuwʔi ʕawaaːqibihi faʶsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ waʃjak aːlssalwaai qalijla aːld͡ʒazaʕi ħasana aːlʕazaaːʔi faʕaltu ʔilajk wafaʕaltu lilkibri mud͡ʒaaːnibanaː waqijla lahu waʶaʶːʕrˤiʶdˤ ʕan aːlddunjaaː taʁnam jaaː ʁulaaːmu maʶwsˤuʶwfaʶnaʶː biaːlkarami maʶlˤħuʶwðˤaʶnaʶː biaːlwafaaːʔi ʔiiðan tuqijma ʕndanaaː waħakaaː aːlħasanu bnu rad͡ʒaaːʔin miθla ðalika ʕan aːlmaʔamuwni qaaːla ʕlm laː jnfʕ kknz laː junfaqu mnh waħukija faqaaːla lahu ʔaaħsin qalijlanaː waʔaanjbwaː ʔiilaː rabbikum waʔaaslimwaː lahu min qabli ʔaan jaʔatijakumu aːlʕaðaːbu θumma laː tuʶnsˤaʶrˤwnaʶ kamaaː ħukija ʔaanna rad͡ʒulanaː qaaːla fj ħjaːtj saːmj jnaːm fj aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶːbq aːlʕlwj waaːlmalaku ʕalaː ʔaard͡ʒaːʔiihaː wajaħmilu ʕarʃa rabbika fawqahum jawmaʔiiðin θamaːnijaaun ʔaʶuʶfdˤlˤ aːlʕml wħdj waʔiinnamaaː kaaːna kaðalika laaː taʃrab waʔaanta taʕibun mnʕnj aːlmdrrs mn aːlχrwd͡ʒ aːntqlwaː llʕjʃ hnaː ʕalaː sururin maʶwdˤwnaʶaʶiʶn jʕzf mwsjqaː ʔaʶsˤbħ saːmj ʔaʃhr mdrrs fj θaːnwjjtnaː sˤlˤaʶːħ ʔamrk baːlʔaχlaːq mrd͡ʒʕh faqawiim aːlnfs baːlʔaχlaːq tstqm tʔakl hðh aːlħjwaːnaːt aːlʕʃb aːlʃkwaː lʁjr aːllh mðla hðh ʕjaːda w ljst qaːʕa rˤjaʶːdˤjjaʶ man d͡ʒalla fij aːlddunjaaː qadruhu aːuʃkuruwaː lij ʔaajjuhaaː aːlθθaqalaaːni faʔiinna man ʃakara maʕruwfa man ʔaaħsana ʔilajhi ʕaaːʃir ʔaahlak biʔaaħsani ʔaaχlaaːqik faʔiinna aːlθθawaaːʔa fijhim qalijlun ʔaʶsˤbħ saːmj mtwaːd͡ʒdaː bʃkl daːʔim fj mnzl ljlaː tamkijnu aːlnnafsi min laððaaːtihaaː ʔaawlaaː lnðhb ʔilaː aʶːlˤtˤaʶːbq aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤj famaʕnaaː qawlihi aʶːttsˤlˤ saːmj baːlʕjaːda wamaː ʔaahlaknaː min qarjaain ʔiillaː lahaː munðirwna maaː maʶdˤaʶaʶː min aːlddunjaaː kamaaː lam jakun waaːd͡ʒʕal zamaaːna raχaaːʔiik ʕuddaaan lizamaaːni balaaːʔiik ʔiinnaː ʔaʶaʶχlˤaʶsˤnaʶːhuʶm biʶχaʶːlˤiʶsˤaʶaʶiʶn ðikraaː aːlddaːri wad͡ʒaʕalnaː minhum ʔaaʔiimmaaan jahdwna biʔaamrinaː lammaː sˤaʶbaʶrˤwaʶː wakaːnwaː biʔaːjaːtinaː jwqinwna fajuðallilu nafsahu ʔaanafaaan ʔaammaaː aːlʔaahlu falimumaaːssaai aːlrraħimi waʶtaʶʕaʶaʶːtˤuʶfiʶ aːlnnasabi waʔiinnamaaː ħaʶðˤðˤuʶ aːlʔaaχijri ʔaan jataʕaaːnaaː ħiʶfðˤaʶ aːlʃʃaaːridi wad͡ʒamʕa aːlmuftariqi wahuwa fij aːlmaʕnaaː sˤaʶħiʶjħuʶn lajjina aːld͡ʒaaːnibi sʔaʃtrj aːlsjaːra bʃrˤtˤ ʔan jsˤlˤħwaʶː aːlmkaːbħ ʔawlaːan ðhb saːmj llnnwm wanaraːhu qarjbanaː qaːla rabbi bimaː ʔaanʕamta ʕalajja falan ʔaakwna ðˤaʶhjrˤaʶnaʶː lilmud͡ʒrimjna juqaaːlu ʔaanna ʔaabaaː bakrin aʶːlˤsˤsˤiʶdiʶjqaʶ rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu kaaːna jatamaθθalu bihaðaaː aːlʃʃaʕri waʔiiðaaː qijla lahum ʔaːminuwaː kamaaː ʔaːmana aːlnnaaːsu jawma tamwru aːlssamaːʔu mawranaː wakaθraaa muraaːʕaaːtihaaː waʶsˤaʶrˤfaʶ aːlhimmaai ʔilaaː aːlʕinaaːjaai lahaaː ʃajʔianaː ʕaaːdaaːhu juʶtˤaʶːfuʶ ʕalajhim bikaʔasin min maʕjnin waman ʔauʕd͡ʒiba bikalaaːmihi aːstarsala fijhi waaːlmustarsilu fij aːlkalaaːmi kaθijru aːlzzalali daaːʔiimu aːlʕiθaaːri kaːn sˤwt saːmj juʶtˤrˤiʶbuʶ ʔiinna hðaː maː kuntum bihi tamtarwna ln nsˤlˤ ʔilaː ʔaj mkaːn faʔiinna maʶqtˤuʶwʕaʶ aːlbirri dˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶʕuʶn wamuhmalu aːlʔiiħsaaːni dˤaʶaʶːlˤlˤuʶn waʶsˤaʶddaʶqaʶhaʶaʶː faʔaad͡ʒaaːbathu tʕaʶːtˤj saːmj llmχddraːt jmkn ʔan jd͡ʒlb aːntbaːh aʶːlˤʃʃrˤtˤaʶ ʔaan jaqnaʕa biaːlbulʁaai min dunjaaːhu aʶːntðˤrˤ saːmj stta ʔaʃhr ʔaχraː lmħ saːmj mnzlaː waʔiin kaaːna ħaqijranaː liqillaai ʔaanafatihi wamaː ʔaadraːka maː hijah qul faʔatwaː bikitaːbin min ʕindi aːlllahi huwa ʔaahdaː minhumaː ʔaattabiʕhu ʔiin kuntum sˤaʶːdiʶqjnaʶ waaːlʃʃukru ʕalaaː aːlnnuʕmaaː ʔanaː ʔaʕjʃ ʕjʃa ʃrjfa lm
