warabbi aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ rabbi aːlʕaːlamjna aːlklaːb tnbħ waːlqaːfla tsjr qaːla laʔiini aːttaχaðta ʔiilhanaː ʁajrj laʔaad͡ʒʕalannaka mina aːlmasd͡ʒwnjna qijla lˤiʶbaʶʕdˤiʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man jaʕrifu kulla aːlʕuluwmi faqaaːla kullu aːlnnaaːsi kaːn saːmj sˤdjqaʶː lˤʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ ljlaː waħukija ʔaanna qawmanaː maʃawaː χalfa ʕalijji bni ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶn rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu faqaaːla hl mn d͡ʒdjd waʕillaau haðaaː aːlqawli ðˤaʶaʶːhiʶrˤaʶaʶuʶn fijhi sittaau taʔawijlaaːtin waminhaaː maaː laħiqahu min ʃaqaaːʔi d͡ʒamʕihi wanaaːlahu min ʃʕr saːmj ʔann ħjaːa ljlaː kaːnt fj χtˤrˤ tbdw aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ mblwla juʔufaku ʕanhu man ʔaufika waman tafahhama aːzdaaːda aʶːnðˤrˤ ʔilaː aʶːlˤsˤwrˤaʶ ʔaaw jaððakaru fatanfaʕahu aːlððikraː lm jħddθ saːmj tˤbjbaʶː qtˤtˤ ħwl hðaː aːlʔamr ljs hðaː maː ʔardt ʔiχbaːrk ʕnh aːllaðjna kafarwaː lahum ʕaðaːbun ʃadjdun waaːllaðjna ʔaːmanwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶːlˤiʶħaʶːtiʶ lahum maʁfiraaun waʔaad͡ʒrun kabjrun laː tasmaʕu fjhaː laːʁijaaan maːðaː ʕn aːljwm bʔimkaːnk aːlqdwm mʕj twqqf saːmj mn tqdjm aːlʕlaːd͡ʒ lljlaː mħaːwla mnh kj jqtlhaː aːlmslmwn jʕbdwn aːllh walaaː ʔilaaː maaː jantahij ʔilajhi aːlʕud͡ʒbu min aːld͡ʒahli ʁaaːjaaun ʔant tʕrf ʔannj ln ʔaʕwd ʔaljs kðlk ʔaalam nad͡ʒʕal lahu ʕajnajni aːʕtqd saːmj ʔann ħbb ljlaː lh kaːn dwn qjd ʔaw ʃrˤtˤ aːlʔaʕwr fj wstˤ aːlʕmjaːn mlk farijdun jad͡ʒrij fij aːlʃʃaaːriʕi waʶʔaʶaʶʕtˤaʶː qaljlanaː waʔaakdaː ʔaʃʕa aːlʃms hj aʶːlˤmsˤdrˤ aːlrʔijsj lfjtaːmjn d ʔinna ʔaaħaqqa maaː taʶsˤbiʶrˤuʶ ʕalajhi maaː lam tad͡ʒid ʔilaaː dafʕihi sabijlanaː wamin d͡ʒasadik ʔaan jaχiffa wafij miθli haðaaː aːlχabari qawlu aːlʃʃaaːʕiri wataqallubaka fij aːlssaːd͡ʒidjna rʔajthm jbkwn raħima aːlllahu aːmraʔaan ʔaʶaʶsˤlˤaʶħaʶ min lisaaːnihi ʔarsl saːmj rsaːla ʃdjda aːlllhd͡ʒa lˤlˤmsˤrˤf aːlʃʃara biaːlʃʃari juʶtˤfaʶʔaʶuʶ walaaː jaʕraaː min aʶːlˤnnaʶqsˤiʶ ʔillaaː baʕda ʔaan jastawfijahaaː wahija ʔaarbaʕaaun waaːlqalba raaːʔiidu aːlħaqqi waaːlħaqqa min dawaaːʕij aːlʕaqli fahaðihi ʔaarbaʕaau ʃuʶrˤuʶwtˤiʶn mataaː ʔaaχalla aːlmutakallimu biʶʃaʶrˤtˤiʶn minhaaː faqad ʔaawhana faʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶaʶ baaːqijhaaː lst mtʔakdaː kjf ħdθ ðlk wamaː taʃaːʔwna ʔiillaː ʔaan jaʃaːʔa aːlllahu ʔiinna aːlllaha kaːna ʕaljmanaː tbdw ljlaː qbjħa jd͡ʒb ʔan tħaːwl ʔan tkwn ʔakθr ʔadbaːan wʃrwh bθmn bχs draːhm mʕdwda wkaːnwaː fjh mn aːlzaːhdjn faʕaqaruwhaaː faʶʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħuʶwaʶː naaːdimijna wʔin jkaːd aːlðjn kfrwaː ljzlqwnk bʔaʶbsˤaʶːrˤhm lmaː smʕwaː aːlðkr wjqwlwn ʔinh lmd͡ʒnwn wabussati aːld͡ʒibaaːlu bassanaː swf tθq bk ʁdaːan sjhbtˤ ʕlaː stˤħ aːlqmr ʕlaː qma wjlswn bkaːljfwrnjaː bali aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʕalaaː nafsihi baʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶaʶuʶn kntu lʔaħb ktaːba mʔiaːt aːld͡ʒml fj ttwjbaː lkn ʕndj ʔaʃjaːʔ ʕljj ʕmlhaː hl hj tħbnj qaːl aːðhb fmn tbʕk mnhm fʔin d͡ʒhnm d͡ʒzaːʔukm d͡ʒzaːʔ mwfwraː ʔanti laː jmknki tħdθ baʶːlˤtˤbʕ tsttˤjʕ aːn tfʕl maː tʃaːʔ ʔarjd baːlfʕl ʔan ʔakwn bd͡ʒwaːrk fj hðh aʶːlˤlˤħðˤaʶːt aʶːlˤʕsˤjbaʶ jraː bʔawl rʔajh ʔaːχr aːlʔamwr ðalika aʶːlˤfaʶdˤlˤuʶ mina aːlllahi wakafaaː biaːlllahi waqaaːla aːllaðij ʔaːmana jaaː qawmi aːttabiʕuwni ʔaahdikum sabijla aːlrraʃaaːdi χð jdj qaaːla mawʕidukum jawmu aːlzzijnaai waʔaan juħʃara aːlnnaaːsu dˤuʶħaʶnaʶː ʔiinna aːllaðijna kafaruwaː sawaaːʔun ʕalajhim ʔaaʔaanðartahum ʔaam lam tunðirhum laaː juʔuminuwna hl ttklm aːlʔind͡ʒljzja aːlwd͡ʒwh mraːjaː aːlnfws tdˤjʔ bdˤjaʶːʔiʶhaʶː wtðˤlˤm bðˤlˤaʶːmhaʶː ʔiilaːaːa ʕalaaː ʔaazwaaːd͡ʒihim ʔaaw maaː tʕlm maːhw lwn twm aʶːlˤmfdˤlˤ ʔinhu jʔumn baːlħjaːa aːlʔaːχra drdʃwaː tˤwjlˤaʶnaʶː ʕn aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤj tʕaːl bʕd ʁd waʔiismaaːʕijla waʔiidrijsa waðaaː aːlkifli kullun mina aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːbiʶrˤiʶjnaʶ ql wjwm nsjr aːld͡ʒbaːl wtraː aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ baːrza wħʃrnaːhm flm nʁaːdr mnhm ʔaħdaː rsmat sˤwrˤaʶ d͡ʒmjla lwaːldthaː kaːna qmjsˤhuʶ rmaːdjaːan wrˤbtˤaʶuʶ ʕunqhi sˤfrˤaʶːʔaʶ waman d͡ʒaaːʔa biaːlssajiʔiaai fakubbat wud͡ʒuwhuhum fij aːlnnaaːri hal tud͡ʒzawna ʔiillaaː maaː kuntum taʕmaluwna slbj ʔiinnahum ʔiin jaʶðˤhaʶrˤuʶwaʶː ʕalajkum jard͡ʒumuwkum ʔaaw juʕijduwkum fij millatihim walan tufliħuwaː ʔiiðanaː ʔaabadanaː ʔiinna naaːʃiʔiaaa aːlllajli hija ʔaaʃaddu waʶtˤʔaʶnaʶː waʔaaqwamu qijlaː ʔinh jʃrb aːlmaːʔ jmknk ʔan tʕtmd ʕljh ln jχðlk ʔabdanaː wʔalqt maː fjhaː wtχlt faqulnaaː jaaː ʔaːdamu ʔiinna haðaaː ʕaduwwun laka walizawd͡ʒika falaaː juχrid͡ʒannakumaaː mina aːld͡ʒannaai fataʃqaaː hðaː hw aːlsbb ʔan ʔauʃaːrk hðh aːlʔaχbaːr laː tqlq bʃʔan maː fʕlth ʔiinnahum ʕani aːlssamʕi lamaʕzuwluwna haː hw ktaːbk aːlðj d͡ʒmʕ maːlaː wʕddh fakajfa jakuwnu ʕilmu ħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤiʶ aːlmaðhabi mastuwranaː wahuwa sarijʕun ʕalajhi aːld͡ʒawaaːbu ħtaː ʔiðaː blʁ bjn aːlsdjn wd͡ʒd mn dwnhmaː qwmaː ʔatðkr maː ħsˤlˤ rbmaː jkwn aʶːlˤqtˤ mχtbʔiaː tħt aːlsrjr tarmijhim biħid͡ʒaaːraain min sid͡ʒd͡ʒijlin hn jstħqnhaː faaːrtaqib ʔiinnahum murtaqibuwna faaːχtalafa aːlʔaaħzaaːbu min bajnihim fawajlun lillaðijna kafaruwaː min maʃhadi jawmin ʕaʶðˤiʶjmiʶn waːmrʔath ħmaːla aʶːlˤħtˤb jd͡ʒb ʕljk ʔan tnhj hðaː aːlʕml qbl aʶːlˤðˤhrˤ ʔaaw lˤiʶfaʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶiʶn maʶwdˤiʶʕaʶnaʶː walaaː jarawna ðalika naʶqsˤaʶnaʶː ʔiðaaː nammaquwaː fij aːlmad͡ʒaaːlisi kalaaːmanaː maʶwsˤuʶwfaʶnaʶː ʔinhaː ʕlj aʶːlˤtˤaʶːwlˤaʶ hl ʔant jaːbaːnj ʔaʶsˤbħwaʶː mn mwaʶːtˤnj aːljaːbaːn bjrw hj θaːlθ dwl ʔamrjkaː aːld͡ʒnwbja msaːħaan bʕd aːlbraːzjl waːlʔard͡ʒntjn jsˤnf aʶːlˤnsˤ aːlmktwb baːllʁa aːlʕrbja aːlaː θlaːθ tsˤnjfaʶːt aʶːnsˤt w ʃaːhd waːbqaː haːdʔi waaːllaðijna jabijtuwna lirabbihim sud͡ʒd͡ʒadanaː waqijaaːmanaː bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi waʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːfaʶaʶːtiʶ sˤaʶffaʶnaʶː lmaːðaː trjd ʃraːʔ hðaː aːlktaːb wqd χlqkm ʔaʶtˤwaʶːrˤaʶː ttwjbaː ʔasmʕt bħrwb aːld͡ʒumal saːbqanaː ʔad͡ʒl hðh mtʕtnaː ʔinnj mʃʁwla d͡ʒdaːan laː ʔaʕrf ʔin knaː nħtaːd͡ʒ ðlk twm lm jlms ʔaj ʃjʔ fħmlth faːntbðt bh mkaːnaː qsˤjaʶː ðalika aːlkitaaːbu laaː rajba fijhi hudanaː lilmuttaqijna daʕ twm jðhb maːðaː jrjd ʔan jfʕl wʔasrrt lhm ʔisraːraː wtsˤlˤjaʶ d͡ʒħjm wajamnaʕaaːni min aːlttaχaaːðuli waaːlfurqaai walaaː tuχzinij jawma jubʕaθuwna qaaːluwaː ʔiin haðaaːni lasaaːħiraaːni jurijdaaːni ʔaan juχrid͡ʒaaːkum min taʕaaːlaaː hl tsttˤjʕ ʔan tʕudd baʶːlˤʔiʶjtˤaʶːlˤjaʶ sˤnʕ lj ʔabj rffanaː aʶːlˤqaʶːdˤj aːlbχjl jawma laaː janfaʕu maaːlun walaaː banuwna salaaːmun ʕalajkum bimaaː sˤaʶbaʶrˤtuʶm faniʕma ʕuqbaaː twm maːrj bʔanhaː saːrqa ʔaħb sˤwt aːlʁjθ ʔaθnaːʔ htˤwlˤh aːlsqf waqaaːlat liʔauχtihi quʶsˤsˤiʶjhiʶ faʶbaʶsˤuʶrˤaʶt bihi ʕan d͡ʒunubin wahum laaː jaʃʕuruwna falawlaaː ʔiið d͡ʒaaːʔahum baʔasunaaː sahlun d͡ʒidaːan lj ʕlaː aːlraːdjw qaːlwaː ʔin aʶːlˤtˤqsaʶ sjkwnu baːrdaːan fðaːqt wbaːl ʔamrhaː wkaːn ʕaːqba ʔamrhaː χsraː ʔaam ʕindahum χazaaːʔiinu rabbika ʔaam humu aʶːlˤmuʶsˤaʶjtˤiʶrˤuʶwnaʶ maː χlqkm wlaː bʕθkm ʔilaː knfs waːħda ʔin aːllh smjʕ bsˤjrˤ faʕʕaaːlun limaaː jurijdu fʕlt ðlk mn ʔad͡ʒlhaː twm jʕlm tmaːmaː ʔanh laː jnbʁj ʕljh ʔan jfʕl hðaː hw sˤbwrˤ maːðaː trjdjn ʔanaː ʔarjd ħjwaːn waqaaːla θaʕlabun ʔawd aːltħdθ ʔilaː rʔijsa aʶːlˤmmrˤdˤaʶːt ʔin jwm aʶːlˤfsˤlˤ mjqaːthm ʔad͡ʒmʕjn falammaaː ʔaaslamaaː watallahu lild͡ʒabijni hl maːzlti trjdjn ʃaːjaːan laː tkn ʕaʶːtˤfaʶː ʔin aːllh mʕ aːlðjn aːtqwaː waːlðjn hm mħsnwn fd͡ʒʕlnaːh fj qraːr mkjn sˤfʕt wd͡ʒhh wd͡ʒʕlnaː sraːd͡ʒaː whaːd͡ʒaː aːlðj χlq fswaː ʔanaː ʔaːkl aːlχbz fltkn kðlk ħaːwl ʔan jktb ʔaʶqsˤwsˤaʶ hm jstħqwnh jd͡ʒb aːstχdaːm hðaː aːltlskwb bʕnaːja jbdw lj ʔanka ʔamjn wqaːl nwħ rb laː tðr ʕlaː aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ mn aːlkaːfrjn djaːraː hl trjdnj ħqaːan ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilaː hnaːk aːlʔan θumma lammaaː kaaːna aːlʕaqlu daaːlanaː ʕalaaː ʔaasbaaːbi maaː tadʕuw ʔilajhi aːlħaaːd͡ʒaau jd͡ʒb ʕljk aʶːlˤaʶːndˤmaʶːm lj hðaː aʶːlˤsˤndwq ljs kbjraː kðaːk kaːn mnnaːd mnfʕlaː ʕaʶːtˤfjjaʶː ʔatħdθ lʁa ʔijdw dʕjnaː laː ntħdθ aːlħub qwj wlkn aːlmaːl ʔaqwaː ʔinhaː tmtˤrˤ hnaːk qaːl ʔaʶnðˤrˤnj ʔilaː jwm jbʕθwn aːχtfaː mnnaːd mn aːlqaːhra wasalima aːlʕaaːlimu min aːld͡ʒihatajni tlk aːldraːd͡ʒa draːd͡ʒtj χrd͡ʒt aːlʕaːʔila kllhaː lttmʃʃaː walaqad naʕlamu ʔaannaka jaʶdˤiʶjquʶ sˤaʶdrˤuʶkaʶ bimaaː jaquwluwna maːrj ʔanti ftaːa mskjna ʔajn knti maːðaː ħdθ lki bdʔat ʔaʃrb mbkkraː ʔinʃaːʔ mwqʕ ʔilktrwnj bdwn ʔaj tklfa wlqd rʔaːh nzla ʔaχraː wamina aʶːlˤʃʃaʶjaʶaʶːtˤiʶjniʶ man jaʶʁuʶwsˤuʶwnaʶ lahu wajaʕmaluwna ʕamalanaː duwna ðalika wakunnaaː lahum ħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤiʶjnaʶ twm ʔaʶfdˤlˤ mnaː faʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ ʕalaaː maaː jaquwluwna wasabbiħ biħamdi rabbika qabla tˤuʶlˤuʶwʕiʶ aːlʃʃamsi waqabla aːlʁuruwbi wamin ʃarri ħaaːsidin ʔiiðaaː ħasada twm hw mn bwstwn knt ʔaʃaːhd aʶːlˤsˤwrˤaʶ jd͡ʒb ʔan ndaːfʕ ʕn aːlqaːnwn hw jstmʕ daːʔimaː llʔaχbaːr baːlmðjaːʕ lstmaː aːlwħjdaːn aːlðaːn waːd͡ʒhaː hðaː aːlmʃkl ʕljkmaː ʔan tqblaːh w ʔan ttχtˤjaʶːnh sʔaʶsˤlˤjh sqr dʕwnaː ntqaːsm aʶːlˤmsˤaʶːrˤjf ʔanaː ʔaħbbu ʔan ʔadrsa aːllʁaːta aːlʔad͡ʒnbjaa ʔanaː qaːdmun aːljwm faqad qijla man wadakka liʃajʔin tawallaaː maʕa aʶːnqiʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶhiʶ muʶtˤaʶaʶːʕiʶn θamma ʔaamijnin θm twljtm mn bʕd ðlk flwlaː fdˤlˤ aːllh ʕljkm wrħmth lkntm mn aːlχaːsrjn flaː ʕmlt fj hðaː aʶːlˤmsˤnʕ maː aːlðj trjdhu haː jd͡ʒb ʕljka ʔan laː tħkm ʕlaːa ʃχsˤ mn mðˤhrˤhuʶ waːlsaːrq waːlsaːrqa faʶːqtˤʕwaʶː ʔajdjhmaː d͡ʒzaːʔ bmaː ksbaː nkaːlaː mn aːllh waːllh ʕzjz ħkjm maː tðr biaːlχunnasi lijawmi aʶːlˤfaʶsˤlˤiʶ maː zlt nʕsaːn sˤħjħ laː tsttˤjʕ aːkl aːldd͡ʒaːd͡ʒ kjf tʕrf aːðaː lm td͡ʒrb aːbdaːan wajka jaː man raaːma taqjjda aːlfalak ʔaaːuu nad͡ʒmin fj aːlsaamaː jaʶχdˤaʶʕuʶ lak ʔant nfsk laː tʕrf maː trjd ʔin aːlðjn ftnwaː aːlmʔumnjn waːlmʔumnaːt θm lm jtwbwaː flhm ʕðaːb d͡ʒhnm wlhm ʕðaːb aːlħrjq lqd ʔaʶsˤaʶːb qdmh aːljsraː ʕndmaː sqtˤ ʔanti ksrti aːlqwaːʕd ʔiʶfħsˤ kul waːħd wʔaqm aʶːlˤsˤlˤaʶːaʶ tˤrˤfj aːlnhaːr wzlfaː mn aːlljl ʔin aːlħsnaːt jðhbn aːlsjʔiaːt ðlk ðkraː llðaːkrjn laː ʔaqdr jawma jasmaʕuwna aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶjħaʶaʶaʶ biaːlħaqqi ðalika jawmu aːlχuruwd͡ʒi tʕaːla mud͡ʒddaːan jahdij ʔiilaaː aːlrruʃdi faʔaːmannaaː bihi walan nuʃrika birabbinaaː ʔaaħadanaː aːʕtqd bʔanh laː jmknnaː aʶːlˤrˤfdˤ wmaː hw ʕlaː aːlʁjb bdˤnjn fd͡ʒʕlnaː ʕaːljhaː saːflhaː wʔaʶmtˤrˤnaʶː ʕljhm ħd͡ʒaːra mn sd͡ʒjl lmaːðaː laː trdn ʔan tqln lnaː aːlħqjqa tktb ʔijmjlj rsaːlaan aːbtʕtu lhaː saːʕa sajaʕlamuwna ʁadanaː mmani aːlkaððaaːbu aːlʔaaʃiru bal jurijdu kullu aːmriʔiin minhum ʔaan juʔutaaː sˤuʶħuʶfaʶnaʶː munaʃʃaraaan jsqwn mn rħjq mχtwm jaː ʔajhaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː ʔin ttˤjʕwaʶː aːlðjn kfrwaː jrdwkm ʕlaː ʔaʕqaːbkm ftnqlbwaː χaːsrjn walad͡ʒaaːd͡ʒanaː fij aːlʔiikθaaːri minhu qaaːla liχadijd͡ʒaaa laqad χaʃijtu ʕalaaː nafsij hj tħb aʶːlˤtˤjwrˤ w aːlʔazhaːr hm jsˤdqwnhaʶː aːlbħr haːdʔi fawaaːkihu wahum mukramuwna sʔafʕl ʔajj ʃjʔ lʔad͡ʒlk jaː maːrj ʔalaː tðˤnn ʔann ʕljk ʔaχð qstˤiʶn mn aːlraːħa lqd χdʕnk hðh aːlsla mljʔia baːlfwaːkh fijhaaː ʕajnun d͡ʒaaːrijaaun ʔanaː ʔamrjkj ʔaʶtˤfʔiʶ twm aːlʔanwaːr bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi ʔiinnaaː fataħnaaː laka fatħanaː mubijnanaː hj lm tʕd͡ʒbnj qtˤtˤ man ʃaddada naffara flaː jud͡ʒnaaː bʁjri aʶːlˤʁwsˤiʶ drrunwlaː tlidu aːlwalwdu blaː mχaʶːdˤiʶ ʔin aːlðjn ħqt ʕljhm klmt rbk laː jʔumnwn ʔaχðnaːk ʕhdaː ħmlnaːk wʕdaː wnhdjk sʕdaː ld͡ʒjl ʔaʶtˤlˤ fʔant ʕnh tlhaː saːmj lm jʁlq ʔaj baːb fj aːlbjt kl maː rˤsˤdh aːlflkjwn mn χlaːl aːltlskwbaːt aʶːlˤmttˤwrˤaʶ jwmaː bʕd jwm hj thtm baːlmwsjqaː wmaː ʔanzlnaː ʕljk aːlktaːb ʔilaː ltbjn lhm aːlðj aːχtlfwaː fjh whdaː wrħma lqwm jʔumnwn aʶːlˤrˤjaʶːdˤjaʶːt maːda mθjra llaːhtmaːm waʔaaqbaħa aːnfiraaːdahumaaː jbdw ʔanh rd͡ʒl ʔamjn sjʔatj ʔin kaːn jrʁb ðlk flnkn sˤrˤħaʶːʔ smʕ aːħmd baʶːlˤtχfjdˤ ʔalm tr ʔilaː aːlðjn jd͡ʒaːdlwn fj ʔaːjaːt aːllh ʔanaː jsˤrˤfwn ʕaːʃ fj ʔisbaːnjaː bdˤʕ snwaːt ʃjʔiaːan fʃjʔiaːan tzdaːd mʕrftnaː baːllʁa aːlʔind͡ʒljzja hðaː aːlqaːrb tʕrf ʔan hnaːk trd͡ʒma llqrʔaːn baːlʕbrja lilʃʃaaːfiʕiji rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu faːlq aʶːlˤʔiʶsˤbaʶːħ wd͡ʒʕl aːlljl sknaː waːlʃms waːlqmr ħsbaːnaː ðlk tqdjr aːlʕzjz aːlʕljm sʔal aʶːlˤsˤaʶːʔiʶb ltuʕjjn mħaːmjanaː d͡ʒjjdanaː aːlmwz ʔaʶsˤfrˤ aːllaðijna jaχʃawna rabbahum biaːlʁajbi wahum mina aːlssaaːʕaai muʃfiquwna kaððabat qawmu lˤuʶwtˤiʶn aːlmursalijna wd͡ʒʕlnj mbaːrkaː ʔajn maː knt wʔaʶwsˤaʶːnj baʶːlˤsˤlˤaʶːaʶ waːlzkaːa maː dmt ħjaː walajsa liman bulija bihi ʔillaaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶbrˤuʶ waaːlʔiiqlaaːlu hnaːk ʔazmaːt tdknaː wʔaχraː tχrd͡ʒ mn aːlʔaʕmaːq ʔaʶfdˤlˤ maː fjnaː ʔaʃʕl ʕwd θqaːb kamaaː qaaːla aːlʔaawwalu wʔaːja lhm aːlljl nslχ mnh aːlnhaːr fʔiðaː hm mðˤlˤmwn waʔiinnij laʁaffaaːrun liman taaːba waʔaːmana waʕamila sˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶnaʶː θumma aːhtadaaː wʔaːtjnaːh fj aːldnjaː ħsna wʔinh fj aːlʔaːχra lmn aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħjn laaː tad͡ʒʔaaruwaː aːljawma ʔiinnakum minnaaː laaː tuʶnsˤaʶrˤuʶwnaʶ wlaː jħsbn aːlðjn kfrwaː sbqwaː ʔinhm laː jʕd͡ʒzwn waʔiinnaaː ʕalaaː ʔaan nurijaka maaː naʕiduhum laqaaːdiruwna ʔiðaː lm tkn mʕnaː fʔant dˤdnaʶː bʔan rbk ʔawħaː lhaː hl ʔant tʕlm ʔaʕrf kjf ʔalʕb kra aʶːlˤmdˤrˤb wasaχχara lakumu aːlʃʃamsa waaːlqamara daaːʔiibajni wasaχχara lakumu aːlllajla waaːlnnahaaːra qaaːla ʔaataʕbuduwna maaː tanħituwna ʔinaː ʔarslnaːk baːlħq bʃjraː wnðjraː wlaː tsʔal ʕn ʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːld͡ʒħjm ʔiið qaaːla rabbuka lilmalaaːʔiikaai ʔiinnij χaaːliqun baʃaranaː min tˤiʶjniʶn faːkhjn bmaː ʔaːtaːhm rbhm wwqaːhm rbhm ʕðaːb aːld͡ʒħjm ʔaχrd͡ʒ dftranaː waliʁajrik nuwruhu ʔajn aːlktb snbqaː ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ ħtaː aːlmwt ʔanti ksrti qlbj aʶːlˤmuʶtaʶwaʶaʶːdˤiʶʕuʶ min tˤuʶlˤlˤaʶaʶːbiʶ aːlʕilmi ʔaakθaruhum ʕilmanaː liʔaanna aːlʔiiʕd͡ʒaaːba bihi juʶfdˤiʶj ʔilaaː ħaaːlatajni maðmuwmatajni warad͡ʒulun jadrij walaaː jadrij ʔaannahu jadrij faðalika naaːsin faðakkiruwhu lam jad͡ʒib ʕalajhi aːlnnakijru ʔiðaaː χaʃija tnaːwltu lltw wd͡ʒba aʶːlˤftˤwrˤ ʔanta kjf ʕrfta ðlk twmaːs jʃaːhd fjlmaːan ʔaʕjʃ fj tˤrˤaʶːblˤs ljbjaː ðlk bʔan aːllh hw aːlħq wʔanh jħjj aːlmwtaː wʔanh ʕlaː kl ʃjʔ qdjr hðaː hw aːlktaːb aːlðj tbħθwn ʕnh waqul rabbi aːʁfir waaːrħam waʔaanta χajru aːlrraaːħimijna qrrt ʔan ʔaʕml lħsaːb ʃrka fj ʔamrjkaː tbdw w kʔank rʔajt ʃbħaː ʔanaː ʔaʕml hnaː lst zaːʔiraː lwsmħt laːtnsaː ʔan twqðˤnj ʁdaː fj aːlsaːʕa aːlsaːbʕa lm jtwqqʕ twm ʔajja msaːʕda mn maːrj ql hl nnbʔikm baːlʔaχsrjn ʔaʕmaːlaː ʔajn jʕjʃ χaːlk mn tðˤn nfsk daʕwaaːhum fijhaaː subħaaːnaka aːlllahuma wataħijjatuhum fijhaaː salaaːmun waʔaːχiru daʕwaaːhum ʔaani aːlħamdu lillahi rabbi aːlʕaaːlamijna ʔiðhbj ʔilaːa ʁrqtik wʔanhm ðˤnwaʶː kmaː ðˤnntm ʔan ln jbʕθ aːllh ʔaħdaː ʕn ʕumra rˤaʶdˤiʶj aːllhu ʕanhu qaːla jbdw saːmj lˤtˤjfaʶː man juʶsˤrˤaʶf ʕanhu jawmaʔiiðin faqad raħimahu waðalika aːlfawzu aːlmubijnu walawlaaː faʶdˤlˤuʶ aːlllahi ʕalajkum waraħmatuhu waʔaanna aːlllaha raʔuwfun raħijmun waʔiinnamaaː aːlssaʕaaːdaau ʔaan laaː jakuwna lahu sˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶfuʶn ʕan aːlʕilmi qaːrn bjn ʔasaːljb tlk aːlrsaːʔil tnmw hðh aːlʃd͡ʒra baːlqrb mn bjthaː ʔasrʕ wʔaʕlaː wʔaqwaː ʔaʶnðˤrˤ maːðaː ʔaʶħdˤrˤt lj fj ʕjd mjlaːdj kwbj kaːml hl ʔanta tsʕl dmaːʔ hðaː ljs d͡ʒjdaːan rˤkdˤ aːlklb ʕqb aʶːlˤqtˤ hjaː dʕnaː nðhb ʔilaː aːlbjt nħn ðaːhbtaːn ʔilaː aʶːlˤmtˤbχ lm nħb bʕdˤnaʶː aʶːlˤbʕdˤ dʕwnaː nstʕd llðhaːb lw kntu mkaːnk kntu sʔafʕl nfs aːlʃʔi km aːlmda wʔanta tuʕlm aːlʔisbaːnja kallaaː ʔiinnaaː χalaqnaaːhum mimmaaː jaʕlamuwna kuwnuwaː lilʕilmi ruʕaaːaan wajaħduθu biʶχuʶlˤuʶwsˤiʶ aʶːlˤmuʶsˤaʶaʶːfaʶaʶːaʶiʶ wafaaːʔun wamuħaaːmaaːaun maː kntu dwnhmaː fj aːlʃʕri mqtdraːan waʔiin taʕudduwaː niʕmaaa aːlllahi laaː tuʶħsˤuʶwhaʶaʶː ʔiinna aːlllaha laʁafuwrun raħijmun ʔaami aːttaχaða mimmaaː jaχluqu banaaːtin waʶʔaʶaʶsˤfaʶaʶːkuʶm biaːlbanijna twm ʕaʶːtˤlˤ ʕn aːlʕml ħaːljaː ʔalaː tbʕd jdk ʕnj ʔarjd ʔan ʔatħdθ mʕk bmwdˤwʕ lkl nbʔi mstqr wswf tʕlmwn hudanaː waðikraaː liʔauwlij aːlʔaalbaaːbi aːklnaː bjdˤ ʔiinnamaaː jaʔamurukum biaːlssuwʔi waaːlfaħʃaaːʔi waʔaan taquwluwaː ʕalaaː aːlllahi maaː laaː taʕlamuwna wakullun biaːlʔaaθari jawmuhu ʔaaw ʁaduhu ʔauwlaʔiika ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːld͡ʒannaai χaaːlidijna fijhaaː d͡ʒazaaːʔan bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna twm jqwm bqrʔaːʔa ktaːb taːrjχ marfuwʕaain muʶtˤaʶhhaʶrˤaʶaʶiʶn ql ʔin ʔadrj ʔaqrjb maː twʕdwn ʔam jd͡ʒʕl lh rbj ʔamdaː waaːllaðijna hum biʃahaaːdaaːtihim qaaːʔiimuwna aʶːħtfðˤ bh fj mkaːn baːrd aːalʕad͡ʒalaa mina aʶːlˤʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːn ʔam lkm slˤtˤaʶːn mbjn aːstmrwaː fj aːlħdjθ lsaːʕaːt lma ʔabqjth srananaː waʕalaaː taʶnaʶqquʶsˤiʶhiʶ ʔaaħraaː fʔalqaː ʕsˤaʶːh fʔiðaː hj θʕbaːn mbjn srq mnj kl maːlj ʔaajjumaaː ʔaaħabbu ʔilajk rad͡ʒulun qalijlu aːlððunuwbi qalijlu aːlʕamali hw tˤflˤ aːlʕaːʔila qaːl nʕm wʔinkm lmn aːlmqrbjn maː kðb aːlfʔuaːd maː rʔaaː maː aːlχjaːraːt aːlʔaχraː aːltj ʔamaːmj faʶːtˤmaʶ jaaː rasuwla aːllaahi kajfa jaʔatijka aːlwaħju tħbnj kl ʕaːʔiltj kaːn d͡ʒbjnj jʁlj mn aːlħmaː ʔin hj ʔilaː mwttnaː aːlʔawlaː wmaː nħn bmnʃrjn hl sbq lk ʔan ðhbt ʔilaː aːlwlaːjaːt aːlmtħda laː ʔaʕrf ʃjʔianaː aːlbtta mustakbirijna bihi saaːmiranaː tahd͡ʒuruwna aːljwm hw aːlʔaħd wafirʕawna ðij aːlʔaawtaaːdi ʔaalam tara kajfa faʕala rabbuka biʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbiʶ aːlfijli waʔiilajk nasʕaaː kjf ʔaʕaːwdk w hðaː ʔaθr fʔask waminhunna mamnaʕun taʶdˤuʶrˤrˤuʶ walaaː tanfaʕu tbdw rd͡ʒlanaː sˤdwqaʶnaʶː jmknk aʶːjdˤaʶː aːlmsaːhma fj aːlmsaːbqa mn χlaːl tqjjm w aʶːdˤaʶːfaʶ d͡ʒml d͡ʒdjda ʕlaː aːlmwqʕ ʔiinnij ʔiiðanaː lafij dˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶn mubijnin hðh aʶːlˤtˤaʶːwlˤaʶ mħd͡ʒwza waman lam jarʁab fij aːlssalaaːmaai bulija biaːlʃʃadaaːʔiidi waaːliaːmtihaaːni qaːl wmaː ʕlmj bmaː kaːnwaː jʕmlwn rˤfdˤt ʕrˤdˤj lmsaːʕdthaː θumma ʕabasa wabasara aːħðr waʔaammaaː aːlrrahbaau famin ʕiqaaːbi aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː litaaːrikij ʔaawaaːmirihi wamuhmalij zawaaːd͡ʒirihi kaːn saːmj mʕrwfaː bslwkh aːlmtqllb w aːlʕdaːʔij kamn jbħθ ʕn ʔibra fj kwma qaʃʃ wajurijkum ʔaːjaaːtihi faʔaajja ʔaːjaaːti aːlllahi tunkiruwna falammaaː daχaluwaː ʕalaaː juwsufa ʔaːwaaː ʔiilajhi ʔaabawajhi waqaaːla aːdχuluwaː miʶsˤrˤaʶ ʔiin ʃaaːʔa aːlllahu ʔaːminijna waqaaːla aːlmaʔamuwnu sʔanaːm hnaː waħaraaːmun ʕalaaː qarjaain ʔaahlaknaaːhaaː ʔaannahum laaː jard͡ʒiʕuwna waliʕadli muluwkinaaː fijnaaː hw ʔinkljzj aːlʔaːn ʕrft ʔajn hj ðhb saːmj ʔilaː hnaːk aːχrd͡ʒ mn bjtj ʔalm ʔasmʕk ttklm mʕ ʔaħdhm ʔaʶaʶːsˤjb aːj aːħd ldj ʃqjqjn sʔabqaː baːlbjt ʁdaːan waʶjaʶðˤhaʶrˤaʶ minhu aːlʁinaaː waaːlqudraau wsˤlˤtnaʶː ʔiχbaːrja bʔan aːlʕdw qd nsˤb lnaː kmjnaːan ʕlaː bʕd mjljn mn hnaː wabaladin waaːħidin falaaː jad͡ʒuwzu ʔid͡ʒmaaːʕanaː mnnaːd jnðˤðˤf aːlmnzl wʔaqjmwaː aːlwzn baʶːlˤqstˤ wlaː tχsrwaː aːlmjzaːn huwa aːllaðij juħjij wajumijtu faʔiiðaaː qaʶdˤaʶaʶː ʔaamranaː faʔiinnamaaː jaquwlu lahu kun fajakuwnu nʕm sˤħjħ qaaːla law ʔaanna lij bikum quwwaaan ʔaaw ʔaːwij ʔiilaaː ruknin ʃadijdin wamaaː ʔaahlaknaaː min qarjaain ʔiillaaː walahaaː kitaaːbun maʕluwmun waʔaammaaː aːlllahbaraau faʶaʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶwiʶjlˤaʶaʶuʶ aːlmahzuwlaau tʕaːla wħdk ʔiið qaaːla liqawmihi ʔaalaaː tattaquwna ʔajħsbwn ʔanmaː nmdhm bh mn maːl wbnjn faʔiiðanaː juʶfdˤiʶj bihi aːlʔaamalu ʔilaaː aːlfawti min ʁajri darakin faʔiin tawallawaː faʔiinnamaaː ʕalajka aːlbalaaːʁu aːlmubijnu wakitaaːbin mmaʶstˤuʶwrˤiʶn kaðalika waʔaawraθnaaːhaaː qawmanaː ʔaːχarijna qlnaː laː tχf ʔink ʔant aːlʔaʕlaː nazzala ʕalajka aːlkitaaːba biaːlħaqqi muʶsˤaʶddiʶqaʶnaʶː limaaː bajna jadajhi waʔaanzala aːlttawraaːaa waaːlʔiind͡ʒijla aːljwm hw jwm mjlaːdk qaaːluwaː ʔiinnakum kuntum taʔatuwnanaaː ʕani aːljamijni lqd ʔalqjt nðˤrˤaʶ ʕlaː mdwntk tbdw mθjra llʔihtmaːm waaːsʔaal aːlllaha taʕaaːlaaː rizqa jawmin bijawmin ʔant ttklm aːlʔind͡ʒljzjh mn aʶːlˤʔaʶfdˤlˤ ʔan tðhb maː ħdθ lhm laː jzaːl lʁzaː maː jzaːl twm jðˤnnaʶː ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ qaaːla nuwħun rabbi ʔiinnahum ʕaʶsˤaʶwniʶj waaːttabaʕuwaː man lam jazidhu maaːluhu wawaladuhu ʔiillaaː χasaaːranaː ʔiiði aːlʔaaʁlaaːlu fij ʔaaʕnaaːqihim waaːlssalaaːsilu jusħabuwna flmaː ʔaslmaː wtlh lld͡ʒbjn wʔaqbl bʕdˤhm ʕlaː bʕdˤ jtsaːʔlwn ʔant lm tr qtˤ ʔalmaːsaː ħqjqjaː hðaː hw aːlwqt aːlðj jsˤlˤ fjh ʕaːda wʔin kaːn qmjsˤh qd mn dbr fkðbt whw mn aʶːlˤsˤaʶːdqjn ʔajmknnj aːlqwl bʔannk ftaːa d͡ʒmjla lqd fʕlt ðlk ʕn ʕmd aːlrd͡ʒaːʔ aːblaːʁj ʕn ʔaj tʁjjr fj ħaːlth fʕaːl lmaː jrjd fj mntˤqaʶ rwhr ʕaːda maː tsbb aʶːlˤsˤnaʶːʕaʶ aːlmnd͡ʒmja zlaːzlaː bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi tˤs tilka ʔaːjaaːtu aːlqurʔaːni wakitaaːbin mubijnin laː jzaːl klaː aːlʔaχwjn ʕlaː qjd aːlħjaːa wamarra bihi ʔaːχaru faʶʔaʶaʶʕtˤaʶaʶːhuʶ d͡ʒubbaaan waʶbuʶʁdˤiʶ man ʔaasaaːʔa ʔilajhaaː ln jsjʔ lkn ʔaħd waːðkr fj aːlktaːb mwsaː ʔinh kaːn mχlˤsˤaʶː wkaːn rswlaː nbjaː ʕaːdaan maː jtʁjr aʶːlˤtˤqs fj hðaː aːlwqt mn aːlsna qad ʔaaflaħa man tazakkaaːaː wahaðaaː kitaaːbun ʔaanzalnaaːhu mubaaːrakun faaːttabiʕuwhu waaːttaquwaː laʕallakum turħamuwna waaːllaðijna d͡ʒaaːhaduwaː fijnaaː lanahdijannahum subulanaaː waʔiinna aːlllaha lamaʕa aːlmuħsinijna jaaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː laaː taʔakuluwaː aːlrribaaː ʔaʶaʶdˤʕaʶaʶːfaʶnaʶː muʶdˤaʶaʶːʕaʶfaʶaʶaʶn waaːttaquwaː aːlllaha laʕallakum tufliħuwna aːlðjn dˤlˤ sʕjhm fj aːlħjaːa aːldnjaː whm jħsbwn ʔanhm jħsnwn sˤnʕaʶː hw ʔatrʕa aːlkʔasa wʔin ʔiljaːs lmn aːlmrsljn maː ln jtχlaː ʕnk twm wlqd sˤrˤfnaʶː llnaːs fj hðaː aːlqrʔaːn mn kl mθl fʔabaː ʔakθr aːlnaːs ʔilaː kfwraː juʕqd aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ mrtjn fj aːlʃhr waʶaʶːlˤdˤdˤaʶrˤbuʶ aːlθθaaːliθu laː baːrd wlaː krjm ʔaʁlb aʶːlˤðˤn ʔanhaː tntðˤrˤ mnk ʔan tʕtðr ʔiljhaː sʔanzl fj aʶːlˤmħtˤaʶ aːlqaːdma wmn ʔaːjaːth aːld͡ʒwaːr fj aːlbħr kaːlʔaʕlaːm ʔiin haðaaː ʔiillaaː qawlu aːlbaʃari haːa md͡ʒthda wjuʕtmd ʕljhaː wkm ʔahlknaː qblhm mn qrn hm ʔaħsn ʔaθaːθaː wrʔijaː lam jaʔakul aʶːlˤqiʶtˤtˤuʶ qrrr saːmj ʔan jʔud͡ʒd͡ʒl ðhaːbh ʔilaː aːld͡ʒaːmʕa fad͡ʒaʕala minhu aːlzzawd͡ʒajni aːlððakara waaːlʔaunθaː walaaː jufarriqu bajna maħmuwdin wamaðmuwmin faʔaaqbalwaː ʔiilajhi jaziffwna hðh mkaːtbnaː smʕt ljlaː saːmj w sljma jtχaʶːsˤmaʶːn waqad rawaaː aːlʕalaaːʔu bnu d͡ʒarijrin ʕan ʔaabijhi ʕan saaːlimi bni masruwqin qaaːla jaχrud͡ʒu minhumaaː aːllluʔuluʔuu waaːlmard͡ʒaːnu lm lm tttsˤlˤwaʶː bj msbbqaː ʔaʶdˤʕt saːʕtj fʕljj aːlʔaːn ʔan ʔaʃtrj waːħda ʔaχraː kaːn saːmj jtnaːwl aːlddwaːʔ kaːn saːmj ʕlaː wʃk ʔinhaːʔ ħjaːth waʁadawaː ʕalaː ħardin qaːdirjna bajnahumaː barzaχun laː jabʁijaːni tˤlˤb saːmj ʔan jtrkh aːld͡ʒmjʕ w ʃʔanh wamiħanahu min ʃawaaːhidi nublihi kaːn saːmj jntðˤrˤ fj aːlħaːna laː jwfr aʶːlˤsˤwm aʶːlˤtˤwjlˤ χbzaːan wamuqaaːranatuhu ʃaqaaː hal tuħibbu aːlssafara waʕalaaː miθli ðalika kaaːnat maraaːθij aːlʃʃuʕaraaːʔi waaːllaðjna kafarwaː biʔaːjaːtinaː hum ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːlmaʃʔaamaai waaːðkur ʕabdanaː ʔaajjwba ʔiið naːdaː rabbahu ʔaannj massanija aʶːlˤʃʃaʶjtˤaʶːnuʶ biʶnuʶsˤbiʶn waʕaðaːbin faʔiin ʔaaʕwazahu ðalika ʔillaaː aːstismaaːħanaː fahuwa aːlrriqu aːlmuðillu laː jad͡ʒibu ʕaljaa fiʕlu ðlik ʔaabadaːan laː ʔarjd aːlbqaːʔ lwħdj waʶðˤuʶhuʶwrˤuʶ maaː aːstabhama smʕtkmaː ttχaʶːsˤmaʶːn waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlmasijħi bnu nufajlaaa wsˤlˤnaʶː ʔilaː aːlmstʃfaː bʔamaːn wafij miθlihi qaaːla aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː wajuzijluhu ʕanhaaː ʃjʔ ljs mntˤqjaʶː ʔabdaː jmknhaː aːn tʕd mn waːħd ʔilaː ʕʃra waʔiilzaaːmuhaaː maaː ʔaalzama min tˤaʶaʶːʕaʶtiʶhiʶ ʔatħbnj aːlʕaaːmilu mutʕibun man ħaʶsˤsˤaʶnaʶ dijnahu waʶwaʶsˤaʶlˤaʶ raħimahu waʔaakrama ʔiχwaaːnahu faʔiin qanaʕa waʶaʶːqtaʶsˤaʶdaʶ ʔaataaːhu rizquhu χlʕ saːmj mlaːbsh bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi waaːlʕaːdijaːti dˤaʶbħaʶnaʶː kaðlika nad͡ʒzij aːlmuħsinjna waʶfuʶrˤsˤaʶaʶaʶ qudratihi qd jtwqaː aːlsjf whw mʁmd wd͡ʒd saːmj lljlaː mnsˤb ʃʁl fj aːlmsbħ aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ aːlmrjχ w aːlmʃtrj klhm kwaːkb ntˤqaʶː saːmj w ljlaː baːlʃʃhaːda mʕaː aʶːttsˤlˤ bj mdrrsk wajabʕaθu ʕalaaː aʶːlˤqaʶtˤiʶjʕaʶaʶiʶ waaːlʕuquwqi sqtˤt aːlkθjr mn aːlʔaʃd͡ʒaːr faʔiinna aːlmuluwka tuʕaaːqibu qudraaan laː tns ʔan tqddm ʔikraːmjja llnnaːdl jmkn lltwtr ʔan jʔuθr tʔaθjraː slbjaː kbjraː ʕlaː sˤħtk mn aʶːlˤʔaʶfdˤlˤ ʔan tsrʕw qaːla faaːlħaqqu waaːlħaqqa ʔaaqwlu jmknk aːlmd͡ʒjʔi mʕj kaːn saːmj jstħqq qdˤaʶːʔ wqt ʔakθr fj aːlssd͡ʒn aːħtimaaːlu aːlssafijhi χajrun min aːlttaħalij biʶsˤuʶwrˤaʶtiʶhiʶ waʶaʶːlˤħiʶrˤsˤaʶ ʕalajhi ħaʶðˤðˤaʶnaʶː kamaaː d͡ʒaaːʔa fij aːlħadijθi aːlʔaːχari ʔiðaaː hamamt biʔaamrin fafakkir fij ʕaaːqibatihi faʔiin kaaːna ruʃdanaː faʶʔaʶaʶmdˤiʶhiʶ bdʔa saːmj jqdˤj wqtaː ʔakθr mʕ ljlaː waaːalllahi maaː manaʕahu min d͡ʒawaaːbij ʔillaaː hawaaːnij ʕalajhi waχaaːdaʕa nafsahu biʶʁaʶlˤaʶtˤiʶhiʶ ʔinnamaaː maaːluk lak ʔaaw lilwaaːriθi ʔaaw lild͡ʒaaːʔiiħaai falaaː takun ʔaaʃqaaː aːlθθalaaːθaai saːmj tzwwd͡ʒ mrra θaːnja bʕd wfaːa zwd͡ʒth kaːn ðlk mmtʕanaː ħattaaː sˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ kaðibanaː sˤuʶrˤaʶaʶːħaʶnaʶː faʕinda ðalika jazuwlu aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbuʶ ʔiinna tutlifu ʃijʔianaː liʁajrika tadfaʕ θamanahu lmħthaː hl d͡ʒʔit wħdk ʔinn ʕjaːdtnaː raːʔida fj hðaː aʶːlˤqtˤaʶːʕ ʔiiðaː dˤaʶːqaʶ sˤaʶdrˤuʶ aːlmarʔi ʕan sirri nafsihi ʕuθir ʕlaː ħðaːʔ saːmj fj sˤndwq nfaːjaːt ʕlaː saːmj aʶːntðˤaʶːrˤ ljlaː waljakun d͡ʒuwduk karmanaː waraʁbaaan ʔanaː ʔaraː hðaː mʕ mn trjd ʔan ttħdθ faaːlmuqassimaːti ʔaamranaː kjf lj ʔan ʔansaː ʃjʔiaː khðaː waman kallafathu aːlnnafsu fawqa kafaaːfihaaː famaaː jaʶnqaʶdˤiʶj ħattaaː aːlmamaaːti ʕanaaːʔuuhu waminhaaː liʔaannahu qad jastaqillu biʕaaːlij himmatihi kulla kaθijrin maaː ʔaaswaʔau ħaaːli hiʃaaːmin ʔin lam jaʁfir aːlllahu lahu ʔaad͡ʒdaaː nafʕanaː waʔaaħsanu mawqiʕanaː min kaθijrihi maʕa suwʔi aːlttadbijri smʕ aːlmdrrs ðlk baʶːlˤsˤsˤdfaʶ aʶːnχfdˤ saːmj wajaqwlwna mataː hðaaː aːlfatħu ʔiin kuntum sˤaʶːdiʶqjnaʶ sʔantql llʕjʃ mʕki lmaːðaː trjd aːldraːsa fj aːlχaːrd͡ʒ mina aːld͡ʒinnaai waaːlnnaːsi falanuħjijannahu ħajaaːaan tˤaʶjjiʶbaʶaʶaʶn qaaːla laː bd ʔan lhðaː mʕnaː ʔaχð saːmj mʕh mfaːtjħh w haːtfh aːld͡ʒwwaːl kaːn laːʕbj kra aːlqdm mtʕbjn lknnhm sʕdaːʔ laː tns ðlk ʔabdaː wamaː ðˤaʶlˤaʶmnaʶːhuʶm walkin kaːnwaː humu aʶːlˤðˤðˤaʶːlˤiʶmjnaʶ ʔaʶχfdˤ sˤwt aːltlfaːz saːmj tˤbjb ʔarjd ʔan ʔakwn rd͡ʒl ʔiʶtˤfaʶːʔ aːlrʔaj qbl ʃd͡ʒaːʕa aːlʃd͡ʒʕaːn smmjnaː ʔibnnaː ʕlaː ʔism d͡ʒdj flaːn brq blaː mtˤrˤ wʃd͡ʒr blaː θmr faʶaʶːnðˤuʶrˤ kajfa kaːna ʕaːqibaau makrihim ʔaannaː dammarnaːhum waqawmahum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕjna faqad kamulat fijhi ʔaasbaaːbu aːlχajri bdʔa saːmj jsmʕ sˤwtaʶː jsˤdrˤ mn aːlʕllja wafijhi taʔawijlaaːni ʔaaħaduhumaaː ʕilmu maaː laaː jasaʕu d͡ʒahluhu min aːlʕibaaːdaaːti ʔanaː χd͡ʒl d͡ʒdaː mmaː fʕlt bal ʕad͡ʒibta wajasχarwna wamaː min ʁaːʔiibaain fij aːlssamaːʔi waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ʔiillaː fj kitaːbin mubjnin ʔin aʶːstaʶtˤaʶʕt ʔaan taʕmala lillahi biʶaʶːlˤrˤrˤiʶdˤaʶaʶː fij aːljaqijni faaːfʕal aːlθθawru jaħriθu aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤaʶ ʕaːd saːmj walaaː juħmala ʕalajhi biaːlkaθijri faʶjuʶðˤlˤaʶmuʶ wqd trwn ʃhaːb aːlmwt qd stˤʕaʶː kallaː ʔiinnahu taðkiraaun jaaː banijja taʕallamuwaː aːlʕilma faʔiin kuntum saaːdaaan fuqtum kaːn saːmj aːlʔawwl fj qsmh ʔaalbasu θawbanaː ʔaaqij bihi nafsij ʔaaħabbu ʔilajja min θawbin ʔaaqijhi binafsij sˤfʕ saːmj ljlaː md͡ʒdddaː walajsa aːlʔaamru ʕalaaː maaː ðˤaʶnnuʶwaʶː χajru aːlmaaːli ʕajnun χarraaːraaun fij ʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶn χawwaaːraain tasharu ʔiðaaː nimta faraːʁa ʔiilaː ʔaahlihi fad͡ʒaːʔa biʕid͡ʒlin samjnin aːllaðj kaððaba watawallaː kra aːlqdm hj lʕbtj aʶːlˤmfdˤlˤaʶ qul lillahi aːlʃʃafaːʕaau d͡ʒamjʕanaː lahu mulku aːlssamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ θumma ʔiilajhi turd͡ʒaʕwna waruwija ʔaanna salmaaːna qaaːla liʕalijjin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu kaːnt ljlaː tstħqq ʔan tukrh waʶsˤiʶdquʶn mustamaʕun waaːllaðj χalaqa aːlʔaazwaːd͡ʒa kullahaː wad͡ʒaʕala lakum mina aːlfulki waaːlʔaanʕaːmi maː tarkabwna aːħʃuruwaː aːllaðjna ðˤaʶlˤaʶmwaʶː waʔaazwaːd͡ʒahum wamaː kaːnwaː jaʕbudwna ʔawdd ʔan ʔansaː kll ʃjʔ maaːta lahum ʔinsaaːnun kaːn saːmj jħbb aʶːlˤrˤrˤjaʶːdˤjaʶːt nʃʔa saːmj fj md͡ʒtmʕ mslm ʕlaː aːlʔinsaːn ʔan jʕrf kl ʃjʔ ʕn ʃjʔ wjʕrf bʕdˤ aːlʃjʔ ʕn kl ʃj lm jlʕb saːmj kra aːlqdm ʔabdaː mʕ zmlaːʔih aːlmslmjn faʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːlmajmanaai maː ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːlmajmanaai ʕaduwwu ʕaaːqilun χajrun min sˤaʶdiʶjqiʶn d͡ʒaaːhilin laː ttsrʕ baːlʔid͡ʒaːba ʕan majmuwni bni mihraaːna lazimahu musaaːʕidaau zamaaːnihi fij aʶːlˤqaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶ aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶbrˤuʶ fijmaaː jatawaqqaʕuhu min raʁbaain jard͡ʒuwhaaː faʔiinna aːlkalaaːma ʔin lam jaʶnħaʶsˤiʶrˤ biaːlħaaːd͡ʒaai twm naːma χilaːla aːlfjlm waman ðakara χilaaːfahu tˤaʶaʶːbaʶt ʁajbatuhu lm jbqaː ldaː saːmj χjaːr ʔaːχr bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi ʔiiðaaː aːlssamaːʔu aːnʃaqqat kaːn saːmj jmdˤj wqth aːlmtmjjz mʕ ʔiχwth waqad rawaaː ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu burajdaaa ʕan ʔaabijhi hal tadruwna maaː jaquwlu lahaaː qaaːluwaː ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ltwqjʕ twm wanawmu ħumqin wahuwa aːlʕaʃijju ʔiinnaː balawnaːhum kamaː balawnaː ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbaʶ aːld͡ʒannaai ʔiið ʔaaqsamwaː lˤaʶjaʶsˤrˤiʶmuʶnnaʶhaʶː muʶsˤbiʶħjnaʶ ʔaan laaː juʕannifuwaː mutaʕallimanaː walaw ʔaamkana ðalika lakaaːna aːlʔaawwalu qad ʔaaʁnaaː aːlθθaaːnija ʕanhaaː aːstqaːl saːmj mn mnsˤbh fj aːlʕjaːda ʕnd aːlrhaːn tʕrf aːlswaːbq aːlbʕjd ʕn aːlʕjn bʕjd ʕn aːlqlb fawajlun jawmaʔiiðin lilmukaððibjna θumma qaaːla taʁajjara aːlnnaaːsu kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jqdˤjaʶːn fj kll jwm ʕʃrjn dqjqa mʕaː dʕaːnj aːlmdrrs baːlssmjn waʔiin ʔaud͡ʒijba faʔiilaaː maaː laaː jastaħiqqu ʕad͡ʒibt liman qijla fijhi aːlχajru walajsa fijhi kajfa jafraħu laː bd mn wd͡ʒwd tˤrˤjqaʶ maː man aːlkaaːmilu aːlmuruwʔaai faqaaːla kaːn saːmj msjħjjaː mtmsskaː bdjnh kaːn aːlmdrrs sjjʔiaː d͡ʒddaː taqijhim aːlħarra walam jaðkur aːlbarda lqd aʶːnfsˤlˤnaʶː mn rsm hðh aːllwħaːt warad͡ʒulun jad͡ʒillu biaːlʕamali lˤiʶnaʶqsˤiʶhiʶ wadanaaːʔatihi lmaːðaː laː nsttˤjʕ aːlððhaːb ʔilaː aːlmdrsa kd͡ʒmjʕ aːlnnaːs stbdj lk aːlʔajaːm maː knt d͡ʒaːhlaː aːlssamaaːʔu muʶmtˤiʶrˤaʶaʶuʶn ʔimmaaː litawahhumihi ʔaanna aːlnnaaːsa qad ʁafaluwaː ʕan faʶdˤlˤiʶhiʶ ʔaamaaː ʔinnahu lajsa biʶʔiʶiʶdˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶiʶ aːlmaaːli zallat ʔaaqdaaːmu aːlʕulamaaːʔi fij ðalika raʁbaaan ʔaaw rahbaaan faʶdˤaʶlˤlˤuʶwaʶː waaːllaðjna hum ʕalaː sˤaʶlˤaʶːtiʶhiʶm juʶħaʶːfiʶðˤwnaʶ hl kl ʃjʔ ʕlaː maː jraːm saːmj jħbb aːlmʔakwlaːt aːlbħrjja ʕljj aːlttħdθ mʕ aːlmtħrrj baːkr ʔaχrd͡ʒ saːmj aʶːlˤrˤrˤsˤaʶːsˤaʶ mn ðraːʕ ljlaː ðalika χajrun laː ʔaħd jnaːdjhaː bljlaː aːld͡ʒmjʕ jnaːdjhaː maːmaː aːllaðjna tˤaʶʁaʶwaʶː fij aːlbilaːdi laʕallaka baːχiʕun nafsaka ʔaallaː jakwnwaː muʔuminjna waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi niʶsˤfuʶ raʔajik maʕa ʔaaχijk faʃaaːwirhu lijakmula lak aːlrraʔaju hðaː aːχtbaːr ħml w hw ʔijd͡ʒaːbj kaːn ðlk aʶːlˤdˤdˤd͡ʒjd͡ʒ sˤaʶːχbaʶː waʔiilaaː aːlbaaːdiʔii bihaaː raaːd͡ʒiʕaaun hj mdrrsa lˤtˤjfaʶ waaːllaðj ʔaaχrad͡ʒa aːlmarʕaː haː hj mħfðˤtj ln jnsaːhaː ʔaħd ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jʕwd haːhnaː ħaːlanaː wjsaːʕdnaː lnnhj aːlmhma ʔiilaː rabbihaː naʶːðˤiʶrˤaʶaʶuʶn saːmj mslm kajfa nafaaː ʕanhu aːlllawma walaaː junijluhu maaː ʔaaħabba wajurjkum ʔaːjaːtihi faʔaajja ʔaːjaːti aːlllahi tunkirwna waðallalnaːhaː lahum faminhaː rakwbuhum waminhaː jaʔakulwna kaːn saːmj mhtmmaː bʃʔanh knt sʕjdaː d͡ʒdaː waaːld͡ʒabaaːni aːlfaʃili ʔaami aːttaχaða mimmaː jaχluqu banaːtin waʶʔaʶaʶsˤfaʶːkuʶm biaːlbanjna qlb lh ðˤhrˤ aːlmid͡ʒanii ʔaaw jaʶqtaʶsˤiʶrˤaʶ ʕalaaː nuʶqsˤaʶaʶːniʶn minhaaː lqd tχlljt ʕnnj ʔarsl saːmj aːlrrsaːla ʔilaː ʕnwaːn ljlaː w baːsmhaː laaː jaslamuwna minhaaː ʔaħb td͡ʒrba aːlsjaːraːt aːld͡ʒdjda faʔaaχaða haðaaː aːlmaʕnaaː maħmuwdun aːlwarraaːqu faqaaːla ʔaakθir mina aːlqiraaːʔai fij aːlkutubi aːlnnaaːfiʕaai waman aːltamasa wafaaːʔa aːlʔiiχwaaːni biʁajri wafaaːʔin aːltamasa maaː laaː jakuwnu faqad aːχtalafat maðaaːhibu aʶːlˤfuʶdˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːʔiʶ fijhi laaː ʔaadrij ħattaaː ʔaasʔaala aːlʕaaːlima walataʕlamunna nabaʔaahu baʕda ħjnin aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶːʔiʶrˤaʶ trtfʕ waʕindahum qaʶːsˤiʶrˤaʶːtuʶ aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶrˤfiʶ ʔaatraːbun ʔiinna aːlllaha huwa rabbj warabbukum faaːʕbudwhu hðaː sˤiʶrˤaʶːtˤuʶn mustaqjmun ʔaːh mtaː sjtqaːblwn md͡ʒddaːan mard͡ʒuwwa aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶwaʶaʶːbiʶ jawma tard͡ʒufu aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤuʶ waaːld͡ʒibaːlu wakaːnati aːld͡ʒibaːlu kaθjbanaː mahjlanaː kl bʔus wkl nʕjm zaːʔil tʔaχrt bsbb aʶːlˤmtˤrˤ aːbtʕdt ljlaː kaːn saːmj fj aːlʕml ʕndmaː aʶːttsˤlˤt bh ljlaː waaːlnnahamu ʃuʔumun bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi waaːlnnaːziʕaːti ʁarqanaː lqd wsˤlˤ saːmj ʔilaː aːlʕjaːda wawaʕadahum falam juχlifhum waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlˤuʶ kaːn sˤwt saːmj ʁrjbaː ħqqaː qdmj maː zaːlt tʔulmnj ʔaχð saːmj mlaːbsh ʔilaː mħll aʶːlˤttnðˤjf aːld͡ʒaːf waljaħðar ʔaan jastarsila fij mumaaːzaħaai ʕaduwwin fajad͡ʒʕala lahu tˤaʶrˤiʶjqaʶnaʶː ʔilaaː ʔiʕlaaːni aːlmasaaːwiʔii wahuwa mud͡ʒiddun waʶqaʶtˤʕaʶnaʶː liðaraaːʔiiʕi aːlʔiiʕd͡ʒaaːbi faʔaammaaː aːlmud͡ʒaaːharaau biʶaʶːlˤðˤðˤuʶlˤmiʶ faʕutuwwun muhlikun waʶtˤuʶʁjaʶaʶːnuʶn mutlifun flaːn duraaau aːltaːd͡ʒ wwaʶːstˤaʶ aːlʕqd ʔant jaː mn fj tlk aːlsjaːra qif waʶsˤaʶddaʶhuʶ aʶːlˤqaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔuʶ ʕan tˤaʶlˤiʶbaʶtiʶhiʶ waʔiijjaaːka waʶaʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶmaʶʕaʶ faʔiinnahu faqrun ħaʶaʶːdˤiʶrˤuʶn ʔaʕd͡ʒbtnj raːʔiħth waaːlʔaamru qarijbun waaːlħukmu lillahi taʕaaːlaaː faqad qaaːla ʕumaru bnu aʶːlˤχaʶtˤtˤaʶaʶːbiʶ rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu aːlmuħsinu ʕalaaː aːlmusijʔi ʔaamijrun rʔajt aːlrd͡ʒl jqfz lm tdm sˤdaʶːqtnaʶː falaː ʔauqsimu biaːlχunnasi fanabaðnaːhu biaːlʕaraːʔi wahuwa saqjmun tusqaː min ʕajnin ʔaːnijaain ʕljj aːlððhaːb jaː saːmj lajsa aːlʕaaːmilu naʶʃiʶjtˤaʶnaʶː waʔaːtajnaːhum mina aːlʔaːjaːti maː fjhi balaːʔun mubjnun ʔaqbħ mn zwaːl aːlnʕma jaaː ʔaaχij ʕaːmlnj naːʔib mdjr aːlmdrsa mθl aːlklb sˤfqt aːlbaːb jtm aʶːsˤlˤaʶːħ sjaːrtj aːlʔaːn tsˤbħ ʕlaː ʔalf χjr mrħbaː jaː bnjj waʶsˤaʶħħaʶt rawijjatuhu liʔaanna aːlʕaqla jamnaʕu min ʔaan jakuwna aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔinhaː wrqa nqdja mn fʔia aːlmaːʔia dwlaːr tlqqaː saːmj rsaːla mn ljlaː dwaːʔ aːldhr aʶːlˤsˤbrˤ ʕljh saːmj jʃrb tlqqaː saːmj tʕljmaː d͡ʒaːmʕjjaː ħtaː aʶːlˤʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤ tʕrf ðlk kaːn faʶːdˤlˤ jntðˤrˤ ʔan tttsˤlˤ bh ljlaː tħdθt lkn ʔaħdaː lm jstmʕ ʔilj ʔaχjraːan wsˤlˤnaʶː llbħjra qul kullun jaʕmalu ʕalaaː ʃaaːkilatihi farabbukum ʔaaʕlamu biman huwa ʔaahdaaː sabijlanaː kðlk wzwd͡ʒnaːhm bħwr ʕjn rabbanaaː ʔaːtihim dˤiʶʕfaʶjniʶ mina aːlʕaðaaːbi waaːlʕanhum laʕnanaː kabijranaː wd͡ʒwh jwmʔið msfra taːllh ʔin knaː lfj dˤlˤaʶːlˤ mbjn θumma ʃaqaqnaaː aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ ʃaqqanaː walaaː tuʕfi tˤaʶbʕaʶk min aʶːlˤmuʶnaʶaʶːðˤaʶrˤaʶaʶiʶ fajaʕud saqijmanaː wlaː jħdˤ ʕlaː tˤʕaʶːm aːlmskjn aːlwaːrdaːt aʶːlˤmsˤnʕaʶ ʔilaː aːljaːbaːn qd aːzdaːdt zjaːdaan mlˤħwðˤaʶ km ʕmr waːldk laaː juʔuaaːχiðukumu aːlllahu biaːlllaʁwi fij ʔaajmaaːnikum walakin juʔuaaːχiðukum bimaaː kasabat quluwbukum waaːlllahu ʁafuwrun ħalijmun dhnat aːld͡ʒdraːn baʶːlˤʔaʶbjdˤ wbχtnj tlk aːlmʕlma kθjranaː ʔaʃrb ʕaːdaan kwbanaː mn aːlħljb ʕlaː aʶːlˤʔiʶftˤaʶːrˤ laː jsttˤjʕ aːltnfs lam jaðkur aːlʃʃaʕbiju haðaaː aːlqawla taʶfdˤiʶjlˤaʶnaʶː linafsihi fajustaqbaħu minhu bʔimkaːnj ʔan ʔalʕb aːltns wʔaʶmtˤrˤnaʶː ʕljhm mtˤrˤaʶː fsaːʔ mtˤrˤ aːlmnðrjn ʔinhaː msaːla ħjaːa ʔaw mwt wahaðaaː aːlħadijθu d͡ʒaaːmiʕun liʔaːdaaːbi aːlʕadli fij aːlʔaaħwaaːli kullihaaː ħaːwl md͡ʒddaːan famaaː kaaːna daʕwaaːhum ʔiið d͡ʒaaːʔahum baʔasunaaː ʔiillaaː ʔaan qaaːluwaː ʔiinnaaː kunnaaː ðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ ʔant ħqaː mml ʔant laː ʃjʔ mn dwn maʶːdˤjk wd͡ʒðwrk ʔifʕl ʕlaː aːlmtʕa haðaaː bajaaːnun lilnnaaːsi wahudanaː waʶmaʶwʕiʶðˤaʶaʶuʶn lilmuttaqijna walaaː tad͡ʒʕal jadaka maʁluwlaaan ʔiilaaː ʕunuqika walaaː taʶbsuʶtˤhaʶaʶː kulla aʶːlˤbaʶstˤiʶ fataqʕuda maluwmanaː maħsuwranaː aːlʔaːla aːlʔaːn tʕml ʔatðkr ʔaʃjaːʔ kθjra ʔaʕrifhaː lkl aːmrʔi mnhm jwmʔið ʃʔan jʁnjh fʔatt bh qwmhaː tħmlh qaːlwaː jaː mrjm lqd d͡ʒʔit ʃjʔiaː frjaː walikulli baaːbin minhu taʕalluqun ʕndh ʔad͡ʒr ʕðˤjm waʶdˤaʶaʶːqaʶt maʕahumaaː aːlħaaːlu wdaːʕjaː ʔilaː aːllh bʔiðnh wsraːd͡ʒaː mnjraː wʔanh kaːn jqwl sfjhnaː ʕlaː aːllh ʃtˤtˤaʶː sjðˤhrˤ ʔabj ʕlaː aːltlfaːz aːlljla ʔant ħsaːs d͡ʒdaː waʔiikθaaːrihi hj lj jjnʁ waman ʔaaħsanu qawlanaː mimman daʕaaː ʔiilaaː aːlllahi waʕamila sˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶnaʶː waqaaːla ʔiinnanij mina aːlmuslimijna aːntql mnnaːd ʔilaː mnzl d͡ʒdjd aʶːlˤsˤdq ʔaʶfdˤlˤ warabbikum min kulli mutakabbirin laaː juʔuminu bijawmi aːlħisaaːbi hj maːkra bqdr maː hj lˤtˤjfaʶ waaːlħaaːlu aːlrraaːbiʕaau aːnh jksb θlaːθa ʔaʶdˤʕaʶːf ʔakθr mmaː aːfʕl aːnaː hw mwd͡ʒwdun fj aːlmktab waliðalika lam juχli aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː χalqahu twm mn bnj aːlbʃr waaːlwaqaaːru waʶaʶːsiʶtˤaʶaʶuʶn bajna aːlhuzʔi waaːlssaχaaːfaai aʶːχfdˤ rʔask fahaðaaː wad͡ʒhun tanzijla aːlʕazijzi aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶaʶːtiʶ falahum d͡ʒannaaːtu aːlmaʔawaaː nuzulanaː bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna ʔaanna aːlmuʕd͡ʒaba biʕamalihi mumtannun bihi waaːlmumtannu ʕalaaː aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː d͡ʒaaːħidun mbswtˤ hnaː twm wmaːrj fj sjaːra twm qul lillahi aːlʃʃafaaːʕaau d͡ʒamijʕanaː lahu mulku aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ θumma ʔiilajhi turd͡ʒaʕuwna qaaːla ʔiin saʔaaltuka ʕan ʃajʔin baʕdahaaː falaaː tuʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbniʶj qad balaʁta min ladunnij ʕuðranaː wfj χlqkm wmaː jbθ mn daːba ʔaːjaːt lqwm jwqnwn waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi aːlʔaamalu kaaːlssaraaːbi ʁarra man raʔaːhu waχaaːba man rad͡ʒaaːhu ʔanaː ʔaʃʕr baʶːlˤʕtˤʃ waqaaːla muħammadu bnu baʃijrin raħimahu aːlllahu rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu ʔaawwaluhumaaː maaː jaʶntaʶðˤiʶmuʶ bihi ʔaumuwru d͡ʒumlathaaː waʶtˤaʶlˤaʶbt mink ʔaarbaaːbanaː ʔaajaʔamurukum biaːlkufri baʕda ʔiið ʔaantum muslimuwna wud͡ʒuwhun jawmaʔiiðin mmusfiraaun laː ʔaʃrb aːlkħwljaːt hn jstħqnh waʔiinnaka latadʕuwhum ʔiilaaː sˤiʶrˤaʶaʶːtˤiʶn mustaqijmin twm ʕbr aːlnhr wʔin jrjdwaː χjaːntk fqd χaːnwaː aːllh mn qbl fʔamkn mnhm waːllh ʕljm ħkjm ʔilaː ʕd͡ʒwzaː fj aːlʁaːbrjn aːllaðijna jaʶðˤuʶnnuʶwnaʶ ʔaannahum mulaaːquw rabbihim waʔaannahum ʔiilajhi raaːd͡ʒiʕuwna waʔiin minkum ʔiillaaː waaːriduhaaː kaaːna ʕalaaː rabbika ħatmanaː maʶqdˤiʶjjaʶnaʶː ʔinn ʃwqj ħaːʔir fj mqltjk kun ʕdjm aːlrħma waaːllaðijna hum ʕani aːlllaʁwi muʶʕrˤiʶdˤuʶwnaʶ marad͡ʒa aːlbaħrajni jaltaqijaaːni ʔaam jaquwluwna taqawwalahu bal llaː juʔuminuwna hl ʔanti sʕjda fj mnzlk jwd͡ʒd mqhaː ʔamaːm aʶːlˤmħtˤaʶ jrbj twm aːlχjwl aːlʕrbja aːlnd͡ʒwm ʕbaːra ʕn kraːt ʕmlaːqa mn ftmθl lhaː bʃraː swjaː ʔafhm aːltrkja hl aːllʁa aːlfrnsja ʔaʶsˤʕb mn aːlʔind͡ʒljzja ʔinaː kaːʃfw aːlʕðaːb qljlaː ʔinkm ʕaːʔidwn fj ðˤlˤ raːja θwrtj walaaː janaaːlahu waʶsˤmuʶn ʔið jtlqaː aːlmtlqjaːn ʕn aːljmjn wʕn aːlʃmaːl qʕjd ttħrk aːlħlzwnaːt bbtˤʔ mn ʃr maː χlq hj kʔaχjhaː waaːlʃʃuʕaraaːʔu jattabiʕuhumu aːlʁaaːwuwna twd͡ʒh ʔilaː mħtˤaʶ ħaːflaːt aːld͡ʒzaːʔir aʶːlˤʕaʶːsˤmaʶ hl ħaːwlt aːlaːstmaːʕ ʔiljhaː saːmj kaːn ʕlaː fjsbwk lqd ʔauħrd͡ʒt ħqaːan maːðaː laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ smaːʕkm ʔajhaː aːlrfaːq mn hðh aʶːlˤtˤflˤaʶ aːltj mʕk ʔanaː ʔarjd ʔan ʔaðhb ʔilj aːld͡ʒna wlkn laː ʔarjd ʔan ʔamwt lˤlˤwsˤwlˤ ʔilaː hnaːk wad͡ʒannaaːtin ʔaalfaaːfanaː jbdwaː lj ʔanh jʕlm aːlsr lijad͡ʒzija aːlllahu kulla nafsin maaː kasabat ʔiinna aːlllaha sarijʕu aːlħisaaːbi walaʔiin saʔaaltahum man χalaqahum lajaquwlunna aːlllahu faʔaannaaː juʔufakuwna waʔaanʃada ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu aːlzzubajri θalaaːθaaa ʔaabjaaːtin d͡ʒaaːmiʕaaan likulli maaː qaaːlathu aːlʕarabu aːʕtni bnfsk waʔaːχaruwna murd͡ʒawna liʔaamri aːlllahi ʔiimmaaː juʕaððibuhum waʔiimmaaː jatuwbu ʕalajhim waaːlllahu ʕalijmun ħakijmun ʔaʶuʶsˤjb saːmj baːlmaːlaːrjaː wahuwa aːllaðij juħjij wajumijtu walahu aːχtilaaːfu aːlllajli waaːlnnahaaːri ʔaafalaaː taʕqiluwna ʔaʕjdh ʔilj jħwl aːld͡ʒsm aːlsʕraːt aːlħraːrja aːlzaːʔida ʔilaː ʃħm kaːn ʕlaː aːlmdrs ʔan jqjm d͡ʒmjʕ aʶːlˤtˤlˤb ʔin aːlðjn ʔad͡ʒrmwaː kaːnwaː mn aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː jdˤħkwn ʔinhu jtħdθ aːlbrbrja mʕ mudrsahu qul ʕasaaː ʔaan jakuwna radifa lakum baʶʕdˤuʶ aːllaðij tastaʕd͡ʒiluwna wahija muʶʕaʶrˤrˤaʶdˤaʶaʶuʶn liħasadi aːlʔaadaaːnij waaːlʔaaqaaːribi laː ʔarjd χsaːrtaki aːlʔab fj aːlʁrfa waʔiin lam takun radaaːʔaau aʶːlˤχaʶtˤtˤiʶ saʕaaːdaaan aːqraʔa warabbuka aːlʔaakramu hðaː kθjr ʔalaː tʕrf ʔin kaːnt lwsj qaːdra ʕlaː tklm aːljaːbaːnja ʔajn aːlħbl hl jmknnj ʔan ʔasʔal ʔilaː ʔajn ʔanta ðaːhb waːltft aːlsaːq baːlsaːq lmaːðaː sˤʕdt ʔilaː sqf bjthaː ʔanaː ʕlaː aːlqaːʔima ldjh sjaːra d͡ʒdjda w ʔaχraː qdjma jʕd͡ʒbh hðaː aːld͡ʒjtaːr hnaːk mn jnðˤrˤ ʔiljk hl hðh ʔawl zjaːra lk lm tsˤlˤ aːlħaːfla bʕd aːlbs qbbʕtk jħjaː wʔabwh zkrjaː nbjaːn mn ʕnd aːllh fijhimaaː ʕajnaaːni tad͡ʒrijaaːni wjtˤwf ʕljhm ʁlmaːn lhm kʔanhm lʔulʔu mknwn mn tkwnjii waʔaammaaː man d͡ʒaaːʔaka jasʕaaː aːbq saːktaː bjnmaː nʔakl qaːl rbj jʕlm aːlqwl fj aːlsmaːʔ waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ whw aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm faʔiinna aːlrraʔaja aːlmaʕluwla laaː jabqaaː ʕalaaː ħaaːlihi faminhum man ʔaːmana bihi waminhum man sˤaʶddaʶ ʕanhu wakafaaː bid͡ʒahannama saʕijranaː mimmaaː χaʶtˤiʶjʔiʶaʶaʶːtiʶhiʶm ʔauʁriquwaː faʔaudχiluwaː naaːranaː falam jad͡ʒiduwaː lahum min duwni aːlllahi ʔaʶaʶnsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶnaʶː faʔiinna faʶdˤlˤaʶ aːlmaʃhadi ʕalaaː aːlmaʁijbi luʔumun walakum fijhaaː d͡ʒamaaːlun ħijna turijħuwna waħijna tasraħuwna ʔaʕtqd ʔan hðaː ʕðˤjm wʔadχlnaːh fj rħmtnaː ʔinh mn aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħjn mrħbanaː waʕaðaaːbin waʶbiʶʔiʶiʶðˤhaʶaʶːrˤiʶ maknuwnihi takuwnu aːlfaaːʔiidaau wabiaːstidaaːmaai sˤaʶbrˤiʶhiʶ jakuwnu aːlʔiikθaaːru lqd sqtˤ twm fj ħwdˤ aːlsbaːħa ʁajra ʔaanna aːlddunjaaː ʔiðaaː sˤaʶlˤaʶħaʶt kaaːna ʔisʕaaːduhaaː mawfuwranaː waʶʔiʶiʶʕrˤaʶaʶːdˤuʶhaʶaʶː majsuwranaː lm jd͡ʒd twm nðˤaʶːrˤaʶːth jariθunij wajariθu min ʔaːli jaʕquwba waaːd͡ʒʕalhu rabbi rˤaʶdˤiʶjjaʶnaʶː waʔiiχwaaːnuhum jamudduwnahum fij aːlʁajji θumma laaː juʶqsˤiʶrˤuʶwnaʶ ldjhaː sbʕa sˤbjaʶːn wamina aːlnnaaːsi man jaʃrij nafsahu aːbtiʁaaːʔa maʶrˤdˤaʶaʶːtiʶ aːlllahi waaːlllahu raʔuwfun biaːlʕibaaːdi qaːl rb ʔinj laː ʔamlk ʔilaː nfsj wʔaχj faːfrq bjnnaː wbjn aːlqwm aːlfaːsqjn waʔiimmaaː taχaaːfanna min qawmin χijaaːnaaan faaːnbið ʔiilajhim ʕalaaː sawaaːʔin ʔiinna aːlllaha laaː juħibbu aːlχaaːʔiinijna kaːnt tlk waʔaahdijaka ʔiilaaː rabbika fataχʃaaː wʔajwb ʔið naːdaː rbh ʔanj msnj aʶːlˤdˤrˤ wʔant ʔarħm aːlraːħmjn qaːl aːltlmjð ʔin aːlmʕlm laː jħtrm nfsh waqaaːluwaː ʔaːmannaaː bihi waʔaannaaː lahumu faʶlˤaʶnaʶquʶsˤsˤaʶnaʶ ʕalajhim biʕilmin wamaaː kunnaaː ʁaaːʔiibijna hl ldjk aːlkθjr ltfʕlh aːljwm ʔið aːnbʕθ ʔaʃqaːhaː taqdijru maaː jatawallaaːhu min aːlʔaamwaaːli bisunani aːlddijni min ʁajri taħrijfin fij ʔaaχðihaaː waʶʔiʶiʶʕtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶhaʶaʶː ʔawlʔik aːlðjn aːʃtrwaː aʶːlˤdˤlˤaʶːlˤaʶ baːlhdaː waːlʕðaːb baːlmʁfra fmaː ʔaʶsˤbrˤhm ʕlaː aːlnaːr ʔiin tad͡ʒtanibuwaː kabaaːʔiira maaː tunhawna ʕlaː aːllh twklnaː rbnaː laː td͡ʒʕlnaː ftna llqwm aʶːlˤðˤaʶːlˤmjn ʔin aʶːsttˤʕt tʕaːl mʕnaː ʕalaaː aːlkaaːfirijna ʁajru jasijrin lqd ʔanhjnaː ʔakl tˤʕaʶːm aʶːlˤftˤwrˤ lltw qaːl rb ʔinj ʔaχaːf ʔan aʶːlˤmuʶðˤaʶaʶːhaʶrˤaʶaʶiʶ flmaː d͡ʒaːʔthm ʔaːjaːtnaː mbsˤrˤaʶ qaːlwaː hðaː sħr mbjn qaaːla ðalika maaː kunnaaː nabʁi faaːrtaddaaː ʕalaaː ʔaːθaaːrihimaaː qaʶsˤaʶsˤaʶnaʶː waʔaulfaaun d͡ʒaaːmiʕaaun dʕwthm lknnj lm ʔalbjhaː faðuwquwaː bimaaː nasijtum liqaaːʔa jawmikum haðaaː ʔiinnaaː nasijnaaːkum waðuwquwaː ʕaðaaːba aːlχuldi bimaaː kuntum taʕmaluwna laː ʔamlk aːlwqt aːlkaːfj lqraːʔa hðaː aːlktaːb jawmaʔiiðin jatafarraquwna wjmnʕwn aːlmaːʕwn ʔanaː laː ʔaʁnj θmma ʃaːʔiʕaun tqwl ʔan aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤwlˤjjn jrsmwn χtˤaʶ mdˤaʶːdaʶ llħkwma ʔin d͡ʒmla hðh aːld͡ʒmla sˤħjħaʶ nħwjaːan hj sˤħjħaʶ nħwjaːan wmn mʕh d͡ʒmjʕaː aʶːlˤðˤlˤm mrtʕh wχjm ʔin aːlmtqjn fj d͡ʒnaːt wnhr χatama aːlllahu ʕalaaː quluwbihim waʕalaaː samʕihim waʕalaaː ʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶhiʶm ʁiʃaaːwaaun walahum ʕaðaaːbun ʕaʶðˤiʶjmuʶn waʔaaqijmuwaː aːlwazna biʶaʶːlˤqiʶstˤiʶ walaaː tuχsiruwaː aːlmijzaaːna wad͡ʒamʕuhum θubuwranaː man waʶlˤuʶwtˤaʶnaʶː ʔiið qaaːla liqawmihi ʔaataʔatuwna aːlfaaːħiʃaaa waʔaantum tuʶbsˤiʶrˤuʶwnaʶ ʔiillaaː aʶːlˤsˤʁjrˤ juħbuhaː fj bjwt ʔaðn aːllh ʔan trfʕ wjðkr fjhaː aːsmh jsbħ lh fjhaː baːlʁdw waʶːlˤʔaʶːsˤaʶːlˤ waʕad͡ʒibt liman ʔaajqana biaːlqadari θumma jatʕabu waaːlmuqillu min aːlʔiiχwaaːni waʶsˤaʶaʶːjaʶaʶːhuʶ aːlmarmuwzaai ʔaannahu qaaːla waʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶbrˤuʶ ʕalaaː sˤuʶħbaʶtiʶhiʶm karukuwbi aːlbaħri faʔaaχaðathumu aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶjħaʶaʶuʶ muʃriqijna qul ʔiinnamaaː ʔaunðirukum biaːlwaħji walaaː jasmaʕu aʶːlˤsˤsˤuʶmuʶ aːldduʕaaːʔa ʔiiðaaː maaː junðaruwna lmaːðaː laː jsttˤjʕ ʔabdaː fʕl ʃjʔ aːlqaaːʔiilu waaːlmustamiʕu waaːlʔaːχiðu aʶːlˤʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤ mrʔaːa lld͡ʒw aːlʕaːʔilj twm wmaːrj jstʕdaːn ʔanaː laː ʔaʕrf ʔaj ʃʔi bʕd ʔanaː mstʕd daːʔimaː llmwt qaaːluwaː laʔiin lam tantahi jaaː lˤuʶwtˤuʶ latakuwnanna mina aːlmuχrad͡ʒijna ʔablʁkm rsaːlaːt rbj wʔaʶnsˤħ lkm wʔaʕlm mn aːllh maː laː waaːlllahu juħibbu aːlmuħsinijna ʃkraːan lka hl jmknk ʔan tʕtˤj tqrjraːan kaːmlaːan ħwl maː ħdθ zaːr rʔijsu aːlwlaːjaːt aːlmtħda aʶːlˤsˤjnaʶ zjaːraan rsmja fj ʔaj ʕaːm wldt aːħtflnaː tˤjlˤaʶ aːlljl fwqaːh aːllh sjʔiaːt maː mkrwaː wħaːq bʔaːl frʕwn swʔ aːlʕðaːb waχibraau ʔaaχlaaːqihim qabla aʶːsˤtˤiʶfaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶhiʶm faʔiinnahu maaː ʔaaħadun jaʕdamu ʕaduwwanaː walaaː jafqidu ħaaːsidanaː ʔataː mnnaːd ʔilaː mnzlj ʔaðhb ʔilj aːlʕml fj aːlsaːʕa aːlsaːbʕa lˤtˤaʶːlˤmaʶː ʔaħbbtk faʔiinna ʔid͡ʒaaːbatahaaː tusriʕu ʔanti wsˤlˤtiʶ mbkraːan d͡ʒdaːan hl bʔimkaːnk ʔan tʕtˤjnj dqjqa ʔarjd ʔan ʔaqwl lk ʃjʔiaː aːlmaːʔ mhm d͡ʒdaː aːllaðij ʔaʶaʶtˤʕaʶmaʶhuʶm mmin d͡ʒuwʕin waʔaːmanahum mmin χawfin kraːmaː kaːtbjn fʕl saːmj kll maː bwsʕh kj jsˤf ljlaː bʔabʃʕ sˤwrˤaʶ mmkna lmaːðaː ttbʕnj knt friħaan baːlʔams hal θuwwiba aːlkuffaaːru maaː kaaːnuwaː jafʕaluwna wakaaːna jad͡ʒuwzu min aːlmukallafijna ʔaan laaː takuwna haðihi aːlʔaumuwru muʶsˤlˤiʶħaʶaʶaʶn lahum waʔaarʃadahu ʔilajhaaː biʶaʶːlˤfaʶtˤiʶnaʶaʶiʶ aːllaðijna jukaððibuwna bijawmi aːlddijni ramzunaː ramzunaː mad͡ʒdunaː wʕhdunaː wwaːd͡ʒbun mna aːlwafaː ʔaskn fj bld ʔawrwbj ʕn ʔabj jaʕlaaː ʃaddaaːdi bni ʔaawsin rˤaʶdˤiʶj aːllhu ʕanhu aːlftjaːt jrjdwn fqtˤ aʶːlˤħsˤwlˤ ʕlaː aːlmtʕa ʔam llʔinsaːn maː tmnaː waʶʔaʶaʶsˤlˤuʶ aːlzzuhdi aːlrrahbaau waθamaratuhu aːlʕibaaːdaau faʔiiðaaː aːqtarana aːlzzuhdu waaːlʕilmu faqad tammat aːlssaʕaaːdaau waʕammat aʶːlˤfaʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶuʶ ʔiðaː lm tkn fj sˤfnaʶː fsnʕdk mn ʔaʕdaːʔinaː daːʔimaː ʔaʁsl wd͡ʒhj baʶːlˤsˤaʶːbwn waːlmaːʔ wmn dwnki ħtmaːan qlbj jnthj faʔaammaaː aːlllaaːzimu fahuwa aːlʔaanafaau lilʔaːbaaːʔi min taʶhaʶdˤdˤuʶmiʶn ʔaaw χumuwlin maθalu aːlddunjaaː waaːlʔaːχiraai maθalu dˤaʶrˤrˤaʶtaʶjniʶ ʔin ʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶjt ʔiħdaaːhumaaː ʔaʶaʶsχaʶtˤt aːlʔauχraaː jd͡ʒib ʔan tfkr fj ʕaːʔiltka qaaːla ʔiin kunta d͡ʒiʔita biʔaːjaain faʔati bihaaː ʔiin kunta mina aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ ʔanti ldjki ʔanf kbjr faʔaammaaː maʕa faqdi aːlʔaaʕwaaːni faʕalaaː aːlʔiinsaaːni aːlkaffu ljwm ʕðˤjm waqaaːla aːlmalaʔau aːllaðijna kafaruwaː min qawmihi laʔiini aːttabaʕtum ʃuʕajbanaː ʔiinnakum ʔiiðanaː laχaaːsiruwna tˤbʕaʶːaʶn fasabbiħ biħamdi rabbika waaːstaʁfirhu ʔiinnahu kaaːna tawwaaːbanaː aːltdχjn jqtl faʔiinna ʔaaħadakum laaː jadrij mataaː jaħtaaːd͡ʒu ʔilajhi ʔaaw mataaː jaħtaaːd͡ʒu ʔilaaː maaː ʕindahu wjqwlwn mtaː hðaː aːlwʕd ʔin kntm sˤaʶːdqjn lmaːðaː thaːd͡ʒr aʶːlˤtˤjwrˤ waʔiiðaaː raʔaawka ʔiin jattaχiðuwnaka ʔiillaaː huzuwanaː ʔaahaðaaː aːllaðij baʕaθa aːlllahu rasuwlanaː waʶːlˤnaʶːʃtˤaʶːt nʃtˤaʶː aːtbʕ maː ʔawħj ʔiljk mn rbk laː ʔilh ʔilaː hw wʔaʶʕrˤdˤ waʔaːbaaːʔuukum fij dˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶn mubijnin laaː tasubbuwhaaː faʔiinnahaaː ʕammarat bilaaːda aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː faʕaaːʃa fijhaaː ʕibaaːdu aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː ʔanaː ʔaːsf wlkn hðaː lm jʕd mtaːħaːan qum bzjaːrtnaː ʁdaːan hl sbq lk ʔan rʔajt smka qrʃ jzjd tˤwlˤhaʶː ʕn θlaːθa ʔamtaːr nħn fj aːlχrjf aːlʔaːn waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ ðaːt aʶːlˤsˤdʕ hl ʔant mtzwd͡ʒa faʔiiðaaː nazala bisaaːħatihim fasaaːʔa fχwr wʔiðaː msh aːlχjr mnwʕaː mfaːqmaː bðlk aːlmsaːfa aːltj jd͡ʒb ʔan jqtˤʕhaʶː aːlfwtwn lˤjsˤlˤ ʔiljnaː ʔinhu mzʕd͡ʒ ʔaraː tˤaʶːʔiʶrˤaʶːaʶn ʕlaː aːlʃd͡ʒra waaːlssaqfi aːlmarfuwʕi χajrun min ʔaalfin fij kutubik faʔiiðaaː qaraʔata aːlqurʔaːna faaːstaʕið biaːlllahi mina aʶːlˤʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːniʶ aːlrrad͡ʒijmi waqad qaaːla aːlkindijju aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶdiʶjquʶ ʔinsaaːnun huwa ʔaanta ʔillaaː ʔaannahu ʁajruk waʃubaaaːnuhaaː qaːlwaː ʔard͡ʒh wʔaχaːh waːbʕθ fj aːlmdaːʔin ħaːʃrjn waqaaːla ʕalijjun karrama aːlllahu wad͡ʒhahu liaːbnihi aːlħasani aʶːsˤbʕj aʶːlˤsˤʁjrˤ mtwrm ʕalaaː waʶaʶːsˤiʶlˤiʶhaʶaʶː faqaaːla taʕaaːlaaː ʔaraːd twm aːstdʕaːʔ aʶːlˤʃrˤtˤaʶ wlkn maːrj lm tsmħ lh ʔauχtj tˤaʶːbiʶʕaʶ d͡ʒjda d͡ʒdaːan bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi sabbiħi aːsma rabbika aːlʔaaʕlaaː ʔiinnaka majjitun waʔiinnahum majjituwna qad χalat min qablikum sunanun fasijruwaː fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ faʶaʶːnðˤuʶrˤuʶwaʶː kajfa kaaːna ʕaaːqibaau aːlmukaððibijna aːlraːʔiħa mn mmjzaːt aːlθwm waːtbʕ maː jwħaː ʔiljk stqwm bðlk ʔin dfʕt lhaː aːlθmn hl tʕlm km aːlwqt aːlʔan fj bwstˤn lhðh aʶːlˤqsˤsˤaʶ nhaːja ħzjna sʔaʶtˤlˤq aːlnaːr ʕljh ʔanti laː jmknki tħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja hl jmknki ʔanta qd laː turjd fiʕl ðlk laː trjdjn aːlχrwd͡ʒ mʕj aːlljla ðhb ħsn ʔilaː aːlmdrsa stuχtbr braːʔth fj aːlwqt aːlmnaːsb wqaːlt lʔaχth qsˤjh fbsˤrˤt bh ʕn d͡ʒnb whm laː jʃʕrwn wʔinj mrsla ʔiljhm bhdja fnaʶːðˤrˤaʶ bm jrd͡ʒʕ aːlmrslwn fij ðalika kufranaː liniʕmatihi ʔajmknk mlˤaʶːħðˤaʶ aːlfrq lqd ʔarsltu ʔiljka brjdaːan ʔilktrwnjaːan laː faːʔida mn mħaːwla ħl hðh aːlmsʔala laːjmkn ʔan tħkm ʕljh mn mðˤhrˤh laː tbqj wlaː tðr wmaː aːlktaːb mθjraːan fmaːlʔiwn mnhaː aʶːlˤbtˤwn fkðb wʕsˤaʶː walaaː ʔaanaaː ʕaaːbidun maaː ʕabadtum ʔin aːlqaːʔima kmaː jlj wslaːm ʕlaː aːlmrsljn maaː baaːluk takrahu aːlwalada faqaaːla qul ʔaaðalika χajrun ʔaam d͡ʒannaau aːlχuldi aːllatij wuʕida aːlmuttaquwna kaaːnat lahum d͡ʒazaaːʔan waʶmaʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶnaʶː ʔawʔamn ʔahl aːlqraː ʔan jʔatjhm bʔasnaː dˤħaʶː whm jlʕbwn lm tkn fj aːlmzaːd͡ʒ aːlmnaːsb llktb aːld͡ʒaːda hðaː hw aːlfrq bjnj wbjnk fatanaaːzaʕuwaː ʔaamrahum bajnahum waʔaasarruwaː aːlnnad͡ʒwaaː wamin ʔaasbaaːbi aʶːlˤttaʶqsˤiʶjrˤiʶ ʔaʶaʶjdˤaʶnaʶː ʔaan jaʁfula ʕan aːlttaʕalumi fij aʶːlˤsˤsˤiʶʁaʶrˤiʶ ln ʔatwqqf ʕn aːlbħθ ħttaː ʔad͡ʒd twm rʃʃt maːrj wd͡ʒh twm baːlmaːʔ qaːl lm ʔakn lʔasd͡ʒd lbʃr χlqth mn sˤlˤsˤaʶːlˤ mn ħmʔi msnwn ðhb aːlwld wbʕd mda ʕaːd wlm jʃtraː ʃjʔiaːan ʔanaː χaːʔifh d͡ʒdaːan mn aːlðhaːb ʔilaː hnaːk bmfrdj ql lj ʔaj nwʕ mn aːlχbz trjd ʔaklh mn fdˤlˤk ʁaːdr ħaːlaːan man rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ biʶsˤuʶħbaʶaʶiʶ man laaː χajra fijhi lam jaʶrˤdˤaʶ biʶsˤuʶħbaʶtiʶhiʶ man fijhi χajrun waħaddaθa aːlħasanu aʶːlˤbaʶsˤrˤiʶjjuʶ biħadijθin faqaaːla lahu rad͡ʒulun hl ʔanaː fuzt bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi qul ʔaaʕuwðu birabbi aːlnnaaːsi lmn hðh aʶːlˤmðˤlˤaʶ wʔin rbk hw jħʃrhm ʔinh ħkjm ʕljm ʔanaː mn zaːmbjaː knaː d͡ʒmjʕanaː nʃk fjh aːχtft draːd͡ʒtj ʔama tbnj bʕzm laː jljn ʕfwaːan bdwn aːlwsaːbj mn fdˤlˤk waqaaːla wahbu bnu munabbihin ʔanaː ʔabħθ ʕn aːlʔad͡ʒbaːn qaːla maaː aːlmasʔuuwlu ʕanhaː biʔaaʕlama mina aːlssaaːʔiili ʔant laː tnsˤt faʔiin aːstadaaːma aːlssababu daaːmat aːlʔaulfaau qaːl rb aːʃrħ lj sˤdrˤj θm ʔaχðt aːlðjn kfrwaː fkjf kaːn nkjr km mn mra ðhbt mn aːld͡ʒna waːlnaːs ʔinh jʃm raːʔiħa aːlħsaːʔ llðjn jʔulwn mn nsaːʔihm trˤbsˤ ʔarbʕa ʔaʃhr fʔin faːʔwaː fʔin aːllh ʁfwr rħjm kl maː kaːn jrjdh twm ħqaːan kaːn kʔasaːan mn aːlmaːʔ ʔanaː qlq bʃʔan ntjd͡ʒa tħljl aːldm wʔin kaːnwaː ljqwlwn mnnaːd smjn tˤwkjw hj qrja kbjra klaː bl tħbwn aːlʕaːd͡ʒla fanad͡ʒd͡ʒajnaaːhu waʔaahlahu ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna aːlħjaːa aːlrjfja hj aːlʔakθr hdwʔanan mqaːrnaan bħjaːa aːlmdjna fltkn jaː ʕmaːn nħnu mn ʕhdi aːlnbj ʔaaħaduhumaaː ʔauχuwwaaun muktasabaaun biaːliaːttifaaːqi aːld͡ʒaaːrij mad͡ʒraaː aʶːlˤiʶaʶːdˤtˤiʶrˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶ flmaː qdˤaʶːh bʕd sta ʔaʃhr qdˤaʶːh drhmjn wθlaːθ ħbaːt ʃʕjr mn zrʕ ħsˤd qaːl fmaː χtˤbkm ʔajhaː aːlmrslwn ʔin lkm fjh lmaː tχjrwn ʔin ʃaːʔ aːllh sunnaaa man qad ʔaarsalnaaː qablaka min rusulinaaː walaaː tad͡ʒidu lisunnatinaaː taħwijlanaː wkaːn jʔamr ʔahlh baʶːlˤsˤlˤaʶːaʶ waːlzkaːa wkaːn ʕnd rbh mrˤdˤjaʶː waʔiiðaaː quriʔia aːlqurʔaːnu faaːstamiʕuwaː lahu waʶʔaʶaʶnsˤiʶtuʶwaʶː laʕallakum turħamuwna fʔin twlwaː fʔin aːllh ʕljm baːlmfsdjn faqalla bihaðaaː aːlttaʕlijli ʔiχwaaːnu ʔaahli aʶːlˤfaʶdˤlˤiʶ liqillatihim ħkm ʕljh aʶːlˤqaʶːdˤj baːlʔiʕdaːm lnʕud qbl ʔan tuʶmtˤrˤ kjf tʕrfnj sʔal naːθaːnjjl ʔiinnahu fakkara waqaddara ʔaraːd twm mʕrfa maː ʔin kaːn limaːrj ħbjb wʔiðaː mrˤdˤt fhw jʃfjn ʔanaː ʔaħb aːllʁa aːlʔind͡ʒljzja ʔakθr mn aʶːlˤrˤjaʶːdˤjaʶːt waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi laː ʔaʶtˤjq aʶːlˤsˤbrˤ ħtaː ʔaraː aːlnsχa aːld͡ʒdjda mn ttwjbaː nʕm aːlmʔuaddibu aːldhr laː jʔatjh aʶːlˤbaʶːtˤlˤ mn bjn jdjh wlaː mn χlfh tnzjl mn ħkjm ħmjd ʔanaː nsjt aːsm ʔaχwk maː aːsmuhu wataaːlllahi laʔaakijdanna ʔaʶaʶsˤnaʶaʶːmaʶkuʶm baʕda ʔaan tuwalluwaː mudbirijna laː ʔaurjd ʔan ʔatħdθ ʕnhaː lqd tðˤaʶːhrˤ ʔanh laː jsmʕnj ʔaʶfdˤlˤ ħaːljaː qraːʔa ktb aːlmsaːʕda aːlðaːtja waʔiimmaaː ʔaan jakuwna liʕillaain fij aːlssaaːmiʕi aːlmustaχrid͡ʒi ʔam jqwlwn aːftraːh ql ʔin aːftrjth fʕlj ʔid͡ʒraːmj wʔanaː brjʔ mmaː td͡ʒrmwn wamaaː ʔaadraaːka maaː aːlʕaqabaau liman ʃaaːʔ minkum ʔaan jataqaddama ʔaaw jataʔaaχχara aːlʕljm ʔinmaː ntˤʕmkm lwd͡ʒh aːllh laː nrjd mnkm d͡ʒzaːʔ wlaː ʃkwraː waʔaanna ʔidraaːkahu badijʕun muʕd͡ʒizun aːnt laː tħbnj waʶsˤuʶħbaʶaʶuʶ aːlʔaaħmaqi ʃuʔumun wahaðihi aːlʔaumuwru laaː juʶwsˤaʶlˤuʶ biʁajri aːlddijni ʔilajhaaː walaaː jaʶsˤlˤuʶħuʶ aːlnnaaːsu ʔillaaː ʕalajhaaː klaː waːlqmr waːtrk aːlbħr rhwaː ʔinhm d͡ʒnd mʁrqwn wabiħasabi wufuwrihaaː fijhi jad͡ʒibu ʔaan jakuwna aːlmajlu ʔilajhi waaːlθθiqaau bihi ljtmknwaː mn aːlaːχtjaːr bʃkl sˤħjħ ʔaaw juħibbu aːliaːttisaaːma biaːlʃʃahaaːdaai fajataʕallamu kitaaːba aːlʃʃahaaːdaaːti faʶjaʶsˤiʶjrˤuʶ mawsuwmanaː bid͡ʒahli maaː juʕaaːnij faʔaːmanuwaː famattaʕnaaːhum ʔiilaaː ħijnin ʔanaː ħtaː laː ʔaʕrf maː ðlk fijhinna χajraaːtun ħisaaːnun lm jsttˤʕ aːltʁlb ʕlaː aːlrʁba fj sjd͡ʒaːrain ʔaχraː aːlrd͡ʒaːʔ ftħ ħqjbtk waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ waχaaːfuwni ʔiin kuntum muʔuminijna d͡ʒahannama jaʶsˤlˤaʶwnaʶhaʶaʶː wabiʔisa aːlqaraaːru bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi ʔiiðaaː aːlssamaaːʔu aːnʃaqqat surrt blqaːʔik rbmaː ħtaː aːlħqjqa tχaːf mʕlmaːan ðlk aʶːlˤmsˤnʕ jntd͡ʒ aːlʔalʕaːb lˤlˤħsˤwlˤ ʕlaː hðh aːld͡ʒml nħtaːd͡ʒ aːlaː mʃaːrka aːlkθjr mn aʶːlˤmttˤwʕjn qaːm bqfza χtˤjrˤaʶ laʔaantum ʔaaʃaddu rahbaaan fij sˤuʶduʶwrˤiʶhiʶm mina aːlllahi ðalika biʔaannahum qawmun laaː jafqahuwna qaːl ʔinmaː aːlʕlm ʕnd aːllh wʔablʁkm maː ʔarslt bh wlknj ʔaraːkm qwmaː td͡ʒhlwn laaː tasmaʕu fijhaaː laaːʁijaaan ʔaʶmdˤaʶː saːmj tfwjdˤaʶː jmnħ fjh aːlħqq ljlaː kj tsħb aːlmaːl mn ħsaːbaːth ʔaaħaduhumaaː ʔaanna aːlʕaðaaːba aːllaðij huwa min fawqihim ʔaumaraaːʔu aːlssuwʔi θm ʃqqnaː aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ ʃqaː hl lħqt baʶːlˤqtˤaʶːrˤ waaːlmaaːniʕu min fahmihi huwa ʕalaaː maaː ðakarnaaː min ʔaaqsaaːmihi waminhu maaː kaaːna mustawdaʕanaː biʶaʶːlˤχaʶtˤtˤiʶ sbbt aːlʔaχbaːr aːlkθjr mn aːlaːrtbaːk w lmn jsttˤjʕ rbʕ saːʕa jwmjaː fhðaː ʔaʶfdˤlˤ w ʔaʶfdˤlˤ faʔiin tawallawaː faqul ʔaːðantukum ʕalaaː sawaaːʔin waʔiin ʔaadrij ʔaaqarijbun ʔaam baʕijdun maaː tuwʕaduwna waqismun mawluwduwna wakaðalika nuwallij baʶʕdˤaʶ aʶːlˤðˤðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ baʶʕdˤaʶnaʶː bimaaː aːlmaʃʔaamaai ʕndj ʕml ʔaːχr aːlʔaːn ʔiðhb ʔilaː hnaːk aːlʔaːn faqad jataʕallaqu bimaaː maʶdˤaʶaʶː min aːlʔaasbaaːbi aːlθθalaaːθaai watanqasimu ʔaaqsaaːmanaː θalaaːθaaan waθijaːbaka faʶtˤaʶhhiʶrˤ liʔaanna ħaaːd͡ʒaaa aːlʔiinsaaːni laaːzimaaun laaː juʕarraaː minhaaː baʃarun waʔaantum ħjnaʔiiðin taʶnðˤuʶrˤwnaʶ wad͡ʒazaːʔu sajjiʔiaain sajjiʔiaaun miθluhaː faman ʕafaː waʶʔaʶaʶsˤlˤaʶħaʶ faʔaad͡ʒruhu aʶːlˤfuʶrˤsˤaʶaʶiʶ bihaaː faʶjaʶdˤaʶʕuʶhaʶaʶː ħajθu takuwnu lahu ðuχranaː muʕaddanaː waʁanamanaː mustad͡ʒaddanaː wamaː huwa ʕalaaː aːlʁajbi biʶdˤaʶnjniʶn lm jsmʕ saːmj mn ljlaː waʔaammaaː aːlssaːʔiila falaː tanhar faaːlʕaaːqilu laaː jastaʁnij waʔiin sˤaʶħħaʶt ʁarijzatuhu ʔinna aːlkalaaːma jaʁurru aːlqawma d͡ʒilwatuhu ħattaaː jalid͡ʒd͡ʒa bihi ʕijjun waʔiikθaaːru waʔaammaaː aʶːlˤʃʃaʶrˤtˤuʶ wakaaːna juqaaːlu jkrh saːmj ðlk aːlmdrrs kaːnt mʃʁwla bʔaʕmaːl aːlbjt kaːn saːmj jʕlm ʔann ljlaː kaːnt fj χtˤrˤ θumma jaʕqubuhu aːlʔiind͡ʒaaːzu fiʕlanaː fajaʔuuwlu ʔilaaː suwʔi χuluqin jaʶχuʶsˤsˤuʶhuʶ duwna ʁajrihi smʕ saːmj sˤrˤjrˤaʶː laaː jaʃkuru aːlllaha man laaː jaʃkuru aːlnnaaːsa walaː jaʔatwnaka bimaθalin ʔiillaː d͡ʒiʔinaːka biaːlħaqqi waʔaaħsana tafsjranaː ʔiinna hʔuulaːʔi laʃirðimaaun qaljlwna ʔaan jaʕlama ʔaanna aːlnniʕama zaaːʔiiraaun ln jstmrr saːmj fj tmwjl ʕlaːd͡ʒ ljlaː tħfðˤ aːlθlaːd͡ʒa aːlʔakl mn aːlfsaːd jmdˤj saːmj kll wqth w hw jbððr aːlmaːl aːlħjaːa ljst ʔabdaː bhðh aʶːlˤbsaʶːtˤaʶ twm kaːn wħdh fj aːlmnzl famaː wad͡ʒadnaː fjhaː ʁajra bajtin mina aːlmuslimjna waaːlmalaqu ðullun waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlkarijmu man ʔamaːzlti tuħbbjnh faqad qijla laaː budda lˤiʶlˤmaʶsˤduʶwrˤiʶ ʔaan janfuθa ʔaaw ðˤuʶhuʶwrˤuʶ aːlħud͡ʒd͡ʒaai fij sˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːħiʶhiʶ ʔaajaħsabu ʔaan lam jarahu ʔaaħadun ʔaktm mn aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ ʔiinnj lakum raswlun ʔaamjnun nsj saːmj nðˤðˤaʶːrˤaʶːth fj ʁrfa aːlfndq mtʔakkd mn ʔannaː snd͡ʒd ħllaː faʔaaχaðahu aːlχalijlu waaːlqurʔaːni aːlħakjmi ʔajn jmknnj aʶːlˤħsˤwlˤ ʕlaː mʕdaːt aʶːlˤsˤjd bsʕr d͡ʒjd ʔaːml ðlk ʔaʕd͡ʒbth tlk waʶtˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶ ðalika bihim faaːʃtaʁala aːlrrid͡ʒaaːlu biaːlrrid͡ʒaaːli waaːlnnisaaːʔu biaːlnnisaaːʔi aʶːlˤmaʶrˤiʶjdˤuʶ mutaʔaallimun lm tsʔal kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jħdˤrˤaʶːn ðlk aːlddrs mʕaː waqijla lirad͡ʒulin min ʕabsin kitaːbun fuʶsˤsˤiʶlˤaʶt ʔaːjaːtuhu qurʔaːnanaː ʕarabijjanaː liqawmin jaʕlamwna lqd ʔaʃfjnaːh ʔaʶaʶqrˤiʶdˤhuʶm min ʕaʶrˤdˤiʶk lijawmi faaːqatik waliðalika qaaːla ʕalijju bnu ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶn rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu kaʔaanna aːlkitaaːba ʔaustaaːðun aːlħajaaːʔu waaːlʕijju ʃuʕbataaːni min aːlʔiijmaaːni kaːn saːmj jʕjʃ ħjaːa saːħra ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ msaːʕdtk ʔarsl lk saːmj rsaːla ʔaaw aːlnnamijmaau ʔin kaaːna mustawdaʕanaː ʔajn aːlħmmaːm kaððabat ʕaːdun fakajfa kaːna ʕaðaːbj wanuðuri waqijla lizaaːhidin lm ʔakllm ʔaħdaː waqalbun haaːʔiimun ʔiin huwa ʔiillaː ðikrun lilʕaːlamjna fakaððabwhu faʔaahlaknaːhum ʔiinna fj ðlika laʔaːjaaan wamaː kaːna ʔaakθaruhum muʔuminjna waʔaammaaː aːlmusaaːmaħaau fij aːlʔaamwaaːli fatatanawwaʕu θalaaːθaaa ʔaanwaaːʕin aːntht ʕlaːqa saːmj w ljlaː bʃkl kaːrθjj ʔiðaaː ʁaʶdˤiʶbaʶ aːlzwaːd͡ʒ hw ʔiltzaːm lmdaː aːlħjaːa ʔaʶsˤbt baːlbrd kaːn saːmj mslmaː ʕaːdjjaː ʔinna ruwħa aːlqudusi nafaθa fij rawʕij ʔaanna nafsanaː lan tamuwta ħattaaː tastawfija rizqahaaː waqaːlwaː rabbanaː ʕad͡ʒd͡ʒil lanaː qiʶtˤtˤaʶnaʶː qabla jawmi aːlħisaːbi lm jkn saːmj mslmaː ʔaan taqdira ʕalaaː aːlmaʕruwfi walaaː taʶsˤtˤaʶniʶʕuʶhuʶ ħattaaː jafuwta twd͡ʒd͡ʒh saːmj nħw aːlbaːb w qrʕ mrrtjn kullu man ʕalajhaː faːnin d͡ʒf aːlbʔir dufʕt ljlaː ʔilaː aːld͡ʒdaːr waqaaːla rad͡ʒulun liʕumara rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu χadamak banuwk flaːn qd rkb aːlfjl wqaːl laː tbsˤrˤwnj d͡ʒaːʔ frjd bn ʕmaːd ʔiinna ʕaðaːba rabbihim ʁajru maʔamwnin waaːlʃʃud͡ʒaaːʕu ʔillaaː fij aːlħarbi faʔiin saraaː summuhu zaaːla ʕanhu ʁammuhu mllt waʔaakθaru aːlχajri maʕa ʔaakθari aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶwsaʶaʶːtˤiʶ ʔiin tad͡ʒlis fij mad͡ʒraaː aːlhawaaːʔi taʶmrˤaʶdˤ juħibbu aːlttanaqula fij aʶːlˤmaʶtˤlˤuʶwbiʶ ʔinnahu aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶbrˤuʶ aːllaðij laaː ʃakwaaː fijhi walaaː baθθa tad͡ʒrj biʔaaʕjuninaː d͡ʒazaːʔan liman kaːna kufira hnaːk naːfwra maːʔ llʃrb qrb mlʕb aːltns laː nsrd aʶːlˤtˤrˤaʶːʔiʶf fj aːld͡ʒnaːʔiz wlaː ndˤħk lm nʕd nʕjʃ fj aʶːlˤʕsˤrˤ aːlħd͡ʒrj faʔatijaː firʕawna faqwlaː bnu sˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħiʶn liaːbnihi wakaaːna aːlmutaʕallimu faʶtˤiʶnaʶnaʶː ðakijjanaː ʕaːmilaaun naʶːsˤiʶbaʶaʶuʶn watawahhamuwaː ʔaanna maaː tamijlu ʔilajhi nufuwsuhum min aːlʔaamwaaːli aːlmuqtanaaːai ʕalajhi wasallama ʔaannahu qaaːla junaaːdij munaaːdin jawma aːlqijaaːmaai waħukija ʔaanna sulajmaaːna bna daaːwud ʕalajhimaaː aːlssalaaːmu fakun ʔaanta aːlmuʕtaðiru ʕanhu biʶsˤaʶfħiʶk waʶaʶːlˤmuʶtaʶnaʶsˤsˤiʶlˤuʶ lahu biʶfaʶdˤlˤiʶk waqaaːla ʕalijju bnu ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶn rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu liaːbnihi aːlħasani fij waʶsˤiʶjjaʶtiʶhiʶ lahu aːlʕaːql laː jstqbl aːlnʕma bbtˤrˤ wlaː jwdʕhaː bd͡ʒzʕ waaːlmubaððiru juʶχtˤiʶʔiʶuʶ fij aːld͡ʒahli ðˤlˤ jrˤkdˤ walaaː jaʕrif tˤuʶwlˤaʶnaʶː walaaː ʕaʶrˤdˤaʶnaʶː saːmj ʕljh aʶːlˤaʶːntðˤaʶːrˤ ʔakθr ʔaldjk btˤaʶːqaʶ ʔiʔitmaːn ʔaafaman nafsanaː bifiraaːqihi laː jrjd saːmj aːʕtnaːq aːlʔislaːm aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶrˤuʶ fawqa aːlʃʃad͡ʒaraai maː hw ʔaʶfdˤlˤ tˤʕaʶːmk aːlχfjf aːktʃf saːmj ʃjʔiaː mqlqaː aːstmʕ saːmj llttsd͡ʒjl w smʕ sˤwt aʶːttsˤaʶːlˤaʶː ʁrjbaː mn ʃχsˤ lm jtʕrrf ʕljh walakum fjhaː manaːfiʕu walitabluʁwaː ʕalajhaː ħaːd͡ʒaaan fj sˤuʶdwrˤiʶkuʶm waʕalajhaː waʕalaaː aːlfulki tuħmalwna tlqqt ljlaː ħkmaː baːlssd͡ʒn aːlmʔubbd hðaː maː twʕadwna lijawmi aːlħisaːbi aːlnnaaːsu kaʃad͡ʒaraain ðaaːti d͡ʒananaː wajuwʃiku ʔaan jaʕuwduwaː kaʃad͡ʒaraain ðaaːti ʃawkin ʔin naaːqadtahum naaːqaduwka hl ʔanti aːbna saːmj waħukija ʔaanna muʕaaːwijaaa rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu saʔaala ʕumara ʕan aːlmuruwʔaai faqaaːla wamin ʔaːjaːtihi manaːmukum biaːlllajli waaːlnnahaːri waaːbtiʁaːʔuukum min faʶdˤlˤiʶhiʶ ʔiinna fj ðlika laʔaːjaːtin ʕn ħbh ln ʔaχsr kaððabat θamwdu waʕaːdun biaːlqaːriʕaai waqad qijla aːlʕad͡ʒabu liʁaflaai aːlħussaaːdi ʕan salaaːmaai aːlʔaad͡ʒsaaːdi kaːn saːmj ʕlaː χtˤʔaʶ saːmj ħqqaː ʔaħmq kθra aːlʕtaːb tfrq ʕan ðikri rabbij jaʕnij aːlmaaːla hl ʔant mtʔakkd mn ʔannnaː lm ntqaːbl qbl aːljwm sʔaðhb lˤaʶːsˤtˤħaʶːb saːmj mn mnzl ljlaː faʔaammaaː ʔiðaaː kaaːna aːlbaðlu waʶaʶːlˤʕaʶtˤaʶaʶːʔuʶ ʕan suʔuaaːlin faʶʃuʶrˤuʶwtˤuʶhuʶ muʕtabaraaun min wad͡ʒhajni wamaʕnaaː qawlihi sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama muhraaun maʔamuwraaun ʔaaj kaθijraau aːlnnasli faʔiin ʔaaʁnathu aːliaːstiʕaaːnaau biaːld͡ʒaaːhi ʕan aːliaːstiʕaaːnaai biaːlmaaːli fasalaːmun laka min ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbiʶ aːljamjni sʔalt aʶːlˤmmrˤrˤdˤaʶːt aːlʔaχrjaːt lknnhn lm jtmkkn mn ʔijd͡ʒaːdhaː qaːla naʕam waʔiinnakum ʔiiðanaː lamina aːlmuqarrabjna faʔiinnamaː hija zad͡ʒraaun waːħidaaun faʔiiðaː hum jaʶnðˤuʶrˤwnaʶ wajaʕbudwna min dwni aːlllahi maː laː janfaʕuhum walaː jaʶdˤuʶrˤrˤuʶhuʶm wakaːna aːlkaːfiru ʕalaː rabbihi ðˤaʶhjrˤaʶnaʶː waʔiið qad waʶdˤaʶħaʶ aːlqawlu fij ʔaasbaaːbi aːlmawaaːddi wad͡ʒihaaːti aːlkasbi waruwija ʕan ʕalijji bni ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶn karrama aːlllahu wad͡ʒhahu ʔaannahu qaaːla aːntqlwaː ʔilaː hnaː man kaaːna lahu bajtun waχaaːdimun fahuwa malikun aːlrʔuaː qd tdfʕnj lld͡ʒnwn rakiba ʔiibraaːhijmu aʶːlˤħiʶsˤaʶaʶːnaʶ kaːn saːmj fj sˤffj liʔaannahaaː qad tamnaʕu man faʕala maaː kaaːna mustakrahanaː aːlfaqri waʶbaʶtˤrˤiʶ aːlʁanijji aːllaðij balaʁa maaː laaː jabluʁuhu sˤaʶrˤiʶjħuʶ aːlssuʔuaaːli waman aːltamasa aːld͡ʒazaaːʔa biaːlrrijaaːʔi aːltamasa maaː laaː jakuwnu ʔaχð saːmj ljlaː ʔilaː aːlʕjaːda liʔaanna aːlkufra aʶːlˤttaʶʁtˤiʶjaʶaʶuʶ maː mstwaːk fj aːllʁa aːlʕrbja wabihi nazala aːlkitaaːbu wad͡ʒaaːʔat aːlssunaau waʁanaaːʔiimi ʔimkaaːnihi nħn nsaːmħ aːlχjaːna lkn laː nnsaːhaː walaʔiin tuʶsˤiʶbkaʶ muʶsˤiʶjbaʶaʶuʶn faʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ lahaaː ʕaʶðˤuʶmaʶt muʶsˤiʶjbaʶaʶuʶ mubtalin laaː jaʶsˤbiʶrˤuʶ waqaaːla ʔaːχaru waaːstuʕd͡ʒima d͡ʒawaaːbuhu falam jud͡ʒibhum maːðaː nsjt walaaː sabijla ʔilaaː ʔiʶtˤrˤaʶaʶːħiʶhiʶ wamutaaːrakatihi lm jrd saːmj qdˤaʶːʔ wqt fj aːlssd͡ʒn waʔiibraːhjma ʔiið qaːla liqawmihi aːʕbuduwaː aːlllaha waaːttaqwhu ðlikum χajrun lakum ʔiin kuntum taʕlamwna jħbb saːmj aːlqjaːm bhðaː dχl aːlmdrrs ʔilaː aːlqsm walajsa bisababin ʔaan jafʕala ðalika liʁajri maaː sababin waʔiinnamaaː hija sad͡ʒijjaaun qad fuʶtˤiʶrˤaʶ ʕalajhaaː kaːn saːmj jsbħ fj msbħh waʔaanʃadt liʔaabij aːlfatħi aːlbustijji waʔaːχiruhaaː χizjun jawma aːlqijaaːmaai waʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ ʕalaaː maaː ʔaʶaʶsˤaʶaʶːbaʶk ʔinna ðalika min ʕazmi aːlʔaumuwri tqwl ʁraːʔib laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔafhm wajuqaaːbila dawaaːʕija ʃirratihi biħazmihi fajarudduhaaː d͡ʒazaːʔan wifaːqanaː ʔiðaaː maaː kunta ðaaː bawlin sˤaʶħiʶjħiʶn ʔaalaaː faʶaʶːdˤrˤiʶb bihi wad͡ʒha aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶbiʶjbiʶ waliðalika ʕillataaːni ʔaʶsˤnʕ mn dwd aːlqz twm ljs mtsaːmħaː mθlj lijakuwna lahaaː tˤaʶʕmuʶn ʕinda aʶːlˤmuʶsˤtˤaʶnaʶʕiʶ ʔilajhi waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi aːlmaχðuwlu man kaaːnat lahu ʔilaaː aːllliʔiaaːmi ħaaːd͡ʒaaun mn χrd͡ʒ mn daːrh qll miqdaːrh faman ʁallaba ʕaqlahu ʕalaaː ʃahwatihi fahuwa χajrun min aːlmalaaːʔiikaai laː tns ʔan tbʕθ aːlrrsaːʔil faaːqatij ʔilaaː kalaaːmikum aʶːlˤħiʶsˤaʶaʶːnuʶ jad͡ʒurru aːlʕarabaaa wad͡ʒaʕalnaːhum ʔaaʔiimmaaan jadʕwna ʔiilaaː aːlnnaːri wajawma aːlqijaːmaai laː juʶnsˤaʶrˤwnaʶ faʔiinna ʔirsaaːla aːlqawli aːχtijaaːrun χaːlidjna fjhaː ħasunat mustaqarranaː makaːnin qarjbin qrrr saːmj ʔan jʁaːdr sˤffh ʔaθananr aʶːlˤʔiʶdˤrˤaʶːb ʕlaː aʶːqtsˤaʶːd aːlblaːd aːlnsaːʔ waːlzd͡ʒaːd͡ʒ daːʔimaːan fj χtˤrˤ kaːnt ljlaː trjd maːl saːmj lkn lm tkn trjdh hw aʶːstaʶsˤʁaʶrˤaʶhuʶ man huwa ʔaʶaʶsˤʁaʶrˤuʶ waħaqqarahu man huwa ʔaaqallu waʔaaħqaru faʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ ʔiinna waʕda aːlllahi ħaqqun faʔiimmaː nurijannaka baʶʕdˤaʶ aːllaðj naʕiduhum ʔaaw natawaffajanaka faʔiilajnaː jurd͡ʒaʕwna kaːnt tsχr mn zwd͡ʒhaː ʔiiðaː raʔaathum min makaːnin baʕjdin samiʕwaː lahaː taʶʁaʶjjuʶðˤaʶnaʶː wazafjranaː qul taʶrˤaʶbbaʶsˤwaʶː faʔiinnj maʕakum mina aʶːlˤmuʶtaʶrˤaʶbbiʶsˤjnaʶ waʔauhliku nafsij waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man saaːʔa χuluquhu dˤaʶaʶːqaʶ rizquhu wahakaðaaː aːlχaaːmisu waaːlssaaːdisu min haðihi aːlʔaasbaaːbi walaaː jusqimu nafsanaː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ lilmunʕimi biħaqqi niʕmatihi ʔaan laaː jaʶtaʶwaʶsˤsˤaʶlˤaʶ bihaaː ʔilaaː maʶʕsˤiʶjaʶtiʶhiʶ χð ħbtjn bʕd aːlʔakl ʔinn tˤlˤaʶːq saːmj sjkllfh aːlkθjr wataħðijruhaaː maaː ħaððara min maʶʕsˤiʶjaʶtiʶhiʶ aːħb ʔan aːkwn lwħdj fatakuwnu suruwranaː liman waʶsˤaʶlˤaʶthuʶ waħuznanaː liman faaːraqathu aːlʕlm kaːlsraːd͡ʒ mn mr bh aːqtbs mnh ʔaamarahu bimuʃaaːwaratihim lijastanna bihi aːlmuslimuwna wajatbaʕahu fijhaaː aːlmuʔuminuwna waʔiin kaaːna ʕan maʃuwratihim ʁanijjanaː waaːlʔaːχaru ʔinnamaaː huwa sˤiʶnaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶuʶ kaddin waʔaːlaau mihnaain waman ʔauʁfila taʔadijbuhu fij aʶːlˤsˤsˤiʶʁaʶrˤiʶ kaaːna taʔadijbuhu fij aːlkibari ʕasijranaː ʔaaddi aːlʔaamaaːnaaa ʔilaaː man aːʔitamanak walaaː taχun man χaaːnak ʕljj ʔan ʔatkllma mʕh baːʕ krmh waːʃtraː mʕsˤrˤaʶ aːstdaːr aːlmdrrs ħmmaːmk d͡ʒaːhz ʔaχð saːmj ljlaː ʔilaː ʕjaːda χaʶːsˤsˤaʶ ʔajn ttnaːwl aːlʁðaːʔ ʔawdd ʔan ʔaðhb mʕkmaː ʔin mʕ aːljwm ʁdaː jaː msʕda laː bd ʔanh mn aːld͡ʒnwb dʕaː saːmj llrrb kj jsaːmħh hðh frˤsˤtkiʶ ltd͡ʒrba hðaː smʕ aːlmdrrs maː qlh saːmj sˤdfaʶ ʔijjaːk ʔan ttħrrk mn mkaːnk faʔiin sˤaʶbaʶrˤaʶ tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶʕaʶnaʶː waʔiillaaː aːħtamala hammaaː laaːzimanaː waʶsˤaʶbaʶrˤaʶ kaaːrihanaː ʔaːθimanaː wakaffuhu ʕan musaaːʕadatihaaː waman kaaːnat wilaaːjatuhu duwna qudraain taʶwaʶaʶːdˤaʶʕaʶ lahaaː waman bariʔia min aːlkibri naaːla aːlkaraaːmaaa sʔalnj twm ʔin knt ʔaʕrf ʔajn kaːnt tʕjʃ maːrj aːibqa haːdʔiaːan ʕnd ʃrħ aːldrs waʶʔiʶiʶðˤhaʶaʶːrˤiʶ aːlbaðaaːʔi waʔiiðaː ʔaulqwaː minhaː makaːnanaː dˤaʶjjiʶqaʶnaʶː muqarranjna daʕawaː hunaːlika θubwranaː tatad͡ʒaːfaː d͡ʒunwbuhum ʕani aʶːlˤmaʶdˤaʶːd͡ʒiʶʕiʶ jadʕwna rabbahum χawfanaː waʶtˤaʶmaʶʕaʶnaʶː wamimmaː razaqnaːhum junfiqwna laː jhmm mn ʔajn ʔataː ʔaʶaʶjqaʶðˤaʶ aːlrraʕdu aːlnnaaːʔiima qaːbl saːmj mslmjn mn bldaːn mχtlfa ʔillaaː aːmtalaʔaat taraħanaː maʶħsˤuʶwrˤaʶnaʶː fij taqsijmin d͡ʒaaːmiʕin wahuwa janqasimu qismajni mrrnaː bsaːnt lwjs fj tˤrˤjqnaʶː ʔilaː njw ʔawrljnz ʔið lam jaʶħfaʶðˤ aːlħurmaaa wajastur aːlʕawraaa maː lakum laː taʶntˤiʶqwnaʶ waaːlssaqfi aːlmarfwʕi maaː jasuddu d͡ʒawʕatak waqifwhum ʔiinnahum masʔiwlwna maaː ʔaamara aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː biʃajʔin ʔillaaː waʔaaʕaaːna ʕalajhi θumma taħawwalnaaː ʕanhaaː ʔilaaː ʔauχraaː faqallat fijhaaː ʔaamwaaːlunaaː aːlʔaadabu wasijlaaun ʔilaaː kulli faʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶiʶn ʔaannahu lam jansa walakinnahu maʶʕaʶaʶːrˤiʶjdˤuʶ aːlkalaaːmi waqad dˤaʶrˤaʶbaʶ aːlʃʃaaːʕiru bihi maθalanaː qaaːla hðaː ktaːbj wamaaː qadaħa fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶʕrˤaʶaʶːdˤiʶ min aːlkalaaːmi nawʕaaːni ʔiinnahumaː min ʕibaːdinaaː aːlmuʔuminjna ðhbt ljlaː llmdrsa kj tsˤbħ mmrˤrˤdˤaʶ ðaːt ʃhaːda waʔiiðaaː aːustuʕinta faʔaaʕin waaːnʃaqqati aːlssamaːʔu fahija jawmaʔiiðin waːhijaaun χajru aːlʔaumuwri ʔaʶaʶwsaʶaʶːtˤuʶhaʶaʶː ʔarslt aːlʕjaːda faːtwra ʔaχraː klmaː kθr aːlðbaːb haːn qtlh ʔiðaː knt tdrj ftlk msˤjbaʶ wʔin knt laː tdrj faʶːlˤmsˤjbaʶ ʔaʶʕðˤm jd͡ʒb ʔan jtmm ʔiχlaːʔ aːlʕjaːda hamalanaː ʔaaw sudanaː lm tqbl aʶːlˤʃʃrˤtˤaʶ blaːʁ aʶːlˤʃʃχsˤ aːlmfqwd aːlðj qddmh saːmj maaː ʔaʶaʶsˤʕaʶbuʶ ʃajʔin ʕalaaː aːlʔiinsaaːni qaaːla aʶːlˤqiʶtˤtˤuʶ d͡ʒaaːʔiiʕun ruddwhaː ʕalajja faʶtˤaʶfiʶqaʶ masħanaː biaːlsswqi waaːlʔaaʕnaːqi bʔis aːlʃʕaːr aːlħsd ʔanaː ʔaʶrˤkdˤ tbdw ktfaːħa ʔinn d͡ʒmaːl ljs qddjsaː baːlrrʁm mn ðlk ʔanaː ʔaθq bh ðalika limaʕrifaai aːlʕulamaaːʔi bimanfaʕaai aːlmaaːli wad͡ʒahli aːlʔaaʁnijaaːʔi lˤiʶfaʶdˤlˤiʶ aːlʕilmi lkaːn ʔamraː msljaː ʔauʕd͡ʒb saːmj bnmtˤ aːlħjaːa fj aːlrrjf liʔaanna nafʕa maaː siwaaː ʔaanasu bnu maaːlikin ʕan aːlnnabiji sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama ʔaannahu qaaːla limaaː fijhi min aːrtijaaːħi aːlnnafsi binajli ʃahawaaːtihaaː ʔaχð saːmj ljlaː mn aʶːlˤmtˤaʶːrˤ kaːn saːmj aːljawma ʔaajjuhaaː aːlmud͡ʒrimwna jaqraʔau saʕijdun aːlkitaaːba waʶʔaʶaʶsˤʕuʶbuʶ markabanaː faʔiin ʔaaʃkala ʕalajhi ʔaamraaːni aːd͡ʒtanib ʔaaħabbahumaaː ʔilajhi fakaːna ʕaːqibatahumaː ʔaannahumaː fij ʕalaaː ʃarijfin waʔaaqlaʕa ʕan saaːlifi zalalihi lijatimma lahu aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːħuʶ watastadijma lahu aːlssaʕaaːdaau ʔaʁlqaː aːlʔabwaːb w aːlnnwaːfð aːntqlj ʔilaː hnaː hl ʔant d͡ʒdjd hnaː ʔarjd ʔan ʔamwt waaːlʃʃuʕaraːʔu jattabiʕuhumu aːlʁaːwwna waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man kaθura ʃaʶtˤaʶtˤuʶhuʶ kaθura ʁaʶlˤaʶtˤuʶhuʶ qdˤaʶː saːmj maː tlaːhaː mn snwaːt jbnj ħjaːth aːltj kaːdt tnthj bsbb lraːmj kaːn saːmj jntðˤrˤ ljlaː dχlt ʔaχt saːmj aːlmstʃfaː ldjh aːld͡ʒnsjja aːlʔawkraːnjja warawaaː aːbnu masʕuwdin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu ʕan aːlnnabiji sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama faʔaanʃaʔaa jaquwlu jarbaħu aːlssaaːbiqu d͡ʒaaːʔiizaaan ʔaʶχtˤrˤ saːmj aʶːlˤʃʃrˤtˤaʶ aːn lm jkn aːlaːn mtaː aːstmr χtˤaʶːbh lθlaːθa saːʕaːt aːllaðj ʔaaħsana kulla ʃajʔin χalaqahu wabadaʔaa χalqa aːlʔiinsaːni min tˤjniʶn faʔaaχaðahu aːlllahu nakaːla aːlʔaːχiraai waaːlʔawlaː liʔaannahaaː maħbuwbaaun tad͡ʒuwru ʔidlaaːlanaː wataʁurru makranaː θumma kallaː sajaʕlamwna faʔaammaaː ʔiðaaː kaaːna aːlwaqtu muttasaʕanaː waaːlzzamaaːnu mumtaddanaː fataʕd͡ʒijlu aːlssuʔuaaːli luʔumun waʶquʶnuʶwtˤuʶn d͡ʒmʕt fjdjwhaːt mqaːlb saːmj aːlmlaːjjn mn aːlnnqraːt ʔiinnaː ʔaanzalnaːhu fj lajlaain mubaːrakaain ʔiinnaː kunnaː munðirjna waaːlllajli ʔiiðaː sad͡ʒaː waaːllaðjna ʔiiðaː ðukkirwaː biʔaːjaːti rabbihim lam jaχirrwaː ʕalajhaː sˤuʶmmaʶnaʶː waʕumjaːnanaː faqad taʕaddaaː ʕalaaː aːlddahri biʶʃaʶtˤaʶtˤiʶhiʶ fakaaːna haðaaː taʶfaʶdˤdˤuʶlˤaʶnaʶː minhu wataʔaallufanaː ʔaʶħdˤrˤ saːmj sˤdjqaʶ mʕh kaːnt ʕnd ljlaː ʕlba mχfwq ħljb bðwq aːlfrwla faʔiiðaaː aːχtaaːra waʔaard͡ʒuw ʔaan juwaffaqa liliaːχtijaaːri lndʕuhm ʔilaː aːlʕʃaːʔ waman faqada aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbaʶ fij aːlʔaaʃjaaːʔi aʶːlˤmuʶʁdˤiʶbaʶaʶiʶ ħattaaː aːstawat ħaaːlataaːhu qabla aʶːlˤʔiʶiʶʁdˤaʶaʶːbiʶ wabaʕdahu lahum maː jaʃaːʔwna ʕinda rabbihim ðlika d͡ʒazaːʔu aːlmuħsinjna sˤuʶħuʶfiʶ ʔiibraːhjma wamwsaː aʶːntˤaʶlˤiʶqwaʶː ʔiilaː maː kuntum bihi tukaððibwna kaːn zmjl saːmj fj aːlzznzaːna mslmaː samiʕtu aʶːlˤnnaʶsˤiʶjħaʶaʶaʶ walakin juχmiduhaaː ʔaan laaː tad͡ʒida ħaʶtˤaʶbaʶnaʶː jtħrkwn mn mkaːn ʔilaː ʔaːχr lma jħdθ hðaː θaːnjaan ʔiinna aːlmuttaqjna fj maqaːmin ʔaamjnin wdˤʕ aːlktaːb ʕlaː aːlrf limaaː fijhimaaː min ʔiʶsqaʶaʶːtˤiʶ aːlʃʃukri waʔiilaaː aːlχawfi min taʶsˤdiʶjqiʶ aːlttuhami ʔaaqraba aːlħikami kaθraau maaːli aːlmajjiti tuʕazzij waraθatahu ʕanhu aːlħiðaːʔu d͡ʒadijdu nsjt kll maː jtʕllq bdraːstj w ħlmj kj ʔaʶsˤbħ tˤbjbaʶː hðaː mʃrwʕ ħkwmj waːfqthaː aːlrʔaj saːmj ljs fj aːlʕjaːda wasababu ðalika maaː ðakarnaaː min kaθraai aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶsˤfiʶjaʶaʶːʔiʶ aːlmusʕidijna waqillaai aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔi aːlmud͡ʒħifijna ʔithmnaː aʶːlˤʃχsˤ aʶːlˤχtˤʔaʶ bʕmlja aːlqtl wajuksibuhu aːlmaθuwbaaa ʕanhaaː waaːlllahu d͡ʒaʕala lakumu aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ biʶsaʶːtˤaʶnaʶː hl tʕaːnj mn ʔalm fj aʶːlˤbtˤn ljs ðlk aʶːlˤqmjsˤ bl aːlʔaːχr waʔiinnamaaː aːstad͡ʒaaːza sˤuʶhaʶjbuʶn ʔaan juʶʕaʶrˤrˤiʶdˤaʶ lirasuwli aːlllahi sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama biaːlmazħi fij d͡ʒawaaːbihi jħsn saːmj aːlssbaːħa mθl ljlaː tqrjbaː wajufsiduwna fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ʔauwlaaːʔiika humu aːlχaaːsiruwna ʔinna aːlnnafsa laʔaammaaːraaun biaːlssuwʔi kaːn saːmj jtmttʕ baːlħjaːa waʔiiðaaː sˤaʶʁʁaʶrˤtaʶhuʶ ʕaʶðˤðˤaʶmtaʶhuʶ waaːʕlam ʔaanna biħasabi faʶdˤlˤiʶ aːlʔiinsaaːni waʶðˤuʶhuʶwrˤiʶ aːlnniʕmaai ʕalajhi jakuwnu ħasadu aːlnnaaːsi lahu watad͡ʒannabuwaː aːlkaðiba waʔiin raʔaajtum ʔaanna fijhi aːlnnad͡ʒaaːaa faʔiinna fijhi aːlhalakaaa sttzwwd͡ʒjn w stnd͡ʒbjn aːlkθjr ðlika ʔaamru aːlllahi ʔaanzalahu ʔiilajkum waman jattaqi aːlllaha jukaffir ʕanhu sajjiʔiaaːtihi waʶjuʶʕðˤiʶm lahu ʔaad͡ʒranaː wajarawnahu kaʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶdaʶaʶː ʔin radda sˤaʶwtaʶnaʶː lam jad͡ʒid nafʕanaː saːmj jħbb aːlqhwa faħaqqa ʕalajnaː qawlu rabbinaː ʔiinnaː laðaːʔiiqwna waʶːsˤlˤ saːmj aʶːlˤaʶːntðˤaʶːrˤ qul ʔiin kaaːnat lakumu aːlddaaːru aːlʔaːχiraau ʕinda aːlllahi χaʶaʶːlˤiʶsˤaʶaʶaʶn ʕan ʔaabij salamaaa lm jsmʕ saːmj ʔajj sˤwt sˤdrˤ mn tlk aːlχjma ʔaan juraaːʕija maχaaːrid͡ʒa kalaaːmihi biħasabi maʶqaʶaʶːsˤiʶdiʶhiʶ waʶʔaʶaʶʁrˤaʶaʶːdˤiʶhiʶ faʔiin kaaːna tarʁijbanaː qaranahu biaːlllijni waʶaʶːlˤlˤlˤuʶtˤfiʶ wabadaː lahum sajjiʔiaaːtu maː kasabwaː waħaːqa bihim maː kaːnwaː bihi jastahziʔiwna ðˤnn saːmj ʔann ljlaː kaːnt sttˤlˤq ʕljh aːlnnaːr kaːn saːmj jħbb aːlħjaːa aːld͡ʒjjda aːstuqbl χbr ħml ljlaː brdwd ʔafʕaːl mtbaːjna maː zaːlt qdmajj tʔulmaːnnj jaʕnij sajfa nafsihi ʔaʶħdˤrˤ saːmj aʶːlˤbjtˤrˤj tħsˤsˤlˤ faʶːdˤlˤ ʕlaː maː aːstħqqh tmaːmaː laː tns ʔidχaːl aːlklb kaːn ðlk aːlħml sbbaː fj tbaːʕd ljlaː w saːmj tˤaʶːlˤʕ saːmj ktbaː tˤbbjaʶ ħðˤ fj aːlsħaːb wʕql fj aːltraːb fajanbaʁij liðij aːlllubi aːlssawiji waaːlħazmi aːlqawijji ʔaan jatalaqqaaː quwwaaa aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ biħilmihi faʶjaʶsˤuʶddaʶhaʶaʶː ʔiðaaː dˤaʶħiʶkaʶ aːlʕaaːlimu dˤiʶħkaʶaʶaʶn mad͡ʒd͡ʒa min aːlʕilmi mad͡ʒd͡ʒaaan wazinwaː biʶaʶːlˤqiʶstˤaʶːsiʶ aːlmustaqjmi lm tqsˤd ʔajj ʔaðaː bid͡ʒamijlin jadʕuw ʔilaaː aʶːsˤtˤiʶfaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶhiʶ warubbamaaː ʔaʶaʶdˤd͡ʒaʶrˤaʶ qaaːriʔiahu wʔatbʕwaː fj hðh lʕna wjwm aːlqjaːma bʔis aːlrfd aːlmrfwd maː kaːn jd͡ʒb ʕlj ʔan ʔaθq btwm ʕljk ʔalaː tðhb nud͡ʒħu aːld͡ʒaaːhili waʔiikdaaːʔu aːlʕaaːqili hl jsttˤjʕ ʔan jraːnj liʔaanna tarka aʶːlˤiʶaʶːstiʶtˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶaʶiʶ ʔaːlafu wʔand͡ʒjnaː mwsaː wmn mʕh ʔad͡ʒmʕjn mn ʃr aːlwswaːs aːlχnaːs tntd͡ʒ aːld͡ʒzaːʔir aːltmwr faqaaːla ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu masʕuwdin jawma jukʃafu ʕan saaːqin wajudʕawna ʔiilaaː aːlssud͡ʒuwdi falaaː jaʶstaʶtˤiʶjʕuʶwnaʶ wamin ʔaːjaaːtihi χalqu aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ waaːχtilaaːfu ʔaalsinatikum waʔaalwaaːnikum ʔiinna fij ðalika laʔaːjaaːtin lilʕaaːlimijna sʔaltqj bkm jaː ʃbaːb fj kwrjaː waaːlχaaːmisu muʕaaːnaaːau aʶːlˤmaʶðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶ waaːlʔaaħkaaːmi biaːlttaswijaai bajna ʔaahlihaaː waaːʕtimaaːdi aʶːlˤnnaʶsˤaʶfaʶaʶiʶ fij faʶsˤlˤiʶhaʶaʶː waaːllatij ʔaʶaʶħsˤaʶnaʶt fard͡ʒahaaː fanafaχnaaː fijhaaː min ruwħinaaː wad͡ʒaʕalnaaːhaaː waaːbnahaaː ʔaːjaaan lilʕaaːlamijna jħtrq aːlwrq bshwlh waʔiin lam tuʔuminuwaː lij faaːʕtaziluwni hl bʔimkaːnk tslq tlk aːlʃd͡ʒra wamaaː ʕallamnaaːhu aːlʃʃiʕra wamaaː janbaʁij lahu ʔiin huwa ʔiillaaː ruʃdak ʕan ʕuluwmi aːlnnawkaaː watakallufi aʶːlˤbaʶtˤtˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶjnaʶ qaaːluwaː nafqidu sˤuʶwaʶaʶːʕaʶ aːlmaliki waliman d͡ʒaaːʔa bihi ħimlu baʕijrin waʔaanaaː bihi zaʕijmun hal ʕamilt ʕamalanaː fʔinh jħml jwm aːlqjaːma wzraː waθullaaun mmina aːlʔaːχirijna faʔiinna najla aʶːlˤʕaʶðˤiʶjmiʶ biʔaamrin ʕaʶðˤiʶjmiʶn θumma fij silsilaain ðarʕuhaaː sabʕuwna ðiraaːʕanaː faaːslukuwhu laː ttrkj sˤbjk jsˤrˤχ kaːn ʃd͡ʒaːʕaːan ħsˤlˤ ʔamsaːan ʔaʁrb ʃjʔ dʕwnaː nqsm aːlfaːtwra bʔarbʕa tˤrˤq waʔiiðaaː fahima aːlmaʕaaːnija saʶqaʶtˤaʶ ʕanhu kulfaau aːstiχraaːd͡ʒihaaː wabaqija ʕalajhi muʕaaːnaaːau ħiʶfðˤiʶhaʶaʶː waaːstiqraaːrihaaː hnaːk fj aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤj krsj jtħrk nħwk bbtˤʔ lm jʕd twm mdrsaː llfrnsja bʕd aːlʔaːn waliðalika ʔaasbaaːbun faaːsidaaun wadawaaːʕin waaːhijaaun faʔiinnamaaː ʔaːχr ʁrbj fad͡ʒaʕalahum kaʶʕaʶsˤfiʶn maʔakuwlin ʔakjd sʔaʶntðˤrˤ ʔiðaː ʔant ʔakrmt aːlkrjm mlkth wʔin ʔant ʔakrmt aːllʔijm tmrdaː wʔaʶdˤlˤ frʕwn qwmh wmaː hdaː wajabqaaː wad͡ʒhu rabbika ðuw ʕrbaːt aːlʔamtʕa laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ aʶːlˤdˤħk ʔaw aːlbkaːʔ ʔaθθrt fjnaː sˤdaʶːqthm bʃda naðijranaː llilbaʃari waqaaːla maħmuwdun aːlwarraaːqu raħimahu aːlllahu wmaː d͡ʒʕlnaːhm d͡ʒsdaː laː jʔaklwn aʶːlˤtˤʕaʶːm wmaː kaːnwaː χaːldjn ʔiinna aːllaðijna kafaruwaː biaːlððikri lammaaː d͡ʒaaːʔahum waʔiinnahu lakitaaːbun ʕazijzun ʔaʕrf aːlfrq bjn aʶːlˤbtˤ waːlʔiwz ʕlaː maːðaː jħtwj waqaaːla aːllaðijna fij aʶːlˤsˤsˤuʶwrˤiʶ nafχaaun waaːħidaaun qaːl qrjnh rbnaː maː ʔaʶtˤʁjth wlkn kaːn fj dˤlˤaʶːlˤ bʕjd waʔiiðaaː maʶrˤiʶdˤtuʶ fahuwa jaʃfijni wtlk aːld͡ʒna aːltj ʔawrθtmwhaː bmaː kntm tʕmlwn waːħda fataraaːti aːlnnufuwsi waaːstiraaːħaaːti aʶːlˤχaʶwaʶaʶːtˤiʶrˤiʶ qul ʔiinnamaaː ʔaadʕuw rabbij walaaː ʔauʃriku bihi ʔaaħadanaː falaaː jaħzunka qawluhum ʔiinnaaː naʕlamu maaː jusirruwna wamaaː mfaːd͡ʒʔaa hl bʔimkaːnk tfsjrh bʃkl ʔaħsn waʔaammaaː man χaaːfa maqaaːma rabbihi wanahaaː aːlnnafsa ʕani aːlhawaaː nhaːja aːlʕaːlm qrjba d͡ʒdaːan waaːlʔaːχiraau χajrun waʔaabqaaː hl hnaːk ʔaj ʃχsˤ ʔaːχr trjd aːltħdθ ʔiljh qaaːluwaː rabbunaaː jaʕlamu ʔiinnaaː ʔiilajkum lamursaluwna ʔaʶʕtˤiʶ aʶːlˤqtˤtˤ bʕdˤ aːlllħm ʔanaː ʔanhjt ktaːba aːltqrjr aːlħamdu lillahi aːllaðij wahaba lij ʕalaaː aːlkibari ʔiismaaːʕijla waʔiisħaaːqa ʔiinna rabbij lasamijʕu aːldduʕaaːʔi waqaaːla sulajmaaːnu bnu daaːwud ʕalajhimaaː aːlssalaaːmu waʶaʶːlˤʃʃaʶjaʶaʶːtˤiʶjnaʶ kulla bannaaːʔin waʶʁaʶwwaʶaʶːsˤiʶn maː rʔajhaː fj sjaːrtj aʶːlˤsˤwrˤaʶ fj hðaː aːlktaːb walanabluwannakum biʃajʔin mina aːlχawfi waaːld͡ʒuwʕi waʶnaʶqsˤiʶn mina aːlʔaamwaaːli waaːlʔaanfusi waaːlθθamaraaːti wabaʃʃiri aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːbiʶrˤiʶjnaʶ bali aːlllahu mawlaaːkum wahuwa χajru aʶːlˤnnaʶaʶːsˤiʶrˤiʶjnaʶ waʔiin aːftaraqaaː fajaaː wajħa muftaraqajni maaː ʔaʶaʶdˤaʶrˤrˤaʶ aːftiraaːqahumaaː wakunuwzin wamaqaaːmin karijmin kallaaː ʔiinna kitaaːba aːlʔaabraaːri lafij ʕillijijna falaaː jaχluw ħaaːla taʶqsˤiʶjrˤiʶhiʶ min ʔaarbaʕaai ʔaaħwaaːlin waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶʕrˤaʶaʶːdˤaʶ waaːlʔaad͡ʒsaaːma ʔaalqaaːbanaː taʶwaʶaʶːdˤaʶʕuʶwhaʶaʶː limaʕaaːnin aːttafaquwaː ʕalajhaaː ʔaalam tara ʔiilaaː aːllaðijna jud͡ʒaaːdiluwna fij ʔaːjaaːti aːlllahi ʔaannaaː juʶsˤrˤaʶfuʶwnaʶ fwqʕ aːlħq wbtˤlˤ maː kaːnwaː jʕmlwn waliðalika qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi ʔanaː ħqaːan lstu d͡ʒaːʔiʕaːan rbmaː sjʁjr rʔajh maː hj aːlʔabd͡ʒdjja aːltj tuktb bhaː hðh aːlllʁa bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi waaːlððaaːrijaaːti ðarwanaː θm kaːn mn aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wtwaʶːsˤwaʶː baʶːlˤsˤbrˤ wtwaʶːsˤwaʶː baːlmrħma faʶjaʶsˤiʶjrˤuʶ aːlʔaamalu χajbaaan waaːlrrad͡ʒaaːʔu ʔijaaːsanaː ʔaħqaːan laː jmknk aːlsbaːħa kaːn saːmj qrra ʕjn ʔammh wlnsknnkm aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ mn bʕdhm ðlk lmn χaːf mqaːmj wχaːf wʕjd ʔin aːlsʔuaːl ʕn ħd͡ʒm aːlkwn mnð aːlaːnfd͡ʒaːr aːlkbjr ʔaam ʕindahum χazaaːʔiinu rabbika ʔaam humu aʶːlˤmuʶsˤaʶjtˤiʶrˤuʶwnaʶ mlʔ ʕjn aːlzzmn sjfnaː waːlqlm qul law kaaːna maʕahu ʔaːlihaaun kamaaː jaquwluwna ʔiiðanaː laaːbtaʁawaː ʔiilaaː ðij aːlʕarʃi sabijlanaː hl ldjk ʔarz wamaaː jaðkuruwna ʔiilaːaːa ʔaan jaʃaaːʔ aːlllahu huwa ʔaahlu aːlttaqwaaː waʔaahlu aːlmaʁfiraai wd͡ʒdt aːlktaːb aːlðj fqdth aːlbaːrħa faʶːsˤbrˤ ʔin wʕd aːllh ħq fʔimaː nrjnk bʕdˤ aːlðj nʕdhm ʔaw ntwfjnk fʔiljnaː jrd͡ʒʕwn lm tkn mʕrkaan waːħdaan bl ʔakθr ʔajn ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔad͡ʒd sjaːra ʔad͡ʒra ʔinhmaː mn ʕbaːdnaː aːlmʔumnjn wmn taːb wʕml sˤaʶːlˤħaʶː fʔinh jtwb ʔilaː aːllh mtaːbaː waʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ ʕalaaː maaː jaquwluwna waaːhd͡ʒurhum had͡ʒranaː d͡ʒamijlanaː waʔiiðaaː massahu aːlχajru manuwʕanaː ʃʕr mnnaːd ʔannh fj ħaːla ʔaswʔ wd͡ʒaːʔ ʔahl aːlmdjna jstbʃrwn ʔajn aːlkrjma aːlmχfwqa sʔafʕlhaː bnfsj ʕaːlm ʔaːχr mmkn ʔalm nd͡ʒʕl aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ kfaːtaː ʔaam lahum ʃurakaaːʔ faljaʔatuwaː biʃurakaaːʔiihim ʔiin kaaːnuwaː sˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ aːðhab bikitaaːbij haðaaː faʔaalqih ʔiilajhim θumma tawalla ʕanhum faʶaʶːnðˤuʶrˤ maaːðaaː jard͡ʒiʕuwna sanasimuhu ʕalaaː waʔaaqraba ruħmanaː ʔanaː mtʔakd ʔanj ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔafʕl hðaː btˤrˤjqaʶ ʔaw bʔaχrj wmn ʔaːjaːth mnaːmkm baːlljl waːlnhaːr waːbtʁaːʔukm mn fdˤlˤh ʔin fj ðlk lʔaːjaːt lqwm jsmʕwn aːlʕlm aːlfrnsj aːzrq wʔaʶħaʶːtˤt bh χtˤjʔiʶth fʔawlʔik ʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːlnaːr hm fjhaː χaːldwn ʔanaː ʔaħb aːlʃms likulli ʃajʔin fatraaun hðh ljst aːlmra aːltj fjhaː hðh aːld͡ʒmla wakaaːnat aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶnsˤaʶaʶːrˤuʶ ʔaaʃaddahum aːlmnʃʔaːt fj aːlbħr kaːlʔaʕlaːm lqd zrʕt ħqlj baːlʃʕjr ʔaan jakuwna lizijaaːdaai aʶːlˤlˤlˤaʶfðˤiʶ ʕalaaː aːlmaʕnaaː faʶtaʶsˤiʶjrˤuʶ aːlzzijaaːdaau ʕillaaan maaːniʕaaan min fahmi aʶːlˤmaʶqsˤuʶwdiʶ minhu waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlħamijdi aːlddunjaaː manaaːzilu faraaːħilun wanaaːzilun faʔiinnamaaː ʔaahlaka aːllaðijna min qablikum kaθraau masaaːʔiilihim waːχtilaːafuhum ʕalaaː ʔaanbijaaːʔiihim waʔaad͡ʒalla fij aːlnnufuwsi maʶwdˤiʶʕaʶnaʶː lm jsbq lnaː w ʔan rʔajnaː aːntħaːraː khðaː malʕuwnijna ʔaajnamaaː θuqifuwaː ʔauχiðuwaː waquttiluwaː taqtijlanaː wd͡ʒħdwaː bhaː waːstjqnthaː ʔanfshm ðˤlˤmaʶː wʕlwaː faʶːnðˤrˤ kjf kaːn ʕaːqba aːlmfsdjn laː ʔarjdk ʔan tqlq bʃʔanj msaːʔ aːlχjr kjf ħaːlk bʕd ʔan ʔanhjt ʕmlj χrd͡ʒt lʔatnzh ʕndj qtˤaʶːn waruwija ʕanhu ʔaannahum banuw aːmraʔaaai aːlrrad͡ʒuli min ʁajrihi aːld͡ʒaaːhili aːzdaaːda qubħanaː ʔaðhb bkθra ʔilaː aːlmktba ʔanaː ʔaurjd bjra bʔakwaːb wʔabaːrjq wkʔas mn mʕjn frt mn qswra ʔatðkr aːlbjt aːlðj nʃʔat fjh bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm jaː ʔajhaː aːlnaːs ʔaan ʔalm jʕlmwaː ʔan aːllh jʕlm srhm wnd͡ʒwaːhm wʔan aːllh ʕlaːm aːlʁjwb lqd lftt aːntbaːhj waʔaaslamak ʔaahluk waħaʃamuk aːlχbr aːlsʕjd hw ʔanh bʔimkaːnnaː msaːʕdtk klaːmh laː jtmaːʃaː mʕ ʔafʕaːlh sʕa aːlχzaːn χmswn d͡ʒaːlwnaːan ʔilaː ʔaj mħtˤaʶ stðhb sna mn qd ʔarslnaː qblk mn rslnaː wlaː td͡ʒd lsntnaː tħwjlaː wlw traː ʔið fzʕwaː flaː fwt wʔaχðwaː mn mkaːn qrjb jaː bnj aːlswdaːn hðaː rmzkm waaːlʕaaːqibaau lilttaqwaaː waʔaːtuwaː aːlnnisaaːʔa sˤaʶduʶqaʶaʶːtiʶhiʶnnaʶ niħlaaan faʔiin tˤiʶbnaʶ lakum ʕan ʃajʔin minhu nafsanaː fakuluwhu hanijʔianaː marijʔianaː ʔarjd ʔan ʔaʶsˤbħ tˤbjbaʶ ʔaw mmrˤdˤaʶ ʔaw mdrsa ʔimkaːnja tmdd aːlkwn ħqjqa tnbʔa bhaː aːlfjzjaːʔij ʔalbrt ʔajnʃtaːjn ʔiinna ʔiilaaː rabbika aːlrrud͡ʒʕaaː faljaʔatuwaː biħadijθin mmiθlihi ʔiin kaaːnuwaː sˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ wataðaruwna aːlʔaːχiraaa ʔin kaːn ldjk maː tqwl fqulh ʔinna haðihi dalaaːlaaun faaːsidaaun waʶʔaʶaʶʁtˤaʶʃaʶ lajlahaaː waʔaaχrad͡ʒa dˤuʶħaʶaʶːhaʶaʶː lqd aːdχrt maːʔih dwlaːr wmaː kaːn d͡ʒwaːb qwmh aːlrriʕaaːjaau hðaːn aːltwʔamaːn ldjhmaː wd͡ʒhaːn mtmaːθlaːn ʕjsaː rswl mn aːllh ʕinda aːliaːmtiħaaːni jukramu aːlmarʔu ʔaaw juhaaːnu faʔaamsaka ʕan d͡ʒawaaːbij faʔaad͡ʒmiʕuwaː kajdakum θumma ʔaaʕwaza fijhi whw jχʃaː ʔaħb daːʔimaː ʔan ʔastmʕ llmwsjqaː aːlklaːsjkja ʕndmaː jkwn ldj wqt faːrʁ aːlðjn tˤʁwaʶː fj aːlblaːd lqd kaːn aːlrd͡ʒl aːlʔanaːnj mkrwhaː mn tˤrˤf zmlaːʔih qaaːluwaː tawaqqaf ʕan zijaaːraai kulli jawmin ʔiðaaː ʔaakθart mallaka man tazuwru waqaaːla ʔaːχaru ʕndj θmaːnja ʔiχwa waʔaaqbala baʶʕdˤuʶhuʶm ʕalaaː baʶʕdˤiʶn jatasaaːʔaluwna fʔaθaːbhm aːllh bmaː qaːlwaː waʔaafʕaaːlu aːlχajri taʶtaʶwaʶssaʶtˤuʶ bajna raðijlatajni ʔanaː ʔafkr fjk tˤwaʶːlˤ aːljwm waaːlwad͡ʒhu aːlθθaaːliθu laaː juʶsˤaʶddaʶʕuʶwnaʶ ʕanhaaː walaaː junzifuwna hl jmknk aːn tsaːʕdjnj fsbħ baːsm rbk aʶːlˤʕðˤjm aːld͡ʒmjʕ jmwt aʶːʕrˤdˤ lnaː baʶːχtsˤaʶːrˤ ħaːltk aːʃrb aːlkθjr mn aːlmaːʔ ħqaː jd͡ʒb ʔan nqwm bʃjʔ ħjaːl hðaː aːlʔamr rbmaː twm ldjhu ʃjʔiaːan lʔiχfaːʔih aːlħamdu lillahi rabbi
