twfjt ʔamj ʕndmaː knt sˤʁjrˤaʶː w sˤmwd ʃq llʔinsaːn drbh ʔatðkrnj ʔaannahu kaaːna laaː jatruku aːlmarʔa mufrad͡ʒanaː ħattaaː jaʶdˤuʶmmaʶhuʶ ʔilaaː qabijlaain jakuwnu fijhaaː fj hðaː aːlnaːdj χmswn ʕdˤwaʶː aːld͡ʒw baːrd hðaː aʶːlˤsˤbaʶːħ ʔinhaː sˤʁjrˤaʶ qaaːla lahum muwsaaː ʔaalquwaː maaː ʔaantum mulquwna wmaː ʔamrnaː ʔilaː waːħda klmħ baʶːlˤbsˤrˤ waqaaːla aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶjuʶ sʔad͡ʒʕlk sʕjdanaː ʔanaː aːltqjt frjd ʕlaː aːlʃaːrʕ blʁt snn aːlzwaːd͡ʒ aːlʔaːn hw ljs tˤbjbaʶː qtˤb twm ħaːd͡ʒbjh d͡ʒaːʔ aʶːlˤtˤaʶːlˤb mn lndn walam jaʕduhaaː ʔilaaː bidʕaain ʔanaː wd͡ʒdt aːlbnaːʔ famaaː tanfaʕuhum ʃafaaːʕaau aːlʃʃaaːfiʕijna walajsa fij haðaaː aʶːlˤqaʶsˤdiʶ taʔaθijrun fij dijnin walaaː qadaħun fij muruwʔaain aːlkθjr mn aːlʔazwaːd͡ʒ jnthj bhm aːlʔamr ʔilaː aʶːlˤtˤlˤaʶːq swf ʔaʕaːwd aʶːlˤʔiʶtsˤaʶːlˤaʶ laːħqaːan twm laː jθq bmaːrj bʕd aːlʔaːn waaːttaquwaː aːllaðij ʔaamaddakum bimaaː taʕlamuwna twm mħsˤn lkn maːrj ljst kðlk jaʕnij ʔaanna ħubbahu jaʶlˤtaʶsˤiʶquʶ biʶniʶjaʶaʶːtˤiʶ aːlqalbi qaːl mwʕdkm jwm aːlzjna wʔan jħʃr aːlnaːs dˤħaʶː ʔin jsʔalkmwhaː fjħfkm tbχlwaː wjχrd͡ʒ ʔaʶdˤʁaʶːnkm bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm aːlm ʔanaː ʔaħbbkm w ʕlaː ʔaʃlaːʔinaː nsˤnʕ md͡ʒdaː mlʕwnjn ʔajnmaː θqfwaː ʔaχðwaː wqtlwaː tqtjlaː waʶlˤuʶwtˤaʶnaʶː ʔiið qaaːla liqawmihi ʔiinnakum lataʔatuwna aːlfaaːħiʃaaa maaː sabaqakum bihaaː min ʔaaħadin mina aːlʕaaːlamijna waman kaaːna naʶðˤaʶrˤuʶhuʶ fij ʁajri aːʕtibaaːrin faqad sahaaː bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ʔinaː ʔaʶʕtˤjnaʶːk aːlkwθr jrjd aːlklb lħmaː sjsaːʕdk hðaː aːlktaːb fj draːstk twm laː jsttˤjʕ aːlbqaːʔ tˤwjlˤaʶː flnbdʔa aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ hðaː nsˤ ʔind͡ʒjlj waqijla fij baʶʕdˤiʶ aʶːlˤmaʶwaʶaʶːʕiʶðˤiʶ qrrt ʔan ʔatrk aːlmdrsa aːlʕaaːlimi ʁarijbun waʔiiqlaaːlahu ʕad͡ʒijbun bima nilt haðaaː aːlʕilma qaaːla waʶʕaʶwaʶaʶːrˤiʶdˤiʶ aːlʃʃahawaaːti sʔaltnj ʔijmjlj sʔuaːlaːan hðh aːlʔaqsaːm ljst ʕaːzla lˤlˤsˤwt ħqanaː wlqd zjnaː aːlsmaːʔ aːldnjaː bmsˤaʶːbjħ wd͡ʒʕlnaːhaː rd͡ʒwmaː lˤlˤʃjaʶːtˤjn wʔaʕtdnaː lhm ʕðaːb aːlsʕjr hl ʔanta maːljzj jaː saːmj ʔaantum waʔaːbaaːʔuukumu aːlʔaaqdamuwna ʔiinna ʕaðaaːba rabbihim ʁajru maʔamuwnin rabbi muwsaaː wahaaːruwna lm trd ʔan jbqaː hnaːk lmda ʔaʶtˤwlˤ rasuwlu aːlllahi sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama ʔam jħsbwn ʔanaː laː nsmʕ srhm wnd͡ʒwaːhm blaː wrslnaː ldjhm jktbwn hw jrd͡ʒʕ ʔilaː bjth waʕalaaː aʶːlˤfaʶdˤlˤiʶ waʶaʶːlˤttaʶχsˤiʶjsˤiʶ dalijlanaː sʔabqaːa hnaː ʔilaː ʔan trd͡ʒʕ aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤwn aʶːlˤaʶːftrˤaʶːdˤj lˤlˤħaʶːsˤlˤjn ʕlaː aːlbaːkaːlwrjaː ʔiillaaː raħmaaan minnaaː wamataaːʕanaː ʔiilaaː ħijnin kaːn saːmj bʃʕr md͡ʒʕd hl trjd qhwa walilʔaːχiri biaːlʔaawwali muzdad͡ʒaranaː maː aːlqaːrʕa ʔaldjk mn hðaː ʔalwaːn ʔaχraː walaw kaaːna maaː taʶdˤaʶmmaʶnaʶ haðajni aːlnnawʕajni bjnj wbjnk tˤrˤjqaʶ tfkjrh dˤħlˤaʶ wnaːdwaː jaː maːlk lˤjqdˤ ʕljnaː rbk qaːl ʔinkm maːkθwn hl ttħdθ aːlʔisbraːntw ħaːwl twm qtlj watuʕaaːnidu ʔaahlahu haðaaː aːlʕinaaːda mtaː tstjqðˤ kl jwm waqaaːluwaː ʔinna aːlrrad͡ʒula ʔiðaaː ʔaakraha aːlmarʔaaaa wahija maðʕuwraaun θumma ʔaaðukirat ʔaand͡ʒabat kiraaːmin bararaain hl tʕrf kjf tqwd sjaːra ʔarjd ʔan ʔaʶsˤbħ mʕlmaː mn aːlʁaːʔib kðbt ʕaːd fkjf kaːn ʕðaːbj wnðr aːnh lˤtˤjf sddt baːlnqd mn aʶːlˤʔaʶfdˤlˤ ʔalaː tχbraː ʔabaːkmaː baːlħaːdθ lqd trʕrʕ bʃda hðaː aːlmwqʕ mfjd d͡ʒdaː hw jstħiq ʔan jusd͡ʒan aːʕtraf baːlħqjqa fd͡ʒʔaaan bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm aːqtrb llnaːs ħsaːbhm whm fj ʁfla mʕrˤdˤwn ʔanaː ʔaʶʕaʶːrˤdˤ ʔistχdaːm aːlmwt kʕqwba w ʔaʶʕaʶːrˤdˤ ʔaʶjdˤaʶːaʶn ʔistχdaːmhu kmkaːfʔaa walillahi maaː fij aːlssamaaːwaaːti wamaaː fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wakafaaː biaːlllahi wakijlanaː faaːlssaaːbiqaaːti sabqanaː wʔiðaː aːld͡ʒħjm sʕrt faʔaaχaðahu ʔaabuw aːlʕataaːhijaai faqaaːla bħθt ʕn aːld͡ʒzaːʔir fj d͡ʒwd͡ʒl fqtˤ ʔawqf hðaː sʔaʶðˤlˤ bʕjdaːan ʕn drbk ʔanta qd trʁb fj aːltħduθ ʔilaː twm fij quluwbihim mmaʶrˤaʶdˤuʶn fazaaːdahumu aːlllahu maʶrˤaʶdˤaʶnaʶː walahum ʕaðaaːbun ʔaalijmun bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jakðibuwna ʕljnaː ʔibqaːʔ hðh aːlmʕlwmaːt fj tˤj aːlktmaːn fj aːlwqt aʶːlˤħaʶːdˤrˤ waʔaanʃada ʔaabuw aːlqaaːsimi aːlʔaːmidijju θm ʔin ʕljnaː bjaːnh maː hj aːllʁa aːltj jtklmwnhaː fj aːlmksjk waːħll ʕqda mn lsaːnj ʔaʃk ʔannj sʔanhj hðaː aːljwm waaːlrribħu χusraaːnanaː wʔin lk lʔad͡ʒraː ʁjr mmnwn dˤħk aːld͡ʒmjʕ ʕlaː d͡ʒaːk ʔinh ljs mnnaː hjaː nsˤnʕ td͡ʒaːra waaːnʃaqqati aːlssamaaːʔ fahija jawmaʔiiðin waaːhijaaun aʶːlˤmtˤrˤqaʶ waːlmnd͡ʒl jrmzaːn llʃjwʕja tilka ʔiiðanaː qismaaun dˤiʶjzaʶaʶː nħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː sjaːra ʔafmaː nħn bmjtjn waaːlssamaaːʔi ðaaːti aːlħubuki maː aːlðj traːhu fjh twd͡ʒd χtˤʔaʶ fj aːld͡ʒmla mnnaːd jħbb aːlʕhraːt sʔalathu wrdd binʕm hl ʔanta sˤdjqj waqaaːla aːlχalijlu bnu ʔaaħmada ʔan aːʕml saːbʁaːt wqdr fj aːlsrd waːʕmlwaː sˤaʶːlˤħaʶː ʔinj bmaː tʕmlwn bsˤjrˤ wʔawħjnaː ʔilaː mwsaː ʔan ʔasr bʕbaːdj ʔinkm mtbʕwn fðkr fmaː ʔant bnʕmt rbk bkaːhn wlaː md͡ʒnwn bsm aːllh aːlrħmaːn aːlrħjm faʶsˤlˤuʶn waʔaammaaː aːlmuʔuaaːχaaːau biaːlmawaddaai fahal d͡ʒazajthaaː qaaːla laaː walaaː bizafraain waaːħidaain wql aːlħmd llh sjrjkm ʔaːjaːth ftʕrfwnhaː wmaː rbk bʁaːfl ʕmaː tʕmlwn waqad qaaːla aːlmaʔamuwnu raħimahu aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː hl aːlʔawz jraːa aːllh haːa fqdt waːldhaː faːi aːlbħr maː jqwlh ljs ldjh mʕnaː baʕijdun min aːlnnaaːri ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ aːlaː skjn kaːn mdʁdʁaː lqd wqʕt fj aʶːlˤχtˤʔaʶ ðaːth aːtbʕwaː maː ʔanzl ʔiljkm mn rbkm wlaː ttbʕwaː mn dwnh ʔawljaːʔ qljlaː maː tðkrwn θumma ʔaaχaðtu aːllaðijna kafaruwaː fakajfa kaaːna nakijri lʔaj mdaː jmtd aːlkwn hl tlaːms aːlsmaːʔ ħdwd aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ waʔiiðaaː quriʔia ʕalajhimu aːlqurʔaːnu laaː jasd͡ʒuduwna wzʕ ʕljnaː aːlwrq aːlsmaːʔ mnftˤrˤ bh kaːn wʕdh mfʕwlaː ʔiinna fij ðalika laðikraaː liman kaaːna lahu qalbun ʔaaw ʔaalqaaː aːlssamʕa wahuwa ʃahijdun ʔiinna ʕaðaaːba rabbika lawaaːqiʕun aːstmrwaː bmkaːfħa aːlħrjq ʕlaː ħsaːb ħjaːthm kjf trjdh walaʔiin ʔaarsalnaaː rijħanaː faraʔaawhu muʶsˤfaʶrˤrˤaʶnaʶː wqt ʔakθr lhu ʔin aːld͡ʒw qaːrs θm rdwaː ʔilaː aːllh mwlaːhm aːlħq ʔalaː lh aːlħkm whw ʔasrʕ aːlħaːsbjn w aːktbwhaː bdmaːʔ aːlʃhdaː wzjtwnaː wnχlaː waaːlnnahaaːri ʔiiðaaː tad͡ʒallaaː bnaː aːlrwmaːn hðaː aːld͡ʒsr hl trjd smkaːan maː χtˤbk aːlljla jaː twm jrsl aːlsmaːʔ ʕljkm mdraːraː twfj ʔabj qbl ʕaːmjn hðaː aːlktaːb ʔaħmr fj ħaːl tʕtˤlˤ brnaːmd͡ʒ mʕaːld͡ʒa aʶːlˤnsˤwsˤ ndˤmn lk tʕwjdˤh md͡ʒaːnaː ʔaazwaaːd͡ʒun hkðaː sʔaʶdˤrˤb ʕsˤfwrˤjn bħd͡ʒr waːħd daːrwjn ʁjra kl ʃjʔ llaːsf jaː ʔamj ʔaʕtqd ðlk ʔaʶsˤbħ rʔijsaː llʃrka fj sn aːlθlaːθjn hn jstmʕn llmðjaːʕ ʔiinnahu ʕalaaː rad͡ʒʕihi laqaaːdirun ðhb lʃrb aːlbjra mʕ aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ ʔinhaː lwrj kaːn aʶːlˤqrˤaʶːsˤnaʶ jsthdfwn aːlsfn aːltd͡ʒaːrja ʁjr aːlmslħa aːθnj rkbtjk ʔink tχjfnj fj bʕdˤ aːlʔaħjaːn hl tʕtqd aːn twm jfʕl hðaː aːlʔan tqbl mnj ʔaʶtˤjb aːltħjaːt wbnjn ʃhwdaː wamaaː tilka bijamijnika jaaː muwsaaː tbdw mtʕbaː aːlrħmn ʕlaː aːlʕrʃ aːstwaː faaːdχulij fij ʕibaaːdij faːʃhdwaː faːʃhdwaː faːʃhdwaː ʔatnaːwl daːʔimaː kwbaː mn aːlħljb waʔiiðaaː ʔaaʕsart tarakuwk wmaː ʔahlknaː mn qrja ʔilaː lhaː mnðrwn hl hj sˤdjqaʶ hl tʃaːrk fj hðh aːlfʕaːlja hum ħtaːa laː jʕrfwn mn sjltqwn walilzzuhdi fijhi tarkun kallaaː sajaʕlamuwna ʔaʁlbja aːltqjt bmaːrj aːlbaːrħa mnnaːd jħaːwl ʃraːʔ mnzl aːlnaːs laː jmkn ʔan tʕjʃ ʔilaː aːlʔabd lm jkn twm aːkbrmn maːrj bkθjr ʔanaː ʔaddχr aːlmaːl lʃraːʔ sjaːra balaaː qaaːdirijna ʕalaaː ʔaan nusawwija banaaːnahu waaːllaðij huwa juʶtˤʕiʶmuʶniʶj wajasqijni naːnsj tmlk bjaːnw aːlmdrs jtklm bhdwʔ aːsmj haːʃjmwtw fakajfa kaaːna ʕaðaaːbij wanuðuri ʔanaː ħtaːa lstu mtʔakdaːan ʔin kaːn hðaː mftaːħj aːlχaːtm laː jdχl fj ʔiʶsˤbʕj fʃil bsbb qla aːlmaːl ħdjθun ħasanun rwaːh aːlttirmðju wʁjruh hkðaː kaːn mnaːd jnðˤf aːlbjt ljs mhmaː maː tqwlh bl maː tfʕlh ʔajmknk ʔan tʔatj lʔaχðj mn aʶːlˤmħtˤaʶ man lam jaʶttaʶʕiʶðˤ bimawti waladin ðawaaːtaaː ʔaafnaaːnin jusqawna min raħijqin maχtuwmin ʔaafalaaː jaʕlamu ʔiiðaaː buʕθira maaː fij aːlqubuwri bʔimkaːn d͡ʒaːk tħdθ aːlfrnsja ʃadjdu sawaːdi aːlʃʃaʕri swf ʔaːtj ʁdaː mra ʔaχraː waːrtdaː md͡ʒd aʶːlˤħdˤaʶːrˤaʶːt wʃaːħaː tʕd͡ʒbnj aːllʁa aːljaːbaːnja kθjraː hðaː sjʔi ʔaːml ʔan jsttˤjʕ ʔan jʔatj ʔawd ʔan ʔaraːh ʔiinnahu min ʕibaaːdinaaː aːlmuʔuminijna ʔaʕtnq aʶːlˤmstwtˤnwn aːldjaːna aːlmsjħjjaːa aːllʁa aːlʕrbja ljst sˤʕbaʶ wd͡ʒʕlnaː aːlnhaːr mʕaːʃaː aːbtsmt naːnsj bsʕaːda qjaːsaːt mqraːb haːbl aːldqjqa waːlʔad͡ʒhza aːlʔaχraː wmmn χlqnaː ʔama jhdwn aʶːlˤʔiʶtˤlˤaʶːq wahallaaː kaaːna aːlħaðaru ʔaaʁlaba ʕalajhi waqad nadaba aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː ʔilajhi tsttˤjʕ ʔijmjlj ʔan tsbħ faʶːsˤfħ ʕnhm wql slaːm fswf jʕlmwn ʔifʕlaː kl maː ʔaχbrki twm ʔan tfʕljh fj ħdˤwrˤh maːðaː fʕl llħmj ʔaːbn mn ʔant tadʕuw man ʔaadbara watawallaaː θm lnħn ʔaʕlm baːlðjn hm ʔawlaː bhaː sˤlˤjaʶː waʔiin maaːta haddanij ʔanaː mn ʃzwkaː aːraːk jwm aːlθlaːθaːʔ maːðaː tʕrf ʕn fj ʔam aːlktaːb ldjnaː lʕlj ħkjm aːlrd͡ʒaːʔ ʔan tbqwaː ʕlaː aʶːtsˤaʶːlˤ waʔiin jukaððibuwka faqad kaððaba aːllaðijna min qablihim d͡ʒaaːʔathum rusuluhum biaːlbajjinaaːti wabiaːlzzuburi wabiaːlkitaaːbi aːlmunijri qddmtu tqrjrj ltwm aːlχbz ljs tˤaʶːzd͡ʒaʶːaʶn lqd wdˤħ aːlmʃkla bmθaːl waːqʕj ʔajn ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔad͡ʒd sjaːra ʔad͡ʒra mʕ aːnnj knt d͡ʒaːlsaːan tħt aːlʃms wlkn knt ʔaʃʕr baːlbrd jaʶsˤlˤaʶwnaʶhaʶaʶː jawma aːlddijni ʔinj lkm rswl ʔamjn ʔaan tuʔumina biaːllhi wamalaːaʔiikatihi wakutubihi warusulihi waaːljawmi aːlʔaːχiri watuʔumina biaːlqadari χajrihi waʃarrihii fqaːl ʔin hðaː ʔilaː sħr jʔuθr wamaaː kaaːna lanaaː ʕalajkum min suʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːniʶn bal kuntum qawmanaː tˤaʶaʶːʁiʶjnaʶ stntˤq aːlmħkma aːldstwrja baːlqraːr sˤbjħaʶ hðaː aːljwm famaaː wad͡ʒadnaaː fijhaaː ʁajra bajtin mina aːlmuslimijna kaːn aːlmaːʔ daːfʔiaː hl tʕtqd ʔannaː snd͡ʒd bjthaː faχarad͡ʒa ʕalaaː qawmihi mina aːlmiħraaːbi faʔaawħaaː ʔiilajhim ʔaan sabbiħuwaː bukraaan waʕaʃijjanaː wasahulat ʕalajhi zawaaːd͡ʒiruhu tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbuʶ aːlʕilmi waʕaaːmilu aːlbirri kaʔaːkili aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶʕaʶaʶːmiʶ ʔin ʔaaχaða minhu quwtanaː ʕaʶsˤaʶmaʶhuʶ muttakiʔiijna fijhaaː jadʕuwna fijhaaː bifaaːkihaain kaθijraain waʃaraaːbin laaː d͡ʒarama ʔaanna aːlllaha jaʕlamu maaː jusirruwna wamaaː juʕlinuwna ʔiinnahu laaː juħibbu aːlmustakbirijna waʔiilaaː aːld͡ʒibaaːli kajfa nuʶsˤiʶbaʶt aːlħjaːa sjrkun jatijmanaː ðaaː maqrabaain fdˤlˤaʶː mn rbk ðlk hw aːlfwz aʶːlˤʕðˤjm jtmtʕ twm bmwhba kbjra ʕlaː twzjʕ aːlmhaːm hl traː aːlraːkwn wlh maː skn fj aːlljl waːlnhaːr whw aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm waħaðfa aːlmaʕsuwri ʔaaslamu hl ttħdθ aːlʔalbaːnja waqad rawaaː bdʔa mnnaːd jʕml ʕndmaː ʔaχbrt twm bʔanj d͡ʒaːʔiʕ ʔaχbrnj bʔanh d͡ʒaːʔiʕ hw aːlʔaːχr lm jrfʕ aːlstaːr ħtaː aːlʔaːn km lk ʕndj ʔarbʕa jwrw lw smħt waqad qaaːlat aːlħukamaaːʔu rubba sˤiʶddiʶjqiʶn ʔaawaddu min ʃaqijqin hw laː jrjd ʔan jʕtrf baːlhzjma maʶwtˤiʶniʶj maʶwtˤiʶniʶj aːlʃbaːbu ln jkilaa hamuuhu ʔan tstaqilaa ʔaw jabjd ħfðˤ d͡ʒmjʕ mn fj aʶːlˤsˤf aʶːlˤqsˤjdaʶ ʕn ðˤhrˤ qlb wakaʔasanaː dihaaːqanaː faaːʕlam ʔaannahu laaː ʔiilaha ʔiillaaː aːlllahu waaːstaʁfir liðanbika walilmuʔuminijna waaːlmuʔuminaaːti waaːlllahu jaʕlamu mutaqallabakum wamaθwaaːkum wqaːl qrjnh hðaː maː ldj ʕtjd ʔilaː aːlʁd ʔinh mħðˤwðˤ ʔakθr mmaː hw ðkj aʶːlˤsˤrˤaʶːʕ bjn ʔisraːʔijl wswrjaː jtfaːqm waʔiinna rabbaka lajaʕlamu maaː tukinnu sˤuʶduʶwrˤuʶhuʶm wamaaː juʕlinuwna ʔiðaː aːbtsm aːlmhzwm ʔafqd aʶːlˤmntsˤrˤ lða aːlfwz kaːn saːmj ʕlaː maː juraːm kul χdˤrˤaʶːwaʶːtk maː ʔad͡ʒml smaːʕ hðh aːlqaːfja ql lj jħb twm aːlħdjθ ʕn aːld͡ʒwlf qaaːla mud͡ʒaaːhidun qaːl rb bmaː ʔaʁwjtnj lʔazjnn lhm fj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wlʔaʁwjnhm ʔad͡ʒmʕjn wad͡ʒahlu maaː jabtadiʔiu bihi aːlmutaʕallimu ʔaaqbaħu min d͡ʒahli maaː jantahij ʔilajhi aːlʕaaːlimu kl ʃjʔ ħwlj jðkrnj bk ʔinhu ʔaqtbaːs mn aːlktaːb aːlχmjs aːlqaːdm hw jwm ʕtˤlˤaʶ lqd ʃrrfat d͡ʒaːmʕtnaː waʔaanna ʕalajhi aːlnnaʃʔaaaa aːlʔauχraaː lmaːðaː laː trjdwn ʔan tχbrwnaː baːlħqjqa famaaː minkum mmin ʔaaħadin ʕanhu ħaaːd͡ʒizijna kaːnwaː qljlaː mn aːlljl maː jhd͡ʒʕwn wlwlaː nʕma rbj lknt mn aʶːlˤmħdˤrˤjn hl tʕlm aːn aʶːlˤslˤtˤʕwn jʔakl aːlʃraːʁf ʔaχbrt waːldjj bnwaːjaːj ʔanaː mskjn ʔinh mʕrwf llbld bʔasrh tsˤlˤ ʕlaː hðaː aːlʔasaːs sʔabqaː ʔakθr qljlaː maː ħdθ fj fjjt naːm kaːn kaːlkaːbws faqaaːla ʔaanaaː rabbukumu aːlʔaaʕlaaː wkjf tʔaχðwnh wqd ʔaʶfdˤaʶː bʕdˤkm ʔilaː bʕdˤ wʔaχðn mnkm mjθaːqaː ʁlˤjðˤaʶː jbdw qwjaːan saːmj bχjr faʔaaχaða haðaaː aːlmaʕnaaː maʶnsˤuʶwrˤuʶ bnu ʔismaaːʕijla faqaaːla waʔiinnahu laqasamun llaw taʕlamuwna ʕaʶðˤiʶjmuʶn ðalika biʔaannahum ʃaaːqquwaː aːlllaha warasuwlahu waman juʃaaːqiqi aːlllaha warasuwlahu faʔiinna aːlllaha ʃadijdu aːlʕiqaaːbi hðh ʔawl mra ʔaktb baːllʁa aːlʕrbja aːfʕl maː tħb bʕd aːlmʕaːnaːa tʔatj aːlrfaːhja jd͡ʒb ʕljk ʔan tktb rsaːlaan qul ʔiinnij laaː ʔaamliku lakum dˤaʶrˤrˤaʶnaʶː walaaː raʃadanaː waːllh ʔaʕlm bmaː jwʕwn ʃkraːan lħbk kaːnt kʔam θaːnja baːlnsba lj nðˤrˤ ʔiljj ʃzranaː wd͡ʒdt mtˤʕmaʶː mksjkjaː d͡ʒjdaː dʕnaː fqtˤ nsˤbħ ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ ʔanfshm fj d͡ʒhnm χaːldwn waqijla liʔaabij hurajraaa rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu laːa juʔuminu ʔaaħadukum ħattaaː juħibba lʔaiaχijhi maaː juħibbu linafsihi lam jaχlu ʔaan jakuwna sˤaʶdiʶjqaʶnaʶː ʔakθr mnk maːlaː wʔaʕz nfraː waʔaanta taχdumuhaaː watuħibbu mawtahaaː maːrjaː tsaːʕd waːldthaː wamaaː janbaʁij lilrraħmani ʔaan jattaχiða waladanaː hj lm tktʃf aːlħqjqa ʔabdaː ħðˤh jsbq ðkaːʔh hðh waljuriħ ðabijħatahu ʔiʶntðˤrˤ dqjqa jaː twm tbrrʕa baːlkθjr mn aːlmaːl laː ʔaʶsˤdq ʔan ʕljj ʔaχð aːχtbaːr jwm aːlʔaħd km jwd͡ʒd mn sʔuaːl ʔinh jtħdθ aːlʔan mʕhaː wajaʕmalu fijhaaː ʕamala waðikraaː lilmuʔuminijna qtˤk laː jrjd ʔan jnzl mn mktbj waʔiinna ʔaand͡ʒaba aːlnnisaaːʔi aːlfaruwku ʔauħibbu ʔaalaːlaː ʔaaqwma biʃajʔin χilaːla aʶːlˤʕuʶtˤlˤaʶiʶ wamaaː ʔaadraaːka maaː sid͡ʒd͡ʒijnun sajaquwluwna lillahi qul ʔaafalaaː tattaquwna aːlkθjr mn aːlnaːs jd͡ʒhlwn ʔan aʶːlˤmdˤaʶːdaʶːt aːlħjwja ljst ldjhaː tʔaθjr ʕlaː aʶːlˤʔaʶmrˤaʶːdˤ aːlfjrwsja tdχl fjmaː knt ʔaqwm bh fkðbwh fʕqrwhaː fdmdm ʕljhm rbhm bðnbhm fswaːhaː wahuwa bikulli ʔaaħadin qabijħun wabiaːlʕulamaaːʔi ʔaaqbaħu maaː baʕaθa aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː min baʕdihi nabijjanaː ʔillaaː fij θarwaain min qawmihi waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu masʕuwdin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu lijaʕlama ʔaan qad ʔaablaʁuwaː risaaːlaaːti rabbihim waʶʔaʶaʶħaʶaʶːtˤaʶ bimaaː ladajhim waʶʔaʶaʶħsˤaʶaʶː kulla ʃajʔin ʕadadanaː ʔaaraaːhum ʔiðaaː ʔaajsart lazimuwk waqaaːla firʕawnu jaaː haaːmaaːnu aːbni lij sˤaʶrˤħaʶnaʶː laʕallij ʔaabluʁu aːlʔaasbaaːba qaːl fʔink mn aʶːlˤmnðˤrˤjn sjdnj hj ʔakbr mdjna fj aːstraːljaː laaː tanaaːluwna maaː ʕizijna ʔaʶtˤlˤq mnnaːd aːlnnaːr waliðalika qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʕulamaaːʔi aːnaː raːhb wamaaː ʔaadraaːka maaː saqaru aʶːuʶnðˤuʶrˤ ʔilaaː qawli aːlʃʃaaːʕir ʔaj ʃjʔ ʔaːχr aːstχdm qdmjk lqd knt sˤaʶːmtaʶː biwud͡ʒuwbi ðalika biaːlʃʃarʕi laː jsˤlˤaʶːhaʶː ʔilaː aːlʔaʃqaː kaːn mnnaːd mnd͡ʒðbaː ʔilaː klaː aːld͡ʒnsjn lm jd͡ʒd twm mftaːħh fj ʔaj mkaːn jʔatwk bkl sħaːr ʕljm ʔanaː laː ʔaʕrf θlaːθa lʁaːt ʁtˤst fj aːlmsbħ ʔinhm jtd͡ʒaːhlwnnj χlq aːlʔinsaːn mn sˤlˤsˤaʶːlˤ kaːlfχaːr hðaː mwsm aʶːlˤbtˤjχ bismi aːllhi maːðaː tʕtqd ʔaʶfdˤlˤ wsjla lˤlˤwsˤwlˤ ʔilaː mnzl twm mn hnaː ʔinhaː lʔiħdaː aːlkbr ʔin aːlʔinsaːn χlq hlwʕaː walisaaːnanaː waʃafatajni mrħbaːan wkʔajn mn qrja ʕtt ʕn ʔamr rbhaː wrslh fħaːsbnaːhaː ħsaːbaː ʃdjdaː wʕðbnaːhaː ʕðaːbaː nkraː waʶʔaʶaʶʕtˤaʶaʶː qalijlaː waʔaakdaaː ʕn aːljmjn wʕn aːlʃmaːl ʕzjn mn jraːqb aːlmraːqbjn fltbdʔa aːlmbaːraːa wjnsˤrˤk aːllh nsˤrˤaʶː ʕzjzaː bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm waːlsmaːʔ ðaːt aːlbrwd͡ʒ laː ʔaħb ʔan jklmnj aːlnaːs warad͡ʒaaːʔa aːlʕafwi ʕanhu waːldj jχtˤʔiʶ lj waːldtj ʔink trˤdˤj ʁrwrj waʕuwtiba ʔaanuwʃirwaaːna ʕalaaː tarki ʕiqaaːbi ʔamrnj ʔan ʔaqwm bhðaː fqmt bh ʔafnd͡ʒʕl aːlmslmjn kaːlmd͡ʒrmjn falaaː ʔauqsimu biaːlχunnasi maːðaː trjd ʔasmʕ aʶːlˤtˤbwlˤ hw jʕrf aːlkθjr ʕn aːlħjwaːnaːt ʔanaː waːθq mn nfsj aːstmʕt aʶːlˤqtˤaʶ lˤχtˤwaʶːthaʶː faʶsˤaʶlˤlˤiʶ lirabbika waaːnħar nħn kaːlʔiχwa ʔinmaː ʔant mnðr mn jχʃaːhaː aʶːlˤχtˤtˤ tħaːk fj ʁrf ʔiinnij qataltu minhum nafsanaː faʔaaχaaːfu ʔaan jaqtuluwni waʔaawfara taħabbubanaː watawaddudanaː θm ʔiðaː kʃf aʶːlˤdˤrˤ ʕnkm ʔiðaː frjq mnkm brbhm jʃrkwn wamaaː ʕalajka ʔaalaːaːa jazzakaaː twaːd͡ʒh aːljaːbaːn ʔazmaːt aʶːqtsˤaʶːdjaʶ qaːsja waʕamala aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶːtiʶ fiʕlun wahuwa ʔaaθqalu man ʔaaʃaaːra ʕalajk biʶaʶːsˤtˤiʶnaʶaʶːʕiʶ d͡ʒaaːhilin ʔaaw ʕaaːd͡ʒizin ʔawqʕ fj aʶːlˤχtˤʔiʶ fkaːn bihi jastahziʔiuwna waðalikum ðˤaʶnnuʶkuʶmuʶ aːllaðij ðˤaʶnaʶntuʶm birabbikum ʔaardaaːkum faʶʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħtuʶm mina aːlχaaːsirijna sʔaʃrʕ sˤjaʶːmaʶː ʕn aːlmaːʔ ʔiinna aːlssaaːʕaaa ʔaːtijaaun ʔaakaaːdu ʔauχfijhaaː litud͡ʒzaaː kullu nafsin bimaaː tasʕaaː mqsˤdj dfʕ aːlʁrjm wʕlaː aːllh aːʕtmaːdj ʔanaː hdmt aːlmdrsa jaaː sˤaʶaʶːħiʶbaʶ aːlʕilmi taʕallam min aːlʕilmi maaː d͡ʒahilt waʕallim aːld͡ʒuhhaaːla ʔabjkm wtkwnwaː mn bʕdh qwmaː sˤaʶːlˤħjn waaːallaðij min taħti ʔaard͡ʒulihim aːlχasfu jaaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː ʔiin taʶnsˤuʶrˤuʶwaʶː aːlllaha jaʶnsˤuʶrˤkuʶm wajuθabbit ʔaaqdaaːmakum ʔanaː ʔaʕml kl jwm ʕdaː aːlʔaħd ktb hðaː aːlktaːb ʕndmaː kaːn ʕmrh ʕʃrjn sna walaqad taraknaaːhaaː ʔaːjaaan fahal min muddakirin ʃkraːan kθjraːan nmtʕhm qljlaː θm ndˤtˤrˤhm ʔilaː ʕðaːb ʁlˤjðˤ faʔiiðaaː wamaθalanaː mina aːllaðijna χalawaː min qablikum waʶmaʶwʕiʶðˤaʶaʶaʶn lilmuttaqijna waːllðaːn jʔatjaːnhaː mnkm fʔaːðwhmaː fʔin taːbaː wʔaʶsˤlˤħaʶː fʔaʶʕrˤdˤwaʶː ʕnhmaː ʔin aːllh kaːn twaːbaː rħjmaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːbiʶrˤiʶjnaʶ waʔaanna aːʕtiqaaːdahu ħud͡ʒd͡ʒaaun walaaː jaħzunka qawluhum ʔiinna aːlʕizzaaa lillahi d͡ʒamijʕanaː huwa aːlssamijʕu aːlʕalijmu kaaːna wufuwru aːlʕaqli waʶðˤuʶhuʶwrˤuʶ taχfijfu aːlʔaaθqaaːli ʕanhu wlqd ʔanzlnaː ʔiljkm ʔaːjaːt mbjnaːt wmθlaː mn aːlðjn χlwaː mn qblkm wmwʕðˤaʶ llmtqjn qaaːla ʔaʶaʶwsaʶtˤuʶhuʶm ʔaalam ʔaaqul lakum lawlaaː tusabbiħuwna dˤħk djmaː ʔiillaaː huwa faʔaannaaː tuʔufakuwna jaaː ʔaabaaː hurajraaa zur ʁibbanaː tazdad ħubbanaː ʔahm χjr ʔam qwm tbʕ waːlðjn mn qblhm ʔahlknaːhm ʔinhm kaːnwaː md͡ʒrmjn fʔaːmnwaː baːllh wrswlh waːlnwr aːlðj ʔanzlnaː waːllh bmaː tʕmlwn χbjr fajawmaʔiiðin waqaʕati aːlwaaːqiʕaau waqaaːla ʔaazdaʃijru bnu baaːbaka ʔant niʕma aʶːlˤtˤaʶːlˤb aːlrjaːħ ʃdjda aːljwm ʔalaːʔ wakulla ʔiinsaaːnin ʔaalzamnaaːhu tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶrˤaʶhuʶ fij ʕunuqihi wanuχrid͡ʒu lahu jawma aːlqijaaːmaai kitaaːbanaː jalqaaːhu manʃuwranaː walaqad ʔaaχaðnaaːhum biaːlʕaðaaːbi famaaː aːstakaaːnuwaː lirabbihim wamaaː jaʶtaʶdˤaʶrˤrˤaʶʕuʶwnaʶ laː jmknnj ʔiʶqrˤaʶːdˤ twm fj aːlwqt aːlħaːlj bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi ʔaataaː ʔaamru aːlllahi falaaː tastaʕd͡ʒiluwhu subħaaːnahu wataʕaaːlaaː ʕammaaː juʃrikuwna ʃms wmtˤrˤ qws quzħ waaːlbaʁja mustawlin ʕalajhi ʔiðaaː qadara bjtj mrjħ ʔakθr mn bjtk ðhbt ʔilaː aːlmdrsa ʔams ʔanti jmknki aʶːlˤrˤqsˤ ʔaljs kðlk bjdˤaʶːʔ lða llʃaːrbjn sʔaʶsˤlˤħ draːd͡ʒtj fj aːlbjt warawaaː χaaːlidu bnu maʕdaaːna ʕan aːlmiqdaaːmi qaaːla waʔaammaaː taʶqsˤiʶjrˤuʶ aʶːlˤlˤlˤaʶfðˤiʶ wazijaaːdatuhu famin aːlʔaasbaaːbi aʶːlˤχaʶaʶːsˤsˤaʶaʶiʶ duwna aːlʕaaːmmaai ʔinaː ʔaːmnaː brbnaː ljʁfr jafqahuwna ʔin aːlmnaːfqjn fj aːldrk aːlʔasfl mn aːlnaːr wln td͡ʒd lhm nsˤjrˤaʶː waqaaːla maslamaau bnu ʕabdi aːlmaliki rʁm kl ʃjʔ fhj lm tʔatj ʔaʶsttˤjʕ tʕljm aːllʁa aːlʔind͡ʒljzja laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ aʶːlˤmaʶnaʶaʶːðˤiʶrˤuʶ faʶʔaʶaʶχtˤaʶʔaʶaʶ baaːna naʶqsˤuʶhuʶ hðaː aːlktaːb lj waːlðjn kðbwaː bʔaːjaːtnaː waːstkbrwaː ʕnhaː ʔawlʔik ʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːlnaːr hm fjhaː χaːldwn lʔaχðnaː mnh baːljmjn kaːd twm waʶʔaʶaʶtˤiʶjʕuʶwaʶː aːlrrasuwla laʕallakum turħamuwna wajantafij ʕanhum taʶbaʶaʶːʁuʶdˤuʶ aːlʕadami wahija ʔaaχbaθu ʔaaħwaaːli aːlmukallafijna ʔajmknk ʔan ttħdθ bbtˤʔiʶ mn fdˤlˤk ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔiʶj wjqwlwn ʔaʔinaː ltaːrkw ʔaːlhtnaː lʃaːʕr md͡ʒnwn laaː tunaaːziʕuwaː ʔaahla aːlddunjaaː fij dunjaaːhum fajunaaːziʕuwkum fij dijnikum jsʔalwn ʔajaːn jwm aːldjn ʔanaː ʔaʕlm ʔanh mʃʁwl nʔasf lwfaːth faʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlʕaaːduwna waʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːljamijni maaː ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːljamijni lħiq aʶːlˤsˤjaʶːd ʔaːθaːr aːldb wad͡ʒaaːʔuwaː ʔaabaaːhum ʕiʃaaːʔan jabkuwna ʔaħjaːnaː ʔanaːm fj aːlqsm ʔalqi nðˤrˤaʶaʶn ʕlaː hðh aʶːlˤχrˤjtˤaʶ ʔawd ħd͡ʒz mwʕd llmʕaːld͡ʒa baːlflwraːjd laːbnj lqd tˤlˤb lnaː ʃraːʔiħ aːllħm twm ljbraːlj wajalħaqu biʔaaħwaaːli aːlʕaaːmilijna aʶːlˤqtˤ tħt aːlmaːʔida twm ljs sʕjdaː waχajru aːlʔaaʕmaaːli maaː aːstaħaqqa ʃukranaː ʔazft aːlʔaːzfa ʔaθq fj qdrtk waːlðjn kfrwaː wkðbwaː bʔaːjaːtnaː ʔawlʔik ʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːld͡ʒħjm ʔaam tasʔaaluhum ʔaad͡ʒranaː fahum min maʁramin muθqaluwna wajad͡ʒʕaluwna lillahi aːlbanaaːti subħaaːnahu walahum maaː jaʃtahuwna waʶħaʶfiʶðˤnaʶaʶːhaʶaʶː min kulli ʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːniʶn rad͡ʒijmin ʔasrʕ w ʔilaː fsjfwtk aʶːlˤqtˤaʶːrˤ aːʃtraː twm kaːmjraː qijla waʕumuwmuhu ʔaan jastawd͡ʒiba d͡ʒamijʕa aːlʔaaħwaaːli aːlðjn ʕaːhdt mnhm θm jnqdˤwn ʕhdhm fj kl mra whm laː jtqwn waraħima ʔaahla aːlddajni waaːlmaskanaai blaː ʔin rbh kaːn bh bsˤjrˤaʶː wqaːlwaː nħn ʔakθr ʔamwaːlaː wʔawlaːdaː wmaː nħn bmʕðbjn twm ljs ʔaħmq ʔaaʔiiðaaː kunnaaː ʕiʶðˤaʶaʶːmaʶnaʶː naχiraaan kaːn hnaːk aːzdħaːm kbjr llsjaːraːt wstˤ mdjna kjwtw aːllh rbkm wrb ʔaːbaːʔikm aːlʔawljn maʕa qillatihim ʔaanna aːlnnabija sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama qaaːla laː fjhaː ʁwl wlaː hm ʕnhaː jnzfwn hl bʔimkaːnk ʔiʃʕaːl msˤaʶːbjħ sjaːrtk ʔanta trjd aʶːlˤtˤlˤaʶːq ʔaljs kðlk ʕalajhaaː tisʕaaa ʕaʃara ʔaaħabbu ʔaʶaʶsˤhaʶaʶːrˤiʶj ʔilajja aːlqabru twm jʕrf d͡ʒjdaːan kjf jtm aːlaːħtfaːl baːlʕjd ħkma baːlʁa fmaː tʁn aːlnðr kðlk wʔawrθnaːhaː bnj ʔisraːʔijl ʔajn jʕjʃ aʶːlˤtˤwaʶːrˤq tʁlq aːlbwaːba ljlaː kaːnt tlbs blwza ħmraːʔ wtnwra bjdˤaʶːʔ ʕljk ʔan tnd͡ʒz waːd͡ʒbaːth fj aːld͡ʒzaːʔir tmθl aːstqaːla ʕbd aːlʕzjz bwtfljqa nhaːja ħqba waʔiið qulnaaː lilmalaaːʔiikaai aːsd͡ʒuduwaː liʔaːdama fasad͡ʒaduwaː ʔiillaaː ʔiiblijsa ʔaabaaː aːlm traː qwa aːlʔijmaːn mn aːlshl ʕlaː sˤbj ħdjθ aːlwlaːda ʔan jmrˤdˤ ʔawlʔik lhm nsˤjb mmaː ksbwaː waːllh srjʕ aːlħsaːb ʔanaː lst aʶːlˤsˤwrˤaʶ wlkn ʔanaː laː ʔarjd aːlhrwb ʔanaː ʔarjd ʔan ʔaraː ʔiʶjtˤaʶːlˤjaʶː ʔinaː ʔanzlnaːh qrʔaːnaː ʕrbjaː lʕlkm tʕqlwn waħadaaːʔiiqa ʁulbanaː hðh aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ lnaː fljʕʃ swdaːnnaː ʕlmaːan bjn wamanaaːaa aːlθθaaːliθaaa aːlʔauχraaː waʔiin ʔaaqamtum ʔaaχaðakum waʔiinna min ʃijʕatihi laʔiibraaːhijma ʔiinna aːllaðijna hum min χaʃjaai rabbihim muʃfiquwna ʔanaː mmtn llʁaːja lmsaːʕdtk d͡ʒahannama ʕan ðij aːlhawaaː ʕazijzu ʔinna aːlhawaaː lajsa lahu tamjijzu waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi laː traː fjhaː ʕwd͡ʒaː wlaː ʔamtaː ʔaatazawwad͡ʒat jaaː zajdu qaaːla qaːlt ʔanhaː stʔatj ʕalaaː ʔaan faaːlʕumuru ʔaʶaʶqsˤaʶrˤuʶ min ʔaan janfada fij ʁajri aːlmanaaːfiʕi qaːlwaː ʔaːmnaː brb aːlʕaːlmjn sˤnʕ lj bil fstaːnanaː d͡ʒmjlanaː maːt aːlʔaχaːn ʔanaː ʔaħb aːllʁa aːljaːbaːnja kθjraːan faʶːsˤbrˤ ʔan tttsˤlˤ bj aːllljla waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu aːlmuʕtazzi raħimahu aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː km mn aːlwqt bqj lˤlˤʔiʶftˤaʶːrˤ faaːltaqamahu aːlħwtu wahuwa muljmun aːlrrad͡ʒulu sabaħa fij aːlnnahri liqillaai taħarruzihi minhaaː juʔulimunj ʔaan tuʕaððiba aːlħajawaaːna laχalqu aːlssamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ʔaakbaru min χalqi aːlnnaːsi walkinna ʔaakθara aːlnnaːsi laː jaʕlamwna naːdaːnj aːlmdrrs baːlʔaħmq waʶjaʶstaʶsˤʁiʶrˤuʶ maʕahaaː kulla kabijrin liʔaanna limaħmuwdihaaː ʔaʶaʶdˤdaʶaʶːdaʶnaʶː muqaaːbilaaan jusʕiduhaaː hawanaː muʶtˤaʶaʶːʕuʶn waʃahwaaun ʁaaːlibaaun aʶːlˤmaʶrˤiʶjdˤuʶ jaʕd͡ʒizu ʕanhu fajakrahu taqaddumahu fijhi waʶaʶːχtiʶsˤaʶaʶːsˤaʶhuʶ bihi wahaðaaː jakuwnu min sˤiʶjaʶaʶːnaʶaʶiʶ aːlnnafsi wakamaaːli aːlmuruwʔaai taʕrud͡ʒu aːlmalaːʔiikaau waaːlrrwħu ʔiilajhi fj jawmin kaːna miqdaːruhu χamsjna ʔaalfa sanaain nħn hnaː jartad͡ʒijka raaːʁibun waʶsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ biʶaʶːlˤfaʶdˤlˤiʶ maʃhuwranaː salaːmun hija ħattaː maʶtˤlˤaʶʕiʶ aːlfad͡ʒri ʔiðaaː lam takun nafsu aːlʃʃarijfi ʃarijfaaan waʔiin kaaːna ðaaː qadrin falajsa lahu ʃarafu waʔaand͡ʒaħu lilmutaʕallimi wakaaːna kaʶmuʶstaʶnhiʶdˤiʶ aːlmasd͡ʒuwni walaaː jad͡ʒʕala lˤiʶlˤʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːniʶ suʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːnaʶnaʶː fij naʶqdˤiʶ ʕazaaːʔiimihi waʶmuʶʕaʶaʶːrˤaʶdˤaʶaʶiʶ χaaːliqihi θalaaːθaaun laaː jaslamu ʔaaħadun minhunna lqd tʁjjr saːmj kn lˤtˤjfaʶː hðh aːlmrra jðhb kjn llssbaːħa jwmaːan bʕd jwm hl ʁjjrti rʔajki aːlʔaːθaaːmi dʕt ljlaː saːmj ʔilaː mnzlhaː hmaː fj nfs aːlʕmr walaqad raʔaːhu biaːlʔaufuqi aːlmubjni kaːn mdrrsw saːmj jkrhwnh daːʔimaː aːlθθawbu qaʶsˤiʶjrˤuʶn knt ʔaʕlm ʔanh ʔant maː rʔajk ʔanðhb baːlsjaːra ʔam baːltaːksj aːld͡ʒannaau laaː jadχuluhaaː dajjuwθun walaaː qallaaːʕun aːlʕzjzaːlrħjmaːlrzaːqaːlʃaːfj twsˤsˤlˤ faʶːdˤlˤ mn ʔiʶsˤaʶːbaʶ raːmj btˤlˤqaʶ fj aʶːlˤðˤðˤhrˤ dʕjnj ʔaʶnðˤrˤ ʔiljki ʔasrʕ mn shm aːlquluwbu ʔaawʕijaau aːlʔaasraaːri lqd sˤfqnaʶː ʕaːda ljs ʕndj wqt kaːf ltnaːwl wd͡ʒba ʁdaːʔ kbjra lˤħðˤaʶ ʔiinna aːlʔaabraːra lafj naʕjmin fij waʶsˤiʶjjaʶtiʶhiʶ fij aːlbalaaːʁaai fwwt saːmj drs aʶːlˤttsˤwjrˤ ʔiin taʶdˤrˤiʶb qiʶtˤtˤaʶnaʶː jaχmiʃka ʔilaː ðlk aːlħjn maː θmn hðh aːlqbbʕa ʔiin ʔaanta ʔiillaː naðjrun maːðaː trjd aːlʔaːn ʔanaː ʔaqwm bkl maː bwsʕj lʔansaː ʔann ðlk qd ħdθ waaːstaχʃanat dˤaʶrˤrˤaʶaʶːʔuʶuʶhuʶ nʃʔa saːmj fj ʔasra mn aʶːlˤtˤtˤbqaʶ aʶːlˤwstˤaʶː ljs ldj ʕlm mn ʔajn d͡ʒaːʔt ʔin ʃtmt ljlaː mrra ʔaχraː sʔaksr ʔasnaːnk jaʕuwdu aːlʁarijbu ʔiilaaː baladihi waaːlʔaad͡ʒmala min tˤaʶrˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶqiʶhaʶaʶː χrd͡ʒ saːmj ljħtfl kaːn saːmj jħbb kwnh mslmaː ʔawl aːlʃd͡ʒra bðra kaːn saːmj jtʁjjb ʕn aːlddrws drs saːmj mn ʔad͡ʒl ʃhaːda aːlddktwraː aːldχwl lˤlˤmwðˤfjn fqtˤ jaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːlʔiinsaːnu ʔiinnaka kaːdiħun ʔiilaː rabbika kadħanaː famulaːqjhi ʔaam jaqwlwna ʃaːʕirun naʶtaʶrˤaʶbbaʶsˤuʶ bihi rajba aːlmanwni hðaː ħj sjʔ wakaːnwaː juʶsˤiʶrˤrˤwnaʶ ʕalaaː aːlħinθi aʶːlˤʕaʶðˤjmiʶ wabajjana lahum ʃarijʕatahu ʔinn ħjaːtj ljst mʃkltk wakajfa ðalika jaaː rasuwla aːlllahi qaaːla faʕan ðalika d͡ʒawaaːbaaːni ʔiinnaka majjitun waʔiinnahum majjitwna ʔaaχrad͡ʒa minhaː maːʔahaː wamarʕaːhaː aːldnjaː ktaːb aːlmrʔaa ʔaannahu χarad͡ʒa jawmanaː ʔilaaː ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbiʶhiʶ wahuwa jaquwlu ln ʔans hðh aːlttd͡ʒrba ʔabdaː hw fj aːlmrkz aːlttd͡ʒaːrj jħdˤrˤ saːmj aːlʔaːn ħfl zfaːf aʶːlˤʕaʶsˤfuʶwrˤuʶ masd͡ʒuwnun fij aʶːlˤqaʶfaʶsˤiʶ ʔalnaː bʃwka lm ʔant wqħ lhðh aːldrd͡ʒa saːmj ʁjr rˤaʶːdˤiʶn bwðˤjfth aʶːlˤtˤqs fj aːnd͡ʒltraː ʔakθr aːʕtdaːlaːa mmaː hw ʕljh fj aːskwtlaːndaː ħarrik munaaːk ʔiðaaː aːʁtamamt faʔiinnahuna maraaːwiħu waqaaːla ʔaːχaru fawaqaːhu aːlllahu sajjiʔiaaːti maː makarwaː waħaːqa biʔaːli firʕawna swʔu aːlʕaðaːbi wataraknaː ʕalajhi fij aːlʔaːχirjna faʔiinna ðalika ʔaʶaʶʕðˤaʶmuʶ liʔaad͡ʒrihim wazaaːda ʕalaaː ħaddi aːlkifaaːjaai jbdw ʁaʶːmdˤaʶː ħwl maː ʔaraːd fʕlh ʔinhaː fj aːd͡ʒtmaːʕ aːlʔaːn ʕlaː aːlmrʔ ʔan jfʕl kll maː bwsʕh fahaðaaː ʔaaljaqu biʔaahli aːlmuruwʔaai waʔaaʕammu d͡ʒadwaaː wamanfaʕaaan waʔiin kaaːna ʕaqiba aːlttaʔaamuli salijmanaː waʔiiðaaː aːlbiħaːru fud͡ʒd͡ʒirat waʔaanʃaʔaa jaquwlu halaka ʕannj suʶlˤtˤaʶːniʶjaʶh sjqdˤj saːmj bqjja ħjaːth fj aːlssd͡ʒn hl ðhbt ʔilaː aːlmħll aːqdaʕuwaː haðihi aːlnnufuwsa ʕan ʃahawaaːtihaaː faʔiinnahaaː tˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶuʶn tanziʕu ʔilaaː ʃarri ʁaaːjaain ħdθ ðlk lj mrraːt ʕdda lklin ðwqh dʕaː saːmj ljlaː ltnaːwl wd͡ʒba lħm mʃwj waaːlqismu aːlχaaːmisu aʶːstjqðˤ saːmj ʔaχjraː mn aːlʁjbwba aʶːntðˤrˤ saːmj ʔilaː ħjn ʁaːdrt ljlaː ʔaalam naχluqkum min maːʔin saːmj bkaː w bkaː w bkaː tʕrrf saːmj ʕlaː mslmjn mn dwl ʔislaːmjja mχtlfa waqad waʶsˤaʶfaʶ baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʃʃuʕaraaːʔi aːlʔiinsaaːna faqaaːla ʔaalaː ʔiinnahum min ʔiifkihim lajaqwlwna waqaaːla muʶsˤʕaʶbuʶ bnu aːlzzubajri aʶːlˤttaʶwaʶaʶːdˤuʶʕuʶ maʶsˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶduʶ aːlʃʃarafi waman laaː jastaħiqquhu ʃarrun min aːlχinzijri kaːn saːmj mħbbaː lʔawlaːdh aːliaːstiħjaaːʔu min d͡ʒazaaːʔi aːld͡ʒawaaːbi faʔaammaaː aʶːlˤfwdˤaʶː bʔimkaːnk aʶːlˤaʶːħtfaʶːðˤ bh mannaːʕin lilχajri muʕtadin murjbin jursili aːlssamaːʔa ʕalajkum midraːranaː waqaaːla lirad͡ʒulin jumaaːʃijhi ʔiχtrqt aʶːlˤrˤsˤaʶːsˤaʶ d͡ʒsdh kaːn saːmj jrjd ʔan thtmm bh aːlftjaːt ʕaːd ʔilaː kra aːlqdm aʶːttsˤlˤ aːlmdrrs bʔammj dʕaː saːmj ljlaː llʕʃaːʔ kaːn ðlk aʶːlˤdˤdˤd͡ʒjd͡ʒ qwjjaː d͡ʒddaː ljs aːld͡ʒmjl ʁaːljaːan bl aːlʁaːlj hw aːld͡ʒmjl jsrrnj aʶːlˤdˤdˤħjaʶ aːlttaːlja lm jʃfaː aʶːlˤħsˤaʶːn χuðuwaː zijnatakum ʔanaː ʁd͡ʒrjja ʔaan jakuwna mustawdaʕanaː fij sˤaʶniʶjʕiʶn maʃkuwrin ʕaːdaan maː ʔalʕb aːltns lqd ʔafsdt kl ʃjʔ maː ʔaʶlˤtˤfk fasawwaaːhuna sabʕa samaaːwaaːtin wahuwa bikulli ʃajʔin ʕalijmun ʔaanaaː ʔaaʕlamu lakum ðalika ʔiðaː ðkrt aːlðʔib fχð aːlħðr jaqwlu ʔaahlaktu maːlanaː lubadanaː waman aːltamasa mawaddaaa aːlnnaaːsi jntðˤrˤ fj aːlχaːrd͡ʒ waʔaand͡ʒajnaaː aːllaðjna ʔaːmanwaː wakaːnwaː jattaqwna ʔin aːlnfs lʔamaːra baːlswʔ maːzaːl jd͡ʒb dfʕ aːlfaːtwra aːljwm wamaː jaʶntˤiʶquʶ ʕani aːlhawaː ʔajn kntm d͡ʒmjʕkm aːlfaqijru muħtaaːd͡ʒun ʔauwlʔiika aːllaðjna laʕanahumu aːlllahu faʶʔaʶaʶsˤaʶmmaʶhuʶm waʔaaʕmaː ʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶːrˤaʶhuʶm aːlʕaaːqilu aːlkarijmu sˤaʶdiʶjquʶ kulli ʔaaħadin ʔillaaː man dˤaʶrˤrˤaʶhuʶ waʔaaħdaθa bihi min hammin waʶaʶːlˤiʶaʶːnqiʶtˤaʶaʶːʕuʶ ʕan aːlʕamali ʔilaaː aːlʕilmi ʔiðaaː ʕamila bimuwd͡ʒibi aːlʕilmi waaːlʕafwu ʕinda aːlqudraai watilka aːlʔaamθaːlu naʶdˤrˤiʶbuʶhaʶː lilnnaːsi wamaː jaʕqiluhaː ʔiillaaː aːlʕaːlimwna waʔiisʕaaːfuhum fij nawaaːʔiibihim walaaː fusħaaa liðij muruwʔaain maʕa ðˤuʶhuʶwrˤiʶ aːlmuknaai ʔaan jakilahum ʔilaaː ʁajrihi ʔiið nad͡ʒd͡ʒajnaːhu waʔaahlahu ʔaad͡ʒmaʕjna laqad χalaqnaaː aːlʔiinsaːna fj kabadin ħaːwl ʔan jtqn aːlfrnsja θumma d͡ʒaʕala ʔilaaː rasuwlihi wabiʕuquwlihim muktafijna ʔimmaaː lˤiʶsˤiʶjaʶaʶːnaʶaʶiʶ ʕiʶrˤdˤiʶn jad͡ʒuwdu biaːlwaʕdi walakinnahu jadhunu min qaaːruwraain faaːriʁah jaʕijʃu aːlssamaku fij aːlmaaːʔi lawwaːħaaun lilbaʃari faqutila kajfa qaddara ʔanzl saːmj naːfðth ʕaːd aːlʔamr ʔilaː nsˤaʶːbh laː bd ʔanh ʁbj ljqwm bʃjʔ khðaː ln jfwz twm waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi fij ʔiʶʁdˤaʶaʶːbiʶk raaːħaau ʔaʶaʶʕsˤaʶaʶːbiʶk liʔaanna haðihi ʔaumuwrun laaː jumkinu aːlʔiinsaaːnu dafʕahaaː ʕan nafsihi taʶsˤaʶddaʶquʶwaʶː ʕalaaː ʔaaχijkum biʕilmin jurʃiduhu wajarfaʕa ħaqijranaː kaːn saːmj jdrs aːlʔislaːm srrjaː buʕiθtu liʔautammima makaaːrima aːlʔaaχlaaːqi wasuʔiila ʕalijjun karrama aːlllahu wad͡ʒhahu ʕan aːlssaχaaːʔi faqaaːla waaːlʕaaːʃiru min ʔaasbaaːbihi aːlmakru watawaqquʕu aʶːlˤfuʶrˤaʶsˤiʶ aːlχalfijjaai kaːn saːmj jsmʕ lħmaːs sˤbjaʶːnj fj sˤwt ljlaː maːrʔajk bhðh aʶːlˤχtˤaʶ lm ʔasmʕ lhaː sˤwtaʶː tˤwaʶːlˤ aːllljl waqaaːla mud͡ʒaaːhidun ʔaʶaʶʕtˤaʶaʶː kulla ʃajʔi zawd͡ʒaaan θumma hadaaːhu linikaaːħihaaː wamaː ʔaadraːka maaː aʶːlˤħuʶtˤaʶmaʶaʶuʶ aʶːlˤħsˤaʶːn ħjwaːn hm jntðˤrˤwnnj fqdt ʔaʶʕsˤaʶːbhaʶː kaj laaː jakuwna maʕa aʶːlˤwaʶsˤmaʶaʶiʶ laː jzaːl aʶːlˤħsˤaʶːn jrtd͡ʒf lam jalid walam jwlad hðh md͡ʒrrd aʶːftrˤaʶːdˤaʶːt mnki kaːn maʶːdˤj saːmj jtˤaʶːrˤdh llʔabd aːχtbʔa saːmj wad͡ʒamaʕa faʔaawʕaː ʔant btˤlˤnaʶː faʔaammaː man ʔawtija kitaːbahu bijamjnihi waχasafa aːlqamaru waaːʕlam ʔaanna lilnnafsi ħaaːlatajni jawma hum ʕalaaː aːlnnaːri juftanwna maliki aːlnnaːsi fj raqqin manʃwrin ʔaχrd͡ʒ aːlqmaːma qdˤaʶː nħbh wajatasallaaː biʔauwlij aːlʕibari faqaaːla ʔaabuw bakri bnu muħammadin aːlʃʃaaːʃiju fij ʔaʶuʶsˤuʶwlˤiʶ aːlfiqhi waʶʔaʶaʶʕtˤiʶfuʶ ʕalajhim jrjd saːmj ʔan jmdˤj bʕdˤ aːlwqt lwħdh bqija aːlwld haːdʔiaːan faman ʔaʶaʶsχaʶtˤaʶ suʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːnaʶhuʶ taʶʕaʶrˤrˤaʶdˤaʶ lilmanijjaai waman ʔaawħaʃa ʔiχwaaːnahu tabarraʔaa min aːlħurrijaai fawajlun lillaðijna jaktubuwna aːlkitaaːba biʔaajdijhim θumma jaquwluwna haaːðaaː min ʕindi aːlllahi hðh ʔaʕmq nqtˤaʶ fj aːlbħjra ʕaːd ʔilaː znzaːnth ʔarsl saːmj rsaːʔil ʁrjba lljlaː namaaːʔu ziraaːʕaain waʶdˤaʶʕuʶfaʶ raʔajuhu ʕan χijraai ʔaasbaaːbihi wadawaaːʕijhi falaː sˤaʶddaʶqaʶ walaː sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶː dˤbtˤ saːmj mnbbhh kj jstjqðˤ lˤsˤlˤaʶːaʶ aːlfd͡ʒr ʔaaw ʔiʶiʶtˤʕaʶːmuʶn fj jawmin ðj masʁabaain waʔiiðaaː aːuʔutumina falaaː jaχuwnu jaʃtaddu aːlbardu fij aːld͡ʒibaaːli walilʔaumuwri mutaħammilanaː warawaaː hiʃaaːmu bnu ʕurwaaa ʔajn hj lwrj faqawluhu saqijmun lajsa fij χiʶsˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶ aːlʃʃari ʔaaʕdalu min aːlħasadi hl nsjt tʃmjʕ aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤjjaʶ md͡ʒdddaː waaːlnnaːʃiraːti naʃranaː ðhbt ʔamj ʔilaː aːlswq ʔaʁzl mn aːmrʔi aːlqjs kaːn saːmj jħbb ħjaːa aːlħflaːt aːlssaaːʕij bajna manzilatajni qabijħatajni waʔaajjadahum biʶnaʶsˤrˤiʶhiʶ aːχtbʔat ljlaː χlf aːlʃʃd͡ʒra bal qaːlwaː ʔiinnaː wad͡ʒadnaː ʔaːbaːʔanaː ʕalaː ʔaummaain waʔiinnaː ʕalaː ʔaːθaːrihim muhtadwna dˤaʶaʶːʕaʶ aːlmiftaaːħu balaː qad d͡ʒaːʔatka ʔaːjaːtj fakaððabta bihaː waaːstakbarta wakunta mina aːlkaːfirjna fawajlun lillaðjna kafarwaː min jawmihimu aːllaðj jwʕadwna lnlʕb kra aːlqdm kaːn saːmj jʕjʃ ħjaːa laːʔaχlaːqjja ʔanti tbaːlʁjn baːlʃʃk mn hnaː waqad χalaqakum ʔaʶaʶtˤwaʶːrˤaʶnaʶː aːlʕʃaːʔ d͡ʒaːhz tʕaːl ltʔakl ldjnaː mdrrs d͡ʒdjd lm ʔans klaːmk ʃabbat aːlnnaaːru lakinna aːlχasaaːʔiira qalijlaaun fajad͡ʒmaʕu bajna maʕarraai aːlkaðibi minhu aʶːdˤħk mʕhm ldjj aːbna wħjda faʔaammaaː aʶːlˤmaʶtˤaʶaʶːmiʶʕuʶ aːlddanijaau jaʶðˤaʶlˤlˤuʶ aːlʕaaːmilu muʃtaʁilanaː faʔiiðaaː aːlnnud͡ʒwmu tˤuʶmiʶsaʶt waʶðˤiʶlˤlˤiʶn min jaħmwmin hw jswq bsrʕa kaːnt ljlaː mftʕla ħraːʔiq χtˤjrˤaʶ ʔaam lahu aːlbanaːtu walakumu aːlbanwna faʔaammaaː suwʔu aʶːlˤðˤðˤaʶniʶ bihaaː faqad aːχtalafa aːlnnaaːsu fijhi waʶsˤaʶːħiʶbaʶtiʶhiʶ waʔaaχjhi aːʕtnq saːmj aːlʔislaːm fj ʃhr rˤmdˤaʶːn aːnhaː laː tstħq tʕbk waʔaanʃadanij baʶʕdˤuʶ ʔaahli aːlʔaadabi ʔaʶχfdˤ aʶːlˤsˤwt mn fdˤlˤk ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ hðaː aːlʕlaːd͡ʒ waminhu jalħaqu aːlttaaːlij dʕaː saːmj ljlaː ʔaʶjdˤaʶː waqad jamtazid͡ʒu bihaðaaː kasabwaː wajaʕfu ʕan kaθjrin ʔahl ʔabdw ʔanjqaː kaːn saːmj tˤflˤaʶː mbdʕaː tʃbh waːldthaː fj kl ʃjʔ qaːla ʔaawalaw d͡ʒiʔituka biʃajʔin mubjnin wajaː qawmi ʔiinnj ʔaaχaːfu ʕalajkum jawma aːlttanaːdi fadaʕaː rabbahu ʔaannj maʁlwbun faʶaʶːntaʶsˤiʶrˤ liʔaajji jawmin ʔaud͡ʒd͡ʒilat waaːlθθaaːliθu aːld͡ʒamaaːlu waaːlzzijnaau walaaːʔiimin muʶsˤaʶddaʶqiʶn wafij suʔuaaːlihi maħruwmun θumma nutbiʕuhumu aːlʔaːχirjna aʶːlˤʃʃaʶrˤtˤuʶ aːlʔaawwalu waʔiin lam taʶstaʶtˤiʶʕ faʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ faʔiinna fij aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶbrˤiʶ ʕalaaː maaː takrahu χajranaː kaθijranaː ʃkraː lˤlˤtˤfkiʶ wajuqawwimu ʕiwad͡ʒak wamajlak wajuʔuminuk suwʔa aːlmaʁabbaai walam ʔaakun biduʕaaːʔiika rabii ʃaqijjanaː walaw qaːtalakumu aːllaðjna kafarwaː lawallawuaː aːlʔaadbaːra θumma laː jad͡ʒidwna walijjanaː walaː naʶsˤjrˤaʶnaʶː qaaːla ʔabdaː lm jʃʕr saːmj baːlrraːħa wanurjdu ʔaan namunna ʕalaaː aːllaðjna aʶːstuʶdˤʕiʶfwaʶː fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wanad͡ʒʕalahum ʔaaʔiimmaaan wanad͡ʒʕalahumu aːlwaːriθjna wataʃbijhun maʕluwlun kaððaba naʶaʶːtˤiʶquʶn ʔaafqahu aːlnnaaːsi waʶdˤdˤaʶaʶːħuʶ aːljamani fij qawlihi ħfðˤ aːlsr ʔamaːna falammaː d͡ʒaːʔahaː nwdija ʔaan bwrika man fij aːlnnaːri waman ħawlahaː wasubħaːna aːlllahi rabbi waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ jaʶbsuʶtˤuʶ aːlrrizqa liman jaʃaːʔu wajaqdiru ʔiinnahu bikulli ʃajʔin ʕaljmun dafʕu sˤaʶniʶjʕaʶaʶiʶn biʔaajsari muʔunaain waaːktisaaːbu ʔiχwaaːnin biʔaajsari mabðuwlin qaaːluwaː biʶsˤaʶwaʶaʶːbiʶn wad͡ʒadahu min ʁajrihi tðkkr ʔinsaːnjjtk w aːns aːlbaːqj saːʕdnj ʔaχj ʔan ʔaħl waːd͡ʒbj haːhj qwtk jaaː ʔaamijra aːlmuʔuminijna kaʔaanna biaːbni aːlqajni waqad ʔaad͡ʒaaːbanij faqaaːla ʔatqblwn aːldfʕ bbtˤaʶːqaʶ aːlʔiʔitmaːn lakunnaː ʕibaːda aːlllahi aʶːlˤmuʶχlˤaʶsˤjnaʶ jalsaʕu aʶːlˤbaʶʕwdˤuʶ ʔajn tχtbʔuwn jaː rfaːq laː ʃkk ʔann aːlllʕb hnaːk ʔamr χtˤjrˤ faman tabiʕa hudaaːja falaaː χawfun ʕalajhim walaaː hum jaħzanuwna ʔaakuffaːrukum χajrun min ʔauwlʔiikum ʔaam lakum baraːʔaaun fij aːlzzuburi waliðalika d͡ʒaaːza aːttifaaːqu aːlnnaaːsi ʕalaaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤiʶdqiʶ lqd tqddmt fj aːlssn aːljawma naχtimu ʕalaː ʔaafwaːhihim watukallimunaː ʔaajdjhim wataʃhadu ʔaard͡ʒuluhum bimaː kaːnwaː jaksibwna waaːlllabijba ʁajra aːlħaquwdi laː tns aʶːlˤaʶːtsˤaʶːlˤ bʔammk waʔiin χaʃuna maqatuwhu wakaaːna ʕalaaː χaʶtˤaʶrˤiʶn minhum wasanaðkuru taʕlijla kulli ʃaʶrˤtˤiʶn minhaaː bimaaː junabbiʔiu ʕan luzuwmihi walaaː jaltamisuwaː ʕalajhi rizqanaː waʔiin taħallaaː biʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤiʶlˤaʶaʶiʶ waʕilaaːd͡ʒuhu ʔaan jutraka ʕalaaː malalihi fajamalla aːld͡ʒafaaːʔa kamaaː malla aːlʔiiχaaːʔa waaːlθθaaːnij fij d͡ʒinsihi waqijmatihi ʔanzl saːmj ljlaː ʔilaː aːlʕjaːda waliʕaqlik musʕifanaː waʔaanʃadt lˤiʶbaʶʕdˤiʶ aːlʔaaʕraaːbi ʔinna aːlllaha tabaaːraka wataʕaaːlaaː jaqraʔau ʕalajk aːlssalaaːma wajaquwlu lak walillahi aːlmaʃriqu waaːlmaʁribu faʔaajnamaaː tuwalluwaː faθamma wad͡ʒhu aːlllahi ʔiinna aːlllaha waaːsiʕun ʕalijmun kaʔaanna biaːbni aːlmaraaːʁaai qad had͡ʒaaːnij faqaaːla kaːn saːmj jmlk kll ʃjʔ jħtaːd͡ʒh fj ħjaːth taʶbiʶjdˤuʶ aːlddad͡ʒaːd͡ʒaaun maː sbb χwfkm d͡ʒmjʕanaː mn saːmj ʔanfq saːmj aːlmaːl fj ʃraːʔ aːlkħwl saːmj d͡ʒrraːħ td͡ʒmjlj fanaħnu kamaaː qaaːla aːlʃʃaaːʕiru smħ saːmj lljlaː kj tqjm tlk aːlʕlaːqa aːld͡ʒnsjja aʶːlˤχtˤjrˤaʶ mʕh fabaaːʔuwaː biʶʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶn ʕalaaːaː ʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶn walilkaaːfirijna ʕaðaaːbun muhijnun raːsl saːmj ljlaː ʕbr aːlhaːtf md͡ʒdddaː kaðlika jwħj ʔiilajka waʔiilaaː aːllaðjna min qablika aːlllahu aːlʕazjzu aːlmunfaridijna bihi kaːnt trtdj fstaːnaːan ʔaħmraːan tʕrrf saːmj ʕlaː mslmjn mn mχtlf aːlddwl aːlʔislaːmjja mn baːlbaːb aːʃkr mn ʔaanʕama ʕljk wʔaanʕim ʕlaː mn ʃkrk ʔarnj maː ldjk lˤtˤfaʶː ʔatʕtqd ʔaaʕd͡ʒalahu qabla ʔaad͡ʒalihi walaw tˤaʶlˤaʶbtuʶhuʶ biquwwaai aːlssamawaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ waqad qaaːla aːbnu ʕabbaaːsin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhumaaː fij taʔawijli qawlh taʕaaːlaaː hðaː χinzijrun waaːbki liʕilmin ħawaaːhu ʃirrijrun ʔaχbr saːmj ljlaː baːlddwaːʔ aːlðj qddmh lhaː aːlqds ljs mʃklaː llmslmjn fqtˤ bl hw mʃkl dwlj bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi waaːlmursalaːti ʕurfanaː ʔajn ʔaqrb mħtˤaʶ lˤqtˤaʶːrˤ aːlʔanfaːq fabalaʁa ðalika sulajmaaːna rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu faʃaʁlahum biaːlllajli waaːlnnahaaːri hl stðhb mʕ twm lm aːlħjaːa fðˤjʕaʶ lhðh aːlddrd͡ʒa laaː taʃrab baʕda aːld͡ʒarj ʔinh jtħssn kl jwm kaːn saːmj jʕtqd ʔann kll aːlmslmjn jdˤrˤbwn aːlnnsaːʔ lw kaːn lj d͡ʒnaːħaːn lˤtˤrˤt lʔinqaːðhaː snʃtrj btˤaʶːqtjn waʔaadbarat ʕan aːlʕaaːqili biaːliaːstiħqaaːqi qul ʔiinna rabbj jaʶbsuʶtˤuʶ aːlrrizqa liman jaʃaːʔu wajaqdiru walkinna ʔaakθara aːlnnaːsi laː jaʕlamwna waaːtlu ʕalajhim nabaʔaa ʔiibraːhjma waaːlθθaaːnij satru aːlʕawraai mn ʔant mfʕmaː baːlħjaːa ʔiðaː tklmt baːlklma mlktk wʔiðaː lm ttklm bhaː mlkthaː likulli aːmriʔiin minhum jawmaʔiiðin ʃaʔanun juʁnjhi waaːlθθaaːnij ʔaannahu aːlʕamalu aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħuʶ wahuwa qawlu aːbni ʕabbaaːsin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhumaaː ʔawd͡ʒdt d͡ʒwaːzk wahammun laaːzimun kaːn saːmj fj ħsˤsˤaʶ draːsjja faaːʕlam ʔaanna aːlmutaʕallimijna dˤaʶrˤbaʶaʶːniʶ walaaː ʕan aːlmuraaːʕaaːai mustaʁnijaaan saːmj jʕjʃ ħjaːa raːʔiʕa ʔaraːdaː ljlaː w saːmj ʔan jqjmaː mwʕdaː ʁraːmjjaː raːʔiʕaː ðlk mstħjl aʶːlˤtˤbʕ ʁlb aʶːlˤttˤbʕ ʕalajk biaːljaʔasi mimmaaː fij ʔaajdij aːlnnaaːsi hðh ʔawl mra ʔasmʕ hðh aʶːlˤqsˤaʶ wasimaau aːlʃʃari aːlqiħaau waaːlbaðaaːʔu sjkwn mn aʶːlˤsˤʕb lnaː fʕl ðlk ʔaalam jaʕlam biʔaanna aːlllaha jaraaː laaː jaðuwquwna fijhaaː bardanaː walaaː ʃaraaːbanaː ʔabj jtklm daːʔimaː fij aːlχalqi ʔaafalaaː jaʕqiluwna qaaːla kaðalika qaaːla rabbuka huwa ʕalajja hajjinun waqad χalaqtuka min qablu walam taku ʃajʔianaː ðlk bʔanhm aːtbʕwaː maː ʔaʶsχtˤ aːllh wkrhwaː rˤdˤwaʶːnh fʔaʶħbtˤ ħkjm χbjr jaː ʔajhaː aːlnbj ħsbk aːllh wmn aːtbʕk mn aːlmʔumnjn ʔaam lam junabbaʔa bimaaː fij sˤuʶħuʶfiʶ muwsaaː ʔin ʔiljnaː ʔijaːbhm fmaː kaːn dʕwaːhm ʔið d͡ʒaːʔhm bʔasnaː ʔilaː ʔan qaːlwaː ʔinaː jalqaaːnij aːlzzamaaːnu liʔaad͡ʒlihi biʶʔiʶiʶʕðˤaʶaʶːmiʶ mawluwdin waʔiiʃfaaːqi waaːlidi faʔaammaaː aːlmuntaqilu fahuwa aːlʔiidlaaːlu ʔaalaaː ʔiinnahum humu aːlmufsiduwna walakin laaː jaʃʕuruwna ħbjbj ʔaqddm ʕmrj lka hdjja hðh aʶːlˤqdˤjaʶ mʕrwfa mnð wqt tˤwjlˤ hl twd͡ʒd klma ʔaχraː jmkn aːstʕmaːlhaː bdlaː mn mraːdf waʕiʃnaaː fijhaaː ʁaaːfilijna ʕaːml aːlnaːs brʔaj rfjq waːlq mn tlqaː bwd͡ʒhin tˤlˤjq jawmaʔiiðin laaː tanfaʕu aːlʃʃafaaːʕaau ʔiillaaː man ʔaaðina lahu aːlrraħmanu waʶrˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ lahu qawlanaː waqad qijla man wadakka tˤaʶmaʶʕaʶnaʶː fijk ʔaʶaʶbʁaʶdˤaʶk ʔiðaaː ʔaajisa mink ʕjnaː aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ mustaqarrun wamataaːʕun ʔiilaaː ħijnin jwd͡ʒd wħʃ tħt srjrj faʔiin ħurisat biʶaʶːlˤttaʶwaʶaʶːsˤuʶlˤiʶ waʶaʶːlˤttaʶlˤaʶaʶːtˤuʶfiʶ taʔaakkadat ʔaasbaaːbuhaaː waaːqtarana biħamijjaai mustaqijmin ʔið qaːl rbk llmlaːʔika ʔinj χaːlq bʃraː mn tˤjn wʔin jtfrqaː jʁn aːllh klaː mn sʕth wkaːn aːllh waːsʕaː ħkjmaː ʔiið qaaːla lahum ʔaaχuwhum huwdun ʔaalaaː tattaquwna wmn jhd aːllh fmaː lh fawqahu d͡ʒrb ħðˤk dʕwnaː nʕks aːlʕmla ʔiʶtaʶsˤaʶlˤtuʶ ʕljhaː msaːʔ aːlʔams wlknhaː lm tud͡ʒib lj d͡ʒaːr jhwdj ʔanaː ʃχsˤ sˤaʶːdq sʔaraːqbk jataχaaːfatuwna bajnahum ʔiin labiθtum ʔiillaaː ʕaʃranaː ʔin sururin maʶsˤfuʶwfaʶaʶiʶn wazawwad͡ʒnaaːhum biħuwrin ʕijnin faʔaanbatnaaː fijhaaː ħabbanaː kaːn mnnaːd jswq aːlddraːd͡ʒa ʔilaː aːlqaːhra mtwd͡ʒd͡ʒhaː ʔilaː mnzlh waaːd͡ʒʕal ʔaabʕada ʔaamlika baqijjaaa juqallibu aːlllahu aːlllajla waaːlnnahaaːra ʔiinna fij ðalika laʕibraaan liʔauwlij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶ mn fdˤlˤk ʔaʶʕtˤnj qlmaːan w bdˤʕaʶ ʔawraːq jnbʁj ʔan trd aːldjwn aːltj ʕljk bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm khjʕsˤ ʔaaw mutadajjananaː bihi fij aːlʃʃarʕi wad͡ʒaaːʔa firʕawnu waman qablahu waaːlmuʔutafikaaːtu biʶaʶːlˤχaʶaʶːtˤiʶʔiʶaʶaʶiʶ waaːliaːχtilaaːfu bitadbijrihi ʔaʶaʶðˤhaʶrˤaʶ wtlk ħd͡ʒtnaː ʔaːtjnaːhaː ʔibraːhjm ʕlaː qwmh nrfʕ drd͡ʒaːt mn nʃaːʔ ʔin rbk ħkjm ʕljm ʔaafamani aːttabaʕa rˤiʶdˤwaʶaʶːnaʶ aːlllahi kaman baaːʔa biʶsaʶχaʶtˤiʶn mina aːlllahi wamaʔawaaːhu d͡ʒahannamu wabiʔisa biaːlttaʔaalufi ʔiʶðˤhaʶaʶːrˤuʶhaʶaʶː wajastanbiʔiuwnaka ʔaaħaqqun huwa qul ʔiij warabbij ʔiinnahu laħaqqun wamaaː ʔaantum bimuʕd͡ʒizijna aːlʕadli aːlmuqtarini bihaaː walaaː sˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːħaʶ fijhaaː ðkraː qd frˤdˤ aːllh lkm tħla ʔajmaːnkm waːllh mwlaːkm whw aːlʕljm aːlħkjm aːχtijaaːru χulafaaːʔiihi fij aːlʔaumuwri ʔaan jakuwnuwaː min ʔaahli aːlkifaaːjaai fijhaaː aːʃʕr baːlðnb lawad͡ʒaba miθluhu bsħrh fmaːðaː tʔamrwn walaʕamrij ʔinna ʔiχwaaːna aʶːlˤsˤsˤiʶdqiʶ min ʔaanfasi aːlððaχaaːʔiiri waʶʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlˤiʶ aːlʕudadi ʔanaː ʔaħb aːllʁa aːltrkja kθjraːan lm jkn llkwn ʔaj msˤdrˤ dˤwʔ ʔinhaː ʃaːja ʔafk faʔaaχaða ðalika ʔaabuw tammaaːmin aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶjuʶ faqaaːla ʕndnaː qtˤ klnaː nħb aʶːlˤqtˤtˤ swf tħbbhaː maːrj lmaːðaː trjd ʔan tʕrf ðlk fj aːlħmjm θm fj aːlnaːr jsd͡ʒrwn wfaːth χsaːra ʕad͡ʒd͡ʒil lanaaː qiʶtˤtˤaʶnaʶaʶː qabla jawmi aːlħisaaːbi hl tʕlm maː jʕmlh twm lksb rzqh tdˤrˤb aːlzlaːzl aːljaːbaːn bkθra walaw nazzalnaaːhu ʕalaaː baʶʕdˤiʶ aːlʔaaʕd͡ʒamijna lˤʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːljmjn fad͡ʒaʕalnaaː ʕaaːlijahaaː saaːfilahaaː waʶʔaʶaʶmtˤaʶrˤnaʶaʶː ʕalajhim ħid͡ʒaaːraaan min sid͡ʒd͡ʒijlin sʔasaːʕdh ʁdaːan tqʕ aːlqrja fj waːdin jblʁ aːtsaːʕh ħwaːlj nsˤf mjl faʁafarnaaː lahu ðalika waʔiinna lahu ʕindanaaː lazulfaaː waħusna maʔaːbin aːlhdf hw tʕrjf aːlnaːd͡ʒħjn fj aːlbaːkaːlwrjaː bkjfja aːlaːχtjaːr hl bʔimkaːnk ʔan tnsχ lj ʕʃrjn nsχa mn hðaː aːltqrjr qaaːla rabbi aːʃraħ lij sˤaʶdrˤiʶj ʔanaː sˤdjq rwbrts laː tθqwaː bh sʔalʕb kra aːlqdm ʁdanaː θumma jatuwbu aːlllahu min baʕdi ðalika ʕalaaː man jaʃaaːʔu waaːlllahu ʁafuwrun raħijmun hlaːaː ʔarjtnj ʔajn hw aːlħmmaːm aːχtalafa aːlmufassiruwna fij aːlħafadaai wazakarijjaaː wajaħjaaː waʕijsaaː waʔiiljaaːsa kullun mina aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħiʶjnaʶ knt ʔatsaːʔl mtaː stʕwd aːnfarid bisirrik walaaː tuwdiʕhu ħaaːzimanaː fajazilla χalaqa aːlʔiinsaːna saːmj msʔuwl ʕlaː aːlʕjaːda kllhaː kaːn saːmj jrjd ʔan jkwn sˤdjqaʶː lfrjd mamħuwqaau aʶːlˤmaʶħsˤuʶwlˤiʶ kaːn saːmj jntðˤrˤ χaːrd͡ʒ aːlmħkma laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ rʔuja ʃjʔ aːlntjd͡ʒa waːħd aːlkll wakaaːna aːlħasanu aʶːlˤbaʶsˤrˤiʶjjuʶ raħimahu aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː jaquwlu aːlʁijbaau faaːkihaau aːlnnisaaːʔi laaː juʕd͡ʒibuk rad͡ʒulun kasaba maaːlanaː min ʁajri ħillihi faʔiin ʔaanfaqahu lam juqbal minhu rd͡ʒaːʔ nffð kmaː ʔaːmrk huwa aːllaðj d͡ʒaʕala lakumu aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ ðalwlanaː faaːmʃwaː fj manaːkibihaː wakulwaː min rizqihi waʔiilajhi aːlnnuʃwru faʔaammaaː aːllaðjna ʔaːmanwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶːlˤiʶħaʶːtiʶ fajudχiluhum rabbuhum fj raħmatihi ðlika huwa aːlfawzu aːlmubjnu mn ʔajn aːʃtrjt tlk aːlqbbʕa faʶaʶːnðˤuʶrˤ ʔilaaː haʔuulaaːʔi kajfa ʔaabaaːnuwaː biaːlkalaaːmi ʕan d͡ʒahlihim faʔaanzalnaaː ʕalaaː aːllaðijna ðˤaʶlˤaʶmuʶwaʶː rid͡ʒzanaː mina aːlssamaaːʔi bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jafsuquwna waqjla man raːqin kaːn jħbbhaː w kaːnt tħbbh hj ʔaʶjdˤaʶː kaːn aːlkalaaːmi ʔaakθarta min aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶwaʶaʶːbiʶ maː sbb td͡ʒaːhl ħqq aːlʕwda llaːd͡ʒʔijn aʶːlˤflˤstˤjnjjn waʔiiðaaː aːlmawʔwdaau suʔiilat wamaaː kaaːna qabijħanaː faaːlʕaqlu maaːniʕun minhu aːðhb w aːd͡ʒls fj aːlssjaːra wamakarwaː makranaː wamakarnaː makranaː wahum laː jaʃʕurwna kjf ħaːl aːld͡ʒmjʕ waqad tuħdiθu aːlmanaaːzilu waaːlwilaaːjaaːtu liqawmin ʔaaχlaaːqanaː maðmuwmaaan juʶðˤhiʶrˤuʶhaʶaʶː suwʔu tˤiʶbaʶaʶːʕiʶhiʶm ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː msaːʕdth lmn hðjn aːlħðaːʔijn lm lm tdʕh jdχl km dˤħjaʶ kaːnt hnaːk aːlmaʃuwraau ħiʶsˤnuʶn min aːlnnadaaːmaai faʶaʶːnðˤuʶrˤ ʔilaaː haʔuulaaːʔi kajfa ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶj bihim aːlʕud͡ʒbu ʔilaaː ħumqin sˤaʶaʶːrˤuʶwaʶː bihi nakaaːlanaː fij aːlʔaawwalijna kaːn saːmj laː jzaːl fj aːlʕjaːda waʶːsˤlˤ saːmj ħjaːth ʔamlt aʶːlˤʃʃrˤtˤaʶ ʔan jqddm saːmj bʕdˤ aːlmʕlwmaːt ʕn mkaːn twaːd͡ʒd ljlaː lijawmi aʶːlˤfaʶsˤlˤiʶ aːlmazzaaːħu muʶdˤiʶrˤrˤuʶn hw jwaːd͡ʒh aːlʕdjd mn aːlʕwaːʔiq waqulnaaː aʶːhbiʶtˤuʶwaʶː baʶʕdˤuʶkuʶm lˤiʶbaʶʕdˤiʶn ʕaduwwun walakum fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ mustaqarrun wamataaːʕun ʔiilaaːaː ħijnin waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami wajlun lˤiʶlˤðˤðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶ min jawmi aʶːlˤmaʶðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶ tisʕaau ʔaaʕʃaaːri aːlrrizqi fij aːlttid͡ʒaaːraai waaːlħarθi waaːlbaaːqij fij aːlssaaːʔiibaaːti faʔaanʃaʔaa aːbnu ʃihaaːbin jaquwlu waqad kafarwaː bihi min qablu wajaqðifwna biaːlʁajbi min makaːnin baʕjdin waqaaːlat aːlħukamaaːʔu tˤaʶlˤaʶbuʶ maaː laaː judraku ʕad͡ʒzun waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi jakfijk min aːlħaaːsidi ʔaannahu jaʁtammu fij waqti suruwrik ʔin aːlmsʔala aːlʔawlaː aːltj jd͡ʒb ʔan nd͡ʒaːbhhaː hj aʶːlˤttˤrˤf aːlʕnjf bkaːfa ʔaʃkaːlh law kunnaaː naʶtˤlˤuʶbuʶ aːlʕilma linabluʁa ʁaaːjatahu kunnaaː qad badaʔanaaː aːlʕilma biʶaʶːlˤnnaʶqiʶjsˤaʶaʶiʶ hl ʔant tfkkr fj ʔiχbaːrh ʕn ðlk fajaqharu nafsahu ʕalaaː aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ raʁbaaan fij aːld͡ʒazaaːʔi waaːlθθawaaːbi qddm saːmj lˤlˤʃʃrˤtˤaʶ wsˤfaʶː ʕn aːlmʃtbh bh lam juʁnihi minhaaː kaθraau maaː jad͡ʒmaʕu ʔiiði aːnbaʕaθa ʔaaʃqaːhaː wamaː huwa biaːlhazli ʔaj tˤflˤ jʕrf ðlk mħmd rswl aːllh ʔiðaː ðˤlˤmt mn dwnk flaː tʔamn ʕqaːb mn fwqk falillahi aːlʔaːχiraau waaːlʔawlaː kaːnt ljlaː trjd ʔan tsˤbħ mmrˤrˤdˤaʶ waqaaːla saaːbuwru bnu ʔaardaʃijra aːlʕaqlu nawʕaaːni ʔaaħaduhumaaː maʶtˤbuʶwʕuʶn waaːlʔaːχaru masmuwʕun waʔaammaaː aʶːlˤmuʶʕtˤiʶj faʔiinnahu wad͡ʒada ðalika aːttifaaːqanaː warubbamaaː ʔaamala biaːliaːttifaaːqi ʔaʶaʶdˤʕaʶaʶːfaʶnaʶː munjbjna ʔiilajhi waaːttaqwhu waʔaaqjmuwaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶlˤaʶːaʶaʶ walaː takwnwaː mina aːlmuʃrikjna rakkaba aːlllahu aːlmalaaːʔiikaaa min ʕaqlin bilaaː ʃahwaain mn fdˤlˤk wzzʕ aːlwrq faqaːla ʔaanaː rabbukumu aːlʔaaʕlaː ljtnj knt qaːdraː ʕlaː nsjaːn tlk aːlħaːdθa waʔiiðaː qjla lahumu aːsd͡ʒudwaː lilrraħmni qaːlwaː wamaaː aːlrraħmnu ʔaanasd͡ʒudu limaː taʔamurunaː wazaːdahum nufwranaː hal ʔaataːka ħadjθu mwsaː wud͡ʒwhun fj aːlfn mn aʶːlˤwaʶːdˤħ ʔannh mðnb jaʔakulu aːlʔiinsaːnu kaj janmuwa jtʁjjr aːld͡ʒww mn jwm ʔilaː ʔaːχr aːftħ aːlbaːb tmm tʕjjn ljlaː kmraːqba d͡ʒdjda lˤlˤmmrˤrˤdˤaʶːt saːmj jħbb maːdda aʶːlˤttsˤwjrˤ ʔiinnaː d͡ʒaʕalnaːhu qurʔaːnanaː ʕarabijjanaː laʕallakum taʕqilwna jʕml saːmj fj aːlʕjaːda aːlbldjja faʔaammaaː aːlʔiinsaːnu ʔiiðaː maaː aːbtalaːhu rabbuhu faʔaakramahu wanaʕʕamahu fajaqwlu rabbj ʔaakramani faðahaba baʶʕdˤuʶhuʶm ʔilaaː ʔaanna aːlʔaawlaaː taʕd͡ʒijlu aːlwaʕdi qawlanaː walaqad fatannaː qablahum qawma firʕawna wad͡ʒaːʔahum raswlun karjmun waʔiinnamaaː aːχtalafat ʕaaːdaaːtu aːlʔislaːm aːttχð aːsmaː mslmaː krjʃa fj mhb aːlrjħ kaːn saːmj χaːrd͡ʒ aːlmdrsa walaaː jaktafij biʶaʶːlˤmuʶrˤdˤiʶj minhaaː ʕan aːlttahðijbi maː ħdθ ljs srananaː lillahi darru aːlttaqwaaː maaː tarakat aːmriʔiin minhum ʔaan juʔutaː sˤuʶħuʶfaʶnaʶː munaʃʃaraaan walan taraaː ðalika fijman salimat fiʶtˤnaʶtuʶhuʶ faʔiimmaː naðhabanna bika faʔiinnaː minhum muntaqimwna wahuwa aːllaðj χalaqa mina aːlmaːʔi baʃaranaː fad͡ʒaʕalahu nasabanaː waʶsˤiʶhrˤaʶnaʶː wakaːna rabbuka qadjranaː kaːn wd͡ʒh saːmj mʁtˤtˤaʶː hl tħb ðlk qd rʔajth waʶðˤaʶlˤlˤaʶlˤnaʶaʶː ʕalajkumu aːlʁamaaːma waʔaanzalnaaː ʕalajkumu aːlmanna waaːlssalwaaːaː faʔiiðaaː ʕadimahaaː aːlʔiinsaaːnu haaːna bihaaː walam jakun libaaːqij faʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤiʶhiʶ fij aːlnnufuwsi maʶwdˤiʶʕuʶn ʔaan tantahija bihi aːlqanaaːʕaau ʔilaaː aːlkifaaːjaai lqd waʶaʶːlˤdˤdˤaʶħiʶkiʶ rabbanaː laː tad͡ʒʕalnaː fitnaaan lillaðjna kafarwaː waaːʁfir lanaː rabbanaː ʔiinnaka ʔaanta aːlʕazjzu aːlħakjmu ʔin aːlʔajaːdj qrˤwdˤ waʶjuʶsˤlˤiʶħuʶ zajfak wafaaːsidak liʔaanna aːlθθanaaːʔa jabʕaθu ʕalaaː aːlbaðli waħubba aːlmaaːli jamnaʕu minhu walaqad ʔaʶaʶdˤaʶlˤlˤaʶ minkum d͡ʒibillanaː kaθjranaː ʔaafalam takwnwaː taʕqilwna bdʔa saːmj draːsth aːld͡ʒaːmʕjja fj sbtmbr ʔawʃaːm ʔaʶaʶtaʶsˤbiʶrˤuʶ lilbalwaaː ʕazaaːʔan waχaʃjaaan fatuʔud͡ʒaru ʔaaw tasluw suluwwa aːlbahaaːʔiim waqaaːla ʃabijbu bnu ʃajbaaa lilmahdijji ʔajn snltqj bal mattaʕtu hʔuulaːʔi waʔaːbaːʔahum ħattaː d͡ʒaːʔahumu aːlħaqqu waraswlun mubjnun waaːlħaaːdiθu ʕan aːlħuzni aʶːlˤmaʶrˤaʶdˤaʶ waaːlʔaasqaaːma likumuwnihi ħattaː ʔiiðaː d͡ʒaːʔanaː qaːla jaː lajta bajnj wabajnaka buʕda aːlmaʃriqajni ʕlm bðlk aʶːlˤʔiʶnfsˤaʶːlˤjwn hm ʔaʕdaːʔ aːlħjaːa θumma qaʶbaʶdˤnaʶːhuʶ ʔiilajnaː qaʶbdˤaʶnaʶː jasjranaː ʔaurʁim saːmj ʕlaː χlʕ mlaːbsh w ħðaːʔih ʔinn saːmj jʕaːml ljlaː baʶːlˤtˤtˤrˤjqaʶ aːltj tstħq ʔan tuʕaːmal bhaː θumma ʔiinnj ʔaaʕlantu lahum waʔaasrartu lahum ʔiisraːranaː wabiaːlʔaaðaaː maʶqsˤuʶwduʶn ʔatsaːʔl ʔin kaːn bjnhmaː rˤaʶːbtˤ hl aːnthjt mn ʕmlk hnaːk ʔiinna aːlʔiinsaːna lirabbihi waʔiiʕmaaːli ʃarrihi ʔajmknk msaːʕdtj fj trd͡ʒma hðh aːld͡ʒml ʔilaː aːllʁa aʶːlˤsˤjnjaʶ haðaaː kitaaːbun mufijdun qaaːla ʔaʶaʶħaʶfiʶðˤt qaaːla bal nasijtu ʔaʶuʶnaʶðˤðˤiʶfuʶ aːlħiðaːʔa ʔijjaaːka aʶːlˤdˤdˤd͡ʒjd͡ʒ daχala ʕalajja rasuwlu aːlllahi sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama waʔaanaaː ʔaatamaθθalu bihaðajni aːlbajtajni waaːlʔaad͡ʒru ʔaad͡ʒdaru bihi min aːlʔiiθmi waaːlʕizzu ʔaaljaqu haʶdˤjmuʶn faʔaammaaː aːlttaʔadijbu aːlllaaːzimu lilʔaabi fahuwa ʔaan jaʔaχuða waladahu bimabaaːdiʔii aːlʔaːdaaːbi lijaʔanasa bihaaː ʔaqlʕt ʕn aːltdχjn mnð sta ʔaʃhr waaːlssarafu fij aːlððami aːld͡ʒnsjja aʶːlˤχtˤjrˤaʶ mn tlk aːlbnt kaðaba aʶːlˤʕuʶsˤfuʶwrˤuʶ faʔiinna ʁurafa dimaʃqa mabnijjaaun biʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤuʶχuʶwrˤiʶ laaː jaqdiru ʔaan juskinahaaː hunaaːka jurjdu ʔaan juχrid͡ʒakum min ʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶkuʶm bisiħrihi famaːðaː taʔamurwna ʔatħb mwsjqaː aːlraːb ʕallamahu ʃadjdu aːlquwaː lqd mdˤt snwaːt tˤwjlˤaʶ sjmknnaː hðaː mn ksb bʕdˤ aːlwqt jakθuru aːlnnaχlu fij aːlbasaːtijni aːlmuθmiraai waʔiijjaaːka wamuʃaaːwaraaa aːlnnisaaːʔi faʔiinna raʔajahunna ʔilaaː aːlʔaafni laː ʔaħd jʃkw hðh aːlʕjaːda ʔakbr bkθjr ʕn tlk aːltj knt ʔaʕml fjhaː ʔaalaaː ʔaunabbiʔiukum biaːlfaqijhi kulli aːlfaqijhi ljs mwd͡ʒwdaːan mlʕwna tlk aːlsʕaːda fwq ħuʶtˤaʶːm ʔinsaːn lqd χdʕt nfsk liʔaanna aʶːlˤfaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤaʶ hajʔiaaːtun muʶtaʶwaʶssiʶtˤaʶaʶuʶn bajna faʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶtaʶjniʶ naʶaʶːqiʶsˤaʶtaʶjniʶ ʔabtsm aːlkalimaai man jafʕal aːlχajra laaː jaʕdam d͡ʒawaaːʔiizahu laaː jaðhabu aːlʕurfu bajna aːlllahi waaːlnnaaːsi waʔaanʃada aːlrrijaaːʃiju wamuʕaaːnaaːain fij taʶsˤaʶwwuʶrˤiʶhiʶ ʔiʶsˤlˤaʶːħ aːlmwd͡ʒwd χjr mn aʶːntðˤaʶːrˤ aːlmfqwd ʔiinna aːlbaqara taʃaaːbaha ʕalajnaaː waʔiinnaaː ʔiin ʃaaːʔa aːlllahu lamuhtaduwna kasara maħmuwdun aʶːlˤʁuʶsˤnaʶ ʕalaː sururin mutaqaːbiljna aːlbas min aːlθθijaaːbi maaː laaː jazdarijk fijhi aʶːlˤʕuʶðˤaʶmaʶaʶːʔuʶ min firʕawna ʔiinnahu kaːna ʕaːlijanaː mina aːlmusrifjna ʔasrʕ mn aːlbrq qul ʔiin kaːna lilrraħmni waladun faʔaanaː ʔaawwalu aːlʕaːbidjna waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi aːlbaχijlu ħaaːrisu niʕmatihi waχaaːzinu waraθatihi waʶqaʶtˤaʶʕaʶ ʔaaʕðaaːrahaaː lst bðaːk aːlkaːtb nd͡ʒaː saːmj mn aːlnnaːr ʕbr aːlnnaːfða ʔin ʔaaħsana ʔilaaː ʔaaħadin taraka aʶːlˤmuʶtˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶbaʶaʶaʶ biaːlʃʃukri ʔaʶfdˤlˤ aːld͡ʒwd aʶːlˤʕtˤaʶːʔ qbl aːlmwʕd ʔaʶfdˤlˤ aːld͡ʒwd ʔan tbðl mn ʁjr msʔala waqad qaaːla aːlmutanabbij hðaː tzjjn lʃd͡ʒra ʕjd aːlmjlaːd aʶːlˤʔiʶnfsˤaʶːlˤjwn jrjdwn zʕzʕa aːlblaːd waʔaanna aːlssuruwra bihaaː ʔiðaaː ʔaaqbalat maʃuwbun biaːlħaðari min firaaːqihaaː ʔiðaaː ʔaadbarat waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi maaː hajjad͡ʒa d͡ʒaʔaʃak kaʶʁaʶjðˤiʶn ʔaad͡ʒaaːʃaka waaːttifaaːqu aːlnnaaːsi fij aːlddawaaːʕij aːlnnaaːfiʕaai mumkinun aʶːtˤlˤbwaʶː aːlʕlm wlw fj aʶːlˤsˤjn ʔakrh ʔan ʔaraːki ħzjna faliðalika qatala aːlħuznu walam jaqtul aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbuʶ liburuwzi aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ wakumuwni aːlħuzni ʔinnij daχalt aːlbaaːriħaaa fij aːlʔaarbaʕijna waʔaanaaː ʔaastaħij min sinij ʔaʶsˤbħt aːlkra mʕh tˤmwħh ʔan jsˤbħ sfjraː qaːla hal ʔaantum muʶtˤtˤaʶlˤiʶʕwnaʶ waʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶbrˤuʶ waaːlħilmu tawʔaamaaːni fijhinna tamaaːmu kulli dijnin waaːlqadaħa fij aːlmanaaːzili waaːlʔaaħwaaːli waʶnaʶsˤiʶjbaʶnaʶː min ʔaawaaːmirihi faʶaʶːdˤiʶlˤiʶn ʔillaaː min d͡ʒihaai naʶaʶːqiʶsˤiʶn wabalwaaː ʕaaːlimin ʔillaaː ʕalaaː jadi d͡ʒaaːhilin ʔamskwaː bh maːðaː tʃbh waqaaːla aːbnu aːld͡ʒallaaːli biχilaaːfi aːlnnawʕi aːlʔaawwali waʔiin katamuwhu taʶnaʶaʶːqaʶsˤaʶ wawahija laʕalla aːlkitaaːba rˤaʶχiʶjsˤuʶn faʶjaʶsˤiʶjrˤuʶ aːlkalaaːmu laʁwanaː waʶaʶːlˤʁaʶrˤaʶdˤuʶ aʶːlˤmaʶqsˤuʶwduʶ lahwanaː wajad͡ʒʕaluwna maaː junabbihuwnahu ʕalajhi min masaaːwiʔiihi ʕiʶwaʶdˤaʶnaʶː ʕan taʶsˤdiʶjqiʶ aːlmadħi fijhi waqaaːla muħammadu bnu ʕalijjin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu tstħq ðlk juʶtˤiʶjʕuʶ ʔaaħamdu ʔaabaaːh ʔiið qaːla lahum ʔaaχwhum nwħun ʔaalaː tattaqwna aʶːlˤtˤrˤjq mn fdˤlˤk wahaðaaː maðhabu man jaraaː taʶfdˤiʶjlˤaʶ aːliaːʕtidaaːli waqad ruwija ʕan aːlnnabiji sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi qul ʔaafaʁajra aːlllahi taʔamurwnnj ʔaaʕbudu ʔaajjuhaaː aːlʕjaːda waʕalajhaaː muʕaaːqabun ʕalimat nafsun maː ʔaʶaʶħdˤaʶrˤaʶt swf ʔafʕl kll maː bwsʕj kj ʔasʕdh waʔaaqnaaː d͡ʒaʕala lahum qunjaaan wahija ʔaʶuʶsˤuʶwlˤuʶ aːlʔaamwaaːli wataʕfuwa ʕamman walaː tˤaʶʕaʶːmuʶn ʔiillaː min ʁisljnin lm jχbr ʕn mkaːn twaːd͡ʒdh lahum maː jaʃaːʔwna fjhaː waladajnaː mazjdun twqqf saːmj ʕn ʔiħdaːθ ðlk aʶːlˤsˤsˤwt wahija sittaau fuʶsˤuʶwlˤiʶn mutafarriʕaain waaːlʕatbu ʕanhaaː maʶwdˤuʶwʕuʶn kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jtχaʶːsˤmaʶːn wabaʕdu fadawlaau aːld͡ʒaaːhili kaaːlʁarijbi aːllaðij jaħinnu ʔilaaː aːlnnuqlaai kaːnt ldaː saːmj ħjaːa srrja waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi man d͡ʒaaːra ħukmuhu ʔaahlakahu ðˤuʶlˤmuʶhuʶ waʶaʶːlˤbaʶaʶːtˤiʶnuʶ min ðammihi sˤiʶdqaʶnaʶː warawaaː muʕaaːðu bnu rifaaːʕaaa dʕaː saːmj llh kj jʁfr lh rd͡ʒʕt rjma lʕaːdthaː aːlqdjma lijuwaffijahum ʔaud͡ʒwrahum wajazjdahum min faʶdˤlˤiʶhiʶ ʔiinnahu ʁafwrun ʃakwrun ʔaaʁnaaː χalqahu biaːlmaaːli ʔið laaː jaʶsˤiʶħħuʶ ʔaadaaːʔu ʕibaaːdaain d͡ʒahila faaːʕiluhaaː sˤiʶfaʶaʶːtiʶ ʔaadaaːʔiihaaː aʶːntðˤrˤk saːmj tˤjlˤaʶ aʶːlˤðˤðˤhjrˤaʶ ʔaan jadfaʕa bihi saʶtˤwaʶaʶaʶ ʔaaʕdaaːʔiihi rabbanaː ʔaːtihim dˤiʶʕfaʶjniʶ mina aːlʕaðaːbi waaːlʕanhum laʕnanaː kabjranaː ʔauwlaaːʔiika aːllaðijna aːʃtarawuaː aʶːlˤdˤdˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶaʶaʶ biaːlhudaaːaː famaaː rabiħat tid͡ʒaaːratuhum wamaaː kaaːnuwaː muhtadijna ʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħaʶtiʶ aːlʁurfaau naʶðˤiʶjfaʶaʶaʶn walam juʶtˤaʶaʶːwiʶʕhaʶaʶː fijmaaː tuħibbu ʔiðaaː kaaːna ʁajjanaː muʔunaau aːlmutawaqqifi ʔaajsaru min takallufi aːlmuʕassafi twm wħjd lʔahlh faʶːdˤlˤ msˤrˤj aːld͡ʒw mmtˤrˤ aːljwm liʔiirsaaːli aʶːlˤχaʶwaʶaʶːtˤiʶrˤiʶ aːlθθaaːqibaai waʔiid͡ʒaaːlaai aːlʔaafkaaːri aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːdiʶqaʶaʶiʶ falaaː jaʕzubu ʕanhaaː mumkinun walaaː jaχfaaː ʕalajhaaː d͡ʒaaːʔiizun jurjdwna lˤiʶjuʶtˤfiʶʔiʶwaʶː nwra aːlllahi biʔaafwaːhihim waaːlllahu mutimmu nwrihi walaw kariha aːlkaːfirwna saːmj naːʔim kaːn saːmj ʔakbr ʔabnaːʔ raːmj w ljlaː sˤaʶːdq fajaraaː taʔadijaaa aːlħaqqi ʕalajhi tˤaʶwʕaʶnaʶː ʔimmaaː ʔaanafaaan waʔiimmaaː ʃukranaː lijakuwna min ʔaasri aːliaːmtinaaːni tˤaʶlˤiʶjqaʶnaʶː ʔaχwh mχtlf ʕnh aːbdʔa fj aʶːlˤttsˤfjq lqd χdʕtnj tmaːmaː straː maː sjħdθ lst srjʕaːan bmaː fjh aːlkfaːja maaː duwna aːlssaħari wafawqa aːlʃʃiʕri aʶːsˤlˤaʶwhaʶː faʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤwaʶː ʔaaw laː taʶsˤbiʶrˤwaʶː sawaːʔun ʕalajkum ʔiinnamaː tud͡ʒzawna maː kuntum taʕmalwna tfwħ mn saːmj raːʔiħa aːlddd͡ʒaːd͡ʒ famarra tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶrˤuʶn jaʶsˤiʶjħuʶ faqaaːla rad͡ʒulun min aːlqawmi waman lam jaqnaʕ kaaːna faqijranaː waʔiin kaaːna mukθiranaː kallaː ʔiiðaː balaʁati aːlttaraːqija kaːnt ldaː saːmj ʔaʶqrˤaʶːsˤ fj kll mkaːn waaːlχajbaaa maʕa aːlʔiiħd͡ʒaaːmi wamaː janbaʁj lahum wamaː jaʶstaʶtˤjʕwnaʶ wamiθlu ðalika qawlu baʶʕdˤiʶ aːlzzuʕamaaːʔi fij ʃiʕrihi wsˤlˤ aːlmdrrs mtʔaχχraː faʔiinna aːlʔaamra fijhi muʕtabarun biħaaːli tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶhiʶ faʔiin kaaːna mimman taqaaːʕada ʕalaaː maraaːtibi aːlrruʔuasaaːʔi huwa aːllaðj juʶsˤaʶlˤlˤj ʕalajkum wamalaːʔiikatuhu lijuχrid͡ʒakum mina aʶːlˤðˤðˤuʶlˤuʶmaʶːtiʶ ʔiilaaː aːlnnwri wakaːna biaːlmuʔuminjna raħjmanaː waliðalika qaaːla aːlnnabiju sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama waʕadaaːwatuhum lahu ħattaaː laaː jaraaː fijhim walijjanaː laʔaaχaðnaː minhu biaːljamjni lm jrd saːmj ʔan jtχaʶːsˤm mʕ ðlk aːlrrd͡ʒl hl bdʔat tʃʕr baːlχwf faʶaʶːnðˤuʶrˤ ʔilaaː haðaaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶbiʶjiʶ kajfa aːstaχrad͡ʒa biʶfaʶrˤtˤiʶ ðakaaːʔiihi faʔaammaaː man ʔaʶaʶʕrˤaʶdˤaʶt nafsuhu ʕan qabuwli nuʶsˤħiʶhiʶ falam jafid ʔatrd͡ʒm jaaː haðaaː laaː tuʁriqanna fij sabbinaaː ʕalaaː maaː junabbihuwnahu ʕalajhi min masaaːwiʔiihi aːllatij sˤaʶrˤaʶfaʶhuʶ ħasanu aʶːlˤðˤðˤaʶniʶ ʕanhaaː ʔanaː wtwm nʕtmd ʕlaː bʕdˤnaʶː lamaʕa fjʕrˤdˤ ðlk aːld͡ʒmjʕ lˤlˤχtˤrˤ tχrrd͡ʒ saːmj mn aːlθθaːnwja lqd ʔaʕd͡ʒbtmaː saːmj lima manaʕth faqaaːla jadu aːllhi maʕa aːld͡ʒamaaːʕaai ʔaaħaduhumaaː fij aːlssaaːʔiili ʔaqnʕ faʶːdˤlˤ daːnja kj tntql waħasmu haðihi aʶːlˤmaʶtˤaʶaʶːmiʶʕiʶ ʃajʔiaaːni ʔinh md͡ʒnwn bħbk waʔaaθbata lahu aːlħud͡ʒd͡ʒaaa falajsa lilððakaaːʔi ʁaaːjaaun hl jħb aːld͡ʒmjʕ aːlmwsjqaː lħsn aʶːlˤħðˤ lm jtʔað ʔaħd ʕalajhaː tisʕaaa faqijla lahu faʶjaʶsˤiʶjrˤuʶ aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔaasijra ʃahawaaːtin laaː taʶnqaʶdˤiʶj faʔiin lam ʔaafʕal jakuwnu maaːðaaː faqaaːla lqd ʔaħbbnj aːlmdrrs aːttχðt hðaː aːlqraːr fad͡ʒamaʕa bajna aːlddami waːħd waaːllaðjna ʔaːmanwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶːlˤiʶħaʶːtiʶ lanudχilannahum fij aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶːlˤiʶħjnaʶ fajaraaː ʔaanna aːlkaðiba ʔaaslamu waʔaaʁnamu faʶjuʶrˤaʶχχiʶsˤuʶ linafsihi fijhi waqad ħukija ʔaanna aːlħad͡ʒd͡ʒaaːd͡ʒa qaaːla liʔaaʕraaːbijjin waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man ʔauʕd͡ʒiba biqawlihi ʔaʶuʶsˤiʶjbaʶ biʕaqlihi aːllaðj χalaqa aːlmawta waaːlħajaːaa lijabluwakum ʔaajjukum ʔaaħsanu ʕamalanaː wahuwa aːlʕazjzu aːlʁafwru kl mmnwʕ mrʁwb kaːn mdrrsnaː fj aːlʕlwm fajaʔatijahum baʁtaaan wahum laː jaʃʕurwna aʶːlˤnðˤaʶːfaʶ nsˤf aːlʁnaː tm aːthaːm mdjr aːlʃrka bdfʕ rʃaːwaː waħaaːd͡ʒizanaː ʕan muχaaːlafatihi kaðlika aːlʕaðaːbu walaʕaðaːbu aːlʔaːχiraai ʔaakbaru law kaːnwaː jaʕlamwna waluzuwmi tanakkubihi laː jħtaːd͡ʒ twm lʃraːʔ ʔaj ʃjʔ waʔaadwami liʔaaħwaaːli aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːħiʶ wakunwzin wamaqaːmin karjmin kaːn faʶːdˤlˤ jħbb aːlmdrsa ʔataː aːlwld rˤaʶːkdˤaʶːaʶn sˤiʶfaʶaʶuʶ aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶdiʶjqiʶ ʔaan jabðula lak maaːlahu ʕinda aːlħaaːd͡ʒaai bali aːllaðjna faʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ sˤaʶbrˤaʶnaʶː d͡ʒamjlanaː wafij ħusni aʶːlˤðˤðˤaʶniʶ bihaaː muʶqtaʶsˤiʶdaʶnaʶː hnaːk ʃʔi waːħd ʔaːχrʕljj fʕlh ħaːwlt rfʕ mʕnwjaːth ʃrwq aːlʃms d͡ʒmjl hðaː aʶːlˤsˤbaʶːħ fajaʔatij biaːlħimli ʕalaaː aːlnnafsi maaː ʔaamkana min jasijrin jasuddu bihi χallaaan liʔaannahaaː tad͡ʒmaʕu ʔilaaː maðammaai aːlʁijbaai waluʔumi aːlnnamijmaai waqaaːla aːlʔaaħnafu bnu qajsin man ðˤaʶlˤaʶmaʶ nafsahu kaaːna dˤuʶrˤb saːmj w fqd wʕjh waʕinda taqaaːbulihimaaː jakuwnu aʶːlˤsˤsˤiʶdquʶ ʔaalzama aːlʔaamrajni waʔaammaaː faʶdˤlˤuʶ maaː bajna aːlʕilmi waaːlʕibaaːdaai ʔiðaaː lam juχilla biwaaːd͡ʒibin walam juʶqaʶsˤsˤiʶrˤ fij faʶrˤdˤiʶn waʔaammaaː aːlʔaawlaaː biaːlʔiinsaaːni ʔaan jadʕuwahu lalħilmi ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlˤuʶ ʔaasbaaːbihi waqaaːla sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama aːlnnaχlu bdʔa saːmj ʔan tkff ʕn mtˤaʶːrˤdth aːlzzuhdu biʶsˤiʶħħaʶaʶiʶ aːljaqijni wakafaaː bihaaː lˤiʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶhaʶaʶː fitnaaan wsˤlˤt ʔasʕaːr aːlʔashm ðrwthaː fj jwljw aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤj ʔinna man qanaʕa kaaːna ʁanijjanaː waʔiin kaaːna muqtiranaː wahuwa ʔaannahu qaaːla mn aːlmmkn ʔann saːmj sjtħddaːh ʔabnaːʔuh faʔiinna aːlllaha jaħtad͡ʒibu minhumaaː wakilaaːhumaaː maðmuwmun qm bʕmlk bnfsk wamaː ʔaanta bihaːdi aːlʕumji ʕan dˤaʶlˤaʶːlˤaʶtiʶhiʶm ʔiin tusmiʕu ʔiillaː man juʔuminu biʔaːjaːtinaː fahum muslimwna kaːnt ʕnd saːmj stt ħsˤsˤ draːsjja fj aːljwm aːlwaːħd kaːn ʕmrnaː ħjnhaː χms ʕʃra sna fqtˤ mn hðh aːlftaːa ʕan ʕumara bni majmuwnin aʶːntðˤrˤth sˤaʶːbrˤaʶ kallaː bal tukaððibwna biaːlddjni waqaaːla ħassaaːnu bnu θaaːbitin aʶːlˤtqtˤ klb aʶːlˤʃʃrˤtˤaʶ raːʔiħa saːmj wawaqaʕa aːlqawlu ʕalajhim bimaː ðˤaʶlˤaʶmwaʶː fahum laː jaʶntˤiʶqwnaʶ ʔaħb ʃrb aːlqhwa saːχna aːlʕz fj nwaʶːsˤj aːlχjl musaaːmaħaau ʔiʶsqaʶaʶːtˤiʶn liʕudmin aːlʔawlaːd laː jlʕbwn baːlddmaː waaːmtadaħa rad͡ʒulun aːlzzuhrija faʶʔaʶaʶʕtˤaʶaʶːhuʶ qaʶmiʶjsˤaʶhuʶ aʶːlˤʔiʶnfsˤaʶːlˤjwn hm ʔaʕdaːʔ aːlħwaːr waʔiiðaaː aːld͡ʒannaau ʔauzlifat biʔaakwaːbin waʔaabaːrjqa wakaʔasin min maʕjnin ntˤq saːmj baːlʃʃhaːda aːlʔasbwʕ aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤj twm rd͡ʒl baːlʁ aʶːlˤlˤtˤf waːlkrm ʔarjd mnk χdma aːχtaːraː faʶːdˤlˤ ʔan ljlaː ʔan jmdˤjaʶː wqthmaː mʕaː kħbjbaːn man aːltamasa ʔaarbaʕanaː biʔaarbaʕin aːltamasa maaː laaː jakuwnu ʔanaː ʔaqrʔa aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶːlˤʕ waminhu qawlh taʕaaːlaaː waʔaannahu taʕaaːlaaː d͡ʒaddu rabbinaaː waman ʔaamara bimaaː laaː jaʔatamiru faqad χadaʕa aʶːntðˤrˤnj liaːstijlaaːʔiihi ʕalajhaaː lam jaʶħfaʶðˤ mħmdun darsahu jaː ħaːdja aːlʕjs ʕrrd͡ʒ kj ʔawddʕhm wamaaː jaʶnquʶsˤuʶ min hajʔiaaːti aːlrrid͡ʒaaːli jazijdu fij bihaaːʔiihaaː waʔaalbaaːbihaaː jawma laː tamliku nafsun linafsin ʃajʔianaː waaːlʔaamru jawmaʔiiðin lillahi ʔaʶtˤwʕ lh mn jmjnh aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlʕaqlu sˤaʶdiʶjquʶn maʶqtˤuʶwʕuʶn waaːlhawaaː ʕaduwwun matbuwʕun qaːbl saːmj mslmjn mn mχtlf aːlddwl kaːn saːmj jmθθl ʔahmm ʃjʔ fj ħjaːa ljlaː qadiir lirid͡ʒlika qbl aʶːlˤχtˤw mwdˤʕhaʶː ʔiinna rabbaka lˤaʶbiʶaʶːlˤmiʶrˤsˤaʶːdiʶ lam jaʶtˤmiʶθhuʶnnaʶ ʔiinsun qablahum walaː d͡ʒaːnnun lkj jnʃʔa aːlʔiħsaːs jnbʁj ʔan tsˤlˤ ʃda aːlmθjr ʔilj drd͡ʒa tsmj aːlʕtba aʶːlˤmtˤlˤqaʶ ʃwhid saːmj w hw jʃrb ʔaʶqrˤaʶːsˤaʶː ðˤlˤ mħaʶːfðˤaʶːaʶn ʕlaː mbaːdʔih kaːn saːmj jstʕjr aːlmaːl mn ʃrkth tˤwaʶːlˤ aːlwqt walam jastaθqil min aːlqawli maaː jastaθqiluhu min aːlʕamali aʶːttsˤlˤ saːmj baʶːlˤʃʃrˤtˤaʶ jwmaː bʕd wfaːa ljlaː maːrj mʁrma bʃχsˤ ʔaːχr jrjd ʃjʔiaː baːrdaː faʕalaaː qadri aːlssuruwri jakuwnu aːlħuznu ʕmlt naːdlanaː lθlaːθ snwaːt tʕaːnj mn mrˤdˤ mʕd wajadfaʕu χidaaːʕa ħijlatihi waqaaːla ʔaanuwʃirwaaːna libazard͡ʒamhara waʶjuʶnsˤiʶfaʶ fij aːlħikami waʔiiðaaː aːlbiħaːru sud͡ʒd͡ʒirat liʔaanna ʃarafahu juθmiru ʕalaaː sˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶhiʶ baːlrrʁm mn ʔann ljlaː drst fj saːmj llaːstd͡ʒwaːb hw jd͡ʒʕl aːlʁrfa mðˤlˤmaʶ ʕalaː qalbika litakwna mina aːlmunðirjna ʔaajju aːlʔaaʃjaaːʔi χajrun lilmarʔi qaaːla ʕaqlun jaʕijʃu bihi qaaːluwaː ʔaatattaχiðunaaː huzuwanaː qaaːla lanukaffirana ʕanhum sajjiʔiaaːtihim walanad͡ʒzijannahum ʔaaħsana aːllaðj kaːnwaː jaʕmalwna ʔaraːd saːmj ʃχsˤaʶː kj jʕtnj bh hðaː faljaðwqwhu ħamjmun waʁassaːqun walaː takwnwaː kaaːllaðjna nasuwaː ʔaːχiratihi ʕurfu aːlʔaad͡ʒnaaːsi faʔiinna lilʔaad͡ʒnaaːdi zijjanaː maʔaluwfanaː wajustafaaːda biaːlddurbaai waʶaʶːlˤmuʶʕaʶaʶːtˤaʶaʶːaʶiʶ hðaː χalqu aːlllahi faʔaarwnj maːðaː χalaqa aːllaðjna min dwnihi bali aʶːlˤðˤðˤaʶːlˤiʶmwnaʶ fj dˤaʶlˤaʶːlˤiʶn mubjnin waʔiinnj kullamaː daʕawtuhum litaʁfira lahum d͡ʒaʕalwaː ʔaʶaʶsˤaʶːbiʶʕaʶhuʶm fj ʔaːðaːnihim waaːstaʁʃawaː θijaːbahum waʶʔaʶaʶsˤaʶrˤrˤwaʶː waaːstakbaruwaː aːstikbaːranaː ħqn saːmj bʕdˤ baːlbaːktjrjaː aːlħlwjjaːt aːltj ʔaklthaː ljlaː ʔinna min aːlʃʃiʕri laħikmaaan ln tstfjd mn aːlmqaːwma flaː tħaːwl ʔinh mwlʕ bk falammaaː ʕadima dirhamin wad͡ʒaʕala maaː salabahu aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶbiʶjuʶ min aːlbiʃri waaːlħajaaːʔi sababanaː litaʁajjuri aːlnnaaːsi ħakaaː ħumajdun aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶwiʶjlˤuʶ ʔaanna ʕammaaːra bna jaaːsirin ʕuzila ʕan wilaaːjaain faaːʃtadda ðalika ʕalajhi nħn ln nʕml mʕhm ʔabdaː bdʔa ltwwh ʔinn aʶːlˤtˤtˤbjb aːlwħjd aːlðj fj aːlχdma hw d͡ʒmaːl sˤaʶːdq knt hnaː aːlħjaːa ħlwa jrjd saːmj ʔan jkwn ʔakθr fʕaːljja lmaːðaː jrjd twm aːltħdθ mʕj jasbaħu aːlssamaku ʃʕr saːmj w kʔann ʔaħdaː kaːn jraːqbh dˤbtˤ saːmj ljlaː w hj tnðˤrˤ ʔiljh kaːnt ljlaː tˤflˤaʶ mθaːljja waʶʔaʶaʶtˤjʕuʶwaʶː aːlllaha waʶʔaʶaʶtˤjʕuʶwaʶː aːlrraswla faʔiin tawallajtum faʔiinnamaː ʕalaː raswlinaaː aːlbalaːʁu aːlmubjnu kam duwna lisaaːnik min ħid͡ʒaaːbin qaaːla waman faqadahu min ʔaahli aːlddunjaaː qallat aːlrraʁbaau fijhi waaːlrrahbaau minhu χddrt ljlaː saːmj kaːn saːmj jrjd ʔan jʃtrj mlaːbsaː lljlaː aːntqln ʔilaː hnaː wazad͡ʒara aːlnnafsa ʕan rukuwbi aːlhawaaː waaːd͡ʒʕal muʶnaʶaʶːðˤaʶrˤaʶaʶaʶ aːlmutaʕallimi tanbijhanaː ʕalaaː maaː lajsa ʕindak haʔuulaaːʔi lˤaʶdˤaʶaʶːlˤlˤuʶwnaʶ aːsq aːlbstaːn walanabluwannakum ħattaaː naʕlama aːlmud͡ʒaaːhidijna minkum waʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːbiʶrˤiʶjnaʶ wanabluwa ʔaaχbaaːrakum wlqd χlqnaː fwqkm sbʕ tˤrˤaʶːʔiʶq wmaː aʶːlˤðˤaʶːlˤmwn lqd ʔataː kj jzwrk aːlbaːrħa ʔanaː ʔakrh d͡ʒjraːnj ðlk lʔan aːlfqaːʕa tlaːʃt fj aːlhwaːʔ maːðaː tʕllmti aːlχaːms mn maːjw hw jwm mjlaːdhaː fahaðaaː jastaħiqqu ʕaðaaːba aːlmud͡ʒtariʔii waʶːlˤdˤrˤaʶːʔ lʕlhm jtdˤrˤʕwn rˤfdˤt aʶːlˤdˤħjaʶ ʔiqaːma dʕwaː qdˤaʶːʔiʶjaʶ kaːn saːmj jqtˤn fj aːlqaːhra bdʔat ʔaħs baːld͡ʒwʕ aːlllahu lˤaʶtˤiʶjfuʶn biʕibaaːdihi jarzuqu man jaʃaaːʔu wahuwa aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶdiʶjquʶ sˤaʶdiʶjqaʶnaʶː lˤiʶsˤiʶdqiʶhiʶ fj ʔaj sn bdʔat ʕndk aːldwra aːlʃhrja walillahi maaː fij aːlssamaaːwaaːti wamaaː fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wakaaːna aːlllahu bikulli ʃajʔin tdrrs aːlʔisbaːnja walammaaː balaʁa ʔaaʃuddahu ʔaːtajnaaːhu ħukmanaː waʕilmanaː wakaðalika nad͡ʒzij aːlmuħsinijna aːlħaːswb mwdˤwʕ ʕlaː jsaːr aːlsjdaːt ħrqt aʶːsˤbʕj maː kntu lʔafʕlh lw knt mkaːnk ʔiin tuʶqrˤiʶdˤuʶwaʶː aːlllaha qaʶrˤdˤaʶnaʶː ħasananaː juʶdˤaʶaʶːʕiʶfhuʶ lakum wajaʁfir lakum waaːlllahu ʃakuwrun ħalijmun maːðaː tʕtqd ʔaʶfdˤlˤ tˤrˤjqaʶ ltswja hðaː aːlnzaːʕ ʔiinna rabbaka huwa aːlχallaaːqu aːlʕalijmu maaːta χazzaaːnu aːlʔaamwaaːli wabaqija χazzaaːnu aːlʕilmi ʔaaʕjaaːnuhum mafquwdaaun waʶʔaʶaʶʃχaʶaʶːsˤuʶhuʶm fij aːlquluwbi twqf ʕn tbðjr aːlmaːʔ waʶjaʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶ aːlʕaduwwu muwaaːlijanaː hl ʔaaː jnðˤrˤ ʔaħd sˤbaʶːħ aːlχjr ʔinhu wqt aʶːlˤʔiʶstjqaʶːðˤ tlk mdjna d͡ʒmjla ʔaʶuʶfdˤlˤ ʔan ʔad͡ʒls bd͡ʒwaːr aːlnaːfða klaːmhaː ʔaθaːr ʁdˤbj kjfa ħaːlk twm jħb aːlsmraːwaːt ʔaħb aʶːlˤrˤjaʶːdˤaʶ waaːttaχaðuwaː min duwni aːlllahi ʔaːlihaaan laʕallahum juʶnsˤaʶrˤuʶwnaʶ ðlk qlb jawma tamuwru aːlssamaaːʔu mawranaː hudanaː wabuʃraaː lilmuʔuminijna wamaaː naqamuwaː minhum ʔiillaaː ʔaan juʔuminuwaː biaːlllahi aːlʕazijzi aːlħamijdi ʔiχwtj hjaː llʕlaː sʕjaː dʕnj ʔaʕrf ʔaajaʕidukum ʔaannakum ʔiiðaaː mittum wakuntum turaaːbanaː waʶʕiʶðˤaʶaʶːmaʶnaʶː ʔaannakum muχrad͡ʒuwna wʔamlj lhm ʔin kjdj mtjn wd͡ʒd djmaː ʔan aːlbðla kbjra d͡ʒdaː lmmaː d͡ʒrbhaː ln jħl aːlʃd͡ʒaːr ʃjʔiaːan min duwni aːlllahi hal jaʶnsˤuʶrˤuʶwnaʶkuʶm ʔaaw jaʶntaʶsˤiʶrˤuʶwnaʶ aːljwm baːrd tʕd͡ʒbnj aːllʁa aːlbrtʁaːlja aːlbraːzjlja ʔarjd ʔan ʔad͡ʒls waaːljawmu ʕamalun wjstnbʔiwnk ʔaħq hw ql ʔij wrbj ʔinh lħq wmaː ʔantm bmʕd͡ʒzjn qaːlwaː tlk ʔiðaː kra χaːsra χtˤjrˤ d͡ʒdaːan lki ʔan tkwnj hnaː faʶsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ kaʶaʶːlˤmaʶrˤiʶjdˤiʶ aːllaðij huwa biʶmaʶrˤaʶdˤiʶhiʶ mutaʃaaːʁilun lqd ʕwqbwaː ʕlaː d͡ʒraːʔimhm ʕaːml aːlnaːs kmaː tħb ʔan jʕaːmlwk aːntql saːmj mn mnzl llfqraːʔ ʔilaː ʃqqa fχma bjn ljla w dˤħaʶːhaʶː laː tlʕb kra aːlqaːʕda hnaː jaʶtˤuʶwfuʶ ʕalajhim wildaaːnun mmuχaladuwna twm md͡ʒaːhd faqaaːluwaː ʔaabaʃaranaː mminaaː waaːħidanaː nnatabiʕuhu ʔiinnaaː ʔiiðanaː llafij dˤaʶlˤaʶːlˤiʶn wasuʕurin wʔin rbk lðw fdˤlˤ ʕlaː aːlnaːs wlkn ʔakθrhm laː jʃkrwn wʔin ʕzmwaː aʶːlˤtˤlˤaʶːq fʔin aːllh smjʕ ʕljm muttakiʔiijna ʕalaaː sururin mmaʶsˤfuʶwfaʶaʶiʶn wazawwad͡ʒnaaːhum biħuwrin ʕijnin kaːnt aːlwljma mn ʔaʶtˤjb maː ðqt θumma ʔiinnakum baʕda ðalika lamajjituwna qul ʔaanfiquwaː tˤaʶwʕaʶnaʶː ʔaaw karhanaː lan jutaqabbala minkum ʔiinnakum kuntum qawmanaː faaːsiqijna ʕibaaːda aːlllahi qul jaaː ʔaahla aːlkitaaːbi lima takfuruwna biʔaːjaaːti aːlllahi waaːlllahu ʃahijdun ʕalaaː maaː taʕmaluwna nðˤðˤiʶf aːlmd͡ʒtmʕ mn ʃrwrh maː hj aːllʁa aːltj jtklmwnhaː fj aːlmksjk aːfʕl waliðalika qaaːla ʕumaru bnu aʶːlˤχaʶtˤtˤaʶaʶːbiʶ rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu hw ʔaʁlq ʕjnjh wahaðaaː qad jakuwnu min ʔaaħadi wad͡ʒhajni fj wqt mn aːlaːwqaːt kaːn hnaːk qtˤ aːsmh taːnʁw ʔin aːlqbaːʔilja tqaːftkn bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm ʔinaː ʔanzlnaːh fj ljla aːlqdr wʔiðaː ħdˤrˤ aːlqsma ʔawlw aːlqrbaː waːljtaːmaː waːlmsaːkjn faːrzqwhm mnh wqwlwaː lhm qwlaː mʕrwfaː waqaaːluwaː aːttaχaða aːlllahu waladanaː subħaaːnahu bal lahu maaː fij aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ kullun lahu qaaːnituwna kaːnt qlqa bʃʔan sˤħth ʔanta kjf ʕrfta ðlk hðaː laː jhm walikulli d͡ʒuzʔin minhu qiʶstˤuʶn min aːlfasaaːdi aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ d͡ʒamijʕanaː θumma jund͡ʒijhi ftaːa ħsnaːʔ mθlk ħtmaː tkwn qd lˤwħðˤt ʔiinna ʔaaħadakum lajaʕmalu biʕamali ʔaahli aːld͡ʒannaai ħattaaː maaː jakuwna bajnahu wabajnahaaː ʔiilaːaːa rubbamaaː waqaʕa bihi χalalun fij niʶðˤaʶaʶːmiʶhiʶ maːðaː trjd ʔanaː w bkl bsaʶːtˤaʶ laː ʔarʁb fj aːlχrwd͡ʒ aːlljla jwm jχrd͡ʒwn mn aːlʔad͡ʒdaːθ sraːʕaː kʔanhm ʔilaː nsˤb jwfdˤwn aʶːsˤbrˤ ʕlaː maː ʁajru mubijnin waħukija ʔaanna baʶʕdˤaʶ aːlzzuhaaːdi waqafa ʕalaaː d͡ʒamʕin fanaaːdaaː biʔaaʕlaaː sˤaʶwtiʶhiʶ jbdw ʃaːbanaː laː jmkn ʔan jkwn ʔakbr mnj wajuθnijhaaː maħabbaaan waʶaʶːnʕiʶtˤaʶaʶːfaʶnaʶː twm mn hnaː hj laː tħsn aːlʔind͡ʒljzja mθlk laː tbaːlj bmaː qaːl fqd kaːn jmzħ ljs ʔilaː ʔarjd aːltħdθ aːljk ʕn ʃjʔ ʔaːχr waʔaammaaː aːlmuktasabaau biʶaʶːlˤqaʶsˤdiʶ falaaː budda lahaaː min daaːʕin naʶqsˤuʶsˤhuʶm ʕalajka wakallama aːlllahu muwsaaː taklijmanaː ʔarjd frˤsˤaʶ θaːnja nħn mtʔakdwn ʔank stkwn ʕlaː maː jraːm ʔiillaaː maaː ʃaaːʔa aːlllahu ʔiinnahu jaʕlamu aːld͡ʒahra wamaaː jaχfaaːaː fqtˤ lj θlaːθ ʔaχwaːt bjn aːlʔiχwa kθjr mn aːltwtr ʔin ðlk lħq tχaʶːsˤm ʔahl aːlnaːr hw ʁbj wʁjr sˤaʶːdq waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami ʔaatʕib qadamak faʔiin taʕiba qaddamak qaːlwaː ʔinaː ʔilaː rbnaː mnqlbwn wbaːlʔasħaːr hm jstʁfrwn faʶːsˤbrˤ lħkm rbk wlaː tkn ksˤaʶːħb aːlħwt ʔið naːdaː whw mkðˤwm ʕalajkum biaːlwaduwdi aːlwaluwdi walaaː tankiħuwaː aːlħamqaaːʔa faʔiinna sˤuʶħbaʶtaʶhaʶaʶː balaaːʔun wawaladahaaː dˤiʶjaʶaʶːʕuʶn ʔant tsʔal kθjraː ʕn ʃʔuwn aːlʁjr wamaaːddaaun kaaːfijaaun taskunu nafsu aːlʔiinsaaːni ʔilajhaaː wajastaqijmu ʔaawaduhu bihaaː hðaː laː jχsˤnj lmaːðaː laː trdn ʔan tχbrnnaː baːlħqjqa fawaaːllhi aːllaðij laːa ʔiilaha ʁajruhu kaaːnat sˤuʶħuʶfuʶ muwsaaː ʕalaaː nabijjinaaː waʕalajhi aːlssalaaːmu kulluhaaː ʕibaranaː aʶːdˤrˤb waːlrjħ tsˤjħ hl ʔaʕd͡ʒbk bjtk aːld͡ʒdjd ħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤuʶwaʶː ʕalaaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶlˤaʶwaʶaʶːtiʶ waʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːaʶiʶ aʶːlˤwuʶstˤaʶaʶː waquwmuwaː lillahi qaaːnitijna ʔanaː ʔaχðt tlk aʶːlˤsˤwrˤaʶ qbl ʔisbwʕ aːstlqaː ʕlaː aːlsrjr ʔiinnahum lahumu aʶːlˤmaʶnsˤuʶwrˤuʶwnaʶ wahaðaaː ʔaaʕlaaː maraaːtibi aːlʔaulfaai fmn aːllh ʕljnaː wwqaːnaː ʕðaːb aːlsmwm ʕndmaː hb aːlrjħ aʶːntˤfʔaʶt aːlʃmʕa walajsa jaqdiru ʕalaaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶbrˤiʶ man haðaaː ħaaːluhu ʔillaaː ʔaan jakuwna ʁaaːliba aːlʃʃahwaai fj rwmaː baːrjs w aːlbndqja laː ʔaħd jtsaːʔl ʕn ʔaj ʃjʔi ʔatʕlm aːlʕrbja tlk aːlmrʔaa aːlʕd͡ʒwz tskn lwħdhaː waːlðjn aːtχðwaː mn dwnh ʔawljaːʔ aːllh ʔiðaː ʕsʕs qlq saːmj wdˤʕ dˤʁtˤaʶːuʶ ʕlaː ʕaːʔilth ʔimaː ʔant ʔaw sˤdjqk mχtˤʔiʶ fij raqqin manʃuwrin klbj jʔakl aːlʕnb lqd tlqjnaː χbr wfaːth wnd͡ʒwmhaː lk hdjja lqd qaːm bqtl ðaːk aːlrd͡ʒl aːʁlq bjtj ʃrfun fj aːlnsbi wʔiðaː aːlsmaːʔ frd͡ʒt tm qbwlh fj aːld͡ʒaːmʕa bʕd ʔan rsb fj aːmtħaːn aːlqbwl mrtjn aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wlm jlbswaː ʔijmaːnhm bðˤlˤm ʔawlʔik lhm aːlʔamn whm mhtdwn jaː aːllh aːtrk jaʕrifuwnahu kamaaː jaʕrifuwna ʔaabnaaːʔahum waʔiinna farijqanaː minhum lajaktumuwna aːlħaqqa wahum jaʕlamuwna wjtˤwf ʕljhm wldaːn mχldwn ʔiðaː rʔajthm ħsbthm lʔulʔuaː mnθwraː ʔinh lqrʔaːn krjm ʔanaː mtʔakd ʔan twm sjkwn hnaː qrjbaːan jd͡ʒb aːld͡ʒmjʕu aːlʔaːnsa waːjt ʔaajju ʕaaːlimin laaː jahfuw aːlħdθ aʶːftrˤaʶːdˤj ʔant laː jmknk tħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja sˤħjħ ʔin ðlk sˤħjħ ʔirjk bdʔa baːlʁnaːʔ wad͡ʒannaain ʕaʶrˤdˤuʶhaʶaʶː aːlssamaaːwaaːtu waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤuʶ ʔauʕiddat lilmuttaqijna ʔiinna fij χalqi aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ waaːχtilaaːfi aːlllajli waaːlnnahaaːri laʔaːjaaːtin fajastakidduwaː χaʶwaʶaʶːtˤiʶrˤaʶ qad muniħuwaː sˤiʶħħaʶtaʶhaʶaʶː fijmaaː laaː jud͡ʒdij nafʕanaː walaaː jufijdu ʕilmanaː hlaː ʃʁlt aːltlfaːz mn fdˤlˤk mud͡ʒaaːlasaau aːlʕuqalaaːʔi lqd ʕmlt fj mzrʕa ʕankumu aːlððikra sˤaʶfħaʶnaʶː ʔaan kuntum qawmanaː musrifijna mn fdˤlˤk aʶːstjqðˤ ʕlaː aːlsaːʕa aːlsaːbʕa ljs ldjnaː ʃjʔ lnχsrh wlaː td͡ʒʕlwaː mʕ aːllh ʔilhaː ʔaːχr ʔinj lkm mnh nðjr mbjn ʔanaː lm ʔaktb ʔilaː waːldj twqf ʕn ʁjðˤ ʔaχtk jaaː marjamu aːqnutij lirabbiki waaːsd͡ʒudij waaːrkaʕij maʕa aːlrraaːkiʕijna laː ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː ʔaħd waqad aːχtalafat maðaaːhibu aːlnnaaːsi fij aːttiχaaːði aːlʔiiχwaaːni sˤnʕ mjdlaːja mn aːlðhb ʔauwlaʔiika aːllaðijna aːʃtarawuaː aʶːlˤdˤdˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶaʶaʶ biaːlhudaaː waaːlʕaðaaːba biaːlmaʁfiraai famaaː ʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶrˤaʶhuʶm ʕalaaː aːlnnaaːri hammaaːzin maʃʃaaːʔin binamijmin liʔaanna aːlrrad͡ʒula jaʁlibuhaaː ʕalaaː aːlʃʃabaqi lizuhdihaaː fij aːlrrid͡ʒaaːli ʔaʕjʃ fj tˤrˤaʶːblˤs lbnaːn njk ldjh ʃʕr qsˤjrˤ ʔam ʕndhm χzaːʔin rbk ʔam hm aʶːlˤmsˤjtˤrˤwn ʔaan janfija ʕan nafsihi raðaaːʔiila aːld͡ʒahli biʶfaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤiʶ aːlʕilmi waʁaflaaa aːlʔiihmaaːli biʶaʶːstiʶjqaʶaʶːðˤiʶ aːlmuʕaaːnaaːai waaːllaðijna hum lifuruwd͡ʒihim ħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤuʶwnaʶ hl ʔant mstʕd lhaːlwjn ln tsttˤjʕ ʔaj mn ʔad͡ʒhza aːlħaːswb aːlaːstmraːr fj aːlʕml mʕ btˤaʶːqaʶ mħrwqa ql kfaː baːllh ʃhjdaː bjnj wbjnkm ʔinh kaːn bʕbaːdh χbjraː bsˤjrˤaʶː laː ʔaħd jtklm mʕj jnbʁj ʔan tkwn
