ʔink tʕrf kjf ttʕaːml mʕ aːlnsaːʔ hj trktnaː sjwðˤf ʃχsˤaʶː jtħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja lm ʔakn ʔaʕlm bʔanh ʕlaː twm fʕl ðlk kallaaː bal raaːna ʕalaaː quluwbihim maaː kaaːnuwaː jaksibuwna jrħmk aːllh ljla aːlqdr χjr mn ʔalf ʃhr ʔant knta mdlll tʕrd͡ʒ aːlmlaːʔika waːlrwħ ʔiljh fj jwm kaːn mqdaːrh χmsjn ʔalf sna jaʶħuʶtˤtˤuʶ rid͡ʒaaːlun bajna ʔaaʕjunihim sˤuʶlˤbaʶaʶː waliðalika qijla jawma laaː juʁnij mawlanaː ʕan mawlanaː ʃajʔianaː walaaː hum juʶnsˤaʶrˤuʶwnaʶ laː ʃkraːan lk hl sbq ʔank aːħbbt ʃχsˤaʶː laː jħbk hðaː jwm aʶːlˤfsˤlˤ d͡ʒmʕnaːkm waːlʔawljn kaːn ʁrˤdˤ aːlrsaːla hw ʔiχbaːrhaː ʔanh kaːn mrˤjdˤaʶː walikulli qismin minhum manzilaaun min aːlbirri waʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤiʶlˤaʶaʶiʶ aːbtsm djmaː baːltʔakjd ʔant tmzħjn ldjhaː nbd fj wd͡ʒhhaː falillahi aːlʔaːχiraau waaːlʔauwlaaː lm ʔaðhb lʔan aːld͡ʒw sjʔ laː ʔaħb aːstχdaːm trd͡ʒma ʁwʁl sħb jdh mn aʶːlˤtˤaʶːwlˤaʶ wamaaː ʔaadraaːka maaː ʕillijuwna trkthaː tðhb jd͡ʒb ʕlja ħfðˤ aːlkθjr mn klmaːt aːlsr wʔaːθr aːlħjaːa aːldnjaː ʕad͡ʒibt liman ʔaajqana biaːlnnaaːri θumma jaʶdˤħaʶkuʶ kl maː kaːn jħtaːd͡ʒh twm ħqaːan hw ʕnaːq min ʔaarbaʕaai ʔaaħwaaːlin hl ttħdθ aːlfrnsja aːlʕdjd mn aːlsjaːsjjjn jaχlfwn wʕwdahm ln ʔatd͡ʒaːwz ʕn ʔaʶχtˤaʶːʔiʶk θaːnjaan jaʶmdˤiʶj ʔaaχuwk falaaː talqaaː lahu χalafanaː waaːlmaaːlu baʕda ðahaaːbi aːlmaaːli muktasabu waqaaːla ʔaːχaru maaː lakum laaː tuʕaaːtibuwna aːld͡ʒuhhaaːla faqaaːla ʔaʶħdˤrˤ klbh ʔilaː aːlmdrsa laː tqaʶːtˤʕnj rħma mn rbk ʔinh hw aːlsmjʕ aːlʕljm ʔan d͡ʒd mmtn lmsaːʕdtk qaːl lw ʔan lj bkm qwa ʔaw ʔaːwj ʔilaː rkn ʃdjd ʔataː mnnaːd fʔalqj aːlsħra saːd͡ʒdjn maː hj mwaʶːsˤfaʶːth falazima liðalika ʔaan jaʶsˤrˤiʶfaʶ aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔilaaː dunjaaːhu ħaʶðˤðˤaʶnaʶː min ʕinaaːjatihi sjkwn aːsrʕ aːðaː ðhbnaː baːlmtrw ʔinna aːlddunjaaː kaθijraau aːlttaʁjijri ʔiirama ðaaːti aːlʕimaaːdi jaʕnij ʕaʃijraaan maaːniʕaaan wahuwa aːlχaaːmisu min ʔaasbaaːbi aːlʔaulfaai faliʔaannahu juʶwsˤiʶlˤuʶ ʔilaaː aːlquluwbi ʔaʶaʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːfaʶnaʶː wanaħnu laaː natuwbu ħattaaː namuwta laː aːχaːf aːlmwt fj fsˤlˤ aːlχrjf tʁjr aːlʔawraːq ʔalwaːnhaː w ttsaʶːqtˤ faːlntfq ʕlaː ʔan nχtlf ql hw nbʔa ʕðˤjm fahija ʔaʶaʶwsaʶtˤuʶ aːlʔaaħwaaːli waʔaaʕdaluhaaː jaː ʔajhaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː aːðkrwaː aːllh ðkraː kθjraː liʔaanna minhaaː maaː jastamiddu ʔilaː ʔajn nðhb waʔiinna haðihi ʔaummatukum ʔaummaaan waaːħidaaan waʔaanaaː rabbukum faaːttaquwni fʔaθrn bh nqʕaː aːlddunjaaː jawmaaːni nʕm ʕlaː aːlʔard͡ʒħ ʔanhaː swf tʔatj ʔilaː aːlmnzl lqd aːstʕaːd mħfðˤth aːlmsrwqa watawaqqijanaː min taʶsaʶlˤlˤuʶtˤiʶ aːlʁurabaaːʔi aːlʔaad͡ʒaaːnibi ʔanaː mn aːlʔikwaːdwr tˤaʶːʕaʶ wqwl mʕrwf fʔiðaː ʕzm aːlʔamr flw sˤdqwaʶː aːllh lkaːn χjraː lhm qbrh hnaːk θm tqdm mnh wqaːl χð faːstfthm ʔalrbk aːlbnaːt wlhm aːlbnwn ʔattðkr aːlmra aːltj zrnaː fjhaː twm ʕndmaː kaːn laː jzaːl mraːhqaː laː tqwlj ʃjʔianaː qbl aːltfkjr fjh hw dʕaːnj ʔilaː mnzlh waqad qijla liaːbni ʕabbaaːsin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhumaaː waχaʃjaau aːlllahi fij aːlssiri waaːlʕalaaːnijaai faːljwm laː tðˤlˤm nfs ʃjʔiaː wlaː td͡ʒzwn ʔilaː maː kntm tʕmlwn laː jsmʕwn fjhaː lʁwaː ʔilaː slaːmaː wlhm rzqhm fjhaː bkra wʕʃjaː faquwlaaː lahu qawlanaː lajjinanaː laʕallahu jataðakkaru ʔaaw jaχʃaaː kam min ðalijlin ʔaaʕazzahu ʕilmuhu ʔinnamaaː summija aːlχalijlu χalijlanaː lmaːðaː tkrh aːbntk aːlħlwaː ʃarru aːlʔiiχwaaːni man kaaːnat mawaddatuhu maʕa aːlzzamaaːni ʔiðaaː ʔaaqbala maliki aːlnnaaːsi jmkn llbd͡ʒʕa ʔan tstwʕb aːlkθjr mn aːlʔasmaːk fj mnqaːrhaː qwm frʕwn ʔalaː jtqwn ʔahlaː mn d͡ʒdjd dfʕt lh χmsa dwlaːraːt maːðaː ʕljj ʔan ʔaʶħdˤrˤ laː tud͡ʒaːdil laː ʔazaːl raːʁba fj ʔan ʔand͡ʒb ʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤaʶː aːhdʔa jaː bnj ʁrdt aʶːlˤʕsˤaʶːfjrˤ θm d͡ʒʕlnaːkm χlaːʔif fj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ mn bʕdhm lˤnnðˤrˤ kjf tʕmlwn hm jstmʕwn llmðjaːʕ ʔan dʕwaː llrħmn wldaː wlm ʔadr maː ħsaːbjh aːlfnd͡ʒaːn ʕlj aʶːlˤtˤaʶːwlˤaʶ twm laː jdrs aːlfrnsja aːlʔaːn jħlfwn lkm lˤtrˤdˤwaʶː ʕnhm fʔin trˤdˤwaʶː ʕnhm fʔin aːllh laː jrˤdˤaʶː ʕn aːlqwm aːlfaːsqjn jaː lh mn tsˤmjmiʶn d͡ʒmjl waqaaːla aːlħukamaaːʔu ʔanaː mθaːlj ʔanaː laː ʔaʕrf ʔilj ʔajn ʔanaː ðaːhb wlknj ʕlaː aʶːlˤtˤrˤjq waʔaammaaː aːllluʁzu fahuwa taħarrij ʔaahli aːlfaraaːʁi waʃuʁlu ðawij aʶːlˤbaʶtˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶaʶiʶ ʔant d͡ʒmjlun ltdrjb aːlkmbjwtr ʕlaː aʶːlˤntˤq θumma huwa sˤiʶddiʶjquʶn ʔaaw ʕaduwwun ʔajd͡ʒb ʔan ʔaqwm bðlk ʕlaː aːlfwr ʔanaː ldj sˤdjq fj ʔind͡ʒltraː ʔabdanaː laː jfkkr twm baːlʔaːχrjn waʔiiðaaː marruwaː bihim jataʁaaːmazuwna ʔinhaː turjd aːlʔintqaːm ʔaʕdt lj kʕka hl d͡ʒwaːr ʔaħs twm bʃjʔ jzħf ʕlaː ðraːʕh nħb mn jtd͡ʒaːhlnaː wntd͡ʒaːhlu mn jħbnaː qaːmwaː btd͡ʒrba lmʕrfa maː aːðaː kaːn aːldwaːʔ qd ħsn aːlðaːkra wʔamh wʔabjh lijakfuruwaː bimaaː ʔaːtajnaaːhum fatamattaʕuwaː fasawfa taʕlamuwna sˤdq ʔaw laː tsˤdq fhj ldjhaː θlaːθa ʔabnaːʔ hl hðaː nhr aːmlʔa aːlzd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa maːʔaː mn fdˤlˤk ʔardtu ʔan ʔaʶtsˤlˤ bika wlkn lm jkun ldja rqmk ʔanaː fuzt wʔaʕtðr ʕn rˤχsˤiʶ aːlhdj waʔaaððin fij aːlnnaaːsi biaːlħad͡ʒd͡ʒi jaʔatuwka rid͡ʒaaːlanaː waʕalaaː kulli dˤaʶaʶːmiʶrˤiʶn jaʔatijna min kulli fad͡ʒd͡ʒin ʕamijqin waːʕbd rbk ħtaː jʔatjk aːljqjn faʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ sˤaʶbrˤaʶnaʶː d͡ʒamijlaː man ʔaanti faqaaːlat jaː ljtnj ʕndj ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ kθr waaːlqamara qaddarnaaːhu manaaːzila ħattaaː ʕaaːda kaaːlʕurd͡ʒuwni aːlqadijmi ʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːrˤuʶhaʶaʶː χaaːʃiʕaaun ljs hnaːk ʔaj mʃaːkl ħattaaː laaː taʶtˤmaʶħaʶ lahu ʕajnun lirijbaain walaaː tunaaːziʕahu nafsun ʔilaaː fud͡ʒuwrin faʶtˤaʶaʶːfaʶ ʕalajhaaː tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶfuʶn mmin rrabika wahum naaːʔiimuwna latarkabunna tˤaʶbaʶqaʶnaʶː ʕan tˤaʶbaʶqiʶn saʔaalathu lmaːðaː kaːn jbkj ʔaʶaʶtˤtˤaʶlˤaʶʕaʶ aːlʁajba ʔaami aːttaχaða ʕinda aːlrraħmani ʕahdanaː wwfjt kl nfs maː ʕmlt whw ʔaʕlm bmaː jfʕlwn lqd ʕlqt fj aːzdħaːm mrwrj faqad jarʕawij man laaː jarwij waːlʃʕraːʔ jtbʕhm aːlʁaːwwn ʔiinna ʔiibraaːhijma laħalijmun ʔaawwaaːhun munijbun ʔant tðkrnj bʔaχjk baːltaːlj swf ʔaʶdˤtˤrˤuʶ llqaːʔi hnaː kjfa kaːnt aːlmdrsa aːljwm waʔaammaaː aːlssaaːkinu faradijʔun ʔanaː hnaː mn ʔad͡ʒlk wmaː tsʔalhm ʕljh mn ʔad͡ʒr ʔin hw ʔilaː ðkr llʕaːlmjn waʔaawfuwaː aːlkajla ʔiiðaaː kiltum wazinuwaː biʶaʶːlˤqiʶstˤaʶaʶːsiʶ aːlmustaqijmi ðalika χajrun waʔaaħsanu taʔawijlanaː ʔaajjumaaː ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlˤuʶ aːlmaaːlu ʔaam aːlʕilmu faqaaːla fawidaaːduhu χaʶtˤaʶrˤuʶn waʔiiχaaːʔuuhu ʁararun aːmzħ falammaaː raʔaawhaaː qaaːluwaː ʔiinnaaː lˤaʶdˤaʶaʶːlˤlˤuʶwnaʶ maaː ʔaurijdu minhum min rizqin wamaaː ʔaurijdu ʔaan juʶtˤʕiʶmuʶwniʶ hl zwd͡ʒtk tˤbaʶːχaʶ maːhra fj ʔajaːmnaː hðh bʔimkaːn ʔaj waːħd ʔan jħsˤlˤ ʕlaː aːlktb ʔajmknnk ʔan twsˤlˤnj ʔilaː aʶːlˤmħtˤaʶ ʔanaː lbst ħðaːʔ aʶːlˤdˤjf χamsun χuðuwhunna ʕannij falaw rakibtum aːlfulka maaː wad͡ʒadtumuwhunna ʔillaaː ʕindij fasad͡ʒada aːlmalaaːʔiikaau kulluhum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕuwna kalaːaːa ʔiinnahaaː lˤaʶðˤaʶaʶː twm laː jħtrm maːrjjaː tˤrˤd saːmj ljlaː mn aːlbjt tfdˤlˤ baːld͡ʒlws mn fdˤlˤk waʔaaraaːhu χaʶtˤtˤaʶ ʕubajdi aːlllahi waqaaːla lahu lmaːð hrb wsaːrʕwaː ʔilaː mʁfra mn rbkm wd͡ʒna ʕrˤdˤhaʶː aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ ʔaʕdt llmtqjn aːlnaːs jʕjʃwn fj d͡ʒmjʕ ʔanħaːʔ aːlʕaːlm hl qblt dʕwth aʶːntðˤrˤ lˤħðˤaʶ kl ʃχsˤ ldjh dˤʕf wqwa waʔiiðanaː qad lazima min haðajni aːlwad͡ʒhajni sabru aːlʔiiχwaaːni qabla ʔiχaaːʔiihim waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi qaddim liħaaːd͡ʒatik baʶʕdˤaʶ lad͡ʒaaːd͡ʒatik faħurraaːsuhu fij aːlssamaaːʔi aːlmalaaːʔiikaau waʔiinnahu laðikrun laka waliqawmika wasawfa tusʔaaluwna ʔaafasiħrun haðaaː ʔaam ʔaantum laaː tuʶbsˤiʶrˤuʶwnaʶ biʔaajjjikumu aːlmaftuwnu fkjf ttqwn ʔin kfrtm jwmaː jd͡ʒʕl aːlwldaːn ʃjbaː maːðaː stfʕlwn bkl hðaː aːlmaːl liʔaannahu jaruwmu miθlahu aʶːlˤʃrˤtˤaʶ tbħθ ʕnnj ql lj kjf ʕlmta ʔaʶsˤbħ twm btˤlˤaʶː ʔaːh maːðaː ʕsaːnj ʔan ʔafʕl fj ħaːla khðh aːlħqjqa hj d͡ʒmjla bdwn ʃk wlkn ħtaː hj aːlʔakaːðjb lm ʔakn ʔarjd ʔan ʔaqwl ʃjʔiaː faʔaaχrad͡ʒnaaː man kaaːna fijhaaː mina aːlmuʔuminijna lajsa lahaaː min duwni aːlllahi kaaːʃifaaun waaːliaːntiqaaːla min aːlmaχbuwri ʔilaaː ʁajrihi χaʶtˤaʶrˤuʶn ʔanaː lstu qlqaːan kθjraːan bʃʔan sjrtj aːlðaːtja laː d͡ʒrm ʔanhm fj aːlʔaːχra hm aːlʔaχsrwn χsr wðˤjfth wqaːlwaː ʔin hj ʔilaː ħjaːtnaː aːldnjaː wmaː nħn bmbʕwθjn wabiaːlllajli ʔaafalaaː taʕqiluwna mn ʔad͡ʒl maːðaː ʔatjta ʔilaː hnaː wamin ʃarri aːlnnafaaːθaaːti fij aːlʕuqadi faːðkrwnj ʔaðkrkm waːʃkrwaː lj wlaː tkfrwn twqf ʕn dˤrˤb ʔaχjk aːwraːq aːlʃd͡ʒr ttʁjr lwnhaː waaːlrraaːbiʕu aːlʃʃahwaau aːllatij jaduwmu bihaaː aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶlˤaʶbuʶ walaaː jusriʕu ʔilajhi aːlmalalu waʔaablaʁu min ðalika qawlu ʕijsaaː aːbni marjama ʕalaaː nabijjinaaː waʕalajhi aːlssalaaːmu laː jwd͡ʒd ʔaj ʃjʔ mdʕaːa llfχr waʔaaʃhada fijhi naaːsanaː minhum ʕumaru bnu aʶːlˤχaʶtˤtˤaʶaʶːbiʶ twm jrjd mnj ʔan ʔastqjl mn hðh aʶːlˤwðˤjfaʶ aːktʃf aːlflkjaːn haːbl w hjwmaːsn ʔann ʔaʁlbhaː ttħrk bʕjdaː ʕnaː waʔaammaaː man ʔaːmana waʕamila sˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶnaʶː falahu d͡ʒazaaːʔan aːlħusnaaː wasanaquwlu lahu min ʔaamrinaaː jusranaː man d͡ʒaaːʔa biaːlħasanaai falahu χajrun minhaaː wahum min fazaʕin jawmaʔiiðin ʔaːminuwna jd͡ʒb ʕlaː aːlmstʔad͡ʒr dfʕ aːlaːjd͡ʒaːr llmaːlk fj nhaːja kl ʃhr wamaaː jaχtalifu min ʔaaħwaaːli aːlʔaːmirijna bihi waaːlnnaaːhijna ʕanhu aːlðjn jd͡ʒʕlwn mʕ aːllh ʔilhaː ʔaːχr fswf jʕlmwn kaːn twm dktwr d͡ʒaːmʕj liʔaannahu ʕalaaː aːlqalijli ʔaaqdaru ðhbt ʔamj lˤlˤtbdˤʕ waaːttaquwaː aːlnnaaːra aːllatij ʔauʕiddat lilkaaːfirijna walillahi mulku aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wajawma taquwmu aːlssaaːʕaau jawmaʔiiðin jaχsaru aʶːlˤmuʶbtˤiʶlˤuʶwnaʶ ʔið jʁʃaː aːlsdra maː jʁʃaː ʕalaaː sururin mutaqaaːbilijna fðkr ʔin nfʕt aːlðkraː ltrkbn tˤbqaʶː ʕn tˤbq ʃkraːan ldʕwtki lj ʔilaː aːlħfla d͡ʒʕlnaːh jðhb aːbn ʕmj twrˤtˤ fj aːlaːʕmaːl aːlmʃbwha waːlχzj llaːsra hl lj bkʔas mn aːlmaːʔ ʕlaː ħd ʕlmj fʔin aːlʃaːʔiʕaːt ljst sˤħjħaʶ ʔaʶuʶsˤjb ʕndmaː sqtˤ tʕaːl ʔilaː mnzlj ljst mʕk ħjwaːnaːt ʔaw nbaːtaːt sˤħjħ maːðaː tʕtqd ʔaʶfdˤlˤ tˤrˤjqaʶ ltswja hðaː aːlnzaːʕ fajanbaʁij liman bulija bihi ʔaan jastadrika taʶqsˤiʶjrˤaʶhuʶ bikaθraai aːlddarsi waʶjuʶwqiʶðˤaʶ ʁaflatahu biʔiidaaːmaai aʶːlˤnnaʶðˤaʶrˤiʶ waʔiinnamaaː kaaːna ðalika kaðalika waʔiimmaaː min balaaːdatihi waqillaai fahmihi ʔaħbk wʔarjd aːlzwaːd͡ʒ mʕk hl hðaː d͡ʒdjd wlaː tqwlwaː lmn jqtl fj sbjl aːllh ʔamwaːt bl ʔaħjaːʔ wlkn laː tʃʕrwn mnnaːd jdˤaʶːd͡ʒʕ baːja waːtqwaː aːllh wlaː tχzwn qaaːluwaː ʔiinnaaː ʔiilaaː btˤjʔ aːlaːstjʕaːb tħml aːlfʔiraːn aʶːlˤtˤaʶːʕwn ljs mhmaːan tˤwaʶː twm aːlwrqa qbl ʔan jʕtˤjhaʶː lmaːrj faʔaawwalu ħuquwqihi aːʕtiqaaːdu mawaddatihi θumma ʔijnaaːsuhu biʶaʶːlˤiʶaʶːnbiʶsaʶaʶːtˤiʶ ʔilajhi fij ʁajri muħarramin ʔaʶsˤbħ aːllħm sjʔiaː zijaaːdaau ħuruwfin fij ʔaaθnaaːʔi aːlkalimaai jaʃkulu bihaaː maʕrifaau aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶħiʶjħiʶ min ħuruwfihaaː ʔiinna aːllaðijna aːttaqawaː ʔiiðaaː massahum tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶfuʶn mina aʶːlˤʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːniʶ taðakkaruwaː faʔiiðaaː hum muʶbsˤiʶrˤuʶwnaʶ aːlmslmwn jʔumnwn ʔan mħmmdaː rswl mn aːllh mn fdˤlˤk aːinsχ hðh aʶːlˤsˤfħaʶ fakaaːna haðaaː aːlssuʔuaaːlu min saaːʔiilihi ʔimmaaː aːχtibaaːranaː qrrraː saːmj w ljlaː qdˤaʶːʔ bʕdˤ aːlwqt aːlmtmjjz lwħdjhmaː hl stmtˤrˤ ʁdaːan waminhaaː maaː ħurima min manaaːfiʕi maaːlihi wasuliba min wufuwri ħaaːlihi maː jubaddalu aːlqawlu ladajja wamaː ʔaanaː biʶðˤaʶlˤlˤaʶːmiʶn lilʕabjdi faʔiinna qalba aːlʔaaʕjaaːni sˤaʶʕbuʶ aːlmaraaːmi waqaaːla aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶsˤmaʶʕiʶjjuʶ faʔaammaaː aːlqaaːʕidaau aːlθθaaːliθaau waʔaammaaː aːlnnazaaːhaau fanawʕaaːni ʔaaħaduhumaaː aːlnnazaaːhaau ʕan aʶːlˤmaʶtˤaʶaʶːmiʶʕiʶ aːlddanijaai waaːstiʁnaaːʔan bimaaː jabʕaθu ʕalajhi aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶbʕuʶ fj ʔaajji sˤwrˤaʶaʶiʶn aːlsaːʕa jd͡ʒb ʔan laː tnaːm ʔaajjuhaaː aːlʔaamijru ʔinnahu qad tabaaːʕada fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ fjhaː sururun marfwʕaaun ʔiðaː nuʶsˤiʶrˤaʶ aːlrʔaj btˤlˤ aːlhwaː ʔiðaː habaat rjaːħk faːʁtnmhaː maħduwdanaː kaaːlssaχaaːʔi faʔiinnahu ʔin ʔaasrafa fijhi kaaːna maliqanaː maðmuwmanaː ʕan ʔaabij saʕijdin waaːlʔaawwalu ʔaaʃbahu aːlθθaʕlabu jaʔakulu aːlddad͡ʒaaːd͡ʒa ʔaχbrthaː ʔilaː ʔajn snðhb baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi man ʕarafa maʕaaːbahu falaaː jalum man ʕaaːbahu walaaː dawlaaun lak min ʔiðaaːlaain mink kullu ʃajʔin ʔiðaaː kaθura rˤaʶχuʶsˤaʶ ʔillaaː aːlʕaqla faʔiinnahu ʔiðaaː kaθura ʁalaaː wad͡ʒhihi ʃaaːhidun min aːlχabari fasimaau aːlχajri aːlddaʕaau waaːlħajaaːʔu waʔaaʃbaaːhihi min aːldduhaaːai man ʔauʕd͡ʒiba biraʔajihi lam juʃaaːwir hl wd͡ʒdt maː knt tbħθ ʕnh waʔiilaaː aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ kajfa suʶtˤiʶħaʶt aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶrˤiʶjqaʶaʶuʶ dˤaʶjjiʶqaʶaʶuʶn wamaː ʔaadraːka maː lajlaau aːlqadri waðalika liaːstiħkaaːmi aːlʕadaaːwaai bajnahumaaː biaːlmubaaːjanaai waħuduwθi aːliaːntiqaaːmi liʔaad͡ʒali aːlttaqadumi ʔanaː mʕk fj hðaː qaaːla rasuwlu aːlllahi sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama ʔant hw ħjaːtj jaː bnjj hl bʔimkaːnj aːlqjaːm bʃjʔ laː laː bʔas sʔaʶnðˤðˤfh ʔanaː wajumdidkum biʔaamwaːlin wabanjna wajad͡ʒʕal lakum d͡ʒannaːtin wajad͡ʒʕal lakum ʔaanhaːranaː faʔiinna qurraaa ʕujuwni aːlkiraaːmi fij aʶːlˤʔiʶiʶʕtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶ wasuruwra aːllliʔiaaːmi fij aːlʔaaχði qaʶtˤaʶfaʶ muħammadun zahraaan laː jastawj ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːlnnaːri waʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːld͡ʒannaai ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːld͡ʒannaai humu aːlfaːʔiizwna aʶːlˤmuʶwaʶaʶːdˤaʶʕaʶaʶuʶ waʶaʶːlˤʔiʶiʶsˤlˤaʶaʶːħuʶ mtaː tzwd͡ʒt man bariʔia min θalaaːθin naaːla θalaaːθanaː walaqad zajjanaaː aːlssamaːʔa aːlddunjaː biʶmaʶsˤaʶːbjħaʶ wad͡ʒaʕalnaːhaː rud͡ʒwmanaː lˤiʶlˤʃʃaʶjaʶːtˤjniʶ waʔaaʕtadnaː lahum ʕaðaːba aːlssaʕjri waminhaaː maaː jaʶðˤhaʶrˤuʶ biaːlfiʕli wajaχfaaː biaːlttaʁaaːfuli waʶːdˤħ ʔannh mðnb wakaaːna maaː taχallala kitaaːbahu min qaʶsˤaʶsˤiʶ aːlʔaanbijaaːʔi aːlssaaːlifaai twqqf saːmj ʕn tqdjm aːlʕlaːd͡ʒ lljlaː mħaːwlaː ʔan jqtlhaː maːðaː knt tfʕl waʶlˤwtˤaʶnaʶː ʔiið qaːla liqawmihi ʔaataʔatwna aːlfaːħiʃaaa waʔaantum tuʶbsˤiʶrˤwnaʶ ʕljk ʔan tdʕh jrbħ ʔaħjaːnaː aʶːuʶnðˤuʶrˤ man kaaːna minhum lajsa rizquhu ʕalaaː aːlllahi ʕazza wad͡ʒalla faħawwilhu ʔilaaː manzilij ʔiinnaː kaðlika nad͡ʒzij aːlmuħsinjna dχlt aːlssd͡ʒn bsbb sˤfʕj lljlaː kjf wd͡ʒdt aʶːlˤmnðˤrˤ aʶːlˤmtˤlˤ mn aːlfndq wad͡ʒihaaːtu aːlmakaaːsibi mutaʃaʕʕibaaun man ʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħaʶ walam janwi ðˤuʶlˤmaʶ ʔaaħadin ʁafara aːlllahu lahu maaː aːd͡ʒtarama bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi js tafattiaħat aːlwardaau aːld͡ʒamijlaau falaː tuʶtˤiʶʕiʶ aːlkaːfirjna wad͡ʒaːhidhum bihi d͡ʒihaːdanaː kabjranaː mimman ʔaanta qaaːla ʔatrjd aʶːlˤaʶːχdˤrˤ ʔaw aːlaːzrq faʔaawwalu muqaddamaaːti ʔaadabi aʶːlˤrˤrˤiʶjaʶaʶːdˤaʶaʶiʶ waʶaʶːlˤiʶaʶːstiʶsˤlˤaʶaʶːħiʶ ʔaan laaː jasbiqa ʔilaaː ħusni aʶːlˤðˤðˤaʶniʶ binafsihi ʔaanna kulla waaːħidin minhum jad͡ʒidu sabijlanaː ʔilaaː nafji aːlʔiiðaaːʕaai ʕan nafsihi quʶtˤiʶʕaʶt aːlħablu biaːlssakajni mtaː ʕjd mjlaːd saːmj tm aːthaːm twm aːlʃhr aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤj bali aːllaðjna kafarwaː jukaððibwna lqd rʔaːnj aːlmdrrs maː aːlðj tfʕlh man qabila sˤiʶlˤaʶtaʶk faqad baaːʕak muruwʔatahu waʔaaðalla liqadrik ʕizzahu wad͡ʒalaaːlatahu tbaːdlaː saːmj w ljlaː ʔakθr mn ʔalf rsaːla ħbb fafaʕala fasaaːʔat ħaaːluhum faaːd͡ʒtamaʕuwaː ʔilajhi faqaaːluwaː bddl saːmj mlaːbsh aːlʕilmu ʃarafun laaː qadra lahu dχl saːmj ʔilaː mktbj bdwn ʔan jqrʕ aːlbaːb ʔiðaː ʔataːk ʔaħd aʶːlˤχsˤmjn wqd fuqiʔiat ʕjnh flaː tqdˤ lh ħtaː jʔatjk χsˤmh kamaaː qaaːla aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶnaʶwbaʶrˤiʶjuʶ ʔawd aːlnzwl fj aːld͡ʒaːda aːlχaːmsa waħaaːlu taʶsˤaʶrˤrˤuʶfiʶhiʶ waʶjaʶqiʶðˤaʶtiʶhiʶ ʔiilaː firʕawna wahaːmaːna waqaːrwna faqaːlwaː saːħirun kaððaːbun kallaː lammaː jaʶqdˤiʶ maː ʔaamarahu nd͡ʒaː saːmj walaaː bijadihi fajadfaʕu ʕanhaaː ʔatʕlm aːllʁa aːlʔalmaːnja mn ʔad͡ʒl aʶːlˤħsˤwlˤ ʕlaː aːlmzjd mn aʶːlˤfrˤsˤ fj aːlmhna ʔanaː ʔaʶtsˤiʶlˤ bhaː kul msaːʔ sttfaːd͡ʒʔi ħjn traː maː tsttˤjʕ tʕlmh fj ʔasbwʕ ʔaw jʔaχðhm fj tqlbhm fmaː hm bmʕd͡ʒzjn qaaːla aːðhab faman tabiʕaka minhum faʔiinna d͡ʒahannama d͡ʒazaaːʔuukum d͡ʒazaaːʔan mawfuwranaː ʔaʶsˤdqk hl jʕtnwn baːlklb jd͡ʒb ʕljk mmaːrsa aʶːlˤrˤjaʶːdˤaʶ tkmn aːlmʃkla fj aːlmħrk drswaː aːlʔind͡ʒljzja aːlbaːrħa waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi θamaraau aːlʕuluwmi aːlʕamalu biaːlʕuluwmi kaːnt aːlftaːa χaːʔifa mn ðˤlˤhaʶː ʕad͡ʒabanaː liman jaχaaːfu aːlʕiqaaːba kajfa laaː jakuffa taquwluwaː maaː laaː tafʕaluwna ħsˤlˤ baːlʔams ʔarwʕ ʃjʔ waʔaannaaː minnaaː aːlmuslimuwna waminnaaː aʶːlˤqaʶaʶːsiʶtˤuʶwnaʶ faman ʔaaslama faʔauwlaʔiika taħarrawaː raʃadanaː aʶːlˤʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːnuʶ maːrj aːlssamaaːʔu muʶnfaʶtˤiʶrˤuʶn bihi kaaːna waʕduhu mafʕuwlanaː laaː sijjamaaː waaːlχaaːʔiifu ʕalaaː aːlʃʃajʔi muʶχtaʶsˤsˤuʶ aːlhammi bihi muʶnsˤaʶrˤiʶfuʶ aːlfikri ʕan ʁajrihi tʔaχr fj mʕdl qablahum mina aːlquruwni ʔaannahum ʔiilajhim laaː jard͡ʒiʕuwna wanaħnu nastaʕijðu biaːalllahi min ʔaan nuʁbana biʶfaʶdˤlˤiʶ niʕmatihi ʕalajnaaː wjsttˤjʕ aːld͡ʒmjʕu aːlmsaːhmaa qutila aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʕalajhi lqd ħq aːlqwl ʕlaː ʔakθrhm fhm laː jʔumnwn wahaðaaː jakuwnu taaːraaan min sahwi aːlkaaːtibi fajaqillu falaaː jamnaʕu min aːstiχraaːd͡ʒi aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶħiʶjħiʶ ʔaannaaː lahumu aːlððikraaː waqad llnsaːʔ waːlfrnsja llrd͡ʒaːl waːlʔalmaːnja lˤħsˤaʶːnj wakaðalika man ʕammahu aːlʔaamnu kaman aːstawlat ʕalajhi aːlʕaaːfijaau wad͡ʒaʕala aːlqamara fijhinna nuwranaː wad͡ʒaʕala aːlʃʃamsa siraaːd͡ʒanaː ftwl ʕnhm ħtaː ħjn mrwaː bsrʕa w bdwn ʔilqaːʔ nðˤrˤaʶ fħʃr fnaːdaː ql aːllh ʔaʕbd mχlˤsˤaʶː lh djnj faʔaaχaðathumu aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶjħaʶaʶuʶ muʶsˤbiʶħiʶjnaʶ faʶsaʶtuʶbsˤiʶrˤuʶ waʶjuʶbsˤiʶrˤuʶwnaʶ ʔaalajsa aːlllahu biʔaaħkami aːlħaaːkimijna hl ldjk ʔaj fkra ʕn mn jsttˤjʕ fʕl miθl hðaː aːlʃjʔ ʔiið ʔaabaqa ʔiilaaː aːlfulki aːlmaʃħuwni laː bd lj mn aːltħdθ mʕhaː ħwl aʶːlˤχtˤaʶ aːld͡ʒdjda saʶːuʶħdˤiʶrˤ lka ʃjʔiaːu ltʃrbhu sʔaʶħsˤlˤ ʕlaː aːlmaːl mn twm btˤrˤqaʶ ʔaw bʔaχraː faqad qaaːla aːlχalijlu bnu ʔaaħmada tʕrrf saːmj bmslm fj aːlmrkz aːlʔislaːmj ʔaʶsˤbħt ljlaː mʃhwra fj θaːnwjja baːkr zaːr saːmj msd͡ʒdaː aːlʁaːʔib ʕuðruh mʕh aːnthjt ltwwj mn mʃaːhda aːlħlqa aːlθaːlθa ʔaʶmdˤjt ljla mmtʕa tχllaː saːmj ʕn mhnth aːlmrbħa ktˤbjb kj jsˤbħ saːʔiq sjjaːra ʔad͡ʒra jaː ħasraaan ʕalaaː aːlʕibaːdi maː ʕalaaː ʕiqaaːbij lamaaː ʕafawta ʕannij faqijla lahu qad nazalat bik ʔaʶwsˤlˤ saːmj ljlaː ʔilaː ʕjaːda ʔiʕaːda tʔahjl tfwħ mnk raːʔiħa aːlʃwkwlaːta falaaː taʶqsˤuʶrˤuʶ bid͡ʒazaʕin walaaː taʶtˤuʶwlˤuʶ biʶsˤaʶbrˤiʶn waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔu aːnaː jd͡ʒb aːn aːnaːqʃ mʕ ʃχsˤ maː liʔaanna tamkijnahaaː wamaaː tahwaaː baʶtˤaʶrˤuʶn juʶtˤʁiʶj waʔaaʃarun jurdij ʔanhaː saːmj ʁsl aːlnnwaːfð ʔanaː minhaaː suhmaaun maʕa d͡ʒahlin warabbaka fakabbir aːlmslmwn jʔumnwn bʕjsaː w mħmmd kaːn saːmj jʕml fj ʃrka lsjjaːraːt aːlʔisʕaːf ʃrb saːmj kmmja mn aʶːlˤʔaʶqrˤaʶːsˤ waqad qaaːla aːlnnabiju sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi waaːlnnad͡ʒmi ʔiiðaː hawaː wasahwuhu biʶaʶːlˤqaʶsˤdiʶ ʔaʕʃq mmaːrsa aʶːlˤrˤjaʶːdˤaʶ lm ʔanti tbkjn kaːn saːmj jkrh saːmj fj mkaːn mmnwʕ aːlssbaːħa fjh hm ʔaħbwaː sˤwrˤk kθjraː wamaaːlihi min ʔaajna aːktasabahu wafijma ʔaanfaqahu tdhwrt sˤħħaʶ faʶːdˤlˤ waʔiilaaː maaːlihi biθalbihi ʔantmaː tħrd͡ʒaːnnj lm ʔaʶsttˤʕ ʔan ʔaʶħdˤrˤ aʶːlˤtˤtˤbjb kaːn saːmj jntðˤrˤ fj aːlmnzl ʔinna mimmaaː ʔaadraka aːlnnaaːsa min kalaaːmi aːlnnubuwaai aːlʔauwlaaː walaqad d͡ʒaaːʔakum muwsaaːaː biaːlbajjinaaːti θumma aːttaχaðtumu dwlaːr salawhu faʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶaʶ ʕilmihi wawasamuwhu biqabijħi tabaððulihi fahal taraː lahum min baːqijaain wahuwa aːllaðj fij aːlssamaːʔi ʔiilhun wafij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ʔiilhun wahuwa aːlħakjmu aːlʕaljmu ʔinh daːrwjn aːlðj ktb ʔaʶsˤlˤ aːlʔanwaːʕ ʔiinnaː naħnu nazzalnaː ʕalajka aːlqurʔaːna tanzjlanaː laː ʔaʕrf maːðaː sjħdθ fakajfa ʔiiðaː tawaffathumu aːlmalaːʔiikaau jaʶdˤrˤiʶbwnaʶ wud͡ʒwhahum waʔaadbaːrahum aːlssamaːʔu muʶnfaʶtˤiʶrˤuʶn bihi kaːna waʕduhu mafʕwlanaː waʔiin kaaːna aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶfħuʶ ʔaad͡ʒmala waʔiiðaaː sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶjt sˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːaʶaʶn faʶsˤaʶlˤlˤiʶ sˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːaʶaʶ muwaddiʕin faħaqqun ʕalaaː aːlʕaaːqili ʔaan jaħtariza min zalalihi biaːlʔiimsaaːki ʕanhu ʔaaw biaːlʔiiqlaaːli minhu ʔatħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja jwmjaːan nmt lsaːʕtjn fqtˤ kaːn twm hnaː ʔaʶjdˤaʶːaʶn qaaːla laaː walakinnij ʔaaradtu ʔaan ʔaʶaʶtaʶwaʶaʶːdˤaʶʕaʶ lillahi biaːld͡ʒuluwsi ʔilajkum trkt ljlaː mhnthaː kmmrˤrˤdˤaʶ bkm hðh aːldraːd͡ʒa aːld͡ʒblja jblʁ ʕdd skaːn aːlbld ħwaːlj χmsjn mljwn nsma waqaaːla ʕumaru bnu aʶːlˤχaʶtˤtˤaʶaʶːbiʶ rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu ʔaʶaʶlˤsˤiʶquʶwaʶː biðawij aːlʁijari tattasiʕ quluwbukum tlqqaː faʶːdˤlˤ ħkmjn baːlmʔubbd lm jtrk ʕml faʶːdˤlˤ aːlkθjr mn aːlwqt kj jqdˤjh mʕ flwrjdaː famin ʔaad͡ʒli ðalika muliʔiat d͡ʒahannamu min aːld͡ʒinnaai waaːlnnaaːsi ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna ðikraː wamaː kunnaː ðˤaʶːlˤiʶmjnaʶ stdˤlˤ tˤrˤjqk kaːn saːmj jʕjʃ ħjaːa mχtlfa jaaː muħammadu ʔinna rabbak jaʔamuruk ʔaan taʶsˤiʶlˤaʶ man qaʶtˤaʶʕaʶk ʔiʶsˤtˤħb ʔaχth liʔaanna aːlddawaaːʕija ʔilajhi ʁajru naaːfiʕaain ldjj d͡ʒaːra mslma wad͡ʒunwdu ʔiibljsa ʔaad͡ʒmaʕwna laaː jatimmu aːlmaʕruwfu ʔillaaː ʔaajjaːmin wamaː massanaː min luʁwbin ʔaaʕdaaː ʔaaʕdaaːʔiik nafsuk aːllatij bajna d͡ʒanbajk kaːn saːmj mnʃʁlaː ʔilaː ħdd ʔannh aʶːttsˤlˤ bsjjaːra ʔisʕaːf hija aːlrraaːsiχaaːtu fij aːlwaħli aʶːlˤmaʶtˤʕiʶmaʶaʶːtuʶ fij aːlmaħalli wakunnaː naʶχwdˤuʶ maʕa aʶːlˤχaʶːʔiʶiʶdˤjnaʶ kaːn aːlmdrrs jmʃj ħwl aːlqsm waʔiinnamaaː jakuwnu aːlrraʔaju maqbuwlanaː ʔiðaaː kaaːna ʕan raʁbaain waʶtˤaʶlˤaʶbiʶn faʔaaqbala baʶʕdˤuʶhuʶm ʕalaː baʶʕdˤiʶn jatasaːʔalwna qtˤtˤʕt maːrj qljlaː mn aʶːlˤbsˤlˤ walaw sˤaʶdaʶrˤaʶ ʕan rawijjaain wadaʕaaː ʔilajhi daaːʕin lasalimuwaː min ʃajnihi ħattaaː jaʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶ kaaːlbahijmaai aːllatij qad aʶːnsˤaʶrˤaʶfaʶ tˤaʶlˤaʶbuʶhaʶaʶː ʔilaaː maaː tadʕuw ʔilajhi ʃahwatuhaaː ħaːwl ʔan thdʔa fj aːlħqjqa lqd kðb ʔaʶʕtˤnj mftaːħ aːlqlʕa ʔanaː laː ʔaʶfaʶːwdˤ tmm tnðˤjf mnzl saːmj w bjʕh maːðaː tfʕl lm jrd saːmj qdˤaʶːʔ jwm ʔaːχr fj msˤrˤ maaː ʔaakθaru sˤaʶwaʶaʶːbiʶkuʶm qaaːla bal aːlʕilmu faʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ ʕalaaː aːlddawaaːʔi kamaaː ʔaanna ʔaarðalahum nafsanaː mutahajjiʔi raswlanaː ʃaːhidanaː ʕalajkum kamaː ʔaarsalnaː ʔiilaː firʕawna raswlanaː ʔaanzalnaaː ʕalajkum libaaːsanaː stqlʕ aːlsfjna mn hwnʁ kwnʁ ʁdaː fj aːlθaːlθa msaːʔaː kaːn saːmj ʁdˤbaʶːnaʶː fad͡ʒaʕalahum kaʶʕaʶsˤfiʶn maʔakwlin θumma huwa liʔaawzaaːrihaaː muħtaqibun aːltamisuwaː aːlrrizqa fij χabaaːjaaː aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ hl tðkr aːsmhaː klmaː tˤaʶːrˤ qsˤ d͡ʒnaːħh wahuwa biaːlððami d͡ʒadijrun kabura maqtanaː ʕinda aːlllahi ʔaan taqwlwaː maː laː tafʕalwna qul maaː badaaː lak min zuwrin wamin kaðibi ħilmij ʔaʶaʶsˤaʶmmuʶ waʔauðnij ʁajru sˤaʶmmaʶaʶːʔiʶ walaaː ħaaːllaaan fij markazihaaː sqtˤ saːmj ʕn aʶːlˤħsˤaʶːn ʔaʶaʶdˤħaʶt aːlmadijnaau muzdaħimaaan stmtˤrˤ aːljwm twm jʕrf ʔannj ʔawdh stnd͡ʒzh χlaːl ʔarbʕaːan w ʕʃrjn saːʕa ʔant mθl aːlklb aːlðj jrjd aʶːrˤdˤaʶːʔ sˤaʶːħbh aːlðj jsjʔ ʔiljh qaːla ʔaʶaʶwsaʶtˤuʶhuʶm ʔaalam ʔaaqul lakum lawlaː tusabbiħwna faqijla lahu fij ðalika faqaaːla ljst hj wasuʔiila aːlʃʃaʕbiju ʕan ʔaakli laħmi aʶːlˤʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːniʶ faqaaːla naħnu naʶrˤdˤaʶaʶː minhu biaːlkafaaːfi falaː taʕlamu nafsun maː ʔauχfija lahum min qurraai ʔaaʕjunin d͡ʒazaːʔan bimaː kaːnwaː jaʕmalwna jaʶsˤiʶjduʶ aːlθθaʕlabu dad͡ʒaːd͡ʒaaan jad͡ʒibu ʕalajka ʔaanna tuʶnðˤðˤiʶfaʶ ʔasnaaːnaka kulla jawmin jawma judaʕʕwna ʔiilaː naːri d͡ʒahannama daʕʕanaː faaːlħaaːlu aːlʔauwlaaː χajrun min aːlχajru muʶʕtˤiʶjhiʶ waʃarrun min aːlʃʃari faaːʕiluhu ʃʕr saːmj ʔannh aːħtjd͡ʒ waqaaːla aːlʃʃarafu fij aːlssarafi faqijla lahu laaː χajra fij aːlssarafi χðnj mʕk jaʕtamiduwna ʕalaaː ʔaːraaːʔiihim aːlmuχtalifaai wajanqaaːduwna liʔaahwaaːʔiihim aːlmutaʃaʕʕibaai limaaː tuʔuawwalu ʔilajhi ʔaumuwruhum min aːliaːχtilaaːfi waaːlttanaaːzuʕi frr saːmj mn aːlmnzl humaaː bimanzilaai aːld͡ʒuwdi waaːlbuχli fatamassak biʔaajjihimaaː ʃiʔita lmaːðaː tkrhjnj waqad rawaaː aːlʕalaaːʔu bnu ʕabdi aːlrraħmani waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man ʔaafʃaaː sirrahu kaθura ʕalajhi aːlmutaʔaammiruwna wahaðaaː taʶrˤaʶbbuʶsˤuʶn waʶaʶːχtiʶsˤaʶaʶːrˤuʶn waqad raʁiba ʕanhu ðawuw aːliaːqtidaaːri wazahida fijhi ðawuw aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶχtˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶ ʔaaʃtaʁilu fij aːlħadjqaai wabadaː lahum sajjiʔiaaːtu maː ʕamilwaː waħaːqa bihim maː kaːnwaː bihi jastahziʔiwna aːlmustaʃijru waaːlmustaʃaaːru muʔutamanun wamuqaaːrabatuhu ʕamaaː aːðaːlm tstħj fʔafʕl maː tʃaːʔ kaːn saːmj jlʕb lʕba χtˤjrˤaʶ llʁaːja faqaaːla lahu ʔaabuw juwsufa aːlʕad͡ʒabu liman jard͡ʒuw man fawqahu kajfa jaħrimu man duwnahu sʔatwd͡ʒd͡ʒh ʔilaː aːlssjrk waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi ʃaaːfiʕu aːlmuðnibi χuʶdˤuʶwʕuʶhuʶ ʔilaaː ʕuðrihi waqad qaaːla aːlʕabbaaːsu bnu ʕabdi aʶːlˤmuʶtˤtˤaʶlˤiʶbiʶ ʁnaː aːlmrʔ fj aːlʁrba wtˤn wfqrh fj aʶːlˤwtˤn ʁrba jqwlwn ʔannhm jnswn kθjraː mn aːlmʔusf wahuwa ʔaanasu bnu ʔausajdin χtˤrˤ lj fkra d͡ʒjda drws saːmj sˤʕbaʶ llʁaːja sjðhb frjd lʔawrwbaː jwm aːlʔiθnjn waʔaːχarjna muqarranjna fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶsˤfaʶːdiʶ ħattaaː mfaːtjħh w haːtfh aːlnnqaːl aːld͡ʒwaːb aːlrqjq jskt aʶːlˤʁdˤb χtˤrˤ bbaːlh fkra d͡ʒjda waʔaammaaː ʃuʶrˤuʶwtˤuʶ aːlmuruwʔaai fij ʁajrihi faθalaaːθaaun aːlmuʔuaaːzaraau waaːlmujaaːsaraau waʶaʶːlˤʔiʶiʶfdˤaʶaʶːlˤuʶ ðikru raħmati rabiika ʕabdahu zakarijjaaː walaaː jad͡ʒidu limafquwdihi badalanaː waman aːltamasa aːlʕilma biraaːħaai aːld͡ʒasadi aːltamasa maaː laaː jakuwnu χjr mrʔaːa traː fjhaː nfsk hj ʕmlk aːstħqq saːmj hðh aʶːlˤwðˤjfaʶ aːlddaaːru waaːsiʕaaun faqaaːlat jaaː rasuwla aːlllahi ʔinnamaaː qult maaː fijhaaː kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː ʕaːlqjn jntðˤrˤaʶːn walaaː jaʁurranak θanaaːʔun man d͡ʒahila ʔaamrak waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami man ʔaʶaʶðˤhaʶrˤaʶ ʕajba nafsihi faqad zakkaaːhaaː waʔiilaː rabbika faaːrʁab waʔaanʃada baʶʕdˤuʶ ʔaahli aːlʕilmi ʔaan jatad͡ʒaaːfaaː ʔaʶaʶdˤħaʶaʶː aːlʁamaaːmu kaθijfanaː ʔant tʃbh waːldk mn maːlk hðaː aːlbjt waqad qijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami man daaːma kasaluhu χaaːba ʔaamaluhu waaːlqadra bihi χaaːmilun ljs hnaː waaːlrraaːbiʕu aʶːqtaʶsˤiʶd fij mizaaːħik faʔiinna aʶːlˤʔiʶiʶfrˤaʶaʶːtˤaʶ fijhi juðhibu aːlbahaaːʔa θumma huwa ʔaazjadu fij rutbatihi waʔaablaʁu fij taqaddumihi ðhb saːmj ʔilaː msˤrˤ haː qd ʔataː aʶːlˤbaʶːsˤ lilħazmi ʔaan jastadfiʕa dˤaʶrˤaʶrˤaʶhuʶ aːstdr mn fdˤlˤk ʔaʶðˤlˤm mn aːlljl falam nabluʁ minhaaː aːlmaħduwda lm jkn ldaː saːmj ʔaħd kj jsaːʕdh walaqad waʶsˤsˤaʶlˤnaʶː lahumu aːlqawla laʕallahum jataðakkarwna fatatawad͡ʒd͡ʒahu ʔilajhi laaːʔiimaau aːlmutawahhimijna taθqijlun waman θaqqala ʕalaaː aːlnnaaːsi haaːna walaaː qadra ʕindahum limuhaaːnin saːmj mslm saːbq liʔaannahu ʔin tˤaʶlˤaʶbaʶ bihi aːlʃʃukra waaːlθθanaaːʔa ħaːwlt ʔamm saːmj ʔan tqtlh maʶqtˤuʶwʕaʶ aːlħud͡ʒd͡ʒaai wahaðaaː aːlnnawʕu ʔaaswaʔau ħaaːlanaː mimmaaː qablu wawakalahum ʔilaaː naʶðˤaʶrˤiʶhiʶm fij tˤaʶlˤaʶbiʶ makaaːsibihim aʶːntˤaʶlˤiʶqwaʶː ʔiilaː ðˤiʶlˤlˤiʶn ðj θalaːθi ʃuʕabin ʔinhaː qaːdma hðaː aːlflm bbsaʶːtˤaʶ raːʔiʕ laː tlʕb hnaː lm ʔaqdr ʔan ʔafkkr ʔilaː ʔajn ʔajmknk ʔan tqtrħ fkra ʔaʶfdˤlˤ ħðrth mn χalaaːʔiiquhu lm jχbr saːmj aʶːlˤʃʃrˤtˤaʶ waqijla fijhi laaː tadaʕu aːlʔaajjaaːmu d͡ʒaaːhilanaː ʔillaaː ʔaaddabathu ʔabħθ ʕn qfaːzaːtj saːmj fj mrkz aʶːlˤʃʃrˤtˤaʶ saːmj hw mn tsbbb bkll aːlmʃaːkl fj tlqaːʔijj baːlssd͡ʒn aːlmʔubbd ʔin ʔaudjn tbwwl saːmj jaʔatwka bikulli saħħaːrin ʕaljmin faaːlwad͡ʒhu aːlʔaawwalu waaːʕlam ʔaannahu biħasabi maaː junʃaru min faʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤiʶ aːlʕaaːqili waðakara aːlmawta waaːlbilaaː hl jlʕb kjn aːltns fasawfa juħaːsabu ħisaːbanaː jasjranaː wzzʕ ʕljnaː wrq aːllʕb kjf kaːn jwmk waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlʕafwu jufsidu min aːlllaʔiijmi biqadri ʔiʶsˤlˤaʶaʶːħiʶhiʶ min aːlkarijmi lm ʔaʶsttˤʕ ʔinhaːʔihaː lm jkn ðaːk mdrrsj jʕjʃ mnħnjaːan tˤjlˤaʶ aːlħjaːa wanujassiruka liljusraː waʔiiʃaaːraain justadallu ʕalajhaaː bikarmihi lqd dˤaʶːd͡ʒʕt mdrrstj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤaʶːdˤj aʶːlˤflˤstˤjnjaʶ aːlmħtla baːlmnaːsba hl zrt hwkaːjdw mn qbl waqad qijla man taaːha fij wilaaːjatihi ðalla fij ʕazlihi aːlʔaummu tuʶtˤʕiʶmuʶ ʔaawlaːadahaaː waʔaːdaaːbi aːlbulaʁaaːʔi wafijhi jaquwlu aːlʃʃaaːʕiru wasuʔiila ʕalijju bnu ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶn rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu ʕan aːlddunjaaː faqaaːla ʔaχwk mn sˤdqk aʶːlˤnsˤjħaʶ laː tns tqdjm aːlʔakl llklb ʔaataʔamuruwna aːlnnaaːsa biaːlbirri watansawna ʔaanfusakum waʔaantum tatluwna aːlkitaaːba ʔaafalaaː taʕqiluwna wanaʕmaain kaːnwaː fjhaː faːkihjna hl hðaː hw aːlħb waʔiin kaaːna ðarijʕaaan ʔilaaː kulli maðammaain fajaksibu biaːliaːnqijaaːdi lˤiʶlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ min aːlrraðaaːʔiili ʔaakθara mimmaaː jaslubuhu ʕadamu aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ min aʶːlˤfaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤiʶ wajuχbiru bimaknuwnaaːti aːlssaraaːʔiiri qaːblth fj ʕda mnaːsbaːt twqqf saːmj ʕn tnaːwl dwaːʔih kaːn twm baːlʁ aːlθraːʔ walaː juʔuðanu lahum fajaʕtaðirwna wafij miθlihi qaaːla ðuw aːlnnuwni raħmaau aːlllahi ʕalajhi saːmj jħbb aʶːlˤtˤtˤbχ waʔiiðaaː aːlssamaːʔu furid͡ʒat laː ʔaʕtqd ʔannnj sʔansaːk kll mn aːljhwd w aːlmsjħjjjn w aːlmslmjn jttfqwn ʔann aːlqds mdjna mqddsa ʕaːmlthaː kʔanhaː bntj ʔiinna aːlllaha laaː jastaħjij ʔaan jaʶdˤrˤiʶbaʶ maθalanaː maaː baʶʕuʶwdˤaʶaʶaʶn famaaː fawqahaaː aʶːlˤbjaʶːdˤ nsˤf aːlħsn bjt aʶːlˤðˤaʶːlˤm χraːb tudammiru kulla ʃajʔin biʔaamri rabbihaː faʶʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħwaʶː laː juraː ʔiillaː masaːkinuhum kaðlika nad͡ʒzij aːlqawma aːlmud͡ʒrimjna fqtˤ aːns aːlʔamr fjhinna qaʶːsˤiʶrˤaʶːtuʶ aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶrˤfiʶ lam jaʶtˤmiʶθhuʶnnaʶ ʔiinsun qablahum walaː d͡ʒaːnnun faqaaːla lahu dˤiʶrˤaʶaʶːrˤuʶn waaːalllahi law qult ʕaʃranaː lam tasmaʕ waaːħidaaan waʶjaʶsˤrˤiʶfaʶhuʶ ʕan buʁjatihi ʔinnamaaː kuntu ʔaumaaːziħuk waminhaaː aːlʁinaaː faqad tataʁajjaru bihi ʔaaχlaaːqu aːlllaʔiijmi baʶtˤaʶrˤaʶnaʶː bitawbatihi maːðaː laː ʔasmʕk tˤlˤbt aːlnd͡ʒda km θmnhaː waʔaawfaaː ʕahdahu faʔiinna raʔaja ʁajri ðij aːlħaaːd͡ʒaai ʔaaslamu sʔaqjs ħraːrtk aːlʔaːn ʃabaaːbihi fijmaaː ʔaablaaːhu d͡ʒff aːlqlm aːlʔaaklu fwtˤaʶ ʔaχraː kaːn saːmj jmdˤj aːlwqt mʕ aːmrʔaa tʔaχχrt aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶːʔiʶrˤaʶ aːnzl mn aːlssjaːra mn fdˤlˤk walaqad ʔaarsalnaː ʔiilaː θamwda ʔaaχaːhum sˤaʶːlˤiʶħaʶnaʶː ʔaani aːʕbuduwaː aːlllaha juhaaːbu maː laː juhaːbu aːlsjf dˤrˤb saːmj ljlaː w kssr lhaː dˤrˤsaʶː waaːllaðjna aːttaχaðwaː min dwnihi ʔaawlijaːʔa aːlllahu ħaʶfjðˤuʶn ʕalajhim wamaː ʔaanta ʕalajhim biwakjlin dʕaː ftaː ʔaːχr ljlaː wafuħʃu aːlqawli waqad rawaaː makħuwlun qaaːla maaː jastawd͡ʒibu bihi qubħa aːlrradi wasuwʔa aːlmanʕi fkkr fjma stʃʕr ʔin ħdθ ðlk lk aːχlʕ ħðaːʔk faaːʕtarafwaː biðanbihim fasuħqanaː lˤiʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbiʶ muʕaaːdijhi biʕadlihi aːħtrqt aːlmnaːzl waːħda tlw aːlʔaχraː watawakkal ʕalaaː aːlħajji aːllaðj laː jamwtu wasabbiħ biħamdihi wakafaː bihi biðunwbi ʕibaːdihi χabjranaː klma aːlsr hj mwrjl qfzt ljlaː ʕbr aːlnnaːfða kj tnd͡ʒw bħjaːthaː waʶjuʶbʁiʶdˤuʶ aːlfaaːħiʃa aːlbaðijʔu bʕd tˤlˤaʶːqh mn ljlaː aʶːsˤbħt ħjaːa saːmj fwdˤaʶː walaʔiin saʔaaltahum man χalaqa aːlssamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ wasaχχara aːlʃʃamsa waaːlqamara lajaqwlunna aːlllahu faʔaannaː juʔufakwna waʔiin ʔauhmila kaθijruhu aʶːdˤmaʶħaʶlˤlˤaʶ ʔanaː χd͡ʒwl qljlaːan warawaaː sˤaʶfwaʶaʶːnuʶ bnu sulajmin qaaːla kaːn saːmj d͡ʒaːlsaː ʕlaː aːlssrjr ʔiinna aːllaðjna ʔaːmanwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶːlˤiʶħaʶːtiʶ lahum d͡ʒannaːtu aːlnnaʕjmi saːmj jfkkr hkðaː daːʔimaː qaaːla ʔiinnahu jaquwlu ʔiinnahaaː baqaraaun sˤaʶfrˤaʶaʶːʔuʶ faaːqiʕun lawnuhaaː tasurru aʶːlˤnnaʶaʶːðˤiʶrˤiʶjnaʶ wabanajnaː fawqakum sabʕanaː ʃidaːdanaː srwaːlk mtsχ laqad ʔaʶaʶdˤaʶlˤlˤaʶnj ʕani aːlððikri baʕda ʔiið d͡ʒaːʔanj wakaːna aʶːlˤʃʃaʶjtˤaʶːnuʶ lilʔiinsaːni χaðwlanaː qaːlwaː rabbanaː ʔaamattanaaː aːθnatajni waʔaaħjajtanaaː aːθnatajni faaːʕtarafnaː biðunwbinaː fahal ʔiilaː χurwd͡ʒin min sabjlin waʔaanʃadanij aːbnu lankaka liʔaabijhi faqul hal laka ʔiilaː ʔaan tazakkaː ʁajra ʔaannahu jalijnu ʕinda aːlrradi lijnanaː jaqijhi aːlððama ʔaammaaː aːllaðjna ʔaːmanwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶːlˤiʶħaʶːtiʶ falahum d͡ʒannaːtu aːlmaʔawaː nuzulanaː bimaː kaːnwaː jaʕmalwna laː ʔaqdr ʔan ʔasaːmħh ʕlaː maː fʕl kaːn saːmj jħbb ħjaːa aːlrrfaːhja ʔauʕd͡ʒb saːmj bðlk km tbʕd aːlħdjqa ʕn mnzlk aːllaðjna juqjmwna aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶlˤaʶːaʶaʶ wajuʔutwna aːlzzakaːaa wahum biaːlʔaːχiraai hum jwqinwna θumma jattahimu nafsahu fij sˤaʶwaʶaʶːbiʶ maaː ʔaaħabbat wataħsijni maaː aːʃtahat salaːmun ʕalaː nwħin fij aːlʕaːlamjna lm jʕlm saːmj mn kaːn jtˤaʶːrˤdh maː jud͡ʒaːdilu fj ʔaːjaːti aːlllahi ʔiillaaː aːllaðjna kafarwaː falaː jaʁrurka taqallubuhum fij aːlbilaːdi watuħibbwna aːlmaːla ħubbanaː d͡ʒammanaː taθabbata walam jalum biaːlttawahumi fajakuwna maluwmanaː kaːn mdrrs aːlfnwn jkrhnj faʔiin tabarraʕa biʶfaʶdˤlˤiʶ aːlkarami waʶfaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶdˤiʶ aːlmuruwʔaai faʶnaʶhaʶdˤaʶ fij ħawaaːdiθihim jawmaʔiiðin jaʶsˤduʶrˤuʶ aːlnnaːsu ʔaaʃtaːtanaː lijurawaː ʔaaʕmaːlahum ljlaː mdrrsa fj aʶːlˤrˤrˤwdˤaʶ ʔaʶjdˤaʶː kaːn ʔihmaːlaː mnhaː ʔan tnsaː mn ksr hðaː naʶðˤðˤiʶf θijaːbaka aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ w aːlmrjχ w aːlmʃtrj kwaːkb twm wħjd tmaːmaː mn d͡ʒdjd kaːn aːlmdrrswn jkrhwnhaː wamin kulli ʃajʔin χalaqnaː zawd͡ʒajni laʕallakum taðakkarwna falam jabqa liwad͡ʒhihi maaːʔun ʔillaaː ʔaaraaːqahu laː ʔaħd fssr maː kaːn jqwm bh faʶːdˤlˤ hnaːk kaððabwaː biʔaːjaːtinaː kullihaː faʔaaχaðnaːhum ʔaaχða ʕazjzin muqtadirin aːlm ðaaːlika aːlkitaaːbu laaː rajba fijhi hudanaː llilmutaqijn ħdˤrˤ twm llmdrsa baːlsjaːra naħnu ʔaaʕlamu bimaː jaqwlwna wamaː ʔaanta ʕalajhim bid͡ʒabbaːrin faðakkir biaːlqurʔaːni man jaχaːfu waʕjdi jaaː ʔaabaaː bakrin man haðaaː fajaquwlu aːlħalaaːlu laaː jaħtamilu aːlssarafa kallaː lajunbaðanna fij aʶːlˤħuʶtˤaʶmaʶaʶiʶ laː jaʔatjhi aʶːlˤbaʶːtˤiʶlˤuʶ min bajni jadajhi walaː min χalfihi tanzjlun min ħakjmin ħamjdin ʁaːdr saːmj rfqa ʃχsˤ jʕml fj aːlʕjaːda sˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ ʕiʶrˤdˤuʶhuʶ hadafanaː lilmaθaaːlibi aːlʕtaːb sˤaʶːbwn aːlqlb faliʔaanna aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶmaʶʕaʶ ðullun waaːlddanaaːʔaaa luʔumun walammaː dˤuʶrˤiʶbaʶ aːbnu marjama maθalanaː ʔiiðaː qawmuka minhu jaʶsˤiʶddwnaʶ waaːlssalaaːmaau min aʶːlˤssaʶtˤaʶwaʶaʶːtiʶ walaʔiin ʔaarsalnaː rjħanaː faraʔaawhu muʶsˤfaʶrˤrˤaʶnaʶː lˤaʶðˤaʶlˤlˤwaʶː min baʕdihi jakfurwna qul ʔiinnamaː ʔaadʕw rabbj walaː ʔauʃriku bihi ʔaaħadanaː faʔiinna man ħaqqara jasijrahu famanaʕa minhu ʔaaʕd͡ʒazahu kaθijruhu faaːmtanaʕa ʕanhu knt ʔastħm ʕndmaː rn aːlhaːtf faʔiiðaaː sˤaʶrˤaʶfaʶ ħusna aʶːlˤðˤðˤaʶniʶ ʕanhaaː watawassamahaaː bimaaː hija ʕalajhi min aːlttaswijfi waaːlmakri faaːza biʶtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶtiʶhaʶaʶː ʔajkfj hðaː aːlmaːl laː tftħ hðh aːlrrsaːla ħttaː tʁaːdr aːlbld walan tad͡ʒida aːlʔaaχlaaːqa ʕalaaː maaː waʶsˤaʶfnaʶaʶː min ħaddi aːlmuruwʔaai muʶntˤaʶbiʶʕaʶaʶaʶn saːmj laː jħml slaːħh aːlnnaːrj mʕh kaːn saːmj jħbb aʶːlˤʔaʶbtˤaʶːlˤ χaːrqjn bnaː saːmj mnzlaː qtl saːmj ljlaː θmm qtl nfsh waʔaadabu rˤiʶjaʶaʶːdˤaʶaʶiʶn waʶaʶːstiʶsˤlˤaʶaʶːħiʶn sjʕtnj saːmj bkll ʃjʔ ħjn ʁjaːb ljlaː ʕljnaː tʔad͡ʒjl aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ warubbamaaː daʕaaː aːlmuʁtaaːba ðalika ʔilaaː ʔiʶðˤhaʶaʶːrˤiʶ maaː kaaːna jasturuhu aʶːntðˤrˤ saːmj fj aːlssjaːra liʔaanna aːlddawaaːʕija ʔilajhi naaːfiʕaaun kaːnt aʶːlˤdˤdˤd͡ʒaʶ sˤaʶːχbaʶ d͡ʒddaː waaːlθθaaːnij laaː taʔakuluwaː ħaraaːmanaː faʔiinnahu ʔisraaːfun wahaðaaː qawlu aːbni zajdin ʔinn aːlddktwr saːmj baːkr jʕml ʕlaː kjfjja aʶːlˤqdˤaʶːʔ ʕlaː aːlwbaːʔ tnaːwl saːmj ʔaʶqrˤaʶːsˤ aːlnnwm haːti jdki waʔiinnamaaː jaðkuru kullu ʔinsaaːnin maaː balaʁahu aːlwusʕu min ʔaːdaaːbi zamaaːnihi kaːn faʶːdˤlˤ juʕaːld͡ʒ bʔadwja mdˤaʶːddaʶ llððhaːn ʔinhaː mʔia dwlaːr ʔaalaː jaʶðˤuʶnnuʶ ʔauwlʔiika ʔaannahum mabʕwθwna liʔaannahum aʶːlˤtˤtˤuʶrˤuʶquʶ ʔilajhi lm tdrk χtˤʔaʶhaʶː faʶwaʶsaʶtˤnaʶ bihi d͡ʒamʕanaː kullu ʃajʔin jaħtaaːd͡ʒu ʔilaaː aːlʕaqli waaːlʕaqlu jaħtaaːd͡ʒu ʔilaaː aːlttad͡ʒaaːribi laː ʔadrj ʔin kaːn jħbbnj d͡ʒundun maː hunaːlika mahzwmun mina aːlʔaaħzaːbi lm jkn jd͡ʒdr bk ʔan td͡ʒʕlnj ʔatwsl aːðhab bikitaːbj hðaː faʔaalqih ʔiilajhim θumma tawalla ʕanhum faʶaʶːnðˤuʶrˤ maːðaː jard͡ʒiʕwna waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi χajru aːlnnaaːsi man ʔaaχrad͡ʒa aːlʃʃahwaaa min qalbihi waʶʕaʶsˤaʶaʶː faaːlħamdu lillahi aːllaðij niʕamuhu laaː tuʶħsˤaʶaʶː waʃukruhu laaː juʔuaddaaː aːljaʔasu waaːlqanaaːʕaau ʔiið qaːla liqawmihi ʔaalaː tattaqwna ʔaan jakuwna aːlssaaːʔiilu mustawd͡ʒibanaː waaːlmasʔiuwlu mutamakkinanaː falaaː ʕuðra lahu fij aʶːlˤttaʶʕaʶrˤuʶdˤiʶ lilmaaːli bal tuʔuθirwna aːlħajaːaa aːlddunjaː ruwija ʕan rasuwli aːlllahi sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama ʔaannahu qaaːla ʔaraːd saːmj ʔan jkwn sˤdjqaʶː lnaː fj ħqjqa tns aːlktaːba baːlʔaħrf aːlkbjra fanad͡ʒd͡ʒajnaːhu waʔaahlahu ʔaad͡ʒmaʕjna χalaqa aːlʔiinsaːna min sˤaʶlˤsˤaʶːlˤiʶn kaaːlfaχχaːri stdˤjʕ walaaː juʔuaθθiru taʔaθijrahaaː lm jtnaːwl saːmj ʔajja ʔaʶaʶʕrˤaʶdˤwaʶː faqul ʔaanðartukum sˤaʶːʕiʶqaʶaʶaʶn miθla sˤaʶːʕiʶqaʶaʶiʶ ʕaːdin waθamwda walaaː ʕilmin lajsa fijhi tafahhumun faʔaaθarna bihi naqʕanaː aːqtrbt ljlaː mn saːmj w qbblth ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː niʕmaau aːlllahi ʕalaaː ʔaaħadin ʔillaaː wad͡ʒada lahaaː ħaaːsidanaː faʔaalhamahaaː fud͡ʒuwrahaaː wataqwaaːhaaː qaaːla aːbnu ʕabbaaːsin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu waʔiin kaaːna aːljasijru maʁfuwranaː bjt aːlʕnkbwt qul ʕasaː ʔaan jakwna radifa lakum baʶʕdˤuʶ aːllaðj tastaʕd͡ʒilwna liʔaannahu juntid͡ʒu aːlnnamijmaaa ʕljk ʔan tbqaː sˤaʶːmtaʶː fj aːlqsm qaaːla qaaːla rasuwlu aːlllahi sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama wasaʔaala baʶʕdˤuʶ χulafaaːʔi banij aːlʕabbaaːsi d͡ʒalijsanaː lahu ʕan aːlddunjaaː faqaaːla waaːd͡ʒʕal nuʶsˤħaʶ nafsik ʁanijmaaa ʕaqlik waqaaːla ʔaaħmadu bnu juwsufa kaːn bʔimkaːn saːmj ʔan jqjm sˤdaʶːqaʶ ħttaː mʕ sˤχrˤaʶ sjntðˤrˤ saːmj ʃamma ʕalijun wardaaan χajru aːlmaaːli ʕajnun saaːhiraaun liʕajnin naaːʔiimaain aʶːtˤlˤb tðˤfrˤ kaːnt ljlaː qwjja bmaː jkfj kj tʕbr saːmj ʔann aʶːlˤʃʃjtˤaʶːn hw mn ʔamrh baʶːlˤttdˤħjaʶ bljlaː kaːn saːmj jrjd ʔan twljh aːlftjaːt aːntbaːhhnn ʔaabʕiduwaː ʕannij χafqa niʕaaːlikum faʔiinnahaaː mufsidaaun liquluwbi nawkaaː mubtadiʔianaː bihi fij ʔaawwali ħaaːlin lqd wd͡ʒdthaː ʔaχjraː saːmj mn fwd͡ʒʔi bwd͡ʒwdk hnaː falammaaː faraʁa qaaːla biʶtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶtiʶhiʶ lqd ʃfjt nuqilt ljlaː d͡ʒwwaː ʔilaː mstʃfaː mħllj lijaðilla lahu qijaaːduhaaː aːuχrud͡ʒ maʕij zid min tˤuʶwlˤiʶ ʔaamalik fij qaʶsˤiʶjrˤiʶ ʕamalik hj ttħdθ aːlqljl mn aːlʕrbja min hud͡ʒnaai musaaːwijhi qul juħjjhaaː aːllaðj ʔaanʃaʔaahaː ʔaawwala marraain wahuwa bikulli χalqin ʕaljmun fajawmaʔiiðin laː juʕaððibu ʕaðaːbahu ʔaaħadun bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi qul jaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːlkaːfirwna hwaːʔ sjdnj ʔaʶnðˤf mn hwaːʔ tˤwkjw faʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ liħukmi rabbika walaː tuʶtˤiʶʕ minhum ʔaːθimanaː ʔaaw kafwranaː ʕnd aʶːlˤbtˤwn tʕmaː aːlʕjwn wajabqaaː ʕalajk maaː tartakibuhu min aːlmaħaaːrimi ʔaan jastashila aːlmaʕuwnaaa masruwranaː kaððaba ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːlʔaajkaai aːlmursaljna kaːn jʕml ljlaː nhaːraː kj jsˤbħ θrjaː walibaaːsu aːlttaqwaaː aːltqjt aːlbaːrħa btwm wawuffijat kullu nafsin maː ʕamilat wahuwa ʔaaʕlamu bimaː jafʕalwna kaːn saːmj aːlʔibn aːlwħjd lljlaː baːkr w zwd͡ʒhaː aːlʔasbq frjd sˤaʶːdq hðaː hw mdrrsj aʶːlˤmfdˤdˤlˤ qaaːla d͡ʒamijʕu ʔaahli aːlttaʔawijli lˤntðˤaʶːhrˤ bʔannaː mχlwqaːt fdˤaʶːʔiʶjaʶ waʔaːtajnaaː ʕijsaaː aːbna marjama aːlbajjinaaːti waʔaajjadnaaːhu biruwħi aːlqudusi qddm saːmj aːlzzkaːa lˤfaʶːdˤlˤ wajanfuðu fijhi taʶsˤaʶrˤrˤuʶfuʶhuʶ ħattaaː qaaːla harimu bnu quʶtˤbaʶaʶaʶ ħijna tanaaːfara ʔilajhi ʕaaːmiru bnu aʶːlˤtˤtˤuʶfaʶjlˤiʶ waʕalqamaau bnu ʕulaaːθaaa lnbdʔa baːlʔahm waaːlllahu ʔaanbatakum mina aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ nabaːtanaː ʔaafalaː jaʶnðˤuʶrˤwnaʶ ʔiilaaː aːlʔiibili kajfa χuliqat knnaː ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ maːðaː tsˤddqh waaːlssababu aːlssaaːbiʕu wsˤft ʔamm faʶːdˤlˤ aːbnhaː ʔannh ftaː d͡ʒjjd wad͡ʒaʕala maaː taʕabbadahum bihi maʔaχuwðanaː min ʕaqlin matbuwʕin aʶːʃtrˤtˤ faʶːdˤlˤ ʔan tqddm lh daːnja aːlmaːl hw bħaːd͡ʒa lðlk aːlmaːl knt ʔadχr saːmħ aːld͡ʒmjʕ lkn laː tns ʃjʔiaː wd͡ʒdnaː aːlbaːb aːlrʔijsj mqfl saːmj ʁjr sʕjd bwðˤjfth χajru aːlʔaumuwri aʶːlˤnnaʶmaʶtˤuʶ aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶwsaʶtˤuʶ ʔinh fwqk tmaːmaː ʕaːd ʔilaː aːlssd͡ʒn faʔiinna aːlzzamaaːna ʁaaːdirun waʶaʶːlˤfuʶrˤaʶsˤuʶ muntahazaaun waaːlθθiqaau ʕad͡ʒzun ħfðˤ saːmj rsaːla ljlaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤwtjaʶ waluzuwmu aːlʕurfi aːlmaʕhuwdi waaːʕtibaaːru aːlħaddi aʶːlˤmaʶqsˤuʶwdiʶ ʔaadallu ʕalaaː aːlʕaqli wajatad͡ʒarraʕu bimahaaːnaai aːlʕad͡ʒzi maraaːraaa ʁuʶsˤaʶsˤiʶhiʶ ʔinh jtklm ʔakθr mmaː jd͡ʒb wawaqqiruwaː man tuʕallimuwnahu mdd jdh lʔaχð aːltfaːħa ðhb ʔilaː aːldkaːn jʕml ʔabj fj aʶːlˤmsˤnʕ lm jʕd͡ʒb aːlħfl saːmj lw ʔannnj knt ʔaʕrf waminhu taʔaawwala aːlħasanu waqataaːdaau qawlh taʕaaːlaaː ʔaamarnaaː mutrafijhaaː ʔad͡ʒd ʔan fkrth ʁbjja kaːn hnaːk ʔaannak tukθiru aːlrrada ʔarslh baːlbrjd ʔaaw kaaːna libaaːʕiθin wasababin kaaːda aːlfaqru ʔaan jakuwna kufranaː rʔajth jmzzq aːlrsaːla laː tzaːl ljlaː tʕml mn ʔad͡ʒl aːstrd͡ʒaːʕ sˤħħthaʶː wud͡ʒwhun aʶːlˤðˤðˤhjrˤaʶ lm tbkjn fahuwa jaʶtaʶrˤaʶbbaʶsˤuʶ bidawaaːʔiiri aːlssawʔi aːntihaaːza fuʶrˤaʶsˤiʶhiʶ kam ʕaʶtˤaʶaʶːʔuʶuʶk qaaːla waʕinabanaː waʶqaʶdˤbaʶnaʶː lqd dχlt aːlnaːdj waaːlnnawaaːʔiiba waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi man sˤaʶbaʶrˤaʶ naaːla aːlmunaaː waman ʃakara ħaʶsˤsˤaʶnaʶ aːlnnuʕmaaː ʔaaħaduhaaː ʔaannahu aːlmaaːlu wahuwa qawlu mud͡ʒaaːhidin qaaːla liʔaannij raʔaajtuk tuħibbu ʔaan tuʶʕtˤiʶjaʶ walaaː tuħibbu ʔaan taʔaχuða qdˤaʶːʔ wqt mʕ ʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤk ln jdˤrˤ kðlk ʁmr aːlmaːʔ jrwj wjʁrq dʕaː saːmj klaː ljlaː w frjd lmnzlh hðh sˤwrˤaʶ laːbntj ljlaː km hj d͡ʒmjla km kaːnt d͡ʒmjla ʔaːh ʔaːsfa waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi maaː ʔaasarrak maaː katamt sirrak waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi aːlqanaaːʕaau ʕizzu aːlmuʕsiri waʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶdaʶqaʶaʶuʶ ħirzu aːlmuwsiri aʶːttsˤlˤ saːmj bljlaː tkraːraː w mraːraː lknn aʶːttsˤaʶːlˤaʶːth kaːnt tħwwl ʔilaː aːlbrjd aʶːlˤsˤsˤwtj hm jrfʕwn aːlrraːja rabbu aːlssamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wamaː bajnahumaaː aːlʕazjzu aːlʁaffaːru faʶːdˤlˤ mn ljlaː ʔan tsˤwwb aːlmsdds nħw raːmj ʔatħs bwd͡ʒʕ fj btˤnk faʔiiðaaː naaːzaʕathu aːlʃʃahwaau tˤaʶlˤaʶbaʶ min aːlmaaːli maaː juʶwaʶsˤsˤiʶlˤuʶhuʶ wajaʕlama ʔaanna makaaːnatahu fij nafsihi baːlnfs ʔaʶqsˤaʶː ʁaːja aːld͡ʒwd aːld͡ʒwd mn aːlmwd͡ʒwd aːld͡ʒwʕ kaːfr aːlttaʁrijra biaːlnnufuwsi waaːlʔaamwaaːli law saʔaalta d͡ʒaaːrak ʔaʶaʶʕtˤaʶaʶːk faqaaːla ʕθra aːlqdm ʔaslm mn ʕθra aːllsaːn lm walaaː jad͡ʒʕala balaaːdatahu ðarijʕaaan liħirmaaːnihi faʔiinna aːlʃʃahwaaa baaːʕiθaaun waʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶbrˤaʶ muʔuaθθirun kjf d͡ʒʔit ʔilaː hnaː ðhbaː saːmj w ljlaː ʔilaː aːlmsd͡ʒd waʔiinnamaaː buʕiθtu muʕallimanaː wad͡ʒalasa ʔilaaː ʔaahli aːlfiqhi waaːlssaaːdisu huwa satru aːlʕawraai wahaðaaː qawlu ʕabdi aːlrraħmani bni zajdin waaːlʃʃawaaːhida bihaaː waʶaʶːdˤiʶħaʶaʶuʶn wanufiχa fij aʶːlˤsˤsˤwrˤiʶ biaːlkutubi lam tafuthu salwaaun ʔimmaaː ʔaan jakuwna qad ʔaʶaʶsˤaʶaʶːbaʶ fijhaaː aʶːlˤʁaʶrˤaʶdˤaʶ aʶːlˤmaʶqsˤuʶwdaʶ bihaaː ʔaatuħibbu ʔaan tuhdaaː ʔilajk ʕujuwbuk qaaːla walaaː juʔuammilu ʔaan tabqaaː aːlddunjaaː ʕalaaː ħaaːlaain lm trjdjn aːlmʁaːdra aːljwm walam ʔaadri maː ħisaːbijah lm jkn saːmj jntðˤrˤ rsaːla mn ʔaħd liʔaannahu nahjun ʕan munkarin laː tkwnj ʔanaːnjja waqaaːla aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː waðakara χaaːlidu bnu sˤaʶfwaʶaʶːnaʶ aːlmizaaːħa faqaaːla ʕn aːlmrʔ laː tsʔal wsl ʕn qrjnh aːstʕaːr saːmj ʔaqlaːm ljlaː sʔaʶʕtˤjk hðaː aːlktaːb ʔanaː sʕjd lʔannh laː jwd͡ʒd ʔaħd hnaː saːmj ʕalimati aːld͡ʒinnaau ʔiinnahum lˤaʶmuʶħdˤaʶrˤwnaʶ ʔaafaman jattaqj biwad͡ʒhihi swʔa aːlʕaðaːbi jawma aːlqijaːmaai waqjla lˤiʶlˤðˤðˤaʶːlˤiʶmjnaʶ ðwqwaː maː kuntum taksibwna ʕabdanaː ʔiiðaː sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶː walatakwnanna mina aːlχaːsirjna waaːlθθaaːliθaau maaː aːrtakabahu min aːlʁadri waaːstaʕmalahu min aʶːlˤχaʶtˤaʶrˤiʶ wahaðaaː jakuwnu min aːlddahaaːʔi ʔiinnakum laðaːʔiiquw aːlʕaðaːbi aːlʔaaljmi man kunt sababanaː libalaaːʔiihi wad͡ʒaba ʕalajk aʶːlˤttaʶlˤaʶtˤuʶfuʶ lahu fij ʕilaaːd͡ʒihi min daaːʔiihi subħaaːna aːlllahi ʔaawafijka ʃakkun jaaː rasuwla aːlllahi faqaaːla juʶsˤlˤiʶħ lakum ʔaaʕmaːlakum wajaʁfir lakum ðunwbakum waman juʶtˤiʶʕiʶ aːlllaha waraswlahu faqad faːza fawzanaː ʕaʶðˤjmaʶnaʶː ʕan d͡ʒaddihi rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhum qaaːla waaːlnnamijmaau tuntid͡ʒu aʶːlˤbaʶʁdˤaʶaʶːʔaʶ waʔaannahu kaːna jaqwlu safjhunaː ʕalaaː aːlllahi ʃaʶtˤaʶtˤaʶnaʶː kaːnt tkrh mdrrshaː fj aʶːlˤrˤrˤjaʶːdˤjaʶːt ʔinna aːlzzamaaːna walaw jalijnu liʔaahlihi lamuχaaːʃinu χuʶtˤuʶwaʶaʶːtuʶhuʶ ʔan ʔafqd qwaːj bsbb hðaː aːlħml srq faʶːdˤlˤ sjjaːra walaː jaχaːfu ʕuqbaːhaː waʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤiʶdquʶ waaːlkaðibu jadχulaaːni aːlʔaaχbaaːra aʶːlˤmaʶaʶːdˤiʶjaʶaʶaʶ kamaaː ʔaanna aːlwafaaːʔa waaːlχulfa aːlkaððaaːbu kaaːlssaraaːbi faʔiinna aʶːlˤnnuʶsˤħaʶ waaːlmawaddaaa juʶsˤaʶddiʶqaʶaʶːniʶ aːlfikraaa waʶjuʶmaʶħħiʶdˤaʶaʶːniʶ aːlrraʔaja ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ llmsaːʕda kamaaː taχaaːfu min aːlddaaːʔi fjaː ljt aːlʃbaːb jʕwd jwmaː fʔaχbrh bmaː fʕl aːlmʃjb sˤlˤaʶː wsˤaʶːm lʔamr kaːn jʔamlh ħtaː qdˤaʶːh fmaː sˤlˤaʶː wlaː sˤaʶːmaʶː bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi ʔiiðaaː aːlssamaːʔu aʶːnfaʶtˤaʶrˤaʶt ʔaχð fj jawmajni watad͡ʒʕalwna lahu ʔaandaːdanaː ðlika rabbu aːlʕaːlamjna aːχtbʔa saːmj χlf ʃd͡ʒra sˤnwbrˤ wabiaːlħasraai halaʕanaː waʶʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlˤaʶ maʔamuwlin faaːlbuʕdu minhu ħaðaranaː ʔaaslamu liʔaanna waʔaan juraaː fij aːlnnufuwsi muʶʕaʶðˤðˤaʶmaʶnaʶː wamufaχχamanaː faaːlkifaaːjaau laaː tuqilluhu ħattaaː jakuwna maaːluhu faʶaʶːdˤiʶlˤaʶnaʶː ʃhaːda ʃrfja kjf ħaːlk jaː maːjk laaː jaʶstaʶtˤiʶjʕuʶ mdrrskm aːlbdjl aʶːntðˤrˤ saːmj qraːba aːlʕʃrjn dqjqa waaːlθθaaːnij maaː taʔaallafa bihi nabwaaa nufuwrin jħtml ʔan twm laː jħbk aːlʕtb ʕlaː aʶːlˤnðˤrˤ aːlʔislaːm ljs sˤʕbaʶː ʔaraːd saːmj ʔan jtʕrrf bmslmjn kaːn saːmj jrsm sˤwrˤaʶː ʕaːrja wamizaːd͡ʒuhu min tasnjmin hj tʕd͡ʒbnj jaaː rasuwla aːlllahi nuθnij ʕalajhi biaːlʕibaaːdaai faqad ʕadima min faʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤiʶ aːlnnafsi aːlʃʃad͡ʒaaːʕaaa wanafʕa aːlmaaːli χaʶaʶːsˤsˤuʶn md͡ʒtmʕa fj mkaːn waːħd mnnaːd jʕml maːðaː fʕl llħmj ldjh qmjsˤ ʔaswd wʕd͡ʒbwaː ʔan d͡ʒaːʔhm mnðr mnhm wqaːl aːlkaːfrwn hðaː saːħr kðaːb ʔinh md͡ʒrd tˤflˤ lawaħa twm ʕaqluhu kaθura hazluhu nħn nʕlm maːðaː nkwn w lknnnaː laː nʕlm maː qd nsˤbħ hl tħb aːlfrnsja ʔaljs ʕljnaː sʔuaːl twm biʶnaʶsˤrˤiʶ aːlllahi jaʶnsˤuʶrˤuʶ man jaʃaːʔu wahuwa aːlʕazjzu aːlrraħjmu jaaː rabbi kuntu ʔauħibbu lahum ʕaðaaːbanaː ʕaaːd͡ʒilanaː waqallamaaː jakuwnu ðalika ʔillaaː min χalijʕin baʶtˤiʶrˤiʶn ʔaaw murtaaːbin ʔaaʃirin kaːnt ldaː saːmj ħjaːa χfjja ʔiʶntðˤrˤtk θumma ʔiinna ʔiinnakum ʔaajjuhaaː aʶːlˤdˤdˤaʶːlˤwnaʶ aːlmukaððibwna aːlmulku jawmaʔiiðin aːlħaqqu lilrraħmni wakaːna jawmanaː ʕalaaː aːlkaːfirjna ʕasjranaː wamaː tafarraqa aːllaðjna ʔawtuwaː aːlkitaːba ʔiillaː min lisunnaai aːlllahi tabdjlanaː waʔiijjaaːka waʶfuʶdˤuʶwlˤaʶhuʶ faʔiinnahu juzillu aːlqadama kaːn sˤwt saːmj ʁlˤjðˤaʶː d͡ʒddaː laː ttkllm bhðh aːlnnbra mʕ ʔabjk mn fdˤlˤk fkr fj aʶːlˤmwdˤwʕ waqaaːla sulajmaaːnu bnu ʕabdi aːlmaliki tklm fqd klm aːllh mwsaː lqd aːttχðt qraːrj tfdˤdˤlˤj waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʕulamaaːʔi ʕallim ʕilmak wataʕallam ʕilma ʁajrik wuld faʶːdˤlˤ fj ftra aːlksaːd aːlkbjr jblʁ mtħddθj aːllʁa aːlʔind͡ʒljzja mljaːr nsma sjkwn fʕl ðlk χtˤrˤaʶnaʶː θumma ʕalaaː suwri baladihi ʕaːd mn aʶːlˤmrˤsˤd qddm lj aːlmdrrs aːħtd͡ʒaːzaː ʔiinna ðlika laħaqqun taʶχaʶːsˤuʶmuʶ ʔaahli aːlnnaːri ʔiin ħisaːbuhum ʔiillaː ʕalaː rabbj law taʃʕurwna kaːn saːmj fj ʁrfa aːstʕd͡ʒaːlaːt ʔaħd aːlmstʃfjaːt ʔalaː trjd ʔijqaːf twm laːtstʕn baʶːlˤðˤaʶːlˤm ʕlaː aʶːlˤðˤaʶːlˤm ħtaː laːtkwn frjsa llʔaθnjn faʔiiðaː nuqira fij aːlnnaːqwri juχrid͡ʒu aːlħajja mina aːlmajjiti wajuχrid͡ʒu aːlmajjita mina aːlħajji wajuħjij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ baʕda mawtihaː wakaðlika tuχrad͡ʒwna waraʔaajta aːlnnaːsa jadχulwna fj djni aːlllahi ʔaafwaːd͡ʒanaː aʶːlˤsˤdjq ʔimaː ʔan jnfʕ wʔimaː ʔan jʃfʕ ʔaan jusriʕa wuʶsˤuʶwlˤuʶhaʶaʶː lilfahmi hðaː ʔabʃʕ rd͡ʒl θld͡ʒj rʔajth ʔabdaː kaːnt ljlaː qd maːtt ʕndmaː wsˤlˤt sjjaːra aːlʔisʕaːf ʕljnaː ʔan nd͡ʒd ħlaːaː kaːn saːmj msˤaʶːbaʶː bd͡ʒrħ fj aːlrrʔas ʔaqll twm maːrj mn aʶːlˤmtˤaʶːrˤ fasubħaaːna man tafarrada fijnaaː biʶlˤuʶtˤfiʶ ħikmatihi faqaaːla ʔaanbiʔiuwnij biʔaasmaaːʔi haaːʔuulaaːʔi ʔiin kuntum sˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ waʔiiðaː maʶrˤiʶdˤtuʶ fahuwa jaʃfjni maː χaːb man aːstʃaːr ʔaaw jakuwna qad zaaːda fijhaaː ħattaaː tad͡ʒaaːwazat maħduwdahaaː km mn aːlwqt aːstʁrqk lttrd͡ʒm hðaː aːlktaːb faqaaːla aːbnu ʕabbaaːsin laaː χajra walaaː ʃarra hw jdrs aːlfzjaːʔ qrʕ saːmj ʕlaː baːb ljlaː hl aʶːntðˤrˤt kθjraː waaːstiʃfaaːfanaː lˤiʶlˤtˤtˤaʶmaʶʕiʶ kaːn aːlmdrrs jtsˤrˤrˤf bʁraːba ʔiið ʕuʶrˤiʶdˤaʶ ʕalajhi biaːlʕaʃijji aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶːfiʶnaʶːtuʶ aːld͡ʒijaːdu mataːʕanaː lakum waliʔaanʕaːmikum warawat ʔaasmaaːʔu bintu jazijda qaaːlat waʔaammaaː aːlmunaaːsabaau fahija ʔaan jakuwna aːlmaʕnaaː jalijqu biʶbaʶʕdˤiʶ aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶlˤfaʶaʶːðˤiʶ ʔimmaaː liʕurfin mustaʕmalin aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶbrˤuʶ sˤaʶbrˤaʶaʶːniʶ aːlʕaaːd͡ʒizu man ʕad͡ʒaza ʕan sijaaːsaai nafsihi maːðaː tzrʕ fj mzrʕtk faqaaːla sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama kajjataaːni waaːʕlam ʔaannak maaː ħajijta maʶlˤħuʶwðˤuʶ aːlmaħaaːsini maʶħfuʶwðˤuʶ aːlmasaaːwiʔii sˤaʶnaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶʕuʶ aːlmaʕruwfi taqij maʶsˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶʕaʶ aːlssuwʔi ʕljk aːltħkm baːnfʕaːlk twm waaːlθθaaːnij ʔaanna ðalika raaːd͡ʒiʕun ʔilaaː libaaːsi aːlttaqwaaː wamaʕnaaː aːld͡ʒaaːhi waaːlʔiisʕaaːdu biaːlnnafsi waaːlmaʕuwnaau fij aːlnnaaːʔiibaai raħima aːlllahu man qaaːla χajranaː faʁanima lm laː tʁjjr mlaːbsk ʔaawlaː laka faʔaawlaː klb saːmj ldjh braːʁjθ wakaːna fij aːlmadjnaai tisʕaau rˤaʶhtˤiʶn jufsidwna fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ walaː juʶsˤlˤiʶħwnaʶ waqaaːla ʕijsaaː aːbnu marjama ʕalaaː nabijjinaaː waʕalajhi aːlssalaaːmu rabbi aːlssamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wamaː bajnahumaaː aːlrraħmni laː jamlikwna minhu χiʶtˤaʶːbaʶnaʶː wawud͡ʒwhun jawmaʔiiðin ʕalajhaː ʁabaraaun saːmj jnðˤðˤf aːlmnzl saːmj md͡ʒrm χtˤjrˤ llʁaːja aːlqraːr bjdk aːlʔaːn χrd͡ʒ aʶːlˤwdˤʕ ʕn sjtˤrˤtj ʔajn tqʕ baːrjs liʔaannanaaː qad klhm bʃr maqtalu aːlrrad͡ʒuli bajna fakkajhi kallaː ʔiinnahu kaːna liʔaːjaːtinaː ʕanjdanaː lm tʔat qbl aːlθaːnja waaːlqawlu fij aʶːlˤdˤdˤaʶħiʶkiʶ kaaːlqawli fij aːlmizaaːħi ʔin tad͡ʒaaːfaaːhu aːlmdrsa waman taʕallama aːlʕarabijjaaa raqqa tˤaʶbʕuʶhuʶ walaqadira ʕalaaː maaː jaʶsˤuʶwnaʶhuʶ walajsa man faaːd͡ʒaʔaahu aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶʕaʶaʶːmuʶ kaman jad͡ʒidu rijħahu waʶjaʶtˤʕaʶmuʶhuʶ fadaʕ aːlħaaːd͡ʒaaa taχtamiru biaːlwaʕdi faqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʃʃuʕaraaːʔi mn ktb haːmlt saːmj ʔaħmq lʕjn w laː jstħqq dmwʕki aːliaːstihaaːnaau biaːlmusijʔi waðalika ʕan dˤaʶrˤbiʶn min aːlkibri waaːlʔiiʕd͡ʒaaːbi faʔaalhamahaː fud͡ʒwrahaː wataqwaːhaː waaːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶaʶːtiʶ ʔauwlaaːʔiika ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːld͡ʒannaai hum fijhaaː χaaːliduwna faqultu aːstaʁfirwaː rabbakum ʔiinnahu kaːna ʁaffaːranaː waʔiiðaaː aːlnnud͡ʒwmu aːnkadarat wajufriʁu ʕalajhi ʔaaħarra min aːlmird͡ʒali kam ʔaahlaknaː min qablihim min qarnin fanaːdawaː walaːta ħjna maʶnaʶːsˤiʶn maːðaː tqwl aːlrrsaːla wadaːnijaaan ʕalajhim ðˤiʶlˤaʶːlˤuʶhaʶː waðullilat quʶtˤwfuʶhaʶː taðljlanaː waħumilati aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤuʶ waaːld͡ʒibaːlu fadukkataː dakkaaan waːħidaaan wajanbaʁij ʔaan jakuwna lilʕaaːlimi firaaːsaaun jatawassamu bihaaː aːlmutaʕallima lijaʕrifa mablaʁa tˤaʶaʶːqaʶtiʶhiʶ hðaː aːlħjwaːn ʔakbr mn ðaːk waʔiinnj mursilaaun ʔiilajhim bihadijjaain faʶnaʶːðˤiʶrˤaʶaʶuʶn bima jard͡ʒiʕu aːlmursalwna kafaaː muχabbiranaː ʕammaaː baqija maaː maʶdˤaʶaʶː wakafaaː ʕibaranaː liʔauwlij aːlʔaalbaaːbi maaː d͡ʒarrabuwaː waaːllaðjna kafarwaː biʔaːjaːti aːlllahi waliqaːʔiihi ʔauwlʔiika jaʔiiswaː min raħmatj waʔauwlʔiika lahum ʕaðaːbun ʔaaljmun lm ʔant waːqf qaaːla jaaː rabbi dullanij ʕalajhi ħattaaː ʔauχrid͡ʒahu faqaaːla faqaaːla maaː ʔauħibbu ʔaan ʔaaħilla lak maaː ħarrama aːlllahu ʕalajk ʔaaʁsilu jadajja faaːlssaːbiqaːti sabqanaː kaaːna ʔaaʃadda min ðulli aːlrriqi waʶχuʶdˤuʶwʕiʶ aːlʕabdi θumma ʔinnahu d͡ʒallat qudratuhu d͡ʒaʕala sadda ħaaːd͡ʒatihim waʶtaʶwaʶsˤsˤuʶlˤiʶhiʶm ʔilaaː manaaːfiʕihim min wad͡ʒhajni sntʔaχr ʕn aːlʕʃaːʔ waaːlθθaaːnij laaː tutbiʕ aːlʔauwlaaː aːllatij waqaʕat sahwanaː biʶaʶːlˤnnaʶðˤrˤaʶaʶiʶ aːlθθaaːnijaai aːllatij tuwqiʕuhaaː ʕamdanaː maaː sˤaʶbaʶrˤaʶ man baθθa falaaː jadaʕhu aːlkarmu ʔaan jaʁfula walaaː aːlħajaaːʔu ʔaan jakuffa aːlħadijqaau d͡ʒamijlaaun qaaːla lij aːlrraʃijdu waʔiinnamaaː juqaddimu aːlwaʕda ʔaaħadu rad͡ʒulajni lqd tmt aːlmhmh bnd͡ʒaːħ waħijna jaʃtahij bʕdˤhm mʕtdl w aʶːlˤbʕdˤ aːlʔaːχr mtʃdd kaːn saːmj jtħrrk bbtˤʔuʶ ʔiinnaː ʔaaʕtadnaː lilkaːfirjna salaːsila waʔaaʁlaːlanaː wasaʕjranaː ʁjjr saːmj mlaːbsh lm laː tfʕl ðlk bnfsk waʔaːχiruk d͡ʒijfaaun qaðiraaun walada aːlllahu waʔiinnahum lakaːðibwna watawakkal ʕalaaː aːlʕazjzi aːlrraħjmi lijasʔaala aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶːdiʶqjnaʶ ʕan sˤiʶdqiʶhiʶm waʔaaʕadda lilkaːfirjna ʕaðaːbanaː ʔaaljmanaː aʶːsˤtˤdmt sjaːrth bʃd͡ʒra faʔiinna muʃaaːħħaaa aːlnnufuwsi fijhaaː ʔaʶaʶʕðˤaʶmuʶ waaːlʕinaaːda ʕalajhaaː ʔaakθaru aːlkðb daːʔ waʶːlˤsˤdq dwaːʔ laː ʔatðkkr ʔajn wdˤʕt mfaːtjħj waqijla lilʕattaaːbiji wahuwa jaʔiuwlu ʔin aːstamarra ʔilaaː fitnaain ʔaaw d͡ʒalaaːʔin faʔaammaaː aːlqawlu fahuwa tˤiʶjbuʶ aːlkalaaːmi waħusnu aːlbiʃri waaːlttawadudu bid͡ʒamijli aːlqawli qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlʔiiħsaaːnu riqqun waaːlmukaaːfaʔaaau ʕitqun waʔiinna laka laʔaad͡ʒranaː ʁajra mamnwnin ʔalf saːmj ħjaːth aːlmzdwd͡ʒa ʔilaː ħdd kbjr laaː taʃrab aːlmaaːʔa aːlrraaːkida rwmaː mdjna qdjma saːmj jntðˤrˤ ʔaħdaː maːðaː nsjt ʔan ʔaktbh aːllaðj hum fjhi muχtalifwna tˤaʶbaʶχt aːlmarʔaaau aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶʕaʶaʶːmaʶ wmʕaːan tmθlaːn ħsn aːlaːtsaːq waːlaːnsd͡ʒaːm maː bjn aːltqaːljd waːltqdm aʶːnhdˤ ʕinda sidraai aːlmuntahaː aːstarʃiduwaː aːlʕaaːqila tarʃuduwaː walaaː taʶʕsˤuʶwhuʶ fatandamuwaː sˤdrˤt mðkkraːt twqjf dˤdd ljlaː snlʕb aːltns fj ʕtˤlˤaʶ nhaːja aːlʔasbwʕ kaːn twm dʕmaː kbjraː lj miħanu aːlfataaː juχbirna ʕan faʶdˤlˤiʶ aːlfataaː kaaːlnnaaːri muχbiraaun biʶfaʶdˤlˤiʶ aːlʕanbari waqallamaaː takuwnu miħnaau tkffl aːlʔisʕaːfjjwn bd͡ʒrwħ saːmj ʔalj bdljl aːlhaːtf ʔaarbaʕaau ʔaaχlaaːqin naaːhijka bihaaː ðammanaː wahija waʔiin lam jakun lilʔaamri dawaaːmun fafijma aːlssuruwru aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶbrˤuʶ dˤiʶjaʶaʶːʔuʶn liʔaanna maaː ħaramahaaː min fiʕli aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶːtiʶ biaːlʕad͡ʒzi waʶaʶːlˤdˤdˤaʶʕfiʶ ʔaakθaru θawaaːbanaː waʶʔaʶaʶʕðˤaʶmuʶ ʔaad͡ʒranaː walaʕalla harimanaː ʔaaraaːda ʔaan jadfaʕahumaaː ʕan nafsihi faaːʕtaðara bimaaː qaaːla ʔajn tʕml kamaaː aːstaqarra ħubbu man jaaːsarahaaː wasaaːmaħahaaː fakaaːna ʔaaljaqu liʔaumuwri aːlmuruwʔaai aʶːstiʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːfaʶ aːlnnufuwsi biaːlmujaaːsaraai waaːlmusaaːmaħaai fasawfa jadʕw θubwranaː wdˤʕt ljlaː jdhaː ʕlaː jd saːmj lm laː tʕtðr w ttˤlˤb mnh ʔan jsaːmħk taraktu aːlħasada fabaqijtu ʔinn mnzl saːmj kbjr baːlnnsba lrd͡ʒl waːħd kj jnðˤðˤfh waqaaːla lˤaʶqiʶjtˤuʶ bnu zuraaːraaa waqul libanij saʕdin famaaː lij wamaaː lakum lqd trqjt wajlun jawmaʔiiðin lilmukaððibjna faaːlʔiid͡ʒaaːbaau hahunaaː tastaħiqqu karmanaː watastalzimu muruwʔaaan walajsa lilrradi sabijlun ʔillaaː liman aːstawlaaː ʕalajhi aːlbuχlu man ʔaʶaʶsˤaʶaʶːbaʶthuʶ muʶsˤiʶjbaʶaʶuʶn faʃakaaː ʔilaaː aːlnnaaːsi faʔiinnamaaː jaʃkuw rabbahu bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi jaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːlmuzzamilu laː jasʔaamu aːlʔiinsaːnu min duʕaːʔi aːlχajri waʔiin massahu aːlʃʃaru fajaʔiwsun qaʶnwtˤuʶn kaːn saːmj fj mkaːn laː tusmħ fjh aːlssbaːħa walajaʕlamanna aːlllahu aːllaðjna ʔaːmanwaː walajaʕlamanna aːlmunaːfiqjna wamaː ʔaadraːka maː jawmu aʶːlˤfaʶsˤlˤiʶ fahuwa jard͡ʒuw waaːljaʔasu ʕalajhi ʔaaʁlabu lam jankasir aːlzzud͡ʒaːd͡ʒu ʔaːmn mn ħmaːm mka ʔajmknnj ʔan ʔastʕjr sikkjnak faʔiin waʶjaʶsˤbiʶrˤ ʕalaaː balaaːʔiij faljaχtar rabbanaː siwaaːja kaːn saːmj naːʔimaː taʕallamuwaː waʕallimuwaː faʔiinna ʔaad͡ʒra aːlʕaaːlimi waaːlmutaʕallimi sawaaːʔun qddm faʶːdˤlˤ daːnja lraːmj saːmj sjttˤjʕ rˤbtˤ ħðaːʔih dˤmjrˤj mrtaːħ sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama bajaaːna maaː kaaːna mud͡ʒmalanaː dʕaː saːmj ljlaː llʕjʃ mʕh ʔawl aʶːlˤqsˤjdaʶ kfr ʔawl maː ʃtˤħ ntˤħ ʔaaχbaranij rasuwlu aːlllahi sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama ʔaanna fij ʕajnajk baʶjaʶaʶːdˤaʶnaʶː lan jaʕuwda aːlʁaaːʔiibu aːlħasuwdu laaː jasuwdu waʔaammaaː aːlʃʃahwaau fatatanawwaʕu nawʕajni waaːχtalafa majjitanaː laaː taħillu ʁijbatuhu ħajjanaː jaː lk mn wld d͡ʒmjl ntˤq saːmj baːlʃʃhaːda lwħdh fj ʁrfth faʶjaʶnðˤuʶrˤuʶ faʔiin χaaːfa biaːlrradi qadħa ʕiʶrˤdˤiʶn ʔaamranaː min ʕindinaː ʔiinnaː kunnaː mursiljna kallaː laʔiin lam jantahi lanasfaʕanaː biʶaʶːlˤnnaʶːsˤiʶjaʶaʶiʶ qaːl faʶːdˤlˤ ʔannh kaːn jsmʕ ʔaʶsˤwaʶːtaʶː fj rʔash lqd dmmr saːmj ħjaːth waʶlˤwtˤaʶnaʶː ʔiið qaːla liqawmihi ʔiinnakum lataʔatwna aːlfaːħiʃaaa maː sabaqakum bihaː min ʔaaħadin mina aːlʕaːlamjna ʔaraː kl ʔinsaːn jraː ʕjb ʁjrh wjʕmaː ʕn aːlʕjb aːlðj hw fjh maː aːlðj d͡ʒʕlk tʔatj ʔilaː hnaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶbrˤuʶ waaːld͡ʒazaʕu aʶːlˤfaʶsˤlˤuʶ aːlθθaaːnij fij aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶbrˤiʶ waaːld͡ʒazaʕi jaʕnij waaːalllahu ʔaaʕlamu liqillaai muruwʔatihi waʶðˤuʶhuʶwrˤiʶ ʃahwatihi faʶaʶːntˤaʶlˤaʶqwaʶː wahum jataχaːfatwna kaːlmħtmj bbjt aːlʕnkbwt qutila baːlsjf ʔaːkul tfaːħa sjfrħ ʔanaː sʕjd lsmaːʕ ʔann ljlaː ʔaːmn mn aʶːlˤχtˤrˤ waʶðˤaʶnnaʶ ʔaannahu aːlfiraːqu faʔaammaaː ħajaaːʔuuhu min aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː fajakuwnu biaːmtiθaaːli ʔaawaaːmirihi waaːlkaffi ʕan zawaaːd͡ʒirihi lm ʔansk aːlfn jtˤrˤq baːb aːlχjaːl w aːlχjaːl jftħ baːb aːlʔibdaːʕ hl rʔajt wd͡ʒh mtˤlˤq aːlnaːr lˤiʶjaʶsˤiʶlˤaʶ ʔilaaː faʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶiʶ aːlʔaamrajni biaːlmuknaai min aːljasaaːri waaːlʔiiʕsaaːri faʔiinna lilmuwsiri fij aːlzziji qadranaː waqad qijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami man jaχun jahun aʶːtðˤrˤ saːmj fj sˤmt waaːlʃʃahwaaa muʶχtaʶsˤsˤaʶaʶuʶn binajli aːlllaðaai aːrd͡ʒʕ ʔilaː aːlwraːʔ mn fdˤlˤk ʃkraː ʕlaː ʔaːdχaːl aːlʁsjl jaː d͡ʒjrj rbmaː stmtˤrˤ aːlljla laaː zawaaːla lilnniʕmaai maʕa aːlʃʃukri lqd aːttχð saːmj qraːraː w laː ʔaħd jsttˤjʕ ʔan jd͡ʒbrh ʕlaː aːlttnaːzl ln ʔaʶdˤrˤb aːmrʔaa ʔabdaː faʶaʶːlˤʕaʶːsˤiʶfaʶːtiʶ ʕaʶsˤfaʶnaʶː aːlddlaːl aʶːlˤmfrˤtˤ sjjʔ sanuqriʔiuka falaː tansaː walaaː liniʕamihi min aːlnnaaːsi ʔaahlanaː waʔaalzamahum muʶftaʶrˤaʶdˤaʶaʶːtiʶhiʶ mn jqf hnaːk faaːlʔaawlaaː fij miθlihi aːnfiraaːdu kulli waaːħidin bifikrihi d͡ʒanaaː aːlfalaːaħu quʶtˤnaʶhuʶ wabaaːʕahu θumma aːiʃtaraaːa biʶbaʶʕdˤiʶ θamanihi maaː jaħtaaːd͡ʒu ʔiilajhi waʔaːθara aːlħajaːaa aːlddunjaː aːstʔad͡ʒr saːmj ʔaʶfdˤlˤ aːlmħaːmjn kj jdaːfʕwaː ʕljh waʶaʶːnqaʶbaʶdˤaʶ ʕan munaaːfasaai aːlʔaakfaaːʔi laː jaʶsˤlˤaʶːhaʶː ʔiillaaː aːlʔaaʃqaaː ʔaalastum tastarijħuwna biaːlllajli qaaːluwaː waʔiin kunta kaaːðibanaː faqad bahatahu man lam jaʕudda kalaaːmahu min ʕamalihi kaθurat χaʶtˤaʶaʶːjaʶaʶːhuʶ waliʔaanna fij aːlrrud͡ʒuwʕi ʕanhu min aːliaːnkisaaːri wajubarhinu ʕan maʶħsˤuʶwlˤiʶhiʶ faʔiiðaː nufiχa fij aʶːlˤsˤsˤwrˤiʶ nafχaaun waːħidaaun sʔaltnj km ʕmrj hj laː tzaːl fj aːlχjma waʔiiðaaː aːlqubwru buʕθirat ʔaam ʔaanaː χajrun min hðaaː aːllaðj huwa mahjnun walaː jakaːdu jubjnu niʕma aːlmuʔuaaːzaraau aːlmuʃaaːwaraau wabiʔisa aːliaːstiʕdaaːdu aːliaːstibdaaːdu aːlmftaːħ ʕnd saːmj walaaː jalħaquhu zijaaːdaaun bifaqdi aːlħilmi man ħalima saaːda waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi ʔiðaaː tˤaʶlˤaʶbtaʶ aːlʕizza faʶaʶːtˤlˤuʶbhuʶ biʶaʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶiʶ jʕtqd aːlkθjrwn ðlk aːnaː ʔaʔumn fj qdraːtj laː ʔaʕrf kjf sqtˤt mn ʕlaː aʶːlˤħsˤaʶːn wahuwa mustashalu aːlkalafi ʔaam jaqwlwna naħnu d͡ʒamjʕun muʶntaʶsˤiʶrˤuʶn maː zaːlt qdmaːj tʔulmaːnnj bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi ʔiiðaː waqaʕati aːlwaːqiʕaau sʔaʕjdk llmnzl kj aːlrd͡ʒaːl waʔiiðaaː ħasadtum falaaː tabʁuwaː kaːn jʕd͡ʒbnj mdrrs aʶːlˤrˤrˤjaʶːdˤjaʶːt lm ʔaʕlm ʔilaː ʔajn ʔaðhb ʔaw maː ʔafʕlh rʔaaː saːmj θʕaːbjnaː tχrd͡ʒ mn ðlk aːld͡ʒħr tˤuʶrˤd saːmj mn hðh waʶjuʶwaʶdˤdˤiʶħuʶ ħaqaaːʔiiqa aːlʔaumuwri faʔiinnahu man aːstawʕaba aːlħalaaːla taaːqat nafsuhu ʔilaaː aːlħaraaːmi ðaːkrt saːʕa wakaaːna tˤaʶbʕuʶhuʶ ʔilajhi maaːʔiilanaː lijanfija ʕanhu wajukfaaːhu wajaslamu min dˤaʶrˤaʶrˤiʶhiʶ waʕadaaːwatihi dχl saːmj ʔilaː aːlmstʃfaː jsˤaʶːħb aːlbrq aːlrʕd ʕaːda saaːlibaaːtu aʶːlˤfaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤiʶ waʶaʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶjrˤaʶ maħʃwraaan kullun lahu ʔaawwaːbun ʔijjaaːka wakaθraaa aʶːlˤdˤdˤaʶħiʶkiʶ faʔiinnahu jumijtu aːlqalba wajuðhibu binuwri aːlwad͡ʒhi waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi aːlbaχijlu lajsa lahu χalijlun aːlʔinsaːn jraː ʕjwb nfsh bʕjwn ʁjrh fqtˤ wajuqillu halaʕahu kaːn faʶːdˤlˤ jħbb aːlqmaːr kaːn ʔaħdhm jntðˤrˤ saːmj jaʃtarij aːlttaaːd͡ʒiru aʶːlˤquʶtˤnaʶ hkðaː sjbq aːlħaːl waqaaːla ʔaakθamu bnu sˤaʶjfiʶjjiʶn man sˤaʶbaʶrˤaʶ ðˤaʶfiʶrˤaʶ waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi bimiftaaːħi ʕazijmaai aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶbrˤiʶ tuʕaaːlad͡ʒu maʁaaːlijqu aːlʔaumuwri ʔiinnamaaː aːlħajaːau aːlddunjaː laʕibun walahwun waʔiin tuʔuminwaː watattaqwaː juʔutikum ʔaud͡ʒwrakum walaː jasʔaalkum ʔaamwaːlakum hðaː aːlwʃm sχjf hðaː ʃjʔ ln ʔansaːh ʔabdaː sanadʕu aːlzzabaːnijaaa man ʔaaʃd͡ʒaʕu aːlnnaaːsi ʔarsl saːmj aːlkθjr mn aːlrrsaːʔil lljlaː waqaaːla aːbnu aːlmuʕtazzi aːlħasadu daaːʔu aːld͡ʒasadi ʔaam lilʔiinsaːni maː tamannaː ʔijnaaːsu aʶːlˤmuʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶjnaʶ waaːlttawadudu ʔilaaː aʶːlˤmuʶχaʶaʶːlˤiʶtˤiʶjnaʶ wafiʕluhu ðamijmun aːlddawaːau mamluwʔaaun masluwba aːlʕazaaːʔi ʔaʶnðˤrˤiʶ waaːstabðala sˤiʶjaʶaʶːnaʶtaʶhuʶ ʔaχð saːmj bʕdˤ aːlddrws saːr saːmj ʔilaː tlk aːlnnaːfða bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi tˤsm kmaː tzrʕ tħsˤd waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi ʃarafu aːlkarijmi taʁaaːfuluhu ʕan aːlllaʔiijmi wataraka lakum maaː kasaba wataraktum ʕalajhi maaː aːktasaba kaːn ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jðhb ʔilaː aːlmdrsa jrjd saːmj ʔan jbjʕ klbh mn fsˤjlˤaʶ aːlʃʃjbaː ʔijnw ʔin kaːnt θmma tˤrˤjqaʶ lʔastmtʕ baːldraːsa hllaː ʔaχbrtnj ʕnhaː famaː jukaððibuka baʕdu biaːlddjni aːlʕml ʔablʁ χtˤaʶːbiʶn walaaː jaʁurranaka hawaaːk biʶtˤaʶjjiʶbiʶ aːlmalaaːhij walaaː taftinuk dunjaaːk biħusni aːlʕawaaːrijj qaːlat ʔiinna aːlmulwka ʔiiðaː daχalwaː qarjaaan ʔaafsadwhaː wad͡ʒaʕalwaː ʔaaʕizzaaa ʔaahlihaː ʔaaðillaaan wakaðlika jafʕalwna waðahaba qawmun ʔilaaː ʔaanna suwʔa aʶːlˤðˤðˤaʶniʶ bihaaː ʔaabluʁu fij sˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːħiʶhaʶaʶː hðaː mdrrsj fj aːlmwsjqaː nsjt ljlaː dwaːʔhaː fj aːlmχjjm ʔaʃd aːld͡ʒhaːd md͡ʒaːhda aʶːlˤʁjðˤ lm jqdr saːmj ʕlaː tħmml ðlk aʶːlˤdˤdˤd͡ʒjd͡ʒ laː tns ðlk warawaaː zajdu bnu ʔaaslama qaaːla kl ʔimrjʔ jsˤnʕ qdrhu bnfsh aːlħalaaːlu bajjinun waʶtaʶdˤuʶmmaʶ ʔilaaː luʔumihaaː danaaːʔaaan waʁadranaː tfdˤdˤlˤ aːlbjt bjtk kaːn saːmj sʕjdaː bχrwd͡ʒ ljlaː mn ħjaːth maːðaː tfʕl bmlaːbs saːmj aːlʕlm jrfʕ bjtaː laː ʕmaːd lh waːld͡ʒhl jhdm bjt aːlʕz waːlʃrf kullu nafsin ðaːʔiiqaau aːlmawti θumma ʔiilajnaː turd͡ʒaʕwna min qawlik ʔaan tuʶχtˤiʶʔiʶaʶ walimiθli ðalika qaaːlat aːlħukamaaːʔu wqf saːmj ʔamaːm aːlnnaːfða lqd χudʕ saːmj mn tˤrˤf ʔabjh kaːlħaːdj wljs lh bʕjr waʶmuʶtaʶsaʶlˤlˤiʶtˤuʶn ðˤaʶlˤuʶwmuʶn χð aːlkrsj aːlʔaːχr waqad qaaːla aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː laaː tulquwaː aːld͡ʒawhara lilχinzijri faaːlʕilmu ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlˤuʶ min aːllluʔuluʔui fij aːlʁanami simanuhaaː maʕaaːʃun sˤrˤrˤħ aʶːlˤʔaʶtˤbbaʶːʔ ʔann ljlaː kaːnt ttʕaːfaː mn srˤtˤaʶːnhaʶː wataʃʁalu aːlqalba falam janfi ʕanhaaː qabijħanaː walam jahdi ʔilajhaaː ħasananaː ʔajjhaː aːlʔaħmq kjf td͡ʒrʔu ʕlaː sˤfʕj walam jatadaaːrak biʕuðrihi waʶtaʶnaʶsˤsˤuʶlˤiʶhiʶ kaːnt ħjaːa saːmj ʕaːdjja llʁaːja aːldnjaː ʕdw fj θjaːb sˤdjq ljs bʔimkaːn ʔaj ʔinsaːn ʔan jsˤbħ ʃaːʕraː wahaðihi aːlθθalaaːθu χiʶsˤaʶaʶːlˤuʶ hunna d͡ʒaaːmiʕaaːtu aːlrraðaaːʔiili ʔaʃaːr ʔan tnfjð aʶːlˤχtˤaʶ sjklf aːlkθjr mn aːlmaːl aːiftarasa aːlððiʔibu kabʃanaː bal naħnu maħrwmwna χuðhu baːlmwt ħtaː jrˤdˤaʶː baːlħumaaaː χðw aːlħkma mn ʔafwaːh aʶːlˤbstˤaʶːʔ bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi waʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶːfaʶːtiʶ sˤaʶffaʶnaʶː kaːnt ʕnd saːmj w ljlaː ħsˤsˤaʶ draːsjja jħdˤrˤaʶːnhaʶː mʕaː fwaː ʕd͡ʒbaː km jdʕj aʶːlˤfdˤlˤ naʶːqsˤ wwaː ʔasfaː km jdʕj aʶːlˤnqsˤ faʶːdˤlˤ ʔaθaːr ʃhr rˤmdˤaʶːn aːhtmaːm saːmj maːðaː ħsˤlˤ baːlmaːl falammaː raʔaawaː baʔasanaː qaːlwaː ʔaːmannaː biaːlllahi waħdahu wakafarnaː bimaː kunnaː bihi muʃrikjna wamin ʔaːdaaːbihi kaːn hðaː fj ʕlba brjdk aːd͡ʒʕal taʕlijmak diraaːsaaan liʕilmik ʕljk aʶːlˤtsˤrˤf bʔadb ʔaθnaːʔ ʁjaːbj ʔatsmʕ maː ʔaqwl aʶːlˤtqtˤtuʶ bʕdˤ aʶːlˤsˤwrˤ ltwm hl ldjk ħaːsb ʔaːlj lm jsbq lsaːmj w ʔan qaːbl mslmaː fj ħjaːth wataqlijluhu ʕan ʔaan jakuwna mustakθiranaː fawaqaːhumu aːlllahu ʃarra ðlika aːljawmi walaqqaːhum naʶdˤrˤaʶaʶaʶn wasurwranaː mn aʶːlˤχtˤrˤ ʔan jkwn aːlmrʔa fj ħaːla nfsjja khðh kaːnt ljlaː mʃd͡ʒd͡ʒʕa mθjra fj aːld͡ʒaːmʕa faaːlħaqqu ʔaaqwaaː muʕijnin θumma qaaːla waʁalaba ʕalajhi aːlχuluqu aːlððamijmi χð ħbtjn mn aːldwaːʔ bʕd aːlʔakl waʔaammaaː mawaaːqifu aːlrrijbaai fahija aːlttaradudu bajna manzilataj ħamdin waðammin waaːstaʕijnuwaː biʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶbrˤiʶ waʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːaʶiʶ waʔiinnahaaː lakabijraaun ʔiillaaː ʕalaaː aːlχaaːʃiʕijna fj aːld͡ʒrjra tʃtrk aːlʕʃjra waʔaammaaː sˤiʶnaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶuʶ aːlʕamali faqad tanqasimu qismajni ʕamalun sˤiʶnaʶaʶːʕiʶjjuʶn waʕamalun bahijmijjun θumma lammaaː kaaːnat aːlmawaaːddu maʶtˤlˤuʶwbaʶaʶaʶn liħaaːd͡ʒaai aːlkaaːffaai ʔilajhaaː ʔauʕwizat biʁajri tˤaʶlˤaʶbiʶn ðl mn laː sjf lh ʔatnsaː ʕaːda aːlqjaːm bwaːd͡ʒbaːt wafij haðaaː aːlnnawʕi qad jaqaʕu aːlttad͡ʒaaːwuzu waʶaʶːlˤttaʶqsˤiʶjrˤuʶ waʶaʶːlˤttaʶwaʶsuʶtˤuʶ aʶːlˤmaʶtˤlˤuʶwbuʶ fijhi muʕtabarun min wad͡ʒhajni thaːnjj hl ʔant qaʶːsˤrˤ duħwranaː walahum ʕaðaːbun waʶːsˤiʶbuʶn ʔaχbr saːmj ljlaː bħmlj waʔaafsadathu d͡ʒahaaːlatuhu liʔaanna aːlbalaaːʁaaa lajsat ʕalaaː maʕaaːnin mufradaain walaaː wanahjihi waʶtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶuʶ aːlllahi fij sirrihi wad͡ʒahrihi jasʔaalu ʔaajjaːna jawmu aːlqijaːmaai ldjj mwʕd mʕ aːlmħrrra baːkr ʕaːd mn aːlmχbr maːðaː nfʕl hnaː waaːld͡ʒaaːhilu laaː jaʕrifu qurʔat lsaːmj ħqwqh walilmuʕsiri duwnahu ʔatʕrfaːn bʕdˤkmaʶː d͡ʒaʕala aʶːlˤtˤtˤiʶjaʶrˤaʶaʶaʶ ʕuðra χajbatihi limaaː fij aʶːlˤmaʶtˤlˤiʶ min takdijri aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶniʶjʕiʶ watamħijqi aːlʃʃukri laː tns rahbaain walaaː raʁbaain aːstahaaːnuwaː bihi waʶwaʶsˤaʶfaʶ baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʃʃuʕaraaːʔi qawmanaː faqaaːla kaːn saːmj mslmaː tʕbt ljlaː mn aʶːlˤaʶːntðˤaʶːrˤ waːd͡ʒh saːmj ljlaː bʃʔan aːlħml lmaːðaː ʁurst tlk aːlʔaʃd͡ʒaːr wstˤ mwqf aːlssjaːraːt ðlk walahu aːld͡ʒawaːri aːlmunʃaʔaːtu fij aːlbaħri kaaːlʔaaʕlaːmi kaːn saːmj tˤflˤaʶː mʕrˤrˤdˤaʶː lˤlˤχtˤrˤ waqad ruwija ʕan ʕalijji bni ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶn rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu ʔaannahu qaaːla ʔaljst swdaːʔ waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi man baðala maaːlahu ʔaadraka ʔaːmaaːlahu ʔiinna hʔuulaːʔi juħibbwna aːlʕaːd͡ʒilaaa wajaðarwna waraːʔahum jawmanaː θaqjlanaː liʔaanna haðaaː min sˤiʶfaʶaʶːtiʶ aːlħamijri td͡ʒmmʕwaː ħwl naːr aːlmχjjm ʕndmaː tsˤffrˤ aʶːlˤsˤsˤfaʶːrˤaʶ ʕlaː aːld͡ʒmjʕ ʔan jtwqqf ʕn maː jfʕlh w jstmʕ ʕaːdt mn aːlmktba faaːsd͡ʒudwaː lillahi waaːʕbudwaː kaːn ldjj mdrrs mtʕssf θumma tamaθθala aːlʔaaħnafu biqawli aːlʔaaʕwari aːlʃʃaniju kllmh w aʶːtˤlˤb mnh ʔan jʕwd ħadaːʔiiqa waʔaaʕnaːbanaː fij aːlssamaaːʔi nud͡ʒuwmun laːamiʕaaun aːʕtqd aːn twm jħtaːd͡ʒ aːn jrjh aːħdhm kjf jfʕl ðlk waaːʁfir liʔaabj ʔiinnahu kaːna mina aʶːlˤdˤdˤaʶːlˤjnaʶ nʃʔa saːmj kmsjħjj mʕmdaːnj stbqaː blaː ʕml waʔaazlafnaː θamma aːlʔaːχarjna ʔaakθartu waʔaakθart jaʕnij kalaaːmanaː waʶsˤaʶwaʶaʶːbaʶnaʶː muttakiʔijna ʕalaː rafrafin χuʶdˤrˤiʶn waʕabqarijjin ħisaːnin watakθijrun jakuwnu haðranaː w ʔaχjraː wd͡ʒdthaː qaːlt ljlaː lsaːmj ʔannhaː stqtlh ʔaammaaː aːlmamnuwʕu faliʔaannahu qad faʶdˤdˤaʶlˤaʶ ʕalajhi man siwaaːhu wataħkijmuhaaː daaːʕin ʔilaaː saʶlˤaʶaʶːtˤaʶtiʶhaʶaʶː wafasaaːdi aːlʔaaχlaaːqi bihaaː ʔaannak ʔiðaaː ʃakkaktahu fijhi taʃakkaka ħattaaː jakaaːda jard͡ʒiʕu fijhi walaaː jud͡ʒijbu ʔillaaː ʕunfanaː ʔaallaː taziru waːziraaun wizra ʔauχraː walaaː jaχluw fijmaaː ʔaataaːhu min ʔaarbaʕi ʔaaħwaaːlin waaːstarðaluwaː ʔaahlahu kallaː ʔiinnaː χalaqnaːhum mimmaː jaʕlamwna aʶːlˤmiʶsˤbaʶaʶːħuʶ muttaqidun waqad ħukija ʔaanna rad͡ʒulanaː saaːjara baʶʕdˤaʶ aːlwulaaːai faqaaːla ʔaahwaaː hawaaː aːlddijni waaːlllaðaaːtu tuʕd͡ʒibunij fakajfa lij bihawaaː aːlllaðaaːti waaːlddijni faqaaːlat χuð aːlʕafwa waʔamur biaːlʕurfi waʶʔaʶaʶʕrˤiʶdˤ ʕan aːld͡ʒaaːhilijna ʔalm tns ʃjʔiaː watad͡ʒaaːwaza qadrahu aːʕtqd saːmj ʔann hðaː kaːn mfjdaː fj ħjaːth rdd saːmj fabalaʁa maaː ʔaaħabba min ʔiχfaaːʔi nafsihi waʶsˤaʶdaʶqaʶ fij χabarihi kjf td͡ʒd aːʕtnaːqk llʔislaːm waqad qaaːla aːbnu aːlssamaaːki dʕmkm mqdr waʔaammaaː aʶːlˤmuʶʕtˤiʶj ʔiðaaː judχilhu rˤiʶdˤaʶaʶːhuʶ fij baʶaʶːtˤiʶlˤiʶn ʕinda baaːriʔiikum fataaːba ʕalajkum ʔiinnahu huwa aːlttawaaːbu aːlrraħijmu lmaːðaː laː tʔatj kj tʕml fj hðh aːlʕjaːda ʔaʶʕtˤnj frˤsˤaʶaʶn ʔaχraː kaːnt sˤdmaʶ qwja ʔaatabnwna bikulli rjʕin ʔaːjaaan taʕbaθwna taʁurru waʶtaʶdˤuʶrˤrˤuʶ watamurru lijad͡ʒzija aːllaðjna ʔaːmanwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶːlˤiʶħaʶːtiʶ min faʶdˤlˤiʶhiʶ ʔiinnahu laː juħibbu aːlkaːfirjna wajakuffa ʕan aʶːlˤðˤðˤuʶlˤmiʶ wataʔaallufahaaː biaːlmuqaaːrabaai waaːlmusaaːhalaai ʔinn aːlħjaːa laː tbdʔa w tnthj bsaːmj kaːn saːmj ðaːhbaː ʔilaː aːlqaːhra kj jmdˤj bʕdˤ aːlʔajjaːm mʕ ljlaː waʔaarsaχu limaʕluwmihim waaːlʔaaħmaqu dˤaʶaʶːlˤlˤuʶn muʶdˤiʶlˤlˤuʶn ʔin ʔauwnisa takabbara hl jmknk ʔan tdlnj ʕlaː aʶːlˤtˤrˤjq aːlaː aʶːlˤmħtˤaʶ kaːn saːmj ʔaʶfdˤlˤ ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ frjd ln jntql saːmj llʕjʃ fj mkaːn ʔaːχr rˤkdˤ saːmj llnnd͡ʒaːa bħjaːth walaaː fij aːlttamaaːdij muhlaaan jawma jataðakkaru aːlʔiinsaːnu maː saʕaː jʕrf saːmj ljlaː mnð snwaːth fj aːld͡ʒaːmʕa swf tnsaːnj jwmaː maː ʔaʶʕtˤs kθjraːan waaːlmuqaaːbalaau takuwnu min wad͡ʒhajni waʔiinnaka laʕalaː χuluqin ʕaʶðˤjmiʶn tuʶsˤnaʶʕuʶ aːlʔaaħðijaaa mina aːld͡ʒaldi ʔaððn saːmj lqd ʔanqðt ljlaː ħjaːa saːmj liʔaanna maaː taraddada bajna ʔaamrajni faaːlmuraaːdu minhu aʶːlˤiʶaʶːʕtiʶrˤaʶaʶːdˤuʶ ʕalaaː fasaaːdihi waʔiirʃaaːdi aːlʕibaaːdi fij qasmi aːlmanaaːfiʕi bajnahum ħaːrb ʕdwk baːlslaːħ aːlðj jχʃaːh laː baːlslaːħ aːlðj tχʃaːh hl tʕrf kjf tlʕb kra aːlqdm ʕud ʔilaaː qitaaːli ʕaduwwi aːlllahi walakinnahaaː zallaaun min zallaaːti rddt ljlaː saːmj waʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːduʶ ʕan ðalika ʔaan jaraaː ʔaːθaaːra aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː fij aʶːlˤðˤðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ faʔiinna lahu fijhim ʕibaranaː ʔanaː ʔaʶdˤjʕ wqtj ʔaʕlnt ljlaː ʔannhaː dˤaʶːbtˤaʶ ʃrˤtˤaʶ aʶːlˤsˤlˤħ bʕd aːlʕdaːwa ʔaʶtˤjb mn aːlħlaːwa ftħ saːmj aːlrrsaːla suʔiila aːlʔaaħnafu bnu qajsin ʕan aːlmuruwʔaai faqaaːla tˤlˤb saːmj mn aʶːlˤʃʃrˤtˤaʶ ʔan tdʕh w ʃʔanh kaːn saːmj fj ħfl warawaaː ʃahru bnu ħawʃabin ʕan ʔaabij ʔaumaaːmaaa qaaːla saːmj bʕjd ʕn aʶːlˤχtˤrˤ aːlwaladu maʶrˤiʶjdˤuʶn man aːstaʁnaaː biaːalllahi aːktafaaː lm jkn saːmj jʕrf kjf jsˤbħ mslmaː ʕnd aːlnaːzla tʕrf ʔaχaːk hnaːk aːlʕdjd mn aːld͡ʒaːmʕaːt fj kjwtw waʔaarsalnaːhu ʔiilaː miaːʔiaai ʔaalfin ʔaaw jazjdwna wakaðlika ħaqqat kalimatu rabbika ʕalaaː aːllaðjna kafarwaː ʔaannahum ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːlnnaːri hðh tfaːħa ʔaʶjdˤaʶːaʶn aʶːntðˤrˤ saːmj lstta ʔajjaːm snd͡ʒls w nntðˤrˤ ʔaraːd saːmj aːlʕjʃ fj bld ʔislaːmj qm btnsˤjb ljnks waʔaubbahaaa aːlmustaqillijna wsˤlˤ ʔaχjraː ʔiinna aːlllaha jaʕlamu maː jadʕwna min dwnihi min ʃajʔin wahuwa aːlʕazjzu aːlħakjmu mʃjt mʕh sʔasaːʕdk fj tnðˤjfh laː tns aʶːlˤwsˤlˤ tmm aːħtd͡ʒaːz ljlaː mn ʔad͡ʒl ʕlaːd͡ʒhaː walaw ʔaannahum sˤaʶbaʶrˤwaʶː ħattaː taχrud͡ʒa ʔiilajhim lakaːna χajranaː lahum waaːlllahu ʁafwrun raħjmun liʔaanna maaː jaʔatijhi biʶaʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶbʕiʶ min ʁajri takallufin aːlʔibtsaːma klma mʕrwf mn ʁjr ħrwf waaːlbuʔusu marðalaaun maː rʔajki tamahhal fij aːlssajri ʕani aːlnnabaʔii aʶːlˤʕaʶðˤjmiʶ sʔaqwm bʁsl aʶːlˤsˤħwn bmaː ʔank tˤbχtaʶ waʔiiðaː quriʔia ʕalajhimu aːlqurʔaːnu laː jasd͡ʒudwna walaʔiin jafʕala maaː lam jaqul ʔaad͡ʒmalu min ʔaan jaquwla maaː lam jafʕal haðaaː hal jakuwnu mansuwbanaː ʔilaaː aːlssaχaaːʔi fajuħmadu ʔaaw χaaːrid͡ʒanaː ʕanhu fajuðammu faaːlmulqijaːti ðikranaː lan tanfaʕakum ʔaarħaːmukum walaː ʔaawlaːdukum jawma aːlqijaːmaai jaʶfsˤiʶlˤuʶ bajnakum waaːlllahu bimaː taʕmalwna baʶsˤjrˤuʶn ʔaʶaʶħfaʶðˤuʶ aːlddarsa lm ʔakn ʔanwi ʔan ʔaχbrh hw jdrs aːlʔind͡ʒljzjja twm jʕrf ʕljh aːlmʁaːdra lqd aʶːstjqðˤ saːmj ʔaχjraː mn ʁjbwbth waʔaamaaːnun min aːlmalaaːmaai jwsf aʶːlˤsˤdjq kaːn saːmj mdrrsaː mħtrmaː d͡ʒddaː lqd sˤfʕth fj aːlwd͡ʒh waqaaːla aːlʃʃaʕbiju maaː ʔaadrakt ʔaummij θumma tuʔuawwalu ʔilaaː taʶqaʶaʶːtˤuʶʕiʶ aʶːlˤmuʶtaʶwaʶaʶːsˤiʶlˤiʶjnaʶ waʶtaʶbaʶaʶːʁuʶdˤiʶ hl maː zaːl ðlk aːlħljb sˤaʶːlˤħaʶːaʶn llʃrb walaaː takun ʕabda ʁajrik waqad d͡ʒaʕalak aːlllahu ħurranaː wamuħassinaau aːlqabaaːʔiiħi smʕt waːldtj tʁnj fj aːlħmaːm liʔaanna aːlʃʃuħa jamnaʕu min ʔaadaaːʔi aːlħuquwqi ʃadda ʕalajhi barðaʕaaan fajasijru fajalqaaː aːlrrad͡ʒula fajaquwlu aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶrˤiʶjquʶ qad d͡ʒaaːʔa aːlʔaamijru lahum fjhaː faːkihaaun walahum maː jaddaʕwna laː trtdi ħðaːʔaː fj aːlmsd͡ʒd hw jθjraː ʔaʶʕsˤaʶːbj ħqqaː waʶjaʶtˤwfuʶ ʕalajhim ʁilmaːnun lahum kaʔaannahum luʔuluʔuun maknwnun walillahi mulku aːlssamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ jaʁfiru liman jaʃaːʔu wajuʕaððibu man jaʃaːʔu wakaːna aːlllahu ʁafwranaː raħjmanaː fahuwa ʔaan laaː jaqnaʕa biaːlkifaaːjaai waʶjaʶtˤlˤuʶbaʶ aːlzzijaaːdaaa waaːlkaθraaa kaːn saːmj ʔaːtjanaː mn hnaːk waħwrun ʕjnun kaːn saːmj jlkm ljlaː ħttaː ʕndmaː kaːnt ħaːmlaː bʕdda ʔaʃhr warubbamaaː tawahhama baʶʕdˤuʶ man χalaaː min faʶdˤlˤiʶn kaːn saːmj jʕlm ʔann ljlaː lm tkn fj χtˤrˤ faʶsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ bihaðihi aːlnnisbaai min aːlmaʕluwmaaːti aːlfikrijjaai hðh aːlsjaːra tħtaːd͡ʒ lˤʔiʶsˤlˤaʶːħ qijla ʔaafajakuwnu kaððaaːbanaː qaaːla laaː fʔin qljl aːlħb baːlʕql sˤaʶːlˤħ wʔin kθjr aːlħb baːld͡ʒhl faːsd laː ʔadrj ʔajn mwqf aʶːlˤbaʶːsˤ ʔiin hðaː ʔiillaː qawlu aːlbaʃari lm jkn saːmj jkrh aːlmslmjn ʔiið d͡ʒaːʔa rabbahu biqalbin saljmin ʔaʶsˤbħt ljlaː aːlʔaːn mmrˤrˤdˤaʶ χaʶːsˤsˤaʶ ln nnsaːhm ʔabdaː salaːmun qawlanaː min rabbin raħjmin aːʕtrft ljlaː ʔannhaː tχaʶːsˤmt mʕ zwd͡ʒhaː saːmj fj aːljwm aːlðj aːχtfaː fjh ʕrˤrˤdˤ saːmj nfsh lˤχtˤrˤ aːlkʃf jasbaħu aːlʁulaːamu fij aːlnnahri laː jmkn ʔan jkwn ðlk sˤħjħaʶːaʶn mn aːlmstħjl ʔan jtʕllm aːlmrʔa aːlssbaːħa bdrws mraːsla aːlllʁa aːlʔalbaːnjja d͡ʒmjla d͡ʒddaː tˤlˤb saːmj mn ljlaː ʔan tʕtˤjh rqmhaː waaːlllajli ʔiiðaː ʕasʕasa tʔaχrt bsbb zħma aʶːlˤtˤrˤjq aːlʃdjda faqaaːla lilmutawakkili bihi ʔaan jaʕtamida mukramwna wakaððaba biaːlħusnaː faħalafa ʔaan jaʶdˤrˤiʶbaʶ bihaaː raʔasa muʕaaːwijaaa waliʔaanna aʶːlˤʕaʶtˤaʶaʶːʔaʶ waaːlmanʕa ʔiðaaː kaaːnaaː liʁajri ʕillaain ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶjaʶaʶː ʔilaaː ðammi aːlmamnuwʕi ʔanaː laː ʔantqdk kaːn saːmj msjħjjaː qbl ʔan jʕtnq aːlʔislaːm kaːn saːmj jtkllm mʕ ljlaː laaː tazuwlu qadamaaː aːbni ʔaːdama ħattaaː jusʔaala ʕan θalaaːθin kaððabat qawmu lˤwtˤiʶn aːlmursaljna lqd wdˤʕt hðaː aːlmwqʕ fj mfdˤlˤaʶːtj kaððabat qablahum qawmu nwħin waʕaːdun wafirʕawnu ðuw aːlʔaawtaːdi laː jʕrf ʔaħd aːsmh hðihi aːlnnaːru aːllatj kuntum bihaː tukaððibwna waʶrˤaʶaʶːbaʶtˤuʶwaʶː fijhi taʔawijlaaːni jʕml saːmj fj ʕjaːda mħllja lm jsmʕ ʔaħd ʕn saːmj mnð aːld͡ʒmʕa sˤbaʶːħaʶː χaʶːfiʶdˤaʶaʶuʶn raːfiʕaaun waʶtaʶsˤaʶwwuʶrˤuʶhuʶ ħattaaː laaː jaʕzuba ʕanhu ʔaʶtˤwlˤ mn ljl aːlʃtaːʔ kaːn hnaːk mdrrswn baːlqrb ʃrb saːmj sta kʔuws mn aːlχmr kaːn aːlmdrrs jtkllm sʔal saːmj ljlaː ʔin kaːn bʔimkaːnh aːstʕaːra aːlmzjd lm ʔant mtwttr lhðh aːlddrd͡ʒa waχalaqa aːlllahu aːlssamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ biaːlħaqqi walitud͡ʒzaː kullu nafsin bimaː kasabat wahum laː juʶðˤlˤaʶmwnaʶ aʶːsˤtˤħb saːmj ljlaː ʔilaː ʕjaːda ʔiʕaːda tʔahjl waʔaanʃada aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶsˤmaʶʕiʶjjuʶ ʔaħbb saːmj hðaː aːlmkaːn ʔatt ljlaː w aʶːsˤtˤħbtnj walaqad dˤaʶrˤaʶbnaʶː lilnnaːsi fj hðaaː aːlqurʔaːni min kulli maθalin laʕallahum jataðakkarwna wafij aːlttawraaːai liʔaanna aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶdˤrˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ bihaaː ʔaaʕammu kaːnt ljlaː ftaːa mʃhwra fj aːlθθaːnwja maː aːlðj ħmlhaː ʕlaː fʕl ʃjʔ khðaː walajsa ʕaʶtˤaʶbuʶn ʔillaaː wahija lahu sababun waʕalajhi ʔaalabbu laː tns ʔan tfkkr qbl bdʔa aːlħdjθ mn ðaːk aːlrd͡ʒl saːmj mslm mnð stt snwaːt fadaʕ maaː jarijbuk ʔilaaː maaː laaː jarijbuk walajsa fijmaaː ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶaʶː ʔilaaː waaːħidin minhumaaː χajrun jurd͡ʒaaː wahuwa d͡ʒadijrun ʔaan jakuwna ʃarranaː juttaqaaː maːhj χtˤtˤk ljwm aːlʔaħd ʔinna aːlbalaaːʔa muwakkalun biʶaʶːlˤmaʶntˤiʶqiʶ twqf ʕn mħaːwla ʔibhaːd͡ʒj lqd aːknʃf aːlʔad͡ʒwba bnfsh waaːlħalijmu ʔillaaː fij aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ walaaː tamjijzun limustaħiqqin ʔiðaː ʕurifa aːlsbb btˤlˤ aːlʕd͡ʒb hw lm jkn mdrrsj laaː ʔaaraaːk aːlllahu makruwhanaː tnaːwlt tˤʕaʶːm aʶːlˤftˤwrˤ aːlsaːʕa aːlsaːbʕa w aʶːlˤnsˤf sˤbaʶːħaʶːaʶn waaːlθθaaːliθi ħajaaːʔuuhu min nafsihi fakaaːna ðalika ʔaaʃrafa lilbaaːðili ʔant tʕlm ʔannj ʔaħbbh ʔaljs kðlk walafaqijhun waaːħidun ʔaaʃaddu ʕalaaː aʶːlˤʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːniʶ min ʔaalfi ʕaaːbidin lim ʔaʕlam kam saʶjaʶtˤwlˤuʶ aːlʔid͡ʒtimaːʕ hl ðhbt ʔilaː aːlmtd͡ʒr waʶsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ aːlħilmu mudabbiranaː lilʔaumuwri aʶːlˤmuʶʁdˤiʶbaʶaʶiʶ biqadrin laaː jaʕtarijhi naʶqsˤuʶn biʕadami aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ ʔaʕd͡ʒbt tlk aʶːlˤqsˤsˤaʶ saːmj ʔinh mwd͡ʒwd fj aːlbjt aːlʔaːn jaaː rasuwla aːlllahi ʔaadʕu lij biaːlmaʁfiraai faʔaaðina lahu aːlʕaaːlimu waaːd͡ʒtinaaːʔi aːlʔaawzaaːri fij muχaaːlafatihi sʔaqaːtl ħtaː aːlnfs aːlʔaχjr θumma ʕafawnaaː ʕankum min baʕdi ðaaːlika laʕallakum taʃkuruwna rʔaaː saːmj ljlaː fj aːlʕjaːda biʔaanna rabbaka ʔaawħaː lahaː tuqallabu fij aʶːlˤħaʶdˤaʶrˤiʶ min ʁajri qillaain walaaː safarin waʶʔaʶaʶbsˤiʶrˤ fasawfa juʶbsˤiʶrˤwnaʶ kaːnt d͡ʒθθa saːmj aːlhaːmda ttˤfw fj aːlmsbħ aʶːlˤχaʶtˤaʶʔaʶuʶ fij ʔiʶʕtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶ maaː laaː janbaʁij wamanʕu maaː janbaʁij waaːħidun tfaːd͡ʒʔat zwd͡ʒtj qaːla rabbu aːlmaʃriqi waaːlmaʁribi wamaː bajnahumaː ʔiin kuntum taʕqilwna sʔaːχðk ʔilaː mkaːn ʔaːmn ʕaːml aːlnaːs bmaː tħb ʔan jʕaːmlwk bh ðˤuʶlˤmaʶ aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ waqaaːla d͡ʒaʕfaru bnu muħammadin aːlfitnaau ħaʶsˤaʶaʶːduʶn lˤiʶlˤðˤðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmaʶjniʶ muttakiʔijna ʕalajhaː mutaqaːbiljna aːllaðj χalaqaka fasawwaːka faʕadalaka liʔaannahu kaaːna d͡ʒaaːhilanaː ʔaːkj hw klbj kaːn saːmj jħbb ʔan jtbaːhaː faaːltamasahaaː aːlnnaaːsu fawad͡ʒaduwhaaː faqaaːluwaː lahu qad radda aːlllahu raaːħilatak faʶsˤaʶlˤlˤiʶ waqaaːla d͡ʒaʕfaru bnu muħammadin ʔiin jwħaː ʔiilajja ʔiillaː ʔaannamaː ʔaanaː naðjrun mubjnun waqaaːluwaː quluwbunaaː ʁulfun bal laʕanahumu aːlllahu bikufrihim faqalijlanaː maaː juʔuminuwna aːsmʕi lj jaː ljlaː sˤaʶfwaʶaʶːnaʶ ʔinnij laʔaafraħu biʔiifaaːdatij aːlmutaʕallima ʔaakθara min faraħij biaːstifaaːdatij min aːlmuʕallimi waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi χajru aːlmizaaːħi laaː junaaːlu waʃarruhu laaː juqaaːlu liʔaanna aːlʕaaːdaaa tˤaʶbʕuʶn θaaːnin ʁdˤb aːld͡ʒaːhl fj qwlh wʁdˤb aːlʕaːql fj fʕlh aːlʔamjn laː tχwnh waːlχaːʔin laː tʔamnh snqtlk srqt ljlaː saːmj ʕlaː saːmj ʔan jhtmm bʃʔuwnh qul lillaðjna ʔaːmanwaː jaʁfirwaː lillaðjna laː jard͡ʒwna ʔaajjaːma aːlllahi lijad͡ʒzija qawmanaː bimaː kaːnwaː jaksibwna saːmj laː jrjd aʶːlˤχsˤaʶːm walaaː juhmiluhu θiqaaan biqudratihi ʕalajhi ʔiʕzf lj mqtˤwʕaʶ lʃwbaːn naːdaː saːmj kll aːlqsm bʕbaːra ʔaʁbjaːʔ kaːn saːmj tˤbjbaʶː jtqaʶːdˤaʶː raːtbaː mʕtbraː w jtmttʕ bsmʕa d͡ʒjjda wamaː jastawij aːlʔaaʕmaː waʶaʶːlˤbaʶsˤjrˤuʶ ʔið lajsa jaraaː qaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔaʶ aːlllahi ʕadlanaː waʔaaʕqabahu aːlttawakulu nadama aːlχaaːʔiibijna ʔajj nwʕ mn aːlrrd͡ʒaːl ʔant ʔaan jaʶtˤlˤuʶbaʶ minhaaː qadra kifaaːjatihi qul huwa aːllaðj ʔaanʃaʔaakum wad͡ʒaʕala lakumu aːlssamʕa waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶːrˤaʶ waaːlʔaafʔiidaaa qaljlanaː maː taʃkurwna faqaaːla lahu ʕumaru rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu wakaaːna baʶʕdˤuʶ muluwki aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶwaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶfiʶ ʔiðaaː ʁaʶdˤiʶbaʶ ʔaulqija ʕindahu mafaaːtijħu turabi aːlmuluwki fajazuwlu ʁaʶdˤaʶbuʶhuʶ waqaaːla mud͡ʒaaːhidun knt mhddaː qaaːla min ʔaajji ʕaqijlin qaaːla min banij χafaaːd͡ʒaaa waʔiiðaaː aːld͡ʒaħjmu suʕʕirat waqallamaaː tad͡ʒidu miθlahu maʶlˤħuʶwðˤaʶnaʶː ʔaaw mumawwalanaː maʶħðˤuʶwðˤaʶnaʶː aʶːlˤsˤjn dwla kbjra d͡ʒdaːan qaːl saʶnaʶnðˤuʶrˤuʶ ʔaʶsˤdqt ʔam knt mn aːlkaːðbjn wanafsuhu ʔilajhi munqaaːdaaun saːmj ʔaːmn mn aʶːlˤχtˤrˤ waman d͡ʒaːʔa biaːlssajiʔiaai fakubbat wud͡ʒwhuhum fij aːlnnaːri hal tud͡ʒzawna ʔiillaː maː kuntum taʕmalwna ʔiinnahu kaːna laː juʔuminu biaːlllahi aʶːlˤʕaʶðˤjmiʶ ʔiinna aːlssaːʕaaa laʔaːtijaaun laː waðikraː likulli ʕabdin munjbin ʔaχbr saːmj ljlaː ʔannh aʶːntðˤrˤ ħjaːth kllhaː kj jqaːbl ftaːa mθlh stwaːd͡ʒh aːlʔaswʔ ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː ʔisʕaːfaːt ʔawlja kaːnt mlaːbs saːmj mlˤtˤtˤχaʶ bdm ljlaː qaaːluwaː aːlʔaːna d͡ʒiʔita biaːlħaqqi faðabaħuwhaaː wamaaː kaaːduwaː jafʕaluwna waqaaːla aːbnu sijrijna aːlkalaaːmu ʔaawsaʕu min ʔaan juʶsˤaʶrˤrˤaʶħaʶ fijhi biaːlkaðibi ħalabat aːlfataaːau aːlbaqaraaa kaːn saːmj mdrrsaː bwðjjaː waʶʕaʶðˤuʶmaʶ fijhaaː χaʶtˤaʶrˤuʶhuʶ aʶːlˤrˤjaʶːdˤaʶ d͡ʒjda lˤsˤħtk ʔataː saːmj ʔilaː aːlmsd͡ʒd qbl aːlʔaðaːn waaːlrrahbaaa takuffu ʕan aʶːlˤmaʶʕsˤiʶjaʶaʶiʶ jrjd saːmj ʔan jtqddm fj ħjaːth fabalaʁa ðalika muʕaaːwijaaa faqaaːla faʔaammaaː aːlfitnaau fij aːlʔaaʁlabi faʶtuʶħiʶjtˤuʶ biʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶhaʶaʶː laː jmknnj ʔan ʔansaː aːljwm aːlðj qaːblth fjh wkwnwaː mʕ aʶːlˤsˤaʶːdqjn χrbʃwaː fj kraːsj θm qjl lhm ʔajn maː kntm tʃrkwn ʔaallaaː tattabiʕani ʔaʶaʶfaʶʕaʶsˤaʶjtaʶ ʔaamrij waaːðkur ʕibaaːdanaaː ʔiibraaːhijma waʔiisħaaːqa wajaʕquwba ʔauwlij aːlʔaajdij waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶ hllaː ʔaqrrt aːqtraːħj wlaː nklf nfsaː ʔilaː wsʕhaː wldjnaː ktaːb jntˤq baːlħq whm laː jðˤlˤmwn qd sˤdqt aːlrʔujaː ʔinaː kðlk nd͡ʒzj aːlmħsnjn ʔaqddr nsˤjħtk d͡ʒdaːan wlqd sˤrˤfnaʶː fj hðaː aːlqrʔaːn ljðkrwaː wmaː jzjdhm ʔilaː nfwraː dʕnaː nnhj aʶːlˤwðˤjfaʶ fadaʕaaː rabbahu ʔaannij maʁluwbun faʶaʶːntaʶsˤiʶrˤ ql ʔinmaː ʔadʕw rbj wlaː ʔaʃrk bh ʔaħdaː ʔanaː bʔaħsn aːlðj kaːnwaː jʕmlwn maː hw d͡ʒjd lk d͡ʒjd lj ʔaʶjdˤaʶː hðaː aːlʃaːj d͡ʒjd tˤrˤʔaʶt kθjr mn aːltʁjraːt ʕlaː aːlmd͡ʒtmʕ mʔuχranaː hðaː bjaːn llnaːs whdaː wmwʕðˤaʶ llmtqjn ʔillaaː ʔaasaaːʔa aːlʕamala libuʕdi himmatihi ʔaʶsˤħjħ ʔan aːlʔawrwbjjn laː jstħmwn kl jwm nsbħ fj aːlbħr ðhb llmnzl ʕlj rd͡ʒlh waʕindahum qaʶaʶːsˤiʶrˤaʶaʶːtuʶ aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶrˤfiʶ ʕijnun kθjraːan maː tʃrb ʔaχtj aːlkbraː aːlʃaːj baːlħljb aʶːʕtˤnj frˤsˤaʶ ʔajn aːlqiʃda mtaː bdʔata draːsa aːllʁa aːlaːnd͡ʒljzja θumma ʔaadbara jasʕaaː waliðalika qijla aːlʕulamaaːʔu ʁurabaaːʔu likaθraai aːld͡ʒuhhaaːli hl ʔant daːʔimaː fj aːlmnzl fj aːlmsaːʔ ʔanti ʔimjlj naːdranaː maː jhdj zwd͡ʒth waʔiinna aːllaðijna laaː juʔuminuwna biaːlʔaːχiraai ʕani aʶːlˤsˤsˤiʶrˤaʶaʶːtˤiʶ lanaaːkibuwna lm jtwqf ʕn aʶːlˤdˤħk hðaː aːlmrʃħ lmd͡ʒls aːlmnʁwlja ʕlaː mwqʕ ttwjbaː ħtaː aːlʔaːn waqaaːla ʕijsaaː aːbnu marjama ʕalajhi aːlssalaaːmu aːlddunjaaː qaʶntˤaʶrˤaʶaʶuʶn faaːʕburuwhaaː walaaː taʕmuruwhaaː aːlnnaaːsu kulluhum ʕijaaːlu aːlllahi
