aʶːlˤtˤrˤq dʕnaː nnqsm fʔiðaː nfχ fj aʶːlˤsˤwrˤ flaː ʔansaːb bjnhm jwmʔið wlaː jtsaːʔlwn hl trjdjn mʃaːhda mqaːbla kra aːlqaːʕda ʕlaː aːltlfaːz ʔink ʕdaːʔij ʔaaw nurijannaka aːllaðij waʕadnaaːhum faʔiinnaaː ʕalajhim muqtadiruwna waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi ʃafijʕu aːlmuðnibi ʔiqraaːruhu watawbatuhu aːʕtiðaaːruhu ʔanti mnfʕla jaː wajlataː lajtanj lam ʔaattaχið fulaːnanaː χaljlanaː w ʔaχjraːan wsˤlˤnaʶː ʔilaː aːlqrja waʔiinnahu liħubbi aːlχajri laʃadjdun faʶaʶːsˤfaʶħ ʕanhum waqul salaːmun fasawfa jaʕlamwna faʶdˤlˤuʶ aːlʕilmi χajrun min faʶdˤlˤiʶ aːlʕibaaːdaai bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi waaːlfad͡ʒri waʔiin kaaːna kullun minhu kaθijranaː ʕaːda maː jsˤlˤlˤj saːmj sˤlˤaʶːaʶ aːlʕʃaːʔ qbjl ðhaːbh ʔilaː aːlnnwm ʔafrʁ d͡ʒjbk laː ʔaħd jnsaː bldj km ʕmrh ʕaːd ʔilaː aːlrrsm qaːlwaː subħaːnaka ʔaanta walijjunaː min dwnihim bal kaːnwaː jaʕbudwna aːld͡ʒinna ʔaakθaruhum bihim muʔuminwna faqaaːla jaaː rabbi law kaaːna lak ħimaaːrun laʕalafth maʕa ħimaaːrij wafiʕlu qalijli aːlχajri ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlˤuʶ min tarkihi aːlbrtqaːl jħtwj ʕlaː fjtaːmjn sj lqd ʔatʕbtnj hðh aːlrħla rʁm qsˤrˤ mdthaː ʔinna haðaaː aːlħaqqa θaqijlun marijjun aʶːlˤsˤbrˤ ʕnd aʶːlˤsˤdmaʶ aːlʔawlaː ʔaðl aːlbχl ʔaʕnaːq aːlrd͡ʒaːl walaaː tuʔuaaːχiðnij bimaaː jaquwluwna warutbaaan turtaqaaː faman kamulat fijhi fahuwa ʕanqaaːʔu muʁribin saːmj laː jħml msddsh mʕh ldjhaː aːbn jħbh aːld͡ʒmjʕ laaː juʕrafu aːld͡ʒawaaːdu ʔillaaː fij aːlʕusraai ʔinnhaː aːntkaːsa mrjra fij ʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶk liʔaanna aːlmazħa hazlun lqd qaːblnaː mdrrsnaː aːntʃr χbr ðlk hd͡ʒwm wabiʔiirʁaaːbihi ʔin danaaː ðj quwwaain ʕinda ðij aːlʕarʃi makjnin waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi maʃuwraau aːlmuʃfiqi aːlħaaːzimi ðˤaʶfaʶrˤuʶn wamaʃuwraau ʁajri aːlħaaːzimi χaʶtˤaʶrˤuʶn ʔiinnaː ʔaarsalnaː ʕalajhim ħaʶːsˤiʶbaʶnaʶː ʔiillaː ʔaːla lˤwtˤiʶn nad͡ʒd͡ʒajnaːhum bisaħarin ʔaʶðˤn ʔan ʔaʕjaːd aːlmjlaːd mhma hl bʔimkaːnk aːlttklm baːlbrtʁaːljja waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi laaː tamnaʕuwaː aːlʕilma ʔaaħadanaː faʔiinna aːlʕilma ʔaamnaʕu lid͡ʒaaːnibihi wamanaʕa ħusna ħaaːlihi waʶːsˤlˤ saːmj smaːʕ tlk aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤwaʶːt waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aʶːlˤfuʶsˤaʶħaʶaʶːʔiʶ quwwaau aːlminani min dˤaʶʕfiʶ aːlmunani ʕaːda maː jðkr mqwlaːt lʃjksbjr aːlmutaʕammiqu fij aːlʕilmi kaaːlssaaːbiħi fij aːlbaħri lajsa jaraaː ʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶnaʶː χajru aːlrrizqi maaː jakfij waχajru aːlððikri aːlχafijju walaaː ʔaan juʶʕaʶaʶːrˤiʶdˤaʶhuʶ fij ʔaamrihi fajuraddu maħruwmanaː masluwbanaː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi ʃarru aːlmaaːli maaː lazimak ʔiθmu maksabihi waħurimta ʔaad͡ʒra ʔinfaaːqihi aːlħaaːsidu muʶʁtaʶaʶːðˤuʶn ʕalaaː man laaː ðanba lahu hl jumknnj aːstʕaːra sjaːrtk lhðh aːlljla kullun jaraaː ʔaanna aːlʃʃabaaːba lahu fij kulli mablaʁi laððaain ʕuðraaː waliðalika qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi bʕdˤ aːlθʕaːbjn saːma kaːn saːmj jtħddθ mʕ ljlaː tˤwlˤ aːlbaːl jhdm aːld͡ʒbaːl waʃaaːwirhum fij aːlʔaamri laaː tukθir mina aʶːlˤdˤdˤaʶħiʶkiʶ kullu ʃajʔin jaħtaaːd͡ʒu ʔilaaː aːlʕaqli hl hðh sˤwrˤk wataaːbiʕanaː maħquwranaː wamaː huwa biqawli ʃaːʕirin qaljlanaː maː tuʔuminwna wabaʃʃiri aːlmuʔuminjna biʔaanna lahum mina aːlllahi faʶdˤlˤaʶnaʶː kabjranaː ʔaʶmdˤaʶː saːmj aːllljla fj aːlʕjaːda aːlħud͡ʒraau muʶðˤlˤiʶmaʶaʶuʶn wataʁajjuru zamaaːnihimaaː ðhb saːmj ʔilaː aːlqsm ʔiinnahu laqurʔaːnun karjmun ʔiʶsχaʶaʶːtˤuʶ aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː fij muʶʕaʶaʶːrˤaʶdˤaʶtiʶhiʶ baːlnsba lj fʔin klb saːmj jbdw bχjr ʕaːʃ saːmj ħjaːa nzjha mn ktb hðh aʶːlˤqsˤjdaʶ aʶːlˤtˤtˤiʶjaʶrˤaʶaʶuʶ wasuwʔu aʶːlˤðˤðˤaʶniʶ waʶʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlˤuʶhaʶaʶː ʕilmu aːlddijni ntfaːʔil bh ʔaaʔiiðaː kunnaː ʕiʶðˤaʶːmaʶnaʶː naχiraaan ðˤlˤm aːlʔaqaːrb ʔaʃd wqʕaː mn aːlsjf waljaʕlam ʔaannahu min fuʶrˤaʶsˤiʶ zamaaːnihi mʕlwm ʔann ljlaː lm tstħqq ʔan tmwt bhðh aʶːlˤtˤtˤrˤjqaʶ aʶːlˤfðˤjʕaʶ lm jstħqq saːmj ʔan jmwt bhðh aʶːlˤtˤtˤrˤjqaʶ aʶːlˤfðˤjʕaʶ jawma naqwlu lid͡ʒahannama hali aːmtalaʔati wataqwlu hal min mazjdin waʔiiðaaː aːustuʃirta falaaː tuʕad͡ʒd͡ʒil ħattaaː taʶnðˤuʶrˤaʶ kaːnt ljlaː fj wdˤʕ χtˤjrˤ wakaaːda aːlħasadu ʔaan jaʁliba aːlqadara aʶːttsˤlˤ saːmj bsˤdjq kj jqllh laaː taħmilanna ʕalaaː jawmik hamma ʁadik wawaʕada bihi min taʔajijdihi tlʕb aːltns kl jwm lm ʔaʕrf kjf ʔad͡ʒjb ʕlaː sʔuaːlh man ʔaakθara min ðikri aːlmawti rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ min aːlddunjaaː biaːljasijri maː aːlðj d͡ʒaːʔ bk ʔilaː hnaː waʔiinna aːlfud͡ʒd͡ʒaːra lafj d͡ʒaħjmin waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu aːlħasani liaːbnihi muħammadin jaː lk mn wʁd waʔaaχlaaːqin mursalaain aːbqa mkaːnk ʔanaː ʔaʶttsˤlˤ bsjjaːra ʔisʕaːf jbdw saːmj mθlki fad͡ʒaʕalnaːhum salafanaː wamaθalanaː lilʔaːχirjna hl stlʕb mʕj fatabassama rasuwlu aːlllahi sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama waqaaːla ħukija ʔaanna aːlmuʔuabbaðu samiʕa dˤaʶħiʶkaʶ aːlχaddaaːmi fij qaːla rabbj ʔaaʕlamu bimaː taʕmalwna ln jmssnj ʔaħd ʔaʶʕtˤaʶː saːmj ljlaː ħqna ʔaraːd twm ʔan tʕrf aːlmuʔuminu jaʶʁbiʶtˤuʶ waaːlmunaaːfiqu jaħsudu waqaaːla ʕijsaaː aːbnu kaaːallaðij ħukija ʕan aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶsˤmaʶʕiʶjjiʶ ʔaanna aːlrraʃijda saʔaalahu jawmanaː ʕan ʔaansaaːbi baʶʕdˤiʶ aːlʕarabi faqaaːla walilʔiiʕd͡ʒaaːbi mubaaːjinanaː waaːljasijri aːlttaaːfihi min sˤiʶjaʶaʶːnaʶaʶiʶ aːlssaaːʔiilijna tħjaː aːlmlka lqd bdʔa saːmj ħjaːth llttw lˤiʶlˤtˤtˤaʶaʶːwuʶwsiʶ rijʃun d͡ʒamijlun lqd aːntht ħjaːa saːmj ʔaaw χaaːmarahu fijhaaː wahmun lm ʔanaː mwd͡ʒwd waʶʔaʶaʶʕðˤaʶmuʶ ʁararanaː tʕrrf saːmj ʕlaː ðlk aːlsslaːħ jmkn ltwm ʔan jqwl ʃjʔiaː mn ʔajn aːbtkr hðaː aːlħasadu jaʔakulu aːlħasanaaːti kamaaː taʔakulu aːlnnaaːru aʶːlˤħaʶtˤaʶbaʶ saːmj mdrrsnaː fj aʶːlˤrˤrˤjaʶːdˤaʶ knt ʔatsaːʔil sjtχrd͡ʒ twm fj ʔaktwbr mn jrjd ʔijðaːʔ saːmj jχtˤtˤtˤ saːmj ʔan jtzwwd͡ʒ fwr maː jtχrrd͡ʒ mn aːlθθaːnwja ʃʁʁl saːmj d͡ʒhaːz aːlʔinðaːr waqillaau muʶχaʶaʶːlˤaʶtˤaʶaʶiʶ aːlʔaakfaaːʔi waʶʔaʶaʶmtˤaʶrˤnaʶː ʕalajhim maʶtˤaʶrˤaʶnaʶː fasaːʔa maʶtˤaʶrˤuʶ aːlmunðarjna ʔiinnahum kaːnwaː laː jard͡ʒwna ħisaːbanaː faʔiin kaaːna lahu takallama waʔiin kaaːna qabbaħahu aːlllahu ʔaatarawnahu law zaaːduwhu faʕala waʕazalahu kaːn faʶːdˤlˤ fj ħfl tbdw hðh aːlllʕba χtˤjrˤaʶ nwʕaː maː ʔinna lillahi taʕaaːlaaː fij ʔaaθnaaːʔi kulli miħnaain minħaaun ʔinnamaaː ʔauθijbu kulla ʔinsaaːnin ʕalaaː qadri ʕaqlihi lima tuħibbu aːlddaraaːhima wahija tudijnuk min aːlddunjaaː faqaaːla mawʕiduk aːld͡ʒannaau zħf saːmj ʕbr naːfðth lm jkn ʕnd saːmj ʔaħd aʶːlˤʕaʶðˤjmuʶ hunaːlika aːbtulija aːlmuʔuminwna wazulzilwaː zilzaːlanaː ʃadjdanaː wakaðalika qaaːla aːlnnabiju walajsa ʔilaaː maaː juksibuhu aːlkibru min aːlmaqti ħaddun lqd qddm tstqaːlth qbl ʔakθr mn ʃhr sˤaʶħiʶjħaʶnaʶː lak waaːlθθaaːnij kaffu aːlllisaaːni ʕan aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶʕrˤaʶaʶːdˤiʶ waðarijʕaaun ʔilaaː ʔinkaaːrihi ʔajn snʔakl falaː ʔauqsimu biaːlʃʃafaqi mn aʶːlˤsˤʕb bmkaːn ʔan jsˤddq aːlnaːs sbb qtl bʕdˤ aːlʔamhaːt ʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤhn ʔilaː ʔanhaː aːlħqjqa ʔaknt mʕ ʔaħd qddm saːmj ljlaː lˤtˤaʶːlˤb mslm maː sbb ʁdˤbhn ʔinħnt ʔinna aːlllaha juħibbu aːlħalijma aːlħajijja samiʕtuhu jaquwlu aːnaː twm huwa aːllaðj juħjj wajumjtu faʔiiðaː qaʶdˤaʶː ʔaamranaː faʔiinnamaː jaqwlu lahu kun fajakwnu waħiljaaun zajjana aːlllahu bihaaː ʕaʶwaʶaʶːtˤiʶlˤaʶ aːlʔaaħsaaːbi hl aːldjaːnaːt ʔilaːhja ʔam χlq aːlʔinsaːn ʔaraːd saːmj qraːʔa tlk aːlrrsaːla aːlnnaaːsu θalaaːθaau ʔaʶaʶsˤnaʶaʶːfiʶn qlt lh ʔinnnj mʕ twm wamaː ʔaarsalnaːka ʔiillaː mubaʃʃiranaː wanaðjranaː faʔiiðaaː ʕalimt maaː d͡ʒahilt smʕ saːmj dˤd͡ʒd͡ʒaʶ maː lknnh lm jkn mtʔakkdaː mn tˤbjʕthaʶː waʔaakθaru tad͡ʒribaaan draːd͡ʒth zrqaːʔ qrʕ saːmj ʕlaː baːb ljlaː w lm tstd͡ʒb ldaː maːrj ʃχsˤjjaʶ qwjja lm tkn mfaːd͡ʒʔaa waʔiiðaaː aːld͡ʒibaːlu sujjirat θumma tawallajtum ʔiillaaː qalijlanaː minkum waʔaantum muʶʕrˤiʶdˤuʶwnaʶ mdrrsj jkrhnaː ʔatʕlmjn ʔilaː ʔajn aːntql faʃaːribwna ʃurba aːlhjmi kaːn saːmj jstmʕ lmwsjqaː aːlrrwk aːlmsjħjja lm hðaː mhm waʔauzlifati aːld͡ʒannaau lilmuttaqjna waʕalaaː qadri aːlʕinaaːjaai bihi jakuwnu aːd͡ʒtinaaːʔu θamaratihi lˤlˤsˤdq wd͡ʒh waːħd wllkðb ʔalf wd͡ʒh waʔaːχira maaː nazala min aːlttawraaːai ʔiðaaː lam tastaħi faʶaʶːsˤnaʶʕ maaː ʃiʔit waʔiin kaaːna naʶðˤiʶjrˤiʶj taʶfaʶdˤdˤaʶlˤt ʕalajhi waaːlnnifaaːqu luʔumun ðhb saːmj lˤħdˤwrˤ aːlddrs waaːlllahu χalaqakum wamaː taʕmalwna waaːlnnaaːsu minhu fij salaaːmaain ʔaqnʕth ʔanh kaːn mχtˤʔiʶaʶː faʔaabdaaː sˤaʶfħaʶaʶaʶ ʕuquwqihi jqjs ħraːrth ʔaħbbnj aːlmdrrs tʕrf ʔann d͡ʒwn kaːn jħbhaː lm jkn ʕnd saːmj ʔajj sˤdjq jmlk sjjaːra ʔaːnðaːk waʔaammaaː aʶːlˤħiʶrˤsˤuʶ fajaslubu faʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤaʶ aːlnnafsi tzwwd͡ʒti twm mn ʔad͡ʒl maːlh fqtˤ qaːm mdjr mdrstj btˤrˤd ðlk aːlmdrrs mn aːlmdrsa waʶtaʶdˤħaʶkwnaʶ walaː tabkwna kaːn saːmj jntðˤrˤ fqtˤ wafamu aːld͡ʒaaːhili muʶtˤlˤaʶquʶn kullamaaː ʃaaːʔa ʔaʶaʶtˤlˤaʶqaʶ biʔisamaaː aːʃtarawaː bihi ʔaanfusahum ʔaan jakfuruwaː bimaaː ʔaanzala aːlllahu baʁjanaː kaːn aːld͡ʒmjʕ jʕlm ʔann saːmj kaːn fj aːlʕjaːda waʔiinnamaaː jaʶχtaʶsˤsˤuʶ biħasadi min ʕalaaː ʔaħbk ʔaktb rsaːla bali aːlssaːʕaau mawʕiduhum waaːlssaːʕaau ʔaadhaː waʔaamarru ħasaraaːtu aːlħasadi wasaqaaːmu aːld͡ʒasadi θumma aʶːnsˤaʶrˤaʶfaʶ masruwranaː liʔaannahaaː χiʶsˤaʶaʶːlˤuʶn murakkabaaun min aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ falaaː jaħmilannaka ðalika ʕalaaː aːlrraʁbaai fij aːld͡ʒahli qddm saːmj qrˤsˤaʶː lljlaː lijakuwna lahu maʕa tablijʁi aːlrrisaaːlaai ðˤuʶhuʶwrˤuʶ aʶːlˤiʶaʶːχtiʶsˤaʶaʶːsˤiʶ bihi wamanzilaau aʶːlˤttaʶfwiʶjdˤiʶ ʔilajhi laː ʔaʶðˤn ʔan twm bmzaːd͡ʒ aːlʕml ħaːljaː jbjn aʶːlˤwdˤʕ fj ʔafʁaːnstaːn ʔahdaːf ʔamrjkaː wħaːd͡ʒtnaː ʔilaː aːlʕml aːlmʃtrk fawarabbi aːlssamaːʔi waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ʔiinnahu laħaqqun miθla maː ʔaannakum taʶntˤiʶqwnaʶ ʔaqbħ mn χnzjr ʔalħħ saːmj ʕlaː aːlʔamr wahuwa min nafsihi fij ʕanaaːʔin ʔijjaaːkum wataħkijma aːlʃʃahawaaːti ʕalaaː ʔaanfusikum faʔiinna ʕaaːd͡ʒilahaaː ðamijmun ʔarsl ħkjmaː wlaː twsˤh lmaːðaː tχllaː saːmj ʕnnj ʔarfʕ mn aːlsmaːʔ waðalika faʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶuʶn hw fj aːlχdma ʔaʶfdˤdˤlˤ ʔan ʔamwt bdlaː mn ʔan ʔaʶmdˤj ħjaːtj kllhaː mʕk ʕalaaː qadri aːlmaʁaaːrisi jakuwnu aːd͡ʒtinaaːʔu aːlʁaaːrisi hj mdrrstnaː fj aːlʕrbjja ʔaatard͡ʒuw ʔaan tasuwda bilaaː ʕanaaːʔin wakajfa jasuwdu ðuw aʶːlˤʔaʶχdˤrˤ mbaːrk liʔaanna suʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːnaʶ aːlhawaaː qawijjun waχuð bijadika dˤiʶʁθaʶnaʶː faʶaʶːdˤrˤiʶb bihi walaː taħnaθ ʔiinnaː wad͡ʒadnaːhu sˤaʶːbiʶrˤaʶnaʶː niʕma aːlʕabdu ʔiinnahu ʔaawwaːbun aːlrraħjmu hl jsˤdq ʔaħd twm fʕlaː wakilaaːhumaaː maðmuwmun wahuwa fijhimaaː maluwmun ʕan ʕaaːʔiiʃaaa rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhaaː qaaːlat maʕa ʔaanna aʶːlˤħaʶrˤiʶjsˤaʶ laaː jastazijdu biʶħiʶrˤsˤiʶhiʶ aʶːlˤmaʶntˤiʶqiʶ walahaaː aːlnnaaːsa ʕan maħaaːsini faʶdˤlˤiʶhiʶ bimusaaːwij ʔaadabihi jasʔaaluhu man fij aːlssamaːwaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ kulla jawmin huwa fj ʃaʔanin kamaaː qaaːla ʔaakθamu bnu bazard͡ʒamharu fajawmaʔiiðin laː jusʔaalu ʕan ðanbihi ʔiinsun walaː d͡ʒaːnnun fatuðʕinu liruʃdihaaː waʔaaðinat lirabbihaː waħuqqat aʶːlˤmaʶtˤaʶrˤuʶ kaθijrun waʶaʶːdˤrˤiʶb fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ʕawdanaː wabadʔanaː ħtaː wʔin ʔardnaː aːlqjaːm bðlk fljs ldjnaː wqt jlʕb aːlʔawlaːd baːllʕb hl ðhb faʶːdˤlˤ ʔilaː aːlmstʃfaː man ʕamila fij aːlssiri ʕamalanaː jastaħij minhu fij aːlʕalaaːnijaai falajsa linafsihi ʕindahu qadrun walajsa man ʔaamkanahu ʃajʔun min ðaaːtihi kaman aːstawd͡ʒabahu biʔaːlatihi waʔaadawaaːtihi ʔanaː laː ʔanwj mqaːblth tʕrrf faʶːdˤlˤ ʕlaː ljlaː baːlkaːd faliðalika ʔaaʕwaza aːstijfaaːʔu ʃuʶrˤuʶwtˤiʶhaʶaʶː ʔilaaː d͡ʒumalin jatanabbahu aʶːlˤfaʶaʶːdˤiʶlˤuʶ ʕalajhaaː biʶjaʶqiʶðˤaʶtiʶhiʶ ʕaːd saːmj ʔilaː ʕaːdaːth aːlqdjma jaaː bunajja ʔiðaaː aːustuʃhidta faaːʃhad swf ʔad͡ʒʕlh knt tfʕlh waaːlttad͡ʒaaːwuzu ʕanhum waʶaʶːlˤttaʶʕaʶrˤuʶdˤiʶ liaːktisaaːbi aːlttabiʕaaːti kjf kaːnt ʔad͡ʒwaːʔ aːlmdrsa ʔiʃtrjtu mzhrjaan zd͡ʒaːd͡ʒjaan raːħt aːlskra wd͡ʒaːʔt aːlfkra ʔajn twnj ʔaaw qubħa hid͡ʒaaːʔin muʶmdˤiʶn hw fχwr baːbnh saːmj jbħθ ʕn aːlssʕaːda waʕan θawaaːbihi jarʁabuwna waqaaːla aːlʃʃaaːʕiru waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ ʃuʕaraaːʔi huðajlin χaːn faʶːdˤlˤ ħbjbth ʔaalaː jaʕlamu man χalaqa wahuwa aʶːlˤlˤlˤaʶtˤjfuʶ aːlχabjru walaaː jastankifu mimmaaː muniʕa ʔajmknnj aːldfʕ ʕn tˤrˤjq btˤaʶːqaʶ aːlʔiʔitmaːn ʔaqll tˤʕaʶːmk td͡ʒd mnaːmk waman ʔaafʃaaːhu kaaːna aːlχijaaːru ʕalajhi laː maʶqtˤwʕaʶaʶiʶn walaː mamnwʕaain hlaː ʔamskt bhðaː mn fdˤlˤk faqad jadʕuw ʔilaaː ðalika ʔaarbaʕaau ʔaasbaaːbin jasbaħu aːlʔaawlaːadu fij aːlbiħaːri kaːn saːmj jsˤaʶːħb ʔaʶʃχaʶːsˤaʶː χtˤjrˤjn waʶaʶːlˤmaʶwdˤuʶwʕiʶ min aʶːsˤtˤiʶlˤaʶaʶːħiʶ ʕaʶsˤrˤiʶhiʶ kaððabat qawmu nwħin aːlmursaljna klaːm kaːlʕsl wwʁzun kaːlʔasl ʕlaː saːmj tnðˤjf hðh aʶːlˤfwdˤaʶː waraħimak biħusni ðˤaʶfaʶrˤiʶhiʶ ʕljj ʔan ʔaʶdˤmmd d͡ʒrħ aʶːlˤħsˤaʶːn ħdθ aːlʔamr ðaːth jwm aːlʔiθnjn litatimma aːlssaʕaaːdaau wataʕumma aʶːlˤmaʶsˤlˤaʶħaʶaʶuʶ aːlθθijaaːba aːllatij tasturu ʕawraaːtikum kaːn saːmj jntðˤrˤ aːstdʕaːʔh tχrrd͡ʒ saːmj mn aːlmʕhd w kaːn aːlʔawwl fj qsmh mʕ mn tðˤn ʔanhaː tskn ʔaaw niʕmaain taðkuruhaaː wakajfa jakuwnu ʕaaːranaː maaː ʔaaddaaː ʔilaaː sˤaʶwaʶaʶːbiʶn waʶsˤaʶddaʶ ʕan χaʶtˤaʶʔaʶiʶn faʔiiðaaː tawaaːtara aʶːlˤfaʶdˤlˤuʶ ʕalajhi sˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ aʶːlˤnnaʶqsˤuʶ fijmaaː siwaaːhu waaːlrraaːbiʕu huwa χaʃjaau aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː wahuwa qawlu ʕurwaaa bni aːlzzubajri ʔaalam jaʕlam biʔaanna aːlllaha jaraː liʔaanna aːlkibra jakuwnu biaːlmanzilaai ħukija ʕan θaʕlabin qaaːla aːlaː mtaː snqf mktwfaː aːlaːjdaː mn aːlʔard͡ʒħ ʔan jnswaː wʕwdhm waliðalika dˤaʶrˤaʶbaʶ aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː bihi aːlmaθala faqaaːla waaːlʔiiħsaaːna ʔaan takuwna sarijratuhu ʔaaħsana min ʕalaaːnijatihi aːntbh waqad aːχtalafa ʔaahlu aːlttaʔawijli fij qawlh taʕaaːlaaː walaaː jakmulu ʔillaaː maʕahaaː jaː lh mn klb kbjr walikulli ʕilmin minhaaː faʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶuʶn ttklm maːrjkw aːlʔind͡ʒljzja btˤlˤaʶːqaʶ aːlħaaːd͡ʒaau ʔilaaː aːlʕaqli ʔaaqbaħu min aːlħaaːd͡ʒaai ʔilaaː aːlmaaːli jasurrunij ʔaan taʶħdˤuʶrˤaʶ ʕlaː rʔash rjʃa lmaːðaː aːbtlʕt tlk aʶːlˤʔaʶqrˤaʶːsˤ jbdw saːmj mθlk dχl aːlʁrfa bʕd χrwd͡ʒk ttraːwħ drd͡ʒa aːlħraːra fj aʶːlˤsˤjf mn θlaːθjn ʔilaː ʔarbʕjn drd͡ʒa ʕaːd ʔilaː mwqf aːlssjaːraːt ʕaːd mn mwqf aːlssjaːraːt ttklm w kʔank rʔijs ʕmlnaː ʔaʶðˤn ʔannaː tħaːdθnaː ʕbr aːlhaːtf ʔiinnaː sanulqj ʕalajka qawlanaː θaqjlanaː laː tql ðlk kaːn saːmj jʕtqd ʔann md͡ʒjdaː kaːn thdjdaː χtˤjrˤaʶː lħjaːth rabbi nad͡ʒd͡ʒinj waʔaahlj mimmaː jaʕmalwna bdʔa saːmj jmdˤj wqtaː ʔakθr mʕ ljlaː km ʔasrrtnj rʔuja twm ʔid͡ʒlsj jaː kjt jawma jafirru aːlmarʔu min ʔaaχjhi ʕnd d͡ʒuhajnaaa aːlχbr aːljqjn kl maː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ fʕlh hw aʶːlˤʔiʶntðˤaʶːrˤ ʔarsl saːmj rsaːla lljlaː wmaː ʔabrʔi nfsj hl sjkwn hnaːk ʔaħd baʶːntðˤaʶːrˤj laː tns ʔan tʔaχð ʔaʶʁrˤaʶːdˤk mʕk hw dˤdd hðh aːlmbaːdra qul ʔiinnamaː ʔaanaː munðirun wamaː min ʔiilhin ʔiillaaː aːlllahu aːlwaːħidu aːlqahhaːru ðhb saːmj lˤaʶːsˤtˤħaʶːb ʔaχth mn aːlmdrsa lj sˤdjq ʔabaːh mmθl mʃhwr waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi min kamaaːli ʕaqlik aʶːstiʶðˤhaʶaʶːrˤuʶk ʕalaaː ʕaqlik dʕaː saːmj ljlaː lˤqdˤaʶːʔ aːllljl mʕh man taraaː ʔaan nuwallijahu ħiʶmsˤaʶ faqaaːla maaː aːlqaːriʕaau maː lakum kajfa taħkumwna ʔaħb aːlmfaːd͡ʒʔiaːt wataraka zijnaaa aːlddunjaaː mlʔa saːmj kʔasaː bmdˤaʶːd aːlttd͡ʒmd saːmj jħbb aːlddraːsa ʕlm saːmj ʔann ljlaː lm tkn tħbbh walalkaffu ʕan ʃatmi aːlllaʔiijmi takarrumanaː ʔaʶaʶdˤaʶrˤrˤuʶ lahu min ʃatmihi ħijna jaʃtumu lqd kðb saːmj aːʕtðr saːmj bʔimkaːnk hdm d͡ʒbl wlkn ljs bʔimkaːnk ʔiχfaːʔ aʶːlˤħtˤaʶːm aʶːiʶqtˤʕ aːlkʕka baːlskjn walaaː lˤiʶrˤiʶdˤaʶaʶːhuʶ ʁaaːjaaun liʔaannahum lammaaː lam tastaqirra bihim daaːrun ʔaːkl mn ħwt waðahaba ʔaːχaruwna ʔilaaː wud͡ʒuwbi ðalika biaːlʃʃarʕi duwna aːlʕaqli smn ʕlaː ʕsl χalaqa aːlʔiinsaːna min ʕalaqin fjhaː faːkihaaun waaːlnnaχlu ðaːtu aːlʔaakmaːmi saːmj ftaː mn aːlrrjf aːdχl ʔilaː ðlk aːld͡ʒħr saːmj jħbb aːlθθld͡ʒ ʕalimt maaː raʔaajt ðhb ʔilaː aːlmħl aːltd͡ʒaːrj aːlktaːb jqrʔa mn ʕnwaːnh fajamnaʕahum min taslijmi aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶwaʶaʶːbiʶ lˤiʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶhiʶ waʔaand͡ʒajnaː mwsaː waman maʕahu ʔaad͡ʒmaʕjna waħukija ʕan ʔaabij sˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħiʶ bni ħassaaːna ʔaqnʕ saːmj ljlaː kj tħdˤrˤ lh slaːħaː naːrjjaː waʔiitjaaːna aːlqurabi faʔiinna aʶːtˤtˤiʶrˤaʶaʶːħaʶ muraaːʕaaːtihaaː watarka tafaqqudihaaː mahaaːnaaun waðullun sjtzwd͡ʒ twm ʔaχjraː jusrid͡ʒu aːlχaaːdimu aʶːlˤħiʶsˤaʶaʶːnaʶ lʔad͡ʒl aːld͡ʒħjm aːbq bʕjdaː ʕnj fahaðihi aːlħaaːlaau ʔaʶaʶtˤaʶmmuʶ aːlʕujuwnu maʶsˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶduʶ aʶːlˤʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːniʶ bʔimkaːnh aːlaːstraːħa tilka aːlddaːru aːlʔaːχiraau nad͡ʒʕaluhaː lillaðjna laː jurjdwna ʕuluwwanaː fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ walaː fasaːdanaː waaːlʕaːqibaau lilmuttaqjna ʕndmaː tkwn fj rwmaː tsˤrˤf kmaː jtsˤrˤf aːlrwmaːn lqd lʕb saːmj waʶaʶːlˤnnaʶːʃiʶtˤaʶːtiʶ naʶʃtˤaʶnaʶː kaːnt ljlaː tstħqq ʔan tkwn sʕjda fajakuwnu taaːraaan kasalanaː aːstʁll d͡ʒwn dˤʕf bjl lima lam tʔakl ħlwaːk waʔaanna aːlʕaqla fij aːlddijni ʔaʶaʶsˤlˤuʶn qaːl saːmj ʔannh lm jkn jʕjʃ hnaːk ʔaħd hw ʔamjn sˤndwq d͡ʒmʕjtnaː ʕan ʔaaʕmaaːmihi waʔaad͡ʒdaaːdihi ʔanaː ʔaʶjdˤaʶː knt mdrrsaː waaːliaːstimdaaːdu bihaaː ʔaaʕammu nafʕanaː walikulli binaaːʔin ʔaussun kaːn saːmj jtlˤffðˤ ʔanfaːsh ʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶrˤaʶ aːlrrad͡ʒulu aːlhilaːala famaː tanfaʕuhum ʃafaːʕaau aːlʃʃaːfiʕjna waaːntiqaaːmu ʔaahli aːlʁawʁaaːʔi kullu maʕruwfin sˤaʶdaʶqaʶaʶuʶn lm tkn tʕlm ʔajn kaːnt ʔiin tubdwaː ʃajʔianaː ʔaaw tuχfwhu faʔiinna aːlllaha kaːna bikulli ʃajʔin ʕaljmanaː laː td͡ʒlb lj zhwraː bʕd aːlʔaːn mtaː tlʕb aːltns θumma radadnaːhu ʔaasfala saːfiljna sˤfʕt ljlaː wd͡ʒh saːmj bqwwa aːlʕql sˤdq aːlħkm ʕlaː aːlʔamwr saʔaaʕtaaːdu aːlttabkijra fij aːlnnawmi ʔiiðan jaʶsˤiʶħħaʶ badanuka ʁjjr saːmj rʔajh bχsˤwsˤ aːlmslmjn aʶːlˤdˤmjrˤ sˤwt haːdaːʔ jχbrk bʔan ʔaħdaːan jnðˤrˤ ʔiljk aːlʕtaːb hdja aːlʔaħbaːb laː tns trk ʔikraːmjja lm ʔaʕrf ʔannki hnaː aːntht ʔaːmaːl saːmj bʃkl nhaːʔijj ʔiiðaː massahu aːlʃʃaru d͡ʒazwʕanaː aːlhawaaː maʶtˤiʶjjaʶaʶuʶ aːlfitnaai juħibbu aːlnnaaːsu aːlħaːkima aːlʕaaːdila χtˤʔaʶ walajsa fij muqaaːbalaai haðajni ħaaːd͡ʒaaun daaːʕijaaun walaaː nafʕun mard͡ʒuwwun waʶfaʶdˤlˤuʶ maaː bajna aːlʔaamrajni waʕaraaː ʕan aːmtinaaːnin wanaʃrin jaqwlwna ʔaaʔiinnaː lamardwdwna fij aːlħaːfiraai kaːnt lsaːmj aːlkθjr mn aʶːlˤχsˤaʶːlˤ aʶːlˤtˤtˤjbaʶ fatawalla ʕanhum ħattaː ħjnin laː ttdχl liʔaanna ʁuruwra aːlhawaaː wanaaːziʕa aːlʃʃahwaai jaʶsˤrˤiʶfaʶaʶːniʶ aːlnnafsa ʔaan tarkaba aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlˤaʶ min χalaaːʔiiqihaaː ʔaan jaχtabira ʔaumuwra zamaaːnihi ʕljk ʔan tʕml bd͡ʒdd aʶːħtfðˤ saːmj brsaːla ljlaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤwtjaʶ kaːn saːmj jtsˤrˤrˤf hkðaː qzm waːqf χjr mn ʕmlaːq raːkʕ wahadajnaːhu aːlnnad͡ʒdajni aːlʕiffaau fij aːlddijni wajuballiʁu ħaaːd͡ʒatak faðalika sˤaʶrˤiʶjħuʶ aːllluʔumi waʶmaʶħdˤuʶ aːlddanaaːʔaai kaːn aːlmdrrs jħbbnj mn aʶːlˤsˤsˤʕb nsjaːn maː ħdθ faqaaːla muʕaaːwijaau faʔaawwalu ʔaaqsaaːmihi waʔaawlaaːhaaː wajabʕaθu ʕalaaː aʶːlˤttaʶwaʶrˤuʶtˤiʶ fij aːlʃʃubuhaaːti waʶsˤaʶniʶjʕuʶk ʕindahum zaaːkijanaː aːlklaːm jʃbh aːlnħl fjh aːlʕsl waːlʔibr qutila aːlʔiinsaːnu maː ʔaakfarahu tˤfħ aːlkjl faʔiinnahu laaː juslamu min ʕawaaːqibi ʃarrihi taːd͡ʒ aʶːlˤqjsˤrˤ laː jmkn ʔan jħmjh mn aʶːlˤsˤdaʶːʕ waaːʕlam ʔaanna lilkalaaːmi ʔaːdaaːbanaː ʔin ʔaaʁfalahaaː aːlmutakallimu ʔaaðhaba rawnaqa kalaaːmihi aːstʔad͡ʒr mħaːmj saːmj tˤbjbaʶː ʃrʕjjaː lasta ʕalajhim biʶmuʶsˤaʶjtˤiʶrˤiʶn faqad malakahaaː baʕda ʔaan kaaːna fij milkihaaː qddm saːmj kʔasaː lljlj ljs kl ʔaʶbjdˤ tˤħjnaʶːaʶn jsˤsˤlˤj aːlmslmwn daːʔimaː w hm mtwd͡ʒd͡ʒhwn nħw aːlkʕba waaːlʔaadabu maaːlun laaː χawfa ʕalajhi aʶːlˤtˤaʶːʔiʶrˤaʶ tħtˤ kaːn saːmj jχtˤtˤtˤ lʔinhaːʔ ħjaːa ljlaː ʔiinnahum jakjdwna kajdanaː ðhbt ʔaχtj ʔilaː kwbj baːlʔams lm jtsˤwwrˤ saːmj ʔan jnhj ħjaːth hkðaː waqad jataʕallaqu biaːlddijni ʕuluwmun qad bajjana aːlʃʃaaːfiʕiju faʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶaʶ kulli waaːħidin minhaaː faqaaːla aːllaðj jaraːka ħjna taqwmu dʕ tʕaːljqk aʶːlˤʕnsˤrˤjjaʶ lnfsk saːmj jħbb kra aːlqdm qnaːʕtk nsˤf sʕaːdtk θumma laaː janbaʁij ʔaan jabtadiʔiahu ʔillaaː baʕda aːliaːstidʕaaːʔi ʔaraːd saːmj mʕrfa kjfjja ʔadaːʔ aːlttjmm ʕddhm kbjr waʔiin ʔauhmilat ʔaasqamat θumma ʔaatlafat waaːd͡ʒtanib ʔaahlahumaaː jsˤdrˤ hðaː aʶːlˤmsˤbaʶːħ dˤwʔaʶː saʶːtˤʕaʶː ʔaantum ʕanhu muʶʕrˤiʶdˤwnaʶ qaːlt aʶːlˤʃʃrˤtˤaʶ ʔannh ʕljnaː ʔan ntˤlˤq aːlnnaːr ʕlaː ðlk aːlklb fwr maː rʔajnaːh qaːl saːmj hðaː lʔiħdaː aʶːlˤmmrˤrˤdˤaʶːt waʔiinnamaaː justaʁrabu mimman jald͡ʒaʔau ʔilaaː χaʶaʶːtˤiʶrˤiʶhiʶ wajuʕawwilu ʕalaaː badijhatihi ʔiillaː ʕibaːda aːlllahi aʶːlˤmuʶχlˤaʶsˤjnaʶ qaːmt aʶːlˤʃʃrˤtˤaʶ btʕqqb faʶːdˤlˤ maːtt ʔamj fj ʁjaːbj ʔinna ʔaabaaːk ʔaakala min ħalaaːwatihim faʶħaʶtˤtˤaʶ fij ʔaahwaaːʔiihim waaːlllaʔiijmu jad͡ʒtadij biaːlmahaaːnaai waaːlʕunfi sʔaqrʔa lki kffki ʔaqll saːmj msaːfr ʔawtwstwb bl w sʔalnj ʔaʶjdˤaʶː ʔin knt raːʁba fj aːlzzwaːd͡ʒ mnh waqaaːla ʕumaru bnu ʕabdi aːlʕazijzi walaqad taraknaːhaː ʔaːjaaan fahal min muddakirin ʔaani aːʕbuduwaː aːlllaha waaːttaqwhu waʶʔaʶaʶtˤjʕwniʶ snrsl lk sˤwrˤaʶː lqd wsˤlˤ aːlssjd baːkr waaːlʕamala bihi aʶːdˤtˤiʶrˤaʶaʶːrˤuʶn wanad͡ʒd͡ʒajnaːhu waʔaahlahu mina aːlkarbi aʶːlˤʕaʶðˤjmiʶ laqad wuʕidnaː hðaː naħnu waʔaːbaːʔuunaː min qablu ʔiin hðaː ʔiillaː ʔaʶaʶsaʶːtˤjrˤuʶ aːlʔaawwaljna kam tarakwaː min d͡ʒannaːtin waʕujwnin aːnaː daːʔimaː aːθq fj twm krht ðlk aːlmdrrs ʔajmknk aːltħqq mn dˤʁtˤ aʶːlˤʔiʶtˤaʶːrˤ walaaː taʕd͡ʒaz ʕan aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶlˤaʶbiʶ lˤiʶwaʶsˤaʶbiʶn walaaː naʶsˤaʶbiʶn wdˤʕ bʕdˤ aːlnqwd aːlmʕdnja fj aʶːlˤsˤndwq mn fdˤlˤk tnħħaː d͡ʒaːnbaːan kaːn saːmj bħaːd͡ʒa lmqwwm ʔasnaːn ʔiinna hʔuulaːʔi lajaqwlwna ʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːlʕqwl fj nʕjm faliʔaanna ðaaː aʶːlˤfaʶdˤlˤiʶ laaː jaʕdamu ħaaːsida niʕmaain wamuʕaaːnida faʶdˤiʶjlˤaʶaʶiʶn jaʕtarijhi aːld͡ʒahlu biʶʔiʶiʶðˤhaʶaʶːrˤiʶ ʕinaaːdihi laaː bal sˤaʶwaʶaʶːbaʶnaʶː kaːn saːmj jʔaχð drwsaː d͡ʒaːmʕjja ʕaːdjja wahaðaaː aːlnnawʕu laaː jakuwnu ʕaaːmmanaː waʔiin kaaːna ʔaʶaʶdˤaʶrˤrˤaʶhaʶaʶː kaːn ldaː saːmj sˤwt ʁlˤjðˤ d͡ʒddaː ʕalaː sˤiʶrˤaʶːtˤiʶn mustaqjmin waʕalimat ʔaanna man lam jaqnaʕ biaːlqalijli lam jaqnaʕ biaːlkaθijri lam ʔaasmaʕ ʔaaʕd͡ʒaba min qawli ʕumara bni aʶːlˤχaʶtˤtˤaʶaʶːbiʶ rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu waʔiiðaaː ħaʶdˤaʶrˤaʶ aːʁtaaːba waljataħarra fij aːχtijaaːri man jaʔataminuhu ʕalajhi wajastawdiʕuhu ʔijjaaːhu ʔaafalaː taðakkarwna ʔaqllt aʶːlˤʃʃrˤtˤaʶ saːmj kaːn saːmj jqdˤj bjn stt w sbʕ saːʕaːt jwmjjaː w hw jtdrrb ħikmaaun baːliʁaaun famaː tuʁni aːlnnuðuru tsˤrˤrˤf bʃkl ʁrjb aːlnaːs fj ʁflaːthaː laː ʔaθq baʶːlˤχjaʶːtˤ juqaːl ʔanhaː wuldt fj ʔalmaːnjaː bdʔaː saːmj w ljlaː jqdˤjaʶːn aːlmzjd mn aːlwqt mʕaː θumma ʃaqaqnaaː aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ ʃaqqanaː wajataqarraba bihaaː fij d͡ʒihaaːti aːlbirri waaːstawʕarat sarraaːʔuuhu waqaaːla ʕattaaːbun aːlbaaːqij ʕalajja waman lij biaːlʕaqli qaaːla kaːn faʶːdˤlˤ msjħjjaː mltzmaː maːðaː tʕnj kjf ʔad͡ʒdk aːnh laː jstħq tʕbk kjf thd͡ʒʔi d͡ʒmjl kiraːmanaː kaːtibjna liʔaannahu jaχaaːfu fħsˤ aʶːlˤtˤtˤbjb ʕjnj saːmj fqtˤ knt ʔarjd ʔan ʔansaː tˤlˤbt mnh aːlmaːʔ waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi ʔaakbaru aːlddawaaːʔi taqdijru aːlʁiðaaːʔi twm lm jʔaχðhaː mʕh jaʶsˤlˤaʶwnaʶhaʶː jawma aːlddjni min dwni aːlllahi hal jaʶnsˤuʶrˤwnaʶkuʶm ʔaaw jaʶntaʶsˤiʶrˤwnaʶ baːlnsba lj ʔinh mhm lm ʔant ʔanaːnj lhðh aːlddrd͡ʒa qaaːla kaaːnuwaː ʔiðaaː ðakaruwaː aːlfuruwd͡ʒa kannawaː ʕanhaaː waqad qaaːla aːlħukamaaːʔu hðh ʔakbr fraːwla rʔathaː ʕjnaːj wajawma taqwmu aːlssaːʕaau juqsimu aːlmud͡ʒrimwna maː labiθwaː ʁajra saːʕaain kaðlika kaːnwaː juʔufakwna minhaaː walaaː jaχrud͡ʒa ʕanhaaː maaː huwa fijhaaː ln jmwt ʔaħd hnaː lnsrʕ ktb saːmj lljlaː rsaːla ħbb fjhaː stt sˤfħaʶːt sllm saːmj nfsh lˤlˤʃʃrˤtˤaʶ kaːnt ljlaː ħqqaː mʕd͡ʒba bsaːmj kallaː bal laː tukrimwna aːljatjma famaː lahum ʕani aːlttaðkiraai muʶʕrˤiʶdˤjnaʶ aːd͡ʒtnb msˤaʶːħbaʶ aːlkðaːb fʔin aʶːdˤtˤrˤrˤt ʔiljh flaː tuʶsˤaʶdiʶiʶqhuʶ aːntqlt ljlaː ʔilaː aːlmnzl ʔiillaː man huwa sˤaʶːlˤiʶ aːld͡ʒaħjmi ðhbnaː ʔilaː aʶːlˤmtˤʕm aːlʃhjr wkaːnt td͡ʒrba d͡ʒmjla wajaʃuħħu biaːljasijri min maaːlihi ʔin kaaːna ʔaaʕlaaː minnij ʕaraft lahu qadrahu waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aʶːlˤfuʶsˤaʶħaʶaʶːʔiʶ aːlʔaadabu jasturu qabijħa aːlnnasabi waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi min ʕalaaːmaai aːlʔiiqbaaːli aʶːsˤtˤiʶnaʶaʶːʕuʶ aːlrrid͡ʒaaːli ln ʔanshaː ʔabdaː famaaː aʶːstaʶtˤaʶːʕwaʶː min qijaːmin wamaː kaːnwaː muʶntaʶsˤiʶrˤjnaʶ kaːn aːld͡ʒw ħaːraːan d͡ʒdaːan ðˤhjrˤaʶ aːljwm twm jrbbj qtˤaʶ swdaːʔ lm jħdθ saːmj ʔajja dˤd͡ʒd͡ʒaʶ ʔiinna ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbaʶ aːld͡ʒannaai aːljawma fj ʃuʁulin faːkihwna jaʶsˤiʶmuʶ aːlmaaːziħa wajuʔuðij aːlmumaaːzaħa waliðalika qaaːlat aːlħukamaaːʔu aːlʕajnaaːni ʔaanammu min aːlllisaaːni wamaːʔin maskwbin ʔaʕln ħbh ʔaudχl aːlmstʃfaː ʔiið jaʁʃaaː aːlssidraaa maː jaʁʃaː jʕml ʔaʶdˤaʶːf saːmj bʕdˤ aːlfrwla lˤlˤʕsˤjrˤ sʔaħaːwl wdˤʕ ʔafkaːrj fj ktaːb knt ʔaħaːwl ʔan ʔansa kll ʃjʔ man taʶtˤaʶjjaʶrˤaʶ faljaqul aːiʃtrt ʔamj mðˤlˤaʶ sˤfrˤaʶːʔ lʔaχj walaː sˤaʶdjqiʶn ħamjmin saːmj tammaaːmin aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶjuʶ mn fj aːlmnzl wntd͡ʒ ʕn ðlk mzjd mn aːlχwf wʕdm aːlθqa mustaʃhidanaː min kitaaːbi aːlllahi d͡ʒalla aːsmuhu bimaaː jaʶqtaʶdˤiʶjhiʶ kʔan ʕlaː rʔwshm aʶːlˤtˤjrˤ laaː aʶːlˤtˤjwrˤ ʕlaː ʔaʃkaːlhaː tqʕ kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jtχaʶːsˤmaʶːn ʔaħjaːnaː jatʕabu aːlʔiinsaːnu fij sˤiʶʁaʶrˤiʶhiʶ kaj jartaaːħa fij kibarihi waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi kafaaː aʶːlˤdˤdˤaʶːlˤjnaʶ kaːn saːmj ʔaʕzz ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ frjd ʔajmknk ktaːba aːlrsaːla baːlʔind͡ʒljzja tħtaːd͡ʒ aːlnbaːtaːtu dˤwʔaʶ aːlʃms ltnmw kaːn ħðaːʔ saːmj dˤaʶːʔiʶʕaʶː ʕaʶtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶj ʔaalfaaːni jaftaħu muħammadun aːlbaaːba ʔaʶsˤlˤħt aːldraːd͡ʒa aːlbaːrħa wajaħðifu aʶːlˤfuʶdˤuʶwlˤaʶ waaːlzzijaaːdaaa faʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤiʶdquʶ huwa aːlʔiiχbaaːru ʕan aːlʃʃajʔi ʕalaaː maaː huwa ʕalajhi kaːn saːmj jdrrs waχuruwd͡ʒihi ʕan d͡ʒumlaai aːlʕawaaːmm aːlmustarðalijna watarku aːlddunjaaː ʔaʶaʶfdˤaʶlˤuʶ min mulaaːbasatihaaː aːʁtanim χamsanaː qabla χamsin ʔastsaːʕdhm lm jtʕrrf saːmj btaːtaː ʕlaː sˤwt ljlaː ʃjʔiaːan hnaː waaːlʕuquwlu lahaaː muwaaːfiqaaun d͡ʒalasa aːlwaladu kaj jastarijħa wakulla ʃajʔin ʔaʶaʶħsˤaʶjnaʶːhuʶ kitaːbanaː naðjranaː lilbaʃari lmaːðaː tkrhnj kaːnt ljlaː tqddm drwsaː fj mdrsa waʶaʶːlˤbaʶtˤnaʶ wamaaː waʕaaː lˤiʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbiʶ aːljamjni ln ʔaðhb llmdrsa jwm aːlsbt wasuʔiila muħammadu bnu ʕalijjin ʕan aːlmuruwʔaai faqaaːla aːindlʕt aːlħrb ʔaχjraːan liʔaanna firaaːqa aːlmaʔaluwfi fij aːlʕaaːdaai ʔajn tðhb llʕml waðakara aːsma rabbihi faʶsˤaʶlˤlˤaʶː d͡ʒ saːmj jħbb aːlħsaːʔ ʔardt qraːʔthm hðaː ʔad͡ʒml waʔiin harabta minhum tˤaʶlˤaʶbuʶwkaʶ waman χadamak faaːstaχdimijhi warawaaː saʕijdu bnu d͡ʒubajrin qaaːla ðhb saːmj ʔilaː tlk aːlnnaːfða nuzulanaː min ʁafwrin raħjmin ʔajn aːlmχrd͡ʒ tuʶsˤbiʶħuʶ aːlʁurfaau naʶðˤiʶjfaʶaʶaʶn walakinnij raʔaajt ðaaː ʔant ðaːhb walaaː min aːlħazmi ʔiʶdˤaʶaʶːʕaʶaʶuʶ naʶsˤiʶjbiʶhiʶ min aːlttawakuli wakunnaː nukaððibu bijawmi aːlddjni man ʔaaraaːda birra aːlwaaːlidajni faʶlˤjuʶʕtˤiʶ aːlʃʃuʕaraaːʔa waʶsˤaʶaʶːbiʶrˤuʶwaʶː ʕaduwwakum laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ aːlttd͡ʒml fj ʃhr rˤmdˤaʶːn watarka maaː tahwaaː dawaaːʔuuhaaː waʔiin lam tuʔuminwaː lj faaːʕtazilwni rˤkdˤt ljlaː llnnd͡ʒaːa bħjaːthaː maːtwaː waːħdaː tlw aːlʔaːχr kaːnt aːlmdrrsa tbkj lm jsˤdrˤ saːmj ʔajja dˤd͡ʒd͡ʒaʶ aːlħilmu waʶaʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbuʶ aʶːlˤfaʶsˤlˤuʶ aːlrraaːbiʕu fij aːlħilmi waʶaʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ waʶðˤaʶlˤaʶmaʶ faaːstaʁfara lm jkn saːmj jʃrb maːrj aːmrʔaa faːtna bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi tanzjlu aːlkitaːbi mina aːlllahi aːlʕazjzi aːlħakjmi waːldj saːmj mslmwn wahuwa aːllaðj d͡ʒaʕala lakumu aːlllajla libaːsanaː waaːlnnawma subaːtanaː wad͡ʒaʕala aːlnnahaːra nuʃwranaː flaːn kaːlkʕba tuzaːru wlaː tustazaːru waaːliaːstirsaaːlu fij aːliaːstiʕaaːnaai lm jsttˤʕ saːmj tħmml ðlk aʶːlˤdˤdˤd͡ʒjd͡ʒ ʔanaː mtzwwd͡ʒ baːmrʔaa flˤstˤjnjaʶ dˤrˤb ʔaχmaːsaː bʔasdaːs maːðaː lw fʃil faʔiinnahum laʔaːkilwna minhaː famaːliʔiwna minhaaː aʶːlˤbuʶtˤwnaʶ jd͡ʒb ʔan laː tlʕb hl fhmt ʔanaː lm ʔafhm btaːtaː waqijla lilʃʃaʕbiji fij naaːʔiibaain kajfa ʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħt qaaːla bal ʔaaʕrifuk qaːlwaː tˤaʶːʔiʶiʶrˤuʶkuʶm maʕakum ʔaaʔiin ðukkirtum bal ʔaantum qawmun musrifwna θumma ʔiinna lahum ʕalajhaː laʃawbanaː min ħamjmin wajuwħiʃu mink aʶːlˤmuʶsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶjnaʶ laː ttrknj wħjdaː ʔakrh rʔujtk ħzjna ʔaʶmdˤt ljlaː jwmaː kaːmlaː bdwn tnaːwl dwaːʔ ħjwjj qaːm saːmj baʶːlˤtˤtˤlˤb θm aʶːntðˤrˤ ʔaan jakuwna salijma aːlfikri min hammin qaʶaʶːtˤiʶʕiʶn waʔiinna min aːlbajaaːni lasiħranaː aːʕtnq saːmj aːlʔislaːm ħdjθaː ʔarjd aːlʕjʃ hnaː waʔiiðaaː aːlʕiʃaːru ʕuʶtˤtˤiʶlˤaʶt sʔal mdrrsaː ʔaːχr maʔaχuwðun biwizrihaaː wqʕ saːmj fj ħbb ftaːa mslma aːsmhaː ljlaː mtaː tdrs laː ʔaʕrf kjf ʔaʃkrk ʔatraː aːlfrnsja sˤʕbaʶ kaːn aːlħfl d͡ʒjjdaː llʁaːja aːlʕdl ʔasaːs aːlmulk wafij jadihi zijaaːdaaan ʕan kifaaːjatihi ʔamm saːmj msjħjja d͡ʒjjda ʔaʕrf aːlmaʔamuwnu liʔiibraaːhijma bni aːlmahdijji kamaaː qaaːla aʶːlˤd͡ʒaʶaʶːħiʶðˤuʶ fij kitaaːbi aːlbajaaːni ʔinnij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbuʶ hudanaː laaː saaːʔiilu nadanaː qmnaː mn θwra dˤd ʔiħdaː aːlʁurwbi snsaːʕdh ʔin tˤlˤb mnaː ʔaʕz mn aːlwld wld aːlwld maː salakakum fj saqara waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlrraħmani bnu zajdin fij qawlh taʕaaːlaaː saːmj jħbb ʕsˤjrˤ aʶːlˤbtˤtˤjχ aːlʔaħmr aːddʕaː saːmj ʔannh mmrˤrˤdˤ fj mstʃfaː baːlqaːhra ʕndmaː kaːn fj snn aːlssaːdsa ʕʃr fqtˤ waqad qijla fij taʔawijli qawlh taʕaaːlaaː aʶːsˤtˤħb saːmj ljlaː mn aʶːlˤmtˤaʶːrˤ waaːlmasʔiuwlu ʁajra mutamakkinin walajsa ʔaχth mn aːlmdrsa ʔauwlʔiika fj d͡ʒannaːtin mukramwna waman kaaːna min qalijli aːlddunjaaː laaː jaʃbaʕu bʁaːθ aʶːlˤtˤjrˤ ʔakθrhaː fraːχaːan bqdr aːlrʔaj tʕtbr aːlrd͡ʒaːl wbaːlʔaːmaːl jntðˤrˤ aːlmʔaːl msˤwwrˤaʶ likajlaaː taʔasawaː ʕalaaː maaː faaːtakum walaaː tafraħuwaː bimaaː ʔaːtaaːkum hw jħbbhaː w hj tħbbh ʔaʶjdˤaʶː waʶjaʶsˤiʶfuʶhuʶ biʶfaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶħaʶ jansubuhaaː ʔilajhi faʔiin kaaːna aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶʁiʶjrˤiʶ kamaaː ʔaannahu raaːziqu aːlwaladi aːlkabijri qaaːla faaːlzzijaaːdaau min aːlχajri χajrun wajulbisuk θawba aːlwaqaaːri ʔaħqqaː sjðhb twm ʔilaː bwstˤn lwħdh waaːlmukaaːfaʔaaau ʕitqun ʔaan jaʕlama ʔaanna tˤaʶwaʶaʶːrˤiʶqaʶ aːlʔiinsaaːni min dalaaːʔiili faʶdˤlˤiʶhiʶ waʶħuʶsˤsˤiʶlˤaʶ maː fij aʶːlˤsˤsˤuʶdwrˤiʶ hw ljs ʁjwraː waaːlbaðaaːʔu min aːld͡ʒafaaːʔi waaːld͡ʒafaaːʔu fij ʕljh kaːnt ljlaː msjħjja d͡ʒjjda ʔaan jakuwna ʕaduwwanaː qad aːstaħkamat ʃaħnaaːʔuuhu aːntbh fθmma sjaːra qaːdma fasanujassiruhu liljusraː kaːn saːmj jtnaːwl aːlkθjr mn aːlddwaːʔ ʔaattaχaðnaːhum ʔaħd aʶːntðˤrˤ dqjqa ʔaaw jaʶdˤʕuʶfuʶ ʕanhu bibalaaːdatihi faʔiinnahu ʔaarwaħu lilʕaaːlimi faaːstuʕmila aːbnu ʃubrumaaa baʕda ðalika ʕalaaː aʶːlˤqaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶ faqaaːla lahu aːbnuhu ʔaabuw bakrin lqd ʁjjr saːmj ħjaːa ljlaː fjhimaː ʕajnaːni tad͡ʒrijaːni d͡ʒbaːn kaːldd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa waʔaani aːʕbudwnj hðaː sˤiʶrˤaʶːtˤuʶn mustaqjmun aːlθθawbu naʶðˤiʶjfuʶn ʔaqsaː mn sˤχrˤaʶ ljs baʶːlˤdˤrˤwrˤaʶ waqaaːla aːlddunjaaː maaː lam jaðuqhu aːlʃʃabaaːbu waʕanhu ʕalajhi aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːaʶuʶ waaːlssalaaːmu ʔaannahu qaaːla ʔaamaaː tamnaʕu haʔuulaaːʔi aːlʁilmaaːni faqaaːla ʔaanuwʃirwaaːna ʁrq saːmj fj msbħ ħððrthaː fasabbiħ biaːsmi rabbika aʶːlˤʕaʶðˤjmiʶ walaaː nafʕun juwaaːzij dˤuʶrˤrˤaʶhuʶ wahuwa aʶːlˤðˤðˤiʶlˤuʶ aːllaðij jald͡ʒaʔau ʔilajhi aʶːlˤmuʶdˤtˤaʶrˤrˤuʶwnaʶ waaːlħimaaː aːllaðij jaʔawij ʔilajhi aːlmaʕruwfi sˤaʶʁiʶjrˤuʶhuʶ waqad ʔaʶaʶdˤaʶlˤlˤwaʶː kaθjranaː walaː tazidi aʶːlˤðˤðˤaʶːlˤiʶmjnaʶ ʔiillaː dˤaʶlˤaʶːlˤaʶnaʶː rad͡ʒulun taridu ʕalajhi aːlʔaumuwru fajusaddiduhaaː biraʔajihi tsbbb ʔastħqqk waʔiilaaː aːld͡ʒibaːli kajfa nuʶsˤiʶbaʶt ʕndmaː jʃjχ aːlθʕlb tntf wbrh aːlʁrbaːn qaːla rabbi ʔiinnj daʕawtu qawmj lajlanaː wanahaːranaː waaːld͡ʒawaaːbu aːlθθaaːnij kaːn saːmj mndhʃaː llʁaːja hllaː ʔaʶχfdˤt sˤwt aːltlfaːz waʔiin kuntunna turidna aːlllaha waraswlahu waaːlddaːra aːlʔaːχiraaa faʔiinna aːlllaha ʔaaʕadda lilmuħsinaːti minkunna ʔaad͡ʒranaː ʕaʶðˤjmaʶnaʶː ʔaχð saːmj ljlaː ʔilaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːlnnabiju ʔiinnaː ʔaarsalnaːka ʃaːhidanaː wamubaʃʃiranaː wanaðjranaː hl nsjnaː maːlnaː fatanħasiru ʕanhaaː ðillaau aːlmaqhuwri waaːstaħabbahu wakarihahu man lam jakun ʕaqluhu ʔaaʁlaba bnu saʕdin sˤħħħ saːmj aːlmdrrs θlaːθ mrraːt ʔiillaː mawtatanaaː aːlʔawlaː wamaː naħnu bimuʕaððabjna aːstħmmt ljlaː w ʁjjrt mlaːbshaː falaaː jaʶrˤdˤaʶaʶː linafsihi ʔillaaː bitaʕd͡ʒijli aːlħaqqi ʔaahlaku ʔaummatij rad͡ʒulaaːni ʔarjd aːlðhaːb ʔilaː kjwtw ʔataː dˤaʶːbtˤ ʃrˤtˤaʶ ʔaːχr ʔaʶðˤnn twm jχfj ʃjʔianaː rˤaʶaʶːdˤiʶjaʶnaʶː ʕan zamaaːnik kaːn saːmj laː jzaːl sˤdjqaʶː lljlaː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi ʔaaħsanu aːlmakaaːrimi ʕafwu aːlmuqtadiri wud͡ʒuwdu aːlmuftaqiri ljs ldjj ħqq baːlttdχl fj ħjaːtk ʔarjd ʔan ʔaʕrf lm knt mdˤtˤrˤrˤaʶː llqjaːm bðlk qd jd͡ʒbn aːlʃd͡ʒaːʕ blaː slaːħ wamuʕaaːtabatuhu miħnaaun kaːn faʶːdˤlˤ d͡ʒrraːħaː mwθwq bh waʔaaħaduhumaaː ʔaaħabbu ʔilajja min sˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶhiʶ jaː ʕibaːdija aːllaðjna ʔaːmanwaː ʔiinna ʔaʶaʶrˤdˤj waːsiʕaaun faʔiijjaːja min najli maʶtˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶhiʶ dfʕ ʕʃra dwlaːraːt fqtˤ lðlk aʶːlˤqmjsˤ aːintbh aːʁtsl saːmj dʕaː saːmj ljlaː ltnaːwl aːlʃʃaːj laaː jaaː rabbi kaːn mnzl saːmj d͡ʒħjmaː faljakun badalu aʶːlˤdˤdˤaʶħiʶkiʶ ʕinda aːlʔiijnaaːsi tabassumanaː aːstuqbl saːmj aːstqbaːlaː ħsnaː aʶːntðˤrˤ saːmj hnaːk waqad qaaːla ʔaabuw aːlʕataaːhijaai jaʶsˤiʶfuʶ aːlnnaaːsa fajabqaaː taħammuluhaaː wajaduwmu taʶsˤaʶwwuʶnuʶhaʶaʶː qatala ʔaabaaːhu aːlzzubajru kaːn aːlkħwl hw aːlmχddr aʶːlˤmfdˤdˤlˤ ʕnd saːmj tʁllb saːmj ʕlaː ljlaː wabitaqallubi aːlʔaaħwaaːli waʶtaʶnaʶaʶːquʶsˤiʶhaʶaʶː ʔaarðaaːlanaː faaːlkaðibu jamnaʕu minhu aʶːlˤχaʶtˤtˤaʶaʶːbiʶ rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu man kaθura dˤaʶħiʶkuʶhuʶ qallat hajbatuhu waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi ʕqwba aːlħaːsd nfsh ʔaʕlm ʔannh jbħθ ʔabqi ʁrftk nðˤjfaʶaʶn bqdr aːlʔimkaːn biraχaaːʔiihaaː wqʕwaː waːħdaːan tlw aːlʔaːχr waaːlʔaaʁnijaaːʔu sukaaːraaː ʔillaaː man ʕaʶsˤaʶmaʶhuʶ aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː bitawaqquʕi aːlʁijari ʕaːʃ saːmj ħjaːa raːʔiʕa waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶwaʶaʶːbiʶ waqaːla aːlrraswlu jaː rabbi ʔiinna qawmij aːttaχaðwaː hðaaː aːlqurʔaːna mahd͡ʒwranaː ʔinnahu jaʶχtˤuʶbuʶhaʶaʶː linafsihi wajaquwlu lahaaː zawwid͡ʒijnij nafsak ʔauskinuki ʔaajja jurjkum ʔaːjaːtihi wajunazzilu lakum mina aːlssamaːʔi rizqanaː wamaː jataðakkaru ʔiillaː man junjbu wakaθraai aːlʔiid͡ʒraaːmi ʔajn tqtˤn baʶːlˤdˤdˤbtˤ ħaːwl ʔan tbtlʕ rjqk jakaaːdu aːlbarqu jaʶχtˤaʶfuʶ ʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶhuʶm bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi waaːlssamaːʔi waʶaʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶːrˤiʶqiʶ aːlʔinsaːn jwld fj ʃkl aːlwaːw wħjn juqawwimu nfsh jðˤn ʔanh ʔalf aːlʁamaaːmu kaθijfun walaaː jalzamu ʃukranaː ʕalaaː nuʕmaaː waaːstinkaaːranaː limahaaːnaai aʶːlˤnnaʶqsˤiʶ waʶmaʶdˤaʶrˤrˤaʶaʶiʶ aːlkaðibi ʕalajhi trjd kʔasaːan ʔaːχr mn aːlʃaːj ʔaʕddt lk kʔasaːan mnð lˤħðˤaʶːt qljla ljs ldaː saːmj drws hðaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤbaʶːħ baːltʔakjd laː ʔarjd ʔan ʔafʕl maː qaːm bfʕlh twm qbl qljl waʔiin taʶwaʶssaʶtˤaʶ waʶaʶːqtaʶsˤaʶdaʶ fijhi kaaːna maʕruwfanaː wabirranaː maħmuwdanaː ʕml saːmj fj wzaːra aʶːlˤsˤsˤħaʶ waliðalika qaaːla rasuwlu aːlllahi sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama laː jmknnj tħml tkaːljf aːlsfr lˤlˤʕtˤlˤaʶ waʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶbrˤuʶ ʕalaaː aːlnnawaaːʔiibi wahaðaaː ʔaaʕlaaː manaaːzili aːlqanaaːʕaai twm lm jkn jtsˤwrˤ ʔanh baːmkaːn maːrj aːlqjaːm bʔamr khðaː wamanzilaain rafijʕaain ħallahaaː biʁajri faʶdˤlˤiʶn jabijtu aːlbaħru haaːʔiid͡ʒanaː qaaːla ʔaalam ʔaaqul lakum ʔiinnij ʔaaʕlamu ʁajba aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ aːstmʕ saːmj llrrsaːla aʶːlˤsˤsˤwtjaʶ ljlaː tħbb aːlqjl w aːlqaːl ʔaʶdˤʕt rqm haːtfk aʶːlˤrˤjaʶːdˤaʶ mfjda lˤlˤsˤħaʶ aːudχul aːlbustaːna wamattiʕ nafsaka biʶmaʶnðˤaʶrˤiʶhiʶ walaaː taʕbaθ biʔaazhaːrihi waθimaːrihi θumma ʔaahluk waqijla liʕijsaaː aːbni marjama ʕalaaː nabijjinaaː waʕalajhi aːlssalaaːmu faqad rawaaː ʔaabuw hurajraaa qaaːla ʔinhm jraːqbwn maː jħdθ ʕn kθb faʔaaχaðatkumu aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːʕiʶqaʶaʶuʶ waʔaantum taʶnðˤuʶrˤuʶwnaʶ wakaaːna aːlfarad͡ʒu minhu qarijbanaː waʶdˤaʶʕuʶfaʶ ʔiχaaːʔuuhu kaːn faʶːdˤlˤ hw ʃrjk raːmj aːld͡ʒdjd kallaː bal raːna ʕalaː qulwbihim maː kaːnwaː jaksibwna ðhb twm ʔilaː bwstˤn mʕ sˤdjq maː taðaru min ʃajʔin ʔaatat ʕalajhi ʔiillaː d͡ʒaʕalathu kaaːlrramjmi ʔinh qlq bsbb mrˤdˤ waːldh ʃadda aːlttilmjðu aːlħabla klb ħj χjr mn ʔasd mjt waaːlllajli wamaː wasaqa waaːlʕaqla lanaaː murʃidanaː fajuθbita maaː kaaːna muwaaːfiqanaː wasababu aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ hud͡ʒuwmu maaː takrahuhu aːlnnafsu mimman duwnahaaː ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ lmzjd mn aːlwqt lʔanhj waːd͡ʒbj ʔaaħsin ʔilj aːlnaːs tstʕbd qlwbhm waħijna jarhabu fad͡ʒumiʕa aːlssaħaraau limjqaːti jawmin maʕlwmin hl aːistmtʕt bwqtk mʕ aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ mn jrjd aːlħrb ʔaʶsˤbħ faʶːdˤlˤ ʃχsˤaʶː χtˤjrˤaʶː lm jsbq lljlaː w ʔan rʔat d͡ʒmlaː fj ħjaːthaː ʕθrt ʕl twm jdχn aːlnrd͡ʒjla aːlllahi sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama ʕan aːlzzuhdi faqaaːla waʔaufrida biaːlħaaːdiθaai baʕda ʔaan kaaːna mukaaːfijanaː waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlħamijdi faqaaːla ʕaffirij hðaː maː twʕadwna likulli ʔaawwaːbin ħaʶfjðˤiʶn χajru manzilin law kaaːna aːlllahu ballaʁanij qatla ʔaarbaʕaain fataqarrabtu ʔilajhi bidimaaːʔiihim laː ljs mʕj waqijla man qalla tawaqqijhi kaθurat masaaːwiʔiuhu laː jaʔakuluhu ʔiillaaː aʶːlˤχaʶːtˤiʶʔiʶwnaʶ ʕaːd ʔilaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤħrˤaʶːʔ kaːn haːtf ljlaː ʕnd saːmj aːltqjt btwm qbl aːlʔaːn waʔiiðaː tutlaː ʕalajhim ʔaːjaːtunaː bajjinaːtin qaːla aːllaðjna kafarwaː lilħaqqi lammaː d͡ʒaːʔahum hðaː siħrun mubjnun aːlʔaːbaːʔ jħbwn ʔawlaːdhm wajad͡ʒʕalu sitra aːlmuruwʔaai mahtuwkanaː aːlhawaaː malikun ʁaʃuwmun walaaː juwallij makrumaaan mn mħaːsn aːlqaːmws aːlʔilktrwnj ʔanh shl aːlħml aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶbrˤuʶ ʕalaaː maaː taʶqtaʶdˤiʶjhiʶ ʔaawqaaːtuhu min razijjaain qad ʔaad͡ʒhadahu aːlħuznu ʕalajhaaː w ʔant ʕʃ jwmaːan blaː hm tʕʃ jwmaːan χaːldaːan waqaaːla qawmun waman kataba aːlħadijθa qawijat ħud͡ʒd͡ʒatuhu wamaː ʔaanta bihaːdij aːlʕumji ʕan dˤaʶlˤaʶːlˤaʶtiʶhiʶm ʔiin tusmiʕu ʔiillaː man juʔuminu biʔaːjaːtinaː fahum muslimwna hddd saːmj bqtl ljlaː fj aːlʕʃraːt mn aːlrrsaːʔil aːlnnamijmaau danaaːʔaaun waaːlssiʕaaːjaau radaaːʔaaun kaaːld͡ʒadali aːllaðij takuwnu fijhi aʶːlˤmuʶnaʶaʶːðˤaʶrˤaʶaʶuʶ ʔiin kaːnat ʔiillaː sˤaʶjħaʶaʶaʶn waːħidaaan faʔiiðaː hum d͡ʒamjʕun ladajnaː muʶħdˤaʶrˤwnaʶ tfaːd͡ʒʔunj daːʔimaː jaː twm waʶʔiʶiʶðˤhaʶaʶːrˤuʶ aːlrrad͡ʒuli sirra ʁajrihi ʔaaqbaħu min ʔiʶðˤhaʶaʶːrˤiʶhiʶ sirra nafsihi taħarrawaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤiʶdqaʶ waʔiin raʔaajtum ʔaanna fijhi aːlhalakaaa faʔiinna fijhi aːlnnad͡ʒaaːaa ʔaalam nad͡ʒʕali aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ kifaːtanaː walaaː tastadijmu baʕdahaaː ʔin knt tðˤn aːltʕljm mklfanaː faʶːntðˤrˤ ħtaː traː maː jklfk aːld͡ʒhl twm ljs mtrd͡ʒm hl bʔimkaːnkm ʔid͡ʒraːʔ bʕdˤ aːltʕdjlaːt ʕlaː aːlhwaːʔijja waʔiin kaaːduwaː lajaftinuwnaka ʕani aːllaðij ʔaawħajnaaː ʔiilajka litaftarija ʕalajnaaː ʁajrahu waʔiiðanaː laaːttaχaðuwka χalijlanaː ðhbnaː ʔilaː lndn ʔanaː fqtˤ sʔatrk hðh hnaː wasabbiħuwhu bukraaan waʶʔaʶaʶsˤiʶjlˤaʶnaʶː bqj aːlbaːb mʁlqanaː tˤwaʶːlˤ aːljwm ʔaʶuʶʕtˤjk χams dqaːʔiq lħl hðh aːlmʃkla sttzwwd͡ʒ brd͡ʒl θrjj qaːl std͡ʒdnj ʔin ʃaːʔ aːllh sˤaʶːbrˤaʶː wlaː ʔaʶʕsˤj lk fafahhamnaaːhaaː sulajmaaːna wakullanaː ʔaːtajnaaː ħukmanaː waʕilmanaː wasaχχarnaaː maʕa daaːwuwda aːld͡ʒibaaːla jusabbiħna waʶaʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶjrˤaʶ wakunnaaː faaːʕilijna kaːn mnnaːd jbqj qtˤtˤh daːχl baːlswʔ mn aːlqwl ʔilaː mn ðˤlˤm wkaːn aːllh smjʕaː ʕljmaː tard͡ʒiʕuwnahaaː ʔiin kuntum sˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ aːnaː mʃ faːhm aːnaː ʕaːjz mwbjlk baːj knt ʔafkr hl trjd aːlzwaːd͡ʒ saːmj mtwttr ʔinnaː nbħθ fij jawmin kaaːna miqdaaːruhu χamsijna ʔaalfa sanaain ldj ʕjnjn ʔaħqaː maːt ʔabj ʔin aːlðjn hm mn χʃja rbhm mʃfqwn wabanajnaaː fawqakum sabʕanaː ʃidaaːdanaː ʔiinna aːllha taʕaaːlaaː tˤaʶjjiʶbuʶn laːa jaqbalu ʔiilaːaːa tˤaʶjjiʶbaʶnaʶː ʔanaː ðhbt ʔilaː aːlmstʃfaː d͡ʒazaaːʔan bimaaː kaaːnuwaː jaʕmaluwna wajamnaʕu min aʶːlˤttaʶqaʶaʶːtˤuʶʕiʶ waaːlttadaaːburi qaaːla faʔati bihi ʔiin kunta mina aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ laː ʔaraː ħtaː ʃd͡ʒra waːħda ljs ldj wqt llaːkl aːlaːn hm jsˤdqwnh qul law ʔaanna ʕindij maaː tastaʕd͡ʒiluwna bihi lˤaʶquʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlʔaamru bajnij wabajnakum waaːlllahu ʔaaʕlamu biʶaʶːlˤðˤðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ faʔiiðaaː lam jakun ʔaːlifanaː maʔaluwfanaː taʶχaʶtˤtˤaʶfaʶthuʶ ʔaajdij ħaaːsidijhi ttʁðaː aːlħjtaːn ʕlaː aːlʔasmaːk aʶːlˤsˤʁjrˤaʶ aːldnjaː ʕbrt ʕn aːjaːm w sjnjn frwd͡ʒ maːðaː tnwj bðlk ʔanaː fqtˤ aːbðl qsˤaʶːrˤaʶː d͡ʒhdj naʶːsˤjaʶ kaːðba χaʶːtˤʔiʶaʶ walaaː jamliku aːllaðijna jadʕuwna min duwnihi aːlʃʃafaaːʕaaa ʔiillaaː man ʃahida biaːlħaqqi wahum jaʕlamuwna whdjnaːh aːlnd͡ʒdjn ʔaam lakum ʔaajmaaːnun ʕalajnaaː baaːliʁaaun ʔiilaaː jawmi aːlqijaaːmaai ʔiinna lakum lamaaː taħkumuwna wajaaː qawmi maaː lij ʔaadʕuwkum ʔiilaaː aːlnnad͡ʒaaːai watadʕuwnanij ʔiilaaː aːlnnaaːri hðaː maː jqwlh aːlnaːs rbnaː aːʁfr lj wlwaːldj wllmʔumnjn jwm jqwm aːlħsaːb kjf qutil twm liʔaanna aːlssaʕaaːdaaa lajsat bikaθraai aːlmaaːli fakam min mukθirin ʃaqijjun wamuqillin saʕijdun ʔaðhb ʔaħjaːnaːan wʔaħjaːnaːan ʔauχraː laː ʔaðhb jd͡ʒb aːn tltzm bnðˤaʶːmk aːlʁðaːʔij ʔanaː fʕlaː ʔaqdr sˤħbtk ʔaʕtqd ʔank ðhbt bʕjdaː twm ʔataːa jwm aːlʔiθnjn wʕaːd ʔilaːa aːlbjt fj aːljwm aːltaːlj waːlðjn ʔiðaː ʔaʶsˤaʶːbhm aːlbʁj hm jntsˤrˤwn ʔanaː laː ʔaʃrb aːlqhwa sʔaʶtsˤlˤ bika kul sˤbaʶːħ fk rqba ħaːwl tðkr maːðaː ħdθ laː ʔadʕj fhm aːlnsaːʔ htˤlˤ aʶːlˤmtˤrˤ wql ʔinj ʔanaː aːlnðjr aːlmbjn maʕluwmun min ħaaːli aːlʕuqalaaːʔi ʕalaaː aːχtilaaːfihim jwmʔið jsˤdrˤ aːlnaːs ʔaʃtaːtaː ljrwaː ʔaʕmaːlhm hðh aːlθlaːd͡ʒa θqjla d͡ʒdaː waqad rawaaː ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu ʕumara rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhumaaː qaaːla lˤaʶʔaʶuʶqaʶtˤtˤiʶʕaʶnaʶ ʔaajdijakum waʔaard͡ʒulakum min χilaaːfin θumma lˤaʶʔaʶuʶsˤaʶlˤlˤiʶbaʶnaʶkuʶm ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna ʔin aːllh ʕaːlm ʁjb aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ ʔinh ʕljm bðaːt aʶːlˤsˤdwrˤ lmaːðaː tbkjn jaː ħbjbtj hl tʕtqd ʔan aːlaːħtraːr aːlʕaːlmj hw ntjd͡ʒa lʕml aːlbʃr baːrjs ʔiħdaː ʔakθr mdn aːlʕaːlm zjaːraan waʔiin kaaːna aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː qad ʔaaʃraka bajnahumaaː fij aːlbirri wad͡ʒamaʕa bajnahumaaː fij aʶːlˤwaʶsˤiʶjjaʶaʶiʶ wafij aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔi ʕinda aːlmukaaːʃafaai waaːlmud͡ʒaaːharaai wsˤaʶːħbth wbnjh lm jkn baːb mnzl saːmj mqflaː ʔaʔant mʔulf hðaː aːlktaːb fawarabbika lanaħʃurannahum waʶaʶːlˤʃʃaʶjaʶaʶːtˤiʶjnaʶ θumma lˤaʶnuʶħdˤiʶrˤaʶnnaʶhuʶm ħawla d͡ʒahannama d͡ʒiθijjanaː hl jwd͡ʒd ʃjʔi fj ðhnk ʔalqwaː ʔaslħtkm ʔin btˤʃ rbk lʃdjd wamaaː raʔaajt miθla aːlnnaaːri naaːma haaːribuhaaː tanzijlanaː mimman χalaqa aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ waaːlssamaaːwaaːti aːlʕulaaː maaː taquwlu fij sˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːaʶiʶ aːlllajli faqaaːla man lam jarʁab biθalaaːθin bulija bisittin lhðaː aːllħm raːʔiħa krjha klaː snktb maː jqwl wnmd lh mn aːlʕðaːb mdaː laː tqlq bʃʔan ʔamr khðaː kaːn jd͡ʒb btr ðraːʕ twm waaːllaðijna kafaruwaː biʔaːjaaːtinaaː hum ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːlmaʃʔaamaai hl ʔaʶdˤʕtaʶ mftaːħa mnzlk qrʔat aːlbaːrħa rwaːja mθjra llʔihtmaːm wawaʔadi aːlbanaaːti wʔaʶʕtˤaʶː qljlaː wʔakdaː aːllaðijna jariθuwna aːlfirdawsa hum fijhaaː χaaːliduwna ħattaaː ʔiiðaaː d͡ʒaaːʔuwaː qaaːla ʔaakaððabtum biʔaːjaaːtij walam tuʶħiʶjtˤuʶwaʶː bihaaː ʕilmanaː ʔaammaaːðaaː kuntum taʕmaluwna liʔaanna aːlmaʕaaːnija ʃawaaːridu taʶdˤiʶlˤlˤuʶ biaːlʔiiʁfaaːli ʔanaː ʕaːlq θumma kallaaː sawfa taʕlamuwna aʶːlˤʔaʶχtˤaʶːʔ hj mʕlmjn hl jwd͡ʒd maːʔ hnaː liʔaanna aːlʔiinsaaːna dunjaaː nafsihi taʕallamuwaː aːlʕilma qabla ʔaan jurfaʕa twm jħb aʶːlˤbjrˤwqrˤaʶːtˤjaʶ kθjraː ʔinnaː sˤbjaʶ ʔanaː lst mdrsaːan ʔamrnj ʔan ʔaqwm bhðaː fqmt bh mra ʔaχraː ʔaawa ʔaːbaaːʔuunaaː aːlʔaawwaluwna wnzʕnaː maː fj sˤdwrˤhm mn ʁl ʔiχwaːnaː ʕlaː srr mtqaːbljn juwlid͡ʒu aːlllajla fij aːlnnahaaːri wajuwlid͡ʒu aːlnnahaaːra fij aːlllajli wahuwa ʕalijmun biðaaːti aʶːlˤsˤsˤuʶduʶwrˤiʶ fjhmaː ʕjnaːn td͡ʒrjaːn laː tqm btrwjʕ aːlʔaːmnjn wʔiðaː aːlqbwr bʕθrt ʕaːm sʕjd lkl aːld͡ʒzaːʔirjjn waʔiinnamaaː tad͡ʒiduhu fij baʶʕdˤiʶhiʶ faʕadluhu fijhim jakuwnu biʔaarbaʕaai ʔaaʃjaaːʔa wajastad͡ʒijbu aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː waʕamiluwaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶaʶːtiʶ wajazijduhum min faʶdˤlˤiʶhiʶ waaːlkaaːfiruwna lahum ʕaðaaːbun ʃadijdun waðallalnaaːhaaː lahum faminhaaː rakuwbuhum waminhaaː jaʔakuluwna wkðlk nsˤrˤf aːlʔaːjaːt wljqwlwaː drst wlnbjnh lqwm jʕlmwn maaː ʔauħibbu ʔaan ʔaʶaʶbsuʶtˤaʶ ʔaamalij ʔilaaː ʔaan taðhaba ʔilaaː baʁdaaːda watad͡ʒijʔa wllðjn kfrwaː brbhm ʕðaːb d͡ʒhnm wbʔis aʶːlˤmsˤjrˤ faʕalajk biðaaːti aːlddijni taribat jadaaːk tlk ʔaːjaːt aːllh ntlwhaː ʕljk baːlħq wʔink lmn aːlmrsljn ħattaaː ʔaaqsama bihi fij kitaaːbihi faqaaːla subħaaːnahu wataʕaaːlaaː wakaaːna fij aːlmadijnaai tisʕaau rˤaʶhtˤiʶn jufsiduwna fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ walaaː juʶsˤlˤiʶħuʶwnaʶ hl taʕalama aːljaːbaːnja ʔaʶjdˤaʶːaʶn nðˤf ʁrfth jwm aːlaːħd tˤbʕaʶː jursalu ʕalajkumaaː ʃuʶwaʶaʶːðˤuʶn mmin nnaaːrin wanuħaaːsun falaː taʶntaʶsˤiʶrˤaʶaʶːniʶ maː tqwlh sˤħjħ θumma radadnaaːhu ʔaasfala saaːfilijna wʔaʶtˤjʕwaʶː aːllh wʔaʶtˤjʕwaʶː aːlrswl waːħðrwaː fʔin twljtm faːʕlmwaː ʔanmaː ʕlaː rswlnaː aːlblaːʁ aːlmbjn hlaː ʔarjtnj rˤχsˤtk sjdj waʶʔaʶaʶtˤiʶjʕuʶwaʶː aːlllaha waaːlrrasuwla laʕallakum turħamuwna ʔiinnaaː d͡ʒaʕalnaaː fij ʔaaʕnaaːqihim ʔaaʁlaaːlanaː fahija ʔiilaaː aːlʔaaðqaaːni fahum muqmaħuwna wlqd ʕhdnaː ʔilaː ʔaːdm mn qbl fnsj wlm nd͡ʒd lh ʕzmaː ʔaakmalu aːlrraaːħaai maaː kaaːnat ʕan kaddi aːlttaʕabi twm kaːn wsjmaːan llʁaːja ʔiinna laka fij aːlnnahaaːri sabħanaː tˤaʶwiʶjlˤaʶnaʶː maː aːlʕd͡ʒb fj ðlk ʃrb twm bʕdˤ aːlmaːʔ hjhaːt hjhaːt lmaː twʕdwn ʔin aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħaʶːt wʔaχbtwaː ʔilaː rbhm ʔawlʔik ʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːld͡ʒna hm fjhaː χaːldwn ʔaaw χajrin ʔaassasahu ʔaaw ʕilmin aːqtabasahu ʔiinna aːlllaha wamalaaːʔiikatahu juʶsˤaʶlˤlˤuʶwnaʶ ʕalaaː aːlnnabiji jaaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː sˤaʶlˤlˤuʶwaʶː ʕalajhi wasallimuwaː taslijmanaː tʔaχrt aʶːlˤtˤaʶːʔiʶrˤaʶ bsbb aʶːlˤtˤqs aːlsjʔ ʔifʕl ʃjʔiaːan rd͡ʒaːʔan kðlk jbjn aːllh lkm ʔaːjaːth lʕlkm tʕqlwn tʕaːl law naʃaaːʔu lad͡ʒaʕalnaaːhu ħuʶtˤaʶaʶːmaʶnaʶː faʶðˤaʶlˤtuʶm tafakkahuwna ʔinh fnaːn ʕðˤjm nħn mʕd͡ʒbwn bh d͡ʒmjʕanaː aːlm hðaː waʶːdˤħaʶː lw ʃʔi mumtʕ ʔanaː ʔawd ʔan ʔafʕlhu baʶːlˤtˤbʕ kaːn jtˤlˤq ʕlj aːsm aːtʃjrw nħtaːd͡ʒ ʔilaː msaːʕdtk laː jnbʁj ʔan ndˤjʕ aːlmzjd mn aːlwqt klmaː aːstmʕt ʔilaː hðh aːlʔaʁnja bkjt ʔinhaː ʕljhm mʔuʶsˤdaʶ ʔiin tuʕaððibhum faʔiinnahum ʕibaaːduka waʔiin taʁfir lahum faʔiinnaka ʔaanta aːlʕazijzu aːlħakijmu ʔaχbrnj kjf ʕrfta jqaːl aːnhaː tˤbaʶːχaʶ maːhra wnd͡ʒjnaːhmaː wqwmhmaː mn aːlkrb aʶːlˤʕðˤjm ħaːwl twm ʔan jtd͡ʒnb aʶːlˤnðˤrˤ ʔilaː maːrj waʔaanna aːlssaaːʕaaa ʔaːtijaaun laaː rajba fijhaaː waʔaanna aːlllaha jabʕaθu man fij aːlqubuwri hl lk ʔan tqlnj ʔilaː aʶːlˤmħtˤaʶ wʔant ħl bhðaː aːlbld ðlk bʔan aːllh mwlaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʔan aːlkaːfrjn laː mwlaː lhm ʔalm nhlk aːlʔawljn julquwna aːlssamʕa waʔaakθaruhum kaaːðibuwna laqad χalaqnaaː aːlʔiinsaaːna fij kabadin qul sˤaʶdaʶqaʶ aːlllahu faaːttabiʕuwaː millaaa ʔiibraaːhijma ħanijfanaː wamaaː kaaːna mina aːlmuʃrikijna fʔaqblt aːmrʔath fj sˤrˤaʶ fsˤkt wd͡ʒhhaː wqaːlt ʕd͡ʒwz ʕqjm wahuwa biaːlʔaufuqi aːlʔaaʕlaaː waːlðj qdr fhdaː sʔad͡ʒʕlk sʕjdaan ʔauħibb hðh aːlʔaʁnja hlaːaː ʔasdjta lj mʕrwfaː klaː swf tʕlmwn blaː qd d͡ʒaːʔtk ʔaːjaːtj fkðbt bhaː waːstkbrt wknt mn aːlkaːfrjn hj ʔaʁlqt ʕjnjhaː waaːlllajli wamaaː wasaqa bal jurijdu kullu aːmriʔiin mminhum ʔaan juʔutaaː sˤuʶħuʶfaʶnaʶː mmunaʃaraaan faʔaammaaː aːlrramzu falast tad͡ʒiduhu fij ʕilmin maʕnawijjin hl ʔamkm fj aːlmnzl fkaːn qaːb qwsjn ʔaw ʔadnaː waːðkr fj aːlktaːb ʔismaːʕjl ʔinh kaːn sˤaʶːdq aːlwʕd wkaːn rswlaː nbjaː lm jkn saːmj qaːdraː ʕlaː ʔid͡ʒraːʔ ʕmljjaːt d͡ʒraːħjja ʕlaː aʶːlˤmrˤdˤaʶː wahaðihi aʶːlˤmuʶwaʶaʶːdˤaʶʕaʶaʶuʶ aːlʕaaːmmaau tusammaaː ʕurfanaː waʶjuʶʕaʶtˤtˤiʶfuʶhuʶm ʕalaaː aːlrraʕijaai waminhum man jaquwlu rabbanaaː ʔaːtinaaː fij aːlddunjaaː ħasanaaan wafij aːlʔaːχiraai ħasanaaan waqinaaː ʕaðaaːba aːlnnaaːri hw fj mʃkla d͡ʒrħ jdh aːljsraː bskjn ʔinh mn ħsn aʶːlˤħðˤ ʔan tkwn rd͡ʒlaːan bihaðihi aːlmanzilaai min aːlʔaulfaai faqad taʶʕrˤiʶdˤuʶ lahu ʕaʶwaʶaʶːrˤiʶdˤuʶ tamnaʕu minhaaː θm ʔadbr waːstkbr min ħusni ʔiislaːami aːlmarʔi tarkuhu maaː laːa jaʕnijhi kaːn mnnaːd mhmmaː walaqad χalaqnaaː fawqakum sabʕa tˤaʶrˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶqaʶ wamaaː kunnaaː ʕani aːlχalqi ʁaaːfilijna rfʕ twm aʶːlˤsˤndwq bħðr ʔiinnamaaː nuʶtˤʕiʶmuʶkuʶm liwad͡ʒhi aːlllahi laaː nurijdu minkum d͡ʒazaaːʔan walaaː ʃukuwranaː qaːl jaː qwm ljs bj dˤlˤaʶːlˤaʶ wlknj rswl mn rb aːlʕaːlmjn wkntm ʔazwaːd͡ʒaː θlaːθa bajnaaː ʔaanaaː naaːʔiimun raʔaajtu aːlnaaaːsa juʶʕrˤaʶdˤuʶwnaʶ ʕalajaa waaːbtiʁaaːʔa aːlħaqqi ʔaabʕaθu ʕalaaː aʶːlˤnnuʶsˤrˤaʶaʶiʶ wanazzalnaaː mina aːlssamaaːʔi maaːʔan mubaaːrakanaː faʔaanbatnaaː bihi d͡ʒannaaːtin waħabba aʶːlˤħaʶsˤiʶjdiʶ ʕalimat nafsun mmaaː ʔaʶaʶħdˤaʶrˤaʶt sʔal djmaː hl tʕrfjn kwd aʶːlˤaʶːtsˤaʶːlˤ llbnaːn farawħun warajħaaːnun wad͡ʒannaau naʕijmin kjf ħaːlk aːnaː bχjr ʃkraː klmaːt klmaːt lknhaː mstχdmaː aːltlskwb aːld͡ʒdjd aʶːlˤdˤχm hwwkr faʔaammaaː aːlqaaːʕidaau aːlʔauwlaaː faʔaaχaðathumu aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶjħaʶaʶuʶ biaːlħaqqi fad͡ʒaʕalnaaːhum ʁuθaaːʔan fabuʕdanaː lilqawmi aʶːlˤðˤðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ ʔiinna aːlmuttaqijna fij d͡ʒannaaːtin waʕujuwnin aːlħrb thmnaː d͡ʒmjʕaːan kaːn ʔabwh ʃrˤtˤjaʶː ʔawlʔik aːlðjn aːʃtrwaː aʶːlˤdˤlˤaʶːlˤaʶ baːlhdaː fmaː rbħt td͡ʒaːrthm wmaː kaːnwaː mhtdjn kl aʶːlˤqtˤtˤ d͡ʒmjlwn warabbuka jaʕlamu maaː tukinnu sˤuʶduʶwrˤuʶhuʶm wamaaː juʕlinuwna ʕnd sdra aːlmnthaː ʔiillaaː mani aʶːrˤtaʶdˤaʶaʶː min rasuwlin faʔiinnahu jasluku min bajni jadajhi wamin χalfihi rˤaʶsˤaʶdaʶnaʶː hl kaːn kjn fj aːlbjt baːlʔams mlʔ kl d͡ʒnaːn ðkr kl lsaːn aʶːsˤlˤwhaʶː faʶːsˤbrˤwaʶː ʔaw laː tsˤbrˤwaʶː swaːʔ ʕljkm ʔinmaː td͡ʒzwn maː kntm tʕmlwn sjurfʕ aːlraːtb bdaːja mn ʔabrjl aːlnnaaːsu tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbaʶaʶːniʶ jaʶtˤlˤuʶbaʶaʶːniʶ wmθl klma χbjθa kʃd͡ʒra χbjθa aːd͡ʒtθt mn fwq aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ maː lhaː mn qraːr lqd kaːn mn aʶːlˤwaʶːdˤħ ʔanhu fj ʔalm walahu aːlkibrijaaːʔu fij aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wahuwa aːlʕazijzu aːlħakijmu falajsa kullu man ʔaʶaʶðˤhaʶrˤaʶ aːlχajra kaaːna min ʔaahlihi ʔanaː laː ʔaʕml lʔaj ʔaħd fawarabbi aːlssamaaːʔi waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ ʔiinnahu laħaqqun miθla maaː ʔaannakum taʶntˤiʶquʶwnaʶ ʔinhaː trjd ʔan tntðˤrˤ ħtaː ttzwd͡ʒ ʕn ʔabj ðrrin d͡ʒundubi bni d͡ʒunaaːdaaa wʔabj ʕbdi aːlrraħmni muʕaːði bni d͡ʒblin ʔanaː lstu muwaswasaːan ʔanhm jtbʕwnnj ħqqaːan tħtl aːlktb ʔakbr msaːħa fj ʁrfth waʃarra aːlddunjaaː waaːlʔaːχiraai fij aːlfud͡ʒuwri waaːlfaqri ʔard͡ʒw ʔan ttsˤlˤ bj ʔin ʔardtnj ʔaʶdˤaʶːʕt traːsj nðˤaʶːrˤthaʶː maːrj tˤwjlˤaʶ wqwjja raħima aːlllahu lˤuʶwtˤaʶnaʶː aːuʁdu ʕaaːlimanaː ʔaaw mutaʕallimanaː ʔaaw mustamiʕanaː ʔaaw muħibbanaː walaaː takun aːlχaaːmisa fatahlika walaaː takuwnuwaː kaaːllaðijna qaaːluwaː samiʕnaaː wahum laaː jasmaʕuwna lijasʔaala aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ ʕan sˤiʶdqiʶhiʶm waʔaaʕadda lilkaaːfirijna ʕaðaaːbanaː ʔaalijmanaː hdaː wbʃraː llmʔumnjn hl ldjk aːlkθjr mn aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ hnaː fj aːljaːbaːn ljn trˤkdˤ bsrʕa walaaː tataʕallamhu lituħaddiθa bihi fajakuwnu ʕalajk buwruhu maː ʔin aːnthaː aːd͡ʒtmaːʕhm ʃrʕwaː fj aːlʕml jʕqd aːlmd͡ʒls aːd͡ʒtmaːʕaː mrtjn fj aːlʃhr ʔin fj aːχtlaːf aːlljl waːlnhaːr wmaː χlq aːllh fj aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ lʔaːjaːt lqwm jtqwn wahija ʔaadnaaː rutbaai aːlʔaanafaai qaːlwaː fʔatwaː bh ʕlaː ʔaʕjn aːlnaːs lʕlhm jʃhdwn ʔan aːʕbdwaː aːllh waːtqwh wʔaʶtˤjʕwn fʔiðaː nfχ fj aʶːlˤsˤwrˤ nfχa waːħda kn mtʔakdaː mn aːntqaːʔ klaːmtk qbl ʔan tlˤfðˤhm ʔiinna aːllaðijna kafaruwaː waʶsˤaʶdduʶwaʶː ʕan sabijli aːlllahi qad dˤaʶlˤlˤuʶwaʶː dˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶnaʶː baʕijdanaː hj lam tðhb lʔan sˤdjqhaʶː lm jðhb bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm swra ʔanzlnaːhaː wfrˤdˤnaʶːhaʶː wʔanzlnaː fjhaː ʔaːjaːt bjnaːt lʕlkm tðkrwn aʶːlˤtˤrˤfaʶ aːlθaːlθa nħn laːʕbwn krh aːlqdm faʶʔaʶaʶsqiʶtˤ ʕalajnaaː kisafanaː mina aːlssamaaːʔi ʔiin kunta mina aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ faʶʕaʶsˤaʶwaʶː rasuwla rabbihim faʔaaχaðahum ʔaaχðaaan raaːbijaaan fahaðaaː ʔaaʃrafu aːlʔiiχwaaːni nafsanaː waʔaakramuhum tˤaʶbʕaʶnaʶː dʕwnaː nʔaχð qstˤaʶːaʶn mn aːlraːħa hl ʔanti ħqaːan trjdjn aːltħdθ ʕn hðaː aːlʔan mn wraːʔih d͡ʒhnm wjsqaː mn maːʔ sˤdjd ʔiið qaaːla lahum ʔaaχuwhum nuwħun ʔaalaaː tattaquwna wakunnaaː naʶχuʶwdˤuʶ maʕa aʶːlˤχaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶdˤiʶjnaʶ waħaaːd͡ʒd͡ʒanij baʶʕdˤuʶhuʶm ʕalajhi faqaaːla jaaː ʔaabataaːhu aːʁfir lahum lʔaanaahum laːa jaʕlamuwna maaːðaaː jafʕaluwna ʔiilaaː rabbika jawmaʔiiðin aːlmasaaːqu aːðkur raabaka ʔiiðaaː nasijta ʔant ttħdθ ʕnh jaː sˤaʶːʔiʶb wd͡ʒmʕ fʔawʕaː ʔanaː ʔaːkl wʔaʃrb maː kl mn qaːl qwlaː wfaː ʔaðlk lk ʔanti trjdjn aʶːlˤtˤlˤaʶːq ʔaljs kðlk aʶːlˤrˤfdˤ jʔulm ʔasʔalk sʔuaːlaːan waʔiinnamaaː aːlʔaaʁlabu ʔaan fkntm ʕlaː ʔaʕqaːbkm tnksˤwn ʔam lhm ʔaːlha tmnʕhm mn dwnnaː laː jsttˤjʕwn nsˤrˤ ʔanfshm wlaː hm mnaː jsˤħbwn walaaː nafʕa biaːlʕadwi qabla aːlqudraai wad͡ʒaaːʔa aːlssaħaraau firʕawna qaaːluwaː ʔiinna aːlqawli naʶqdˤuʶn limaaː ðakarnaaː qablu min tarki fuʶdˤuʶwlˤiʶhaʶaʶː aːnhm mʃʁwlwn d͡ʒdaː faːstd͡ʒbnaː lh wnd͡ʒjnaːh mn aːlʁm wkðlk nnd͡ʒj aːlmʔumnjn waʔaanʃada aːlmubarridu ʕan ʔaabij sulajmaaːna aːlʁanawijji waːldj jħbnaː juʕrafu aːlmud͡ʒrimuwna bisijmaaːhum fajuʔuχaðu biʶaʶːlˤnnaʶwaʶaʶːsˤiʶj waaːlʔaaqdaaːmi ðaːk sjrkun fʔahlknaː ʔaʃd mnhm btˤʃaʶː wmdˤaʶː mθl aːlʔawljn kaːn ʕljh ʔan jbħθ ʕn ʁrfth bnfsh ʔanaː ʁnjtu ʔaʁnjaan qaːl djmaː mχrd͡ʒanaː haːtfh aʶːntðˤrˤj ʔaʕrf mn jsttˤjʕ ʔan jslfnj bʕdˤ aːlmaːl maħabbaaun fij aːlʔaahli faʶtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶtuʶhaʶaʶː tamnaʕu aʶːlˤttaʶqsˤiʶjrˤaʶ waʃafaqatuhaaː taruddu ʕan aːlssarafi waaːlttabðijri ʔiinna ðalika laħaqqun taʶχaʶaʶːsˤuʶmuʶ ʔaahli aːlnnaaːri tʕd͡ʒbnj wðˤjftkiʶ tʔakl aːlbwma aːllħm kaːn mnnaːd jqtˤn mʕ waːldjh fj hðaː aːlmnzl aʶːlˤsˤsˤʁjrˤ hwa ʔaʶħdˤrˤ aʶːlˤtˤʕaʶːm lˤdˤjfhuʶ wqdm lhu aːlmʔawaːa lm tkn ʔaljs mwd͡ʒwda fj aːlaːd͡ʒtmaːʕ ʔaljs kðlk bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi ʔiiðaaː d͡ʒaaːʔa naʶsˤrˤuʶ aːlllahi waaːlfatħu wahaðaaː min χidaʕi aːld͡ʒahli waʁuruwri aːlkasali ʔiillaaː mawtatanaaː aːlʔauwlaaː wamaaː naħnu bimuʕaððabijna waːlðjn jbjtwn lrbhm sd͡ʒdaː wqjaːmaː ʔaχbrnj maː aːlðj jmknnj fʕlh lmsaːʕdtk millaaa ʔiibraaːhijma ħanijfanaː wamaaː kaaːna mina aːlmuʃrikijna ljd͡ʒzj aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħaʶːt mn fdˤlˤh ʔinh laː jħb aːlkaːfrjn waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi ʔijjaaːkum rahwanaː ʔiinnahum d͡ʒundun muʁraquwna aːlħqjqa juʶsˤlˤiʶħ lakum ʔaaʕmaaːlakum wajaʁfir lakum ðunuwbakum waman juʶtˤiʶʕiʶ aːlllaha warasuwlahu faqad faaːza fawzanaː ʕaʶðˤiʶjmaʶnaʶː aːllaðijna laaː juʔutuwna aːlzzakaaːaa wahum biaːlʔaːχiraai hum kaaːfiruwna faʔaammaaː man ʔauwtija kitaaːbahu bijamijnihi fajaquwlu haaːʔuumu aːqraʔuwaː kitaaːbijah ħaːwl twm ʔijqaːf maːrj mn ʃrb ʔaːχr zd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa mn bjn aːlqmħ waːlʃʕjr ʔaan takfija ʔiʃfaaːqa aːlmuħibbi waħaðara aːlwaaːmiqi falajsa limuʃfiqin θiqaaun ʕhdnaː aːlmwt mwtaː w aːlħjaːa ħjaːa fltʕd͡ʒbn lqwm jmʃwn ʔamwaːtaː ʔaawalam jarawaː kajfa biaːlʕaaːdaai mad͡ʒraaː aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶbʕiʶ mn aːlðj aʶːtsˤlˤ bʔaːn wamizaaːd͡ʒuhu min tasnijmin ʕad͡ʒibt liman jaħtamij min aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶtˤʕiʶmaʶaʶiʶ lˤiʶmaʶdˤaʶrˤrˤaʶaʶːtiʶhaʶaʶː ʔinhaː ʔaʶtˤwlˤ mnj bkθjr taʕlamuwna ʔaafaman jattaqij biwad͡ʒhihi suwʔa aːlʕaðaaːbi jawma aːlqijaaːmaai waqijla lˤiʶlˤðˤðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmiʶjnaʶ ðuwquwaː maaː kuntum taksibuwna hl bʔimkaːnj ʔan ʔaːχð tðkrtj fj aʶːlˤmtˤaʶːrˤ bʕd ʕʃr waħusni aːlmutaaːrakaai baʕda aʶːlˤwaʶrˤtˤaʶaʶiʶ wʔin kaːn ðw ʕsra fnðˤrˤaʶ ʔilaː mjsra wʔan tsˤdqwaʶː χjr lkm ʔin kntm tʕlmwn warad͡ʒaaːʔan litalaaːfij maaː ʔaaslafa min taʶqsˤiʶjrˤiʶhiʶ wajamnaʕuwna aːlmaaːʕuwna waqaaːla qarijnuhu haðaaː maaː ladajja ʕatijdun ʔanaː tħdθt mʕhaː ʔanti lsti msʔuwla ʕn tlk aʶːlˤfwdˤaʶː ʔatt ltraːnj ʕjd fiʶsˤħ sʕjd wkm ʔarslnaː mn nbj fj aːlʔawljn flaː mtrd͡ʒm qaaːla qarijnuhu rabbanaaː maaː ʔaʶaʶtˤʁaʶjtuʶhuʶ walakin kaaːna fij dˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶn baʕijdin w sˤhjlˤ aːlχjl ʕnd aʶːlˤtˤlˤb hl ʔinthjt jdʕj ʔanh rsaːm ʔinj mtʕb bʕdˤ aːlʃjʔ ʔanaː qaːdm mn wmaː kaːn aːllh mʕðbhm whm jstʁfrwn qaaːluwaː ʔiinnamaaː ʔaanta mina aːlmusaħħarijna waʔaanaaː aːχtartuka faaːstamiʕ limaaː juwħaaː hl jd͡ʒb ʔan tðhbj ʔilaː mktb aːlbrjd tħtaːd͡ʒ aːld͡ʒzaːʔir ʔilaː mrˤdˤhaʶː ħjnmaː bdʔat aːlnd͡ʒwm aːlbdaːʔija fj ʔiʶdˤaʶːʔaʶ aːlkwn srq aːlmaːl aːnaː mhnds kaːn saːmj mʃwwʃaː faʔaatbaʕuwhum muʃriqijna ʔanaː ʃdjda aːlfχr bʔabj waman jaʕʃu ʕan ðikri aːlrraħmani nuʶqaʶjjiʶdˤ lahu ʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːnaʶnaʶː fahuwa lahu qarijnun aːld͡ʒbl mʁtˤaʶː baːlθlwd͡ʒ tilka ʔaːjaaːtu aːlkitaaːbi aːlmubijni famin ħaqqihim ʔaan jaʕrifuwaː ħaqqahu waʶjaʶstaʶbtˤiʶnuʶwaʶː ʔaahlahu wabihim min aːlħaaːd͡ʒaai waaːlʕad͡ʒzi maaː waʶsˤaʶfnaʶaʶː wʔant ʔaʶjdˤaʶnaʶː kaːdt ʃaːħnaun tdhsunij hl ldjkm maːʔ mʕdnj wanujassiruka liljusraaː ʔalm jtsˤlˤ ʔaħdhm baʶːlˤʃrˤtˤaʶ ʃqtj haːdʔia wnðˤjfaʶ twm jʃrb qljlaː mn aːlmaːʔ aːlddunjaaː ʔimmaaː muʶsˤiʶjbaʶaʶuʶn muwd͡ʒiʕaaun w ʕqdnaː aːlʕzm ʔan tħjaː aːld͡ʒzaːʔir jastaʕd͡ʒiluwnaka biaːlʕaðaaːbi waʔiinna d͡ʒahannama lˤaʶmuʶħiʶjtˤaʶaʶuʶn waʶaʶːlˤmuʶsˤaʶaʶːhaʶrˤaʶaʶuʶ waaːlmawaddaau waaːlbirru wʔin d͡ʒhnm lmwʕdhm ʔad͡ʒmʕjn hw ħrˤdˤ ʕlaː aːlʃʁb ʔaʶðˤnnhuʶ jχfj ʃjʔianaː fajatabahrad͡ʒa biʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤuʶlˤaʶħaʶaʶːʔiʶ walajsa minhum jħb tnaːwl aʶːlˤslˤtˤaʶ baːllħm ðlk bʔan aːllh nzl aːlktaːb baːlħq wʔin aːlðjn aːχtlfwaː fj aːlktaːb lfj ʃqaːq bʕjd tħwjl aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤwaʶːt aːlaː nsˤwsˤ bjdˤaʶ aːljwm χjr mn dd͡ʒaːd͡ʒa aːlʁd aːlʃrka ʕaːnt aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶ ʕalaaː aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːħiʶbiʶ aːlmbnaː bh ʕʃrwn tˤwaʶːbq sˤrˤaʶːtˤ aːlðjn ʔanʕmt ʕljhm falaʕallaka baaːχiʕun nafsaka ʕalaaː ʔaːθaaːrihim ʔiin lam juʔuminuwaː bihaðaaː aːlħadijθi ʔaasafanaː waqaaːla bazard͡ʒamhar aːlʃʃaʁlu mad͡ʒhadaaun waaːlfaraaːʁu mafsadaaun jaː lhaː mn zhra mskjna wmaː ðˤlˤmnaʶːhm wlkn kaːnwaː hm aʶːlˤðˤaʶːlˤmjn llmʃaːrka jkfj aːldχwl lmwqʕ aːlmʃrwʕ maaː lakum laaː taʶntˤiʶquʶwnaʶ wmaː ʔarslnaːk ʔilaː kaːfa llnaːs bʃjraː wnðjraː wlkn ʔakθr aːlnaːs laː jʕlmwn faljadʕu naaːdijahu knt fj dwr ʕrˤdˤ llsjnmaː tʕrˤdˤ ʃkjb lħaːdθ sjr hmaː tstmʕaːn llmðjaːʕ lqd wsˤlˤ faʶtˤaʶaʶːfaʶ ʕalajhaaː tˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶfuʶn min rabbika wahum naaːʔiimuwna bima ʔaadrakt haðaaː aːlʕilma qaaːla fstðkrwn maː ʔaqwl lkm wʔaʶfwdˤ ʔamrj ʔilaː aːllh ʔin aːllh bsˤjrˤ baːlʕbaːd wamaaː aʶːnsˤaʶrˤaʶfaʶ ʕanhu mimmaaː huwa ʔaaʃaddu min maʶrˤaʶdˤiʶhiʶ waχawfihi kaːn aːld͡ʒw baːrdanaː fj ðlk aːljwm waʶːjdˤaʶːaʶn bdʔat tmtˤrˤ fatakuwnu rahbaau aʶːlˤssuʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːniʶ ʔaaʃadda zad͡ʒranaː waʔaaqwaaː radʕanaː zaːd aːlsaːʔiq mn srʕa sjaːrth hðaː nzlhm jwm aːldjn ʔanaː ʔaχðthaː ʔilj aːlmstʃfj tˤlˤb mnj aːlmsaːʕda hum trkwnj ʔaðhb tʕaːla bmfrdk waːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħaʶːt ʔawlʔik ʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aːld͡ʒna hm fjhaː χaːldwn ʕsaː rbnaː ʔan jbdlnaː χjraː mnhaː ʔinaː ʔilaː rbnaː raːʁbwn lisaʕjihaaː rˤaʶaʶːdˤiʶjaʶaʶuʶn bʁrbai aːlsaːʕa ʔaħbbtk ʕaːda maː knt ʔaʶsˤaʶːħbh lˤsˤjd aːlsmk aːltfsjr jmkn ʔan jkwn ʔakθr tʕqjdaː jawma hum ʕalaaː aːlnnaaːri juftanuwna fljkn twm ʔaraːd ʔan jktʃf mn aːlfnaːn aːlðj kaːn jʕzf ʕlaː aːlkmaːn btˤrˤjqaʶ ʁaːba ʔarknsaːs aːlmaʁribajni lm jftħ saːmj rsaːla ljlaː ħttaː waʔaammaaː ʔaːdaaːbu aʶːlˤmuʶwaʶaʶːdˤaʶʕaʶaʶiʶ waʶaʶːlˤiʶaʶːsˤtˤiʶlˤaʶaʶːħiʶ faʶdˤaʶrˤbaʶaʶːniʶ ʔakl wħmd χjr mn ʔakl wsˤmt aːddʕaː saːmj ʔannh tˤbjb ʔaʶrˤχsˤ mn aːltmr fj aʶːlˤbsˤrˤaʶ man ʔaʶuʶʕtˤiʶjaʶ faʃakara waʶʔiʶiʶħbaʶaʶːtˤiʶ aːlʔaad͡ʒri laː jsttˤjʕ ʔaħdun msaːʕdtj tħsˤsˤlˤt ljlaː ʕlaː ʃhaːda mmrˤrˤdˤaʶ waribħu tid͡ʒaaːraain nħn mn nfs aːld͡ʒaːmʕa maːðaː trjd ʔan tʔakl saːmj laː jħbb aːlmslmjn waħukija ʔaanna aːlrraʃijda ħabasa rad͡ʒulanaː θumma saʔaala ʕanhu baʕda zamaaːnin min ʃarri maː χalaqa faljadʕu naːdijahu liʔaanna aːlmukaaːfiʔia ʔaaʕaðru wamadχala aːlʃʃari masluwkanaː daʕwaaun mustad͡ʒaaːbaaun ʔaan laaː jarfaʕa bikalaaːmihi sˤaʶwtaʶnaʶː mustankaranaː walaaː janzaʕid͡ʒa lahu aːnziʕaaːd͡ʒanaː mustahd͡ʒananaː ʔaantum waʔaːbaːʔuukumu aːlʔaaqdamwna tχaʶːsˤmaʶː saːmj w ljlaː ħwl mʃkl ʔidmaːnhaː ʕlaː aːlkħwl ʔiinnaː χalaqnaaː aːlʔiinsaːna min nuʶtˤfaʶaʶiʶn ʔaamʃaːd͡ʒin nabtaljhi fad͡ʒaʕalnaːhu samjʕanaː baʶsˤjrˤaʶnaʶː nħn ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ qdaːmaː ʔaʶfdˤlˤ rkwb aːldraːd͡ʒa ʔiinnaː lamuʁramwna walanuðjqannahum mina aːlʕaðaːbi aːlʔaadnaː dwna aːlʕaðaːbi aːlʔaakbari laʕallahum jard͡ʒiʕwna waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi man lam jaʃkur limunʕimihi aːstaħaqqa qaʶtˤʕaʶ aːlnniʕmaai kjf kaːnt ʔid͡ʒaːztk aːχtbr aʶːlˤtˤtˤbjb rdwd ʔafʕaːl saːmj bmaː ʔank hnaː lʕlnaː nbdʔa kaːn ldjnaː mdrrs ʕnsˤrˤj aːld͡ʒaːr wlw d͡ʒaːr ðlk χaːrq llʕaːda waʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤuʶbħiʶ ʔiiðaː ʔaasfara jaduhu maʕa ʔaajdijnaaː faʶwaʶsˤaʶlˤaʶhuʶ aːktifaaːʔun bihaðaaː aʶːlˤttaʶʕrˤiʶjdˤiʶ jazraʕu aːlfalaːaħu aʶːlˤqaʶsˤaʶbaʶ maaː lawnuhaaː waʶʔiʶiʶsˤlˤaʶaʶːħiʶ χalalihi ʔinh sˤdjqj hl tʕrfwnh jaː ʃbaːb laaː tuʕaððib aːlħajawaaːna rubba dahrin bakajtu minhu falammaaː sˤiʶrˤtuʶ fijhi bakajtu ʕalajhi wakaaːna sufjaaːnu bnu ʕujajnaaa raħimahu aːlllahu jataʔaawwalu qawlh taʕaaːlaaː waʶtˤaʶmaʶsaʶ bahd͡ʒaaa bajaaːnihi dˤħħt ljlaː bsaːmj ltnd͡ʒw bnfshaː kaːn saːmj mdrrsaː lljwʁaː mtaː ʕjd mjlaːdk saːmj mdjr aːlʕjaːda wahaðaaː ʔinnamaaː jaʶsˤiʶħħuʶ liðij aːlnnafsi aːlʔaabijjaai ʔajn hj nʕaːlj ʔin klma mrkz aːlmdjna tʃjr ʔilaː aːld͡ʒzʔ aːltd͡ʒaːrj mn ʔaj mdjna wasuwʔi aːlmunqalabi ʔanaː mtʔaθθr kθjraː wad͡ʒamaħat bihi ʕan qanaaːʕaai zuhdihi kaːnt ljlaː tdrrs fj mdrsa aːlʔaħd qultu liʔaaʕraaːbijjin maaː ʔaʶaʶtˤwaʶlˤaʶ ʕumurak ʔajmknk ʔaχðnaː ʔilaː aːlmtħf aʶːlˤbrˤjtˤaʶːnj waʔiinna lˤwtˤaʶnaʶː lamina aːlmursaljna marra biʶʕuʶsˤfuʶwrˤiʶn jaduwru ħawla ʕuʶsˤfuʶwrˤaʶaʶiʶn faqaaːla lˤiʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbiʶhiʶ jaː lajtahaː kaːnati aʶːlˤqaʶːdˤiʶjaʶaʶaʶ falaaː tankaʃifu ʔillaaː wahuwa bihaaː maʶsˤrˤuʶwʕuʶn kamaaː qaaːla aːlllahu taʕaaːlaaː lm laː jmknnj mʁaːdra ʁrftj hl jmknk aːn trjnj aʶːlˤtˤrˤjq hðaː klb aʶːlˤʔiʶnfsˤaʶːlˤjwn hm ʔaʕdaːʔ aːlʔitħaːd walaː ʔauqsimu biaːlnnafsi aːlllawaːmaai rʔaaː saːmj maː kaːnt ljlaː trjdh ʔan jraːh man ʕaʶðˤuʶmaʶt maraaːfiquhu ʔaʶaʶʕðˤaʶmaʶhuʶ muraaːfiquhu dʕaː saːmj ljlaː kj tʕtnq aːlʔislaːm ʔiið qaaːla lahu rabbuhu ʔaaslim qaaːla ʔaaslamtu lirabbi aːlʕaaːlamijna liʕizzi aːlkamaaːli waʕinda aʶːlˤmuʶnaʶaʶːðˤaʶrˤaʶaʶiʶ ʔaʶaʶwdˤaʶħuʶ aːttaχaðwaː ʔaajmaːnahum d͡ʒunnaaan faʶsˤaʶddwaʶː ʕan sabjli aːlllahi ʔiinnahum saːʔa maː kaːnwaː jaʕmalwna lˤiʶjaʶsˤiʶħħaʶ lahu aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶwaʶaʶːbuʶ wajatabajjana lahu aːlħaqqu saːmj jmlk hðaː aːlmnzl ʔinna aːlʕaaːqila man ʕaqluhu fij ʔirʃaaːdin lm jkn baʶːsttˤaʶːʕaʶ saːmj aʶːlˤaʶːntðˤaʶːrˤ faʔiinna maʕa aːlʕusri jusranaː wad͡ʒaʕalahaaː min dalaaːʔiili rusulihi waʶʔaʶaʶwdˤaʶħaʶ bihaaː aːlħud͡ʒd͡ʒaaa ʕalaaː χalqihi twm mtˤlˤwb bthma aːlqtl ʕalaː ʔaan nubaddila ʔaamθaːlakum wanunʃiʔiakum fj maː laː taʕlamwna ʔiinnahaː saːʔat mustaqarranaː wamuqaːmanaː waaːnħaaːza ʕan maʶʕsˤiʶjaʶtiʶhaʶaʶː aʶːntðˤrˤ ʔarjd aːlħdjθ mʕk famu aːlʕaaːqili mulad͡ʒd͡ʒamun ʔiðaaː hamma biaːlkalaaːmi ʔaaħd͡ʒama falaaː tatbaʕu aːliaːħtimaaːla walaaː taqwaaː ʕalaaː sˤaʶbrˤiʶn waaːlkaððaaːbu jasriqu ʕaqlak aːttaʔiid ħattaaː taʃfaʕa lilnnaaːsi juʶdˤiʶlˤlˤuʶ bihi kaθijranaː wajahdij bihi kaθijranaː wamaaː juʶdˤiʶlˤlˤuʶ bihi ʔiillaaː aːlfaaːsiqijna qawaːrjra min fiʶdˤdˤaʶaʶiʶn qaddarwhaː taqdjranaː kaːnt ljlaː tfdˤdˤlˤ qdˤaʶːʔ wqthaː χaːrd͡ʒ aːlmnzl ʔajj tˤrˤjq jʔuddj ʔilaː aʶːlˤʃaʶːtˤʔiʶ ft fj ʕdˤd flaːn wθqt ljlaː bsaːmj fajastaħlij aːlkaðiba aːllaðij lajsat ʁaraaːʔiibuhu maʕuwzaaan waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aʶːlˤrˤrˤiʶdˤaʶaʶː biaːlkafaaːfi juʔuaddij ʔilaaː aːlʕafaaːfi ʔalaː tzaːl tlk aːlʕjaːda mwd͡ʒwda lijaʕlama ʔaannahu mamnuwħun biħusni aːlddifaaːʕi muðhilun ʕan aːlfikri fij aːlnnawaaːʔiibi aːlmulimmaai waqaaːla ʔaufnuwnu aːlttaʁlibiju wataʔakulwna aːltturaːθa ʔaaklanaː lammanaː faʔiin lam tarahaaː tanqaaːdu biaːlttaħðijri waaːlʔiirhaaːbi laː ʔaħbb ʔan ʔaraːki tʕaːnjn ħusnu aʶːlˤmaʶħdˤaʶrˤiʶ waaːħtimaaːlu aːlzzalaai waqillaau aːlmalaaːli liʔaanna aːlfaqijra taaːrikun waaːlʁanijja mulaaːbisun qddm saːmj jdh lljlaː quli aːlllaha ʔaaʕbudu muʶχlˤiʶsˤaʶnaʶː lahu djnj ljs ldj ʔaʃqaːʔ qutila ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶːbuʶ aːlʔauχdwdi qaːrin hðaː mʕ maːðaː jħdθ fj msˤrˤ waaːlbaħri aːlmasd͡ʒwri laaː taʔakul waʔaanta ʃabʕaaːnu waχalaqa aːld͡ʒaːnna min maːrid͡ʒin min naːrin saːmj laː jtħrrk wajatawaqqaaː ʔaaθarahu walam jakun lahum min ʃurakaːʔiihim ʃufaʕaːʔu wakaːnwaː biʃurakaːʔiihim kaːfirjna fj kl mkaːn ʔaʶnðˤrˤ aːnhaː md͡ʒrd ħfna mn aʶːlˤtˤrˤq aːlmsdwda χð jaː d͡ʒjm kaːn saːmj jħsb ħbbaːt msbħth laː jnbʁj ʕlaː ʔajj mdrrs aːlqjaːm bhðaː kaðlika nafʕalu biaːlmud͡ʒrimjna aʶːħdˤrˤh aːlaː hnaː faʶlˤjaʶnðˤuʶrˤiʶ aːlʔiinsaːnu mimma χuliqa lahu maː fij aːlssamaːwaːti wamaː fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wahuwa aːlʕalijju aʶːlˤʕaʶðˤjmuʶ ʔalqj aʶːlˤqbdˤ ʕljk ltd͡ʒaːwzk ʕlaː aːlmmtlkaːt ðˤnntk ðkrt ʔank wħjd waaːlʕarabu taquwlu daχala bajtanaː maaː ʔauχrid͡ʒa minhu kaːnaː saːmj w ljlaː jtʃaːd͡ʒraːn baːstmraːr bʃʔan ðlk aːlħml hðaː ʔibnj bʕdˤ aʶːlˤʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔ laː juʶʕwwdˤwn jaaː rasuwla aːlllahi wakajfa aːlmaχrad͡ʒu qaaːla walajaħmilunna ʔaaθqaːlahum waʔaaθqaːlanaː maʕa ʔaaθqaːlihim walajusʔaalunna jawma aːlqijaːmaai ʕammaː kaːnwaː jaftarwna sjntðˤrˤwnnaʶː ʔinn saːmj jʁrq fj aːlmsbħ minhaaː suwʔu ðˤaʶnniʶhiʶ biχaaːliqihi ʔaannahu laaː jarzuquhum ʔillaaː min d͡ʒihatihi lmaːðaː trjnj hðh aʶːlˤsˤsˤwrˤaʶ fawarraaː ʕan aːlʔiiχbaaːri binasabihi biʔaamrin jaħtamilu ðˤaʶlˤlˤaʶt aːlʕaaːmilaau muʃtaʁilaaan waħakaaː kaʕbu aːlʔaaħbaaːri ʔaannahu maktuwbun fij aːlttawraaːai aːlllahuma laaː jaʔatij biaːlχajraaːti ʔillaaː ʔaanta walaaː jadfaʕu aːlssajiʔiaaːti ʔillaaː ʔaanta ʔiinna aːllaðjna laː juʔuminwna biaːlʔaːχiraai lajusammwna aːlmalaːʔiikaaa tasmijaaa aːlʔaunθaː waliðalika qijla qaddim liħaaːd͡ʒatik baʶʕdˤaʶ lad͡ʒaaːd͡ʒatik ʕaːd ʔilaː aːlktaːba hl ldjkmaː ʔajja drws hðh aʶːlˤðˤðˤhjrˤaʶ aːstafraʁnaaː fijhaaː aːlmad͡ʒhuwda faqaaːla maaː nafaʕak aːlllahu biðalika walaaː dˤaʶrˤrˤaʶniʶj ħðaːrj saːmj kaːna mustaːʔaːan qaljlaːan walaaː maʃaqqaaa ʕalaaː musdijhi χlʕ saːmj kll mlaːbsh w ðhb llssbaːħa rmaː saːmj aːlmlaːbs aːltj aːstdaːhaː ʔaθnaːʔ aːld͡ʒrjma ʔiðaaː lam tad͡ʒid aʶːlˤlˤlˤaʶfðˤaʶaʶaʶ waaːqiʕaaan mawqiʕahaaː hnaːk tfaːħa waːħda ʕlaː aːlmktb aːʕtrf aːlddktwr sˤaʶːdq laːħqaː ʔannh lm tkn ldjh fkra ʕn sbb tlk aːlwfaːa fjhimaː faːkihaaun wanaχlun warummaːnun aːns maː jħznk waʔaanʃadtu liaːmraʔaaain min aːlʕarabi waʔaammaaː aʶːlˤʃʃaʶrˤtˤuʶ aːlθθaaːnij aʶːiʶmdˤʁ tˤʕaʶːmk d͡ʒjdaːan waqijla lilbadwijji faqaaːla walaqad d͡ʒaːʔahum mina aːlʔaanbaːʔi maː fjhi muzdad͡ʒarun wajanbaʁij liman ʔaunzila manzilaaa aːlmustaʃaaːri waʔauħilla maħalla aʶːlˤnnaʶaʶːsˤiʶħiʶ aːlmawaaːddi ħattaaː sˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ maʔamuwla aːlnnud͡ʒħi tlqqaː saːmj ħkmjn baːlmʔubbd lqd ʔanhjt ʕmlj lltw ʔaʶðˤnn ʔan hðaː maː jħdθ walasawfa juʶʕtˤjkaʶ rabbuka faʶtaʶrˤdˤaʶː kaːnt ljlaː ttʕaːfaː mn ʕmljja d͡ʒraːd͡ʒjja fj aːlqlb qaːm saːmj bkll maː bwsʕh kj jubqj aːlʕjaːda mftwħa waʔiiðaaː ʔaːla aːlbaχijlu ʔilaaː maaː waʶsˤaʶfnaʶaʶː min haðihi aːlʔaaχlaaːqi aːlmaðmuwmaai waaːlʃʃijami man lam juʶqaʶnniʶtˤ aːlnnaaːsa min raħmaai aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː flntħrrk bsrʕa faʔiinna aːld͡ʒannaaa hija aːlmaʔawaː wakaaːna fijhi tqaːʕd saːmj qaːl lj nfs aːlʃʃjʔ ʔinnhaː fj mkaːn ln tʕwd mnh ʔabdaː ʔaʶaʶntˤiʶqaʶ biʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤiʶdqiʶ mrħbaː jaː twm ʔiħdaː ħqaːʔibj mfqwda maʕa maaː juθijruhu min ħanaqin wajuksibuhu min ħiqdin faʔiin sˤaʶaʶːdaʶfaʶ bihimmatihi ħaʶðˤðˤaʶnaʶː naaːla bihi ʔaamalanaː kaaːna fijmaaː naaːlahu kaʶaʶːlˤmuʶʁtaʶsˤiʶbiʶ dˤħħaʶː saːmj bħjaːth kllhaː mn ʔad͡ʒl ljlaː θamanuhu sittaau daraaːhima waʶniʶsˤfuʶn tˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶqrˤuʶ bʔimkaːn hðaː aːlddwaːʔ tnwjm ħsˤaʶːn ʕlm saːmj ʔann aʶːlˤʃʃrˤtˤaʶ kaːnt tbħθ ʕnh waqad qaaːla ʕumaru bnu aʶːlˤχaʶtˤtˤaʶaʶːbiʶ rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu laaː tastafizzuwaː aːlddumuwʕa biaːlttaðakuri ʔanaː ʔaʕml fj qsm aʶːlˤsˤsˤħaʶ lm jkn swaː θlaːθa baːlʁjn fj tlk aːlʁrfa lqd trk aːlmdrsa aːlʔasbwʕ aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤj aːlʁnaː ʁnaː aːlqlb laː ʁnaː aːlmaːl walaqad raːwadwhu ʕan dˤaʶjfiʶhiʶ faʶtˤaʶmaʶsnaʶː ʔaaʕjunahum faðwqwaː ʕaðaːbj wanuðuri waaːstiʃaaːraai naʶaʶːsˤiʶħiʶn musaaːlimin kaffaaːraau aʶːlˤtˤtˤiʶjaʶrˤaʶaʶiʶ aːlttawakulu ʕalaaː aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi biaːlʔiiħsaaːni jaʶrˤtaʶbiʶtˤuʶ aːlʔiinsaaːnu faʔiin lam tafʕaluwaː walan tafʕaluwaː faaːttaquwaː aːlnnaaːra aːllatij waquwduhaaː aːlnnaaːsu waaːlħid͡ʒaaːraau ʔauʕiddat lilkaaːfirijna waqad qijla man ʁalabathu aːlħidaau falaaː taʁtarra bimawaddatihi aːlttufaaːħaau ħlwaaun ʔaljst tˤbjbaʶ fajaðilla biʶaʶːlˤdˤdˤaʶrˤaʶʕiʶ wajuħrama biaːlʔaubbahaai lkl ʃʕaːʕ mnħaː wtˤwjlˤaʶ w ʔitd͡ʒaːh ʔaaχbara ʔaanna aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶrˤiʶjqaʶ ʔilaaː aːld͡ʒannaai aːħtimaaːlu aːlmakaaːrihi waʶaʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶrˤiʶjqaʶ ʔilaaː aːlnnaaːri aːttibaaːʕu aːlʃʃahawaaːti hl bʔimkaːnj zjaːrtk ʁdaː walaaː muʃijra kaðij nuʶsˤħiʶn wamaqdiraain fij muʃkili aːlʔaamri faaːχtar ðaaːka muʶntaʶsˤiʶħaʶnaʶː waʶaʶːlˤχaʶsˤlˤaʶaʶuʶ aːlχaaːmisaau faʔiinna haðihi aːlʔaumuwra tamnaʕu min aːlʔiiðaaːʕaai saaːra aʶːlˤqiʶtˤaʶaʶːrˤuʶ ʔanaː msrwra lʕdm wd͡ʒwdj hnaːk kaːn saːmj mhtmmaː bʃʔuwnh fqtˤ ʔijlaːfihim riħlaaa aːlʃʃitaːʔi waʶaʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶjfiʶ ʔad͡ʒbr saːmj ljlaː ʕlaː aːlððhaːb mʕh haː qd wsˤlˤt aːlħaːfla hm jnaːqʃwn aːlmʃkla smʕ saːmj dˤd͡ʒd͡ʒaʶ qwjja faʕalaaːma aːlttahaaːfutu fij aːlnnaaːri lam jusaaːfir muħammadun qtˤʕ saːmj aʶːlˤaʶːttsˤaʶːlˤ qd jdrk aːlmtʔanj bʕdˤ ħaːd͡ʒth wqd jkwn mʕ aːlmstʕd͡ʒl aːlzll jʃʕr twm baːlmsʔuwlja ʕmaː ħdθ biʔaajdj safaraain ʔaaʔaulqija aːlððikru ʕalajhi min bajninaː bal huwa kaððaːbun ʔaaʃirun wajastaʁnij ʕan aːlʕuluwfaai biraʕjihi ʔaaʔaantum ʔaanʃaʔatum ʃad͡ʒaratahaː ʔaam naħnu aːlmunʃiʔiwna waðalika biaːstinzaaːlihi rabbihi kaman zujjina lahu swʔu ʕamalihi waaːttabaʕwaː ʔaahwaːʔahum walirabbika faʶaʶːsˤbiʶrˤ hðaː aːlʃbl mn ðaːk aːlʔasd nsˤħh tˤbjbh baːlʔiqlaːʕ ʕn aːltdχjn ʔanaː ʕdˤw fj naːdj aːldraːmaː lmaːðaː ʔant mtʔaχr tsbħ bmhaːra ʔaljs kðlk jbdw lj ʔannj laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ td͡ʒaːwz aːlʔamr jwd͡ʒd aːlkθjr lʔatʕlmh tfnn fj aːlbχl wajadun ʕinda fahuwa jaʶðˤuʶnnuʶ ʔaan laaː χawfa lahu ʔillaaː ʔijjaaːhu aʶːχlˤtˤ aːlħsaːʔ wnħn ʔaqrb ʔiljh mnkm wlkn laː tbsˤrˤwn ʔiillaaː raħmaaan min rabbika ʔiinna faʶdˤlˤaʶhuʶ kaaːna ʕalajka kabijranaː hl hʔulaːʔ d͡ʒwaːrbj ʔam d͡ʒwaːrbk hlaː saːʕdnj ʔaħd rd͡ʒaːʔaː flwlaː ʔanh ħajθu jaquwlu ʔin aːlmtqjn fj d͡ʒnaːt wʕjwn aʶːntˤlˤqwaʶː ʔilaː maː kntm bh tkðbwn tnzjl aːlʕzjz aːlrħjm maː rʔaj twm ħjaːl hðaː kaːn qd rn aːld͡ʒrs ʕndmaː wsˤlˤt ʔilaː aːlmdrsa rd͡ʒd͡ʒ qbl aːlftħ rd͡ʒaːʔan ʔilaː rbk jwmʔið aːlmstqr ʔaraːd twm sjaːraan aʶːqtsˤaʶːdjaʶ ʔaazifati aːlʔaːzifaau hðh aʶːlˤtˤaʶːwlˤaʶ msˤnwʕaʶ mn aːlχʃb qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi ʔiðaaː aːustuʕmila aːlʕadlu ʔaaʁnaaː ʕan aːlʃʃud͡ʒaaːʕaai maːðaː tqtrħ ʔan nfʕl aːlʔaːn walajsa limaaː d͡ʒaaːwazahaaː rutbaaun muqaddaraaun ʔaajaħsabuwna ʔaannamaaː numidduhum bihi min maaːlin wabanijna waħaqquhu ʃukru aːlnniʕmaai fahal ʕasajtum ʔiin tawallajtum ʔaan tufsiduwaː fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ waʶtuʶqaʶtˤtˤiʶʕuʶwaʶː ʔaarħaaːmakum twqft aːlsaːʕa aːnh jʕjʃ fj tfaːħa fij raqqin mmanʃuwrin laː laː ʔaʕlm hnaːk ʔaʃjaːʔ kθjra lm liman jaʃaaːʔu wajaqdiru walakinna ʔaakθara aːlnnaaːsi laaː jaʕlamuwna jaaː ʔaahla aːlʃʃaaːmi aːsmaʕuwaː qawla ʔaaχin naʶaʶːsˤiʶħiʶn ʔajn zwaːrq aːlnd͡ʒaːa limiθli haðaaː faljaʕmali aːlʕaaːmiluwna mnhkaː wakullu ðalika ħaθθun minhu sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama ʕalaaː aːlʔaulfaai wakaffun ʕan aːlfurqaai wʕnd ndaːk nlbj ʔad͡ʒl ʔiðaː rd͡ʒt aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ rd͡ʒaː laː ʔaħb aːllʕb mʕh nħn ʔant ʔam tˤaʶːlˤb twd͡ʒd st d͡ʒml baːlmʁwlja fj ttwjbaː ħaːljaː ʔinj ʔatmʃaː mʕhaː bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm sbħ aːsm rbk aːlʔaʕlaː mrħbaːan d͡ʒmjʕaːan lm jtmkn mn aːltħkm fj ʁdˤbh falawlaaː ʔiin ʔilaː aːlknjsa mʕ waːldjk wsˤlˤlˤ lhaː hl bʔimkaːnk aːltʕrf ʕlaː ðlk aːlrd͡ʒl bwaʶːstˤaʶ hðh aʶːlˤsˤwrˤaʶ fʔin mʕ aːlʕsr jsraː ʔant tsrʕ fj aːlklaːm lm ʔard ʔan ʔafwwt ʃjʔiaː laː tqlq qsˤ ʃʕrk laː ʔan ʔaqrʔa ʃjʔiaːan maː laː jwd͡ʒd ʔaml lw knt bsˤħaʶ d͡ʒjda lknt sʕjdaː wmaː ʔahlknaː mn qrja ʔilaː wlhaː ktaːb mʕlwm wamaaː ʕalaaː aːllaðijna jattaquwna min ħisaaːbihim min ʃajʔin walakin ðikraaː laʕallahum jattaquwna ʔaːχiðijna maaː ʔaːtaaːhum rabbuhum ʔiinnahum kaaːnuwaː qabla ðalika muħsinijna laː jʃtrj ʔilaː maː jħtaːd͡ʒ ʔiljh ʔanta trjd aʶːlˤtˤlˤaʶːq ʔaljs kðlk laː ʃjʔ χaːrq llʕaːda ħdθ ʕalaaː baʶʕdˤiʶn jatalaːwamuwna ħjθ jʃjr ʔilaː ʔanh fj maː mdˤaʶː kaːnt aːlmaːda aːlmkwna lkl aːlmd͡ʒraːt χlq aːlʔinsaːn mn ʕd͡ʒl sʔarjkm ʔaːjaːtj flaː tstʕd͡ʒlwn aːjn klbk laː ʃk ʔan twm kaːn ldjh wqt kaːf ljnd͡ʒz aːlʕml mn hw ħjwaːnk aʶːlˤmfdˤlˤ jðˤhrˤ ʔan aʶːlˤtˤqs jtħsn ʃraːʔuh ʁaːl baːlnsba lj mn tmk lbaːb aːlsmaːʔ wlqd nd͡ʒjnaː bnj ʔisraːʔijl mn aːlʕðaːb aːlmhjn wawad͡ʒadaka ʕaaːʔiilanaː faʔaaʁnaaː sna aːllh fj aːlðjn χlwaː mn qbl wln td͡ʒd lsna aːllh tbdjlaː waθamaraau aːlʕamali ʔaan juʔud͡ʒara ʕalajhi ʔamn aʶːlˤnaʶːsˤrˤaʶ jmkn ʔan jkwn ʃjʔ sˤaʶːlˤħ laː jmknnj ʃrħhu ʔakθr dʕjnaː nðhb aʶːlˤtwaʶːsˤlˤ aːlʔid͡ʒtmaːʕj d͡ʒdaː bnaːtja jaː ʔajhaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː ʔaʶtˤjʕwaʶː aːllh wʔaʶtˤjʕwaʶː aːlrswl wlaː tbtˤlˤwaʶː ʔaʕmaːlkm ʔaħb aːlfwaːkh waaːlllajli ʔiiðaaː jasri sʔalnj bdˤʕaʶ ʔasʔila wlkn aːlmrħ ljs kaːfjaːan ʔinaː nħn nħjj wnmjt wʔiljnaː aʶːlˤmsˤjrˤ liman ʃaaːʔa minkum ʔaan jataqaddama ʔaaw jataʔaaχχara ħtaː aːljwm drd͡ʒa aːlħraːra tħt aʶːlˤsˤfrˤ ljs lwqʕthaː kaːðba ʁaːdrt mnð aʶːlˤrˤqsˤaʶ maːðaː stfʕljn aːlljla jhmmnj ʔan ntbʕ aːlqwaːnjn fawaaːalllahi laqad satara smʕtu sˤwtaʶː fj ʁrfa aːlnwm waʔaand͡ʒajnaaː muwsaaː waman maʕahu ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna wamahijnun mustaðallun lqd χalaqaka fasawwaaːka faʕadalaka ʔaaħaduhumaaː min ðaaːtihi falaaː jantahij bihi aːlʔaamalu ʔilaaː ʁaaːjaain md͡ʒddaːan waːldnaː jðhb aːlj aːlʕml baːlsjaːra ʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlkafaraau aːlfad͡ʒaraau χtˤʔuʶkm ʕnd kl aːlnaːs mnaːʕaun mn aːld͡ʒdrj aːljwm rtbt aːlχaːdma srjrj ʕlaː hðh aːld͡ʒzr qd wldnaː wamansuwbun ʔilajhi ʔaafaaːʕijlu man sˤaʶaʶːħaʶbaʶ fʔand͡ʒjnaːh wʔahlh ʔilaː aːmrʔath qdrnaːhaː mn fʔaχðnaːhm ʔaχð ʕzjz mqtdr ln jsjʔ lkmaː ʔaħd aːlʔaamnu ʔaahnaʔau ʕajʃin aʶːntðˤrˤj lˤħðˤaʶ ʔilaː ʔajn tðˤnnjn nfski ðaːhbaan aːχtbʔa twm wraːʔ ʔammh ʕndmaː qlt lh ʔahlaː ʔajmknk ʔan tkrrh mra ʔaχraː nawʕin min aːlʕilmi faχuð minhu aːlħrwb laː tbdʔa hkðaː kmaː jbdʔa aːlʃtaːʔ bl aːlnaːs hm mn jbdʔawn aːlħrwb fmaː mnkm mn ʔaħd ʕnh ħaːd͡ʒzjn hðh aːld͡ʒmla mnfja maː aːlðj qlbhaː ʕljk faʔaaχaða ʔaabuw aːlʕbrjja maːrj qd fqdt aːlkθjr mn aːlwzn ʔaljs kðlk aːlsjaːraːt swf tʔatj waːħda tlw aːlʔauχraː wqaːlwaː aːlħmd llh aːlðj ʔaðhb ʕnaː aːlħzn ʔin rbnaː lʁfwr ʃkwr falaaː budda min kaʃfi aːlssababi ʔilaː mnzlh hl smʕt ʕn ntjd͡ʒa aːlmbaːraːa stħtaːd͡ʒwn aːlaː tsd͡ʒjl aːldχwl waʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːlmaʃʔaamaai maaː ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːlmaʃʔaamaai laː ʔaħbhaː sbħaːnh wtʕaːlaː ʕmaː jqwlwn ʕlwaː kbjraː wlmn sˤbrˤ wʁfr ʔin ðlk lmn ʕzm aːlʔamwr wmaː knt bd͡ʒaːnb aːlʁrbj ʔið qdˤjnaʶː ʔilaː mwsaː aːlʔamr wmaː knt mn aːlʃaːhdjn aːnt ðˤrˤjf d͡ʒdaː waχajru maaː fij aːlllaʔiijmi ʔaan jakuffa ʕank ʃarrahu hrr wlaː klb aːlmjnaːʔ χaːlin mn aːlθld͡ʒ ʔaʶħdˤrˤ aːlnbjð tqbblt maːrj kl ʃjʔ bdwn ʃkwaː ʔinhaː ʔaʶðˤhrˤthaʶː lj warawaaː ʔaabuw salamaaa ʕan ʔaabij hurajraaa ʔaanna rasuwla aːlllahi sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama qaaːla ʕaaːmilaaun naʶaʶːsˤiʶbaʶaʶuʶn swf aːlʕb kra aːltns ʁdaː haː hðaː aːlmaːʔ sˤaʶːlˤħ llʃrb hl ʔabwhaː tˤbjb waʶħiʶfðˤiʶ aːlʔaawzaaːni min aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶdaʶaʶː ħiʶfðˤaʶ aːlʕaqli min aːlhawaaː ʔiinaamaaː aːlʔaaʕmaaːlu biaːlniijaaːti waʔiinaamaaː likulii aːmriʔiin maaː nawaaː mn qaːl ħaːd ʕn aʶːsˤlˤh laː aʶːsttˤjʕ ʔijd͡ʒaːd mfaːtjħj hl jd͡ʒb ʔan tðhb ʔilaː mktb aːlbrjd fij kitaaːbin mmaknuwnin wajaskunu ʔilajhi aːlbarijʔu hl tʕrf ʔajn saːʕtj faʔaajna taðhabuwna aːlnʕaːm laː jmknh aʶːlˤtˤjrˤaʶːn faʶːlˤʕaʶːsˤfaʶːt ʕsˤfaʶː wd͡ʒʕl aːlqmr fjhn nwraː wd͡ʒʕl aːlʃms sraːd͡ʒaː wafutiħati aːlssamaaːʔu fakaaːnat ʔaabwaaːbanaː liʔaanna aʶːlˤtˤtˤuʶʁjaʶaʶːnaʶ markuwzun fij tˤaʶbʕiʶhiʶ ʔiðaaː aːstaʁnaaː ʔaχjraːan wd͡ʒdt wðˤjfaʶ bdʔa saːmj jʃkk ʔann ljlaː kaːnt twaːʕd ʔaaqsaaːmi maaː juʃkilu ʕalaaː man taʶsˤaʶwwaʶrˤaʶhuʶ laː ʔaħd jʕbr nhraː dwn ʔan jbtl fʔaχð aʶːlˤqaʶːdˤj jdh wʔamsk bjd d͡ʒħaː wnd͡ʒaː aʶːlˤðˤlˤm ðˤlˤmaʶːt jwm aːlqjaːma waʕalaaː ʔaːχara man ʔaammala ʔant daːʔimaː maː tnsaː ʔismj ʔawdd ʔan ʔaʶmdˤj bqjja ħjaːtj mʕk mdrrs aʶːlˤrˤrˤjaʶːdˤjaʶːt mðhl bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmni aːlrraħjmi saʔaala saːʔiilun biʕaðaːbin waːqiʕin watustadfaʕu makaaːʔiidu ʔazwaːd͡ʒkm bl ʔantm qwm ʕaːdwn liʔaanna aʶːlˤttaʶwaʶaʶːdˤuʶʕaʶ ʕaʶtˤuʶwfuʶn waaːlʕud͡ʒba munaffirun mrd͡ʒ aːlbħrjn jltqjaːn qd jkwn hðaː ʔalð ʕsˤjrˤ ʃrbth fj ħjaːtj qaːlwaː ʔard͡ʒh wʔaχaːh wʔarsl fj maʶrˤaʶdˤuʶn maaː waʕadanaaː aːlllahu warasuwluhu ʔiillaaː ʁuruwranaː ʔin sʕjkm lʃtaː ʔanaː sʕjd flˤstˤjn daːrj wdrb aʶːntsˤaʶːrˤj flˤstˤjn θaːrj wʔaʶrˤdˤ aʶːlˤsˤmwd snʕrf kjf nsˤlˤħ hðaː btˤrˤjqaʶ ʔaw bʔaχraː waθamuwdu waqawmu lˤuʶwtˤiʶn waʶʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbuʶ aːlʔaajkaai ʔauwlaʔiika aːlʔaaħzaaːbu wlmaː d͡ʒaːʔt rslnaː lˤwtˤaʶː sjʔ bhm wdˤaʶːq bhm ðrʕaː wqaːl hðaː jwm ʕsˤjb jraːwdnj ʔiħsaːsun ʕsˤjt rbj ʕðaːb jwm ʕðˤjm ʔinhaː tmtˤrˤ aːljwm ʔajn mðˤlˤtj qaːl ʔin lbθtm ʔilaː qljlaː lw ʔankm kntm tʕlmwn ʔiillaaː aːmraʔaatahu qaddarnaaː ʔiinnahaaː lamina aːlʁaaːbirijna χuliqa aːlrrad͡ʒulu min sjaːra d͡ʒdjda θm ʔawħjnaː ʔiljk ʔan aːtbʕ mla ʔibraːhjm ħnjfaː wmaː kaːn mn aːlmʃrkjn faʔiin ʔaʶaʶʕrˤaʶdˤuʶwaʶː faqul ʔaanðartukum sˤaʶaʶːʕiʶqaʶaʶaʶn miθla sˤaʶaʶːʕiʶqaʶaʶiʶ ʕaaːdin waθamuwda ðwaːtaː ʔafnaːn fkðbwh fʔaχðthm aːlrd͡ʒfa fʔaʶsˤbħwaʶː fj daːrhm d͡ʒaːθmjn walaqad nad͡ʒd͡ʒajnaaː banij ʔiisraaːʔiijla mina aːlʕaðaaːbi aːlmuhijni maaː lakum laaː taʶnaʶaʶːsˤaʶrˤuʶwnaʶ aʶːsˤlˤaʶwhaʶaʶː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi man balaʁa ʔaaʃuddahu laaːqij min aːlʕilmi ʔaaʃuddahu jwm tkwn aːlsmaːʔ kaːlmhl laː tns d͡ʒlb ʔadwaːt aʶːlˤmtˤbχ mθl aːlskaːkjn wʔaːnja aʶːlˤtˤbχ χmn aʶːlˤsˤaʶːʔiʶb ʔin biʁajri rawijjaain wjstʕd͡ʒlwnk baːlʕðaːb wlwlaː ʔad͡ʒl msmaː ld͡ʒaːʔhm aːlʕðaːb wljʔatjnhm bʁta whm laː jʃʕrwn ʔaalam tara ʔiilaaː aːllaðijna baddaluwaː niʕmata aːlllahi kufranaː waʔaaħalluwaː qawmahum daaːra aːlbawaaːri waːlðjn hm llzkaːa faːʕlwn aːlqnbla aːlnwwja hj slaːħ fðˤjʕ aːlthmt aːlnnjraːn mnzl ljlaː wʔatjnaːk baːlħq wʔinaː lˤsˤaʶːdqwn kun d͡ʒaːdananaː ʔard͡ʒwk bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm sʔal saːʔil bʕðaːb waːqʕ wtraː kl ʔama d͡ʒaːθja kl ʔama tdʕaː ʔilaː ktaːbhaː aːljwm td͡ʒzwn maː kntm tʕmlwn ʔajn ʔaqrb fndq kllu aʶːlˤqsˤaʶːʔiʶdiʶ mn ʕjnjki ʔaqbshaː maː hj twsˤjtk jaː ħðˤðˤ naːs tʃwfk waaːllaðijna ʕamiluwaː aːlssajiʔiaaːti θumma taaːbuwaː min baʕdihaaː waʔaːmanuwaː ʔiinna rabbaka min baʕdihaaː laʁafuwrun raħijmun qraːrh mn aːlaːn wlaː fsˤlˤ aʶːlˤsˤjf ʔiðaː ʔaklt lqmh hjʔat lʔaχraː raqijbanaː ʕalaaː aːlnnufuwsi fij χalawaaːtihaaː klaː ʔiðaː dkt aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ dkaː dkaː qad sˤaʶddaʶqtaʶ aːlrruʔujaaː ʔiinnaaː kaðalika nad͡ʒzij aːlmuħsinijna whw aːlðj χlq aːlljl aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤj ʕaːm d͡ʒdjd sʕjd ʕan ʔammi aːlmuʔuminjna ʔammi ʕbdi aːllhi ʕaːʔiʃaa rˤaʶdˤiʶj aːllhu ʕanhaaː qaːlat lqd kaːn jstħq aːlʕnaːʔ jawma tublaaː aːlssaraaːʔiiru jmnj aːlsʕjda mnjtj aːllħm mtˤbwχ waqaaːla ʃajχun min banij sulajmin liaːbnihi jaaː bunajja ʔijjaaːka waaːlrraquwba aʶːlˤʁaʶdˤuʶwbaʶ aʶːlˤqaʶtˤuʶwbaʶ aʶːlˤdˤħk blaː sbb mn qla aːlʔadb fj aːlbraːjaː sjdaː ʕmr aːlsjda ʔarbʕwn ʕaːmanaː tðljlaː maaː taʶsˤiʶjrˤuʶ bihi aːlnniʕmaau ʁaraaːmanaː waaːlzzaʕaaːmaau malaaːmanaː ʔataː aːlsjd braːwn ljraːk fwd͡ʒd ʔank ʁjr mwd͡ʒwd faʶsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶt aʶːlˤwaʶsˤlˤaʶaʶuʶ furqaaan waaːlʔaulfaau ʕadaaːwaaan waaːlbaħri aːlmasd͡ʒuwri sna aːllh aːltj qd χlt mn qbl wln td͡ʒd lsna aːllh tbdjlaː maːðaː jnbʁj ʔan jfʕlh fj rʔajkn ðalika bimaaː qaddamat ʔaajdijkum waʔaanna aːlllaha lajsa biʶðˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶːmiʶn lilʕabijdi waʔaammaaː aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶwaʶaʶːrˤiʶʔiʶuʶ fanawʕaaːni ʔaaħaduhumaaː ʃubhaaun taʶʕtaʶrˤiʶdˤuʶ aːlmaʕnaaː fatamnaʕu ʕan faʔiiðaaː kaaːna ʔaːlifanaː maʔaluwfanaː aʶːntaʶsˤaʶrˤaʶ biaːlʔaulfaai ʕalaaː ʔaaʕaaːdijhi maː rʔajk baːlðhaːb lmʃaːhda flm wamaaː taʃaaːʔuuwna ʔiilaːaːa ʔaan jaʃaaːʔ aːlllahu rabbu aːlʕaaːlamijna ldju ʔibna mtzwd͡ʒh mn rd͡ʒl frnsj ʔasʕd χtˤaʶːbuʶ aːlrʔijs aːlðj ʔalqaːh ʔams ʔaʶnsˤaʶːrˤh waʔaannaaː ðˤaʶnaʶnnaʶaʶː ʔaan lan taquwla aːlʔiinsu waaːld͡ʒinnu ʕalaaː aːlllahi kaðibanaː mtkʔijn ʕlaː frʃ btˤaʶːʔiʶnhaʶː mn ʔistbrq wd͡ʒnaː aːld͡ʒntjn daːn aːlnaːr ðaːt aːlwqwd rd͡ʒʕ bχfj ħnjn aːllaðijna jabχaluwna wajaʔamuruwna aːlnnaaːsa biaːlbuχli waman jatawalla faʔiinna aːlllaha huwa aːlʁanijju aːlħamijdu jaː ʔajhaː aːlnaːs qd d͡ʒaːʔkm brhaːn mn rbkm wʔanzlnaː ʔiljkm nwraː mbjnaː aːlʃʃaaːrida wajaqbal aːlʕaaːʔiida waʶjaʶħfaʶðˤ aːlmustawdaʕa faqada aːlmawd͡ʒuwda walam jad͡ʒid aːlmafquwda fʔamaː aːlðjn ʃqwaː ffj aːlnaːr lhm fjhaː zfjr wʃhjq wʔin jrwaː ksfaː mn aːlsmaːʔ saʶːqtˤaʶː jqwlwaː sħaːb mrkwm bʁja aːlaːχtbaːʔ mn aʶːlˤʃrˤtˤaʶ qdˤaʶː djmaː aːlljla fj sla qmaːma naħnu χalaqnaaːhum waʃadadnaaː ʔaasrahum waʔiiðaaː ʃiʔinaaː baddalnaaː ʔaamθaaːlahum tabdijlanaː falajsa limiθlihi fij aːlʔiiχaaːʔi ħaʶðˤðˤuʶn walaaː fij aːlwidaaːdi naʶsˤiʶjbuʶn maːðaː jrjd ʔan jfʕl faaːʕrif manzilatak min aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː bimanzilatik min aːlnnaaːsi θm jʔatj mn bʕd ðlk ʕaːm fjh jʁaːθ aːlnaːs wfjh jʕsˤrˤwn waʔiinna kullanaː lammaaː lajuwaffijanahum rabbuka ʔaaʕmaaːlahum ʔiinnahu bimaaː jaʕmaluwna χabijrun jawma taʃaqqaqu aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤuʶ ʕanhum siraaːʕanaː ðalika ħaʃrun ʕalajnaaː jasijrun ʔiinnaaː kaðalika nad͡ʒzij aːlmuħsinijna ljs mʔuχraː tslm ʔijdk walaʔiin muttum ʔaaw qutiltum laʔiilaaː aːlllahi tuħʃaruwna ʔard͡ʒwk dʕnj ʔaːχð ʔaχtk mn aʶːlˤmħtˤaʶ maaː samiʕnaaː bihaðaaː fij aːlmillaai aːlʔaːχiraai ʔiin haðaaː ʔiillaaː aːχtilaaːqun wdˤʕt aːlsmaːʕa qrjbaː mn ʔaðnj mtʃrf bmʕrftk laː ʔaħd ʔaʕrfhu jrtdj rˤbtˤaʶ aːlʕunuq bʕd aːlʔaːn wjwm jʕdˤ aʶːlˤðˤaʶːlˤm ʕlaː jdjh jqwl jaː ljtnj aːtχðt mʕ aːlrswl sbjlaː hw ʔaχj wlaː tˤʕaʶːm ʔilaː mn ʁsljn ʔanaː laː ʔaʶsˤdqk ʔant tkðb daːʔimaːan laː jftr ʕnhm whm fjh mblswn wʔaːt ðaː aːlqrbaː ħqh waːlmskjn waːbn aːlsbjl wlaː tbðr tbðjraː waʔiiðaaː aːlbiħaaːru fud͡ʒd͡ʒirat ʔaaqimi aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːaʶaʶ liduluwki aːlʃʃamsi ʔiilaaː ʁasaqi aːlllajli waqurʔaːna aːlfad͡ʒri ʔiinna qurʔaːna aːlfad͡ʒri kaaːna maʃhuwdanaː ʔawlʔik mʔawaːhm aːlnaːr bmaː kaːnwaː jksbwn ʔinkm wmaː tʕbdwn mn dwn aːllh ħsˤb d͡ʒhnm ʔantm lhaː waːrdwn aʶːnðˤrˤ kjf dˤrˤbwaʶː lk aːlʔamθaːl fdˤlˤwaʶː flaː jsttˤjʕwn sbjlaː twm laː jrjd mnj aːltħdθ ʕn maː naːqʃnaːh baːlʔams qaaːluwaː taaːlllahi laqad ʕalimtum maaː d͡ʒiʔinaaː linufsida fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ wamaaː kunnaaː saaːriqijna aːlʔaːn bʔimkaːn aːlʃrka ʔan tbrr hðh aʶːlˤmsˤaʶːrˤjf wtlk aːlqraː ʔahlknaːhm lmaː ðˤlˤmwaʶː wd͡ʒʕlnaː lmhlkhm mwʕdaː qaːm aʶːlˤmtðˤaʶːhrˤwn bdˤrˤb aːlʕdjd mn rd͡ʒaːl aʶːlˤʃrˤtˤaʶ ħtaː aːlmwt tħqq md͡ʒddaːan hl ldjk ʔaj mʃkla fj ðlk famaaː lahum laaː juʔuminuwna trjd ljlaː ʔan tʕjʃ mʕ saːmj kzwd͡ʒth twm fj aːd͡ʒtmaːʕ mʕ zbwn qaːla rswlu aːllhi sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːllhu ʕalajhi wasallama walaaː jatad͡ʒaaːwaza bihaaː qadra ħaqqihaaː hðaː jʕd͡ʒbnj kθjraː walajsa haðaaː aːlqawlu minhu tarʁijbanaː linabijjihi sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama fijhaaː kl maː ʕljk fʕlh hw ʔan tsmʕ bʕnaːja waːldtj laː ttħdθ aːlʔind͡ʒljzja bʃkl d͡ʒjd d͡ʒdaːan kn ljnaːan mn ʁjr dˤʕf wʃdjdaːan mn ʁjr ʕnf ʔant twaːʕdjn tˤaʶːlˤbaʶnaʶː mn kjʔiw ʔalst kðlk hðh tbdw kaːljwnaːnja lj lkn w baːlnsba
