ʔinaː knaː ðˤaʶːlˤmjn ʔinh lqwl fsˤlˤ walaqad sˤaʶrˤrˤaʶfnaʶaʶː fij haðaaː aːlqurʔaːni lijaððakaruwaː wamaaː jazijduhum ʔiillaaː nufuwranaː tsttˤjʕ aːlbħθ ʕn aːld͡ʒml aːltj tħtwj ʕlaː klma mʕjna waʶːlˤħsˤwlˤ ʕlaː trd͡ʒmaːt ltlk aːld͡ʒml faʔaarsalnaaː ʕalajhimu aʶːlˤtˤtˤuʶwfaʶaʶːnaʶ waaːld͡ʒaraaːda waaːlqummala waʶaʶːlˤdˤdˤaʶfaʶaʶːdiʶʕaʶ waaːlddama ʔaːjaaːtin muʶfaʶsˤsˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːtiʶn faaːstakbaruwaː wakaaːnuwaː qawmanaː mud͡ʒrimijna hðaː aːlqraːr nhaːʔij hl tqsˤdjnj ʃarru aːlkitaaːbaai aːlʃʃabaqu kamaaː ʔaanna ʃarra aːlqiraaːʔaai aːlhaðramaau ʔin aːllh jʕlm ʁjb aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ waːllh bsˤjrˤ bmaː tʕmlwn ðaːk aːlkrsj aʶːlˤmfdˤlˤ ldj laː ʃjʔ jʃtʁl ʔaʶʕtˤjhaʶː frˤsˤaʶ ʔaχraː ʕn ʔamjri aːlmʔumnjna ʔabj ħfsˤiʶn ʕmra bni aʶːlˤχtˤtˤaʶaʶːbiʶ rˤaʶdˤiʶj aːllhu ʕanhu qaːl waʔiin jarawaː ʔaːjaaan juʶʕrˤiʶdˤuʶwaʶː wajaquwluwaː siħrun mmustamirun ʔilaː frʕwn wmlʔih faːtbʕwaː ʔamr frʕwn wmaː ʔamr frʕwn brʃjd waːlðjn d͡ʒaːhdwaː fjnaː lnhdjnhm sblnaː wʔin aːllh lmʕ aːlmħsnjn hw laː jsttˤjʕ ʔan jtklm ħtaː aːlʔind͡ʒljzja naːhjk ʕn aːlʔalmaːnja kðb ʕljnaː kwnwaː mtsaːmħjn lˤiʶʔiʶiʶʕtˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶnaʶaʶː aːlħaqqa min ʔaanfusinaaː aʶːntˤlˤqaʶ mn tˤwkjw ʔilaː ʔawzaːkaː ʕaːdaan ʔaj mntdjaːt aːlnqaːʃ aːltj jstχdmhaː aːlfrnsjwn llħdjθ ʕn aːlsjaːsa waːlʔaumwr aːlmmaːθla wd͡ʒwh jwmʔið naːʕma ʕnd aːlʔiʃaːra tkwn aːlsaːʕa aːlwaːħda sˤbaʶːħaʶːaʶn wθmaːnin wχmsjn dqjqja wʔarbʕjn θaːnja ʔanaː msrwr lwd͡ʒwdk hnaː mʕj waraʔaaaː aːlmud͡ʒrimuwna aːlnnaaːra faʶðˤaʶnnuʶwaʶː ʔaannahum muwaaːqiʕuwhaaː walam jad͡ʒiduwaː ʕanhaaː maʶsˤrˤiʶfaʶnaʶː waːlðjn laː jʃhdwn aːlzwr wʔiðaː mrwaː baːllʁw mrwaː kraːmaː wamaaː bikum min niʕmaain famina aːlllahi θumma ʔiiðaaː massakumu aʶːlˤdˤdˤuʶrˤuʶ faʔiilajhi tad͡ʒʔaaruwna wjaː qwm maː lj ʔadʕwkm ʔilaː aːlnd͡ʒaːa wtdʕwnnj ʔilaː aːlnaːr faðarhum ħattaaː julaaːquwaː jawmahumu aːllaðij fijhi juʶsˤʕaʶquʶwnaʶ waːtl ʕljhm nbʔa aːlðj ʔaːtjnaːh ʔaːjaːtnaː faːnslχ mnhaː fʔatbʕh aʶːlˤʃjtˤaʶːn fkaːn mn aːlʁaːwjn wmaː wd͡ʒdnaː lʔakθrhm mn ʕhd wʔin aːlrraħijmi waʶaʶːlˤʕaʶsˤrˤiʶ ðlk ʔamr aːllh ʔanzlh ʔiljkm wmn jtq aːllh jkfr ʕnh sjʔiaːth wjʕðˤm lh ʔad͡ʒraː wbdmʕai aːlʁjmai ʔaħbbtk ʕsaː ʔan jhdjnj rbj lʔaqrb mn hðaː rʃdanaː waqijla liχaaːlidi bni sˤaʶfwaʶaʶːnaʶ waaːlθθaaːliθu aːlððakaaːʔu aːllaðij jastaqirru bihi ħiʶfðˤuʶ maaː taʶsˤaʶwwaʶrˤaʶhuʶ wafahmu maaː ʕalimahu waaːliaːstikθaaːra minhu taχallufanaː rbwʕu aːlʃʃʔaːmi brwd͡ʒu aːlʕalaː tuħaːkj aːlssmaːʔa bʕaːlj aːlsaanaː lahu maqaaːlijdu aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ waaːllaðijna kafaruwaː biʔaːjaaːti aːlllahi ʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlχaaːsiruwna walanuskinannakumu aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤaʶ min baʕdihim ðalika liman χaaːfa maqaaːmij waχaaːfa waʕijdi hl jwd͡ʒd aːj ʃχsˤ rbmaː jrjd ʔan jʔuðj twm ʔalaː ttbʕn ʔaʶfʕsˤjt ʔamrj ʔauħb td͡ʒrba ʔaʃjaːʔ d͡ʒdjda hm jtwaʶːsˤlˤwn mʕ bʕdˤhm aʶːlˤbʕdˤ baːlʔijmaːʔaːt haðaaː faljaðuwquwhu ħamijmun waʁassaaːqun ʕndmaː bdʔat lltw fj qraːʔa aːlktaːb tˤrˤq aːħdhm aːlbaːb waaːlʔaːminu min aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː ʁajru χaaːʔiifin wmaː jnðˤrˤ hʔulaːʔ ʔilaː sˤjħaʶ waːħda maː lhaː mn fwaːq θm ʔin ʕljnaː ħsaːbhm hl twd ʔan tʔatj baːldaːχil θm ltsʔaln jwmʔið ʕn aːlnʕjm waaːstiʕaaːnatuhu sˤiʶfaʶaʶuʶn laaːzimaaun lˤiʶtˤaʶbʕiʶhiʶ waχilqaaun qaaːʔiimaaun fij d͡ʒawharihi ħq mn ktb bmsk ʔan jχtm bʕnbr qm bh bnfsk wbaʶːlˤtˤrˤjqaʶ aʶːlˤsˤħjħaʶ aːld͡ʒzaːʔir tsˤdrˤ aʶːlˤnftˤ bdaː w kʔan ʃjʔiaː lm jħdθ ʔaam ħasibta ʔaanna ʔaʶaʶsˤħaʶaʶːbaʶ aːlsmaːʔ waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wmaː kaːnwaː mnðˤrˤjn waʶnaʶsˤaʶrˤnaʶaʶːhuʶ mina aːlqawmi aːllaðijna kaððabuwaː biʔaːjaaːtinaaː ʔiinnahum kaaːnuwaː qawma sawʔin faʔaaʁraqnaaːhum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna aːlknjsa bunjt fj aːlqrn aːlχaːms ʕʃr waaːstakbara huwa wad͡ʒunuwduhu fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ biʁajri aːlħaqqi waʶðˤaʶnnuʶwaʶː ʔaannahum ʔiilajnaaː laaː jurd͡ʒaʕuwna laː td͡ʒʕl mʕ aːllh ʔilhaː ʔaːχr ftqʕd mðmwmaː mχðwlaː wʕlmnaːh sˤnʕaʶ lbws lkm lˤtħsˤnkm mn bʔaskm fhl ʔantm ʃaːkrwn kaðalika juʔufaku aːllaðijna kaaːnuwaː biʔaːjaaːti aːlllahi jad͡ʒħaduwna hl ʔistlmta aːlrsaːla aːltj ʔarslthaː lka baːlʔams ʔaħb ʕjd aːlhaːlwjn ʔanaː ʔaqrʔa d͡ʒrjdtjn jwmjaːan ħtaː zrtm aːlmqaːbr kaðalika aːlʕaðaaːbu walaʕaðaaːbu aːlʔaːχiraai ʔaakbaru law kaaːnuwaː jaʕlamuwna aːnhi hðaː kaaːnat aːlʔiimaaːmaau ʔaawlaaː walaaː juʔuaddij ðalika ʔilaaː ʔiʶbtˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶ aːlʔiimaaːmaai aʶːnðˤrˤ ʕlm aːlmħaːsba dˤrˤwrˤj lnd͡ʒaːħ ʔaj ʃrka mlˤaʶːħðˤtk χaːrd͡ʒa ʕn aʶːlˤmwdˤwʕ kaðalika ħaqqat kalimatu rabbika ʕalaaː aːllaðijna fasaquwaː ʔaannahum laaː juʔuminuwna jaaː wajlataaː lajtanij lam ʔaattaχið fulaaːnanaː χalijlanaː lm ʔar ʔaħdaː mθlhaː qblaː hlaːaː naːwltnj aːlmaːʔ mn fdˤlˤk ʔanta ln tbtʕd hðh aːlmra waaːlllahu ʔaaʕlamu biʔaaʕdaaːʔiikum wakafaaː biaːlllahi walijjanaː wakafaaː biaːlllahi naʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶnaʶː maː knt lˤʔaʶtsˤlˤ bk lwlaː ʔan aːlʔamr mhm ʔaʶaʶjaʶtˤmaʶʕuʶ kullu aːmriʔiin mminhum ʔaan judχala d͡ʒannaaa naʕijmin laː jhmnj ʔajhm aːχtrt ldj ʔaχwaːn maaː kaaːna ʔiibraaːhijmu jahuwdijjanaː walaaː naʶsˤrˤaʶaʶːniʶjjaʶnaʶː walakin kaaːna ħanijfanaː muslimanaː wamaaː kaaːna mina aːlmuʃrikijna hl bslaːm ðlk jwm aːlχlwd wʔiðaː rʔajt θm rʔajt nʕjmaː wmlkaː kbjraː aːlʕlm jrfrf qaaːla qaaːʔiilun minhum ʔiinnij kaaːna lij qarijnun waʔiiðaaː buʃʃira ʔaaħaduhum biaːlʔaunθaaː ðˤaʶlˤlˤaʶ wad͡ʒhuhu muswaddanaː wahuwa kaʶðˤiʶjmuʶn twm aːstqaːl nmtu d͡ʒjdaː aːlljla aʶːlˤmaʶːdˤjaʶ aʶːħfaʶðˤiʶ aːllha tad͡ʒidhu ʔaamaaːmaka taʕarraf ʔiilaaː aːllhi fij aːlrraχaaːʔi jaʕrifka fij aːlʃʃidaai ʔaχʃj ʔanhu ʕmj ʔinh ujtħdθ aːlbrbrja lmudrsahu traːd͡ʒʕ saːmj waʶtˤaʶaʶːʕaʶtuʶhuʶ fij χalqihi tabʕaθu ʕalaaː maħabbatihi hl tħbaːn bʕdˤkmaʶː kθjranaː flaː ʔaqsm baːlʃfq ʔahdtnj χaːltj ktaːbanaː fj ʕjd mjlaːd aːlmsjħ waʔaanna ʔiilaaː rabbika aːlmuntahaaː waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ mddnaːhaː wʔalqjnaː fjhaː rwaːsj wʔanbtnaː fjhaː mn kl zwd͡ʒ bhjd͡ʒ ʔanaː lw knt ʁnjaːan knt ʔawd ʔan ʔaʶʕtˤjkaʶ maːl waħasbuk ʔaan jakuwna lak min ʔaaχijk ʔaakθaruhu ʔinj wd͡ʒdt aːmrʔaa tmlkhm wʔawtjt mn kl ʃjʔ wlhaː ʕrʃ ʕðˤjm ʔaʔant tˤaʶːlˤb jaːbaːnj nʕm ʔin llmtqjn ʕnd rbhm d͡ʒnaːt aːlnʕjm ʔauwlaʔiika aːllaðijna tˤaʶbaʶʕaʶ aːlllahu ʕalaaː quluwbihim wasamʕihim waʶʔaʶaʶbsˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶhiʶm waʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlʁaaːfiluwna flnʁlq aːltlfaːz ʔiðaː kaːn ʔaħd jsttˤjʕ ʔan jsaːʕdnaː fhwa twm ʔanaː ʔaʕml fj blda baːlqrb mn rwmaː kaːn jstmʕ ʔilaː aːlmwsjqaː fj ʁrfth ʔiðaː knt bħaːd͡ʒa lmsaːʕdtj fjrd͡ʒaː ʔiχbaːrnaː bðlk mn aːlmmkn ʔan jtʔaχr twm qaaːla ʔiinnamaaː ʔaaʃkuw baθθij waħuznij ʔiilaaː aːlllahi waʔaaʕlamu mina aːlllahi maaː laaː taʕlamuwna aːlʔaːn wbʕd ʔan tqaːʕdt ʔaʶsttˤjʕ aːlsfr klmaː ʃʔit qaːl twm aːnh aʶːsˤjb bmʁsˤ bʕd aːkl maː tˤbχth maːrj ʔaʃʕr bχjba ʔaml qfwnaː aːlrswl bnhd͡ʒ smaː ʔilaː sdra aːlmd͡ʒd fwq aːlsmaː ʔanaː aːlʕb aːlʔan kra aːlqdm wʔant maːðaː tfʕl fqaːl aːld͡ʒzaːr sʔaʶʕtˤjk lħmaːan kʔanh aːlzbd jd͡ʒb ʔan ʔaʶtˤjrˤ linurijaka min ʔaːjaaːtinaaː aːlkubraaː bilisaaːnin ʕarabijjin mubijnin flst ʕnh btaːʔib ʔiinnaaː qad ʔauwħija ʔiilajnaaː ʔaanna aːlʕaðaaːba ʕalaaː man kaððaba watawallaaː ʔanaː ʔaʶtttˤlˤʕ lˤqdˤaʶːʔ wqt mʕ ʔausrtj tˤmʕ aːlʔinsaːn jhdd ħjaːa kθjr mn aːlʔanwaːʕ aːlħja wlh aːlħmd fj aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wʕʃjaː wħjn tðˤhrˤwn watudbiru ʔidbaaːra aːlhaaːribi snħmj ħmaːk wnħn fdaːk wnksw rbaːk blwn aːlʔaml faʔaammaaː aːlqaaːʕidaau aːlʔauwlaaː aːllatij hija nafsun muʶtˤiʶjʕaʶaʶuʶn tbdw maːrj d͡ʒmjla flwlaː ʔalqj ʕljh ʔaswra mn ðhb ʔaw d͡ʒaːʔ mʕh aːlmlaːʔika mqtrnjn aːlnhr wʔasʕ jblʁ mnnaːd sta ʕʃr sna χðwh faːʕtlwh ʔilaː swaːʔ aːld͡ʒħjm ʔiillaaː ʔiiblijsa ʔaabaaː ʔaan jakuwna maʕa aːlssaaːd͡ʒidijna wʔand͡ʒjnaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wkaːnwaː jtqwn aːlmuʔuminu ʔaːlifun maʔaluwfun ʔin lm jħsˤlˤ aːlmrʔ ʕlaː maː jħb jħb aːlmrʔ maː ħsˤlˤ ʕljh ʔaʶsˤbħnaʶː sˤdjqjn ʕlaː aːlfwr hl ldjk mwʕd θm qjl llðjn ðˤlˤmwaʶː ðwqwaː ʕðaːb aːlχld hl td͡ʒzwn ʔilaː bmaː kntm tksbwn ʔanta kjf ʕlmta ðlk haðaaː baʶsˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶrˤuʶ lilnnaaːsi wahudanaː waraħmaaun liqawmin juwqinuwna wakaðalika nurij ʔiibraaːhijma malakuwta aːlssamaaːwaaːti waʶaʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ walijakuwna mina aːlmuwqinijna kaːn lh aːlwld aːsmh ʃjaːn waaːlllahu χalaqakum wamaaː taʕmaluwna ql ʔin kaːn llrħmn wld fʔanaː ʔawl aːlʕaːbdjn muttakiʔiijna fijhaaː ʕalaaː aːlʔaaraaːʔiiki laaː jarawna fijhaaː ʃamsanaː walaaː zamharijranaː aːd͡ʒls hnaːk maaː ʔaanta ʔiillaaː baʃarun miθlunaaː faʔati biʔaːjaain ʔiin kunta mina aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ hl ʕndk ħsaːb fj ʔaj mwqʕ tʃbjk aːd͡ʒtmaːʕj fajaħtamilu taʕaba aːlddarsi lijudrika raaːħaaa aːlʕilmi wajanfij ʕanhu maʕarraaa aːld͡ʒahli hj laː tħb aːlθʕaːbjn w aʶːlˤrˤjaʶːdˤjaʶːt taraaː aːlʕaqla bihaðihi aːlmaθaaːbaai watanfiru min aːlʕuqalaaːʔi haðaaː aːlnnufuwra waqaaːluwaː jaaː wajlanaaː haðaaː jawmu aːlddijni hj tʕml fj aːlmdrsa ʕlmt nfs maː qdmt wʔaχrt qaaːluwaː wad͡ʒadnaaː ʔaːbaaːʔanaaː lahaaː ʕaaːbidijna man ʔaaðallu aːlnnaaːsi faqaaːla ldj ʔalm fj ʔaktaːfj waʔiin tad͡ʒhar biaːlqawli faʔiinnahu jaʕlamu aːlssira waʔaaχfaaː maː ʔant bnʕma rbk bmd͡ʒnwn faʔiin lam taʔatuwnij bihi falaaː kajla lakum ʕindij walaaː taqrabuwni mn ʃbb ʕlaː ʃjʔin ʃaːb ʕljh laː tdʕwaː aːljwm θbwraː waːħdaː waːdʕwaː θbwraː kθjraː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi man lam jamut lam jafut waʕalaaː aːlllahi qaʶsˤduʶ aːlssabijli waminhaaː d͡ʒaaːʔiirun walaw ʃaaːʔa lahadaaːkum ʔaad͡ʒmaʕijna wakilaaːhumaaː jard͡ʒiʕu ʔilaaː aːlʕadli aːllaðij bihi salaaːmaau aʶːlˤssuʶlˤtˤaʶaʶːniʶ rʔajt qtˤaʶ trˤkdˤ ʕqb aːlklb ʔaajju ʃajʔin kaaːna χabaruk baʕdij qaaːla jaaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːlnnabiju d͡ʒaaːhidi aːlkuffaaːra waaːlmunaaːfiqijna waʶaʶːʁlˤuʶðˤ ʕalajhim wamaʔawaaːhum d͡ʒahannamu wabiʔisa aʶːlˤmaʶsˤiʶjrˤuʶ faʶʕaʶsˤaʶaʶː firʕawnu aːlrrasuwla faʔaaχaðnaaːhu ʔaaχðanaː wabijlanaː nmaː ʔawlaːdh waʶjaʶtˤuʶwfuʶ ʕalajhim ʁilmaaːnun llahum kaʔaannahum luʔuluʔuun mmaknuwnun lˤjqtˤʕ tˤrˤfaʶː mn aːlðjn kfrwaː ʔaw jkbthm fjnqlbwaː χaːʔibjn ʔanaː ʔabdaːan lm ʔaqtl ʔaj ʔaħdaːan waaːstaftaħuwaː waχaaːba kullu d͡ʒabbaaːrin ʕanijdin laʔaːkiluwna min aːlbjt min saʕaaːdaai aːlmarʔi ʔaan jakuwna radijʔa aʶːlˤχaʶtˤtˤiʶ wakaaːna ʕalijju bnu ʔaabij tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶn karrama aːlllahu wad͡ʒhahu jaquwlu mn ʕʃrjn tˤaʶːlˤb waːħd fqtˤ qrʔa aːlktaːb qaːl aːlðjn aːstkbrwaː ʔinaː kl fjhaː ʔin aːllh qd ħkm bjn aːlʕbaːd waqad ʔaʶaʶfsˤaʶħaʶ aːlmutanabbij biðalika fij qawlihi hl hw jħbnj ʔaʔiðaː mtnaː wknaː traːbaː wʕðˤaʶːmaʶː ʔaʔinaː lmdjnwn χaaːlidijna fijhaaː ħasunat mustaqarranaː wamuqaaːmanaː ʔaʶtˤfʔiʶ aʶːlˤdˤwʔ kaːnt ħjaːtj fj χtˤrˤ ʔatsaːʔl ʔin kaːn jħbnj bjnmaː knt ðaːhbaː ʔilaː aːlʕml aːltqjt bχaːlj lijunðira man kaaːna ħajjanaː wajaħiqqa aːlqawlu ʕalaaː aːlkaaːfirijna tlqjt brqja mnhaː twm laː jd͡ʒjd aːlsbaːħa mn naːħja ʔaχraː fhw d͡ʒjd fj lʕba aːlbjsbwl kamaaː naʕuwðu bik min aːlʕud͡ʒbi bimaaː nuħsinu fkðbwh fʔaχðhm ʕðaːb jwm aʶːlˤðˤlˤaʶ ʔinh kaːn ʕðaːb jwm ʕðˤjm ln jtˤrˤd mnnaːd baːja mn aːlmnzl aːltj ttˤlˤʕ ʕlaː aːlʔafʔida tʕd͡ʒbnj aːlkjka ʔaʶʕtˤ aʶːlˤqtˤ bʕdˤ aːllħm jaaː ʔaabati ʔiinnij ʔaaχaaːfu ʔaan jamassaka ʕaðaaːbun mina aːlrraħmani fatakuwna lˤiʶlˤʃʃaʶjtˤaʶaʶːniʶ walijjanaː d͡ʒʔit sjraːan ʕlaː aːlʔaqdaːm jamħaqu aːlllahu aːlrribaaː wajurbij aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶdaʶqaʶaʶːtiʶ waaːlllahu laaː juħibbu kulla kaffaaːrin ʔaaθijmin lqd tˤaʶlˤaʶbaʶ kwb mn aːlmaːʔ ql ʕsaː ʔan jkwn rdf lkm bʕdˤ aːlðj tstʕd͡ʒlwn lff saːmj ħblaː ħwl ʕnq ljlaː w χnqhaː ħttaː aːlmwt wad͡ʒhu fasaaːdihaaː ʔaanna ʃajχij lam jaðkurhaaː wamaaː lam jaðkurhu aːlʃʃajχu laaː χajra fijhi liʔaanna waaːd͡ʒibaaːti aːlʕuquwli laaː jad͡ʒuwzu ʔiʶbtˤaʶaʶːlˤuʶhaʶaʶː biaːlʃʃarʕi ʕndmaː tswq fj aʶːlˤðˤlˤaʶːm tħs w kʔank tħlq fj aːlsmaːʔ wajarawnahu muʶdˤiʶrˤrˤaʶnaʶː biχalqi aːlwaladi baʕijdanaː min nad͡ʒaaːbatihi ʔaannahaaː kalimaaun tuðkaru lilmubaaːlaʁaai walaaː juraaːdu bihaaː suwʔun aːlħdjθ aːlʔawl aːlʔaʕmaːl baːlnjaːt knt mdhʃaː qaːl djmaː lˤʔaʶsˤdqk aːlqwl zulzilati aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤuʶ zilzaaːlahaaː hl tðhb ʔilaː aːlknjsa famaaː lanaaː min ʃaaːfiʕijna waqaaːla ʔaabuw aːlʕabbaaːsi aːlmubarridu radaaːʔaau aʶːlˤχaʶtˤtˤiʶ zamaaːnaau aːlʔaadabi laː jʕjʃ fj hðaː aːlmbnaː ʔaħd d͡ʒiʔitu ʔilaː hnaː lʔataʕallm faʔiini aːntahawaː faʔiinna aːlllaha ʁafuwrun raħijmun man lam jaħtamil ðulla aːlttaʕalumi saaːʕaaan baqija fij ðulli aːld͡ʒahli ʔaabadanaː ql ʔin rbj jbstˤ aːlrzq lmn jʃaːʔ wjqdr wlkn ʔakθr aːlnaːs laː jʕlmwn ðalika waman juʶʕaʶðˤðˤiʶm ʃaʕaaːʔiira aːlllahi faʔiinnahaaː min taqwaaː aːlquluwbi faθabata ʔaanna aːlttad͡ʒaaːnusa waʔiin tanawwaʕa ʔaʶaʶsˤlˤuʶ aːlʔiiχaaːʔi waqaaːʕidaau aːliaːʔitilaaːfi laqad ʔaʶaʶħsˤaʶaʶːhuʶm waʕaddahum ʕaddanaː ʔin hðaː ʔilaː χlq aːlʔawljn tʕaːl ʔiðaː aʶːsttˤʕt maaː laaː jankaffuwna ʕanhu ʔillaaː bimaaːniʕin qawijjin ħbj lhaː kaːn ħqjqjaːan ʔinhm ʔalfwaː ʔaːbaːʔhm dˤaʶːlˤjn bʕd aʶːlˤðˤlˤmaʶːt tðˤhrˤ aʶːlˤdˤwʔ wlqd dˤrˤbnaʶː llnaːs fj hðaː aːlqrʔaːn mn kl mθl lʕlhm jtðkrwn faʔiin lam tafʕaluwaː walan tafʕaluwaː faaːttaquwaː aːlnnaaːra aːllatij waquwduhaaː aːlnnaaːsu waaːlħid͡ʒaaːraau ʔauʕiddat lilkaaːfirijna ʔakfaːrkm χjr mn ʔawlʔikm ʔam lkm braːʔa fj aːlzbr liʔaanna min aːlkalaaːmi maaː kaaːna masmuwʕanaː laaː jaħtaaːd͡ʒu fij fahmihi ʔilaaː taʔaammuli aʶːlˤχaʶtˤtˤiʶ bihi waʔiin jatafarraqaaː juʁni aːlllahu kullanaː min saʕatihi wakaaːna aːlllahu waaːsiʕanaː ħakijmanaː ʔalaː jsd͡ʒdwaː llh aːlðj jχrd͡ʒ aːlχbʔ fj aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wjʕlm maː tχfwn wmaː tʕlnwn rbnaː laː td͡ʒʕlnaː ftna llðjn kfrwaː waːʁfr lnaː rbnaː ʔink ʔant aːlʕzjz aːlħkjm ʔalqjaː fj d͡ʒhnm kl kfaːr ʕnjd lm jraː ʔaħd twm sqtˤ qlmj mn ħaːfa mktbj ʃʕrt sjʔia hðaː md͡ʒrrd maːʔ fqtˤ ʔaljs kðlk jʃwj twm aːllħm twqʕ twm ħdwθ ðlk aːnh mttˤwrˤ ʔink laː tnsˤt mtˤlˤqaʶːaʶn mn aʶːlˤʔaʶfdˤlˤ lj ʔan ʔatħdθ ʔilaː aːld͡ʒdaːr faʔaand͡ʒajnaaːhu waman maʕahu fij aːlfulki aːlmaʃħuwni ʕlmh ʃdjd aːlqwaː ʔakrh aːlsjaːsa whzj ʔiljk bd͡ʒðʕ aːlnχla tsaʶːqtˤ ʕljk rˤtˤbaʶː d͡ʒnjaː ʕmlt maːrj mrbbja lˤlˤʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤ ʕndmaː kaːnt mraːhqa wqaːlwaː rbnaː ʔinaː ʔaʶtˤʕnaʶː saːdtnaː wkbraːʔnaː fʔaʶdˤlˤwnaʶː aːlsbjlaː hl trjd mʃaːhda mqaːbla kra aːlqaːʕda ʕlaː aːltlfaːz ʔajhaː aːlqaːʔid llʕljaːʔ ʃʕbh faaːljawma aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː mina aːlkuffaaːri jaʶdˤħaʶkuʶwnaʶ aːnhaː χd͡ʒwla waʔiið ʁadawta min ʔaahlika tubawwiʔiu aːlmuʔuminijna maqaaːʕida lilqitaaːli waaːlllahu samijʕun ʕalijmun ʔauwlaʔiika aːllaðijna laʕanahumu aːlllahu waman jalʕani aːlllahu falan tad͡ʒida lahu naʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶnaʶː ʔam ʔaːtjnaːhm ktaːbaː mn qblh fhm bh mstmskwn ʔiið qaaːla liʔaabijhi waqawmihi maaː taʕbuduwna wmaː χlqnaː aːlsmaːwaːt waʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ wmaː bjnhmaː laːʕbjn qaaːluwaː laqad ʕalimta maaː lanaaː fij banaaːtika min ħaqqin waʔiinnaka lataʕlamu maaː nurijdu trk lj twm rsaːla ħtaː aʶːlˤtˤjwrˤ baːqja hunaː fj aʶːlˤðˤiʶlˤ aːnj ðaːhb ʔilaː aːldkaːn ʔalaːn waaːd͡ʒtabaaːhu linubuwwatihi sabbiħi aːsma rabbika aːlʔaaʕlaaː man taʃabbaha biqawmin fahuwa minhum kʔamθaːl aːllʔulʔu aːlmknwn laː tuħarrik bihi lisaaːnaka litaʕd͡ʒala bihi twm fj frq aːlbjsbwl d͡ʒaaːʔahu aːlħaquu wahuwa fij ʁaaːri ħiraaːʔin fad͡ʒaaːʔahu aːlmalaku faqaaːla aːqraʔa kaːnt wðˤjfaʶ aːlnsaːʔ aːlrʔijsja ħtaː zmn qrjb hj ʔan jtzwd͡ʒn wjldn aʶːlˤʔaʶtˤfaʶːlˤ wnaːdjnaːh mn d͡ʒaːnb aʶːlˤtˤwrˤ aːlʔajmn wqrbnaːh nd͡ʒjaː mrħbaː aːld͡ʒmjʕ ʔiinnaaː ʔaanzalnaaː ʔiilajka aːlkitaaːba biaːlħaqqi faaːʕbudi aːlllaha muʶχlˤiʶsˤaʶnaʶː lahu aːlddijna ʔinhaː sˤʁjrˤaʶ wʁjr naʶːdˤiʶd͡ʒaʶ ʔanaː ʔarj aːlftaːa ʕaːʃ mnnaːd fj hðaː aːlmnzl lʕaːm kaːml qaːl hj ʕsˤaʶːj ʔatwkʔa ʕljhaː wʔahʃ bhaː ʕlaː ʁnmj wlj fjhaː mʔaːrb ʔaχraː jaʔaajjuhaaː aːlrrusulu kuluwaː mina aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶjiʶbaʶaʶːtiʶ waaːʕmaluwaː sˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶħaʶnaʶː laː ʔaʶsttˤjʕ ʔan ʔaʶuʶsˤdq hðaː walaqad ʕalimtumu aːllaðijna aːʕtadawaː minkum fij aːlssabti faqulnaaː lahum kuwnuwaː qiradaaan χaaːsiʔiijna ʔanaː ʔaʶfdˤlˤ aːlsbaːħa ʕlaː aːltzld͡ʒ hl aːlħljb fʕlaːan mfjdun lˤlˤsˤħaʶ wbʃrnaːh bʔisħaːq nbjaː mn aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħjn qljl daːʔim χjr mn kθjr mnqtˤʕ mn sjkwn dˤħjth aːltaːlja waqaaːla aːbnu aːlmuʕtazzi man aːttaχaða ʔiχwaaːnanaː kaaːnuwaː lahu ʔaaʕwaaːnanaː ʔarjd aːlslaːm qul limani aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤuʶ waman fijhaaː ʔiin kuntum taʕlamuwna wʔin hðh ʔamtkm ʔama waːħda wʔanaː rbkm faːtqwn jaː ʔajhaː aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː aːtqwaː aːllh waːbtʁwaː ʔiljh aːlwsjla wd͡ʒaːhdwaː fj sbjlh lʕlkm tflħwn hl rʔajt aːlħaːdθ ħqaː jbʃrhm rbhm brħma mnh wrˤdˤwaʶːn wd͡ʒnaːt lhm fjhaː nʕjm mqjm watamtaniʕu min χawfihi aːlnnufuwsu aːlʕaaːdijaau ʔiinna aːllha kataba aːlʔiiħsaaːna ʕalaaː kulli ʃajʔin faʔiiðaaː qataltum faʔaaħsinuwaː aːlqitlaaa wʔaʕwð bk rb ʔan jħdˤrˤwn qrr twm ʔan jbdʔa btʕlm aːllʁa aːlfrnsja ʔin aːlðjn ʔaːmnwaː wʕmlwaː aʶːlˤsˤaʶːlˤħaʶːt kaːnt lhm d͡ʒnaːt aːlfrdws nzlaː laː ʔaʕtqd ʔan aːlkθjr mn aːlnaːs rˤaʶːdˤjn brwaːtbhm wʔalqaː fj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ rwaːsj ʔan tmjd bkm wʔanhaːraː wsblaː lʕlkm thtdwn faʶaʶːntˤaʶlˤaʶquʶwaʶː wahum jataχaaːfatuwna ln ʔad͡ʒrħ mʃaːʕrk ʔabdaː sˤbaʶːħ aːlχjr jaː maːjk hl ʔantm bχjr law maaː taʔatijnaaː biaːlmalaaːʔiikaai ʔiin kunta mina aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ qaaːla rabbi aʶːnsˤuʶrˤniʶj ʕalaaː aːlqawmi aːlmufsidijna maː fʕlth ʔanta kaːn χaʶːtˤʔiʶaʶːaʶn ljd͡ʒzj aːllh kl nfs maː ksbt ʔin aːllh srjʕ aːlħsaːb bal hum min aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔi aːlmaħðuwrijna fij biʶdˤʕiʶ sinijna lillahi aːlʔaamru min qablu wamin baʕdu wajawmaʔiiðin jafraħu aːlmuʔuminuwna kalaːaːa lammaaː jaʶqdˤiʶ maaː ʔaamarahu mn aːlshl aːlwqwʕ fj ʕaːdaːt sjʔia tatad͡ʒaaːfaaː d͡ʒunuwbuhum ʕani aʶːlˤmaʶdˤaʶaʶːd͡ʒiʶʕiʶ jadʕuwna rabbahum χawfanaː waʶtˤaʶmaʶʕaʶnaʶː wamimmaaː razaqnaaːhum junfiquwna ʔatʔatwn aːlðkraːn mn aːlʕaːlmjn waqaaːla sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama liʕadijji bni ħaaːtimin waqaaːla muʕaaːðu bnu d͡ʒabalin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi aːlr tilka ʔaːjaaːtu aːlkitaaːbi aːlmubijni waqaaːla aːlmaliku aːʔituwnij bihi ʔaʶaʶstaʶχlˤiʶsˤhuʶ linafsij falammaaː kallamahu qaaːla ʔiinnaka aːljawma ladajnaaː makijnun ʔaamijnun kaːnt mʃkla sˤʕbaʶ aːlħl ʔadt bnaː hðh aːlʔasʔila ʔilaː ʔafq aːstkʃaːf d͡ʒdjda mðhla waaːlθθaaːminu tˤuʶwlˤuʶ aːlʕumuri waaːttisaaːʕu aːlmuddaai lijantahija biaːliaːstikθaaːri ʔilaaː maraaːtibi aːlkamaaːli waman jaʕmal miθqaaːla ðarraain ʃarranaː jarahu aːlʕilmu θalaaːθaau ʔaaʃbaaːrin faman naaːla minhu ʃibranaː ʃamaχa biʔaanfihi waʶðˤaʶnnaʶ ʔaannahu naaːlahu ħsb aːlqrʔaːn fmaː aːlnd͡ʒwm ʔilaː msˤaʶːbjħ tustʕml kmqðwfaːt lrd͡ʒm aʶːlˤʃjaʶːtˤjn hl bʔimkaːnk aʶːlˤʔiʶmdˤaʶːʔ mn fdˤlˤk ʔanaː ʔarjd ʔan tuħibnj fmaː lh mn qwa wlaː naʶːsˤrˤ bismi aːlllahi aːlrraħmani aːlrraħijmi waaːlmursalaaːti ʕurfanaː wlkl ʔama rswl fʔiðaː d͡ʒaːʔ rswlhm qdˤj bjnhm baʶːlˤqstˤ whm laː jðˤlˤmwn aːlħdjθ aːlθaːlθ ʕʃr mn kmaːl aːlʔijmaːn ʔauwlaʔiika ʕalajhim sˤaʶlˤaʶwaʶaʶːtuʶn min rabbihim waraħmaaun waʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlmuhtaduwna wanawʕun laaː jumkinu liaːχtilaaːfi ʔaasbaaːbihi wataʁaaːjuri ʃuʶrˤuʶwtˤiʶhiʶ walaqad sabaqat kalimatunaaː liʕibaaːdinaaː aːlmursalijna hl twd ʔan tʔatj baːldaːχil hl tʕrf ʃjʔiaː ʕn ʕaːʔiltk waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu aːlmuʕtazzi aːld͡ʒaaːhilu kaʶrˤaʶwdˤaʶaʶiʶn ʕalaaː mazbalaain lqd tˤlˤb mnj maːl laaː tadʕuwaː aːljawma θubuwranaː waaːħidanaː waaːdʕuwaː θubuwranaː kaθijranaː laː jsmʕwn ʔilaː aːlmlʔi aːlʔaʕlaː wjqðfwn mn kl d͡ʒaːnb jaː ʔajhaː aːlnaːs aːʕbdwaː rbkm aːlðj χlqkm waːlðjn mn qblkm lʕlkm ttqwn klwaː wtmtʕwaː qljlaː ʔinkm md͡ʒrmwn ʔanaː sʕjd d͡ʒdaːan aːlʔaːn ʔam tsʔalhm ʔad͡ʒraː fhm mn mʁrm mθqlwn ʔaaw dijnun ħaaːd͡ʒirun rwaːh aːlttirmðj wqaːla ħdjθun ħasanun wfj bʕdˤiʶ aːlnnusaχi ħsnun sˤħjħuʶn ljs ldjnaː maːʔ hl jmknk ʔan tχbrnj kjf ʔaʶsˤlˤ ʔilaː aʶːlˤmħtˤaʶ wmaː ʔaʶdˤlˤnaʶː ʔilaː aːlmd͡ʒrmwn waqad χuliqnaaː baʕdahum fajanbaʁij ʔaan naʶnðˤuʶrˤaʶ lillaðij karihnaaːhu minhum fanad͡ʒtanibahu ʔanaː ʔaʶtttˤlˤʕ lʔid͡ʒaːza aʶːlˤsˤjf ʔinhu jtħdθ aːlbrbrja lʔiustaːðj waʔaammaaː biniʕmaai rabbika faħaddiθ fakajfa binafsi ʁajrihi aːnaː d͡ʒaːʔiʕ d͡ʒdaː laː aʶːsttˤjʕ aʶːntðˤaʶːrˤ wqt aʶːlˤaʶːftˤaʶːrˤ dʕnaː ntħlaː baʶːlˤʔiʶχlˤaʶːsˤ fqtl kjf qdr ʔanaː d͡ʒaːdunun jaː twm fðhbt ʔilaː baːʔiʕ aːldbs twm tˤbjb waʶʔaʶaʶdˤaʶlˤlˤaʶ firʕawnu qawmahu wamaaː hadaaː ħjaːth mljʔia baːlmʃaːkl lw kaːn ldj maː jkfj mn aːlmaːl laːʃtrjt tlk aːlħqjba wljħmln ʔaθqaːlhm wʔaθqaːlaː mʕ ʔaθqaːlhm wljsʔaln jwm aːlqjaːma ʕmaː kaːnwaː jftrwn faːsmʕwhaː ʔaqblnaː fjhaː wʔinaː lˤsˤaʶːdqwn tʕtqd ʔannj ʔanaː mn fʕlhaː ʔaljs kðlk fad͡ʒaʕalnaaːhaaː nakaaːlanaː limaaː bajna jadajhaaː wamaaː χalfahaaː waʶmaʶwʕiʶðˤaʶaʶaʶn lilmuttaqijna d͡ʒbl jsmw ʕlaː hðh aːldnaː wahuwa qaaːdirun ʕalaaː aʶːstiʶsˤlˤaʶaʶːħiʶ man juʕaaːdijhi biħusni sˤaʶnaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶʕiʶhiʶ waʔaajaaːdijhi bnsˤrˤ aːllh jnsˤrˤ mn jʃaːʔ whw aːlʕzjz aːlrħjm wajud͡ʒaaːniba ʔaahla aːlrrijabi mn fdˤlˤk aːktbhaː ʔanaː ʔaʕrf ʔanka maː zlt tħbnj kðbt θmwd btˤʁwaʶːhaʶː wahumaaː sababaaːni fij ʁajri aːlmutanaaːkiħajni laː tubqij walaː taðaru wʕlaː kl aːlʕbaːd km lnjlki mn ʔajaːdi kθjr mn aːlnaːs jqwmwn bðlk muddaaun wad͡ʒiddaaun waqarijħaaun waʃahwaaun ldj aːlkθjr mn aːlaːʕmaːl jtwd͡ʒb ʕlj aːlqjaːm bhaː qbl aːlʁd wad͡ʒaʕalnaaː fijhaaː d͡ʒannaaːtin min naχijlin waʔaaʕnaaːbin wafad͡ʒd͡ʒarnaaː fijhaaː mina aːlʕujuwni fajawmaʔiiðin laaː juʕaððibu ʕaðaaːbahu ʔaaħadun aːħmr wd͡ʒhh kaːltlmjð aʶːlˤsˤʁjrˤ hðaː jʕd͡ʒbnj frwħ wrjħaːn wd͡ʒnt nʕjm famakaθa ʁajra baʕijdin faqaaːla ʔaʶaʶħaʶtˤtuʶ bimaaː lam tuʶħiʶtˤ bihi wad͡ʒiʔituka min sabaʔiin binabaʔiin jaqijnin aʶːnχfdˤt drd͡ʒa ħraːra aːld͡ʒw ʔilaː maː tħt aʶːlˤsˤfrˤ hðaː aːljwm ʔaʶjdˤaʶːaʶn ʔaajaħsabu ʔaan lam jarahu ʔaaħadun rkz ʕlaː aːlʔaʃjaːʔ aːltj thm ħqaː frʃ ʃqa d͡ʒdjda jqtdˤj nfqaːt kbjra waːstʕjnwaː baʶːlˤsˤbrˤ waʶːlˤsˤlˤaʶːaʶ wʔinhaː lkbjra ʔilaː ʕlaː aːlχaːʃʕjn hðaː aːllħm mnqwʕ qul huwa aːllaðij ðaraʔaakum fij aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ waʔiilajhi tuħʃaruwna jaaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː ʔaʶaʶtˤiʶjʕuʶwaʶː aːlllaha warasuwlahu walaaː tawallawaː ʕanhu waʔaantum tasmaʕuwna ʔinh laː jqsˤd ʔan jʕaːml aːlʔaːχrjn bqswa ʔinhaː tˤbjʕth fħsb waaːʕlam ʔaanna maaː ʔaʶaʶχtˤaʶʔaʶkaʶ lam jakun lˤiʶjuʶsˤiʶjbaʶkaʶ wamaaː ʔaʶaʶsˤaʶaʶːbaʶkaʶ lam jakun lˤiʶjuʶχtˤiʶʔiʶaʶkaʶ laaː jaʁurranaka taqallubu aːllaðijna kafaruwaː fij aːlbilaaːdi ʔaʶħdˤrˤ ʔilaː aːlmdrs baːlħaːfla ʔilaː ħmjmaː wʁsaːqaː wajuʕallimuhu aːlkitaaːba waaːlħikmaaa waaːlttawraaːaa waaːlʔiind͡ʒijla mn lm jqnʕ baːljsjr lm jktf baːlkθjr kf ʕn lwj ðraːʕj jqʕ mktbnaː aːlrʔijsj fj mdjna ʔawsaːkaː hl tχbz χbz falammaaː d͡ʒaaːʔahaaː nuwdija ʔaan buwrika man fij aːlnnaaːri waman ħawlahaaː wasubħaaːna aːlllahi rabbi aːlʕaaːlamijna ʔaalam jaʕlamuwaː ʔaanna aːlllaha jaʕlamu sirrahum wanad͡ʒwaaːhum waʔaanna aːlllaha ʕallaaːmu aːlʁujuwbi lm ʔarjd aʶːjqaʶːdˤk ffhmnaːhaː sljmaːn wklaː ʔaːtjnaː ħkmaː wʕlmaː wsχrnaː mʕ daːwwd aːld͡ʒbaːl jsbħn waʶːlˤtˤjrˤ wknaː faːʕljn waʔaanna aːld͡ʒuwda baðlu aːlmawd͡ʒuwdi wahaðaaː takallufun juʶfdˤiʶj ʔilaaː aːld͡ʒahli biħuduwdi aʶːlˤfaʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶlˤiʶ ðalika biʔaannahum ʃaaːqquwaː aːlllaha warasuwlahu waman juʃaaːqqi aːlllaha faʔiinna aːlllaha ʃadijdu aːlʕiqaaːbi wamawaaːdda ʕumraaːnihaaː waχaraaːbihaaː twm ʔaraːd ʔan jðhb ʔajnmaː kaːnt maːrj tðhb saːmj msˤaʶːb baːaːlʔijdz aːnh mn aːqrbaːʔij aːlbʕjdjn ʔaammaaː aːlrraʁbaau fafij θawaaːbi aːlllahi taʕaaːlaaː lˤiʶtˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbiʶj maʶrˤdˤaʶaʶːtiʶhiʶ waʶħaʶaʶːfiʶðˤiʶj muʶftaʶrˤaʶdˤaʶaʶːtiʶhiʶ ʔawd kθjraːan ʔan tqbl tˤlˤbj maː qdrwaː aːllh ħq qdrh ʔin aːllh lqwj ʕzjz kaːn χaːʔifaː mn aʶːlˤðˤlˤaʶːm lm jql lj wlw klma waːħda aːlktaːb ʔaħmr wmaː ʕlaː aːlðjn jtqwn mn ħsaːbhm mn ʃjʔ wlkn ðkraː lʕlhm jtqwn maːðaː tʕtqdwn tˤwm kl jwm ʕndh shra ʃrb jaaː ʔaajjuhaaː aːllaðijna ʔaːmanuwaː ʔaʶaʶtˤiʶjʕuʶwaʶː aːlllaha waʶʔaʶaʶtˤiʶjʕuʶwaʶː aːlrrasuwla walaaː tuʶbtˤiʶlˤuʶwaʶː ʔaaʕmaaːlakum rabbanaaː ʔaaχrid͡ʒnaaː minhaaː faʔiin ʕudnaaː faʔiinnaaː ðˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶmuʶwnaʶ aːlm hðaː waʶːdˤħaʶː ʔanaː fχwr d͡ʒdaːan bka bsm aːllh aːlrħmn aːlrħjm waːlljl ʔiðaː jʁʃaː aːlddunjaaː daaːru sˤiʶdqiʶn liman sˤaʶdaʶqaʶhaʶaʶː ʔaʃkrk ʕlaː nsˤjħtk ʔiinnahumaaː min ʕibaaːdinaaː aːlmuʔuminijna ʔaaw janaaːluhu min nakbaain laː jsmʕwn fjhaː lʁwaː wlaː kðaːbaː waːlnχl baːsqaːt lhaː tˤlˤʕ ndˤjd qaːlwaː kðlk qaːl rbk ʔinh hw aːlħkjm aːlʕljm waːlnd͡ʒm waːlʃd͡ʒr jsd͡ʒdaːn ʔaʶdˤħt aːljwm sqaːla dˤχmaʶ llmaːda waʶːlˤtˤaʶːqaʶ aːthmnj aːlsjnaːtwr btʃwjh aʶːlˤmʕtˤjaʶːt km sjklf ðlk zwd͡ʒa maːrj tˤbjbaʶ aʶːlˤtˤaʶːlˤbaʶ aːltj d͡ʒlst ʔamaːm aːlmdrrsa mn ʔalmaːnjaː walaaː liħaaːðirin raaːħaaun ʔiin ħisaaːbuhum ʔiillaaː ʕalaaː rabbij law taʃʕuruwna fʔiðaː swjth wnfχt fjh mn rwħj fqʕwaː lh saːd͡ʒdjn fakaaːna haðaaː muʶwaʶdˤdˤiʶħaʶnaʶː limaʕnaaː maaː ðakarnaaː waʶtˤaʶʕaʶaʶːmaʶnaʶː sχrwaː mnhm maː kaːnwaː bh jsthzʔiwn ðhbt ʔilaː aːlmsrħ fj wqt mbkr d͡ʒdaː kj ʔad͡ʒd mqʕdaː d͡ʒjdaː ʔiillaaː man raħima aːlllahu ʔiinnahu huwa aːlʕazijzu aːlrraħijmu kaːn saːmj jʕjʃ fj qsˤrˤ fχm baːlqaːhra wabaaːdiraai safijhihim jurijdu biaːlmutaʃabbiʕi bimaaː laaː jamliku aːlmutazajjina bimaaː lajsa fijhi qaːlwaː jaː wjlnaː ʔinaː knaː ðˤaʶːlˤmjn kjf tfʕl ðlk wahija fijmaaː siwaaːhu min aːlʕuluwmi ʔaajsaru tʕbt mn aːlktaːba wzχrfaː wʔin kl ðlk lmaː mtaːʕ aːlħjaːa aːldnjaː waːlʔaːχra ʕnd rbk llmtqjn wmn ʔaʶʕrˤdˤ ʕn ðkrj fʔin lh mʕjʃa dˤnkaʶː wnħʃrh jwm aːlqjaːma ʔaʕmaː wajaħlifuwna biaːlllahi ʔiinnahum laminkum wamaaː hum minkum walakinnahum qawmun jafraquwna ʔaam ʔaːtajnaaːhum kitaaːbanaː min qablihi fahum bihi mustamsikuwna faʔiinna aːlʔiiχwaaːna ʕalaaː tˤaʶbaʶqaʶaʶːtiʶn muχtalifaain waʔaanħaaːʔin mutaʃaʕʕibaain laː tʕml aːlʕb fʔaʶʕrˤdˤ ʕnhm waʶːntðˤrˤ ʔinhm mntðˤrˤwn ʔaawalaaː jaðkuru aːlʔiinsaaːnu ʔaannaaː χalaqnaaːhu min qablu walam jaku ʃajʔianaː ʔinnhm mʕj rbnaː ʔink mn tdχl aːlnaːr fqd ʔaχzjth wmaː lˤlˤðˤaʶːlˤmjn mn ʔaʶnsˤaʶːrˤ jaħsabu ʔaanna maaːlahu ʔaaχladahu hl bʔimkaːnk ʔan tʕjrnj haːtfk aːlnqaːl lˤlˤħðˤaʶ waman lam juʔumin biaːlllahi warasuwlihi faʔiinnaaː ʔaaʕtadnaaː lilkaaːfirijna saʕijranaː falammaaː balaʁaaː mad͡ʒmaʕa bajnihimaaː nasijaaː ħuwtahumaaː faaːttaχaða sabijlahu fij aːlbaħri sarabanaː ʔanaː fχwra d͡ʒdaː bwaːldj faʔiinna aːlddunjaaː χuliqat lakum waʔaantum χuliqtum lilʔaːχiraai hwaːjtj aːld͡ʒdjda hj aːlmsaːhma fj mwqʕ ttwjbaː wʔiðaː btˤʃtm btˤʃtm d͡ʒbaːrjn aːksib tˤaʶjjiʶbaʶnaʶː bʔajdj sfra twm lm jkn ljʕrf aːlfrq ʔinnj ʔafhm maː tqwl faliðalika ðˤaʶnnaʶ aːld͡ʒaaːhilu aːlmarzuwqu ʔaanna aːlfaqra waʶaʶːlˤdˤdˤiʶjqaʶ muʶχtaʶsˤsˤuʶn biaːlʕilmi waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu ʕabbaaːsin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhumaaː jad͡ʒmaʕuwna maː hj rwaːjtk aʶːlˤmfdˤlˤaʶ ʔanaː mθaːlj ʔanaː laː ʔaʕrf ʔilj ʔajn ʔaðhb wlknj ʕlaː aʶːlˤtˤrˤjq sˤaʶdaʶaʶːquʶ ʔaummi kulθuwmin aːbnaai ʔaabij bakrin faqaaːla kmaː ʔanʃʔit ʔawqaːf saaːd͡ʒidijna ʔinhaː lm tqrʔa hðaː aːlktaːb aːlmaːʔ d͡ʒmjl ʔaʶʕtˤaʶːnj ʔabj saːʕaan ħlwa qaːlwaː nħn ʔawlw qwa wʔawlw bʔas ʃdjd waːlʔamr ʔiljk faʶːnðˤrˤj maːðaː tʔamrjn fj lndn aːlsaːʕa aːlʔaːn aːlsaːbʕa famarra biaːlmaaːli ʕalaaː ʕumara bni aʶːlˤχaʶtˤtˤaʶaʶːbiʶ rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu faqaaːla ʕd aːlj ʕʃra fahija aːlddijnu aːlmuttabaʕu faliʔaannahu jaʶsˤrˤiʶfuʶ aːlnnufuwsa ʕan ʃahawaaːtihaaː qul law ʔaantum tamlikuwna χazaaːʔiina raħmaai rabbij ʔiiðanaː laʔaamsaktum χaʃjaaa aːlʔiinfaaːqi wakaaːna aːlʔiinsaaːnu qatuwranaː kaːn saːmj bħaːd͡ʒa llttmrn fijhimaaː min kulli faaːkihaain zawd͡ʒaaːni wahuwa mimman d͡ʒaʕalahu aːlmaʔamuwnu min daaːʔi aːlʔiiχwaaːni laaː min dawaaːʔiihim waqad qaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi laaː tukθiranna muʕaaːtabaaa ʔiχwaaːnik fajahuwna ʕalajhim saʶχaʶtˤuʶk aːqraʔa kitaaːbaka kafaaː binafsika aːljawma ʕalajka ħasijbanaː walaqad ttaraknaaːhaaː ʔaːjaaan fahal min mmudakirin wlaː jmlk aːlðjn jdʕwn mn dwnh aːlʃfaːʕa ʔilaː mn ʃhd baːlħq whm jʕlmwn naħnu ʔaaʕlamu bimaaː jaquwluwna wamaaː ʔaanta ʕalajhim bid͡ʒabbaaːrin faðakkir biaːlqurʔaːni man jaχaaːfu waʕijdi klaː ʔinhm ʕn rbhm jwmʔið lmħd͡ʒwbwn tðˤaʶːhrˤ twm bʔanh lm jraː maːrj waʔaamina zalalahu faman tawallaaː baʕda ðalika faʔauwlaʔiika humu aːlfaaːsiquwna bimaaː ʁafara lij rabbij wad͡ʒaʕalanij mina aːlmukramijna jd͡ʒb ʕlj ħsaːb kmja aːlmaːl aːlðj swf ʔanfqh aːlaːsbwʕ aːlmqbl jtjmaː ðaː mqrba ʔablʁkm rsaːlaːt rbj wʔanaː lkm naʶːsˤħ ʔamjn wʔið ʔaːtjnaː mwsaː aːlktaːb waːlfrqaːn lʕlkm thtdwn waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi aːlbaʕijdu qarijbun bimawaddatihi waaːlqarijbu baʕijdun biʕadaaːwatihi fʔin kðbwk fqd kðb rsl mn qblk d͡ʒaːʔwaː baːlbjnaːt waːlzbr waːlktaːb aːlmnjr ʔaʶtsˤlˤ bhaː kl jwm faljabtadiʔi tˤaʶaʶːlˤiʶbuʶ aːlʕilmi biʔaawaaːʔiilihaaː ʔaʶaʶsˤbaʶħaʶ ʕumaru ʔaamara biaːlmaaːli fadufiʕa ʔilaaː ʔaummi kulθuwmin jχrd͡ʒ aːlħj mn aːlmjt wjχrd͡ʒ aːlmjt mn aːlħj wjħjj aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ bʕd mwthaː wkðlk tχrd͡ʒwn waaːld͡ʒaaːnna χalaqnaaːhu min qablu min naaːri aːlssamuwmi flnsʔaln aːlðjn ʔarsl ʔiljhm wlnsʔaln aːlmrsljn kaːnt md͡ʒrd qbla ʕlaː aːlχd mtaː sjnthj aːlʕaːlm wtrknaː bʕdˤhm jwmʔið jmwd͡ʒ fj bʕdˤ wnfχ fj aʶːlˤsˤwrˤ fd͡ʒmʕnaːhm faʶwaʶsˤaʶfaʶ nafsahu biaːlkarami χaaːlidijna fijhi wasaaːʔa lahum jawma aːlqijaaːmaai ħimlanaː ʔinhu mn aːlmmtʕ aːlχrwd͡ʒ mʕhu lqd drrb saːmj χjwl ljlaː aːlqzma hl tʕlm lmaːðaː aːnaː hnaː wlmaː blʁ ʔaʃdh ʔaːtjnaːh ħkmaː wʕlmaː wkðlk nd͡ʒzj aːlmħsnjn wʔamaː mn ʔawtj ktaːbh wraːʔ ðˤhrˤh aːllaðijna hum fij ʁamraain saaːhuwna wmaː ʔadraːk maː ʕljwn ʔanaː ʔardt fqtˤ aːltħqq mn brjdj aːlʔilktrwnj haːðaaː ħaaːsibijjun ttwjbaː lʔan aːllʁa ʔakθr mn md͡ʒrd klmaːt flaː jsttˤjʕwn twsˤjaʶ wlaː ʔilaː ʔahlhm jrd͡ʒʕwn liʔaanna aːlkalimaaa junabbihu ʕalajhaaː waʶsˤlˤuʶ ħuruwfihaaː wajamnaʕu faʶsˤlˤuʶhaʶaʶː min muʃaaːrakaai ʁajrihaaː kaːnt tlk aːlraːʔiħa krjha kaːn aːlmaːʔ aːzrqaː fʔardnaː ʔan jbdlhmaː rbhmaː χjraː mnh zkaːa wʔaqrb rħmaː tʕllm aːlʕrbjja ljs btlk aʶːlˤsˤʕwbaʶ faːlzaːd͡ʒraːt zd͡ʒraː jaː ʕumaru ʔaatadrij mani aːlssaaːʔiilu qultu aːllhu warasuwluhu ʔaaʕlamu ʔink ʔin tðrhm jdˤlˤwaʶː ʕbaːdk wlaː jldwaː ʔilaː faːd͡ʒraː kfaːraː bʔimkaːnj aːlʔaːn ʔan ʔaraː ʔajn hm ʔaʶsˤdqaʶːʔiʶj aːlħqjqjwn aːjn wldt ʔanna aːlnnabja sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːllhu ʕalajhi wasallama qaːla ʔanaː ʔatʕlm aːllʁa aːltʃjkja ʔilaː ʔajn hm ðaːhbwn ðlk aːljwm aːlħq fmn ʃaːʔ aːtχð ʔilaː rbh mʔaːbaː wʔinh lhdaː wrħma llmʔumnjn ljs ldj ʃjʔ ʔaːχr ʔaqwlh lillaðijna juʔuluwna min nisaaːʔiihim taʶrˤaʶbbuʶsˤuʶ ʔaarbaʕaai ʔaaʃhurin faʔiin faaːʔuwaː faʔiinna aːlllaha ʁafuwrun raħijmun fstaːnk d͡ʒmjl d͡ʒdaː θm sˤdqnaʶːhm aːlwʕd fʔand͡ʒjnaːhm wmn nʃaːʔ wʔahlknaː aːlmsrfjn aːld͡ʒzaːʔirjwn waːlʔatraːk ʔiχwa lqd χaːb ðˤnj fjk ql kl mtrˤbsˤ ftrˤbsˤwaʶː fstʕlmwn mn ʔaʶsˤħaʶːb aʶːlˤsˤrˤaʶːtˤ aːlswj wmn aːhtdaː maː hj frqatuka aːlmwsjqjja aʶːlˤmfdˤdˤlˤaʶ qaːlt ʔanaː jkwn lj ʁlaːm wlm jmssnj bʃr wlm ʔak bʁjaː ʔafmn kaːn mʔumnaː kmn kaːn faːsqaː laː jstwwn ʔanaː kbjr bmaː jkfj lʔaʃrb ʕlmt nfs maː ʔaʶħdˤrˤt hl ttħdθ aːltrkja wahuzzij ʔiilajki bid͡ʒiðʕi aːlnnaχlaai tuʶsaʶaʶːqiʶtˤ ʕalajki rˤuʶtˤaʶbaʶnaʶː d͡ʒanijjanaː faraaːʁa ʕalajhim dˤaʶrˤbaʶnaʶː biaːljamijni aʶːlˤtˤlˤaʶːb jstmʕwn ʔilaː aʶːlˤðˤaʶːlˤmjn ʔatwsl ʔiljk ʔan laː tdʕnj qddm lhaː nsˤjħaʶ tʕrf fj wd͡ʒwhhm ndˤrˤaʶ aːlnʕjm jrjdwn lˤjtˤfʔiʶwaʶː nwr aːllh bʔafwaːhhm waːllh mtm nwrh wlw krh aːlkaːfrwn θm ʔinkm ʔajhaː trjdnj ʔan ʔaχbrk tfdˤlˤ klj ʔaːðaːn sˤaʶːʁjaʶ fdˤrˤbnaʶː ʕlaː ʔaːðaːnhm fj aːlkhf snjn ʕddaː ʔinhaː mʃʁwla aːlʔaːn lðaː laː tsttˤjʕ aːltħdθ mʕk ʔin twm mstmʕ d͡ʒjd ʔawʕd͡ʒbtm ʔan d͡ʒaːʔkm ðkr mn rbkm biaːlħaqqi baʃijranaː wanaðijranaː waʔiin min ʔaummaain ʔiillaaː χalaaː fijhaaː naðijrun bdwr smaːʔik lm tħd͡ʒb wʃms d͡ʒbjnk lm tʁrb ʔinhaː mʕd͡ʒza ʔinhaː tħrkt ʔanaː ʔaʕtqd ʔanhaː aːlrjħ jsˤhrˤ bh ʔaan jaʶsˤrˤiʶfaʶ ʔilaaː aːlʕilmi ħaʶðˤðˤaʶnaʶː min zamaaːnihi waːllh d͡ʒʕl lkm aʶːlˤʔaʶrˤdˤ bsaʶːtˤaʶː sqtˤ twm ʕlaː wd͡ʒhh ʔatjħt lj aʶːlˤfrˤsˤaʶ lzjaːra baːrjs wmaː ʔanaː btˤaʶːrˤd aːlmʔumnjn hl ʔant waːθq ʔank trjd aːlðhaːb ʔilaː hnaːk χtˤb ʔaχj ʔaːnjr ʔibnt d͡ʒaːrnaː wʔanh tʕaːlaː d͡ʒd rbnaː maː aːtχð sˤaʶːħbaʶ wlaː wldaː wʔiðaː ttlaː ʕljhm ʔaːjaːtnaː bjnaːt qaːl aːlðjn kfrwaː llħq lmaː fʔad͡ʒaːʔhaː aʶːlˤmχaʶːdˤ ʔilaː d͡ʒðʕ aːlnχla qaːlt jaː ljtnj mt qbl hðaː wknt nsjaː mnsjaː fʕndnaː maːʔ sˤaʶːfiʶn fj aːlbjt ʔaaw juʶsˤbiʶħaʶ maaːʔuuhaaː ʁawranaː falan taʶstaʶtˤiʶjʕaʶ lahu tˤaʶlˤaʶbaʶnaʶː ʔiillaaː man ʔaataaː aːlllaha biqalbin salijmin wahaðihi ʔaumuwrun ʔin lam taʶχlˤuʶsˤ fij aːlʔaakfaaːʔi ʔaasraʕa fijhim taʶqaʶaʶːtˤuʶʕuʶ aːlʔaaʕdaaːʔi fafasaduwaː waʔaafsaduwaː ʔanta ʔaaħqaːbanaː aʶːnðˤrˤ ʔinnh qtˤtˤ jaʶħsˤiʶduʶ aːlfalaːaħu aːlqamħa waaːʕlam ʔaanna aːlfaqra d͡ʒundu aːlllahi aːlʔaakbara juðillu bihi kulla d͡ʒabbaaːrin ʕanijdin jatakabbaru waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ lilmuhallabi bni ʔaabij sˤuʶfrˤaʶaʶaʶ ʔijjaaːkum waaːliaːmtinaaːna biaːlmaʕruwfi faʔiinnahu juʶbtˤiʶlˤuʶ aːlʃʃukra laː ʃk ʔan twm jstmtʕ waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlllahi bnu aːlzzubajri waʔiijjaaːka waʔiird͡ʒaaːʔahu faʔiinna aːlʔiird͡ʒaaːʔa jufsidu ʃaʶtˤrˤaʶ sˤaʶlˤaʶaʶːħiʶhiʶ lnnsaː ðlk aːttfqnaː ʕljj ʔan ʔasaːʕdh wamaː ʔaursilwaː ʕalajhim ħaʶːfiʶðˤjnaʶ ʕdn ʔilaː aʶːlˤmsˤrˤf waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi lijakun aːstiħjaaːʔuuk min nafsik ʔaakθara min aːstiħjaaːʔiik min ʁajrik ʔaʶsˤlˤħt aːldraːd͡ʒa baːlʔams hðh qsˤaʶ d͡ʒdjda baːlnsba lj laː tns maː qlth lk llttw liʔaanna taqalluba aːlʔaaħwaaːli sakaraaun tuʶðˤhiʶrˤuʶ min aːlʔaaχlaaːqi maknuwnahaaː waqad kaaːna sˤuʶhaʶjbuʶ bnu sinaaːnin mazzaaːħanaː faqaaːla lahu aːlnnabiju sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː aːlllahu ʕalajhi wasallama fij taʔawijli qawlh taʕaaːlaaː tˤlˤb saːmj mn ljlaː ʔan tntðˤrˤ jawma jaχrud͡ʒwna mina aːlʔaad͡ʒdaːθi siraːʕanaː kaʔaannahum ʔiilaː nuʶsˤuʶbiʶn jwfiʶdˤwnaʶ ʔaafaman kaːna muʔuminanaː kaman kaːna faːsiqanaː laː jastawwna dfʕt ljlaː maːlaː lsaːmj wajamħaqu aːlʔaad͡ʒra ʕmaː aːlʕjn wlaː ʕmaː aːlqlb ʔaan junazzila aːlllahu min faʶdˤlˤiʶhiʶ ʕalaaːaː man jaʃaaːʔu min ʕibaaːdihi waħukija ʔaanna ʕabda aːlmaliki bna marwaaːna qaaːla lilʃʃaʕbiji ftħ aːlmdrrs aːlbaːb walaaː burhaaːnu aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːdiʶqiʶjnaʶ falaaː aːqtaħama aːlʕaqabaaa faliʔaanna maaː laaː daaːʕija lahu haðajaaːnun farubbamaaː kaaːna tuʶbsˤiʶrˤwnaʶ ʔaʶaʶsqaʶtˤaʶ ʃukrihi waman ʔauʕd͡ʒiba biʕamalihi ʔaʶuʶħbiʶtˤaʶ ʔaad͡ʒruhu ʕllm d͡ʒdd saːmj ħfjdh kjf jtˤlˤq aːlnnaːr fahaðaaː farqun maaː bajna aːlħuzni waʶaʶːlˤʁaʶdˤaʶbiʶ qijla ljlaː ħqqaː laː ʔarjdk ʔan tnsaːnj faʔiin kaaːna maħmuwdanaː ʔaʶaʶmdˤaʶaʶːhuʶ waʔaatbaʕahu bimaaː ʃaaːkalahu waʶdˤaʶaʶːhaʶaʶːhuʶ wabanjna ʃuhwdanaː ʔauʕd͡ʒb saːmj bðlk aːlfjdjw lakin ʔin wad͡ʒadahu qaʶrˤdˤaʶnaʶː marduwdanaː lam jaʔaχuðhu sˤiʶlˤaʶaʶaʶn wad͡ʒuwdanaː wabaʕda aːlʕadaaːwaai ʔiχwaaːnanaː waaːlʕaqlu jaħtaaːd͡ʒu ʔilaaː aːlttad͡ʒaaːribi ʔaħtaːd͡ʒ hðh aːlrsaːʔil wakawaːʕiba ʔaatraːbanaː aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤiʶ waʔiilajhi tuħʃarwna saːmj jħbbki waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlʔaudabaaːʔi aːlrruʕbu luʔumun waqaaːla ʕabdu aːlrraħmani bnu ʕawfin rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu waaːlqamari ʔiiðaaː aːttasaqa waʔiimmaaː aʶːstiʶbsˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶnaʶː faʶsˤaʶdaʶrˤaʶ ʕanhu min aːld͡ʒawaaːbi maaː ʔaaskata faqaaːla lahu rad͡ʒulun wazawd͡ʒaaan muʔuminaaan tuʕijnu ʔaaħadakum ʕalaaː dijnihi ʔaaħaduhumaaː maaː takuwnu aʶːlˤmuʶwaʶaʶːdˤaʶʕaʶaʶuʶ fij furuwʕihi ʔaaðlika χajrun nuzulanaː ʔaam ʃad͡ʒaraau aːlzzaqwmi jlʕb bmhaːra bal satru aːlʕawraai waaːd͡ʒibun biaːlʃʃarʕi ldaː saːmj mrˤjdˤaʶːt ʔaafatasmaʕuwna sˤaʶwaʶaʶːbaʶnaʶː ʔaaw χaʶtˤaʶʔaʶaʶn qaaːluwaː ʔanaː ʔaʶjdˤaʶːaʶn ʔaħb aːlmwsjqaː tmm aːʕtqaːl saːmj bsbb aːlssrqa mn aːlrrfwf faʔiin ðˤaʶhaʶrˤaʶaʶː kaaːna ħubbu aːlθθanaaːʔi kaaːðibanaː waaːlnnahaːri ʔiiðaː d͡ʒallaːhaː aːʕlam ʔaanna aːlʔaːdaaːba maʕa aːχtilaaːfihaaː bitanaqquli aːlʔaaħwaaːli wataʁajjuri aːlʕaaːdaaːti laaː jumkinu aːstijʕaaːbuhaaː limaːðaː takðibu laː ʔaraː ʃjʔiaːan nuʶsˤħuʶ man ʕallamuwhu waaːlrrifqu bihim kaaːna qawluhu marðuwlanaː maːðaː ʔafʕl fj hðh aːlʕjaːda aːlqðra man ħaʶsˤsˤaʶnaʶ sirrahu falahu biʶtaʶħsˤiʶjniʶhiʶ χaʶsˤlˤaʶtaʶaʶːniʶ wafij ʔaajji haðajni kaaːna waʶsˤmaʶaʶaʶn maaː lak tabkijna faqaaːlat liman ʃaːʔa minkum ʔaan jataqaddama ʔaaw jataʔaaχχara sbq ʔan ʔanhjnaː ʕmlnaː waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlħukamaaːʔi ʔinnamaaː halaka aːlnnaaːsu biʶfuʶdˤuʶwlˤiʶ aːlmdrrs ʕjnaːh law naʃaːʔu lad͡ʒaʕalnaːhu ħuʶtˤaʶːmaʶnaʶː faʶðˤaʶlˤtuʶm tafakkahwna waʶmuʶtaʶχaʶtˤtˤiʶjaʶnaʶː ʔilaaː aːltimaaːsi maaː laaː jastawd͡ʒibuhu liʔaannahu biaːlzzawd͡ʒaai waaːlχaaːdimi muʶtˤaʶaʶːʕuʶn fij ʔaamrihi waqaaːla ʕumaru bnu aʶːlˤχaʶtˤtˤaʶaʶːbiʶ rˤaʶdˤiʶjaʶ aːlllahu ʕanhu aːlmadħu ðabħu ʕlaː saːmj dfʕ tklfa aːlʕlaːd͡ʒ mn maːlh aʶːlˤχaʶːsˤ waʔaaχrad͡ʒati aʶːlˤʔaʶaʶrˤdˤuʶ muʕtaaːdanaː lahaaː laː ʔaħd baːldaːχl fj ʕamadin mumaddadaain jbdw twm bħaːl d͡ʒjda lima tad͡ʒannabta aːld͡ʒalijlaaː faqult lahaaː wad͡ʒaʕalnaː fjhaː d͡ʒannaːtin min naχjlin waʔaaʕnaːbin wafad͡ʒd͡ʒarnaː fjhaː mina aːlʕujwni wajudχiluhumu aːld͡ʒannaaa ʕarrafahaː lahum ʔaraːd saːmj ʔan jtzwwd͡ʒ mn aːmrʔaa mslma waruwija ʔaanna rad͡ʒulanaː ʃakaaː ʔilaaː rasuwli aːlllahi sˤaʶlˤlˤaʶaʶː ʔaχbrhaː ʔannh sjdʕnaː nʕwd ʔilaː qsmnaː ʔaʶsˤbħ saːmj mttˤrˤrˤfaʶː χtˤjrˤaʶː walajsa jamtaniʕu ðalika fij ʁajrihi waliðalika aːftaraqa wud͡ʒuwduhu minhu wamin ʁajrihi qaaːla fakuffa ʕan aːlʃʃari jakuffa ʕank aːlʃʃaru ʔiilaː rabbika jawmaʔiiðin aːlmustaqarru lajlaau aːlqadri χajrun min ʔaalfi ʃahrin d͡ʒaːʔ twm fj ʔaːχr lˤħðˤaʶ mn aːχtrʕ hðh aːlʔaːla saːmj jntðˤrˤ ljlaː ʔaataðkuru qawlak jawma kaðaaː ʔið marra bik tˤaʶaʶːrˤiʶquʶn fij mawkibihi faqaaːla sʔaːχð hðaː qum faʔaanðir muttakiʔijna ʕalaː sururin maʶsˤfwfaʶaʶiʶn wazawwad͡ʒnaːhum biħwrin ʕjnin walaaː juqdaru ʕalaaː ħaʶsˤrˤiʶhaʶaʶː wakaaːna biaːlrradi χalijqanaː ʔijaːk wsˤaʶːħb aːlswʔ fʔinh jħsn mnðˤrˤh wjqbħ ʔaθrh ʔijaːk wmaː jʕtðr mnh sˤaʶaʶːrˤaʶ aːlbardu qaaːrisanaː ʔilaːma jrmz ðlk aːlttaqwijmi waaːlttahðijbi waaːalllahi juwaaːrij sawʔaːtikum ʔaaj jasturu ʕawraaːtikum wasummijat aːlʕawraau sawʔaaa qaːlwaː naħnu ʔauwlw quwwaain waʔauwlw baʔasin ʃadjdin waaːlʔaamru ʔiilajki faʶaʶːnðˤuʶrˤj maːðaː taʔamurjna qaaːluwaː biʶʃaʶtˤrˤiʶn wajaʔaχuðu minhaaː biʶnaʶsˤiʶjbiʶn aʶːlˤqtˤtˤ tkrh aːlbll waqaaːla baʶʕdˤuʶ aːlbulaʁaaːʔi aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːdiʶquʶ muʶsˤaʶaʶːnuʶn χalijlun waaːlkaaːðibu muhaaːnun ðalijlun ʔinnhaː aːmrʔaa ʕindak min baqaaːʔiihaaː waqaaːla ʕamruw bnu aʶːlˤʕaʶaʶːsˤiʶ ʔaakrimuwaː sufahaaːʔakum faʔiinnahum jaquwnakum waʶmuʶtˤaʶaʶːlˤaʶʕaʶaʶiʶ ðij aːlʕaqli aːlrraaːd͡ʒiħi aʶːnðˤrˤ ʔiljj mn fdˤlˤk dʕaː saːmj qjla ʔaahkaðaː ʕarʃuki qaːlat kaʔaannahu huwa waʔawtjnaaː aːlʕilma min qablihaː wakunnaː muslimjna ʔaakθara aːlllahu fijnaaː miθlak ʔaaħaduhaaː ʁaʶdˤdˤuʶ aʶːlˤtˤtˤaʶrˤfiʶ ʕan ʔiθaaːratihaaː ʔaan ʔawlaːdj fj aːlħdjqa sʔaʕllmk lamad͡ʒmwʕwna ʔiilaː mjqaːti jawmin maʕlwmin kaθraau aːlʃʃakwaaː wabaθθu aːld͡ʒazaʕi ʔaħbb saːmj ljlaː hl smʕth kjf jsrʕ fj klaːmh saːmj hw sˤwt aːlʕdaːla fj hðaː aːlbld waliðalika d͡ʒaaːza ʔaan taʶstaʶfiʶjdˤaʶ aːlʔaaχbaaːru aʶːlˤsˤsˤaʶaʶːdiʶqaʶaʶuʶ ħattaaː taʶsˤiʶjrˤaʶ mutawaaːtiraaan rd͡ʒaːʔan laː tkðb ʕlj ʔin lm jkn wfaːq ffraːq ʔamaː zaːlt tmtˤrˤ nmaː ħzn saːmj kj jsˤbħ aːktʔiaːbaː hl tmtlk kmbjwtr χlʕt ljlaː ħðaːʔhaː hw ʕnjd kaːn saːmj jʕjʃ ħjaːa ʁrjba θumma huwa markuwbun wamaħluwbun waqijla fij manθuwri aːlħikami aːlmunaaː min baʶdˤaʶaʶːʔiʶiʶʕiʶ aːlnnawkaaː
